oṃṃ namaḥ paramātmane |
ātmatattvavivekaḥ |
śrīmadudayanācāryaviracitaḥ |
śrīśaṅkaramiśrādipraṇītaṣaḍvidhaṭīkāsahitaḥ |
svāmyaṃ yasya nijaṃ jagatsu janiteṣvādau tataḥ pālanaṃ
vyutpatteḥ karaṇaṃ hitāhitavidhivyāsedhasambhāvanam |
bhūtoktiḥ sahajā kṛpā nirupadhiryatnastadarthātmaka-
stasmai pūrvagurūttamāya jagatāmīśāya pitre namaḥ ||
śaṅkaramiśraviracitā1
ātmatattvavivekakalpalatākhyā ṭīkā |
śrīgaṇeśāya namaḥ |
saṃsārapaṭakuvindaṃ jagadaṇḍakalaśakulālamīśānam |
sargapralayasitāsitakusumasraṅmālinaṃ vande ||
śaṅkaramiśreṇāsyāmeva ṭīkāyāmagre “vādivinode sphuṭam” “anu
mānamayūkhe līlāvatīkaṇṭhābharaṇe ca darśita”mityuktatvādete 'pi granthā
anenaiva racitāḥ | evaṃ vaiśeṣikasūtropaskāraḥ kaṇādarahasyākhyaṃ praśastapāda
bhāṣyacchāyāvyākhyānaṃ khaṇḍanakhaṇḍakhādyavyākhyānaṃ ca viracitamityādi sati
staraṃ bhūmikāyāṃ nirūpayiṣyāmīti |
prāripsitasya nirvighnaṃ samāptimuddiśya kṛtaṃ maṅgalaṃ śivyaśikṣāyai
nibadhnāti | svāmyamiti | tasmai sarvajanaprasiddhāya | jagatāmīśāya
jagajjananānukūlakṛtiśaktimate namaḥ | vedaprāmāṇyagrahaupayikamā
ptatvaṃ1 darśayituṃ pitṛtvena taṃ rūpayati | pitra iti | avipralambha
kāyetyarthaḥ | pūrvagurūttamāya pūrvaguravo manukapilādayastebhya uttamā
yetyarthaḥ | tathā ceśvara eva vedavaktā tadanu smartāraḥ paraṃ manvādaya iti
bhāvaḥ | rūpakasyopamābhedatvena tannirvāhāya pitṛsāmyamāha | svāmya
miti | piturapi janiteṣu svāmyamīśasyāpi tathaiva teṣu yatheṣṭavi
niyogādhikāra ityarthaḥ | nijamiti | svābhāvikamityarthaḥ | ādau
janiteṣviti sambandhaḥ | tathā ca janakasyāpi janakatvamīśvarasya
dhvanitam | anyadapi pitṛsāmyamāha | tataḥ pālanamiti | hito
padeśatadācaraṇādinā rakṣaṇamityarthaḥ | anyadapi pitṛsāmyamāha |
vyutpatteriti | yathā pitā adhyāpanādinā puttrān vyutpādayati
tatheśvaro'pi prayojyaprayojakadehabhedamāśritya prāṇino gavādipada
jāte paṭādinirmāṇe ca vyutpādayatītyarthaḥ | sāmyāntaramāha | hitā
hiteti | hitāhitayoḥ hitavidhyahitavyāsedhayoḥ sambhāvanaṃ prāpaṇaṃ
jñāpanamiti yāvat | hitavidhiḥ svargakāmo yajetetyādiḥ |
ahitavyāsedho na kalañjaṃ bhakṣayedityādiḥ | tadubhayamupadiśya
jñāpayati | nanu kathamatra viśvāsa ityata āha | bhūtoktiriti |
yathā pituḥ puttrān prati vidhiniṣedhayoḥ satyoktistatheśvarasyāpī-
ṣāḍguṇyamiti pāṭhe tu
sarvajñatā tṛptiranādibodhaḥ svatantratā nityamaluptaśaktiḥ |
anantaśaktiśca vibhorvidhijñā ṣaḍāhuraṅgāni maheśvarasya ||
tyarthaḥ | satyatve mānamāha | sahajeti | dharmigrāhakamānādāptatveneva
siddheḥ tathā ca bhramapramādavipralipsāvirahāt taduktiḥ satyeti
bhāvaḥ | nanu svaprayojanābhāvāt kathaṃ hitāhite upadiśedityata
āha | kṛpeti | nirupadhireva paraduḥkhaprahāṇecchāsyetyarthaḥ | nanu
sāpi paraṃ duḥkhinaṃ dṛṣṭvā svasmin duḥkhotpatterbhavati na hīśvarasya
duḥkhamata āha | nirupadhiriti | anyathāsiddhiśaṅkārahitetyarthaḥ |
yadvā anaupādhikītyarthaḥ | upadhiḥ kāraṇaṃ tacca nityatvādeva
nāstīti svābhāvyādeva tatheti bhāvaḥ1 | na ca tarhi sukhinameva
sarvaṃ sṛjediti deśyam | adṛṣṭasāpekṣatvāt | yatnastadarthātmakaḥ tasyāḥ
kṛpāyāḥ arthaḥ paraduḥkhaprahāṇaṃ tadātmako yatnaḥ | yadvā tadartho
jagatprayojanaṃ tadevātmā yasya yatnasyetyarthaḥ | yadvā tatpadena hitā
hitapravṛttinivṛttī ucyete te arthaḥ prayojanaṃ yasya tadātmakasta
drūpa ityarthaḥ | atra sarvatra yasyetyāvartanīyam || bhagīrathaṭhakkurakṛtā2
ātmatattvavivekaprakāśikākhyā ṭīkā3 |
tathetyarthaḥ--pāº 2 | 3 puº |
asyaiva bhagīrathaṭhakkurasya meghaṭhākura iti jalada iti ca nāmāntaram |
anena dravyaprakāśiketi guṇaprakāśiketi cākhyayā prasiddhā kiraṇāvalī
prakāśaṭīkā līlāvatīprakāśaprakāśiketi cākhyayā prasiddhā līlāvatī
prakāśaṭīkā kusumāñjaliprakāśajalada ityākhyayā prasiddhā kusumāñjali
prakāśaṭīkā cāpi raciteti sarvaṃ savistaraṃ bhūmikāyāṃ nirūpayiṣyāmīti |
imāmeva ṭīkāṃ jaladanāmnā kecidvyavaharanti |
oṃṃ namaḥ śivāya |
dṛptadetyendradurbhedavakṣastaṭakapāṭabhit |
vedāntasārasarvasvaṃ nṛsiṃhaḥ pātu pāpanut ||
mananamokṣahetutvabodhakavedaprāmāṇyagrahaupayikaṃ bhagavadrūpaṃ nirdi
śanneva tannatiṃ vighnavighātaphalāṃ nibadhnāti | svāmyamiti | iśāya
kāryajātajanakasarvaviṣayakajñānāya namaḥ | nanvātmatvāviśeṣāt katha
masmadādīnāṃ sa namasya ityata āha | jagatāmiti | jagatāṃ
saṃsāriṇām | pitre janakāya | pitre namaskāra ucita eva |
nanvīśvarasya śarīrādyabhāve pitṛtvāsambhavānmanvādīnāmeva tattvamityata
āha | pūrveti | pūrvagurū mātāpitarau yadvā pūrve guravo manvādayaḥ
tebhya uttamāya tairapi svaśarīrādyutpattaye tadapekṣaṇāt | śarīra
janyajananāya tasyāpi śarīraparigrahādityarthaḥ | namasyataupayikaṃ
rūpāntaramāha | svāmyamiti | yato jagatāṃ pitā ato jagatsu
saṃsāriṣu yasya nijamasādhāraṇaṃ krayādyanapekṣaṃ vā svāmyaṃ yatheṣṭa
viniyogayogyatvam | tat kuta ityata āha | janiteṣu yena
yajjanyate tatra tasya svatvādityarthaḥ | eteneśvarasādhakaṃ janyatvaṃ mānaṃ
sūcitam | nanvasmadādīnāmeva tajjanakatvamāstāmityata āha |
ādau kāryadravyānādhāre sargādau śarīrābhāvādasmadādīnāṃ tajjana
katvaṃ na sambhavatītyarthaḥ | nanvīśvarasya prāṇisṛṣṭāveva vyāpārāt teṣāṃ
kathaṃ jīvanaṃ stanapānādīnāṃ tṛptisādhanatānumānābhāvena tatrā
pravṛtteḥ kathaṃ vā teṣāmaniṣṭasādhanānnivṛttiḥ tadaparicayādityata
āha | tataḥ pālanam jagatsu yasyeti sarvatrānvīyate | iṣṭāniṣṭa
sādhanopadeśena jagadyaḥ pātītyarthaḥ | tathāpyupadeśasya śabdarūpatvāt
tasya cāgṛhītasaṅketatvenābodhakatvāt tadgrāhakavyavahārādeva sambhava
ityata āha | vyutpatteriti | vyutpādyavyutpādakatāpannānāṃ kāya
madhiṣṭhāya vyavahāreṇa śabdārthayoḥ saṅketarūpajñānātmikāyā vyutpatteḥ
karaṇaṃ jagatsu yasyetyarthaḥ | nanu tāvatā padārthamātre śaktigrahe
svargasādhanatvādau vākyārthe tadabhāvānna yāgahiṃsādau pravṛttinivṛttī
ityata āha | hiteti | krameṇa hitāhitavidhivyāsedhayoḥ sambhā
vanaṃ jñāpanam | padārthavyutpattereva vidhāyakaniṣedhakavākyādiṣṭā
niṣṭhasādhanatāṃ pramāya pravṛttyādirityarthaḥ | tadupāyamāha | uktiḥ
śrutirūpā yasyetyarthaḥ | nanu tatprāmāṇyāgrahe tatopi kathaṃ kleśa
sādhye pravṛttirityata āha | bhūtā vākyārthayathārthajñānajanyā | tatra
mānamāha | sahajā dharmigrāhakamānasiddhā āptatvenaiva tatsiddhe
rityarthaḥ | nanu tathāpi cetanapravṛttiḥ prayojanajñānaṃ vinā na yuktā
sukhasya dharmābhāvenāsambhavāt | duḥkhābhāvasya cādharmābhāvena svataḥ
siddhatvādityata āha | kṛpeti | kāruṇikānāṃ paraduḥkhahānārthameva
pravṛttirityarthaḥ | nirupadhiḥ upadhiḥ kāraṇaṃ tacchūnyetyarthaḥ | anyeṣāṃ
hi kāruṇikānāṃ parakīyasukhaduḥkhajñānāt sukhaduḥkhe utpadyete
iti sveṣṭasādhanatājñānaṃ kṛpāhetuḥ iyaṃ tu tadapi nāpekṣata ityarthaḥ |
ata eva nirupadhiparaduḥkhaprahāṇecchā kṛpā tatra nirupadhitvaṃ vyarthaṃ
viśeṣaṇamityapāstam | kvacinniravadhiriti pāṭhaḥ | tatra pūrvotta
rāvadhiśūnyā | anutpannā avināśinītyarthaḥ sugamaḥ | jñāpana-
phalamāha | yatnaḥ pravṛttiḥ phalamityarthaḥ | tadarthātmakaḥ taddhitamahi
tahānaṃ cārthaḥ prayojanaṃ yasya tadrūpa ityarthaḥ || tārkikaśiromaṇiraghunāthakṛtā1
ātmatattvavivekadīdhityākhyā ṭīkā |
śrīgaṇeśāya namaḥ |
oṃṃ namaḥ sarvabhūtāni viṣṭabhya paritiṣṭhate |
akhaṇḍānandabodhāya pūrṇāya paramātmane ||
nirṇīya sāraṃ śāstrāṇāṃ tārkikāṇāṃ śiromaṇiḥ |
ātmatattvavivekasya bhāvamudbhāvayatyayam ||
śiṣṭācāraparamparāpariprāptābhimatakarmārambhasamayakartavyatākaṃ kṛta
miṣṭadevatānamaskāraṃ śiṣyān śikṣayitumādau nibadhnāti | svāmya
mityādinā | īśāya sārvajñyādiśāline namaḥ | śrūyate hi yaḥ
sarvajñaḥ sarvavidyasya jñānamayaṃ tapaḥ tasmādetadbrahma nāmarūpamannaṃ ca
jāyate | sarvajña iti sāmānyataḥ sarvaviditi ca viśeṣataḥ brahma
hiraṇyagarbhākhyam | smaryate ca |
sarvajñatā tṛptiranādibodhaḥ svatantratā nityamaluptaśaktiḥ |
anantaśaktiśca vibhorvidhijñāḥ ṣaḍāhuraṅgāni maheśvarasya || iti |
jagatāṃ nikhilaśarīriṇāṃ pitre janakāya | tathā ca smaryate
anenaiva tārkikaśiromaṇiraghunāthena tattvacintāmaṇidīdhitiḥ
kiraṇāvalīprakāśavivṛtiḥ nyāyalīlāvatīvibhūtiḥ padārthatattvanirūpaṇaṃ
khaṇḍanakhaṇḍakhādyaṭīkā sarvadarśanasaṃgrahaśca viracita iti savistaraṃ bhūmi
kāyāṃ nirūpayiṣyāmīti |
pitāhamasya jagata iti | pūrvagurubhyaḥ kapilakamalāsanādibhya
uttamāya teṣāmapi sa eva janaka iti bhāvaḥ | tasmai kasmai
ityapekṣāyāmāha | svāmyaṃ yasyetyādi | ādau sargādau janiteṣu
utpāditeṣu jagatsu yasya nijaṃ krayādyanapekṣaṃ svāmyam ātmanā
mutpattyabhāve 'pi viśeṣaṇasya śarīrasya tathātvādviśiṣṭasya tathā
vyapadeśaḥ | apūrvaśarīrādisambandharūpaṃ tu janma na mukhyo janyarthaḥ |
na vā tāvatāpi svāmyanirvāhaḥ | pālanaṃ rakṣaṇādi | vyutpattiḥ
śabdaśaṅketagrahaḥ | hitasya vidhiḥ kartavyatā | ahitasya niṣedho
'kartavyatvam | tayoḥ sambhāvanaṃ jñāpanam | uktiḥ śrutyādirūpā |
bhūtā yathārthā | sahajā svābhāvikī | rāgadveṣabhramādiviraheṇa
sarvasyā eva tadukteryathārthatvāt | tādrūpyeṇaiva tasya siddheḥ | kṛpā
parahitecchā | upadhiḥ svahitānusandhānaṃ tacchūnyā nityatvāt |
niravadhiritipāṭhe avadhiḥ sīmā tacchūnyā | nityatvena sarvapuruṣī
yasakalahitaviṣayakatvāt | tadarthātmakaḥ tajjanmādyuktiparyantam arthaḥ
prayojanaṃ yasya sa eva ātmā svarūpaṃ yasya sa tathā || mathurānāthatarkavāgīśakṛtā1
ātmatattvavivekarahasyākhyā ṭīkā |
anenaiva mathurānāthatarkavāgīśena tattvacintāmaṇiṭīkā rahasyākhyā
tattvacintāmaṇidīdhititattvacintāmaṇyālokayoṣṭīke rahasyākhye kira
ṇāvalīṭīkā kiraṇāvalīprakāśaṭīkā kiraṇāvalīprakāśavivṛtiṭīkāpi
rahasyākhyaiva nyāyalīlāvatīṭīkā ca nirmiteti bhūmikāyāṃ nirūpa
yiṣyāmi |
oṃṃ namaḥ paramātmane |
kuñcitādharapuṭena pūrayan vaṃśikāṃ pracaladaṅgulipaṅktiḥ |
mohayannakhilavāmalocanāḥ pātu ko'pi navanīradacchaviḥ ||
śrīmatā mathurānāthatarkavāgīśadhīmatā |
bauddhādhikāravivṛtirviśadīkṛtya racyate ||
nirvighnaṃ1 prāripsitagranthasamāptikāmanayā kṛtaṃ bhagavannamaskāra
rūpaṃ maṅgalaṃ śiṣyaśikṣāyai ādau nibadhnāti | svāmyamityādinā |
tasmai nama iti sambandhaḥ | kimbhūtāya tasmai pūrvagurūttamāya pūrvagurubhyo
manukapilakamalāsanādibhya uttamāya utkṛṣṭāya | utkarṣaśca teṣā
mapi ārādhyatvapūrvavartitvādirūpaḥ | punaḥ kīdṛśāya jagatāmīśāya
jagatāṃ nikhilaśarīriṇām īśāya jananānukūlacicchaktimate | punaḥ
kīdṛśāya jagatāṃ nikhilaśarīriṇāṃ pitre janakāya jananānukūla
kṛtiśaktiviśiṣṭāya | tasmai kasmai ityākāṅkṣāyāmāha | svāmya
mityādi | yasya puruṣasya ādau sargādau janiteṣu jagatsu
nikhilaśarīriṣu nijaṃ svāmyamiti yojanā | nijaṃ svetarasya
svāmyānavaruddhaṃ nijaśabdasya yasyaivetyavadhāraṇārthatvāt | svāmyaṃ svāmitvaṃ
jagatsvityatra nirūpakatvaṃ saptamyarthaḥ svatvaṃ vā svāmyaṃ saptamyarthaścādhe
yatvam | kecittu nijaṃ krayādyanapekṣamityāhuḥ | tadasat sargādau
janiteṣvityasyāvyāvartakatāpatteḥ | anyadapi paricāyakamāha | tataḥ
pālanamiti | yasya puruṣasya nijamiti sambaddhyate | nijaṃ svetara
pālanānavaruddhaṃ tatasteṣu sargādāvutpāditeṣu jagatsu pālanaṃ rakṣaṇam |
nirvighnena--pāº 2 puº |
paricāyakāntaramāha | vyutpatteḥ karaṇamiti | yasya nijaṃ tata
iti sambaddhyate | yasya puruṣasya sargādau janiteṣu nikhila
śarīriṣu nijaṃ śabdaśaktigrahakaraṇānavaruddhaṃ vyutpatteḥ śabdaśakti
grahasya karaṇaṃ sampādanamiti yojanā | bhagavāneva hi kevalaḥ
prayojyaprayojakadehamāśritya sargādau utyannān prāṇino gavādipadānāṃ
śaktiṃ grāhayati nānya iti bhāvaḥ | paricāyakāntaramāha | hitā
hiteti | yasya nijaṃ tata iti sambaddhyate | yavya puruṣasya sargādau
janiteṣu nikhilaśarīriṣu hitāhitavidhivyāsedhasambhāvanamiti
yojanā | nijaṃ svetarasya tādṛśasambhāvanānavaruddhaṃ hitavidhiḥ
iṣṭasādhanayāgādeḥ kartavyatā ahitavyāsedhaḥ aniṣṭasādhanasya
kalañjabhakṣaṇāderakartavyatā tayoḥ sambhāvanaṃ jñāpanam | paricāyakā
ntaramāha | bhūtoktiriti | yasyeti sambaddhyate | yasya puruṣasya
śrutyādirūpoktirbhūtā yathārthetyarthaḥ | yathārthatve1 mānamāha |
sahajeti | yataḥ sahajā svābhāvikī bhramādidoṣacatuṣṭaya2rahite
tyarthaḥ | kecittu yasya bhūtoktiḥ prasiddhārthakoktiḥ sahajā pramāṇarūpā |
na tu kāryānvitaśaktivādyupetāprāmāṇyavatītyartha ityāhuḥ | pari
cāyakāntaramāha | kṛpā nirupadhiriti | yasyeti sambaddhyate | yasya
puruṣasya kṛpā paraduḥkhaprahāṇecchā nirupadhiḥ sveṣṭasādhanatāpratisandhā
nājanyā | niravadhiriti pāṭhe yasya paraduḥkhaprahāṇecchārūpā
kṛpā niravadhiḥ avadhiḥ sīmā tacchūnyā parakīyasakaladuḥkhābhāva3-
yāthārthye--pāº 2 puº |
bhramādicatuṣṭayadoṣarahitetyarthaḥ--pāº 2 puº |
nikhiladuḥkhābhāva--pāº 2 puº |
viṣayiṇīti yāvat | na tu yatkiñcitpuruṣasya tadviṣayiṇī
rāgadveṣarahitatvāditi bhāvaḥ | paricāyakāntaramāha | yatnastadarthātmaka
iti | yasyeti sambaddhyate | yasya puruṣasya yatnaḥ tadarthātmakaḥ | jagatsu
utpattipālanavyutpattyādijanaka ityarthaḥ | tat jagadutpattyādyukti
paryantam arthaḥ prayojanaṃ yasya sa evātmā svarūpaṃ yasya sa tathā
iti vyutpatteḥ ||
iha khalu nisargapratikūlasvabhāvaṃ sarvajanasaṃvedana
siddhaṃ duḥkhaṃ jihāsavaḥ sarva eva taddhānopāyamavidvāṃso
'nusarantaśca sarvādhyātmavidekavākyatayā tattvajñānameva
tadupāyamākarṇayanti na tato'nyaṃ pratiyogyanuyogitayā
ca ātmaiva tattvato jñeyaḥ | tathāhi yadi nairātmyaṃ yadi
vātmāsti vastubhūtaḥ ubhayathāpi naisargikamātmajñānama
tattvajñānameva ityatrāpyekavākyataiva vādināmata ātma
tattvaṃ vivicyate |
śaṅkaº ṭīº |1 prekṣāvatpravṛttyarthamabhidheyaṃ2 prayojanaṃ ca darśayati |
iheti | iha granthe ātmatattvaṃ vivicyata iti sambandhaḥ | yadvā iha
saṃsāre tattvajñānameva tadupāyamākarṇayantīti sambandhaḥ | nanvātma
tattvavivekasyāsukhatvādaduḥkhābhāvatvācca na puruṣārthatvamataḥ kathaṃ
tadarthino'tra pravartantāmata āha | tadupāyamiti | duḥkhahānopāya
mityarthaḥ | puruṣārthasādhanatvādātmatattvaviveko'pi puruṣārtha eveti
‘śaṅkaº ṭīº |’ ityanena śaṅkaramiśrakṛtā ṭīkā ityavagantavyam |
evamagre 'pi |
prekṣāvatpravṛttyaṅgamadhidheyaṃ--pāº 1 puº |
bhāvaḥ | bhavedevaṃ yadi duḥkhahānamapi mukhyaḥ puruṣārtho bhavenna tvevaṃ
sukhecchayā tatra vṛtterata āha1 | nisargapratikūlasvabhāvamiti | ataḥ
svarasata eva taddhānecchetyarthaḥ | nanu duḥkhamapi sukhābhāvānnānyadityata
āha | sarvajaneti | sarvajanapratītisākṣikaṃ tadityarthaḥ | ātmāna
madhikṛtya pravartata ityadhyātmaṃ śāstram | ekavākyataikamatyam |

vyāpyaṃ na vā sattvamutpattivyāpyaṃ na vā kāryaṃ svopādānasamānakā

vā | ekadeśimatenāntyaśabde vidhikoṭiprasiddhiḥ niṣedhakoṭistva
līke saugatānāṃ mate ||
bhagīº ṭīº | virodhimānopasthitāvātmasādhakādapi tadasiddheḥ
tatra bādhakamuddhartuṃ tadvikalpayati | tatreti | ya ātmā
tattvato jñeyastatretyarthaḥ | yadyapi kṣaṇabhaṅgo nātmani bādhakaṃ
ghaṭavat kṣaṇikātmasattve 'pyavirodhāt tathāpi kṣaṇabhaṅge
santanyamānāni jñānānyevātmeti tadbhinnātmani bādhakaṃ kṣaṇa
bhaṅgādipadairatra sādhakamabhipretaṃ jñānabhinnaṃ bāhyam tadvijñānavāde
nāstīti so'pi jñānabhinnātmani bādhakaṃ guṇaguṇinorabhede 'pi
kṣaṇikajñānamātramātmeti na tadbhinnātmasiddhiḥ | anupalambhaḥ
śarīrādibhinnātmānanubhavaḥ | kṣaṇabhaṅge vipratipattayaḥ kāryaṃ svasama
vāyisamānakālīnaṃ na vā sattvamutpattivyāpyaṃ na vā kālagarbhavyāptau
yadā yatrāśraye sattvaṃ vartate tadā tatrotpattirvartata eva utpattiścaikakṣaṇa
eva vartata iti kṣaṇikatvaṃ bhāvānām | bhāvaḥ svotpattyavyavahitottara
kālīnadhvaṃsapratiyogī na vā etatkṣaṇavartino bhāvā anetatkṣaṇa
vartino na vā kāraṇāni prāgabhāvavyabhicārīṇi na veti ||
raghuº ṭīº | sati ca balavattarabādhakapramāṇe sādhaka
sahasrasyāpyakiñcitkaratvāt tadevādau nirasyati | tatretyādinā |
kṣaṇabhaṅgetyādau bhaṅgatrayaṃ bhaṅgasādhakamānaparamiti vadanti ||
mathuº ṭīº | sati balavati bādhake sādhakasahasrasyā
kiñcitkaratvam ataḥ prathamamātmano nityatvādisādhane bādhaka
māśaṅkya nirākaroti | ātmanīti | tatra vivecanaviṣaye ātmanī
tyarthaḥ | bādhakaṃ bhavaditi | nityatvajñānasukhādyāśrayatvaśarīrādi
bhinnatvarūpadharmasādhane bādhakaṃ bhavadityarthaḥ | kṣaṇabhaṅgaḥ ātmanaḥ
kṣaṇikatvam | etaccātmano nityatve bādhakam | nityatvaṃ ca
dhvaṃsāpratiyogitvarūpaṃ tannaye dhvaṃse alīke vā prasiddham |
tanmate 'pi dhvaṃsasyāpi anantatvābhyupagamāt | bāhyārthabhaṅgo veti |
padārthamātrasya jñānabhinnatvaviraho vetyarthaḥ | etacca ātmano
jñānāśrayatve vijñānavādināṃ bādhakam | abhede ādhārādheyabhā
vāsambhavāt | guṇiguṇabhedabhaṅgo veti | guṇini guṇabhedaviraho
vetyarthaḥ1 | etadapi jñānasukhādyāśrayatve bādhakamiti bhāvaḥ |
anupalambho veti | ātmanaḥ śarīrādibhinnatvenānupalambho vetyarthaḥ |
etacca ātmanaḥ śarīrādibhinnatve bādhakamiti bhāvaḥ ||
tatra na prathamaḥ pramāṇābhāvāt | yat sat tat
kṣaṇikaṃ yathā ghaṭaḥ saṃśca vivādādhyāsitaḥ śabdādiriti
cet na pratibandhāsiddheḥ ||
guṇiguṇabhedabhaṅgo veti mūlapāṭhamanusṛtya vyākhyātam |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | parābhimataṃ kṣaṇikatāyāṃ pramāṇamāha | yat
saditi | vyāptipakṣadharmatājñānamātramanumitijanakaṃ tadupadarśakau
codāharaṇopanayāveveti dvyavayava eva prayogo bauddhābhimataḥ |
vivādāspadatvamiha pakṣatāvacchedakam | śabdādiriti tvadhikaṃ
sphuṭārtham | yadvā śabdāditvenaiva pakṣatā | vivādāspadatvamantyaśabde
siddhasādhanavāraṇāya | śabdādiriti cālīkasya pakṣatāni
rāsāya | anyathā tatra sattvasya hetorasiddhau bhāgāsiddhiḥ syāt |
āditvaṃ prāmāṇikatvaṃ pakṣatāvacchedakam sattvaṃ cārthakriyākāritvaṃ
heturiti tayorbhedo'nyathā tadaikye vyāptigrāhakamānādeva
sādhyasiddhāvanumānavaiyarthyaṃ syāt | yadvā sattvenaiva pakṣatā hetutā ca
anumitistu prakārabhedaṃ liṅgopadhānādikamādāyeti na doṣaḥ |
ghaṭaḥ prasādhyāṅgako dṛṣṭāntaḥ na ca sattvena tasyāpi pakṣatve dṛṣṭāntatvā
nupapattiḥ | sādhyavattayā niścitatvamātreṇaiva dṛṣṭāntatā na tu
pakṣabhinnatvamapi tantram na cāṃśataḥ siddhasādhanaṃ viśeṣataḥ siddhāvapi
sāmānyasiddheruddeśyatvāt | ghaṭabhinnasattvena vā pakṣatā | pratibandheti |
pratibandho vyāptistasyāḥ kṣaṇikatvanirūpitāyā asiddherityarthaḥ |
kṣaṇikatvanirūpitā vyāptirantyaśabdatvādau prasiddhā sattve pratiṣidhyata
iti nāprasiddhiḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | kṣaṇabhaṅge parābhimataṃ mānamāha | yat saditi |
sattvaṃ prāmāṇikatvamarthakriyākāritvaṃ vā hetuḥ | pakṣatvaṃ ca na tena
rūpeṇa vyāptigrāhakamānenaiva siddhāvanumānavaiyarthyāt kintvanyathetyāha |
vivādeti | etaccāntyaśabdakṣaṇikatvavādināmaṃśataḥ siddhasādhana
nirāsāya | śabdādiriti cālīkavyāvṛttyā bhāgāsiddhinirāsā
rtham | pakṣatve cāditvasyaikasyābhāve 'pyananugamo na doṣaḥ | na caivaṃ
pakṣabhinne sandigdhānaikāntikam | sādhyābhāvavattvena niścitena
hetoḥ sattvāsattvasandeha eva tasya doṣatvāt | anyathāprasiddhānumāne
parvatāparvatadhūmavatāmekadharmābhāvena tadāpatteḥ (?) | ghaṭasya kṣaṇikatvā
siddhāvapi prasādhyāṅgakatayā svamatena dṛṣṭāntatvam | yadvā sattvenaiva
pakṣatvaṃ vyāptigrāhakamānāt sattvaṃ kṣaṇikatvavyāpyamiti buddhāvapi sadvi
śeṣyakakṣaṇikatvabuddheranumānaphalatvāt | sattvena ghaṭasya pakṣatve 'pi
rūpāntareṇa ghaṭatvena dṛṣṭāntatvāt sādhyavattayā niścitasyaiva tattvāt
pakṣānyatve satītyasya vaiyarthyāt abhedānumānābhāvāpātācca | na caivaṃ
dṛṣṭāntatvena tasya sādhyavattvāt sandehasisādhayiṣayorabhāvānna taddhaṭitaṃ
pakṣatvam | sattvāvacchedena sāmānyataḥ sandehe ghaṭasyāpi viṣayatvāt
ghaṭatvena sādhyasiddhau tena rūpeṇa tayorabhāvāt ata eva nāṃśataḥ
siddhasādhanam pakṣatvāvacchedakanānātva eva tasya doṣatvāt tatra buddhi
dvayasyoddeśyatvenaikasyāsiddheḥ | atra ca ghaṭaḥ kṣaṇika iti buddhāvapi
sanmātraṃ kṣaṇikamityuddeśyapratīterasiddheḥ | sattvena ghaṭabhinnasyaiva pakṣatva
mityapyāhuḥ | pratibandheti | yadyapi sattvena pratibandhamātrasya nāsiddhiḥ
prameyatvādinā tatsattvāt kṣaṇikatvavyāpteśca nirūpakāprasiddhernābhāvaḥ
tathāpi svotpattyavyavahitottarakṣaṇavartidhvaṃsapratiyogitvarūpakṣaṇikatvapra
siddhestannirūpitasattvaniṣṭhavyāptau vipakṣabādhakābhāvānmānābhāva ityarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | kṣaṇabhaṅge vipratipattiḥ śabdādiḥ kṣaṇiko na vā
kṣaṇikatvaṃ ca svādhikaraṇasamayaprāgabhāvādhikaraṇakṣaṇānutpattikatve
sati kādācitkatvam utpattimattvaṃ vā utpattiśca svādhikaraṇakṣaṇā
vṛttiprāgabhāvapratiyogikṣaṇasambandhaḥ | kṣaṇaśca svādheyapadārthaprāgabhā
vānādhārasamayaḥ | prasiddhistu vidheḥ naiyāyikānāṃ prāgabhāve carama
dhvaṃse ca niṣedhasya ca bauddhānāmalīke svādhikaraṇasamayaprāgabhāvā
dhikaraṇakṣaṇāvṛttitvaṃ kṣaṇikatvamiti tu jyāyaḥ | prasiddhiretasya
mahāpralaye prāgabhāvaścātra bhāvābhāvasādhāraṇo bodhyaḥ | antye
kādācitkābhāvo vā tenāntyabhāvavyudāsaḥ svādhikaraṇakṣaṇavṛtti
dhvaṃsapratiyogyavṛttitvaṃ vā kṣaṇikatvam | kṣaṇatvaṃ ca svāvṛttiyāvatsva
vṛttidhvaṃsapratiyogikatvaṃ svavṛttidhvaṃsapratiyogyanādhāratvaṃ vā kṣaṇo'pi
vā nopādeyaḥ | bhinnakālayoranādhārādheyabhāvo vā vṛttirvā
kālikī vaktavyā tenātītagocarakṣaṇikajñāne nāṃśato bādhādiḥ
śabdādiḥ svotpattyavyavahitottarakālīnadhvaṃsapratiyogī na vā svo
tpattivyāpyo na vā vyāptiśca kālikī vidhiprasiddhirekadeśinām
antyaśabda iti kecit | sattvamutpattivyāpyaṃ na vā ityādikaṃ tu
na yuktam | tathā sati sattvāderevotpattivyāpyatvādikasya sādha
yitumucitatvāt anumitikāraṇavyāptipakṣadharmatājñānajanakodāhara
ṇopanayātmakadvyavayavavādī bauddhaḥ kṣaṇikatve mānamāha | yat saditi |
sthūladravyābhyupagamena ghaṭo dṛṣṭāntaḥ prasādhyāṅgakaḥ tathotpādaviśiṣṭo
vā paramāṇusamūho ghaṭaḥ asanneva vā vyatirekadṛṣṭānta iti kecit |
vivādādhyāsita ityekadeśimatenāntyaśabde aṃśataḥ siddhasādhanavāra-
ṇāya svarūpakathanaṃ vā pakṣatāvacchedakāvacchedena sādhyasiddheruddeśyāyā
anutpannatvena tasyādoṣatvāt | śabdādiriti | vibhinnarūpeṇa pakṣatve
'pi na kṣatiḥ samūhālambanarūpāyā anumiteḥ sambhavāt keṣāñci
dviśiṣyānupādāne 'pi na tatra sandigdhānaikāntikatvaṃ gṛhītavyāpti
kasya hetostatra parāmarśe' numiterevodayāt | pakṣatvenopanyāsasyā
kiścitkaratvāt | prāmāṇikatvārthakriyākāritvarūpayoḥ sattvayo
rekatarasya pakṣatāvacchedakatvaṃ hetutvaṃ cānyatarasya pakṣatāvacchedakasya
hetutve 'pi na doṣaḥ | vyāptigraheṇa hetau sādhyasāmānādhikaraṇyāva
gāhane 'pi hetumān sādhyavān iti hetumattvāvacchedena hetuma
dviśeṣyakasādhyavattvabuddheruddeśyāyā aprasiddheḥ | pratibandho vyāptiḥ ||
mathuº ṭīº | tatra teṣu caturṣu bādhakeṣu madhye | pramāṇābhā
vāditi | ātmanaḥ kṣaṇikatve pramāṇābhāvāditi | ātmanaḥ
kṣaṇikatve saugato'numānamāśaṅkate yat sat tat kṣaṇikamityā
dinā | atra naiyāyikābhimataṃ sattāsāmānyameva sattvaṃ pratiyogi
dhvaṃsayoḥ sāmānyakāryakāraṇabhāvānurodhena sattāsāmānyasya parai
rabhyupagamāt | tasya dhvaṃsādyavṛttitvena sadvyavahārāniyāmakatve 'pi
kṣaṇikatvasādhakahetutve bādhakābhāvāt | dīdhitikṛtastu sattva
marthakriyākāritvaṃ kāryajanakatvamiti yāvat | prāmāṇikatvaṃ vā
sattvaṃ parairnityavastuno'nabhyupagamena vyabhicāravirahāt | na ca prāga
bhāvadhvaṃsayorvyabhicāraḥ tayoranādyanantatvena kṣaṇikatvavirahāditi
vācyam | tayorapi tannaye kṣaṇikatvāt dhvaṃsaprāgabhāvayoratirikta-
yoranabhyupagamācca | pareṣāmuttarapadārthasyaiva pūrvapadārthadhvaṃsarūpatvāt |
na cātiriktānantadhvaṃsānabhyupagame dhvaṃsāpratiyogitvarūpasya nityatvasyā
prasiddhyā ātmano nityatve kṣaṇabhaṅgasya bādhakatvāsambhavaḥ pareṇa
nityapadārthāntarasyānabhyupagamāt tadabhyupagame tatraiva vyabhicārāpatte
riti vācyam | asatkhyātivādināṃ teṣāmalīka eva tādṛśa
nityatvaprasiddhisambhavādityāhuḥ | kṣaṇikatvaṃ ca svādhikaraṇasamaya
prāgabhāvādhikaraṇakṣaṇāvṛttitvam etacca nyāyanaye mahāpralaye
prasiddham | svapadaṃ kṣaṇikatvenābhimataparam na tvavṛttitvapratiyogi
tādṛśakṣaṇavṛttiparam | pareṣāṃ dhvaṃsasyātiriktasyānabhyupagamena
svādhikaraṇasamayaprāgabhāvādhikaraṇavṛtteraprasiddheḥ sanmātrasya kṣaṇika
tvāt alīkasya ca kālamātrāvṛttitvāt | ātmādeḥ kālika
sambandhenāvartamānatvamupādāyārthāntarāpatteśca | ata eva tādṛśakṣaṇika
tvasya ātmanaḥ kālikasambandhenāvṛttitve 'pi sambhavāt dhvaṃsā
pratiyogitvarūpanityatve na bādhakamiti parāstam | paranaye ātmano
'pyutpattimattvena kālikasambandhena vartamānatayā svapadasya kṣaṇikatve
nābhimataparatvāt | samayapadaṃ ca kālikasambandhena svādhikaraṇatva
lābhāya | anyathā anāgatagocarajñāne vyabhicārāpatteḥ tasya viṣayatvā
vyāpyatvādisambandhena svādhikaraṇasyānāgatasya prāgabhāvādhikaraṇe
svotpattikṣaṇe vṛtteḥ | prāgabhāvādhikaraṇatvamapi kālikasambandhena
vivakṣitam | anyathā sarveṣāmeva viṣayitvāvyāpyatvādisambandhena svādhi
karaṇasamayaprāgabhāvādhikaraṇe samayaprāgabhāvaviṣayakasvasamānakālo
tpannajñānātmakakṣaṇe vṛtterbādhāpatteḥ | avṛttitvamityatra vṛttirapi
kālikī vaktavyā anyathātītagocarajñāne vyabhicārāpatteḥ | tasya
svādhikaraṇasamayaprāgabhāvādhikaraṇe 'tīte viṣayatvāvyāpyatvādi
sambandhena vṛtteḥ ghaṭe jñānamityādipratyayādiha hetāvupādhirneha
hetāvupādhirityādipratyayācca viṣayatvāvyāpyatvasambandhasyāpi vṛtti
niyāmakatvāt svātmakasvādhikaraṇasamayaprāgabhāvādhikaraṇakapālā
dāvupādānatvākhyasvarūpasambandhena vartamānatayā ghaṭādau vyabhicārāpa
tteśca | mahāpralayasyāpi svādhikaraṇasamayaprāgabhāvādhikaraṇe dhvaṃsā
tmakasthūlakālopādhau mahākāle ca vartamānatvāt nyāyanaye 'prasiddhi
vāraṇāya kṣaṇatvena praveśaḥ | kṣaṇatvaṃ ca spandatvam | na ca kṣaṇatvasya
spandatvarūpatve paramate kṣaṇikatvenābhimatānāṃ1 śabdādīnāmapi
svādhikaraṇasamayaprāgabhāvādhikaraṇasvotpattikṣaṇavṛttikṣaṇacatuṣṭayāva
sthāyivinaśyadavasthaspandavyaktau vartamānatvād bādhāpatteriti vācyam |
paramate bhāvamātrasyaiva kṣaṇabhaṅguratayā spandasyāpi kṣaṇacatuṣṭayāva
sthāyitvavirahāt | na caivaṃ paramate spandatvenopādānaṃ vyartham
vyāvartanīyasya mahākālasyāpi sthairyavirahāt prāgabhāvasya ca sthiratve
'pi akālatvāditi vācyam | paramate2 sthiradhvaṃsamādāyāprasiddhi
vāraṇāya tatsārthakyāt sādhye uparañjakaviśeṣaṇasyāpyadoṣatvācca |
nanvetādṛśakṣaṇikatvasya sādhyatve mahāpralayasyāpi pakṣatayā tatra
naiyāyikānāmaṃśataḥ siddhasādhanāsambhave 'pi mahāpralayāvyavahitaprāk-
kṣaṇikatvenābhipretānāṃ--pāº 2 puº |
paranaye--pāº 1 puº |
tṛtīyakṣaṇotpanna1kṣaṇadvayāvasthāyini antyabhāveṃ'śataḥ siddhasādhanaṃ
durvāram svādhikaraṇasamayasya svotpattikṣaṇasya prāgabhāvavati kṣaṇe
tasyāvṛtteḥ | na ca svādhikaraṇasamayasya svadvitīyakṣaṇasya prāgabhāva
vatyutpattikṣaṇa eva vartamānatvāt na siddhasādhanāvakāśa iti
vācyam | tadānīṃ vinaśyadavasthakriyāvyaktereva dvitīyakṣaṇatayā
tatprāgabhāvādhikaraṇe 'pi tasyāvartamānatvāt | na ca taduttarotpanna
dhvaṃso'pi taddvitīyakṣaṇaḥ tasya pratiyogirūpaprāgabhāvādhikaraṇe
svotpattikṣaṇa eva vartamānatvāt na siddhasādhanāvakāśa iti vācyam |
pratiyogino bhāvatve prāgabhāvatvavirahāt | na ca prāgabhāvatvaṃ vihāya
dhvaṃsatvenaiva viśeṣaṇīyamiti vācyam | tathā sati nyāyanaye mahā
pralaye prasiddhyasambhavāt | na ca pakṣatāvacchedakāvacchedena sādhyasiddhe
ruddeśyatvāt nāṃśataḥ siddhasādhanaṃ doṣāyeti vācyam | tathā sati
aṃśataḥ siddhasādhanavāraṇāya vivādādhyāsitatvaviśeṣaṇavaiyarthyāpatte
riti | maivaṃ bhāvābhāvasādhāraṇaprāgabhāvatvasyātra praveśāt prāgabhāvatvaṃ
vā vihāya2 kādācitkābhāvatvena vā praveśanīyam | tathā cāntya
bhāvasya svādhikaraṇasamayasya svotpattikṣaṇasya dhvaṃsarūpakādācitkā
bhāvavati dvitīyakṣaṇe vartamānatvena siddhasādhanānavakāśāt | yadvā
svādhikaraṇakṣaṇavṛttidhvaṃsapratiyogyavṛttitvaṃ kṣaṇikatvam etadapi
nyāyanaye mahāpralaye prasiddham | evaṃ ca prāgabhāvānabhyupagame bhāvā-
vyavahitapūrvatṛtīyakṣaṇotpanna--pāº 2 puº |
prāgabhāvatvamapahāya--pāº 2 puº |
bhāvasādhāraṇasya prāgabhāvatvasya paranaye dhvaṃsaprāgabhāvobhayasādhāraṇasya
kādācitkābhāvatvasya vā durvacatve 'pi na kṣatiḥ | paramate kṣaṇikatve
nābhimatānāṃ śabdādīnāmapi svādhikaraṇadhvaṃsātmakasthūlakālavṛtti
dhvaṃsapratiyogini svotpattikṣaṇe vartamānatvāt bādhavāraṇāya kṣaṇatve
nopādānam | kṣaṇatvaṃ ca bhāvatvam | nyāyanaye ca svādhikaraṇamahā
kālātmakabhāvamādāyaiva mahāpralaye prasiddhiḥ | na ca kṣaṇatvasya
bhāvatvarūpatve sarveṣāmeva svādhikaraṇadaṇḍādyātmakabhāvarūpasthūlakāla
vṛttidhvaṃsapratiyogini svotpattikṣaṇe vartamānatvāt bādhatādavasthyamiti
vācyam | paranaye bhāvamātrasyaiva kṣaṇikatvāt bhāvātmakasthūlakālasyā

dṛṣṭāntatvamiti vācyam | avayavino'nabhyupagame 'pi vilakṣaṇasaṃsthā
nāpannaparamāṇupuñjātmakasya ghaṭasyaiva dṛṣṭāntatvāt | kecittu asannevā
vayavirūpo ghaṭo vyatirekadṛṣṭānta ityāhuḥ | tadasat anvayyudāharaṇe
vyatirekadṛṣṭāntopanyāsasya kathakasampradāyaviruddhatvāt parairvyatireka
sahacāreṇānvayavyāptigrahānabhyupagamācca | yadyapyātmanaḥ kṣaṇikatva
sādhanasyaiva prakṛtatayā ātmatvenaiva pakṣatvamucitam tathāpi prasaṅgāt
sanmātrasyaiva kṣaṇikatvasādhanāt śabdāditvena pakṣanirdeśaḥ | śabdāditvaṃ
ca śabdaviṣayakabuddhiviṣayatvam | sadasatorekajñānāviṣayatvānnālīka
sādhāraṇyam | sattvameva vā śabdāditvam | pakṣatāvacchedakasya hetutve
'pi kṣativirahāt | na ca śabdāditvasya pakṣatāvacchedakatve ghaṭasyāpi
pakṣāntargatatvāt kathaṃ dṛṣṭāntatvamiti vācyam | pakṣatāvacchedakavato
dṛṣṭāntatve virodhābhāvāt | nanu tathāpi vivādādhyāsitatvaviśeṣa
ṇavaiyarthyam | na ca naiyāyikamate mahāpralaye aṃśataḥ siddhasādhana
vāraṇāya tadupādānamiti vācyam | pareṇa mahāpralayānabhyupagamāt
tatrāṃśataḥ siddhasādhanavāraṇāya viśeṣaṇopādānasyānucitatvāditi
cenna | antyaśabde prācāṃ naiyāyikānāmaṃśataḥ siddhasādhanavāraṇāya
tadupādānāt tadarthamupātte ca tasmiṃstata eva mahāpralaye 'pyaṃśataḥ
siddhasādhanānavakāśāt | svarūpakathanaṃ vā vivādādhyāsitapadaṃ pakṣa
tāvacchedakāvacchedena sādhyasiddheruddeśyatvācca mahāpralaye aṃśato naiyā
yikānāṃ siddhasādhanānavakāśaḥ | kecittu pakṣatāvacchedakavato
dṛṣṭāntatvānabhyupagamena dṛṣṭāntātiriktasya pakṣatvalābhāya tadupādāna
mityāhuḥ | na ca tathāpi pratijñādyaprayogāt nyūnatvamiti vācyam |
bauddhasya vyāptipradarśakodāharaṇapakṣadharmatāmātrapradarśakopanayātmakāvaya
vadvayavāditayā pratijñādyaprayogāt | vipratipattiśca śabdādiḥ
kṣaṇiko na vetyākārā kṣaṇikatvaṃ niruktameva | kecittu sattvamutpattivyāpyaṃ
na veti vipratipattiḥ vyāptiśca yadā yatra sattvaṃ tadā tasyotpatti
rityākārā tena kṣaṇikatve paryavasyati | yadvā svādhikaraṇakṣaṇo
ttaratvaṃ svadhvaṃsavyāpyaṃ na veti vipratipattirityāhuḥ | tadasat tathā
sati sattvāderutpattyādivyāpyatvasyaiva sādhayitumucitatvena yat sat tat
kṣaṇikamiti mūlāsaṅgateḥ | kecittu sattvātiriktadharmo dhvaṃsajanaka
tāvacchedako na veti vipratipattiḥ vidhikoṭirnaiyāyikānām
niṣedhakoṭiḥ pareṣām paranaye pratiyogimātrasya dhvaṃsajanakatvāt | na
caitāvatā na kṣaṇikatvamiti vācyam | pratiyogyatiriktasya dhvaṃsā
janakatayā pratiyogyutpattidvitīyakṣaṇa eva dhvaṃsotpādādityāhuḥ |
tadapyasat mūlāsaṅgateḥ | vyaktisthalīyāpattivāraṇāya paramate 'pi
pratiyogidhvaṃsayostattadvyaktitvena kāryakāraṇabhāvasyāvaśyakatayā niṣedha
koṭau bādhāpatteśca | navyāstu etatkṣaṇavṛttayaḥ etatkṣaṇānadhikaraṇa
samayavṛttayo na veti vipratipattiḥ | na ca niṣedhakoṭyaprasiddhiḥ
khaṇḍaśaḥ pratyekapadārthaprasiddhyā vākyārthībhūtaniṣedhaprasiddhisambhavāt |
pratiyogimadavṛttihetumattvajñānādevābhāvasyāprasiddhasyānumitisambha
vāt | mūle yat sadityatra sadityasya etatkṣaṇe sadityarthaḥ |
kṣaṇikatvaṃ ca etatkṣaṇānadhikaraṇasamayāvṛttitvam | yathoktakṣaṇikatvasya
sādhyatve svatvasyānanugatatvāt vyabhicārāpatteḥ | ghaṭaśca prasādhyāṅgako
dṛṣṭāntaḥ pakṣatāvacchedakaṃ śabdāditvamapyetatkṣaṇavṛttitvameva | ekadeśi-
nāmantyaśabde aṃśataḥ siddhasādhanavāraṇāya vivādeti | svarūpakathana
mātraṃ vā | yadvā etatkṣaṇavṛttayaḥ etatkṣaṇāvyavahitottarasamayavṛtti
dhvaṃsapratiyogino na veti vipratipattiḥ | vidhikoṭiḥ pareṣām |
niṣedhakoṭiśca naiyāyikānām | pakṣatāvacchedakāvacchedena vidhestatsā
mānādhikaraṇyena niṣedhasya siddheruddeśyatayā nāṃśataḥ siddhasādhana
bādhau | mūle yat sadityatra sadityasya etatkṣaṇe sadityarthaḥ |
kṣaṇikatvaṃ ca etatkṣaṇāvyavahitottarasamayavṛttidhvaṃsapratiyogitvam |
dṛṣṭānte ca ghaṭapadam etatkṣaṇāvyavahitottarasamayotpattikadhvaṃsa
pratiyogighaṭaparam | nātaḥ prasādhyāṅgatā | pakṣatāvacchedakamapi śabdā
ditvam etatkṣaṇavṛttitva vivādādhyāsita iti svarūpakathanamiti
prāhuḥ | tadasat mūlasya udakṣaratāpatteḥ | pratibandhāsiddheriti |
pratibandho vyāptiḥ tadasiddherityarthaḥ | na ca dhvaṃsasya pratiyogimātra
meva hetuḥ samavāyikāraṇanāśāderhetvantarasya kalpane 'tigauravāt1 |
tathā ca tatkṣaṇe sato bhāvasya tadavyavahitottarakṣaṇe vināśasyāvaśyaka
tayā pratibandhasiddhiriti vācyam | aprāmāṇikānantakṣaṇika
ghaṭāditannāśatadviśeṣahetuhetumadbhāvānāṃ kṣaṇikapūrvapūrvaghaṭādivyakteḥ
kṣaṇikottarottaraghaṭādivyaktiṃ prati hetuhetumadbhāvānāṃ ca kalpa
nāmapekṣya samavāyikāraṇanāśāderhetutvakalpanāyā eva laghutvāditi
bhāvaḥ | yadvā ghaṭasya prasādhyāṅgakadṛṣṭāntatayā anvayasahacāraniścayā
bhāvena vyāptyaniścayāditi bhāvaḥ ||

parābhyupagatameva taccātrāstyeva | atha viparyayaviṣayeyaṃ phakkikā
tathāhi yayorvirodhastadabhāvayorapi virodha iti samarthatvakāri
tvayorvirodhe tadabhāvayorapi virodha iti | yadyakāritvaṃ hetustatra
tadā bādhaḥ atha sādhyamasti tadā hetorasiddhiriti | na hi
yayorvirodhastadabhāvayorapi virodha iti niyamaḥ gotvāśvatvā
bhāvayorekatra sattvāt kiṃ ca nirviśeṣitasāmarthyena nirviśeṣita
kāritvaṃ nāpādyate prasaṅge tathā satīṣṭāpatteḥ | yāvatsattvaṃ kiñcit
karaṇāt viparyaye sādhyahetvorbādhāsiddhī kintvaṅkurasāmarthyenāṅkura
kāritvamāpādyate | evaṃ viparyaye 'ṅkurākāritvāṅkurāsāmarthyayorghaṭena
sahabhāva eveti kva virodhaḥ | yattu sāmarthyena kāritvāpādane
bādho virodhaḥ ata evāsiddhirvyāptyasiddhiriti | tanna upajīvyatvena
vyāptyabhāvasyaiva doṣatve virodhābhidhānasyāprayojakatvāt | api ca
sāmarthyakaraṇayoḥ parasparavirodhe 'karaṇādasamarthamiti viparyaye go
tvāśvatvayostṛtīyakoṭivat sāmarthyakaraṇātiriktakoṭisambhave vyabhi
cāro'pi syāt | atrāhuḥ tarkapakṣe āpādyatāprayojakavyāptibādha
evāpādyabādhaḥ āpādakatāprayojakavyāpyatvarūpaprayojakaviraha evā
pādakāsiddhiḥ vyāpyatvāsiddhipadena ca vyabhicāro'pi gṛhyate
akaraṇādasamarthamiti viparyaye tṛtīyakoṭyaṅgīkāreṇa vyabhicāra
sattve vyāpyatvasya tatrāpyabhāvāt | yadvā gotvāśvatvayoriva virodhā
bhyupagame karaṇāt sāmarthyānumitirna syāt | vyāvṛttyorvirodhena
niyatasāmānādhikaraṇyarūpavyāptyabhāvāt dṛṣṭānta ityavyākṛtya
vyākhyeyamiti vayam | dṛṣṭānte ghaṭādau yadi heturasti tadā bādhaḥ
sādhyābhāvaḥ sādhyavikalo dṛṣṭānta ityarthaḥ | atha dṛṣṭānte sādhya
masti tadā sādhanaṃ nāstītyasiddhiḥ sādhanāsiddhiḥ sādhanavikalo
dṛṣṭānta ityarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | tadeva vyutpādayati | sa ceti | sa virodhaḥ |
mitha ityādi | vyāvartyasya niyamena pratikṣepāt pratikṣepamātrasya
vyabhicārisādhāraṇyādetāvataiva sāmañjasye mitha iti vyāvṛttyo
rasāmānādhikaraṇyasya sphuṭatarapratipattaye | bādhāsiddhī dharmiṇi
sādhyasādhanayorabhāvau | tathā cāsamarthākārivyāvṛttyorekatarasattve
'nyatarābhāvaniyamena sāmānādhikaraṇyavirahe prasaṅge virodho vipa
ryaye ca vyabhicāra iti bhāvaḥ ||
nāpi tadākṣepapratikṣepābhyāṃ vṛkṣatvaśiṃśapātvavat parā-
parabhāvānabhyupagamāt | abhyupagame vā samarthasyāpyakaraṇa
masamarthasyāpi vā karaṇaṃ prasajyeta ||
śaṅkaº ṭīº | nanu gotvāśvatvavat parasparātyantābhāvasāmānādhi
karaṇyaṃ māstu vṛkṣatvaśiṃśapātvavadvyāpyavyāpakabhāva eva vyāvṛtyoḥ syāde
tāvatāpi bhedaḥ siddhyatyevetyata āha | nāpīti | ākṣepaḥ saṅgrahaḥ
pratikṣepo vyavacchedaḥ tathā ca vṛkṣatvasya panasasaṅgrāhakatvaṃ śiṃśapātvasya
ca tadvyavacchedakatvam | na caikasyaitadupapadyate iti tayorbhedo'stu sa ca
vyāpyavyāpakabhāvādhīnaḥ | prakṛte ca tathābhyupagame sāmarthasya vyāpakatve
kathamāpādakatvaṃ vyabhicārāt | vyāpyatve tu sāmarthyaṃ vināpi kāritvaṃ
syādityaniṣṭamityarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | nāpīti | ākṣepo vyāpyāpekṣayā'dhikasaṃgrāha
katvamiti yāvat | pratikṣepo vyāpakopagṛhītakiñcitpratikṣepakatvaṃ
vyāpyatvamiti yāvat | yathā vṛkṣatvenākṣiptapanasādipratikṣepakaṃ
śiṃśapātvamityapi nāsti | kāritvasamarthatvayorvyāpyavyāpakabhāvānabhyupa
gamādityarthaḥ | abhyupagame vā parāparabhāvasyeti śeṣaḥ | kāritvasya
samarthatvavyāpakatve doṣamāha | samarthasyāpīti | tathā ca tatraivānai
kāntikamiti bhāvaḥ | vyāpyatve dūṣaṇamāha | asamarthasyāpīti |
tathā ca samarthatvaṃ vihāyāpi kāritvamiti virodha iti bhāvaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | nāpītyādi | tayorekena vyāvartyayorapareṇākṣepa
pratikṣepābhyāṃ parigrahaparityāgābhyāṃ dvividhābhyāmupadarśitābhyāṃ vṛkṣatva
śiṃśapātvavat yavatvāṅkuratvakurvadrūpavacca | parāparabhāveti | mitho
vyabhicārasyāpyupalakṣakam | parāparabhāvasya mitho vyabhicārasya
cābhyupagame doṣamāha | abhyupagame vetyādinā | sāmarthyasya paratve
samarthasyāpyakaraṇaṃ kāritvasya paratve tu asamarthyasyāpi karaṇaṃ mitho
vyabhicāre tūbhayaṃ prasajyeta | tathā ca samarthasyākaraṇe vyabhicāraḥ
asamarthasya karaṇe tu virodhaḥ | virodhāya datte jalāñjalau
kva viruddhadharmādhyāsa iti bhāvaḥ ||
nāpyupādhibhedāt kāryatvānityatvavat tadabhāvāt |
na ca śabdamātramupādhiḥ paryāyaśabdocchedaprasaṅgāt ||
śaṅkaº ṭīº | nanu gotvāśvatvavat parasparaparihāro vṛkṣatva
śiṃśapātvavat sāmānyaviśeṣabhāvo vā māstu uktadoṣāt kiṃ tu
kāryatvānityatvavat samavyāptirastu tathā ca syādevāpādyāpādaka
bhāvo bhedādhīna ityata āha | nāpīti | uktopādheranyasmādupādhi
bhedādityarthaḥ | prāgabhāvāvacchinnasattāyogitvaṃ1 kāryatvaṃ dhvaṃsā
vacchinnasattāyogitva2manityatvamityupādherbhinnatvamastu prakṛte tu na
tathopādhirastītyāha | tadabhāvāditi | nanu samarthapadavācyatvāda-
sattāpratiyogitvaṃ--pāº 2 puº |
sattāpratiyogitvāt--pāº 2 puº |
nyadevakāripadavācyatvamiti kathaṃ na bheda ityata āha | na ceti |
śabdabhedādeva yadyarthabhedastadaikasminnarthe śabdānāṃ vṛttiḥ paryāyatvaṃ
tanna syādityarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | aupādhikaṃ vyāvṛttyorbhedamāśaṅkya dūṣayati |
nāpīti | yathā kāryatvānityatvayoḥ prāgabhāvadhvaṃsarūpopādhibhedādbheda
stathā prakṛte 'pi vyāvṛttyorna kaścidupādhibheda ityarthaḥ | nanu kāritva
padavācyatvasamarthapadavācyatvarūpopādhibhedādvyāvṛttibhedaḥ syādityata
āha | na ceti | yadyapi śabdabhedasyopādhitve 'pyabhinnapravṛttinimi
ttakatayā paryāyatvaṃ syādeva tathāpi śabdabhedādarthabhedaḥ kalpyata iti
mate paryāyaśabdocchedo dūṣaṇamityarthaḥ | vastuto yadi kuśūlasthaṃ bījaṃ
samarthapadavācyaṃ syāt kāripadavācyaṃ syādityatreṣṭāpattiḥ | tasyāpi
kāripadavācyatvābhyupagamāt viparyaye ca hetvasiddhiriti bhāvaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | nanu mābhūdiha svavyāvartyabhedena virodhaḥ svāva
cchedakopādhivyāvartyabhedena tu syāt prāgabhāvatvadhvaṃsatvalakṣaṇāvaccheda
kopādhivyāvartyabhedādiva kāryatvānityatvayorityāśaṅkya nirākaroti |
nāpīti | kāryatveti | pareṣāmabhāvasyālīkatvena vāstavasya vyāvartyasya
virahe 'pi vyāvahārikaṃ tadbodhyam | prāgabhāvāvacchinnaṃ sattvaṃ kāryatvaṃ
dhvaṃsāvacchinnaṃ cānityatvaṃ svamatenoktamityapi kecit | śabdamātra
bodhakaśabdavṛttirānupūrvībhedādirupādhirvirodhasampādaka iti śeṣaḥ |
paryāyeti | bodhakaśabdabhedena bodhyavyāvṛttibhede paryāyocchedaḥ
bhinnayorabhinnapravṛttinimittakatvaṃ paryāyatvam ||
nāpi vikalpabhedaḥ svarūpakṛtasya tasya vyāvṛttibheda
katve 'samarthavyāvṛtterapi bhedaprasaṅgāt | viṣayakṛtasya tu
tasya bhedakatve 'nyonyāśrayaprasaṅgāt1 | na ca nirnimitta
evāyaṃ vyāvṛttibhedavyavahāro'tiprasaṅgāt ||
śaṅkaº ṭīº | kāritvaprakārakajñānāt samarthatvaprakārakaṃ jñāna
manyaditi tadbhedādapi na bheda ityata āha | nāpīti | svarūpa
kṛtasyeti | jñānavyaktibhedamātrakṛtasvetyarthaḥ | anyonyāśrayeti |
viṣayabhedādhīno vikalpabhedo vikalpabhedādhīnaśca viṣayabheda
ityanyonyāśraya ityarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | nanu vikalpabheda eva vyāvṛttibhedopādhiḥ
syādityata āha | nāpīti | sa vikalpabhedaḥ svarūpakṛto viṣaya
kṛto vā | nādyaḥ ekatrāpyasāmarthyavyāvṛttau vikalpavyaktisvarūpabhedā
dhīnabhedāpātādityarthaḥ | vastuto jñānavyaktibhedasya viṣayabhedaniyata
tvena yasya vyāptiḥ pratītā na tasya pakṣadharmatvamityanumitimātro
ccheda iti bhāvaḥ | nāntyaḥ vyāvṛttibhedaviṣayatvena vikalpabhedasiddhiḥ
tataśca vyāvṛttibhedasiddhirityanyonyāśrayādityāha | viṣayakṛtasyeti |
parasparāśrayatvaprasaṅgāt--pāº 1 puº |
atiprasaṅgāditi | sāmarthyabhedavyavahāro yadi yāvat tāvat prayo
jakavirahe 'pi syāt abhinne 'pi syādityarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | vikalpabheda iti | upādhirityādikamanu
ṣajyate | bhedaprasaṅgāditi | tathā ca vyāptipakṣadharmatājñānābhyāṃ
viṣayīkṛtayorbhede kva prasaṅgādivārteti bhāvaḥ ||
nāpi dvitīyaḥ | sā hi sahakārisākalyaṃ vā prāti
svikī vā | na tāvadādyaḥ pakṣaḥ siddhasādhanāt parā
nabhyupagamena hetvasiddheśca | yat sahakārisamavadhānavat
taddhi karotyeveti ko nāma nābhyupaiti1 yamuddiśya
sādhyate | na cākaraṇakāle sahakārisamavadhānavattvama
smābhi2rabhyupeyate yataḥ prasaṅgaḥ pravarteta ||
śaṅkaº ṭīº | yogyatāpakṣaṃ dūṣayati | nāpīti | sā hīti |
prati svaṃ niyatā prātisvikī | yathā bījeṣu bījatvaṃ tantuṣu tantu
tvam | tattatkāraṇatāvacchedikā jātaya ityarthaḥ | siddhasādhanāditi |
saṃgrahaṃ vivṛṇoti | yaditi | parānabhyupagameneti vivṛṇoti | na
ceti | akurvataḥ kuśūlasthasya bījasya pareṇa naiyāyikena sahakāri
samavadhānānabhyupagamāt tarkasya parābhyupagamamādāyaiva pravṛtterityarthaḥ ||
nābhyupagacchati--pāº 1 puº |
samavadhānavattāsmābhi--pāº 1 puº |
bhagīº ṭīº | yogyatā kāryaprayojakarūpavattā | sā ca dvayī
kāryopadhānaprayojakarūpavattā kāraṇatāvacchedakarūpavattā ca | tatrādyā
sahakāriyogyatā antyā svarūpayogyatā | tāmimāṃ krameṇa vikalpa
yati | sahakārīti | prātisvikī svarūpayogyatetyarthaḥ | sahakāri
madbījamadhikṛtya yadi bījaṃ sahakārisamavahitaṃ syāt tadā kuryā
diti prasaṅge siddhasādhanamiṣṭāpattiḥ tadasamavahite tu karaṇaprayo
jakasahakārisamavadhānarūpāpādakāsiddhiḥ viparyaye tatkāritvāt |
sahakāryasamavahitamityatra sahakārivirahiṇi siddhasādhanam saha
kārisamavahite tu kāriṇyakāriṇyakāritvasya hetorasiddhi
rityāha | siddhasādhanāditi | paraḥ sthiravādī | prasaṅge siddhasādhanaṃ
vivṛṇoti | yaditi | tatraivāsiddhiṃ spaṣṭayati | na ceti | viparyaye
tvasiddhervivaraṇaṃ yaditi | siddhasādhanasya tu na ceti ||
raghuº ṭīº | prātisvikī pratikāraṇajātīyaniyatā | siddha
sādhanāditi | siddhasādhanahetvasiddhī viparyayaprasaṅgayoḥ | paraḥ
sthiravādī | viparyaye siddhasādhanaṃ vivṛṇoti | yadityādinā |
yadi kaścidakurvāṇamapi kāraṇajātīyaṃ sahakārisamavahitamabhyupe
yāt tadā taṃ prati tasyākāritvena sahakārisamavadhānābhāvaḥ
sādhayitumucitaḥ na tvetadasti sahakārisamavahite karaṇaniyamā
bhyupagamenārthato'kāriṇaḥ sahakārisamavadhānābhāvaniyamasyāpyabhyupa
gatatvāt | tathā cākurvāṇe sahakārisamavadhānābhāvasādhane siddha-
sādhanamiti bhāvaḥ | yattu sahakārisamavahite sahakārisamava
dhānena karaṇaprasañjane siddhasādhanamiṣṭāpattiriti | tanna tādṛśa
prasaṅgasyāprastutatvena tatra dūṣaṇopanyāsāyogāt ||
prātisvikī tu yogyatā anvayavyatirekaviṣayībhūtaṃ
bījatvaṃ vā syāt tadavāntarajātibhedo vā sahakāri
vaikalyaprayuktakāryābhāvavattvaṃ vā ||
śaṅkaº ṭīº | bīje satyaṅkuraṃ tadvinā netyanvayavyatirekau |
tadavāntarajātibhedaḥ kurvadrūpavattvaṃ parābhyupagatamityarthaḥ | ubhaya
sādhāraṇīṃ yogyatāmāha | sahakārīti | sahakārivaikalyaprayukto
vyāpyo yaḥ kāryābhāvastadvattvamityarthaḥ | śilāśakale kāryābhāvo
na sahakārivaikalyaprayuktaḥ kiṃ tu śilātvaprayukta eva bīje saha
kārisākalye kāryābhāvo na bhavatyeva ||
bhagīº ṭīº | bījatvamiti svamate anvayetyādinā tatra
mānaṃ sūcitam | tadavāntareti | bauddhābhimatakurvadrūpatetyarthaḥ |
ubhayamatasādhāraṇamāha | sahakārīti | sahakāryabhāvāvacchinna
kāryābhāvanirūpitavyāpyatvam | sahakāryabhāvasya vyarthatvāt nedaṃ saha
kāryabhāvavyāpyajanakatvaṃ vā svarūpayogyatvamityarthaḥ | bījādau kāryā
bhāvavyāpyatāyāḥ sahakāryabhāvenāvacchedāt śilāyāṃ tu śilātve
naivāvacchedāt ||
raghuº ṭīº | anvayavyatireketi | anvayavyatirekagrahetyarthaḥ |
bījatvamiti bījamadhikṛtya | etacca bījasyaivāṅkurajanakatvamiti
matena bīje vinaṣṭe tadavayavebhya evāṅkurotpāda itimatena kapā
lādivyāvṛttakalamayavādyavayavānugatajātiviśeṣaparaṃ bījatvapadamiti
vadanti | tadavāntareti | bījatvavyāpyaṃ kurvadrūpatvaṃ vetyarthaḥ |
kāryābhāvaḥ kāryakāritvābhāvaḥ | caramakāraṇasyāpyuttarakāle kārya
kāritvābhāvaḥ sahakārivirahaprayukta iti bhāvaḥ | yathāśrutaṃ tvasmākaṃ
nimittāsamavāyinoḥ pareṣāmupādānasyāpyasiddhamiti draṣṭavyam ||
na tāvadādyaḥ akurvato'pi bījajātīyasya pratyakṣa
siddhatvāt | tavāpi tatrāvipratipatteḥ ||
śaṅkaº ṭīº | akurvato'pīti | yadi kuśūlasthaṃ bījaṃ syāt
tadā kuryāditi prasaṅgo na ca karoti tasmānna bījamiti viparya
yaśca vyabhicārabādhābhyāmanupapanna ityarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | bījajātīyamaṅkurākāritvādityaca vyabhicāra
māha | akurvato'pīti | tathā ca viparyaye vyāptyabhāvāt
prasaṅge mūlaśaithilyamiti bhāvaḥ | tavāpīti | aṅkurānupahitasya
bījatve 'nubhavasiddhe tavāpi sampratipattiḥ | bhāvatve paraṃ tasya
vivāda ityarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | akurvato'pītyādi | tathā ca bījatvasya karaṇa
vyabhicāro'karaṇasya bījatvābhāvavyabhicāraścobhayasiddha iti na
prasaṅgaviparyayapravṛttiriti bhāvaḥ ||
na dvitīyaḥ1 tasya kurvato'pi mayānabhyupagamena
dṛṣṭāntasya sādhanavikalatvāt | ko hi nāma susthātmā
pramāṇaśūnyamabhyupagacchet | sa hi na tāvat pratyakṣeṇānu
bhūyate tathānavasāyāt | nāpyanumānena liṅgābhāvāt |
yadi na kaścidviśeṣaḥ kathaṃ tarhi karaṇākaraṇe iti cet
ka evamāha neti | paraṃ kiṃ jātibhedarūpaḥ sahakāri
lābhālābharūpo veti niyāmakaṃ pramāṇamanusaranto na
paśyāmaḥ | tathāpi yo'yaṃ sahakārimadhyamadhyāsīno'kṣepa
karaṇasvabhāvo bhāvaḥ sa yadi prāgapyāsīt tadā prasahya
kāryaṃ kurvāṇo gīrvāṇaśāpaśatenāpyapahastayituṃ na
śakyate iti cet yuktametat | yadyakṣepakaraṇasvabhāvatvam2
bhāvasya pramāṇagocaraḥ syāt tadeva kutaḥ siddhamiti
nādhigacchāmaḥ | prasaṅgatadviparyayābhyāmiti cet na
parasparāśrayaprasaṅgāt | evaṃsvabhāvatvasiddhau3 hi tayoḥ
pravṛttiḥ tatpravṛttau caivaṃsvabhāvatvasiddhiriti ||
nāpi dvitīyaḥ--pāº 1 | 3 puº |
dharmatvaṃ--pāº 1 puº |
svabhāvasiddhau--pāº 1 puº | ayameva bhagīrathābhipretaḥ |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | kuśūlasthaṃ bījaṃ yadi kurvadrūpatvajātimat syāt
kuryāt kṣetrapatitabījavaditi prasaṅgaṃ nirasyati | na dvitīya iti |
tasya jātiviśeṣasya | dṛṣṭāntasyeti | kṣetrapatite 'pi bīje
kurvadrūpatvaṃ nāsti | tathā cāpādakavikalo dṛṣṭānta ityarthaḥ |
nanu tavānabhyupagamamātreṇa kathaṃ jātiviśeṣaviraha ityata āha |
ko hīti | pramāṇābhāvādhīna evānabhyupagamo mameti bhāvaḥ |
pramāṇābhāvamevopapādayati | sa hīti | anubhava ālocanam
tasyaiva tanmate pramāṇatvāt | tathānavasāyāditi | avasāyaḥ
savikalpakaṃ tadevālocanonnāyakam | tadabhāvādālocane pramāṇāntaraṃ
nāstītyarthaḥ | liṅgābhāvāditi | sa cānupalambhāditi bhāvaḥ |
nanu karaṇānyathānupapattyunneya eva jātiviśeṣastadabhāvaścākaraṇonneyaḥ
kuśūlastha ityāha | yadīti | arthāpattāvanyathopapattiśaṅkāmāha |
ka evamāheti | sahakārilābhādhīnaṃ karaṇaṃ tadalābhādhīnamakaraṇa
miti1 yadyapi niścaya eva tathāpyāpātataḥ sandehādapyarthāpatti
rdūṣitā bhavati tamevāha | paramiti | bījasyākṣepakaraṇasvābhāvye
sādhye 'pi2 pūrvāparabījayoraikye doṣamāha | tathāpīti | vastuta
evākṣepakaraṇasvābhāvye doṣo'yaṃ na tvanyathāpīti pariharati | yukta
metaditi | akṣepakāritvasvābhāvyaṃ vāstavaṃ śaṅkate | prasaṅgeti |
bījaṃ yadi akṣepakaraṇasvabhāvaṃ na syāt na kuryāt karoti ca
tasmādakṣepakārisvabhāvamiti prasaṅgaviparyayābhyāmakṣepakārisvābhāvya-
tadabhāvādhīnamakaraṇamiti--pāº 2 puº |
svābhāvyamāropya--pāº 2 | 3 puº |
siddhirityarthaḥ | pariharati | neti | akṣepakaraṇasvābhāvyasya prati
yoginaḥ prasiddhau tadabhāvamādāya prasaṅgapravṛttistatpravṛttau ca svābhā
vyasiddhirityarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | yadīdaṃ bījamaṅkurakurvadrūpatvajātimat syāt
aṅkurakāri syāditi prasaṅgamūlavyāptiḥ sahakārisamavahite grāhyā
tatraiva ca tadasiddhiriti dṛṣṭāntasya sādhanenāpādakena vaikalyam | evaṃ
viparyaye 'pyaṅkurākāritvena tajjātyabhāve sādhye dṛṣṭāntasya śilāyā
stajjātyaprasiddhau tadabhāvāprasiddhervyāptyagrahāt sādhanavaikalyamityāha |
tasyeti | sāmagrīmadhyapraviṣṭabīje 'pi tadabhāvamāha | ko hīti |
tadeva spaṣṭayati | sa hīti | avasāyaḥ savikalpakam | tadabhāve
tadunneyaṃ na nirvikalpakamapītyarthaḥ | bījamaṅkuraṃ karotīti buddheḥ
phalopahitasvarūpaviṣayakatvāditi bhāvaḥ | nanu karaṇadaśāyāmakaraṇa
daśāvyāvṛttaṃ bījaṃ yadi na syāt na kuryāditi tādṛśī jātiḥ
syādityāha | yadi neti | sarvasāmarthye sarvadākāryakaraṇam asāmarthye
na kadāpītyarthaḥ | atrāpyanyathāsiddhimāha | ka evamiti | saha
kārisamavadhānarūpadṛśyopādhinaiva tadupapatterna jātau mānamityarthaḥ |
tathāpīti | kāryotpattyavyavahitapūrvakṣaṇavyāpyakālavṛttitvamakṣepakāritvaṃ
bhāvānāṃ svabhāvaḥ tathā ca kuśūlasthaṃ bījaṃ yadyaṅkurākṣepakāri
svabhāvābhinnaṃ syādagrimakṣaṇa evāṅkurakāri syād atatsvabhāvatve vā
sahakārimadhyasthamapi tanna syāt ubhayasvabhāvatve ca virodha ityarthaḥ
atrāpādakāsiddhimāha | yuktamiti | kuta iti | na ca sāmagrī-
madhyasthitabīje tadadhyakṣasiddhaṃ tasyocchalatvādiviṣayatayā (?) tādṛśa
svabhāvāviṣayatvāt tasya ca sahakārirūpatvāt | yadyakṣepakaraṇasvabhāvaṃ
bījaṃ na syāt na kuryācchilāvaditi | sāmagrīmadhyaniviṣṭabīje
tatsiddhamityāha | prasaṅgeti | tādṛśasvabhāvasya pratiyoginoprasiddhyā
tadabhāvāsiddhiriti na prasaṅgāvatāra ityāha | paraspareti | prati
yogitādṛśasvabhāvasiddhau tadabhāvaprasiddhyā prasaṅgasiddhistataśca prati
yogisiddhirityarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | tasya kurvadrūpatvasya dṛṣṭāntasya | aṅkurakāriṇo
bījasya sādhanaṃ prasaṅgasādhanaṃ kurvadrūpatvaṃ tadvikalatvaṃ tadaprasiddhyā tadva
ttvagrahābhāvaḥ | tathā ca prasaṅgahetoraprasiddhiḥ | ata eva tadabhāva
rūpasya viparyaye sādhyasyāprasiddhiḥ ato vyāpyatvāsiddhyā naikasyāpi
pravṛttiriti bhāvaḥ nānabhyupagamamātreṇa prāmāṇikārtho nivartata
ityāha | ko hīti | pratyakṣaṃ nirvikalpakam | anubhavanaṃ viṣayī
karaṇam | pratyakṣamindriyamanubhavonirvikalpakamiti vā | avasāyaḥ
savikalpakam | tadabhāve nirvikalpakābhāvasya tavāpyabhimatatvāditi
bhāvaḥ | bījamaṅkuraṃ karotīti buddheśca phalopahitaṃ svarūpaṃ phalā
vyavahitaprākkālavṛttisvarūpaṃ vā viṣayo na tu kurvadrūpatvamiti |
liṅgābhāvāditi | sādhyāprasiddhyā vyāptyagraheṇa liṅgatvāyogāditi
tajjātīyatvāviśeṣe 'pi karaṇākaraṇena vinā prayojakaviśeṣamupa
padyeta | ataḥ karaṇopapādakatayā viśeṣaḥ sidhyan pariśeṣājjāti
rūpa eva siddhyati tadabhāvādeva cākaraṇamityāśaṅkate | yadīti |
jātibhedaḥ kurvadrūpatvaṃ tadrūpastatsvarūpaḥ tannirūpyastadabhāvaśca jāti
bhedasyābhidhānāt tadabhāvopyarthato labdha ityanye | na paśyāma iti
sandehe 'pi na pariśeṣāvakāśa ityabhiprāyeṇa | tathāpīti |
svotpattyavyavahitottarasamayavṛttikāryamātrakāritvaṃ svakāryavyavahita
prākkālāvṛttitvaṃ svakāryaprāgabhāvasamānakālīnadhvaṃsapratiyogisamayā
vṛttitvaṃ svotpattisamaya eva kāritvaṃ vā'kṣepakāritvam | tathā ca
pūrvaṃ kāryānutpādāt tadānīntanānāmakṣepakaraṇasvabhāvasya viraheṇa
bījatvasya tanniyāmakatvānupapattyā tanniyāmakaṃ kurvadrūpatvaṃ nāma
jātyantaramāstheyamiti bhāvaḥ | tādṛśasvabhāvatvasiddhau satyāmevametat
tadeva tvasiddhamityāha | yuktamityādinā | prasaṅgeti | yanna yatkāryā
kṣepakāri tanna tatkāri yathā'līkaṃ śilāśakalaṃ vā nāṅkurākṣepa
kāri ca sāmagrīsamavahitaṃ bījamupeyate parairiti prasaṅgaḥ yadya
daṅkuraṃ karoti tat tadakṣepakāri yathā dharaṇyādibhedaḥ karoti
cāṅkuramidaṃ bījamiti viparyayaḥ | paraspareti | cakrake 'pi para
sparāśrayatvamakṣatam ||
syādetat | kāryajanmaiva asminnarthe pramāṇaṃ vilamba
kārisvabhāvānuvṛttau kāryānutpattiḥ sarvadeti cet | na
vilambakārisvabhāvasya sarvadaivākaraṇe tattvavyāghātāt |
tataśca vilambakārītyasya yāvatsahakāryasannidhānaṃ tāvanna
karotītyarthaḥ | evaṃ ca kāryajanma sāmagryāṃ pramāṇayituṃ
śakyate na tu jātibhede | te tu kiṃ yathānubhavaṃ vilamba-
kārisvabhāvāḥ parasparaṃ pratyāsannāḥ kāryaṃ kṛtavantaḥ kiṃ
vā yathā tvatparikalpanaṃ kṣiprakārisvabhāvā ityatra
kāryajanana1majāgarūkameveti ||
śaṅkaº ṭīº | nanu vilambakāritve kadāpi kāryajanma na syā
diti tadanyathānupapattyaivākṣepakāritvasiddhiriti śaṅkate | kāryeti |
vilambakāritve 'pi kāryajanmopapadyata evetyāha | vilambeti | nanu
vilambakāritvasvābhāvyaṃ cet tadā dhvaṃsaparyantaṃ tatsvābhāvyānuvṛttau
kāryajanma na syādeveti vilambakāritvamanyathā samarthayati | tata
śceti | tataśca yadadhīnaṃ kāryajanma tat tadeva gamayet na tvakṣepa
kāritvamityāha | evaṃ ceti | na tu jātibhede parābhyupagate |
vilambakāritve 'pi kāryajanmopapādayati | te tviti | sāmagrī
ghaṭakāḥ sahakāriṇa ityarthaḥ | tathā cākṣepakāritve kāryajanmāprayo
jakamiti bhāvaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | asminnarthe bhāvānāmakṣepakāritve kurvadrūpatve
vā | nanu vilambakārisvabhāvādeva kāryajanmānyathāsiddhamityāha |
vilambeti | svādhārakṣaṇāvyavahitottarakṣaṇākāritvaṃ vilambakāritvam |
tathā cāṅkurotpattikṣaṇo yadi vilambakāribījottarakṣaṇaḥ
syādaṅkurakṣaṇo na syāt pūrvakṣaṇavadityarthaḥ | tasmādakṣepakārisvabhāvasya
pūrvamapi sattve tadāpi kāryotpattiḥ syādityādhunikavyaktiviśeṣa
karmopajanana--pāº 3 puº |
eva tādṛśasvabhāva iti kṣaṇabhaṅgaḥ siddha iti bhāvaḥ | vilamba
kārisvabhāvatvamupajīvya sarvāpādane virodha ityāha | vilambeti |
na hi vilambakāritvamakāritvaṃ tathā ca daivāt karaṇe vilamba
kāritvavyāghāta ityarthaḥ | nanu vilambakārisvabhāvasya kathamavilambena
kāritvamiti samādhāna eva vilambya karotīti vyavahāre nimitta
māha | tataśceti | tathā cārthāt sahakārisannidhāvapi na vilambata
ityarthaḥ | tataśca kāryajanma na tatra mānamityāha | evaṃ ceti | nanu
sāmagryapi tādṛśasvabhāvānāṃ melakamevetyata āha | te tviti | te
sahakāriṇaḥ | yathānubhavamiti svapakṣe pramāṇamuktam | vilamba
kāriṇo'pi sahakārilābhādeva kāryajanmānyathāsiddhamiti na tatra
mānamityarthaḥ | yathā vā tvatparikalpanamityasya vyākhyānaṃ kṣiprakāri
svabhāvā iti | na ca karaṇārambhabījamakaraṇārambhabījāvṛttijāti
madaṅkurākṣepakāritvāt kṣityādivaditi vācyam abījatvasyopādhi
tvāt vipakṣabādhakābhāvācceti bhāvaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | asminnarthe 'kṣepakāritve akṣepavilambayoranyasya
prakārasyāsambhavādvilambabādhe pariśeṣādakṣepasiddhiriti bhāvaḥ | vilambo
hyatrākaraṇaṃ tacca sarvadaiva kadācidvā | ādye vilambakāritvāprasiddhiḥ |
dvitīye tu kāryotpatteravirodhānna pariśeṣāvatāraḥ | tathā cākṣepa
karaṇasvabhāvasyāsiddhau na tanniyāmakatvena kurvadrūpatvasiddhirityāha |
na vilambetyādinā | etenāvivakṣitaviśeṣaṃ sāmānyato janakatāva
cchedakarūpavattvameva sāmarthyamabhihitamiti parāstam | svarūpayogya-
syāpi karaṇaprayojakasahakārisāhityaviraheṇākaraṇopapattermūlaśaithi
lyāt | te bījādayaḥ ||
nāpi tṛtīyaḥ virodhāt | sahakāryabhāvaprayuktakāryā
bhāvavāṃṃśca sahakārivirahe kāryavāṃṃśceti vyāhatam |
tasmād yad yadabhāve eva yanna karoti tat tatsadbhāve
tat karotyeva iti tu syāt | etacca sthairyasiddhereva paraṃ
bījaṃ sarvasvamiti ||
śaṅkaº ṭīº | nanu kuśūlasthaṃ bījaṃ yadi sahakāriviraha
prayuktakāryābhāvavat syāt kuryāt na ca karoti tasmānna tatheti
prasaṅgaviparyayau syātāmityata āha | nāpīti | kuśūlasthasya
sahakārivaidhuryamubhayasiddham tathā ca sahakārividhuraṃ bījaṃ yadi
sahakārivirahaprayuktakāryābhāvavat syāt tadā kuryāditi viruddha
mityāha | virodhāditi | tasmāt yat sahakārivirahānna karoti
tadeva sahakārisattve karotītyāyātam tacca sthairyasiddhāveva syādi
tyāha | tasmāditi ||
bhagīº ṭīº | sahakāryabhāvaprayuktakāryābhāvavattvena sahakārya
bhāvakāle kāryakāritvāpādānaṃ vyāghātānnāstītyāha | virodhā
diti | nanvekatra karaṇākaraṇe na sambhavato virodhādityata āha |
yadyaditi | yatkāraṇaṃ yasya sahakārisamavadhānasyābhāve yatkāryaṃ na
janayati tat tatsamavadhāna eva janayatītyaupādhike karaṇākaraṇe
na viruddhe ityarthaḥ | yadabhāva evetyevakāreṇa svabhāvaprayojyatvama
karaṇasya niṣiddham | nanu sahakārisamavadhānāsamavadhāne ekasyāṃ
vyaktau parasparaviruddhe tajjātīyasya tu te kṣaṇikatve 'pyupapadyete | na
tajjātīyasya karaṇākaraṇe sahakārilābhālābhaprayukte ityabhyupagame
kṣaṇikatvāsiddheḥ tadvā tādṛgveti nyāyādekatrāpi tadupapatteriti
bhāvaḥ | bījaṃ pratyabhijñānam tasya sarvasvamupapādakatvāt ||
raghuº ṭīº | nāpītyādi | yadyadā sahakārivirahaprayukta
yatkāryābhāvavat tat tadā tatkāryaṃ karotyevaṃ vā prasaṅgaḥ kiṃ vā
yadā tadeti parityajya | nādyaḥ virodhāt | dvitīye 'pi kimā
pādyāpādakayoryaugapadyena sāmānādhikaraṇyasya grahaḥ kālabhedena vā |
nādyaḥ virodhena tathā grahāsambhavāt | dvitīye tu ekasyaiva dharmiṇaḥ
pūrvāparakālāvasyāyitvalakṣaṇaṃ sthairyamavagāhamānā sāmānādhikaraṇya
buddhireva kṣaṇikatvaṃ viruṇaddhītyarthaḥ | yadityādāvevakārau bhinnakrameṇa
yadeva tadeveti | yadabhāve yasya sahakārisākalyasyābhāva ityanye |
tau ca niyatānvayavyatirekābhyāṃ kāryakaraṇākaraṇayoḥ sahakāri
samavadhānāsamavadhānaprayuktatvasya pradarśanāya ||
etena samarthavyavahāragocaratvaṃ heturiti nirastam |
tādṛgvyavahāragocarasyāpi bījasyāṅkurākaraṇadarśanāt
nāsau mukhyastadvyavahāraḥ1 tasya janananimittakatvāt
tatra vyavahāraḥ--pāº 1 puº |
anyathā tvaniyamaprasaṅgāditi cet kīdṛśaṃ punarjananaṃ
mukhyasamarthavyavahāranimittaṃ na tāvadakṣepakaraṇaṃ tasyā
siddheḥ niyamasya ca sahakārisākalye satyeva karaṇaṃ karaṇa
mevetyevaṃ svabhāvatvenā1pyupapatteḥ tataśca janananimitta2
evāyaṃ vyavahāro na vyāptisiddhiriti ||
śaṅkaº ṭīº | nanu kuśūlasthaṃ yadi samarthavyavahāragocaraḥ
syāt tadā kuryānna ca karoti tasmānna samarthavyavahāragocara iti
prasaṅgaviparyayau syātāmityata āha | eteneti | atrāpi prasaṅge
mūlaśaithilyaṃ viparyaye ca bādha ityāha | tādṛgiti | nanu mukhya
samarthavyavahārajanakatvanibandhanau prasaṅgaviparyayāviti noktadoṣa iti
śaṅkate | nāsāviti | anyatheti | yadi yathā kathañcit samartha
vyavahāranibandhanameva karaṇaṃ syāt tadā bhrāntatādṛśavyavahāragocara
śilāśakalāderapyaṅkuraḥ syādityarthaḥ | yadvā kuśūlasthasyāpi mukhya
samarthavyavahāragocaratve tato'pyaṅkuraḥ syādityaniyamaprasaṅga ityarthaḥ |
mukhyavyavahāraṃ prati nimittaṃ vikalpya dūṣayati | na tāvaditi |
aniyamaprasaṅgaṃ pariharati3 | niyamasya ceti | kuśūlasthasya mukhya
samarthavyavahāragocaratve 'pyaṅkurājananaṃ sahakārivaidhuryaprayuktamiti nā
niyama ityarthaḥ | evaṃ bījaṃ janayatyevetyatyantāyogavyavacchedo niyamaḥ
sahakārisamavahitameva janayati janayatyevetyanyayogātyantāyogābhyāṃ
svabhāvatve--pāº 1 puº |
janananibandhana--pāº 1 puº |
dūṣayati--pāº 3 puº |
niyamaśca śilāyāṃ na prathamaḥ kevalabīje tu na dvitīya1 iti
bhāvaḥ | mukhyasamarthavyavahāragocaratvamupasaṃharati | tataśceti | kadā
cijjananameva śilāśakalādivilakṣaṇamukhyasamarthavyavahāragocaratve
mūlam | tathā ca yadi samarthavyavahāragocaraḥ syāt tadā kuryāditi
na vyāptirastītyataḥ prasaṅge mūlaśaithilyamityarthaḥ | yadvā sattvakṣaṇika
tvayoretāvatā na vyāptisiddhirityarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | prāguktāpādyāvaiśiṣṭyaparihārāya samarthavyavahāra
gocaratvamāpādakamāśaṅkya nirākaroti | eteneti | heturāpādakaḥ
sāmarthyaṃ vyavahāre yadi viśeṣaṇaṃ tadāṃśata āpādyāvaiśiṣṭyameva dūṣaṇa
mityarthaḥ | atha tat tatropalakṣaṇaṃ tatrāha | tādṛśeti | tatreti |
aṅkurānupahite bīje | nanu mukhyaḥ sa kathaṃ na tatretyata āha |
tasyeti | anyatheti | tasya jananānimittatve śilāśakale 'pyajanayati
mukhyasamarthavyavahāraprasaṅgādityarthaḥ | tasya janananimittakatve 'pi
kadācijjananādajanayatyapi samarthavyavahāro mukhya eva jananayogya
tāyāstatra sattvādityāha | kīdṛśamiti | apekṣaṇīyavyāptyavyavahito
ttarakṣaṇe jananamakṣepakāritvam tadyadi sāmagrīmadhyapraviṣṭaṃ bījamadhi
kṛtyāpādanaṃ tadeṣṭāpattiḥ atādṛśe cāpādakābhāvaḥ | tathā cotpattya
vyavahitottarakṣaṇa eva janakatvamakṣepakāritvaṃ vācyaṃ tatrāha | tasyeti |
nanu kāryānupadhānāviśeṣācchilāyāmapi samarthavyavahāraḥ syādityata
āha | niyamasya ceti | samarthavyavahāraviṣayatāyāṃ kādācitkatvasyā-
na tu dvitīya--pāº 2 puº |
tyantāyogavyavacchedena kadācijjanananimittakatvenāpyupapatteḥ karaṇa
mevetyatrāpi sahakārisākalye satītyanuṣañjanīyam nākaraṇa
mityarthāt | tataśceti | jananayogyatāsamarthavyavahāranimittaṃ na tu
jananopadhānamityarthaḥ | nanvaṅkurakāraṇaṃ bījaṃ yadyetaṃtkṣaṇavṛtti syāde
tadavyavahitottarakṣaṇe 'ṅkurajanakaṃ syāt ayaṃ kṣaṇo yadyaṅkurakāra
ṇādhāraḥ syādaṅkurotpattipūrvakṣaṇaḥ syāt aṅkuro yadyetatkṣaṇavṛtti
kāraṇakaḥ syāt etadavyavahitottarakṣaṇotpattikaḥ syāditi tarkāt
kṣaṇikatvaṃ syādityata āha | neti | sarvatra vipakṣabādhakābhāvena
vyāptyabhāvānmūlaśaithilyamityarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | samartheti | tathā ca na prāguktasādhyāvaiśiṣṭyamiti
bhāvaḥ | hetuḥ prasaṅgahetuḥ | tādṛgityādi | tathā ca vyabhicāra
iti bhāvaḥ | mukhyatvena vyavahārasya viśeṣaṇānna vyabhicāra ityāśaye
nāśaṅkate | nāsāviti | kathaṃ na mukhyatā ata āha | tasyeti |
anyathā janakajātīyatvasya sahakārivirahaprayuktakāryābhāvavattvasya
vā nimittatve 'niyamaprasaṅgāt | dravyatvādinā bījajātīyaśilādau
samarthavyavahārasya sahakārisamavahite kurvatyapi tadabhāvasya vā prasaṅgāt
niyataṃ karaṇaṃ tathā syādata āha | niyamasya ceti | niyamasya
karaṇaniyamasya niyatakaraṇasyeti yāvat | satyeva karaṇamityantasya
evakārabalalabhye sahakārivaikalye karaṇābhāve tātparyam | tathā ca
yaddharmāvacchinnasyākaraṇaṃ sahakārivirahaprayuktaṃ taddharmavattvamityarthaḥ |
asti cedaṃ kurvaddaśāyāmapi bīje nāsti ca śilāśakalādau satyapi
sahakārisākalye tatra kāryānutpādena svabhāvasyaiva tatprayojakatvāt |
atha bījamapi bhṛṣṭaṃ śilāsamānamiti cet na abhṛṣṭabījatvamevāstāṃ
tādṛśo dharmaḥ āsādayatu vā bharjanādyabhāvo'pi sahakāribhāvaṃ
karaṇamevetyasya ca satyantānuṣaṅgāt | yaddharmāvacchinnasya sahakāri
sākalye 'vaśyaṃ karaṇaṃ tadvattvamarthaḥ | evaṃ caitannimittakasamarthavyavahāra
viṣayasyāpi sahakārirahitasya bījādeḥ karaṇavirahādvyabhicāreṇa na
vyāptisiddhirityāha | tataśceti na ca yāvatsattvaṃ karaṇaṃ karaṇaniyata
jātimattvaṃ vā tathā asiddhatvāt akaraṇadaśāyāmapi tādṛśatvā
virodhācca aniyamaprasaṅgaṃ nirasyati niyamasya ceti tu sampradāyaḥ |
atha bhavatāṃ paṭādau nīlavyavahārasya nīlaṃ rūpamiva samarthavyavahārasya
śuddhaṃ jananaṃ nimittaṃ lāghavāt | ata eva janakatāvacchedakarūpavattva
mapi parāstamiti cet astu tāvadevaṃ tathāpi nimittasattvāsattvā
bhyāmeva vyavahāratadabhāvopapatteravirodhāt | nimittatadabhāvayoḥ
karaṇākaraṇarūpayoreva virodha iti cet na tasyāgre nirasanīya
tvāt | etena kāripadabodhyatvena karaṇaprasañjanaṃ karaṇaviraheṇa ca
kāripadabodhyatvābhāvasādhanamapi vyākhyātam ||
syādetat | etāvatāpi bhāvasya kaḥ svabhāvaḥ sama
rthito bhavati na hi kṣepākṣepābhyāmanyaḥ prakārostīti
cet | na dūṣaṇābhidhānasamaye1 niścayābhāvenaiva sandi-
dūṣaṇāvasare--pāº 1 puº | ayameva bhagīrathasammataḥ |
gdhāsiddhinirvāhe kathāpūrvarūpaparyavasānāt | uttarapakṣā
vasare tu so'pi na durvacaḥ ||
śaṅkaº ṭīº | kṣepakārisvābhāvye sarvadaivākaraṇamityakṣepakaraṇa
svābhāvyameva bhāvānāmaṅgīkāryam tacca svotpattyavyavahitottarakṣaṇa eva
karaṇe sati syāt tathā ca samarthāsamarthabījakṣaṇayorbhedasiddhau siddhaṃ
kṣaṇikatvamityāśayena bhāvasvābhāvyaṃ pṛcchati | syādetaditi | na
hīti | parasparavirodhe hi na prakārāntarasthitiriti yata iti
bhāvaḥ | akṣepakāritvasvābhāvyaṃ sāmarthyamālambya yadi samarthaṃ syāt
kuryāditi prasaṅgastvayāvatāritastadatra tatsvābhāvyasandehādapi
sandigdhāsiddhirdūṣaṇamuktam etāvataiva paroktasādhane dūṣaṇābhidhānasya
kathāpūrvarūpasya paryavasānāt tava parājaya ityāha | dūṣaṇābhidhā
neti | nanu jalpe svapakṣasādhanamapi vaktumucitamityata āha |
uttareti ||
bhagīº ṭīº | nanvarthakriyākāritvaṃ sattvaṃ tacca kṣepakāritvā
kṣepakāritvābhyāṃ vyāptam tatra yadi bhāvasya kṣepakāritvaṃ svabhāvastadā
sahakārisamavahitasyāpyakaraṇaprasaṅgaḥ athākṣepakāritvaṃ svabhāvastadā
svotpattyanantarameva sahakāryabhāve'pi kuryāt | na ca tṛtīyaḥ prakāraḥ
śaṅkitumapi śakyate parasparaviraharūpatvāditi sthairye bhāvasvabhāvānu
papatteḥ pariśeṣāt kṣaṇikatvaṃ setsyatītyabhipretyāha | etāvatāpīti |
sahakārivirahe kṣepakāritvaṃ tatsāhitye cākṣepakāritvaṃ bhāvānāṃ
svabhāva iti manasi kṛtyāha | dūṣaṇeti | bhāvasvabhāvasandehe 'pi
vitaṇḍākathāyāṃ vādisādhananiṣṭhadūṣaṇāvasare kṣepakāritvākṣepakāri
tvarūpasvabhāvāniścayo'pi sahakārisāhityāsāhityābhyāṃ karaṇā
karaṇe upapanne vyāptigrāhakamānābhāvāt kathāyāṃ vādisādhana
dūṣaṇābhidhānarūpaṃ yat pūrvarūpaṃ tasya nirvāheṇa kathāparyavasānā
dityarthaḥ | tathāpi sthairyapakṣe bhāvasvabhāvaḥ samarthanīya evetyata
āha | uttareti ||
raghuº ṭīº | akṣepakāritvānyathānupapattyā kṣaṇikatvaṃ siṣādha
yiṣurbhāvasvabhāvaṃ pṛcchati | syādetaditi | kathāyāḥ jalpasya | pūrva
rūpaṃ parapakṣakhaṇḍanam uttarapakṣaḥ svapakṣasya prakṛte sthairyasya sthāpanam ||
tathāhi karaṇaṃ pratyavilamba iti ko'rthaḥ | kimutpatte
ranantarameva karaṇaṃ sahakārisamavadhānānantarameva vā |
vilamba ityapi ko'rthaḥ | kiṃ yāvanna sahakārisamavadhānaṃ
tāvadakaraṇaṃ sarvathaivākaraṇamiti vā | tatra prathamacaturthayoḥ
pramāṇābhāvādaniścaye 'pi dvitīyatṛtīyayoḥ pratyakṣameva
pramāṇam | bījajātīyasya hi sahakārisamavadhānāna
ntarameva karaṇaṃ karaṇameveti pratyakṣasiddhameva | tathā saha
kārisamavadhānarahitasyākaraṇamityapi ||
śaṅkaº ṭīº | kṣepākṣepayoravivecitayorekatarakoṭiparigraho
'nucita iti vivektuṃ vikalpayati | utpatteranantarameveti |
svotpattyavahitottarakṣaṇa evetyarthaḥ | prathamacaturthayoriti | svotpattya
nantarameva karaṇe pramāṇābhāvaḥ sarvathaivākaraṇe kāryajātaṃ kadāpi
nopalabhyeteti balavadvipakṣadaṇḍa ityarthaḥ | pramāṇābhāvādityāpātato
viparītameva pramāṇamiti vastugatiḥ | pratyakṣameveti | anvaya
vyatirekabalapravṛttamityarthaḥ | atyantāyogavyavacchede cāyamevakāraḥ |
bījatvenaiva kāraṇateti vivakṣannāha | bījajātīyasyeti | tādrūpye
ṇaivānvayavyatirekapradarśanapravṛtteriti bhāvaḥ | ayogānyayogavyava
cchedābhyāmakṣepakāritva1meva draḍhayati | kṣepakāritvamāha | tatheti ||
bhagīº ṭīº | pratyakṣamityanena svapakṣe pramāṇamuktam | nanve
kasyāṃ kṣaṇikavyaktau samavadhānāsamavadhānayorabhāvāt kathametatpratyakṣa
gocara ityata āha | bījajātīyasyeti | karaṇamiti | deśya
vākyasthaṃ svabhāvapadamanuṣajyate | tajjātīyavyaktiṣu jātipuraskārāt
pratyakṣeṇa tadgraha ityarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | utpatteranantarakaraṇamutpattyanantarakālīnakārya
kāritvam utpattikāle kāritvamiti yāvat | evamagre 'pi neyam |
prathameti | kasyacidutpatteranantarameva kiñcitkāryakāritve 'pi na
sarvatra tathātvaniyamaḥ tasya tadānīṃ sahakārisākalyanibandhanatvāditi
bhāvaḥ | kṣaṇikatvavādibhirekasyāṃ vyaktau karaṇākaraṇayoranaṅgīkārā-
vyavacchedābhyāmevopakāritva--pāº 2 puº |
dāha | bījajātīyasyeti | tatheti | avilambakāritve evakāre
ṇāntarbhāvitopyarthaḥ prādhānyena vilambarūpatayā pṛthagupadarśitaḥ ||
atra ca bhavānapi na vipratipadyata eva pramāṇasiddha
tvāt viparyaye bādhakācca | tathāhi yadi sahakāri
virahe 'kurvāṇastatsamavadhāne 'pi na kuryāt tajjātīya
makaraṇameva syāt1 samavadhānāsamavadhānayorubhayorapya
karaṇāt | evaṃ tatsamavadhānavirahe 'pi yadi kuryāt
sahakāriṇo na kāraṇaṃ syuḥ tānantareṇāpi karaṇāt |
tathā cānanyathāsiddhānvayavyatirekavatāmapyakāraṇatve
kāryasyākasmikatvaprasaṅgaḥ2 tathā ca kādācitkatva
vihatiriti ||
śaṅkaº ṭīº | nanvevaṃ na manyāmaha ityata āha | atra ceti |
pramāṇeti | sahakāriṣu satsu karaṇasyāsatsu cākaraṇasya pratyakṣasiddha
tvādityarthaḥ | viparyaye bādhakaṃ sphuṭayati | tathāhīti | yajjātīyaṃ
sahakārisamavadhānāsamavadhānayorakāraṇaṃ tajjātīyamakāraṇameva
śilāśakalavaditi vyāptyupaṣṭambhenāha3 | yadīti | na ca dīpo
parinayanāt pakvabīje vyabhicāraḥ | tatrāpi sahakāriviśeṣavirahasya
kalpanīyatvāt | yatkāryaṃ yadvyatirekeṇa yat karoti tatkārye na tasya
tajjātīyamakāraṇaṃ syāt--pāº 1 puº |
kāryasyākaraṇakatvaprasaṅgaḥ--pāº 2 puº |
vyāptyavaṣṭambhenāha--pāº 2 puº |
tatsahakāritvaṃ yathā daṇḍasya ghaṭe janayitavye tanturiti | vyāptyava
ṣṭambhenāha | evamiti | yadi sahakāritvenābhimatāḥ kṣityādayoṅkure
janayitavye bījena nāpekṣeran tadā te tatra sahakāriṇo na syuḥ
rāsabhavadityāpādanārthaḥ | na ceṣṭāpattiḥ anvayavyatirekasiddhakārya
kāraṇabhāvatiraskāre tadvyavasthaiva na syāt syācca kāryasyākasmikatva
mityāha | tathā ceti | tataḥ kimityata āha | tathā ceti |
kiñcitkāle 'sataḥ kiñcitkālasattvaṃ kādācitkatvaṃ sudṛḍhapramāṇāva
dhṛtamapi na syādityarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | kṣaṇikatvapakṣe sahakāryanapekṣāyāmapi taiḥ
sahārthaḥ samāja ityabhyupagame 'pi sahakārivirahitasyākaraṇamityatra
sampratipattireva | tadrāhitye svasyābhāvādevākaraṇametāvāṃṃśca viśeṣa
ityāha | atra ceti | tathāpi vyabhicāraśaṅkayā pramāṇasiddhatvameva
kathamityata āha | viparyaya iti | evamapyakaraṇameveti niyamaḥ
kutastya ityata āha | tathāhīti | kāritvaṃ kāryopahitatvaṃ kāraṇatvaṃ
svarūpayogyateti bhedaḥ | tathā ceti | bījatvaṃ yadyaṅkurakāraṇāvṛtti
syād bījamātravṛtti na syāt bījetarājanyoṅkuro yadi bījajanyo
na syādajanyaḥ syādityarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | tajjātīyaṃ taddharmāvacchinnam | akaraṇamasvarūpa
yogyaṃ tathātvaṃ ca prāmāṇikamiti bhāvaḥ | evamiti | sahakāriṇo
yadi tatkāryakāraṇāpekṣaṇīyā na syuḥ tatkāryakāraṇāni na
syurityarthaḥ | tena na vaiyadhikaraṇyam | tathā ceti | tulyanyāyatayā
sarveṣāmevākāraṇatvāditi bhāvaḥ ||
evaṃ ca dvitīyapakṣavivakṣāyāmakṣepakāritvameva bhāvasya
svabhāvaḥ | tṛtīyapakṣavivakṣāyāṃ tu kṣepakāritvameva bhāvasya
svarūpamiti nobhayaprakāra1nivṛttiriti ||
śaṅkaº ṭīº | nanu tathāpi bhāvasya kaḥ svabhāva iti praśne
kimuttaramata āha | evaṃ ceti | sahakārisamavadhānāsamava
dhānarūpāvacchedabhedamādāyākṣepakāritvakṣepakāritvayorubhayorapyekasmin
bījajātīye darśanānnānayorvirodha ityarthaḥ2 |
bhagīº ṭīº | āśayaṃ sphuṭayati | evaṃ ceti | tathā caika
dharmigatatvena na tayorvirodha ityarthaḥ |
raghuº ṭīº | evaṃ cetyādi ||
tathāpi kimasamarthasyaiva sahakārivirahaḥ svarūpa
lābhānantaraṃ kartureva vā sahakārisamavadhānam anyathā
veti | kiṃ niyāmakamiti cet idamucyate kuśūlastha
bījasyāṅkurānukūlaḥ śilāśakalāt kaścidasti viśeṣo
vā na cenniyamenaikatra pravṛttiḥ anyasmā3nnivṛttiśca
nobhayākāra--pāº 1 puº |
iti bhāvaḥ--pāº 2 puº |
aparasmā--pāº 1 puº |
tadarthino na syāt | paramparayāṅkuraprasavasamarthabījakṣaṇa
jananādastyeveti cet kadā punaḥ paramparayāpi tathābhūtaṃ
kariṣyatīti | tatra sandeha iti cet sa punaḥ kimā
kāraḥ kiṃ sahakāriṣu samavahiteṣvapi kariṣyati na veti
utāsamavahiteṣṭhapi teṣu kariṣyati na veti ||
śaṅkaº ṭīº | nanvevaṃ svabhāvadvayasthitāvapi na sthairyaṃ yataḥ kurva
drūpasyaiva sahakārisamavadhānamatadrūpasyaiva tadviraha iti kṣaṇikatve
pyupapadyata ityabhipretyāha | tathāpīti | kartureveti | kūrvadrūpatva
jātimata ivetyarthaḥ | akurvadapi bījatvāliṅgitaṃ samarthamevetyekasyaiva
sahakārilābhālābhābhyāṃ karaṇākaraṇe iti sthairyamevetyabhipretya
pṛcchati | kuśūlastheti | aṅkurādipravṛttyanyathānupapattyaiva kuśūlastha
syāpi sāmarthyamityāha | na cediti | tadarthipravṛtteranyathopapatti
māha | paramparayeti | asamarthamapi kuśūlasthaṃ samarthaṃ janayiṣyati
śilāśakalaṃ tu na tatheti viśeṣa ityarthaḥ | astyeveti | tadarthi
pravṛttirityanuṣaṅgaḥ | yadvā śilāśakalādviśeṣa ityanuṣajyate |
kācidbhuktanaṣṭā vyaktiḥ samarthalakṣaṇaṃ na janayatyatha ca tatrāpi
tadarthipravṛttiriti bījatvenaiva sāmarthyaṃ vācyamiti hṛdiṃ nidhāya
pṛcchati | kadeti | paramparākāraṇe pravṛttau kālāvacchedajñānamatantra
mityāśayenāha | tatreti | bījaṃ sahakārisamavadhāne kariṣyatyeva
samavadhānaṃ kadeti sandeho vācyastathā ca bījatvenaivāṅkuraṃ prati
sāmarthyaṃ vācyamityāśayena saṃśayākāraṃ vikalpayati | sa punariti ||
bhagīº ṭīº | nanu sahakārivirahitasyāsamarthasyaivākaraṇaṃ na
tu svarūpayogyasya tatsamavahitasya ca karaṇaṃ kurvadrūpatvajātimata eve
tyarthaḥ | na niyameneti | kuśūlasthaṃ bījaṃ yadyaṅkurakāraṇatāvacchedaka
rūpavanna syānniyamenāṅkurārthipravṛttiviṣayo na syādityarthaḥ viparyaye
'pyanumānamityarthaḥ | nanu sākṣātprayojakatve sādhye 'ṅkurārthipravṛtti
viṣayatvādityanaikāntikam paramparāprayojakatve ca sādhye tvadape
kṣitāsiddhyā siddhasādhanamityāha | parampareti | śilāśakalādviśeṣa
ityanuṣajyate | tatparamparājanyavyaktyantare 'pi pravṛttisaṃvāda upapadyata
iti bhāvaḥ | kadeti | kālaviśeṣe phalajanakatvāniścaye prekṣāvanto
na pravarteranniti bhāvaḥ | sādhanatvaniścayāt kālasandehe'pi pravṛttiḥ
syādityāha | tatreti ||
raghuº ṭīº | nanu yadyupadarśitaṃ karaṇamakaraṇaṃ ca svabhāvo
bhāvasya tadā yāvatsattvaṃ tadubhayāpattiḥ sati dharmiṇi svabhāva
virahāyogāditi cet na svabhāvatvaṃ tattādātmyaṃ vā syād yāvatsattvaṃ
tatra tatsattvaṃ vā taddharmatāmātraṃ vā | tatrādyayoranabhyupagamo'ntimastu
dharmadharmiṇoratyantabhedena dharmisattve 'pyasattvaṃ na viruṇaddhi | syādetat
bījatvena sāmarthye siddhe samarthānāṃ bījajātīyānāmivaikasyāpi bījasya
sahakārisākalyavaikalyābhyāmeva karaṇākaraṇayorupapattau siddhyati sthairyaṃ
na tvetadasti samarthasya kṣepāyogāditi tathā ca kurvadrūpatvenaiva sāmarthyaṃ
na bījatvena samartha eva ca sahakāriṇāṃ lābho lābha eva tathā ca
na sahakārisākalyavaikalyaprayukte karaṇākaraṇe kiṃ tu sāmarthyā-
sāmarthyaprayukte ityāśayenāśaṅkate | tathāpīti | asamarthetyādi |
samarthasyāpi sahakārivirahe tadānīṃ kāryasyānutpattau samarthasyāpya
karaṇamutpattau ca sahakāriṇāmakaraṇatvam | asamarthe ca sahakāri
sākalye samarthabījavirahe 'pi kāryasyotpattau bījasyākaraṇatvam
anutpattau ca bījaviraheṇa samarthasyāpi sahakāriṇo'karaṇaṃ prasajyeta |
tena tadubhayaṃ vyudastam | anyathā veti | samarthasyāpi kadācitsaha
kāriṇāṃ vaikalyaṃ kadācit sākalyaṃ tenākaraṇaṃ karaṇaṃ ceti pravṛttya
nyathānupapattyā bījatvenaiva sāmarthyamityāśayena pṛcchati | kuśūletyādi |
pravṛttimanyathopapādayati | parampareti | astyeveti | śilāśakalā
dviśeṣaḥ samarthakṣaṇaṃ pratyevānāyatyā bījatvena sāmarthyaṃ vācyam |
tathā ca samarthasyāpi sahakārivirahādakaraṇamityāyātamityāśayena
pṛcchati | kadetyādi |
kecittu tajjātīyānāṃ sahakārilābhālābhayoḥ karaṇākaraṇena
sthairyasādhake kṣaṇikatve 'pyupapannatvāt ekasyaiva tu tenādyāpi siddhe
pratyabhijñānaṃ ca vyabhicārijātīyamasiddhapramābhāvaṃ na sādhakamataḥ
kathaṃ sthairyamityā1śayenāha | tathāpīti | asamarthetyādiniyama
dvayaṃ samarthasyāpi sahakāriṇā vaikalyādakṛtavataḥ paścāt sākalye
sati karaṇasya pratikṣepakaṃ pravṛttyanyathānupapattyā bījatvena sāmarthyasiddhau
na tādṛśaniyamasiddhirityāśayena pṛcchati | kuśūletīti prāhuḥ ||
atha yadā sahakārisamavadhānaṃ tadaiva kariṣyatyeva2
paraṃ kadā teṣāṃ samavadhānamiti sandehaḥ | na tāvat
sthairyasiddhirityā--pāº 2 puº |
karotyeva--pāº 1 puº |
pūrvaḥ sāmānyataḥ kāraṇatvāvadhāraṇe tasyānavakāśāt
avakāśe vā kāraṇatvānavadhāraṇāt | nāpi dvitīyaḥ
sahakāriṇāṃ tattvāvadhāraṇe tasyānavakāśāt avakāśe
vā teṣāṃ tattvānavadhāraṇāt | tṛtīye tu sarva eva
tatsantānāntaḥpātino bījakṣaṇāḥ samānaśīlāḥ prāpnu
vanti yatra tatra sahakārisamavadhāne sati karaṇaniyamāt
sarvatra ca sahakārisamavadhānasambhavāt ||
śaṅkaº ṭīº | sāmānyata iti | na ca saugatānabhyupagatamidaṃ
bījajātīyasya sahakārisamavadhāne satyeva karaṇaṃ karaṇameveti pratyakṣa
siddhamityādinā tatsādhanāt | teṣāmiti | na ceṣṭāpattiḥ saha
kāriṇo na kāraṇaṃ syurityādinā pūrvameva sādhanāt | samānaśīlā
iti | samānasāmarthyarūpaṃ śīlaṃ yeṣāṃ te tathā | evaṃ tarhi kuśū
lasthasyāpi syādityata āha | sarvatra ceti ||
bhagīº ṭīº | sāmānyata iti | bījatvenaiva rūpeṇetyarthaḥ |
yadyapi parasyaitadasiddham tena kurvadrūpatvajātyā kāraṇatvopagamāt
tathāpi bījajātīyasya bījatvena rūpeṇāṅkureṇa prayojakatvamityubhaya
siddham | tatra tasya kāraṇakāraṇatāvacchedakatvamastyāhokāraṇatāvacche
dakatvamiti saṃśaye prathame gauravādantye bādhakābhāvādetadeva nyāyya
mityabhiprāyaḥ | asamavadhānavat samavadhāne 'pyaṅkurākaraṇādbījasyā
tatkāraṇatvāt tadarthinaḥ pravṛttirna svādityāha | avakāśe veti |
tattveti | sahakāritvaniścaye tādṛśasandehābhāvāt tadabhāve 'pi
bhavatastadakāraṇatvādityarthaḥ | samāneti | bījatvenaiva rūpeṇa svarūpa
yogyā ityarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | sāmānyata iti | na cāṅkurasamarthabījakṣaṇaṃ
pratyapi pareṣāṃ bījatvena na kāraṇatvam api tu tatkurvadrūpatvenaiveti
vācyam | tathātve 'pi bījajātīyasya satyāṃ sahakārisampattau avaśyaṃ
karaṇamiti sāmānyato'vadhāraṇāt anavadhāraṇe vā niyatapravṛttyanu
papatteḥ | samānaśīlāḥ samānayogyatākāḥ | tathā ca siddhaṃ bījatvena
kāraṇatvamiti bhāvaḥ ||
samartha eva kṣaṇe kṣityādisamavadhānamiti cet tat
kimasamarthe sahakārisamavadhānameva nāsti samavadhāne
satyapi vā tasmānna kāryajanma | nādyaḥ śilāśakalā
dāvapi kṣitisalilatejaḥpavanayogadarśanāt | na dvitīyaḥ
śilāśakalādiva kadācit sahakārisākalyavato'pi
bījādaṅkurānutpattiprasaṅgāt ||
śaṅkaº ṭīº | samarthāsamarthayoreva sahakārisamavadhānāsamava
dhāne iti naikasyaiva tadadhīne phalopadhānānupadhāne iti kathameka
śīlatvamityāha | samartha eveti ||
bhagīº ṭīº | nanu kurvadrūpatve bādhakābhāvāt tenaiva rūpeṇa
bījasya svarūpayogyatvaṃ na tu bījatvena bījatvānvayavyatirekayostada
nvayavyatirekābhyāmanyathāsiddherityāha | samartha eveti | aṅkurānu
tpattīti | tathātve vā tathā dṛśyeteti bhāvaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | samartha eveti | tathā ca na samānaśīlatvamiti
bhāvaḥ ||
evamapi syāt | ko doṣa iti cet na tāvadidamupa
labdham | āśaṅkyata iti cet na tatsamavadhāne satyapi
akaraṇavat tadvirahe karaṇamapyāśaṅkyeta | āśaṅkyatā
miti cet tarhi bījavirahe'pyāśaṅkyeta | tathā ca sati
sādhvī pratyakṣānupalambhapariśuddhiḥ ||
śaṅkaº ṭīº | evamapīti | sahakārisamavadhānavato'pyaṅkurānu
tpattiḥ syādityarthaḥ | na tāvaditi | kṣetre 'pi tarhi kadācidaṅkuro
na syāditi bhāvaḥ | āśaṅkyata iti | tvanmate samarthādapi kuśūla
sthādaṅkurānutpattiścet tadā sahakārisamavahitādapi tadanupapattiḥ
śaṅkāspadaṃ syādityarthaḥ | anubhavamatikramyāpi yadi śaṅkā tatrāha |
tatsamavadhāna iti | āśaṅkyatāmiti | etāvatāpi na kṣaṇikatva
kṣatiriti bhāvaḥ | anibandhanā cecchaṅkā tadāha | tarhīti | tathā
cāṅkurārthipravṛttirniyamato na syāditi bhāvaḥ | tathā ceti |
pratyakṣānupalambhāvanvayavyatirekau | tatpariśuddhiḥ tadupasthitakārya-
kāraṇa1bhāvāniścayaḥ | tathā ca pravṛttinivṛttyorabhāve nirīhaṃ2
jagajjāyeteti bhāvaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | tarhīti | tathā cāṅkurārthino niyamena bīje
pravṛrttirna syāditi bhāvaḥ | tathā ceti | anvayavyatirekayorittha
mupaplave 'rthakriyākāritvarūpaṃ sattvamapi na niścīyetetyarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | bījajātīyasya sahakārisamavadhāne satyeva karaṇaṃ
sati karaṇameveti tāvanniyatānvayavyatirekābhyāmavadhāritaṃ tatra
yadyekasminnaṃśe āśaṅkā syāt syādaṃśāntare 'pi viparītaniścaya
syākiñcitkaratvādityāha | tatsamavadhāna ityādinā | tadbhyāṃ saha
kāriṇaḥ parāmṛśati ||
syādetat na bījādīnāṃ parasparasamavadhānavatāmeva
kāryakaraṇamaṅgīkṛtyāśaṅkyate yena samavadhānaniyamāt3
sarveṣāmeva tajjātīyānāmekarasatāniścayaḥ syāt nāpi
yatra tatra samarthotpattimaṅgīkṛtya yena vikalebhyo'pi
kadācit kāryajanmasambhāvanāyāṃ pratyakṣānupalambha
virodhaḥ4 syāt ||
tadupaplave kāryakāraṇa--pāº 2 puº |
nirbādhaṃ--pāº 2 puº |
samavadhānāniyamāt--pāº 3 puº |
pratyakṣānupalabdhivirodha iti śaṅkaramiśrasammataḥ pāṭhaḥ |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | syādetaditi | pūrvaṃ kurvadrūpatve sādhakābhāva
ukta idānīṃ vistareṇa bādhakamabhidhīyata ityapaunaruktyam | bījaṃ
sahakārisamavahitaṃ sadaṅkuraṃ karoti sahakārisamavadhānameva kadā
bhaviṣyatīti sandehe bījānāṃ sarveṣāṃ samānaśīlatā prasaktā ata
statsandehaṃ nirasyati | na bījādīnāmiti | śaṅkyata iti | kadā
sahakārisamavadhānaṃ syāditi sandihyata ityarthaḥ | ekarasatāṃ bīja
tvenaiva sarveṣāṃ bījānāmaṅkurakāraṇatāmaṅgīkṛtyetyanantaraṃ śaṅkyata itya
nuṣajyate | pratyakṣānupalabdhivirodho gṛhītānvayavyatirekabhaṅgaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | śaṅkyate kadā punasteṣāṃ sahakārisamavadhāna
miti sandihyata ityarthaḥ | yeneti | sarveṣāṃ bījānāṃ sahakāri
samavadhānaṃ kadācid bhaviṣyatītyātmakāniyamābhyupagame bījajātī
yānāṃ sarveṣāmekarasatāniścayo bījatvena svarūpayogyatāniścaya
ityarthaḥ | aṅgīkṛtyetyatra śaṅkyata ityanuṣajyate ||
raghuº ṭīº | nanu niyatānvayavyatirekābhyāṃ bījajātīya
syāṅkuraṃ prati sāmarthyamevāvadhṛtam tacca na bījatvena samarthasya kṣepā
yogāt | kuśūlasthāderapi bījādaṅkurotpādaprasaṅgāt paraṃ tu bīja
tvāvāntareṇa kurvadrūpatvena samarthānāṃ ca svakāraṇasāmarthyādhīnaḥ samāja
niyamaḥ pramāṇavalādeva kalpyate ekavirahe 'parasmāt kāryotpāde
tasyākāraṇatvaprasaṅgāt anutpāde ca sāmarthyāyogāt śilādi
militāstu bījavirahiṇaḥ kṣityādayo na samarthāḥ kāryājanaka-
tvā1dityāśayenāśaṅkate | syādetaditi | paraspareti | evakāre
ṇātiśaye nairapekṣyalābhaḥ | āśaṅkyate deśyate | kṣaṇikatvamiti śeṣaḥ |
ekarasatvamekasvabhāvatvamekakāryasāmarthyamiti yāvat jātibhedaḥ kurva
drūpatvam | etadaṅgīkāraścānugatāṅkurajātīyaniyāmakatayā kārya
vyaktibhedasya tathotpannakāraṇavyaktibhedādevopapatteḥ | jātiśca naiyāyi
kānāṃ vidhirūpā vyāvṛttirūpā pareṣām dharmiṇi vartamānā
janyatvajanakatvayoravacchedikā anugatavyavahārādiniyāmikā ceti ||
kinnāma bījādiṣu samavahiteṣvavāntarajātiviśeṣa
māśrityāpi kāryajanma sambhāvyata iti | na dṛṣṭasamava
dhānamātreṇaivopapattau tatkalpanāyāṃ pramāṇābhāvāt kalpa
nāgauravaprasaṅgapratihatatvāt atīndriyendriyādivilopa
prasaṅgāt vikalpānupapatteḥ viśeṣasya viśeṣaṃ prati prayo
jakatvācceti ||
śaṅkaº ṭīº | kinnāmeti | bījatvaṃ vā kāraṇatāvacchedakaṃ kurva
drūpatvaṃ vā tatheti sandihyate ityarthaḥ | dṛṣṭeti | anvayavyatireka
viṣayībhūte sati bījatve tadanyakalpanāyāṃ na pramāṇamityarthaḥ | tatra
kurvadrūpatve vipratipattayaḥ | aṅkurakāraṇatāvacchedakatvaṃ phalopahita
bījamātravṛtti na vā bījavṛttijātitvaṃ pratyakṣaviṣayatvavyāpyaṃ
na vā aṅkuropahitamātravṛtti dharmo'ṅkurakāraṇatāvacchedako na vā |
kāryānarjakatvā--pāº 2 puº |
pramāṇābhāvāditi | yogyānupalabdheryogyavyaktivṛttijātyantarābhāva
eva siddho yata ityarthaḥ | doṣāntaramāha | kalpaneti | bījatvenaiva
pratyakṣasiddhenāṅkurakāraṇatāvacchede sambhavati tadarthamatīndriyajāti
kalpanā na sambhavatītyarthaḥ | doṣāntaramāha | atīndriyeti | bāhyā
lokādereva kurvadrūpāt sākṣātkāropapattāvindriyakalpanāpi na
syādityarthaḥ | doṣāntaramāha | vikalpeti | śālitvādinā parāpara
bhāvādivikalpavajjāti1viśeṣasyānupapatterityarthaḥ | doṣāntaramāha |
viśeṣasyeti | bījatvasāmānyasya kvacitprayojakatvamāvaśyakaṃ tacca
nirūpyamāṇamaṅkuraṃ pratyeva syādityarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | kinnāmeti | bījajātīyaṃ kāraṇamityubhaya
vādisiddham | kintvaṅkurānupahitavṛttitvād bījatvaṃ na kāraṇatā
vacchedakamapi tu kurvadrūpatvamiti tannirāsaṃ vinā naikarasatāniścaya
ityarthaḥ | tatra cāṅkurakāraṇatāvacchedakarūpavattvaṃ kārimātravṛtti na
vā bījavṛttijātitvaṃ pratyakṣaviṣayatvavyāpyaṃ na vā kārimātravṛtti
dharme 'ṅkurakāraṇatāvacchedakajātitvaṃ na veti vipratipattayaḥ | pramāṇā
bhāvāditi | yadyapi sādhakabādhakapramāṇābhāvāt saṃśayo yuktasta
thāpi tasya prāmāṇikatve kalpanāgauravasyānavatārāt tadutthāpanārtha
metaduktam | ata eva dṛṣṭasamavadhanetyādipratihatatvādityantamekaṃ
dūṣaṇam | tathā ca lāghavasahakṛtānvayavyatirekābhyāmaṅkurakāraṇatā
vacchedakaṃ bījatvameva klṛptamiti na jātyantarakalpanamityarthaḥ | kāryo-
jātivikalpena--pāº 2 puº |
padhāne tu sahakārisamavadhānaṃ tantramiti bhāvaḥ | atīndriyeti |
yadyapi pareṣāṃ golakamevendriyaṃ tacca nātīndriyaṃ tathāpi dharmapradhāno
nirdeśa itīndriyatvamihendriyapadavācyaṃ tacca kurvadrūpatvaviśiṣṭapratyakṣa
jñānajanakatvamityatīndriyameva | yadvā golakamātraṃ nendriyaṃ prasaktārtha
syāpi1 sattvāt kintu bhogajanakādṛṣṭopagṛhītamiti viśi
ṣṭamatīndriyam atīndriyamindriyaṃ pareṣāṃ samanantarapratyayosmākaṃ
tu manastadubhayamapyatīndriyamityeke | indriyādītyatadguṇasaṃvijñāno
bahubrīhirityanye | vikalpeti | śālitvakurvadrūpatvayorgotvāśvatvayo
riva virodhaḥ avirodhe vā śālitvaṃ tadvyāpakaṃ tadeva vā śālitva
vyāpakamiti vikalpya yathāyathaṃ dūṣyatvādityarthaḥ | etattu svamata
māśrityoktam bauddhairjātimātrānabhyupagamāt kurvadrūpatvasya ca sāmagrī
praviṣṭakāraṇajanyasvarūpaviśeṣarūpatvāt | na cātiśayo'pyatiricyata
ityanyatra svayamevābhidhānāt | viśeṣasyeti | yadi bījaṃ bījatvena
kāñcidarthakriyāṃ na kuryāt tadā tena rūpeṇa tasya sattvaṃ na syāt
yadyena rūpeṇārthakriyājanakaṃ tat tena saditi tavābhyupagamāditi |
bījatvamapi kvacit prayojakaṃ tacca sarveṣāmaviśiṣṭamiti kathaṃ na
samānaśīlatvamiti bhāvaḥ ||
