kṣaṇikasyāpyekasya vastunosiddhirevaṃ syādityarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | bhinnadeśakāryadvayajanakasya ekakāryadeśe kāryā
ntarasāmarthye tatrāpi tatkāryajananamasāmarthye ca kāraṇabheda āpadya
tetyāśayaṃ manyamāno bhrānta āśaṅkate | nanviti | āśayaṃ prakāśa
yati | teṣāmiti |
astu tarhi kaściddoṣa evānayoriti cet sa punaḥ
kasmin sādhye kiṃ sāmarthyāsāmarthyayoḥ kiṃ vā
tadviruddhadharmādhyāsena bhede āhosvit śaktyaśaktyo
rvirodhe ||
śaṅkaº ṭīº | anayoriti | deśagarbhaprasaṅgatadviparyayayo
rityarthaḥ | sāmarthyāsāmarthyayoriti | sādhyayoriti vipariṇāmaḥ |
sāmarthyāsāmarthyayoḥ satorbhede sādhya ityagretanena sambandhaḥ | tatra
yadyapi sāmarthyāsāmarthyarūpe evāhatya na sādhye kiṃ tu tadubhaya
viruddhadharmādhyāsādhīno dharmiṇi bhedaḥ sādhyaḥ tathāpi prasaṅgatadvi
paryayābhyāṃ sākṣāt te eva sādhye ityadoṣaḥ | etadevāha | kiṃ
veti | śaktyaśaktyoriti | karaṇākaraṇayorityarthaḥ | virodha ityatra
sādhya ityanuṣañjanīyam | kaścidanayodoṣa iti sarvatrānuṣaṅgaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | sāmarthyāsāmarthyayoriti | sādhyayoriti vacanaḥ
bhedenānvayaḥ | yadyapi sāmarthyāsāmarthyayorbhedasādhanatvenopanyastayo
sādhyatvābhidhānamayuktama tathāpi pareṇa karaṇākaraṇābhyāṃ sāmarthyā
sāmarthye sādhyete iti tanmatenedamuktam | kiṃ veti | nanu
sāmarthyāsāmarthye tulyatayā viruddhadharmādhyāsasādhyabhedasya tulyava
dvikalpanamayuktam viruddhadharmādhyāsena bhede sādhite tatrāsiddhā
vudbhāvitāyāṃ tatsiddhaye sāmarthyāsāmarthyarūpaviruddhadharmādhyāsasya
svayamevābhidhānāt | maivam sākṣāt sādhyābhiprāyeṇa sāmarthyā
sāmarthye vikalpite paramparā sādhyābhiprāyeṇa ca viruddhadharmādhyāsa
sādhyabhedo vikalpita ityāśayāt | śaktyaśaktyoriti | karaṇā
karaṇayorityarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | anayordeśagarbhaprasaṅgaviparyayayoḥ | sa doṣaḥ | sādhye
viṣaye | sāmarthyeti | sādhyayoriti | vipariṇatenānvayaḥ | kecittu
viruddhadharmasaṃsargādbhedāpattibhayena yadi kaścit kāriṇo'pi sāmarthyaṃ
nopeyāt tadā taṃ prati tadapi sādhyaṃ yadvakṣyati sarvatrāśaktāviti |
aśaktāvasāmarthye bhedopi ca paramparayā prasaṅgādisādhyaḥ virodhastu
bhedasiddhyanuguṇaḥ pramāṇāntarasādhyatvāt sādhyatvena vivakṣita ityāhuḥ |
śaktyaśaktyoḥ sāmarthyāsāmarthyayoḥ agre ca kāritvākāritve karaṇā
karaṇe ca sāmarthyāsāmarthyapare | evaṃ bhinnakālaśaktyaśaktyorityapīti |
yadvā prāk prasaṅgaviparyayayoriti bhedasādhakayordeśabhedena karaṇā
karaṇayorapyupalakṣakam tatra ca ekatra kāriṇo deśāntare'pi
kāritvābhyupagame sarvadeśānāṃ sarvakāryavattvarūpamadvaitam ekatrākāriṇaḥ
sarvatrākāritvābhyupagame ca sarvadeśānāṃ sarvakāryaśūnyatvarūpamadvaitaṃ
kvacitkāritvasya kvaciccākāritvasya cābhyupagame kāraṇabheda āpadye
teti neyam | anayoriti | prasaṅgaviparyayayoḥ karaṇākaraṇayo
ścetyarthaḥ | śaktyaśaktyoriti | karaṇākaraṇayorityarthaḥ | tathā ca
yathāśruta evāgrimagranthaḥ sādhīyān ||
nādyaḥ sarvatra sāmarthye hi prasahya karaṇāt sarvatrā
śaktau kvacidapyakaraṇāt sarvadeśasamānasvabhāvatve'pyasya
svopādānadeśa eva tatkāryaṃ karotīti ayamasya
svabhāvaḥ svakāraṇādāyāto na niyogaparyanuyogāvarha-
tīti cet tarhi sarvakālasamānasvabhāvatve'pi tattatsa
hakārikāla eva1 karotītyayamasya svabhāvaḥ svakāra
ṇādāyāta iti kinna rocayeḥ ||
śaṅkaº ṭīº | sāmarthyāsāmarthyayoḥ sādhyatve yadi prasaṅga
tadviparyayau duṣṭau syātāṃ tadā sarvatra sāmarthyameva syādasāmarthyameva
vā ādye āha | prasahyeti | antye āha2 | sarvatreti | deśabhedena
sāmarthyāsāmarthye naikasya viruddhe iti yadi tadā kālāvaccheda
bhedenāpi3 na virodha iti kutaḥ kṣaṇikatvamiti śaṅkottarābhyā
māha | sarvadeśeti ||
bhagīº ṭīº || 0 ||
raghuº ṭīº | svopādāneti | svaṃ kāryaṃ prati niyatadeśo
palakṣakaṃ cedaṃ kṣaṇikatvena kāraṇasya kāryādhikaraṇatvāyogāt ||
na dvitīyaḥ viruddhadharmādhyāsenāpyabhede bhedavyavahārasya
nirnimittakatvaprasaṅgāt anaikāntikaśca hetuḥ kāla
to'pi na bhedaṃ sādhayet ||
lābha eva--pāº 1 puº |
antye tvāha--pāº 2 puº |
kālabhedenāpi--pāº 1 puº |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | nanu sāmarthyāsāmarthye viruddhe apyekatra vidyamāne
api na dharmiṇaṃ bhinte ityāha | na dvitīya iti |
anaikāntikaśceti | deśabhedena tābhyāṃ viruddhābhyāmapi bhedā
sādhanādityarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | nirnimittaketi | yadītarānimittako bheda
vyavahāro viruddhadharmādhyāsajanyo na syāt akāraṇakaḥ syādityarthaḥ |
viruddhadharmādhyāse'pyabhedaśca syāditi bhāvaḥ | anaikāntikaśceti |
yadi deśato viruddhadharmādhyāse'pi na bhedastadā kālato'pi
viruddhadharmādhyāso heturbhede sādhye'naikāntikaḥ syādityarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | nirnimittakatvasya nirviṣayatvasya prasaṅgāt kvaci
dapi bhedasyāsiddhatvāt | anaikāntika iti | bhedaprasiddhimabhyupetya
tadaprasiddhau tu vyāpyatvāsiddhirdraṣṭavyā ||
na tṛtīyaḥ virodhalakṣaṇayoge bādhakasahasreṇāpi
virodhasyāpanetumaśakyatvāt ayoge vā tadeva cintyam |
yadvidhāne yasya niṣedho yanniṣedhe vā yasya vidhānaṃ
tayorekatra dharmiṇi parasparaparīhārasthitatayā virodhaḥ1
parasparaparīhārāvasthitayorvirodhaḥ--pāº 1 puº |
sa ceha nāsti taddeśakāryakāritvaṃ hi taddeśakāryā
kāritvena viruddhaṃ tadvidhau tasya niyamena niṣedhāt na
punardeśāntare tatkāryākāritvena tasyāniṣedhāt na
hyanyatra tadakaraṇamatatkaraṇaṃ vā tatra tatkaraṇasyā
bhāvo'pi tu tatra tadakaraṇamiti cet hantaivambhūta
virodhalakṣaṇavyāvṛttirbhinnakālaśaktyaśaktyorapītyuktaprāyaṃ
tatpratisandadhīthāḥ ||
śaṅkaº ṭīº | nanu sāmarthyāsāmarthye viruddhe eva na bhavata
ityāha | na tṛtīya iti | virodheti | parasparavirahātmanoḥ
parasparavirahavyāpyayorvā virodhadhrauvyamityarthaḥ | nanvekadeśāvacchedena
kāritvākāritve virodhalakṣaṇākrānte na tu deśabhedenāpītyāha |
ayoge veti | tadeva sāmyāpādanāya paradvārā cintayati |
taddeśakāryakāritvamiti | yaddeśe karoti tatraiva na kuryāt tadā
virodhaḥ syādityarthaḥ deśāntare kāryakāritvenetyatra taddeśakāritvaṃ
viruddhamityanuṣañjanīyam | tasyeti | deśāntare tadakaraṇāsyā
niṣedhādityarthaḥ | nahīti | anyatra yat tatkaraṇaṃ tadviruddhakārya
karaṇaṃ vā na tadeva tatra tatkaraṇasyābhāvo yena virodhaḥ syādapi tu
tatraiva deśe tadānīmeva tadakaraṇaṃ tatkaraṇasyābhāva ityarthaḥ |
sāmyamāpādayati | hantaivamiti | tadā tadakaraṇaṃ tatkaraṇasya
virodhi na tvanyadāpi tadakaraṇaṃ yena virodhaḥ syādityuktamityarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | yadvidhāna iti | yadyapi gotvāśvatvavirodhā
vyāpakamidaṃ virodhalakṣaṇaṃ tayoḥ parasparābhāvavyāpyayoḥ parasparābhāvā
nāmekatvāt tathāpi nedaṃ virodhasāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ kintu bhāvābhāva
rūpavirodhaviśeṣakīrtanamidam | yadvā vidhiniṣedhāvatra jñānasyaiva
tathā cāyamarthaḥ yadvidhāne yasya jñāne sati yatra dharmiṇyaparaniṣedho
niyamena jñānābhāvo yanniṣedhe ca yadajñāne ca niyamato yatra
yasya vidhirjñānaṃ tat tena viruddhamiti sāmānyalakṣaṇaparatvamapi
na punariti | taddeśakāryakāritvamityanuṣajyate | tasya deśāntare
tadakaraṇasyetyarthaḥ | etadeva spaṣṭayati | na hīti | yatra yatkaraṇaṃ
nopalabhyate'tatkaraṇaṃ tadviruddhajātīyakaraṇasyetyarthaḥ | tatreti | yatra
deśe tatkaraṇasya tadviruddhajātīyākaraṇasya ca mānasiddhatvānna
virodha ityarthaḥ | api tviti | tathā ca tatra tadakaraṇameva
tasya tatkaraṇaviruddhamityarthaḥ | hantaivamiti | tadā tadakaraṇaṃ hi
tadā tatkaraṇavirodhisahānavasthānaniyamāt na tvanyadā tadakaraṇa
mityuktamityarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | ayoge vā virodhalakṣaṇasya tadeva virodha
lakṣaṇameva cintyam | yadvidhāna iti | bhāvābhāvavirodhavivecanaṃ
yadvidhāne kriyamāṇe yasya niṣedhaḥ siddhyati yanniṣedhe ca kriyamāṇe
yadvidhānaṃ siddhyati | yadvidhānaṃ yanniṣedho yanniṣedho yadvidhānamiti
tu phalitārthaḥ | kecittu vidhānaniṣedhau jñānājñāne tathā ca
yadajñāne yadjñānaṃ yadajñāna eva yajjñānamityarthād gotvāśvatvādi
sādhāraṇyamityāhuḥ | tayoḥ parasparaparīhārasthitatayā ekadharmiṇi
virodhaḥ sahānavasthānaṃ siddhyatīti | tadvidhau taddeśakāryakāritva
vidhau | tasyaiva taddeśakāryākāritvasyaiva tadvidhau tasyāniṣedhāt tasya
deśāntarakāryākāritvasyāniṣedhāt | atatkaraṇaṃ kāryāntarakaraṇaṃ
dṛṣṭāntārtha cedam abhāva iti vyavahriyata ityarthaḥ | ato
nottaratra uddeśavidheyāvaiśiṣṭyam ||
tasmāt prasaṅgatadviparyayasthitāvapi asiddho viruddha
dharmādhyāsaḥ | nanu yadekadā yat karoti tadyāvat sattvaṃ
tatkarotyeva yathā kaścicchabdaḥ1 śabdāntaramiti
prasaṅgo'stu viparyayastu yadekadā yanna karoti tat sarva
daiva tanna karoti yathā śilāśakalam aṅkuram | na
karoti caikadā kuśūlasthaṃ bījamaṅkuramiti cet tadeta
jjātyabhiprāyeṇa vā syāt vyaktyabhiprāyeṇa vā syāt ||
śaṅkaº ṭīº | pūrvaṃ prasaṅgatadviparyayayorevāsiddhiruktā samprati
tatsiddhāvapi viruddhadharmādhyāsābhāvamupasaṃharati | tasmāditi |
sattvakṣaṇikatvayorvyāptisādhanāya prasaṅgaviparyayāntaramavatārayati |
nanviti | yathā kaścicchabda iti | avinaśyadavastho'nanta ityarthaḥ |
anyathā dvitīyakṣaṇe'karaṇe yāvat sattvaṃ karaṇānupapatteḥ | svamatenaiva
avinaśyadavasthaḥ--ityadhikaṃ śaṅkaramiśrakṛtaṭīkānusāreṇa
vā dṛṣṭāntaḥ viparyaya iti | yadyāvatsattvaṃ yanna karoti tadekadāpi
na karoti yathā śilāśakalaṃ na karoti kuśūlasyaṃ bījaṃ yāva
tsattvamaṅkuraṃ sa ca kadāpi tanna kuryāditi viparyaye darśanīye
ekadā'karaṇasyāpi yāvatsattvākaraṇarūpatayā vyatyāsenaiva viparyayo
darśita ityadoṣaḥ | tadetaditi | prasaṅgatadviparyayopadarśanamityarthaḥ |
jātīti | yajjātīyamekadā na karoti tajjātīyaṃ yāvatsattvaṃ na
karotīti vā yā vyaktirekadā na karoti sā yāvatsattvaṃ na
karotīti vā vivakṣitamityarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | pūrvaṃ prasaṅgaviparyayā vevāsiddhāvityuktamadhunā
tāvapyupetya virodhābhāvamupasaṃharati | tasmāditi | tadā tada
karaṇaṃ prasaṅgaviparyayāntaraṃ vyāptigrāhakamāha | nanviti | kaści
cchabda iti | anantyaśabda ityarthaḥ | nanvātmāpi yāvatsattvaṃ na
śabdāntaraṃ janayati kāryakāraṇayorekakṣaṇāvasthānāt tadā tasya
kāryājanakatvāt | atrāhuḥ kaścidityanenāvinaśyadavastho'pi draṣṭavyaḥ
janakaśca śabdo janyaśabdakāle vinaśyadavastha ityadoṣaḥ | yadeka
deti | nanu yāvatsattvaṃ yat na karotīti sādhyaviparyayaḥ na tvekadā
yanna karotīti tasya sādhanaviparyayatvāt tasya sādhyaviparyayahetu
tvāt | maivam ekadā'karaṇasyāpi yāvatsattvakaraṇaviparyayarūpatvāt ||
raghuº ṭīº | upasaṃharati | tasmāditi | deśabhedeneva
kālabhedenāpi sāmarthyāsāmarthyayoḥ karaṇākaraṇayoścābhyupagame
viruddhadharmasaṃsargo'siddha ityarthaḥ | nanvekadeśe samarthasya deśāntare
kimidamasāmarthyaṃ yadviruddhyate kiṃ sāmarthyābhāvaviśiṣṭasya deśāntare
tatkāryākāritvasyāniṣedhāt sattvaṃ deśāntarāvacchedena tasya sāmarthyā
bhāvavaiśiṣṭyaṃ kiṃ vāsāmarthyaviśiṣṭasya tasya tanniṣṭhasāmarthyasya
vā deśāntare'bhāvaḥ | nādyaḥ dvayamanabhyupagamāt | na cetaraḥ
avirodhāt | etenākaraṇaṃ vyākhyātam | na caikadeśakālasato
deśāntare kālāntare vā kathamasattvamiti vācyam tatrāsattvaṃ
hi tadvatyabhāvaḥ1 tanniṣṭhābhāvapratiyogitvaṃ vā na cedamanyatra
sattvena viruddhyate atadvirahatvādatadākṣepakatvācceti | maivam
evamapi naimittikasukhādisamarthasya rūpāderupādeyakāryadeśe
sukhādikāritvaṃ syāt sāmarthyāviśeṣāt | asāmarthye ca viruddha
dharmādhyāsādbhedāpattiḥ | yadi ca māmarthyāviśeṣe'pi svabhāvādeva
pratiniyatadeśakāryakāritvaṃ tadā tathaiva pratiniyatakālakārya
kāritvamastvityuktatvāt | abhihitaṃ ca deśabhedāvacchedenaikasya
kālasyeva kālabhedāvacchedenaikasyāpi deśasya karaṇākaraṇādi
kamaviruddhamiti prasaṅgaviparyayasthitāvapītyapinā sūcitam | prasaṅga
viparyayasāmānyāsambhavamasahamānontarāprasaṅgaviparyayāntaramāśaṅkate |
nanviti | kaścidanantyaḥ svamatenedam | antyaśabdakṣaṇikatāmate
tu yathāntyaḥ śabdaḥ svanāśamiti draṣṭavyam | yāvatsattvamityatra
kāryaprāgabhāvāvacchinnatvena sattvaṃ viśeṣaṇīyamityapi kaścit | yattu
kaścidityanenāvinaśyadavastho'pi bodhya iti kaṃścit tanna svato'siddheḥ
tadvṛttitvābhāvaḥ--pāº 2 puº |
yat kiñcidrūpaviśiṣṭasya yāvatsattvakaraṇenaiva sādhyasattve ca sahakāri
viśiṣṭasya tathātvādiṣṭāpādanācca ityanena prakāreṇa prayogo'stu
tena kuśūlasthabījasya parābhyupagatamekadāṅkurakāritvarūpahetumattvaṃ
labhyate | ekadā kadācidbhavataḥ kadācidakaraṇasārvadikākaraṇe
yāvatsattvakaraṇakadācitkaraṇavyatirekāviti na viparyayāsaṅgatiḥ |
yajjātīyamekadā yat karoti tajjātīyaṃ kiñcidyāvatsattvaṃ tat
karoti yajjātīyaṃ kiñcidapi yāvatsattvaṃ yanna karoti tajjātīyaṃ
kimapi kadācidapi tanna karotīti yadi vivakṣitaṃ tadā ādye
kasyacid bījasya yāvatsattvamaṅkurakāritvāpattāvapītareṣāmekadā
ṅkurakāriṇāṃ kālāntare tadakaraṇamaviruddham | dvitīye ca tato
hetvasiddhiḥ | samarthabījakṣaṇasya yāvatsattvamaṅkurakāritvopagamāt
bādhaśca1bījajātīyasyaiva sahakārisampannasyāṅkurakāritvāt ||
prathame dvayamapi anaikāntikam aniyamadarśanāt |
dvitīye dvayamapyanyathāsiddham ekāntāsāmarthyaprayukta
tvādatyantākaraṇasya sāmarthye sati sahakārisannidhi
prayuktatvāt karaṇaniyamasya ||
śaṅkaº ṭīº | aniyameti | bījajātīya eva karaṇā
karaṇayordarśanānneyaṃ vyāptirityarthaḥ | dvayamapīti | prasaṅgastadviparyaya
ścetyarthaḥ | anyathāsiddhimāha | ekānteti | śilāśakalādāve-
bādhakābhāve--iti kvacit |
kadākāritve satyanyadāpyakāritvaṃ svarūpāyogyatvaprayuktaṃ svarūpayogyatve
ekadākaraṇaṃ sahakārivekalyaprayuktaṃ yāvatsattvaṃ ca karaṇaṃ sahakāri
lābhaprayuktamityarthaḥ |
bhagīº ṭīº | aniyameti | bījajātīya eva sahakāri
sāhityāsāhityayoraṅkurakaraṇākaraṇadarśanādityarthaḥ | dvayamapīti |
prasaṅgastadviparyayaścetyarthaḥ | anyathāsiddhimupapādayati | ekānteti |
ekadā tadakāriṇo'nyadāpi tadakāritvaṃ śilāśakalādau svarūpā
yogyatvaprayuktam na tvekadā tajjanakatvaprayuktam ekadā kāriṇaśca
svarūpayogyasya yāvatsattvaṃ karaṇaṃ yāvatsattvaṃ sahakārisamavadhāna
prayuktamityarthaḥ |
raghuº ṭīº | atha yajjātīyamekadā yatkaroti tajjātīyaṃ sarvaṃ
yāvatsattvaṃ tat karoti yajjātīyaṃ kiñcidyāvatsattvaṃ yanna karoti
tajjātīyaṃ kimapi kadāpi tanna karotīti tatrāha | dvayamapīti |
dvayaṃ prasaṅgasya viparyayasya ca sādhanam | aniyameti | aṅkurakāriṇāma
ṅkurākāriṇāṃ ca bījajātīyānāṃ bhavatāpyaṅgīkārāditi bhāvaḥ |
anyathāsiddhaṃ vyāpyatvāsiddham | ekānteti | sāmarthyaṃ svarūpayogyatā
sahakāriyogyatā ca | atyantākaraṇaṃ yāvatsattvamakaraṇam | tathā
ca śilādeḥ sahakārisahitasyāpyakaraṇaṃ svarūpāyogyatvāt svarūpa
yogyasya ca bījāderakaraṇaṃ sahakārivaikalyāt tasya cātyantikatva
kādācitkatvābhyāmakaraṇasyāpyātyantikatvakadācitkatve ityarthaḥ ||
etena yadyatkaroti tattadutpannamātraṃ yathā karmavibhāgaṃ
yadutpannamātraṃ yanna karoti tanna kadācidapi yathā
śilāśakalamaṅkuramiti nirastam | atrāpi pūrvavadanai
kāntānyathāsiddhī doṣā1viti ||
śaṅkaº ṭīº | sattvakṣaṇikatvavyāptigrahānukūlameva prasaṅga
viparyayāntaramāśaṅkya nirākaroti | eteneti | pūrvavaditi
jātyabhiprāyeṇānaikāntikatvaṃ na hi bījajātīyamutpannamātrameva
karoti | yā ca vyaktirutpattyanantarameva karoti tatra tattatsaha
kārilābhastattvamityarthaḥ2 ||
bhagīº ṭīº | uktayuktyaiva prasaṅgaviparyayāntaraṃ nirākaroti |
eteneti ||
raghuº ṭīº | etenetyādi | utpannamātraṃ karoti tanna kadā
cidapi tat karoti udāharaṇābhyāṃ tadanurūpāvupanayāvapi sūcitau |
pūrvavaditi jātyabhiprāye'nekāntaḥ vyaktyabhiprāye cānyathāsiddhirdoṣaḥ ||
nāpi tṛtīyaḥ kṛtakatvānityatvāderapi3 parasparā
bhāvavattāmātreṇaiva virodhaprasaṅgāditi ||
anyathāsiddhadoṣau--pāº 1 puº |
tantramityarthaḥ--pāº 3 puº |
kṛtakatvānityatvayorapi--pāº 1 puº |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | tadvattā vā daṇḍitvakuṇḍalitvavaditi yatpūrvaṃ
vikalpitaṃ taddūṣayati | nāpīti | virodhaprasāṅgāditi | tathā ca
tadabhayādhyāsādhīnadharmibhedaprasaṅgādityarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | nāpīti | tadvattā vā daṇḍitvakuṇḍalitva
vaditi pakṣo'pi netyarthaḥ | paraspareti | anyonyābhāvasya tayo
rapi sattvenetyarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | tadvatteti pakṣaṃ dūṣayati | nāpīti |
astu tarhi tasyaiva tenaiva sahakāriṇā sambandho'
sambandhaśceti virodhaḥ na vikalpānupapatteḥ | tathāhi
sambandhinaḥ sambandhyantare svābhāvasvābhāvyaṃ vā viruddhyeta
abhāvapratiyogitvaṃ vā tadaiveti sahitaṃ vā tatraiveti
sahitaṃ vā ubhayasahitaṃ vā tathaiveti sahitaṃ veti ||
śaṅkaº ṭīº | sahakārisamavadhānāt samavadhānādhīne karaṇā
karaṇe iti yat samāhitaṃ tatrāpi virodha ityāha | astu
tarhīti | sambandhina iti | sahakārisamavadhānaṃ tāvanna sambhavati
yata ekasya sahakāriṇaḥ sahakāryantaramabhāvasvarūpameva na ca bhāvā
bhāvayoḥ samavadhānasambhāvanetyarthaḥ | asamavadhāne virodhamāha |
abhāveti | (viruddhyata iti sambaddhyate sahakāriṇo yadyabhāvaḥ
syāt tadā tadasamavadhānaṃ syāt tadeva tu nāsti nahi bhāvasyāpya
bhāvapratiyogitvaṃ sambhāvyate virodhāditi dvitīyavikalpārthaḥ |
bhavatu vā bhāvasyāpyabhāvapratiyogitvaṃ tathāpi svāvacchinna eva
kāle svābhāvaḥ kathaṃ bhavet yena vidyamānenāpi kṣetreṇa bījasya
samavadhānaṃ na bhavediti tṛtīyavikalpārthaḥ | nanu bhavatu vidyamāna
syāpi tatkopyabhāvo'stu tathāpi yatraiva pratiyogī tatraiva tadabhāvo
viruddha iti caturthavikalpārthaḥ | yatra kāle yatra deśe yaḥ prati
yogī tasya tatra tadānīmabhāvo viruddha iti pañcamavikalpārthaḥ |
yadavacchedena yadā yatra pratiyogī tadavacchedenaiva tadaiva tasyaivābhāvo
viruddha iti ṣaṣṭhavikalpārthaḥ | sambandhina iti | sahakārisamava
dhānaṃ tāvanna sambhavati yata ekasya sahakāriṇaḥ sahakāryantarama
bhāvasvarūpameva na ca bhāvābhāvayoḥ samavadhānasambhāvanetyarthaḥ |
samavadhāne virodhamāha | abhāveti |)1 viruddhyata iti sambaddhyate |
sahakāriṇo yadyabhāvaḥ syāt tadā tadasamavadhānaṃ syāt tadeva tu
nāsti nahi bhāvasyāpyabhāvo virodhādityarthaḥ | bhavatu vā bhāva
syāpyabhāvo viruddha ityāha | tadaiveti | atrābhāvapratiyogitvaṃ
viruddhyata ityanuṣaṅgaḥ | evaṃ paratrāpi bhavatu vā bhāvasamāna
kālīnopyabhāvastathāpi yatraiva bhāvastatraiva tadabhāvaḥ kathaṃ syādviro
dhādityāha | tatraiveti | kālabhedenaikadeśatvasambhave'pi yadā
yatra yatsattvaṃ tadaiva tasya tatrāsattvaṃ viruddhamityāha | ubhaya-
() kuṇḍalīsthaṃ pāṭhāntaraṃ tṛtīyādarśapustake'dhikaṃ dṛśyate |
sahitamiti | yenāvacchedena pratiyogaṃ tenaivāvacchedena tatraiva
tadabhāvo na sambhavatītyāha | tathaiveti ||
bhagīº ṭīº | nanvekatra karaṇākaraṇe sahakārisamavadhānā
samavadhānābhyāmupapādyetayorevaikatra virodhādasaṃsarga ityāha |
astviti | tathāhīti | ekasya sambandhinaḥ svakīyābhāvatādātmyaṃ
sambandhyantare viruddhyate ekatra sambandhāsambandhayoḥ sattvābhyupagame
sambandhasya svābhāvatādātmyamevābhyupetaṃ syāt | tathā ca bhāvasya
svābhāvapratikṣepasvabhāvatvaṃ viruddhamityarthaḥ | abhāveti | yatra
sambandhini bījādau sahakāriṇāmabhāvapratiyogitvaṃ tatraiva tada
pratiyogitvaṃ virodhitvamityarthaḥ | sāmānyato virodhaṃ viśeṣato
vikalpayati | tadaiveti | sahitamityatra sarvatrābhāvapratiyogitva
mityanuṣajyate | bhāvakāla evābhāvapratiyogitvaṃ vetyarthaḥ | tathaiveti |
yenaiva prakāreṇa sambandhasya yatrābhāvastenaiveti sahitaṃ vetyarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | vāribījādīnāṃ sambandhaḥ saṃyogobhyupeyate sa
ca sambandhisvarūpaḥ | nirantarotpannakṣaṇikābhyāṃ tābhyāmeva mithaḥ
saṃyuktapratyayādisambhave'tirikte mānābhāvāt | abhāvo'pi cādhi
karaṇasvarūpa eva ekatra ca sambandhatadabhāvopagame sambandhātmakasya tasya
sambandhābhāvātmakatvaṃ syāt na ca svaṃ svasyābhāvo bhavitumarhatītyāha |
sambandhina iti | sambandhyantare kadācidasattve tasya | abhāveti |
nābhāvo vidyate sata iti nyāyāditi bhāvaḥ | abhāvaprati-
yogitvamiti paratra sarvatrānuṣajyate | tadā svakāle tatra svadeśe |
ubhayeti | svākāla eva svadeśa iti | tathaiva svakāle svadeśe
svāvacchedakāvacchedeneti ||
na prathamaḥ anabhyupagamāt | na dvitīyaḥ satkārya
pratiṣedhāt1 | na tṛtīyaḥ prākpradhvaṃsābhāvayorbhāva
samānakālatvānabhyupagamāt | na caturthaḥ sa hi na
tāvatsthitiyaugapadyaniyamena sambandhinostadasiddheḥ ita
eva tatsiddhāvitaretarāśrayatvaṃ niyamasiddhau hi virodha
siddhiḥ tatsiddhau ca bhede sati niyamasiddhiriti |
na cānyatastatsiddhistadabhāvāt aniyatopasarpaṇā
pasarpaṇakāraṇaprayuktatvācca sambandhāsambandhayoḥ nāpi
vināśasya ahetukatvāt ayaṃ virodho'rthāt siddhyati
tasyāpyasiddheḥ dhruvabhāvitve tu vakṣyāmaḥ | nāpi pañcamaḥ
na hi tadeva tatraiva sa eva sahakāryasti nāsti ceti
abhyupagacchāmaḥ |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | anabhyupagamāditi | sambandhyantarameva sambandhya
ntarasyābhāva iti nābhyupagamyate adhikaraṇasvabhāvaścābhāvo na
bhavatīti niṣetsyata eveti bhāvaḥ | satkāryeti | abhāvaprati
yogitvaṃ bhāvasya nāstītyabhyupagame tava sāṃkhyamatapraveśe'pyapasiddhāntaḥ
kṣaṇikatvasādhanavirodhonubhavavirodhaścetyarthaḥ | prāgiti | prāgabhāva-
pratikṣepāt--pāº 2 puº |
pradhvaṃsayoḥ pratiyogisamānakālatvānupapattāvapyatyantābhāvamādāya
sahakāryasamavadhānasambhavāt | sahakāriprāgabhāvapradhvaṃsāvapi prati
yogibhinnakālāvādāya tathā sambhavādityarthaḥ | sa hīti | virodhe
yadi sahakāriṇā sthitiyaugapadyaniyamo bhavet tadaikasahakārideśe
sahakāryantarābhāvo na bhavet sa ca nāstītyarthaḥ | nanu prati
yogitadabhāvayoḥ samānadeśatvavirodhādeva sthitiyaugapadyaniyamaḥ
syādityata āha | ita eveti | tadeva sphuṭayati1 | niyameti |
tatsiddhau virodhasiddhau bhede sati kṣaṇabhaṅge sati niyamasiddhi
rityarthaḥ | kṣaṇabhaṅge sati sahakāriṇāṃ tathotpādaniyamādyaugapadyaṃ
siddhyet sa evādyāpi na siddha ityarthaḥ | nanu virodhādeva sthiti
yaugapadyaṃ māsaitsīdanyata eva kutaścitpramāṇāt siddhyatu tadityata
āha | na ceti | tadabhāvāditi | pramāṇāntarābhāvādityarthaḥ |
nanu sahakāriṇāṃ yaugapadyameva kathaṃ na bhavatītyata āha |
aniyateti | nanu dhvaṃsasya pratiyogibhinnaṃ kāraṇaṃ nāsti tathā
ca svotpattyavyavahitottarakṣaṇavartidhvaṃsapratiyogitve kṣaṇikatve siddhe
puñjāt puñjotpattisiddhāvarthādeva sahakāriṇāṃ sthitiyaugapadya
niyamaḥ setsyatītyāha | nāpīti | tasyāpīti | vināśasyāhetu
katvasyetyarthaḥ | nanu vināśo bhāvānāṃ dhruvabhāvī tathā ca kuto
hetvantarāpekṣetyata āha | dhruvabhāvitva iti | ubhayasahitaṃ veti
dūṣayati | nāpīti ||
tadeva spaṣṭayati--pāº 3 puº |
bhagīº ṭīº | anabhyupagamāditi | sambandhāntare sambandhasya
svābhāvatādātmyānabhyupagamādityarthaḥ | bhedena tayoranubhavācceti
bhāvaḥ | satkāryeti | karaṇākaraṇayoriva kālabhedenaikatra tatsattve
'pyanyadābhāvapratiyogitvaṃ na viruddhaṃ kālabhede'pi tadāvirodhaḥ
syādyadi nābhāvo vidyate sata ityādi mayābhyupagamyetetyarthaḥ |
prāgiti | dhvaṃsaprāgabhāvayorekakālavṛttitvaṃ nābhyupagamyata evetya
tyantābhāvapratiyoginostadviruddhaṃ vācyam tacca deśabhedenaivāviruddha
mityarthaḥ | prāgityatrābhāva iti yojyam | sa hīti | sa virodhaḥ
kṣaṇikatve hi vastūnāṃ svarūpayogyasya sahakāristhitiyaugapadya
niyamaḥ sahakāryaniyamaḥ1 | svarūpāyogyasyaivaikatra sahakāri
sambandhāsambandharūpaviruddhadharmasaṃsargaḥ syāt tadeva tvasiddhamityarthaḥ |
parasparāśrayatvaṃ vivṛṇoti | niyamasiddhāviti | tathotpādarūpa
sthitiyaugapadyaniyamasiddhāvityarthaḥ | nanu sāmarthyāsāmarthyalakṣaṇa
viruddhadharmasaṃsargāt kṣaṇabhaṅgasiddhau sambandhinaḥ sthitiyaugapadya
niyamaḥ syādityata āha | na ceti | tayoravirodhasya sādhita
tvādityarthaḥ | tathāpyekatra sambandhāsambandhau kutastyāvityata āha |
aniyateti | ahetukatvāditi | pratiyogibhinnahetvanapekṣatvā
dityarthaḥ | arthāditi | utpattyanantaraṃ kāraṇavilambānnāśe vilamba
syāt sa ca nāstyevetyutpattyavyavahitottarakṣaṇavarttidhvaṃsapratiyogitve
bhāvānāṃ siddhe sthitiyaugapadyaniyamo'pi siddha ityarthaḥ | dhruva
bhāvitvācca yathā na nāśasyāhetukatvasiddhistathopariṣṭādvakṣyāmaha
sahakāryasambandhaḥ--pāº 2 puº |
ityāha | dhruveti | tathaiveti | sahitamityayamapi pakṣo'nabhyupagame
naiva nirasta iti pṛthaṅ na dūṣitaḥ nāsti cetyato virodha
ityadhyāhāryam ||
raghuº ṭīº | anabhyupagamāditi | anantarotpāda1kṣaṇika
tvayorasiddhyā saṃyogasya dharmivṛttitvānugatapratītyā cābhāvasyā
tiriktasya siddheriti bhāvaḥ | prāgasata eva kāryasyotpatteḥ
prāmāṇikatayā tvayāpi satkāryatvaniṣedhādityāha | satkāryeti |
prāgityādi | saṃyogini saṃyogasya prāgabhāvadhvaṃsayoḥ kālabhedenaiva
vṛttyupagamāt atyantābhāvasya cāvacchedabhedena vṛttau virodhābhā
vāditi bhāvaḥ | sa hīti | sa virodhaḥ sambandhinorekatara
sambandhisattvakāle nairantaryeṇāparasya sambandhino'vaśyaṃ sattvamityevaṃ
rūpeṇa niyamena tāvanna siddhyati yatastadasiddheruktarūpaniyamāsiddheḥ |
ita eva virodhādeva niyamasiddhāvuktarūpaniyamasiddhau | tatsiddhiḥ
virodhasiddhiḥ | tatsiddhau virodhasiddhau | bhede sati sambandhā
sambandhalakṣaṇaviruddhadharmādhyāsāddharmibhede siddhe satītyarthaḥ | etāvatā
cakrake'pi parasparāśrayatvamakṣatam | mānāntarānniyamasiddhaṃ nirā
karoti | na ceti | nanu prathamaṃ sambaddhasyāsambaddhasya vā paścāt
kathamasambaddhatvaṃ sambaddhatvaṃ cetyata āha | aniyateti | ahetu
katvāt pratiyogyuttarabhāvihetvanapekṣitatvāt | arthādutpattyanantara
meva bhāvānāṃ nāśādekasya kālabhedenāpi sambandhāsambandhāyogāt
tasyāhetutvasya | nanu yadyasya dhruvabhāvi tattadutpattyanantarameva
nirantarotpāda--pāº 2 puº |
jāyate yathāsmākaṃ samarthasya kāryaṃ bhavatāṃ ca dravyādeḥ parimāṇādi
dhruvabhāvī ca bhāvasya vināśa ityato'rthādvirodhaḥ setsyatītyata
āha | dhruveti | nahītyādikaṃ vyāpyavṛttyabhiprāyeṇa ||
nanu samavadhānaṃ nāma sahakāriṇāṃ dharmaḥ saṃyogo
bhavadbhiriṣyate sa ca tebhyo vyatirikto'vyāpyavṛttiścetyapi |
tathā ca sa eva tadaiva tatraivāsti nāsti ceti anati
reke sthiravādino vyastānyapi bījavāridharaṇidhāmāni
tānyeveti tebhyo'pi kāryotpattiprasaṅgaḥ | vyāpya
vṛttitve ca sarvatra raktādivibhramaḥ śabdādikāryotpatti
prasaṅgaśca | tasmādasaṃyuktebhyo'nya eva saṃyuktasvabhāvāḥ
paramāṇavo jātā ityeva jyāyaḥ | naitadevaṃ kṣaṇika
paramāṇāvapyasya virodhasya durvāratvāt | tathāhi pūrva
digavasthitaḥ paramāṇuryathā paradigavasthitena paramāṇunā
'paradigavacchedenāvṛtarūpa utpannaḥ tathaiva kiṃ pūrvadiga
vacchedenāpi na vā ubhayathā vā ādye ubhayatopya
nupalabdhiprasaṅgaḥ dvitīye tu ubhayatopyupalambhāpattiḥ
tṛtīye punaḥ sa eva durātmā virodhaḥ sa eva tenaiva
tadaivāvṛto'nāvṛtaśceti ||
śaṅkaº ṭīº | etāvatā praghaṭṭakena sahakārisamavadhānāsama
vadhānādhīne karaṇākaraṇe iti yaduktaṃ tatsamāhitaṃ tathaiveti |
sahitaṃ veti ṣaṣṭhaṃ1 pakṣaṃ paraprativandimukhena samādhitsuḥ prativandina
mutthāpayituṃ pīṭhaṃ racayati | nanviti | na hi tadeva tatraiva sa
evāsti nāsti cetyabhyupagacchāma iti yaduktam tatsaṃyoge śabde
jñānādāvabhyupagamena tavāpasiddhānta iti pūrvapakṣiṇobhisandhiḥ |
tebhya iti | sahakāribhya ityarthaḥ | ityapītyato2 bhavadbhiriṣyate
ityanuṣaṅgaḥ | vyastānyapīti | viśakalitānyapītyarthaḥ | raktādīti |
arakte'pi bhāge mahārajanasaṃyogasya vyāpyavṛttitayā3 raktadhī4
prasaṅga ityarthaḥ | bheryākāśasaṃyogasya ca sakalākāśavṛttitayā
sarvatra śabdotpattiprasaṅgaḥ vibhukāryāṇāmasabhava | yideśānurodhitvāt |
ādipadena sukhaduḥkhādisaṅgrahaḥ5 svasiddhāntānusāreṇopasaṃharati |
tasmāditi | yadvā tasmādityatiriktasaṃyogapakṣe virodhāduktā
dityarthaḥ | saṃyuktasvabhāvā iti | aviraladeśenotpannākṣaṇika
paramāṇava eva tathotpādād ghaṭapaṭādibhāvamāpannā ityarthaḥ |
asya virodhasyeti | āvṛtānāvṛtaraktāraktādivirodhasyetyarthaḥ |
ādya iti | ubhayadigavacchedenānāvṛtatva ityarthaḥ | dvitīya
iti | kvacidāvṛtaḥ kvacidanāvṛta utpanna ityarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | saṃyogasyānatirekavyāpyavṛttitve krameṇa dūṣa
yati | anatireka iti | raktādīti | śuklapaṭe raktatvabhrama-
pūrvaṃ--pāº 3 puº |
ityatopītyato--pāº 2 puº |
sarvavṛttitayā--pāº 2 puº |
raktatva--pāº 2 puº |
sukhaduḥkhādiparigrahaḥ--pāº 2 puº |
nimittaṃ mahārajanasaṃyogaḥ sa yadi vyāpyavṛttiḥ syāt tadā samagra
eva paṭe raktadhīḥ syāt tathā bheryākāśasaṃyogasya śabdāsamavāyi
kāraṇasya nabhovṛttitve sarvatra śabdotpattiḥ syāt yāvati deśe
vibhukāryāṇāmasamavāyikāraṇaṃ tāvati kāryāvaśyambhāvādityarthaḥ |
āvṛtānāvṛtatvādibodhādavayavyabhāve paramāṇusamūho ghaṭasteṣāṃ para
māṇūnāmatīndriyatve'pi tathotpādāt pratyakṣatvasiddhiriti bauddha
siddhāntādāha | tathāhīti | na veti | ubhayadigavacchedenānāvṛta
evetyarthaḥ | yat kramayaugapadyābhyāmarthakriyāsu nopayujyate tadasad
yathā kūrmaroma tathā cākṣaṇikaṃ śaśaviṣāṇādītyatrāpi prasaṅga
viparyayayoḥ sādhyāvaiśiṣṭhyamanvaye vyāptyabhāve'pi vyatireke'pi
tadabhāvaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | ṣaṣṭhamapi prativandimukhenānabhyupagamādeva nira
situmāśaṅkate | nanviti | ityapītyasyārtho bhavadbhiriṣyate nāsti
cetītyasyāgre virodha iti śeṣaḥ | sarvatreti | tattatkāryotpatti
niyāmakānāṃ mahārajanabheryādisaṃyogānāṃ sakalāvayavadigde
śādyavacchedena vṛttau tattatkāryāṇāmapi tathaivotpattiprasaṅgādityarthaḥ |
paramāṇavaḥ | kṣaṇikaparamāṇupuñjarūpā vāribījādayaḥ kāryaviśeṣa
samarthā jātā iti | na ceti | paradigavacchedenāpyanāvṛtarūpa
ityarthaḥ | ubhayathā veti | paradigavacchedenāvṛtarūpaḥ pūrvadigava
cchedena cānāvṛtarūpa ityarthaḥ ||
prakārabhedamupādāyāvirodha iti cet kaḥ punarasau1
digantarāvacchedaḥ | yadi hi yaddigavacchedenaiva saṃyukta
staddigavacchedenaivāsaṃyuktopi tato virodhaḥ syāt iha
tu naivamiti cet hanta saṃyogasaṃyoginorbhedapakṣe'pi
yadyayaṃ siddhāntavṛttāntaḥ syāt kīdṛśo doṣa iti |
etena vyatirekapakṣo'pi nirastaḥ |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | kaśca punarasāvitipraśraḥ digantarāvacchedena
ityuttaram ayaṃ siddhāntavṛttānta iti añcalāvacchedena mahārajana
saṃyoge'pi daśāvacchedena tadabhāvānna sarvatra raktavibhrama ityarthaḥ |
etāvatā tathaiveti sahitaṃ veti ṣaṣṭhaḥ pakṣo'bhyupagamena nirasta iti
siddhaṃ sahakārisamavadhānāsamavadhānaprayukte karaṇākaraṇe ekasyāmeva
vyaktāviti | eteneti | sattvakṣaṇikatvayoranvayavyāptibhaṅgenetyarthaḥ |
yanna kṣaṇikaṃ tanna sat yathā śaśaviṣāṇamiti vyatirekavyāptistvayā
vācyā | kevalānvayino'nabhyupagamāt | vyatirekavyāptiścānvayavyāpti
vyāptā sā cennāsti tadā vyatirekavyāptirapi nāstīti bhāvaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | sandigdhāsiddhaścetyādidūṣaṇamevetyāha | eteneti |
raghuº ṭīº | pṛcchati kaḥ punariti | uttarayati digantareti |
kaśca punarasau--iti śaṅgaramiśrasammataḥ pāṭhaḥ |
etena vyāptiviraheṇa | vyatirekapakṣaḥ yat kramayaugapadyarahitaṃ tada
sat yathā śaśaviṣāṇaṃ kramayaugapadyarahitaśca sthiro bhāva iti
sthirāṇāṃ sattvavyatirekasādhanam ||
adhikaśca tatrāśrayahetudṛṣṭāntasiddhau pramāṇābhāvaḥ
avastuni pramāṇāpravṛtteḥ pramāṇapravṛttāvalīkatvānu
papatteḥ | evaṃ tarhyavyavahāre svavacanavirodhaḥ syāditi
cet tat kiṃ svavacanavirodhena teṣu pramāṇamupadaśitaṃ
bhavati vyavahāraniṣedhavyavahāro vā khaṇḍitaḥ syāt
aprāmāṇiko'yaṃ vyavahāro'vaśyābhyupagantavya iti vā
bhavet |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | adhika iti | anvayavyāptyapekṣayātra bahūni
dūṣaṇānītyarthaḥ | tānyevāha | āśrayeti | āśrayapadaṃ sādhyābhāvaparaṃ
tadāśritya vyatirekavyāptipravṛtteḥ hetupadaṃ sādhanābhāvaparaṃ tadviparyayasya
hetutvopagamāt dṛṣṭāntapadaṃ sphuṭārthameva | tathā ca śaśaviṣāṇādau
sādhyābhāvo na sādhanābhāvo navā śaśaviṣāṇādi pramāṇagaṇagamya
mityarthaḥ | yadvā akṣaṇikamasat kramayaugapadyābhyāmarthakriyārahita
tvāt kūrmaromavadityāśrayāsiddhiḥ sandehasiṣādhayiṣayorabhāvāt |
ata eva hetvasiddhiḥ | vyāptipakṣadharmatāviśiṣṭasyaiva hetutvāt |
evaṃ tarhīti | pramāṇasādhya eva vyavahārastadetyarthaḥ | tathā ca
jñānamātraṃ vyavahārāṅgaṃ na tu pramaiveti bhāvaḥ | alīke ko'pi
vyavahāro na saṃbhavati iti vadatastava svavacanavirodhaḥ | asyaiva
vyavahārasyābhyupagamādityāha | svavacaneti | tatkimiti | pramāṇā
dhīna eva vyavahārastvayā ca vyavahāraniṣedhavyavahāraḥ kriyate |
tannūnaṃ śaśaviṣāṇādyapi prāmāṇikamityāyātamityarthaḥ | vyavahāra
niṣedheti | pramāṇamantareṇa vyavahāraniṣedhavyavahāro'pyayamanupapanna
ityarthaḥ | aprāmāṇiko'pīti | aprāmāṇiko'pi vyavahāraścet
tvayā neṣṭavyastadā tava svavacanavirodho bhavedityarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | adhikaśceti | pūrvānumāne hetvāśrayadṛṣṭāntā
siddhiḥ sphuṭaiva | yadi tvakṣaṇikamasat kramayaugapadyābhyāmarthakriyā
rahitatvāt kūrmaromavaditi brūyāt tadā kṣaṇikatvarūpasādhyā
prasiddhyā pakṣaviśeṣaṇasaṃśayābhāvādāśrayāsiddhiḥ ata eva hetvabhāvaḥ
vyāptapakṣadharmasyaiva hetutvāt dṛṣṭāntāsiddhirapyata eva sādhyāprasiddhyā
sādhyābhāvavyāpakābhāvapratiyogitvagrahasthalābhāvāt | nanu sādhya
jñānamātraṃ tadvyatirekagrahaupayikaṃ na tu sādhyapramā śaśaśṛṅgaṃ
nāstīti vyavahārāt anyathā na tatra vyavahāra ityapi vacanaṃ
vyāhatam asyaiva vyavahārasya sattvāt tathā cāśrayādau pramāṇā
pravṛttāvapi noktadoṣa ityāha | evaṃ tarhīti | tat kimiti |
nahi tatra vyavahāraḥ prāmāṇikaḥ sambhavati alīkānāmakāraṇatayā
pratyakṣāviṣayatvāt vyāptigrāhakatādātmyatadutpattyorabhāve'numānā
sambhavādityarthaḥ | vyavahāraniṣedheti | avastuviṣayakasya vyavahārasya
yo niṣedharūpo vyavahāraḥ so'pi khaṇḍitaḥ tathā ca vyavahāra
niṣedho'pi tatra na kartavya ityarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | āśrayaḥ pakṣaḥ sthiro bhāvastasyāsiddhistatsvarūpasya
pareṇa prāmāṇikatvānabhyupagamāt | yat tadvakṣyati nahi virodha
sahasreṇāpītyādi | tadviśeṣaṇasyāsattvalakṣaṇasya sādhyasyāprasiddhyā ca
hetvasiddhiḥ hetoḥ kramādivirahasyāprasiddhiḥ sati tvayā tadanabhyupa
gamādasataḥ pramāṇāgocaratvāt pakṣasya hetoścāprasiddhyā pakṣadharma
tvāsiddhiśca dṛṣṭāntāsiddhirdṛṣṭāntasyālīkasyāprasiddhiḥ tasya sādhya
sādhanayoścāprasiddhyā ca tatra tadubhayavattvāpratītiḥ alīkatvā
nnāstyevāsati pakṣādau pramāṇamanumānaṃ punarasatkhyātyaiva vyavahāravat
pravartate | atha vyavahāropi pramāṇādhīna eva tatrāha | evaṃ tarhīti |
svavacanamasatyāśrayādau pramāṇābhāva iti vacanam | vyavahāreti |
teṣvityanuṣajyate ||
na tāvat prathamaḥ na hi virodhasahasreṇāpi sthire
tasya kramādivirahe vā śaśaśṛṅge vā pratyakṣamanumānaṃ
vā darśayituṃ śakyaṃ tathātve vā kṛtaṃ bhautakalahena,
dbitīya1stviṣyata eva prāmāṇikaiḥ avacanameva tarhi
prāptaṃ kiṃ kurmo yatra vacanaṃ sarvathaivānupapannaṃ tatrāvacana
meva śreyaḥ tvamapi paribhāvaya tāvanniṣprāmāṇike'rthe
mūkavāvadūkayoḥ kataraḥ śreyān2 |
dvitīyaṃ tviṣyata--pāº kvacit |
kataraḥ prāmāṇika iti--pāº 1 puº |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | akṣaṇikamasat kramayaugapadyarahitatvāt kūrma
romavadityanumāne pakṣasādhyahetudṛṣṭānteṣu pramāṇānupapattimāha |
nahīti | indriyasannikarṣābhāvāt pratyakṣānupapattirvyāptyabhāvā1
danumānānupapattiriti bhāvaḥ | tathātve veti | pramāṇopadarśane
ityarthaḥ | bhauto varvaraḥ bhūtāviṣṭo vā | dvitīyastviti | vyavahārā
bhāvaḥ | vyavahārakhaṇḍanapakṣa ityarthaḥ | apratibhānigrahasthānamudbhā
vayati | avacanameva tarhīti | niranuyogamāha siddhāntī kiṃ
kurma iti | uttarārhe uttarāpratipattirapratibhā idaṃ tūttarārhameva
bhavatīti nāpratibheti bhāvaḥ | etadevāha | tvamapīti | avacana
mevātra śreya ityarthaḥ | niḥprāmāṇika iti | vacanasyāpi mūlabhūta
pramāṇasāpekṣatvāditi bhāvaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | kramādivirahahetau śaśaśṛṅge dṛṣṭānte alīke
mānābhāvāt vidhivyavahāravanniṣedhavyavahāro'pi neṣyate śaśaśṛṅgaṃ
nāstīti vyavahārasya ca śaśe śṛṅgaṃ nāstītyartha ityāha | dvitīya
stviti | nanvevamapratibhānigrahasyānaṃ prāptamityāha | avacanameveti |
alīke vacanahetuvivakṣākāraṇasyābhāvena vacanaṃ na sambhavatītyāha |
kiṃ kurma iti | na cāpativacanārdde uttarāpratipattirapratibheti
tallakṣaṇāt na vā tvayā mādhanaṃ kiñcidaktaṃ yatrānuttarādapratibhā
syādityāha | tvamapīti |
vyāptigraha bhāvāt--pāº 3 puº |
raghuº ṭīº | śaśaśṛṅge veti | tasya kramādivirahe | asattve
cetyapi draṣṭavyam | tathātve veti | pramāṇapravṛttāvasattvānupapatteriti
bhāvaḥ | avacanameveti | tathā cāpratibheti bhāvaḥ | uttarārhe uttarā
pratipattirapratibhā | na cedamuttarārhamityāha | tvamapīti ||
evaṃ viduṣāpi bhavatā na mūkībhūya sthitam api
tu vyavahāraḥ pratiṣiddha evāsatīti cet satyam yathā
aprāmāṇikaḥ svavacanaviruddho'rtho māprasāṅkṣīditi
manyamānena tvayā aprāmāṇika evāsati vyavahāraḥ
svīkṛtastathāsmābhirapi pramāṇacintāyāmaprāmāṇiko
vyavahāro māprasāṅkṣīditi manyamānairaprāmāṇika eva
svavacanavirodhaḥ svīkriyate | yadi tūbhayatrāpi bhavān
samānadṛṣṭiḥ syādasmābhirapi tadā na kiñciducyata iti |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | evaṃ viduṣāpīti | aprāmāṇike'rthe'tra mūkataiva
śaraṇamiti viduṣāpītyarthaḥ | yatheti | sattvaṃ kṣaṇikatvavyāpyamitya
smākaṃ svavacanaṃ tadviruddho'rthaḥ sattve 'satyapi śaśaviṣāṇādau na
kṣaṇikatvamiti vipakṣagāmitvaprasaṅgāt | sa mābhūdetadarthaṃ kṣaṇikatva
vyāvṛttyā sattvavyāvṛttiraprāmāṇikyeveti tvayā yathā vyavahriyate
tathāsmābhirapi | kṣaṇikatve kiṃ pramāṇamiti cintāyāṃ tvadupa
darśitaḥ śaśaviṣāṇādau vyatirekagrahavyavahāro mā prasaktaḥ syāditye
tadarthaṃ svaśiṣyādaya evaṃ bodhyanta ityarthaḥ | yadi tviti | tvaṃ cettatra
vyatirekavyāptiṃ na darśayasi tadā tatra vyatirekabhaṅgāya mayāpi
na yatanīyamityarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | nanu nāvastuni kasyaciddharmasya vidhiniṣedha
vyavahārāviti jānatāpi tatra vyavahāro niṣidhyate na tu mūkatva
mālambyata ityāha | evamiti | yatheti | sāmarthyanivṛttivyavahāra
niṣedhasvavacanavirodhādevāprāmāṇiko'rthaḥ śaśaśṛṅgādistatra niṣedha
vyavahārākaraṇe so'stīti bhrāntirūpā prasaktiḥ sā mābhūdityabhi
mānādyathā tatrānumityarthamaprāmāṇika eva vyavahāraḥ svīkṛtastathā
pramābhūtāyāmanumitau pramārūpa eva liṅgaparāmarśa karaṇamiti
śiṣyaśikṣāyai svavacanavirodho'ṅgīkṛtaḥ | na caivaṃ sādhyasiddhi |
syādāśrayāsiddhyādestādavasthyādityarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | yatheti | aprāmāṇikaḥ pramāṇāviṣayaḥ | svava
canaviruddhaḥ asati pakṣadṛṣṭāntādau pramāṇābhāve 'pyasatkhyātyaivānu
mānaṃ pravartata iti vacanaviruddho'rthaḥ asati vyavahāraniṣedharūpaḥ
aprāmāṇikaḥ pramāṇāmūlakaḥ pramāṇāviṣayārthako vā vyavahāro
'sati śaśaśṛṅgādau kramādivirahāsattvādivyavahāraḥ | pramāṇa
cintāyām asadādau pramāṇaṃ kimiticintāyāṃ vyavahāro'sati
kramādivirahādivyavahāraḥ aprāmāṇika iti prakṛte virodhasyāsa
dghaṭitatvādasati pramāṇābhāvādvirodhopyaprāmāṇika ityarthaḥ | kecittu
svopadarśitasattvakṣaṇikatvavyāptivirodhino'kṣaṇikasattvasya nirākara
ṇāya kṣaṇikatvavyāvṛttyā sattvavyāvṛttiraprāmāṇikī yathā tvayā
vyavahriyate tathāsmābhirapi kṣaṇikatve'pramāṇacintāyāṃ tvadupadarśi
tasya śaśaśṛṅgādau byatirekavyavahārasya nirākaraṇāya śiṣyādaya
evaṃ bodhyanta ityartha ityāhuḥ | pare tu yatra vyavahāraniṣedhe
svavacanavirodhaḥ syāt so'prāmāṇiko'rtho mā prasāṅkṣīdastīti bhrama
viṣayo mābhūdetadartha yathā tatrāsattvānumityarthamaprāmāṇiko vyava
hārastvayā svīkṛtastathā pramitādeva liṅgāt satyānumitirbhavatīti
śiṣyabodhanāyāsmābhirapi svavacanavirodhoṅgīkṛta ityartha ityāhuḥ |
yadi tviti | asati vyavahāraniṣedha ivāsato dṛṣṭāntatvādika
mapi na saṃbhavati pramāṇavirahāditi pratisandhāya yadi bhavā
nuktarūpamanumānaṃ na prayuṅkta ityarthaḥ ||
tṛtīye tvaprāmāṇikaścāpyavaśyābhyupagantavyaśceti kasye
yamājñeti bhavāneva praṣṭavyaḥ | vyavahārasya sudṛḍhanirūḍha
tvāditi cet aprāmāṇikaśca sudṛḍhanirūḍhaśceti vyāghātaḥ
kathañcidapi vyavasthitatvāditi cet aprāmāṇikaścenna
kathañcidapi vyavatiṣṭhate prāmāṇikaścet tadevocyatā
miti vāde vyavasthā |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | abhyupagantavyaśceti | abhyupagamasya pramāṇamūlakatva
sthiterityarthaḥ | nanvabhyupagame pramāmūlatvaṃ (?) na tantram kintu
niścayamūlatvamātraṃ niścayaścāsatkhyātirūpo'pi tatastadadhīno vyava
hāropi prakṛte syādityāha | vyavahārasyeti | atra virodhamāha |
aprāmāṇikaśceti | sudṛḍhatvamasaṅgṛhītasaṃvādatvaṃ nirūḍhatvamidamittha
meveti gṛhītaprāmāṇyatvam | kathañciditi | saṃvṛtisiddhatvenetyarthaḥ |
aprāmāṇikaścediti | saṃvṛtirapramaiva cet tadā tanmūlo'pi
vyavahāraḥ kathaṃ vyavatiṣṭhatām | pramārūpaiva cet saṃvṛtistadā tanmūlaṃ
pramāṇamevocyatām | tacca nāstīti bhāvaḥ | nanu jalpavitaṇḍayoḥ
parasparajayārthamapramāṇenāpi byavahriyata eva tatkathaṃ vyāghāta ityata
āha | vāda iti | vāda eva tvayā sahāyamupakrāntaḥ sthiraṃ vā
viśraṃ kṣaṇikaṃ veti tattvanirṇīṣayā tatra katham apramāṇena vyava
hariṣyamītyarthaḥ | yadvā vādakathāyāṃ svavacanavirodho na nigrahasthānaṃ
nāpyapratibhā kiṃ tu nyūnādhikāpasiddhāntahetvābhāsapañcakānāmeva
tatrodbhāvanīyatvādityarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | sudṛḍhatvamabādhitaviṣayatvam | nirūḍhavyavahāraḥ
svarūpānapahāraḥ | kathañciditi | sāṃvṛtatvenetyarthaḥ | aprāmāṇika
śceti | māṃvṛterapramāṇatāyāṃ nāvaśyasvīkaraṇīyatvaṃ pramāṇatve ca sa
eva vyāghāta ityarthaḥ | vādakathā svavacanavirodhāṅgīkāre'pi pravartata
evetyāha | vādeti ||
raghuº ṭīº | sudṛḍhanirūḍhatvamidamitthameveti pramāviṣayatvaṃ
tatkiṃ svarūpata eva viṣayatopi vā ādye jaḍagavadavaśādivadabhyupa
gamyata eva śaśaviṣāṇaṃ nāstītyādipratyakṣasiddhāḥ śabdāḥ dvitīye
tvāha | aprāmāṇika iti | pramāṇāviṣayārthaka ityarthaḥ | kathañci
diti | saṃvṛtisiddhatvādityarthaḥ | na kathañciditi | aprāmāṇikasya
saṃvṛtisahasreṇāpi vāstavīkaraṇāyogādityarthaḥ | tadeva pramāṇameva |
vāda iti | svavacanavirodhe'pyasiddhena hetunā nirṇayājananāt vakṣya
māṇā jalpādirītirihāpi na nivāryata iti tātparyam |
jalpavitaṇḍayostu pakṣādiṣu pramāṇapraśnamātrapravṛttasya
na svavacanavirodhaḥ tatra pramāṇenottaramaniṣṭamaśakyaṃ ca
apramāṇenaiva tūttare svavacanenaiva bhaṅgaḥ madukteṣu pakṣā
diṣu pramāṇaṃ nāstīti svayameva svīkārāt | anuttare
tvapratibhaiveti |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | nanu na tvayā samaṃ tattvanirṇayārthamahaṃ pravṛttaḥ
kintu vijayārthameva tatra ca svavacanavirodhenāpratibhayā vā nigṛ
hīta evāsītyata āha | jalpeti | aniṣṭamiti | śaśaviṣā
ṇāderapi prāmāṇikatvaprasaṅgādityarthaḥ | tena svavacanavirodhamaṅgī
kṛtyāpi pramāṇamavaśyaṃ praṣṭavyosi tatra cottarānuttarayostvameva
nigrāhya ityarthaḥ | etadevāha | madukteṣviti |
bhagīº ṭīº | nāpi jalpavitaṇḍayoḥ kṣaṇikatvasiddhirityāha |
jalpeti | jalpe vipakṣakhalīkāramātramuddeśyaṃ vāde tu tattvanirṇaya
iddeśya iti svavacanavirodhāṅgīkāraḥ | aniṣṭamiti | atraṇi
kasyāpi dharmiṇaḥ prāmāṇikatvāpatteḥ | aśakyamiti | kramayauga
padyavirahasyālīke pramāṇena grahaṇamaprakyamityarthaḥ |
raghuº ṭīº | jalpeti | śaśaśṛṅgādiśabdā hi padaviṣayā
nārthabhedabodhakā asāmayikatvāt vākyaviṣayā tu tathātve śṛṅgādau
śaśādisaṃsargaṃ bodhayeran tathā ca nityaḥ śabda ityatra śabde nityatva
iva śṛṅgādau śaśādisaṃsarge pramāṇapraśno na vyāhanyata iti bhāvaḥ |
aniṣṭam | prakṛtapakṣādeḥ prāmāṇikatvānabhyupagamāt | aśakyam |
śṛṅgādau saṃsargasādhakapramāṇābhāvāt ||
yadi ca vyavahārasvīkāre virodhaparihāraḥ syāt
asau svīkriyeta pi na tvevaṃ na khalu sakalavyavahārā
bhājanaṃ ca tanniṣedhavyavahārabhājanaṃ ceti vacanaṃ para
sparamavirodhi |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | nanvalīke svavacanavirodhabhayena mūkatvamaṅgī
kṛtyāpratibhā svīkṛtā | vyavahāra eva kathaṃ tatra nāṅgīkṛta ityata
āha | yadi ceti | sakalavidhiniṣedhavyavahārābhājane 'līka
vyavahārasvīkāre'pi virodhasya tādavasthyādityarthaḥ | etadevāha |
na khalviti ||
bhagīº ṭīº | svavacanavirodhenālīke vyavahāro'bhyupetavya
ityapi nāsti tatra niṣedhavyavahārasvīkāre'pi virodhādityāha |
yadi ceti | na khalviti | sakalavyavahārābhājane niṣedhavyavahāra
bhājanatvasya vyāhatatvādityarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | vyavahārābhājanatvena svayamabhyupagate alīke
kramādyabhāvavyavahāratā tvayāpi svavacanavirodhaḥ svahastita evetyāha
yadi ceti ||
vidhivyavahāramātrābhiprāyeṇābhājanatvavāde kuto
virodha iti cet hanta sakalavidhiniṣedhavyavahārā
bhājanatvena kiñcidvyavahriyate na vā ubhayathāpi
svavacanavirodhaḥ ubhayathāpyavastunaiva tena bhavitavyam
vastunaḥ sarvavyavahāravirahānupapatteḥ |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | nanu yena sakalavyavahārābhājanatvamalīkasyāṅgī
kriyate tasya tava niṣedhavyavahāra mayā kriyamāṇaṃ niṣedhaḥ syāt
svavacanavirodho mayā tu vidhivyavahārābhājanatvamātramaṅgīkriyate
tatra tathā ca sattvakṣaṇikatvādiniṣedhavyavahāraṃ kurvato mama kutaḥ
svavacanavirodha ityāha | vidhīti | vidhivyavahāramātretivadatā
tvayā vidhiniṣedhavyavahārābhājanatvena na kiñcidaṅgīkaromīti
mātrapadasvarasaḥ | tathā pratīyate ca tāvatāpi tava svavacanavirodha
eveti vikalpyate | darśayati | hanteti | ubhayatheti vyavahārāvyava
hārayorityarthaḥ | ubhayathāpīti | sakalavidhiniṣedhavyavahārābhāja
natvavyavahāro yasmin dharmiṇi tadavastu kathaṃ na syāt | yadi ca
sakalavyavahārābhājanatvaṃ vyavahriyate | tadā sakalavyavahārabhājanatva
kvāpi prasiddhaṃ pratiṣidhyeta | tathā ca yatra pratītaṃ tadevāvastu
kathaṃ na syādityarthaḥ | ubhayamabhipretyāha | vastuna iti ||
bhagīº ṭīº | vidhīti | sakalavyavahārābhājanatvena vidhi
vyavahārābhājanatvameva vivakṣitamato niṣedhavyavahārabhājanatvaṃ tatrā
viruddhamityarthaḥ | ubhayathāpīti | sakalavidhiniṣedhavyavahārābhāja
natvavyavahāraḥ kvacit pratīto na vā antye kathaṃ niṣedhaḥ ādye
tadāśrayo'pi pratyetavyaḥ | tathā ca sakalavidhiniṣedhavyavahārā
bhājanatvaṃ ca vyavahriyate ceti svavacanavirodha ityarthaḥ |
raghuº ṭīº | vividhavidhivyavahārābhājanatvamevāvastuno vayama
bhyupagacchāma ityāśaṅkate | vidhīti | teneti | sakalavyavahārā
bhājanenetyarthaḥ ||
netipakṣe sakalavidhiniṣedhavyavahāravirahītyanenaiva
vyavahāreṇa virodhāt avyavahṛtasya niṣeddhumaśakyatvāt
vyavahriyata itipakṣe'pi viṣayasvarūpaparyālocanayaiva
virodhāt na hi sarvavyavahārāviṣayaśca vyavahriyate
ceti |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | netipakṣa iti | vidhiniṣedhavyavahāravirahi
tvasya niṣedhasya pratītyartha tadāśrayapratīterāvaśyakatvāt | taccālīka
mevetyarthaḥ | avyavahṛtasyeti | apratītasyetyarthaḥ | vyavahriyata iti |
sakalavidhiniṣedhavyavahārābhājanaṃ ca vyavahriyate ceti viṣayasvarūpa-
meva tathopasthitam yena sphuṭataraḥ svavacanavirodha ityarthaḥ | eta
devāha | nahīti ||
bhagīº ṭīº | nanu vidhivyavahārābhājanatvaniṣedhavyavahārā
bhājanatvābhyāṃ na vyavahriyata ityatra virodhe'pi na vyavahriyata ityatra
na virodhavyavahāraniṣedhamātrasya vivakṣitatvādityata āha | neti
pakṣa iti | tathāpi na vyavahriyate tadvirahitatvavyavahāraśceti
virodhastadavastha evetyarthaḥ | nanu vyavahāramātraniṣedhāt tadvira
hitatvavyavahāro'pi nānumata evetyata āha | avyavahṛtasyeti |
pratiyogivyavahāranirūpaṇaṃ vinā niṣedhavyavahāro'pi tatra na
syādityarthaḥ | viṣayeti | sakalavidhiniṣedhavyavahārābhājanatva
vyavahāreṇaiva virodha ityarthaḥ | tadevāha | nahīti ||
raghuº ṭīº | ubhayathā virodhaṃ vyutpādayati | netītyādinā |
sakaleti | sakalavyavahāraśūnyatvaṃ yatra pratītaṃ tatraiva tadvyavahārāt
kathaṃ sarvatra tadvyavahāraniṣedhaḥ | atha na kvāpi tatpratītaṃ tadā
tadvyavahārasyāpyapratyayāt kathaṃ niṣedha ityāha | avyavahṛtasyeti |
ajñātasyetyarthaḥ | viṣayeti | sakalavyavahārābhājanasya vyavahārā
bhāvavyavahārābhyupagamādityarthaḥ | tadevāha | nahīti ||
yadi cāvastuno niṣedhavyavahāragocaratvaṃ vidhivyava
hāragocaratāpi kiṃ na syāt pramāṇābhāvasyobhayatrāpi
tulyatvāditi | bandhyāsutasyāvaktṛtve 'cetanatvādikameva
pramāṇaṃ vaktṛtve tu na kiñciditi cenna tatrāpi sutatvasya
vidyamānatvāt | na hi bandhyāyāḥ suto na sutaḥ tathā
sati svavacanavirodhād | vacanamātramevaitat na tu para
mārthataḥ suta evāsāviti cenna acaitanyasyāpyevaṃrūpa
tvāt | cetanādanyat svabhāvāntarameva hyacetanamityu
cyate caitanyanivṛttimātrameveha vivakṣitam tacca sambhava
tyeveti cenna tatrāpyasutatvanivṛttimātrasyaiva viva
kṣitatvāt |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | yathā cālīke sattvaṃ kṣaṇikattvaṃ ca vyatireka
siddhyarthaṃ niṣedhyate tathā tayorvidhireva kathaṃ na kriyate vidhiva
nniṣedhasyāpi pramāṇādhīnatvāt | niṣedhavyavahāre pramāṇaṃ śaṅkate |
bandhyāsutasyeti | atrāśrayāsiddhiḥ svarūpāsiddhiśca dvayorapi pramā
ṇāviṣayatvāditi yadyapi tathāpi paraparihāsāya satpratipakṣamāha |
tatrāpīti | vaktṛtvepītyarthaḥ | svarūpāsiddhiṃ nirasyati | na hīti |
tathā satīti | asutatve satītyarthaḥ | bandhyāsuto na vakteti
vadatā tvayaiva tatsutatvābhyupagamāditi bhāvaḥ | vacanamātramiti |
arthaśūnyamityarthaḥ | tvayā tu sādhanatvenopāttaṃ sutarāṃ na vacanamātraṃ
bhavitumarhatīti svarūpāsiddhiriti bhāvaḥ | paryudāsābhiprāyeṇāha |
acaitanyasyāpīti | paryudāsameva vivṛṇoti | cetanāditi | tathā
ca tavāpi svarūpāsiddhireveti bhāvaḥ | prasajyapratiṣedhābhiprāyeṇa
śaṅkate | caitanyeti | tathā cābhāvasyāpi tucchatvātucchatve ca
tatsaṃbhavānna svarūpāsiddhiriti bhāvaḥ | tatrāpīti | asmatprayoge
'pītyarthaḥ | tvanmate 'nyāpoha1syaivāpadārthatvāditi bhāvaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | kiñcidvidhivyavahāravanniṣedhavyavahāro'pi pramā
ṇāsādhyatvāviśeṣādalīke na syādityāha | yadi ceti | nanva
līke prāmāṇika evābhāvavyavahāraḥ syādityāha | bandhyāsutasyeti |
bandhyāsutelīke 'nalīkaḥ prāmāṇiko niṣedhavyavahāro na sambhava
tīti dūṣaṇe satyevāha | tatrāpīti | tathā satīti | bandhyāsuta
syāsutatve satītyarthaḥ | vacanamātramiti | mātrapadenārthaśūnyatvamuktam |
bandhyāsutapadamayogyatvānnānvayabodhakamiti hetoḥ svarūpāsiddhi
rityarthaḥ | paryudāsanañamāśrityāha | cetanāditi | prasajyapratiṣedha
māśrityāha | caitanyeti ||
raghuº ṭīº | nanvayaṃ praśno bhavato'pi duruttara ityata āha |
yadi ceti | ubhayatra | niṣedhe vidhau ca | niṣedhe pramāṇamāśaṅkate |
bandhyeti | pramāṇapravṛttāvalīkatvānupapattau satyāmevāha | tatrā
pīti | vaktṛtvaṃ vacanakaraṇayogyatā | mūkasyāpi mūkatvaviraheṇa
vā sutatvaṃ viśeṣyaṃ mūkatvasya tadviśeṣatvāt | vacanasyopalakṣaṇatayā
kriyāntarakartṛtve vā tātparyam | acaitanyaṃ hi cetanabhinnadharmo vā
caitanyaviraho vā ādya āha | cetanāditi | dvitīyaṃ śaṅkate |
caitanyeti | asutatvaṃ sutetarasvabhāvatvaṃ tannivṛttirasati niḥsvabhāve
na virudhyata iti bhāvaḥ ||
nyāyoha--pāº 2 puº |
asutatvanivṛttimātrasya svarūpeṇa kṛtijñaptyorasā
marthye samarthamarthāntaramadhyavaseyamanantarbhāvya kuto hetu
tvamiti cenna acaitanyepyasya nyāyasya samānatvāt |
vyāvṛttirūpamapi tadeva gamakaṃ yadatasmādeva yathā śiṃśa
pātvaṃ bandhyāsutastvasutādiva ghaṭādeḥ sutādapi deva
dattādervyāvartate ato na heturiti cet nanvidamacaitanya
mapi asyaivaṃrūpameva nahi bandhyāsutaścetanādiva deva
dattāderacetanādikāṣṭhāderna vyāvartate |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | asutatvanivṛtteralīkatvena vaktṛtvaṃ sādhayituma
yogyatayādhyavaseyamālocanīyavastusvarūpamantareṇa hetutvaṃ na saṃbhava
tītyāśaṅkate | asutatveti | pariharati | acaitanyepīti |
vyāvṛttirūpatayā dvayorapi hetvorapi1 viśeṣa ityarthaḥ | asya
nyāyasyeti | vyāvṛttirūpatayā tucchatvarūpasyetyarthaḥ | bandhyāsuta
stviti | bandhyāsutaniṣṭhaṃ sutatvamityarthaḥ | tena na pūrvavirodhaḥ |
atasmādeva svāvacchinnapratiyogikānyonyābhāvavata evetyarthaḥ | yathā
śiśapātvamiti | śiṃśapātvaṃ hi panasādereva vyāvartate na tu śiṃśa
pāto'pītyarthaḥ | tathā ca tanmate vyāvṛttirūpatayā2 śiṃśapātvādi
vat saddhetutvaṃ tadubhayavyāvṛttitayā'titucchatvamiti bhāvaḥ | atasmā
diti vipakṣādevetyeke | tathā ca sapakṣavipakṣobhayavyāvṛttatayā
buddhyorapi--pāº 2 puº |
tanmātravṛttirūpatayā--pāº 2 puº |
'sādhāraṇyamiti bhāvaḥ | paroktepi hetau doṣamimamatidiśati
nanvidamiti | nahi bandhyāsuta iti | bandhyāsutaniṣṭhamacetana
tvamityarthaḥ | bandhyāsute yadacetanatvaṃ varttate tadeva na kāṣṭhādau
vastuni tathā ca tulyamasādhāraṇyamiti bhāvaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | atasmādeveti | vipakṣādeva na sapakṣādapi |
yathā śiṃśapā tvaśiṃśapāta eva vyāvarttate na tu śiṃśapāto'pi
bandhyāsutastu sutādapi sapakṣādvyāvartate ityasādhāraṇatayā na gamakaṃ
ityarthaḥ | alīkānalīkavyāvṛtterekasya dharmasyābhāvāditi bhāvaḥ |
nanu pūrvaṃ sutatvamātrameva hetūkṛtaṃ na tu bandhyāsutatvam na ca tasya
sutād devadattādervyāvṛttiḥ | atrāhuḥ sutādapīti bhāvapradhāno
nirdeśaḥ devadattāderiti vyadhikaraṇe ṣaṣṭhī | tathā ca devadattādi
niṣṭhasutatvādidharmaśūnyatvaṃ bandhyāsutasyetyarthaḥ | evaṃrūpameveti | asā
dhāraṇānaikāntikamityarthaḥ | tadevāha | nahīti | nahi bandhyā
suto'cetanādiva kāṣṭhādeścetanādapi devadattāderna vyāvartata iti
yojanā ato vipakṣādiva sapakṣāddhyāvṛttiruktā bhavati | kāṣṭhādi
sādhāraṇasyācaitanyasya prāmāṇikasyālīke vṛttyabhāvāt tanmātravṛttya
caitanyaṃ hetūkartavyam tatra cāsādhāraṇatvamevetyarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | asutatveti | nivṛttestucchatvāditi bhāvaḥ |
svarūpeṇa svataḥ | kṛtirvacanasya | jñaptirvaktṛtvasya | avaseyam pari
ceyam | avasāyajanakaṃ nirvikalpakaṃ vā | atrāvasāyaḥ tadviṣayaṃ
svalakṣaṇaṃ svalakṣaṇamapi savikalpakaviṣaya itimatenedam ityapi
kaścit bandhyāsutastvalīkatvādasamartha iti bhāvaḥ | asya nyāyasya
tucchatvenāsamarthatayā jñaptijanakatvavirahasya | vakṣyate ca bandhyāsutāde
rapyasāmarthye pramāṇābhāvaḥ | āśaṅkate | vyāvṛttīti | saiva vyāvṛtti
staddharmāvalīḍhasya dharmaṃ sādhayati yā taddharmaśūnyatvāvacchinnāddhyāvṛtte
taddharmāvacchinnādvā vyāvṛtte vartate tathā śiṃśapātvamaśiṃśapānātmani
śiṃśapātmani varttamānaṃ śiṃśapādharmaṃ vṛkṣatvam | atraivakārabalalabhye
taddharmāvalīḍhamātravṛttitve tātparyam | bandhyāsutastu sutāsutobhayavyā
vṛtto'to na tadvṛttirasutatvanivṛttiḥ sutadharmasya sādhikā | na ca
yaivāsutamātravyāvṛttamaitrādivṛttirasutatvanivṛttiḥ saiva bandhyāsute
'pīti vācyam sadasatorekadharmavattvāyogāt | yā tanmātravyāvṛtte
pakṣe varttata iti vārthaḥ tathā ca tanmātravyāvṛttapakṣadharmatāsampattyaiva
vyāvṛttirgamiketi phalitārthaḥ | saiva vyāvṛttirgamikā yā'tasmādeva
vipakṣādeva vyāvartate bandhyāsutastu bandhyāsutavṛttirasutatvanivṛttistu
sapakṣavipakṣavyāvṛttatvenāsādhāraṇatayā na heturiti tu vyākhyānam
asutāderacetanāderityādyagrimagranthasvarasaviruddhamiva pratibhāti ||
vaktṛtvaṃ vastvekaniyato dharmaḥ sa kathamavastuni sādhyo
virodhāditi cet sa punarayaṃ virodhaḥ kutaḥ pramāṇāt
siddhaḥ | kiṃ kaktṛtvaviviktasyāvastuno niyamenopalambhāt
āhosvid vastuviviktasya vaktṛtvasyānupalambhāditi |
na tāvadavastu kenāpi pramāṇenopalambhagocaraḥ tathātve
vā nāvastu nāpyuttaraḥ samānatvāt | nahi vaktṛtvamiva
avaktṛtvamapi vastuviviktaṃ kasyacit pramāṇasya viṣayaḥ |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | svarūpāsiddhiṃ nirasya bādhamāśaṅkya sāmyāpādanena
nirākaroti | vaktṛtvamiti | viviktasya śūnyasya yadalīkaṃ tanna
vaktṛ iti tāvanna kenacitpramāṇenopalabhyate yato virodhaḥ
syādityarthaḥ | āhosviditi | vastuśūnye vaktṛtvaṃ kvāpi nopalabdha
mityayaṃ virodha ityarthaḥ | tadayamarthaḥ | kiṃ vaktṛśūnyasyālīkasya
niyamenopalambhādvirodha uta vastuśūnye vaktṛtvasyānupalambhādvirodha
ityarthaḥ | ādya āha | na tāvaditi | dvitīya āha | samāna
tvāditi | atrāpi pramāṇāpekṣayā āvaśyakatvādityarthaḥ | anu
palambhasyāpyabhāvagrāhakatve pramāṇameva mūlam | anupalambhamātraṃ tu
kevalamatantraṃ svādṛṣṭisarvadṛṣṭivikalpakaraṃvitatvāditi1 bhāvaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | vaktṛtvamiti | ghaṭādau pramitasya vaktṛtvasya
sādhyatve bādha ityarthaḥ | vaktṛtvaviviktasya vaktṛtvaśūnyasyetyarthaḥ | vastu
viviktasya vastvasambaddhasyetyarthaḥ | nahīti | yathā vaktṛtvaṃ vastuviviktaṃ
pramāṇāviṣayastadvadavaktṛtvamapi tat kathamavastuni sādhyaṃ bādhādityarthaḥ |
nanu vastuviviktasyāvaktṛtvasya pramāṇāgocaratve'pyanupalabdhirastyetāva
taivāvaktṛtvāvastunorvirodhaḥ syāt maivam sā hyanupalabdhirna vastuvivikte-
kavalitatvāditi--pāº 2 puº |
taropalabdhirvirodhāt nahi vaktṛtvaviviktamavastu pramāṇagocaraḥ nāpyu
palabdhinivṛttimātraṃ svādṛṣṭervyabhicārāt sarvādṛṣṭeśca sandehāt ||
raghuº ṭīº | sa punarityādi | vaktṛtvasyāvastutvena samaṃ
virodho hi avastutvābhāvavastutvavyāpyatvaṃ tacca kimavastuni niyamena
vaktṛtvābhāvopalambhāt siddham | avastuni vaktṛtvasyānupalambhamātrā
dvetyarthaḥ | vaktṛtvaviviktasya vaktṛtvāsaṃsṛṣṭasya vaktṛtvaśūnyasyeti yāvat |
vastuviviktasya vastvasaṃsṛṣṭasya vastubhinnasaṃsṛṣṭasyeti yāvat |
samānatvāditi | yathā'vastuni vaktṛtvasyānupalambhena vastutvavyāpyatvaṃ
tadvadavaktṛtvasyāpyavastunyanupalambhena vastutvavyāpyatvaṃ syāt tathā ca
avaktṛtvamapi virodhādavastuni na siddhyedityarthaḥ ||
tadviviktavikalpamātraṃ tāvadastīti cet tatsaṃsṛṣṭavi
kalpane'pi ko vārayitā | nanu vaktṛtvaṃ vacanaṃ prati
kartṛtvaṃ tat kathamavastuni tasya sarvasāmarthyavirahalakṣaṇa
tvāditi cet avaktṛtvamapi kathaṃ tatra tasya vacanetara
kartṛtvalakṣaṇatvāditi | sarvasāmarthyavirahe vacanasāmārthya
viraho na viruddha iti cet atha sarvasāmarthyaviraho
bandhyāsutasya kutaḥ pramāṇāt siddhaḥ avastutvādeveti
cet nanvetadapi kutaḥ siddham sarvasāmarthyavirahāditi
cet so'yamitastataḥ kevalairvacanairnirdhanādhamarṇika iva
sādhūn bhrāmayan parasparāśrayadoṣamapi na paśyati |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | tadvivikteti | bandhyāsuto na vakteti vastu
vivekenāvaktṛtvaṃ gṛhyata evetyarthaḥ | tatsaṃsṛṣṭeti | bandhyāsuto vakteti
vaktṛtvasaṃsṛṣṭamapyavedanamapyasatkhyātirūpaṃ tanmate syādevetyarthaḥ | pratya
kṣamāne bādhakamāśaṅkate | nanviti | paryudāsapakṣe tavāpi tulya
midamāha | avaktṛtvamapīti | svasādhye prasajyapratiṣedhamāsṛtyāha |
avaktṛtvaṃ vacanasāmarthyābhāva eva mayā sādhyata iti na virodha iti
bhāvaḥ | sarvasāmarthyavirahāt vacanasāmarthyavirahastadā sa eva kutaḥ
siddha ityāha | atheti | etadapīti | avastutvamapītyarthaḥ | kevalai
riti | arthaśūnyairityarthaḥ | parasparāśrayeti | avastutvāt sāmarthya
virahastata eva cāvastutvamiti pravasati ||
bhagīº ṭīº | tadvivikteti | vastuviviktamavaktṛtvamitijñāna
mātramityarthaḥ | tatsaṃsṛṣṭeti | pramāṇābhāvasyobhayatrāpi tulyatvād
vaktṛtvasaṃsṛṣṭāvastujñānamastyeveti na virodhaniścaya ityarthaḥ | pūrvaṃ
vaktṛtvasya vastutvavyāpyatve vāvastuni virodhaḥ śaṅkitaḥ idānīṃ tama
vastuni sāmarthyāt svarūpaṃ virodhaṃ śaṅkate | nanviti | avaktṛpade
paryudāsanañamāśritya pariharati | aveti | avaktṛtvaṃ vacanakartṛtvā
bhāva iti prasajyapratiṣedhanañamāśrityāha | sarveti | āśrayāsiddhau
satyāmeva svarūpāsiddhimapyāha | atheti | kevalairnirarthakaiḥ vādino
dhanaṃ pramāṇameva tena hīno nirdhanaḥ |
raghuº ṭīº | mābhūdavastuni vaktṛtvābhāvasya pramāṇajananānnirṇayo
vikalpamātraṃ tu syāditi siṃhāvalokitena śaṅkate tadvivikteti
vaktṛtvaviviktāvastuvikalpanamātramityarthaḥ | tatsaṃsṛṣṭeti vaktṛtvasaṃsṛṣṭā
vastubikalpana ityartha | tathā ca vipakṣavṛttitvagrahānna vyāptibuddhi
rityarthaḥ | apare punaḥ sannidhimanurundhānā varṇayanti | tadvivi
kteti | vastuviviktāvaktṛtvavikalpanaṃ bandhyāsuto na vaktetyevamākāra
mityarthaḥ | tatsaṃsṛṣṭeti | vaktṛtvasaṃsṛṣṭāvastuvikalpana ityartha iti |
tatkathamiti | kartṛtvaṃ hi kāritvaviśeṣo vā tatsāmarthyaṃ vā dvayamapi
sarvasāmarthyavirahiṇyavastuni na sambhavatītyarthaḥ | avakṛtvamityatra naña
rthasya dhātyarthenānvayaḥ taddhitārthena vā ādye vacanābhāvo vacanabhinnaṃ
vā'rthaḥ niṣedhavidhau prābhākarāṇāṃ kriyāvirahavat apramāṇamityatra
pramābhinnajñānavadvā ubhayathāpi vacanetarakāryakartṛtvaṃ paryavasyatī
tyāha | tasyeti dvitīyaṃ śaṅkate | sarveti | kecittu viśeṣaniṣedhasya
śeṣābhyanujñāphalakatāyā autsargikatvādvacanakartṛtvaniṣedhenujñātaṃ vaca
netarakartṛtvaṃ dūṣayati | avaktṛtvamapīti āpavādikaniṣedhamātrapara
tvābhiprāyeṇa śaṅkate sarvetyādītyāhuḥ | vacanetyādi | upalakṣaṇametat
vacanakāritvavirahopi draṣṭavyaḥ ||
kramayaugapadyavirahāditi cenna tadvirahasiddhāvapi
pramāṇānuyogasyānuvṛtteḥ | sutatve ca parāmṛṣyamāṇe
tadavinābhūtasakalavaktṛtvādidharmaprasaktau kutaḥ kramayauga
padyavirahasādhanasyāvakāśaḥ kutastarāṃ cāvastutvasādha-
nasya kutastamāṃ cāvaktṛtvādisādhanānām tasmāt
pramāṇameva sīmā vyavahāraniyamasya tadatikrame tvani
yama eveti |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | kramayaugapadyavirahāt sāmarthyavirahe sādhye
kvānyonyāśraya ityarthaḥ | na hi kramayaugapadyavirahāt sarvasāmarthya
virahaḥ tataścāvastutvamavastutvācca kramayaugapadyaviraha iti cakrakamiti
bhāvaḥ | sutatvenaiva hetunā vaktṛtvaṃ kramayaugapadyaṃ vastutvaṃ ca sarvameka
vārameva mayā sādhanīyamiti tvatsādhanānāmanavasaraparāhatatva
mityāha | sutatve ceti | evaṃ prativandimukhena paramatena dūṣayitvā
svamatamupasaṃharati | tasmāditi ||
bhagīº ṭīº | krameti | kramayaugapadyavirahābhyāṃ sarvasāmarthya
virahasiddhau nānyonyāśraya ityarthaḥ | kuta iti | arthakriyāyāma
vastuni kartavyatāyāṃ kutaḥ kramayaugapadyavirahasiddhiḥ tadasiddhau ca
na tatsādhyasarvasāmarthyavirahasiddhistadasiddhau ca na tatsādhyāvaktṛtva
siddhirityarthaḥ | evaṃ paramataṃ dūṣayitvā svamatamāśrityopasaṃharati |
tasmāditi | tathā cālīke mānābhāvānnāvaktṛtvādisādhanamityarthaḥ |
raghuº ṭīº | avastutvāt kālpanikatvāt arthakriyākāritva
śūnyatvādvā kramādivirahādavastutvasiddhirityāśaṅkate | krameti | śaṅkāṃ
nirasyati | neti | na vā kramādivirahaḥ sādhayitumapi śakya
ityāha | sutatve ceti | sutatvamavinābhūtaṃ yena sutatvavyāpakamiti
yāvat vaktṛtvādītyādipadāt sāmarthyavastutvakramādīnāṃ parigrahaḥ |
kramādivirahāvastutvasāmarthyavirahāvaktṛtvādīnāṃ pūrvapūrvasyāsiddhyā
tatsādhyottarottarāsiddhirityarthaḥ | astu tarhi vidhiniṣedhavyavahāra
bhājanatvamevāsata ityetadupasaṃhāravyājena nirasyati | tasmāditi |
tathā cā'sati pramāṇavirahānna pravṛttiriti ||
na hyapratīte devadattādau sa kiṃ gauraḥ kṛṣṇo veti
vaiyātyaṃ vinā praśnaḥ tatrāpi yadyeko'pratītaparāmarṣa
viṣaya1 evottaraṃ dadāti na gaura iti aparo'pi kiṃ
na dadyānna kṛṣṇa iti | na caivaṃ sati kācidarthasiddhiḥ
pramāṇābhāvavirodhayorubhayatrāpi tulyatvāditi |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | vyavahārāviṣaye2 sarvavidhiniṣedhavyavahāra
maryādāvilopamudāharaṇena darśayati | nahīti | vaiyātyaṃ dhārṣṭyaṃ |
avyavasthāmeva darśayati | tatrāpīti | arthasiddhiriti | praśna
viṣayārthasiddhirityarthaḥ |
bhagīº ṭīº | aprāmāṇike'rthe uttaravādīva praṣṭāpyaprāmā
ṇika evetyāha | na hīti | vaiyātyaṃ dhārṣṭyam svājñānānāvaraṇaṃ
aviditaparāmarśaviṣaya iti bhagīrathasammataḥ pāṭhaḥ |
vyavahārāviśeṣe'pi--pāº 2 puº |
vā | aviditeti | na viditaḥ sa iti sarvanāmnaḥ parāmarṣa
viṣayo yena sa tathā | na caivamiti | aprāmāṇikādyathā krama
yaugapadyavirahādaprāmāṇiko'sadvyavahārastadvadaprāmāṇikāt kramayauga
padyasadbhāvādaprāmāṇikaḥ sadvyavahāro'pi kiṃ na syāditi bhāvaḥ |
raghuº ṭīº | vaiyātyaṃ dhārṣṭyam | apratīteti | na pratītaḥ sa
iti tacchabdaparāmarśaviṣayo yena saḥ ||
nanvapratīte vyavahārābhāva iti yuktaṃ kūrmaromādayastu
pratīyanta eva na hyete vikalpāḥ kañcidarthabhedamanulli
khanta eva utpadyante na ca pramāṇāspadameva vyavahārāspada
miti tattvamuktam1 tathāhi śaśaviṣāṇamiti jñāna
manyathākhyātirvā syāt asatkhyātirvā | na tāvadādyaste
rocate tathā sati hi kiñcidāropyaṃ kiñcidāropa
viṣaya iti syāt tathā cāropaviṣayastatraivāsti āro
paṇīyastvanyatraiveti jitaṃ naiyāyikaiḥ | nāpi dvitīyaḥ
kāraṇānupapatteḥ | indriyasya jñānajanane viṣayādhipatyenaiva
vyāpārāt | liṅgaśabdābhāsayoranyathākhyātimātrajana
katvāt | apahastitasvārthayoścāsatkhyātijanakatve śaśa-
tanna yuktam--pāº 1 puº |
viṣāṇādiśabdāt kūrmaromādivikalpānāmapyutpatti
prasaṅgāt niyāmakābhāvāt |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | nanu lāghavād jñāta eva vyavahārostu kiṃ prami
tatvaparyantenetyāśaṅkate | nanviti | eta iti | kūrmaromaśaśaśṛ
ṅgādigocarā ityarthaḥ | na ceti | gauravāditi bhāvaḥ | bhramaviṣa
yatvaṃ pramāviṣayatvavyāpyaṃ na vetyasatkhyātau vipratipattiḥ vyāpyatva
vyatireko niradhikaraṇa ākāśādau prasiddhaḥ sāmānādhikaraṇya
viśeṣasya vyāptitvāt | yadvā nityadravyāviṣayakamidaṃ rajatamiti
jñānaṃ viśeṣaṇānyavyāsajyapratiyogikātyantābhāvātyantābhāvāprati
yogimātraṃ(?) svātiriktaprameyātiriktaviṣayaṃ na veti vipratipattiḥ |
jitamiti | pramitameva vyavahāraviṣaya iti vādibhirityarthaḥ |
pariśeṣeṇa kāraṇābhāvameva vyavasthāpayati | indriyasyeti |
viṣayādhipatyaṃ viṣayasahakāritā indriyārthasannikarṣajanyatvāt
pratyakṣasyetyarthaḥ | āropyasyāsannikarṣo'pi kvacitsannikarṣo vaktavya
eveti bhāvaḥ | nanu pratyakṣābhāsābhāve'pi liṅgābhāsācchabdā
bhāsādvā syādasatkhyātirityata āha | liṅgeti | dhūlīpaṭale
dhūmāropādasadvahnirbhāseta parvate tatra dhūmasya dhūlīpaṭalasya vahneśca
pramitatvaṃ kvacidvācyamevetyanyathākhyātiparyavasānamevaṃ cānāptodī
ritācchabdāt padārtho vākyārtho vā pratīta eva bhāsata ityanyathā
khyātirevetyarthaḥ | nanu syādevaṃ yadi vyāptibalāt saṅketabalādvā
bhānaṃ bhavenna tvevamityata āha | apahastiteti | tiraskṛtasvārthayo
rityarthaḥ | liṅgasya svārtho vyāpako vahnyādiḥ śabdasya cārthaḥ
saṅketaviṣayaḥ tattiraskāre niyamo na syāditi bhāvaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | nanu yadajñātaṃ tanmā vyavahāri jñāte tu kūrma
romādau vyavahāraḥ syādeva na ca pramātvaṃ vyavahāraprayojakaṃ
lāghavājjñānamātrasyaiva tatprayojakatvāt kathānārambhāpatteścetyāha |
nanviti | tathāhīti | asatkhyātau vipratipattiḥ | bhramaviṣayatvaṃ
pramāviṣayatvavyāpyaṃ na vā navetyākāśādau prasiddham ākāśasyā
nadhikaraṇatvena niyatasāmānādhikaraṇyarūpavyāpyatvasya tatrābhāvāt |
yadvā nityadravyāviṣayakamidaṃ rajatamiti bhramajñānaṃ viśeṣaṇānya
kevalānvayyatyantābhāvapratiyogimātraviṣayakaṃ na vā atra sannapi
kaścidbhāsatāmityarthāntaravāraṇāya mātrapadam | evaṃ cākāśajñāne
'pyākāśatvādeḥ kevalānvayyatyantābhāvapratiyogino bhānānmātrārtha
syāsiddhiḥ syāditi viśeṣaṇānyeti viśeṣaṇam kebalānvayyatyantā
bhāvāpratiyogino viśeṣaṇasyaivākāśatvasya bhānāt kebalānvayitvaṃ
cātyantābhāvasyātyantabhāvāpratiyogitvaṃ tatra śuktyatirikto deśaḥ
bhramaviṣayībhūtarajatatvābhāvavān deśatvāt śuktivat na cāprayo
jakatvaṃ purovartirajatayoḥ sattvena bhramatvābhāvāpattyā tayostādātmyasya
pariśeṣeṇa viṣayatvāt tasya cātyantamasattvādityapare | jita
miti | bauddhānāmakṣaṇiko ghaṭa iti dhīryadyanyathākhyātistadā
ropyasyākṣaṇikatvasya kvacit siddhyāpatteriti bhāvaḥ | alīkasya
pratītireva nāsti tatkāraṇābhāvāditi kuto vyavahāra ityāha |
kāraṇeti | viṣayādhipatyeti sannikṛṣṭaviṣayasahakāritvenetyarthaḥ |
svapnādibhramāṇāmapyāropaviṣayārthasannikarṣajatvāt āropyaṃ ca yadyapi
kvacidasannikṛṣṭamapi bhāsate tathāpi sthānāntare tenendriyasanni-
karṣo'styeva tathā ca tathātvopagame'līkatvavyāghāta iti bhāvaḥ |
śaśaviṣāṇādiśabdāḥ svārthasmṛtyapekṣāḥ saṃsargamasantaṃ bodhaye??ra
pekṣā vā evamaliṅgaṃ liṅgatayā gṛhītaṃ svavyāpakasmṛtyapekṣamanu
mityābhāsaṃ janayet tannirapekṣaṃ vā ādye nāmatvyātiḥ teṣā
manyatrasattvenānyathākhyātipakṣapraveśādityāha | śabdeti | antye tvāha |
apahastiteti | svārthaḥ śaṅketaviṣayaḥ svavyāpakaśca | tathā ca śaśa
viṣāṇamiti padaṃ vikalpajanakatve sati kūrmaromādyaviṣayakavikalpa
prayojyarūpavadyadi na syāt tadviṣayakavikalpotpādakaṃ syādi
tyāpādanam |
raghuº ṭīº | tathā vyavahāre jñānatvenaiva prayojakatvaṃ na tu pramā
tvena gauravāt tvayāpi bhrāntestathātvopagamādityāśayenāha | nanviti |
ete śaśaviṣāṇaṃ kūrmarometyādyākārāḥ viṣayādhipatyaṃ viṣayasannikarṣaḥ |
vibhramādau ca jñānādikameva tatheti bhāvaḥ | liṅgeti | aliṅga
mapi liṅgatayā gṛhītaṃ gṛhītavyāpakabhāvaṃ tajjātīyaṃ vā pakṣā
saṃsṛṣṭameva pakṣasaṃsṛṣṭaṃ bodhayadanyathāvyākhyātimevotpādayet vyāpti
grahānapekṣaṇe'tiprasaṅgāt | ananvitau ca svārthāvanvitau bodhayantau
śabdāvapi tathaiva | svārthatiraskāreṇa śabdasya bodhakatve punarāha
apahastiteti ||
sa hi saṅketo vā syāt śabdasvābhāvyaṃ vā | ādya
stāvat saṅketaviṣayāpratītereva parāhataḥ tata eva1 tat-
ita eveti bhagīrathaṭhakkurasammataḥ pāṭhaḥ |
pratītāvitaretarāśrayatvam padasaṅketavalenaiva pratītau
svārthāparityāgāt tathā cānanvitāḥ padārthā evānvita
tayā parisphurantīti viparītakhyātirevānuvartate | svārtha
parityāge tu punarapyaniyamaḥ asāmayikārthapratyāyanāt
śabdasvābhāvyāt tu niyame vyutpannavadavyutpannasyāpi
tathāvidhavikalpodayaprasaṅgāditi |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | śaśaviṣāṇaśabdādityupalakṣaṇaṃ śaśaviṣāṇavyāpyatvena
gṛhītādityapi draṣṭavyam | upalakṣaṇavidhayā śabdābhāsameva tantraṃ
kṛtvā vikalpayati | sa hīti | niyāmaka ityarthaḥ | saṅketagrahaḥ
svārthe padaṃ niyamayet sa ca nāstītyarthaḥ | bākyārthaniyamo'pi
saṅketaviṣayāpratītereva parāsta iti bhāvaḥ | nanu śaśaviṣāṇa
śabdādeva gṛhītasaṅketastato niyatamarthaṃ pratīyādityata āha |

na ceti | nanu śaśaviṣāṇādipadaprayokturavaśyaṃ tadviṣayajñānamasti |
anyathā prayogānupapatteriti śrotustatra saṅketadhīḥ syādityata

na ceti | arthakriyā nayanānayanādirūpā | nanu yathā kambugrīvā

bhagīº ṭīº | pūrvaṃ saṅketaviṣayāpratītau saṅketāsambhavāt
kāraṇābhāvenāsatkhyātyabhāva uktaḥ samprati tatsattve'pyalīkasya
jñānaṃ na sambhavatītyāha | na ceti | śaśeti | nanu svāta
ntryeṇendriyāṇāmalīkajñānājanakatve'pi jñānāvacchedakatayā māna
sapratyakṣe'līke saṅketagrahaḥ syādityata āha | tathāhīti |
alīkopanāyakaṃ mānasapratyakṣaṃ yadi parakīyaṃ tatrāha | parabuddhīnā
miti | na ceti | alīkatvavyāghātādityarthaḥ | unnīya para
buddhiviṣayamiti śeṣaḥ | nanu saṅketayitṛvacanādeva saṅketaviṣayo
pasthitiḥ syādityata āha | na ceti | taddhi śabdavidhayā
tamupanayelliṅgībhūya vā tatra nādya ityāha | tadviṣayāṇāmiti ||
raghuº ṭīº | asato bhānāsambhavena tatra vyutpattivirahaṃ

prayuktaṃ asmācchabdādayamartho mayāvagata ityādyākārāt |
na ca śaśaviṣāṇamuccārayataḥ kaścidabhiprāyo vṛtta

nāmapi tadarthatvaprasaṅgāt |

ṇeti | parabuddhīnāmityatra jñānaviṣayatayā śaṅkitamidaṃ tu tātpa

romakūrmaromādīnāmityarthaḥ | yadvā yanmate ghaṭasyāpi kālpanikatvaṃ

bhagīº ṭīº | antyamāśaṅkya nirākaroti | na ceti |
nahīti | pravṛttinivṛttyaupayika iti śeṣaḥ | saṅketagrahaśca pravṛ
ttinimittaviśeṣopasthitiṃ vinā na sambhavati tādṛśābhiprāya
viṣayatvaṃ na ca tathā gauravādanubhavāccetyarthaḥ | nanu saṅketagrahasya na
viṣayaparyantamavagāhanaṃ kiṃ tu vyāvartakadharmavati tatkalpanāmātra
viṣayo'līkastadviṣayaḥ | tathā ca bhramaviṣayatvenaivopasthite tatra
saṅketagrahaḥ syādityata āha | na ca viśeṣeti | kalpanāmātro
padhānena sarveṣāmalīkānāṃ śaśaviṣāṇapadavācyatā syādityarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | dvitīyamāśaṅkya nirākaroti | na ceti |
kaścitkiñcidarthagocaro'bhiprāyo vikalpo vaktuḥ śroturvā anu
modanādibhājaḥ asmācchabdātkiñcidarthapratyayo vṛtta iti | samaya
grahorthapratyayopayogī abhiprāyamātrādipratītau arthapratyathādyupayukta
samayagrahaprasaṅgāt prakārāntareṇa vetyāśaṅkya nirākaroti | na
ceti | vācya iti vākyātsaṅketagraha iti sāmprataṃ yuktamityarthaḥ |
pareṣāmavayavimātrasyālīkatvāt ghaṭetyuktam | sa cetyādeḥ kataro'rthaḥ
kimasatorthāniva vāsanāvaśādeva taiḥ samaṃ tattacchabdānāṃ saṅketaṃ
pratipadyante kiṃ vā vāsanopanīteṣu teṣu svakṛtaṃ tattacchabdasaṅketaṃ
pratipadyanta iti nādyaḥ śaśādipratyekapadārthāvyutpannasya śaśaviṣā
ṇādiśabdādarthapratyayaprasaṅgāt ||
na ca sarve pratipattāraḥ svasvavāsanayā'sadarthaśabda

itivadupadeśaḥ na ca yathā gaustathā gavaya itivadupa
lakṣaṇātideśaḥ na ceha prabhinnakamalodare madhūni madhu
karaḥ pibatītivat prasiddhapadasāmānādhikaraṇyam |

vyutpādyatām | tathā ca tadarthaṃ prayogaḥ syādata āha | na ca
vyavahāreti | tarhi vyavahārādeva paro vyutpādyatāmata uktaṃ prapañcayati |
na ca gāmiti | tadarthe nayanādivyavahitasamayatvādityarthaḥ1 |
tarhyupadeśādeva vyutpādyatāṃ paraḥ ityata āha | na cāyamiti |
tadgocaraśabdānāmapyagṛhītasamayatvādityarthaḥ | nanu sākṣādupadeśā
sambhave'pyupamānamanumānaṃ vā dvārīkṛtyopadeśaḥ syādata ādyamāśaṅkya
nirākaroti | na ca yatheti | pravṛttinimittasya gavayatvasyo
palakṣaṇaṃ gosādṛśyaṃ tadatideśastatkathanamityarthaḥ | anumānamāśaṅkya
nirākaroti | na ceheti | ayaṃ prāṇī madhukaraśabdavācyaḥ
prabhinnakamalodare madhupānakartṛtvāt yannaivaṃ tannaivaṃ yathā ghaṭa
ityarthaḥ | śaśaviṣāṇādipadārthasya madhupānādivadasādhāraṇakriyā
virahāditi bhāvaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | nanu svakīyamānasapratyakṣaviṣayenānāvacchedake
'līke saṅketagrahaḥ syādityata āha | na ca sarva iti | paraspareti |
mayā yortho'vagataḥ sa evānenāpīti saṃvādābhāva ityarthaḥ |
aparārthatveti | śaśaviṣāṇapadaṃ yadyanyasādhāraṇasaṅketavattayā jñāna
viṣayo na syāt parārthaprayogaviṣayo na syādityarthaḥ | tādṛśaśca
saṅketagraho vyartha ityāha | na hīti | paravyavahāre parakīya
saṅketagrahasyāhetutvādityarthaḥ | tarhi paro'pi saṅketaṃ grāhyatāmityā-
vyavahārābhāvādityarthaḥ--pāº 2 puº |
śaṅkya saṅketagrahopāyābhāvamāha | na ceti | upadeśaśabdenātro
palakṣaṇātideśaprasiddhapadasāmānādhikaraṇyayorapi saṃgrahaḥ | yadvo
padeśaḥ sākṣāt parampaparayā ca paramparā copamānadvāretyarthaḥ | tarhi
paro'pi saṅketamurarīkṛtyānumānaṃ vā tato na pūrvāparagranthavirodhaḥ |
saṅketagrāhakopāyāntarasyāpi vyavahāropajīvakatvāt tadabhāva
māha | na ca gāmiti | prayojakavākyoccāraṇānantaraṃ prayojya
pravṛttidarśanāt taddhetujñāne bālena śaktirgṛhyate | na cālīke
pravṛttiryaddarśanāt taddhetvalīkajñāne saṅketo gṛhyetetyarthaḥ | sākṣā
dupadeśābhāvamāha | na cāyamiti | nātra viśeṣatvena viśeṣa
śaṅketagrāhakaḥ śabda ityarthaḥ | upamānadvārakasya tasyābhāvamāha |
na ca yatheti | gavayatvasya pravṛttinimittasyopalakṣaṇaṃ gosādṛśyaṃ
tasyātideśaḥ kathanamityarthaḥ | anumānadvārakopadeśābhāvamāha |
na ceheti |
raghuº ṭīº | dvitīye tvāha | paraspareti | svasvakṛtasaṅketasyā
nyonyamajñānena parārthatvaṃ parārthabodhopayogitvaṃ na syādityarthaḥ | tarhi
grāhyatāṃ paropi saṅketamata āha | na ceti | upadeśaḥ pravṛttini
mittaviśiṣṭe vācyatābodhakaṃ vākyaṃ yathā pikaḥ kokilaḥ
ayamasāvaśva ityādi paramparayā saṅketagrāhakavākyasyāpyupalakṣaka
midaṃ pravṛttinimittopalakṣakasāmānādhikaraṇyena vācyatābodhaka
mupalakṣaṇātideśaḥ ||

prakārāntareṇa smārayati | mūketi | svapneti | asatkhyātirūpatā

sattvakṣaṇikatvayoḥ pramitatvāttadvyatirekāvapi pramitāveva | tathā
cāprāmāṇikepyāśraye vyatirekagrahostu yadāha kīrttiḥ |
tasmādvaidharmyadṛṣṭānte neṣṭovasyamihāśrayaḥ |
tadabhāvepi tanneti vacanādeva tadgateḥ ||
ityatobhyupagamyāpi nirasyati | bhavatu veti | asatkhyāti
rāśrayāṃśe | yadvā nanu naiyāyikairapi śuktirajatatādātmyasyāsata eva
bhānamaṅgīkriyate ityata āha | bhavatu veti | yadyapi śuktirajata
tādātmyaṃ ca tatra bhāsate tacca sarvaṃ sadeva | na cāsadviṣayatvaṃ bhramatve
tantraṃ kiṃ tu prakāravaiyadhikaraṇyamātraṃ tathāpi saduparaktamasadvibhāsata
iti pakṣe'bhyupagamavādo'yaṃ na tata iti na tatretyarthaḥ |
bhagīº ṭīº | sarve pratipattāraḥ svasvavāsanayā 'sadarthaprati
pattibhāja ityatra dūṣaṇamupasaṃharati | mūketi | naitaditi | na
na tadanurodhena--pāº 2 puº |
kevalaṃ pramāṇābhāvādapi tu śaśaviṣāṇādivikalpārthabodhādapi tasya
śaśaviṣāṇāroparūpatvamityarthaḥ | bhramasya śuktirajatatādātmyaviṣayatve
'pi nāsatkhyātiḥ śuktirajatayoriva tādātmyasyāpi sattvāt | na
ca tayostādātmye'satkhyātau ca tādātmyaṃ cetyatodhikasya tasyābhāvāt
teṣāṃ ca sattvāt sadviṣayatve'pi bhramatvaṃ na hyasadviṣayatvena bhramatvamapi
tu viśeṣyāvṛttiprakārakatvāditi bhāvaḥ | nanu sādhyaviparītadharma
vatyeva dharmiṇi vyatireko na kiṃ tu tadabhāve'pi vyatireko
gṛhyate tasyāpi tadviṣayatvaṃ dharmatvāviśeṣāt tasmād vyatirekayo
rvyāptiralīkarūpa evāśraye gṛhyatāmityāśayenāha | bhavatviti |
kṣaṇikasattvavyatirekayorapyalīkatayā vyāptigraho na pramāṇena śakya
ityarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | upasaṃharati | tadamūriti | naitadityādi |
apirbhinnakrame śaśaviṣāṇādivikalpānāṃ vinā'satkhyātiṃ
durupapādatayā tadanurodhenopetatayā tayā avastuni dharmāntarā
bhāvagrahāt | tasyāpi niṣedhavyavahāragocaratvamiti netyarthaḥ |
śaśaviṣāṇe ghaṭatvādikaṃ nāstīti vikalpānāmasatkhyātau kāraṇā
bhāvenānyathākhyātitvadhrauvyādvastuna eva niṣedhavyavahāragocaratvaṃ nāva
stunaḥ apiḥ pramāṇāntarābhāve samuccayāyetyapyāhuḥ | na tataḥ
tasminnasati kramayaugapadyayoḥ sattvasya ca vyatireko virahaḥ ||
tathāhi ko'yaṃ vyatireko nāma yadyato vyatiricyate
tasya tatrābhāvo vā tadabhāvasvabhāvatvaṃ vā | tatra na
tāvat kramayaugapadyayoḥ śaśaviṣāṇe abhāvaḥ pramāṇa
gocaraḥ vṛkṣarahitabhūmṛtkaṭakavat kramayaugapadyarahitasya
śaśabiṣāṇasya pramāṇāgocaratvāt |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | yadyato vyatiricyata iti | vyatiricyate
bhidyate | yathā bhūtalādbhinnasya ghaṭasyābhāvo na bhūtala iti
svamate | prābhākaramate tvāha | tadabhāveti | tathā ca bhūtalāde
radhikaraṇasyaiva ghaṭādyabhāvasvarūpatvamityarthaḥ | adhikaraṇabhinno
vā'bhāvo'dhikaraṇasvabhāvo'dhikaraṇasvarūpaṃ veti vikalpārthaḥ |
apavyākhyānamanyat uktiretādṛśī paranayena | na tāvaditi |
parvatanitambe yathā vṛkṣābhāvo yogyānupalambhena gṛhyate na tathā
vyatirekagrahaḥ prakṛte sambhavatītyarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | yadyata iti | yadvastu yanniṣṭhābhāvaprati
yogitvena jñāyate tatra tasyābhāva iti na sādhyāvaiśiṣṭyam |
yadvā yad yato vyatiricyata ityanena kṣaṇikasadanyonyābhāvaḥ
śaśaviṣāṇādāvuktaḥ sa ca vaidharmyanirūpyaḥ tacca dharmasyātyantābhāvena
nirūpyata ityāśayenātyantābhāvamāha | tasya tatrābhāva iti |
krameti | kramayaugapadyābhyāmarthakriyāyā ityarthaḥ | vṛkṣeti
vyatirekadṛṣṭāntaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | yato'dhikaraṇāt vyatiricyate vyāvarttate yada
vṛttīti yāvat yadadhikaraṇaṃ yato yaddharmavato vyatiricyate
bhidyate tatra tasya dharmasyetyanye | kevalamadhikaraṇamabhāva iti
matenāha | tadabhāveti | tasya adhikaraṇasya | krameti | artha
kriyānukūlakramayaugapadyayoḥ kramādikaṃ sattvasyāpyupalakṣaṇam |
evamagre'pi ||
nāpi kramayaugapadyābhāvarūpatvaṃ śaśaviṣāṇasya prāmā
ṇikaṃ ghaṭābhāvavacchaśaviṣāṇasya pramāṇenānupalambhāt |
ghaṭābhāvo'pi na pramāṇagocara iti cet na tasya
tadviviktetarasvabhāvasyāpi pramāṇata eva siddheḥ asiddhau
vā tatrāpyavyavahāra eva |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | dvitīyaṃ nirasyati | nāpīti | syādevaṃ yadi
śaśaviṣāṇe kramayaugapadyābhāva iti pratītiḥ kenāpi pramāṇena
syānna tvevamityarthaḥ | ghaṭābhāvavaditi vyatirekadṛṣṭāntaḥ adhikara
ṇasvabhāvatvepyabhāvasya pratītiretādṛśyevābhyupeyeti bhāvaḥ | nanu yathā
pramāṇāviṣayasyāpi ghaṭābhāvasya vyavahāraḥ sarvajanīnastathā
kramayaugapadyābhāvavyavahāropi syādityabhiprāyeṇa śaṅkate | ghaṭā
bhāvopīti | pariharati | tasyeti | ghaṭaviviktaṃ ghaṭabhinnaṃ bhūta
lādi | tadatiriktasvabhāvasya ghaṭābhāvasyetyarthaḥ | yathādhikaraṇā
tirikto ghaṭābhāvaḥ pratyakṣata upalabhyate | naivaṃ kramayaugapadyābhāva iti
bhāvaḥ | nanu bhūtale ghaṭo nāstīti pratītirapyasatkhyātirevetyata
āha | asiddhāviti | tatrāpi ghaṭābhāvepi | pramitasyaiva vyava
hāryatvāditi bhāvaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | dvitīyaṃ kalpaṃ nirasyati | nāpīti |
ghaṭābhāvavadityayamapi vyatirekadṛṣṭāntaḥ | nanu bauddhānāṃ ghaṭā
bhāvo'pi na prāmāṇika iti sarvatrāprāmāṇiko lokavyavahāra
ityāha | ghaṭābhāvo'pīti | atiriktābhāvasya sādhanīyatvena
svamatamāśrityāha | tadvivikteti | tasmādabhāvādvivikto bhinnaḥ
pratiyogī ghaṭastaditarasvabhāvasyetyarthaḥ | tadvivikto ghaṭaviviktaḥ
paṭādistaditarasvabhāvasyetyanye | guruvacanamāśrityottaramityapare |
tathā hyatiriktābhāvasyāprāmāṇikatve'pi bhūtalādirūpastannaye vyava
hartavyaḥ prāmāṇika evetyarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | ghaṭābhāvavaditi vyatirekeṇa dṛṣṭāntaḥ tasyā
siddhimāha | ghaṭābhāvopīti | tathā ca pakṣaḥ sthiro bhāva iva
sapakṣādirapyaprāmāṇika upayujyata iti bhāvaḥ | tadviviktetareti |
tadviviktastadbhinnastaditarasvabhāvasya pratiyogivadabhāvasyāpyatadvyāvṛtta
svabhāvasya pramāṇasiddhatvācca kevalamadhikaraṇamanyo vetyanyadetaditi
bhāvaḥ | tatrāpi ghaṭābhāve'pi ||
ghaṭastāvat svābhāvavirahasvabhāvaḥ pramāṇasiddhaḥ
tādrūpyeṇa kadācidapyanupalambhāt | etāvataiva tadabhā
vo'pi ghaṭavirahasvabhāvaḥ siddha iti cenna ghaṭabhāvasya
tadabhāvavirahasvabhāvatvānabhyupagamāt | na cānyasya
svabhāve pramāṇagocare tadanyo'pi siddhaḥ syādati
prasaṅgāt |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | pramāṇāviṣayasyāpi ghaṭābhāvasya vyavahāryatva
mupapādayati | ghaṭastāvaditi | tādrūpyeṇeti | svābhāvarūpataye
tyarthaḥ | na hi bhavati ghaṭābhāva hava ghaṭa iti pratītiriti
bhāvaḥ | ghaṭavirahasvabhāvaḥ siddha iti | na tu svātantryeṇa pramita
iti rahasyam | gūḍhābhisandhirāha(?) | ghaṭabhāvasyeti | kvacidghaṭā
bhāvasyeti pāṭhaḥ | sa ca ghaṭaścāsāvabhāvaśceti kathañcidupapādyaḥ
abhāvasyāprāmāṇikatve ghaṭasya svābhāvavirahasvābhāvyasthāviprati
padyāmaha iti bhāvaḥ | doṣāntaramāha | na ceti tathā ca
stambhe pravarttamānaṃ pramāṇaṃ kumbhamapi sādhayedityarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | nanu cāprāmāṇikenāpi vyavahāraḥ na cāti
prasaṅgaḥ yaḥ svābhāvavirahasvabhāvaḥ prāmāṇiko bhavati tadabhāvenā
prāmāṇikenāpi vyavahāra ityasya niyāmakatvādityāha | ghaṭastā
vaditi | tādrūpyeṇa pratiyogyātmatvenetyarthaḥ | etāvataiveti |
yadi ghaṭābhāvo ghaṭavirahasvabhāvo na syāt tadā ghaṭasyāpi
svābhāvavirahasvabhātvaṃ na syāt tathā ca tathaivopalabdhetetyarthaḥ |
ghaṭo na ghaṭābhāvaviraharūpo virahasya tvanmate'līkatayā ghaṭasya
tadrūpatve'līkatvaprasaṅgādityāha | ghaṭabhāvasyeti | ghaṭarūpo bhāvo
ghaṭabhāvastasyetyarthaḥ | kvacid ghaṭābhāvasyeti pāṭhaḥ | tatra tadabhāvo
ghaṭastathā ca ghaṭābhāvasya ghaṭavirahasvabhāvatābhyupagamelīkatvavyāghā-
tastasyāsvabhāvatvādityarthaḥ | dūṣaṇāntaramāha | na ceti | ghaṭasya
svābhāvavirahasvabhāvatvagrāhakamānena ghaṭābhāvasyāviṣayīkaraṇāda
viṣayasiddhau cātiprasaṅga ityarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | asiddhe vyavahārābhāva iti satyam abhāvastu
pratiyoginaḥ svābhāvavirahasvabhāvasya siddhyaiva siddham ityāśaṅkate |
ghaṭastāvaditi | tādrūpyeṇa svābhāvarūpatvena | tathā ca
tadviruddhasvabhāvaḥ pratiyogyeva tadabhāvaḥ | pratiyogisattvagrahe
kadācidapyabhāvasyāvyavahārāt ghaṭābhāvopi ghaṭavirahasvabhāvaḥ
siddha ityatra tanmatavirodhamāha | ghaṭabhāvasyeti | tadabhāvo
ghaṭaḥ tadvirahaḥ tadabhāvastathā ca ghaṭābhāvasya ghaṭavirahasvabhāvatā
yāstvayānabhyupagamāt abhāvamātrasyaiva niḥsvabhāvatayā tvayā tucchatvā
bhyupagamāt | ghaṭābhāvasyeti pāṭhe tu ghaṭarūpasya svabhāvasya svābhā
vavirahatvānabhyupagamādityarthaḥ | pratiyoginaḥ svābhāvavirahātmatve
prāmāṇike abhāvaprāmāṇikatāyā āvaśyakatvāditi bhāvaḥ ||
evambhūtāveva ghaṭatadabhāvau yadekasya paricchittira
parasya vyavacchittiriti cet na ghaṭavadghaṭābhāvasyāpi
prāmāṇikatvānabhyupagame svabhāvavādānavakāśāt | pramā
ṇasiddhe hi vastuni svabhāvavādāvalambanaṃ na tu svabhāva-
vādāvalambanenaiva vastusiddhiriti1 bhavatāmeva tatratatra
jayadundubhiḥ |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | atiprasaṅgaṃ paro vyudasyati | evaṃbhūtāveveti |
pratiyogini pravṛttaṃ pramāṇamanuyoginamapi viṣayīkarotyatra
pratiyogyanuyogībhāva eva niyāmaka iti nātiprasaṅgo na
vā'bhāvasya svatantrapramāṇaviṣayatvamiti bhāvaḥ | ghaṭavaditi | vyati
rekadṛṣṭāntaḥ | svabhāvo hi svarūpaṃ tacca niḥsvarūpasya pramāṇa
pathānavatīrṇasya na sambhavatītyarthaḥ | tvayāpi pramāṇasiddha eva
svabhāvāvalambanamaṅgīkartavyamityāha | pramāṇasiddhe hīti ||
bhagīº ṭīº | nanu yadyapyanyasya pratītiranyaparicchittirna
bhavati tathāpi ghaṭatadabhāvayorekasya pratītiranyavyavacchittirna
bhavati tathāpi ghaṭatadabhāvayorekasya pratītiranyavyavacchittireva
bhavati na hi pramāṇapratītameva vyavacchedyamityasti niyamaḥ para
matasyāvyavacchedyatvāpatteḥ atiprasaṅge ca svabhāva eva śaraṇamityāha |
evambhūtāviti | evaṃsvabhāvāvityarthaḥ | ghaṭavaditi vyatireka
dṛṣṭāntaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | api ca ghaṭasya ghaṭasvabhāvatvena sidvyaiva tada
bhāvasya siddhiḥ svābhāvavirahasvabhāvatvena siddhyā vā ādye na ceti
svabhāvabhedasya niyāmakatvānnātiprasaṅga ityāśaṅkate | evambhūtāviti |
evaṃsvabhāvovityarthaḥ | paricchittirnniścayaḥ | vyavacchittirabhāvāvadhā-
vastuvyavasthitiriti--pāº 1 puº |
raṇam tathā ca ghaṭaparicchittau svābhāvatairaścinyena ghaṭābhāvopi
siddha ityarthaḥ | nirākaroti | ghaṭavaditi | vyatireke dṛṣṭāntaḥ
svabhāveti | niḥsvabhāvatvenābhyupagamāt abhāve sasvabhāvatvābhyupa
gamavirodha iti bhāvaḥ ||
tat kimidānīṃ svābhāvavirahasvabhāvo ghaṭaḥ
pramāṇānnaiva siddhaḥ tava dṛṣṭyā evametat ghaṭo hi yādṛk
tādṛksvabhāvastāvat pramāṇapathamavatīrṇastasya tu yadi
paramārthato'bhāvo'pi kaścit syāt syāt paramārthataḥ
so'pi tadvirahasvabhāva iti tathaiva pramāṇenāveditaḥ
syāt | na caitadabhyupagamyate bhavatā tasmād ghaṭavat
tadabhāvasyāpi prāmāṇikatvenaivānayoḥ parasparaviraha
lakṣaṇavyatirekasiddhiḥ aprāmāṇikatve tvanayorapi na
tathābhāva iti śaśaviṣāṇādiṣvapīyameva gatiḥ ||
śaṅkaº ṭīº | tatkimiti | tathā sati svābhāvābhāvo naiva
ghaṭaḥ syāditi sākṣepaparābhiprāyaḥ1 | tava dṛṣṭyeti | dṛṣṭirdarśanam |
tvaddarśane cedabhāvo na prāmāṇikastadā tadvirahasvabhāvo ghaṭo'pi na
prāmāṇikaḥ syādityarthaḥ | yādṛktādṛksvabhāva iti | avayavī
paramāṇusvarūpo vetyarthaḥ | tathaiveti | svābhāvavirahasvabhāvatvenetyarthaḥ |
ubhayoḥ prāmāṇikatvamupasaṃharati | tasmāditi | anayorghaṭatada-
sāpekṣābhidhānābhiprāyaḥ--pāº 2 puº |
bhāvayoḥ | na cānayoranyonyāpekṣāyāmanyonyāśrayaḥ ghaṭatvena ghaṭe
gṛhyamāṇe tadvirahānapekṣaṇāt tadvirahasyāpi prameyatvādinā jñāne1
ghaṭhānapekṣaṇāditi bhāvaḥ | na tathābhāva iti | nānyonyaviraha
svabhāvatvamityarthaḥ | śaśaviṣāṇādiṣvapīti | śaśaviṣāṇādīnāṃ
prāmāṇikatve paratantrakramayaugapadyavirahanirūpaṇaṃ nānyathetyarthaḥ | tathā
ca pramāviṣayasyaiva vyavahāraviṣayatvāditi yadupakrāntaṃ tatsiddhamiti
bhāvaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | tat kimiti | tathā ca ghaṭaḥ svābhāvā
tmakaḥ syāditi bhāvaḥ | tava dṛṣṭhyeti | abhāvasya prāmāṇikatve
ghaṭastadvirahātmakaḥ | na cābhāvastava mate prāmāṇika ityarthaḥ |
tasmāditi | nanu ghaṭatadabhāvayoḥ prāmāṇikatve yadi paraspara
