ṇāt vikalpadhīḥ sāmānyabuddhiḥ pareṣāṃ tathā nivṛtta
pratyayākṣiptā nivṛttibuddhirasmākamiti cet ? hanta
sādhāraṇākāraparisphuraṇe vidhirūpatayā yadi sāmānya
bodhavyavasthā kimāyātamasphuradabhāvākāre cetasi nivṛ
ttipratītivyavasthāyāḥ |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | atra śaṅkate | yadyapīti | itaravyāvṛttavastubhāna
meva vyāvṛttibhānaṃ brūma ityarthaḥ | nivṛttimahaṃ pratyemītyanuvyavasāya
stadā syādyadi vyavasāye nivṛttiḥ svātaṃtryeṇa sphurennatveva mityarthaḥ |
na vikalponānuvyavasāyaḥ | tathāpīti | rajatavyāvṛttamiti bhāne
viśeṣaṇatayā vyāvṛttibhānamāvaśyakamityarthaḥ | etadevopapādayati |
na hīti | yadyapi yathādaṇḍītyatrādaṇḍivyāvṛttibhānamasti | na
tu viśiṣya vyāvṛtyullekhaḥ | tathāpi viśeṣaṇabhānaṃ vyāvṛttibhāna
nāntarīyakameva | atadvyāvṛttirvaiśiṣṭyamiti tavābhyupagamādityarthaḥ |
tadbhānepi tadvṛttiprakārabhānamāvaśyakamityatra dṛṣṭāntamāha |
yatheti | pareṣāṃ naiyāyikānāṃ | tatheti1 | nivṛttapratyayaśce2nnūnaṃ
nivṛttipratyayopyastyevetyarthaḥ | vastugatyā yadvyāvṛttaṃ tadbhāsate na tu
vyāvṛttatvenāpi bhānamaṅgīkurmo yena vyāvṛttibhānaṃ syāt | vidhi-
tathā ceti 2 puº pāº |
yaścenmūlaṃ 2 puº pāº |
rūpaṃ sāmānyaṃ bhāsate na tu tasya sāmānyatvamapi viṣaya iti
nāyaṃ dṛṣṭānta ityarthaḥ | asphuradanubhavākāro yasyetyarthaḥ1 ||
bhagīº ṭīº | nanvatyantābhāvarūpavyāvṛttyasphuraṇe'pi anyo
nyābhāvarūpā'sau vikalpe bhāsate viśiṣṭabuddherviśeṣaṇaviṣayatvaniya
māt, tathā vyāvṛttātmakaviśiṣṭabuddhau vyāvṛttirapi viśeṣaṇatvena
bhāsate yathā gaurityatra viśiṣṭajñāne gotvamityāha | yadyapīti |
pareṣāṃ naiyāyikādīnām | tatheti | nivṛttimanādāya nivṛttadhīreva
na bhavatītyanupapattirevākṣepa ityarthaḥ | yathā gaurityatra viśiṣṭajñāne
vidhirūpatayā viśeṣaṇaṃ gotvamanugatatvena bhāsate na tathā vyāvṛtti
bhāsate kiṃ tu vastuto yadvyāvṛttaṃ tadbhāsate | tathā ca nivṛtta
padārthollekhe'pi na nivṛttatvenollekha ityāha | hanteti ||
raghuº ṭīº | tṛtīyaṃ śaṅkate | yadyapīti | nivṛtto nivṛtti
viśiṣṭaḥ | prādhānyena nivṛtterasphuraṇepi tadviśiṣṭasphuraṇameva tatsiddhi
rityarthaḥ | tathetyādi | viśiṣṭasyātiriktasyābhāvena vinā viśeṣaṇa
viṣayatvaṃ viśiṣṭaviṣayatvānupapatteḥ ākṣepaḥ | bhavedevaṃ, yadyagovyāvṛtta
iti sphuraṇaṃ syānnatvevaṃ, kiṃ tu gauritītyāha | hanteti | cetasi
vijñāne ||
kāro yatra cetasi jñāne 2 puº pāº |
na hyagopoḍhoyamiti vikalpaḥ kiṃ tu gauriti,
tato'nyanivṛttimahaṃ pratyemītyevamākārābhāve'pi nivṛ
ttyākārasphuraṇaṃ yadi syāt ko nivṛttipratītimapahnu
vīta, anyathā tvatatpratibhānaṃ tatheti vyavahṛtiriti
gavākāre cetasi turagabodha ityastu | na ca nivṛtti
mātrapratibhāse'pi pravṛttisambhavaḥ na hyaghaṭo nāstītyeva
ghaṭārthī pravarttate, api tu ghaṭo'stīti |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | etadevāha | na hīti | agopoḍhoyamiti |
agovyāvṛtta ityarthaḥ | tata iti | nivṛtterna prādhānyena bhānaṃ
nāpyupasarjjanatayetyarthaḥ | ajñānaviṣayasyāpi tajjñānaviṣayatākalpane
vipakṣe daṇḍamāha | anyatheti | tathā ca sarvajñānaṃ sarvaviṣayaṃ syāditi
bhāvaḥ | nivṛttisphuraṇe doṣāntaramāha | na ceti | tanmate vikalpena
svalakṣaṇāsaṃsparśānmātretyuktam | pravarttakānubhavavailakṣaṇyamāha | na
hīti | pravarttakajñānasvarūpamāha | api tviti | anubhava evātra
sākṣītyarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | tadeva viśadayati | na hīti | apoḍho
vyāvṛttaḥ | kiṃ tviti | agovyāvṛttimajānato'pi vidhyākāreṇa
gosphuraṇamityarthaḥ | yadi tu yadyatra jñāne na bhāsate tadapi cet
tadviṣayaḥ tadā gobuddhau turago'pi viṣayaḥ syādityāha |
anyatheti | atyantābhāvarūpavyāvṛttibhāne dūṣaṇāntaramāha | na
ceti | aghaṭasya paṭāderabhāvajñāne'pi ghaṭārthī na pravarttate aghaṭasyā1
pyabhāvasambhavāt, kiṃ tu ghaṭajñānādeveti viśiṣṭajñānādapravṛtti
prasaṅga ityarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | attyantābhāvarūpanivṛttibhāne doṣāntaramāha | na
ceti | anyanivṛttitvenāsphuraṇāt | paṭārthipra2vṛttau paṭatvena
pratītereva hetutvāt vinātiriktaṃ paṭatvamanugatānatiprasakta
syāpaṭanivṛttitvāderdurnirūpaṇatvācca naivamiti bhāvaḥ3 ||
aghaṭasyaiva nivṛttiriti pratītau nāyaṃ doṣa
iti cenna | ghaṭanivṛttyapratikṣepe niyamasyaivā'siddheḥ |
tatpratikṣepe tu kastato'nyovidhirniṣedhapratikṣepasyaiva
vidhitvāt | nivṛtteraparisphuraṇe gāṃ badhāneti deśito
'śvamapi badhnīyāt iti cet | na | bhavedapyevaṃ, yadyaśvo
'pi gauḥ syāt kintu gau rgauraśvo'śva iti | anyathā
nivṛttāvapi kutaste samāśvāsa iti | nivṛttyantarācce
danavasthā | nivartyanivṛttitadadhikaraṇānāṃ svarūpasā
ṅkarye pravṛttisaṅkaraḥ syāt | svarūpabhedenaiva niyame vidhi
mātrapratibhāse'pi tathā kiṃ na syāt |
ghaṭasyāpīti yuktaḥ pāṭhaḥ |

śaṅkaº ṭīº | nanu cāghaṭo nāstīti pratīteḥ pravarttakatve
tavāyamanuśayo yadatra ghaṭanivṛttirapi sphurati ghaṭāntarāpekṣayā
ghaṭasyāpyaghaṭatvādaghaṭasyaiva nivṛttiriti pratīteḥ pravarttakatve tu nāyaṃ
doṣa ityāha | aghaṭasyaiveti | neti | aghaṭasyaiveti niyamārtho
ghaṭanivṛttipratikṣepa evā'nyathā pūrvadoṣatādavasthyāt, ghaṭanivṛtti
pratikṣepaśca ghaṭoyamitijñānaparyavasāyī, tatra ca ghaṭatvameva vidhi
rūpaṃ sphuret tanmate savikalpakena svalakṣaṇāsaṃsparśādityarthaḥ | śābdaṃ
jñānamanyanivṛttimukhenaiva jāyata ityavaśyamabhyupagantavyamanyathā'nya
parācchabdādanyatrāpi pravartteteti śaṅkate | nivṛtterasphuraṇa iti |
bhavedevamiti | gopadārthe nāśva iti kathamaśvaṃ badhnīyādityarthaḥ |
gaurgauriti | gopadavācyogauraśvapadavācyo'śva iti kathamanyaparā
cchabdāt anyatra pravṛttirityarthaḥ | anyatheti | nivṛttāvapi
nivṛttipratiyoginivṛttyadhikaraṇādibhyo yadi nivṛttiḥ sphurettadā
'navasthā tadasphuraṇe'śvavyāvṛttigrahepi gopadādaśve pravṛttiḥ syādeva
nivṛtteḥ sādhāraṇyenaiva sphuraṇāt | svarūpasāṃkarya iti | pratiyogyā
disādhāraṇyenaiva nivṛtteḥ sphuraṇādityarthaḥ | pravṛttīti | niṣe
dhyośvoniṣedhādhikaraṇa gauriti tavāpi mate gośabdādatadvyāvṛ
ttiparādapyatadgocarapravṛttyāpatterityarthaḥ | nanu nivṛttiḥ svata eva
vilakṣaṇā tatra kiṃ nivṛttyantarasphuraṇeneti yadi tadā gotvādyapi
svata eva vilakṣaṇamiti tatsphuraṇe kathamanyatra pravṛttiḥ syāditi
samānamityāha | svarūpeti | tathā kiṃ na syāditi | pravṛtte
rniyamaḥ kinna syādityarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | aghaṭasyaiveti | na tu ghaṭasyāpītyevakārārthaḥ |
aghaṭaḥpaṭādirghaṭābhāvaśca | tathā ca ghaṭābhāvasyāpi nivṛttiḥ
pratīyate na vā | antye aghaṭasyeveti niyamāsiddhiḥ ādye vidhi
bhānameva payavasyatītyāha | ghaṭanivṛttīti | na caivamapi ghaṭo
vidhirna ca ghaṭatvamiti vācyam | paramate ghaṭasvalakṣaṇasya
nirvikalpakamātravedyatayā ghaṭatvasyaiva savikalpakavedyatvāt | nanu yadi
gaurayamiti śābdaṃ jñānamaśvavyāvṛttiviṣayakaṃ na syādaśvajñānamivāśve
pravartakaṃ syāt tathā cāśve pravarttakatvamanupapadyamānamasyāśvavyāvṛttivi
ṣayatāmākṣipatītyāha | nivṛtteriti | aśvaviṣayapravṛttijanakatve
'śvaviṣayatvaṃ prayojakamiti tadabhāvenānyathopapannatāṃ nākṣipatītyāha |
bhavediti | dvitīyaṃ gauriti aśva iti ca tacchabdavācyatvaparam,
vācakapadaṃ ca vācyaviṣayakajñānajanakamityarthaḥ | nivṛttivācyatve'pi
nivṛttau yadi pratiyogyādito vyāvṛttiḥ sphurati tadā'navasthā
tadasphuraṇe tu pratiyoginyapi pravṛttiḥ syāt | atha na nivṛttau
nivṛttyantarādvyāvṛttiḥ sphurati kintu svarūpata eva, tadā vidhā
vapi tathāttvamastu ityāha | anyatheti | svarūpasāṅkarye'nyonyavyāvṛ
ttisphuraṇa ityarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | anyanivṛtterasphuraṇe gopadādaśvasādhāraṇapratītyā
'śvepi pravṛttiprasaṅga ityāśaṅkate | nivṛtteriti | yaddharmaviśiṣṭe
yasya padasya saṅketagrahastataḥ taddharmmaviśiṣṭasya pratītirgotvaviśiṣṭe ca
gopadasya saṅketagrahāt tato gotvaviśiṣṭa eva pratīyate nāśva iti
nirākurute | bhavediti | rgaurgaureva gotvaviśiṣṭaḥ | aśvastvaśvatva
viśiṣṭo natu gotvaviśiṣṭa ityarthaḥ | gotvasyaivāśvatvavyāvṛttyasphuraṇe
kathaṃ tatopi niyama iti cet atrāha | anyatheti | agovyāvṛttera
pyanaśvavyāvṛttitovyāvṛttiḥ sphurati na vā | ādye nivṛttyantarā
diti | dvitīye nivartyeti | svarūpeṇaiva bhinnā nivṛttirbhāsate tena
pravṛttiniyama iti yadi, tadā vidherapi tādṛśasyaiva bhānānniyamo
bhaviṣyatītyata āha | svarūpeti ||
svarūpabheda evānyāpoho'nyāpoḍhasvarūpatvādvidhe
riti cenna | alīkapakṣe tadabhāvāt tasya svarūpavidhā
vanalīkatvaprasaṅgāt | svalakṣaṇasya ca vikalpānāro
hāt | api ca gāṃ badhāneti deśito gavi pravṛtto nāśve,
tadapratīteḥ | yadā tvaśvamupalapsyate tadā tatra pravṛttyunmu
svopi gorabhāvaṃ pratītyaiva nivartsyatīti kimanupapannam |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | svarūpabheda eveti | yaḥ svarūpabhedo gotvaṃ tvayo
cyate sa evānyāpoho'tadvyāvṛttilakṣaṇaḥ yastu vidhiḥ so'nyāpo
ho'nya eva tadbhānaṃ śabdānnirākurma ityarthaḥ | alīkapakṣa iti |
anyāpohatvenābhimataṃ gotvādiḥ1 svarūpabhedastvayocyate | tadyadya
līkaṃ tadā kathaṃ svarūpabhedaḥ na hi niḥsvarūpamalīkaṃ svarūpaṃ
bhavatītyarthaḥ | tadabhāvāt svarūpabhedābhāvāt | tasyeti | anyāpoha-
anyāpohalakṣaṇo yo gotvādiḥ--pāº 2 puº |
tvenābhimataṃ gotvādi yadi svarūpaṃ tadā kathamalīkamityarthaḥ |
svarūpavidhāviti | svarūpata eva vidhāvityarthaḥ | kiṃ ca gotvama
nyāpoharūpaṃ yadi vidhisvarūpaṃ bhavet tadā svalakṣaṇatāmāsādayet
tathā ca vastutastasya savikalpakaviṣayatā na syādityāha |
svalakṣaṇasya ceti | yadvā svalakṣaṇamanyāpohatvena gṛhyate iti tavābhi
māno'nupapanna ityāha | svalakṣaṇasya ceti | api ceti | pūrvamaśva
vyāvṛttergośabdādabhānepi nāśve pravarttata ityuktamidānīmaśvāpratītyaiva
nāśve pravarttata ityucyata ityapaunaruktyam | nanu gopadādaśvavyāvṛttiścenna
sphurettadā gāṃ badhānetideśitogavāśvamekatra paśyannaśvaṃ badhnīyā
nnahi tatra nāśvapratītirityata āha | yadātviti | pravṛttyunmukhopi
aśvajñānavānapi nāśve pravarttate praiṣaviṣayādgoraya bhinna iti jñānādvā
nāyaṃ praiṣaviṣaya iti jñānādvā praiṣaviṣayatāvacchedakaṃ yadgotvaṃ tadiha
nāstīti jñānādvā nāyaṃ gauriti jñānādvā na pravarttata ityarthaḥ |
bhagīº ṭīº | nanu vyāvṛttirna vyāvṛttyantarādvyāvṛttā'navasthā
nāt kintu svarūpata eva, vidhistu vyāvṛttipratiyogīti viśeṣa
ityāha | svarūpabheda eveti | vyāvṛttistucchā tasyāmasvarūpāyāṃ na
svarūpabhedo vidhitvāpatterityāha | alīketi | na cāvidhirū
pāyāstasyā alīkaviṣayake savikalpake viṣayatvasambhava ityāha |
svalakṣaṇasya ceti | nanvagojñānādgavi pravṛttivadaśve nivṛttiranubhūyate
tadanyathānupapattyā tasyānubhavikagoviṣayakatvavadaśvavyāvṛttiviṣayaka
tvamapi kalpyata ityata āha | api ceti | jñānasya svaviṣaya
pravṛttijanakasvabhāvatayā gojñānādgavi pravṛtteraśve ca pravṛttyabhāvo
'śvāviṣayatvenaivopapanno na tasyāśvavyāvṛttiviṣayakatvakalpaka ityarthaḥ |
pravṛttyunmukho'pi | nivṛttiprayatnena rahitopītyarthaḥ | tadarthamapi
na tasya vyāvṛttiviṣayakatvaṃ kalpyaṃ gojñānānantaramaśve gotvābhā
vādeva tadupapatteriti bhāvaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | vyāvṛtterniḥsvarūpatayā tatra svarūpabhedona saṃbhavati
kiṃtu sā svata eva vyāvṛttā vidhistu sasvarūpa iti tasyaiva svarūpabhedaḥ
sa cānyāpoha iti svarūpabhinnasya tasya bhāne'nyāpohabhānamityā
śaṅkate | svarūpeti | svarūpabhinnovidhiravāstavobhāsate vāstavo vā ?
ādye | alīketi | alīkasya niḥsvarūpatāyāstvayaivoktattvāt
sasvarūpatve tu alīkatvavyāghāta ityāha | tasyeti | svarūpavidhau
sasvarūpatābhyupagame | dvitīye svalakṣaṇasyeti | svalakṣaṇasya nirvika
lpakamātravedyatāyāstvayā'bhyupagamādityarthaḥ | asmākaṃtu vikalpa
viṣayasyānyāpohaśālinopi vidheḥ svarūpeṇa sphuraṇaṃ na viruddha
miti bhāvaḥ | api ca gośabdādanyavyāvṛttibhānaṃ kiṃ gavi pravṛttaye
kivā' śve tadabhāvāya uta aśvānnivṛttaye, naikamapītyāha | api
ceti | gośabdātpratyakṣataśca pratīte gavi pravarttate, nāśve, tasyāgo
śabdārthatvādindriyāsannikarṣāccāpratīteḥ pravṛttau pravṛttiviṣayapratyakṣa
'syāpi hetutvāt, yadātvindriyasannikarṣādgosādhāraṇākāramaśva
mupalabhate tadā gavāśakayā pravṛttyunmukhopi tatra goranyonyābhāvaṃ
pratītya nivarttate yadā tvayaṃgauritibhrāmyati tadā pravarttata evetyarthaḥ ||
syādetat nahyanubhavamavadhūya bhavituṃ kṣamamiti
kovidhisphuraṇamapa??tām, tadupasarjanībhūtastanni
ṣedhopi sphuratyeva, anyathā vidheravacchedakatvānupapatteḥ,
na hyanyato viśeṣyamavyāvartayatoviśeṣaṇatvaṃ nāma, na
cā'nyato vyāvartanaṃ vyavacchittipratyāyanādanyat, tato
yathendīvarapuṇḍarīkādiśabdebhyo guṇībhūtanīladhavalā
dividhiśekharā pratītistadanyavyavacchedastu tadgarbhārbha
kāyamāṇastathā sarvatreti cet | astu tāvadevaṃ, vidhistu
sphuratītyatra samprati no nirbandhaḥ, anyathā'vacchedyāva
cchedakayorapratīteravacchittirapi na syāt yathotpalā
dāveva nīlatvādyapratītau |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | kīrttidiṅnāgādibhirgauriyamityādivikalpe
vidhisphuraṇa nāstyevetyuktaṃ, jñānaśriyā tu vidhisphuraṇamabhyupagamya
niṣedhasphuraṇamapi tatra bhavatīti svīkṛtaṃ yadāha ‘tatrāpohastadguṇatvena
gamyata’ iti tadutthāpya dūṣayati | syādetaditi | na hyanubhavamabhibhūya
bhavituṃ kṣamamityapi tadgrantha eva | tasyārthaḥ anubhavamabhibhūya
tiraskṛtya śāstraṃ bhavituṃ na kṣamamiti | śāstrasyānubhavānusāritvāt |
tadupasarjanībhūtovidhyupasarjanībhūtaḥ | anyatheti | vyavacchedoyadi na
sphurettadā gotvādervidhervyavacchedakatvaṃ1 na bhavedityarthaḥ | tadevopa
pādayati | nahīti | vyāvarttakaṃ hi viśeṣaṇamityucyata ityarthaḥ |
viśeṣaṇattvaṃ--pāº 2 |
nanu viśeṣaṇa vyavacchittipratyayaṃ janayati, anyatovyāvṛttipratyaye
tu kimāyātamata āha | na ceti | sphuṭataravyāvṛttipratyaye sthāna
dṛṣṭāṃtena (?) gavādipratyayānāmapi vyāvṛttiviṣayatvamāha | yatheti |
indīvara nīlotpalam puṇḍarīka sitāṃbhojam | nīladhavalādi
vidhiśekharā nīladhavalādividhipradhānā | tadgarbhārbhakāyamāṇastatkro
ḍ.avarttī | tathā sarvatra gomahiṣamātaṅgādipratītāvapītyarthaḥ | atra
sampratipattimāha | astviti | sphuritasya vidheralīkatva yadyapi tava
hṛdi varttate tathāpi vidhisphuraṇaṃ svīkṛtameva tvayeti tāvatpadārthaḥ |
prāthamikaviśiṣṭajñāne niṣedho na sphuratītyanuśayastāvatpadārtha iti
kecit | tanna | prathamaviśiṣṭajñānepi vyāvṛttisphuraṇāt | taduktaṃ
guṇakiraṇāvalyāmācāryaiḥ | atadvyāvṛttirvaiśiṣṭyamiti | vaiśiṣṭyaṃ ca
prathamaviśiṣṭajñānepi bhāsata eva | yattu viśeṣaṇattvajñāne vyāvṛtti
pratyayo na viśiṣṭajñāna iti | tanmandaṃ | viśeṣaṇatvajñāne hi
vyāvartakatvaṃ sphurennatu vyāvṛttiḥ | yadapyanyonyābhāvagrahe vaidharmyajñānaṃ
tantramiti | tadapi na | anyonyābhāvatvena tadgrahe tathaiva, na tu
vaiśiṣṭyarūpatayā'nyonyābhāvagrahe tantramitilīlāvatīkaṇṭhābharaṇe eva
vistṛtam1 | avacchedyāvacchedakayoriti | viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyayorvidhi
rūpayorityarthaḥ | vyavacchittirvyavacchittipratyayaḥ | yatheti | nīlaṃ
nīlatvamutpalamutpalatvaṃ ca yadi na bhāsate tadā'nīlādanutpalāt
vyāvṛttirna bhāsata evetyarthaḥ |
vivṛtam | pāº 2 |
bhagīº ṭīº | nanu yadyapyagopoḍhoyamitināstipratītiḥ - -
kintu gaurityeva tathāpi tasya viśiṣṭajñānatayā viśeṣaṇaviśeṣya
sambandhavadviśeṣaṇatvamapi viṣayaḥ taccātadvyāvṛttidhījanakatvamiti tasya
vyāvṛttibuddhiviṣayatvaṃ siddhamityāha | syādetaditi | tadupasarjanī
bhūtaḥ tadguṇībhūta ityarthaḥ | anyatheti | vidhirūpasya gotvādisāmānyasya
viśeṣaṇatvamapi vyāvṛttyaviṣayakatve viśiṣṭajñānasya na syādityarthaḥ |
etadanurūpaṃ dṛṣṭāntamāha | tato yatheti | indīvaraṃ nīlotpalam |
puṇḍarīkaṃ sitapadmam | evamapi vidhirūpasphuraṇaṃ prakṛtaṃ siddha
mevetyāha | astviti | tāvacchabdena hyanupagamaṃ sūcayati | tadbījantu
viśiṣṭajñāne yadyapi viśeṣaṇaṃ viṣayastathāpi tasya viśeṣaṇatvaṃ
na bhāsate tasyātadvyāvṛttidhījanakatvarūpasya viśiṣṭajñānānantaraṃ
bhānāt viśeṣaṇattve jñāta eva tatra vyāvṛttibhānāt anyonyābhāva
grahasya vaidharmyagrahādhīnatvāt | na ca daṇḍapuruṣasambandhā iti
samūhālambanāddaṇḍītijñānasyāviśeṣāpattyā tasya vyāvṛttiviṣayatvaṃ
vācyam | viśiṣṭajñānasya viśeṣaṇajñānajanyatayā kāraṇādhīnasyaiva
viśeṣaṇatāviśeṣasya sattvāt | anyathā vyāvṛttyā'pi samūhālamba
nādaviśeṣāpatteḥ | anyatheti | padi viśiṣṭajñāne vidhirūpayo
rviśeṣaṇaviśeṣyayorbhānaṃ na syāttadā vyāvṛttidhīrapi na syāt ||
raghuº ṭīº | viśeṣaṇaṃ tāvaditaravyāvṛttibodhajanakaṃ viśeṣaṇa
janyā ca viśiṣṭabuddhireveti tasyāmavaśyamitaravyāvṛttirbhāsate ityā
śaṅkate | syādetaditi | vyavacchedakatvaṃ viśeṣaṇatvaṃ, viśeṣaṇaṃ hi
nāgṛhītaṃ nāpyagṛhītaviśeṣyasambandhamanyavyāvṛttibuddhimādhatte parantu
viśeṣye gṛhītasambandham, sa eva ca grahoviśiṣṭabuddhistadadhīnā tu
paścāttanītaravyāvṛttibuddhiriti yadyapi tattvaṃ tathāpi vidhisphuraṇa
mātreṇaiva samprati kṛtārthā vayamityāśayavānāha | astu tāvaditi |
avacchedyāvacchedakayorviśeṣyaviśeṣaṇayoḥ | avacchittiritaravyāvṛtti
buddhiḥ ||
na ca niṣedhyamaspṛśatī pratītirniṣedhaṃ spraṣṭumarhati
tasya tannirūpaṇādhīnanirūpaṇatvāt | na ca niṣedhā
ntarameva niṣedhyamitaretarāśrayaprasaṅgāt | parānapekṣa
nirūpaṇe tu vidhau nāyaṃ doṣa iti | tataḥ pratītāvitare
tarāśrayatvamuktaṃ saṅkete sañcārya yatparihṛtaṃ jñānaśriyā,
tadetat grāmyajanadhandhīkaraṇaṃ golakādivat sthānāntara
sañcārāt |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | nanu niṣedhamātrameva bhāsatāṃ kiṃ niṣedhyasyo
tpalāderapi bhānenetyata āha | na ceti | nanu cāgavi mahiṣādau
yā govyāvṛttiḥ gavi ca dhavalādau yā govyāvṛttistayoreva parasparaṃ
viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvo'stu kiṃ vidherniṣedhyatvenetyata āha | na ceti |
evaṃ satyanyonyāśrayāpattistaduktaṃ--
‘siddhaścā'gaurapohyeta goniṣedhātmakastu saḥ |
tadā gaureva vaktavyo nañā yaḥ pratiṣidhyate’ ||
iti | nanu bhāvopi svābhāvaviraharūpa iti tatrāpyanyonyāśraya
evetyata āha | parānapekṣeti | yadyabhāvavirahātmatayā bhāvanirūpaṇa
mavaśyaṃ bhavettadā'yaṃ doṣaḥ syātkintu svarūpeṇāpi bhāvanirūpaṇaṃ
sambhavatyeveti kvānyonyāśraya ityarthaḥ | anyonyajñānādhīnamanyonya
jñānamiti naiyāyikoktamanyonyāśrayamanyonyasaṅketagrahādhīnamanyonya
saṅketagrahaṇamiti chalataḥ sañcārya jñānaśriyā yatsamāhitaṃ tadetadgrāmya
janasya pāmarajanasya vyāmohanaṃ, na tu parīkṣakasya, yathaindrajāliko
guṭikāntarasthāne guṭikāntaraṃ niveśayati | pṛthagjanāstu tādrū
pyeṇaiva pratipadyanta ityāha | tata iti | saṅkete'nyonyāśrayasañcāro
yathā agaurmahiṣādirmahiṣādipadasaṅketagrahādhīnagrahaḥ gauśca gopada
saṅketagrahādhīnagraha iti | asya ca parīhāraḥ gavādirūpārtha
grahādhīnogopadasaṅketagraho na tu mahiṣādipadasaṅketagrahastatropayujyate
yenānyonyāśrayaḥ syāditi | tathā ca kalpitadūṣyadūṣaṇatvāda
nyonyāśrayasya nāpattiritibhāvaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | dūṣaṇāntaramāha | na ceti | yadyagovyāvṛtti
rgopadasyārthaḥ tarhyagorūpapratiyoginirūpyatvādgoragośca goniṣedhā
tmakatayā gonirūpyatvādanyonyāśrayaḥ ityarthaḥ | yadāhuḥ--
‘siddhaścā'gaurapohyeta goniṣedhātmakaśca saḥ |
gaureva sa tu vaktavyo nañā yaḥ pratiṣiddhyata’ iti |
nanu bhāvo'pyabhāvaviraharūpa iti parasparāśrayatvaṃ tathaiva syādityata
āha | parānapekṣeti | abhāvaviraharūpatayā bhāne tathātvepi
gotvādinā vidhirūpeṇa bhāne noktadoṣa ityarthaḥ | ayaṃ cānyonyā-
śrayaśchalena jñānaśriyā parihṛtaḥ evaṃ kila parairanyonyāśraya ucyate
agojñānāttadvyāvṛttirjñeyā agośca mahiṣādipadasaṅketa upajīvyaḥtatra
cāmahiṣādivyāvṛttistatpadārthaḥ amahiṣādiśca gauriti gopada
saṅketa upajīvya ityanyonyapadasaṅketopajīvanenānyonyasaṅketagraha
ityanyonyāśrayaḥ yadvā gopadasaṅketamupajīvya gojñānaṃ tadupajīvanāda
govyāvṛttau gopadasaṅketagraha ityanyonyāśraya iti | tacca na,
gopadasaṅkete hi grāhye'gorūpāṇāṃ mahiṣādīnāmarthānāmevopajīvanaṃ,
na tu tatpadasaṅketasya, nāpyuttarottarānyonyāśrayaḥ na hi gopadasaṅketa
upajīvyo'pi tu gosvalakṣaṇamevetyādinā, tat hastalāghavena jatu
guḍakasyānyatra sañcāreṇa grāmyajanasya vyāmohanaṃ natvasmākaṃ, arthapratī
tāvevānyonyāśrayasyoktatvāt saṅkete sañcārya taddūṣaṇaṃ kalpitadūṣyarūpaṃ
chalamityarthaḥ | yadvā itthaṃ saṅkete'nyonyāśrayasañcāraṇaṃ apohavādina
iva yasyāpi mate gotvajātimati gopadaṃ śaktamiti vākyāt saṅketa
grahaḥ tasyāpyanyonyāśrayaḥ śābdajñānasya saṅketagrahādhīnatvāt | atha
nānādeśakālānugataṃ sādhāraṇaṃ rūpaṃ puraskṛtya gopiṇḍeṣu vyavahārā
cchaktigraho na vākyādatonānyonyāśrayaḥ, tadā mamā'pyagovyāvṛttyādi
śabdamanapekṣya tadvijātīyāśeṣavyāvṛttau gośabdavācyatāṃ pratipadyata
iti parihāraḥ saṅkete sañcāraṇācchalamityarthaḥ | nanu nā'nyonyāśrayo
niṣedhāntarasyaiva niṣedhyatvāt tasya cā'nādivāsanāvaśādevopasthiteḥ |
na ca tatrā'pi niṣedhāntarameva niṣedhyamityanavasthā | anāditvena
parihārāt | athaikagovyaktyanyonyābhāvo'nyasyāṃ govyaktāvastīti
sā gaurna syāditi yāvadgovyaktyanyonyābhāvavatāmagopadārthatvaṃ vācyam
tāvatāṃ ca pratiyogināmupasthitiryadi gotvatvena tadā'nyonyāśraya
iti cet | na | anādivāsanāvaśādeva tāvatāmupasthiteḥ
abhinavaghaṭādivyakterapi ghaṭatvādinā vāsanāviṣayatvāt | maivam |
anādivāsanāvaśādyāvatpratiyogināmupasthitāvapi pratiyogitā
vacchedakarūpājñāne tāvatāmabhāvānirūpaṇāt | na ca tadakāraṇam
prameyatvādirūpeṇā'pyupasthitānāmabhāvanirūpaṇāpatteḥ | na ca tādṛśī
pratiyogyupasthitistatpratibandhiketi vācyam | nirvikalpātmakaprati
yogyupasthitāvapyabhāvanirūpaṇāpatteḥ | tasmāt pratiyogitāvacchedaka
viśiṣṭapratiyogijñānamabhāvanirūpakamiha nā'stīti kathamabhāva
nirūpaṇam |
raghuº ṭīº | api ca yatkiñciditaravyāvṛttiratiprasaktā
yāvaditaravyāvṛttiḥ yāvaditarānavagatau duravagamā | na ca sarveṣā
mitareṣāṃ prātisvikarūpeṇāśvatvādinā bhānaṃ janmanāṃ sahasreṇāpi
śakyaṃ na vā bhavatāṃ bhāvikamaśvatvādikaṃ tādrapyeṇāpratītānāṃ vā
'gavāṃ vikalpavāsanayāpyupasthāpanaṃ śakyaṃ, meyatvādinā copasthitirna
bhedanirūpaṇakṣamā pratiyogitāvacchedakarūpeṇa pratiyogyupasthitiṃ
vinā tadasambhavāt | yatkiṃcidgavetaratva tu gavāntarasādhāraṇaṃ
gomātretaratvena bhāne ca gotvaṃ bhāvikamanugatamupetavyamityāha |
na ceti | niṣedhyaṃ niṣedhapratiyoginaṃ | atha gavetaretarattvameva
gotvaṃ tatrāha na ceti | niṣedhāntaraṃ gavetaratvarūpaniṣedhaviśiṣṭam |
taduktam--
‘siddhaścāgaurapohyeta goniṣedhātmakaśca saḥ |
tatra gaureva vaktavyo nañā yaḥ pratiṣidhyata’ iti |
saṅketa iti | agovyāvṛttogopadavācya iti vākyādgopadaśakti
rgrāhyā tadvākyapravṛttiśca gopadaśaktigrahādhīnetiyadyanyonyāśrayaḥ tadā
gaurgopadavācyetyatrāpi sa syāt, yadi ca pratyakṣādinopasthite
gotvaviśiṣṭe vyavahārādayaṃ gopadavācya ityādivākyādvā saṅketagraha
iti nānyonyāśrayastadā tathaivopasthite gavetarāpoḍhe tata eva sa
iti sañcāraparīhārau | jñānaśriyā jñānadhanena jñānātirikta
padārthānabhyupagantrā bāhyenetyarthaḥ ||1
sphuratu vidhyalīkamiti cet | na | vyāghātāt |
kiñciditi vidhyartho na kiñciditi cā'līkārthaḥ |
atadrūpaparāvṛttimātreṇālīkatve svalakṣaṇasyā'pyalī
katvaprasaṅgāt | rūpamātraparāvṛttau tu kathaṃ vidhirnāma |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | tadatra dharmottarasya mataṃ śaṅkate | sphuratviti | yadāha
‘asatyarūpamādarśayan vikalpaḥ kathaṃ bāhyasadṛśamādarśayet tayoratyanta
vaidharmyā’diti | vidhyalīkamiti hi karmadhārayo'tra vivakṣitaḥ |
tathā ca vidhitvamalīkatvaṃ ca naikatra sambhavati, kiñcittvaṃ hi
vidhitvamakiñcittvaṃ hyalīkatvamiti pariharati | na vyāghātāditi |
nanu gotvamagovyāvṛttiriti kṛtvā'līkamityucyate | vyavahārabalāttu
jñānaśriyetyādyārabhya bāhyenetyartha ityantaḥ pāṭhaḥ pustakāntare
nāsti |
vidhirevātovidhyalīkatvaṃ na viruddhamityata āha | atadrūpeti |
svalakṣaṇasyāpyatadrūpaparāvṛttisambandhādalīkatvameva prasajyata ityarthaḥ |
nanu svalakṣaṇe'tadrūpaparāvṛttitvaṃ gotvādikaṃ tu rūpamātraparā
vṛttiriti kathaṃ svalakṣaṇasyālīkatvamityata āha | rūpamātreti |
svalakṣaṇādetāvatā bhedepi punaḥ pūrvokta eva vyāghātaḥ na hyekaṃ
niḥsvarūpaṃ sasvarūpaṃ cetyarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | nanu vidhirūpamalīkaṃ vikalpagocaraḥ | tathā
ca vidhitvenā'nyānapekṣanirūpaṇatayā nānyonyāśrayaḥ alīkatvena ca
vyāvṛttivyavahārāspadatvamityanyaḥ śaṅkate | sphuratviti | paramārthato
vidhiśca tadalīkaṃ ceti na sambhavati viruddharūpadvayasyaikatrābhāvāditi
pariharati | vyāghātāditi | tadeva sphuṭayati | kiñciditi |
nanu svarūpaviśeṣavyāvṛttyā'līkatvaṃ vidhitvena vyavahāraviṣayatayā ca
vidhitvamiti tayoravirodhaḥ syādityata āha | atadrūpeti |
svalakṣaṇe'pi svarūpaviśeṣavyāvṛttisattvādityarthaḥ | nanu tatra na
svarūpamātravyāvṛttiḥ svato'pi svarūpatvāt, gotve tu svarūpamātra
vyāvṛttiriti vaiṣamyamityata āha | rūpamātreti ||
raghuº ṭīº | vidhyalīkamiti ko'rthaḥ ? kiṃ vidhisvarūpama
līkaṃ kiṃ vidhitvenāropitaṃ kiṃ vā'gṛhītavyaktibhedakamiti |
ādya āha | vyāghātāditi | - - rūpavyāvṛttyā anugatasya
vidheralīkatvamiti cet | kimatadrūpavyāvṛttyā rūpamātravyāvṛttyā
vā | ādye ataditi | dvitīye rūpamātreti ||
vidhyaṃśasyāropitatvādayameva doṣa iti cet | na |
svalakṣaṇavidhervikalpāsaṃsparśāt sāmānyavidheranupaga
māt pariśeṣādalīkavidhau virodhasyaiva sthiteḥ |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | nanvalīke vidhitvamāropitaṃ sphuratīti vidhya
līkamiti brūma iti kuto virodha iti śaṅkate | vidhyaṃśasyeti |
alīke svalakṣaṇasya vidherāśaṅkā na sambhavati | āropo hi
vikalpastatra ca svalakṣaṇasphuraṇaṃ tvayā neṣyate | sāmānyaṃ yadgotvādi
sa eva vidhistatrāropyata ityapi nāsti | sāmānyavidhestva
yā'naṅgīkārāt | tathā cālīkameva vidhirityāyātaṃ, tatra ca
virodha ukta eveti pariharati | svalakṣaṇeti ||
bhagīº ṭīº | nanu paramārthālīke vidhitvamāropitamityeva
vidhyalīkamityasyā'rtha ityāha | vidhyaṃśasyeti | āropitaṃ tatra
tadvidhitvam tatsvalakṣaṇarūpaṃ vā sāmānyarūpaṃ vā | ādye svalakṣaṇa
vidheriti | antye sāmānyeti | tathā ca vidhitvasyāropābhāvāt
paramārthato vidhiścālīkaṃ ceti vivakṣitamevaṃ ca vyāghāta ityata
āha | pariśeṣāditi ||
raghuº ṭīº | dvitīyaṃ śaṅkate | vidhyaṃśasyeti | svalakṣaṇarūpo
vidhirāropyate sāmānyarūpo vā | ādye svalakṣaṇavidheriti |
tava mata iti śeṣaḥ | dvitīye sāmanyoti | na hi kvacidapi
kaścitsāmānyarūpo vidhirupeyate bhavatā ya ihāropyeta iti |
tathā cāropāsambhavādalīke bhāsamānaṃ tadīyameva vidhitvaṃ vācyam,
tathā ca virodha evetyāha | pariśeṣāditi ||
bhedāgrahādvidhivyavahāramātramiti cet | sambhave
dapyetat1 yadi svalakṣaṇamapi vidhitvamapahāya sphuret
yadi cālīkamapi niṣedharūpatāṃ parihṛtya prakāśeta |
na caivam | ubhayorapi niraṃśatayā prakārāntaramupā
dāyāprathanāt aprathamānarūpāsambhavācca | kālpa
nikasyāṃ2śāṃśibhāvasyāta eva mūla eva nihitaḥ
kuṭhāraḥ |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | nanu svalakṣaṇavidherāropaṃ na brūmo yena vikalpe
tatsphuraṇaṃ syādapi tu tadbhedāgrahamātraṃ brūma iti śaṅkate | bhedā
grahāditi | bhedāgraho vidhyalīkayostadā bhavet yadi vidhi
rvidhitvena na sphuredalīkaṃ vā tattvena | tathā ca na sambhavati
dvayorapi tatvenaiva sphuraṇāt | na hi śuktitvenaiva bhāsamānāyāḥ śukte
bhavedevamiti pāṭhaḥ śaṅkaramiśrasammataḥ | sambhavedapyevamiti pāṭho
bhagīrathaṭhakkurasammataḥ |
kālpanikasyāpīti bhagīrathaṭhakkurasammataḥ pāṭhaḥ |
rajatabhedāgrahaḥ sambhavati vyavahāropayogī ceti pariharati | bhave
devamiti | niraṃśatayā nirdharmakatayā | prakārāntaraṃ svarūpātiriktaṃ
prakāram | nanu yaḥ prakāro na bhāsate tena bhedāgrahaḥ syādityata
āha | aprathamāneti | tatra pramāṇābhāvāditi bhāvaḥ | etacca
paramatenoktam | tena vidhau rūpāntarānabhyupagamāt | alīka
mātraparaṃ vaitat | nanu alīkasvalakṣaṇayoḥ pāramārthikadharmābhāve'pi
kālpanikaṃ dharmamādāyāropa eva syāt | tathā ca vidhervikalpā
saṃsparśepi na doṣa ityata āha | kālpanikasyeti | āropasya
hi mūlaṃ bhedāgrahaḥ sa tu nirastastadā kā''ropasambhāvanetyarthaḥ | na
ca viśeṣadarśane satyapyāhārya evāyamāropaḥ syāditi vācyam | tasya
vyavahārānaṅgatvādvyavahārārthameva hi sphuraṇaṃ cintyata iti bhāvaḥ |
bhagīº ṭīº | nanu mābhūdāropo vidhyalīkayorbhedāgrahā
dvyavahāraḥ syādityata āha | bhedāgrahāditi | mātrapadamāropa
vyavacchedārtham | bhedāgraho vaidharmyāgrahaḥ | tāvanmātraṃ ca na
vyavahārāṅgamiti sādhāraṇarūpagraho'pi taddheturvācyaḥ na ca vidhya
līkayoḥ kiñcitsādhāraṇaṃ rūpamasti yena tayorbhānaṃ syāt |
tathā ca vidhitvālīkatvābhyāmeva tayorjñāne kuto bhedāgrahā - -
- - bhedayorgrahādityāha | sambhavedapyevamiti | niraṃśatayā nirdharma
katayetyarthaḥ | na ca rūpāntareṇāpi bhedāgrahaḥ sambhavatītyāha |
aprathamāneti | yadyapi vidhāvaprathamānamapi rūpaṃ sambhavati tathāpi
svalakṣaṇe yāvanto dharmāstāvatāṃ svalakṣaṇa - - - - - yama iti
vivakṣitvedamuktam | yadvā'līkasyāprathamānapāramārthikarūpābhyupagame
'līkatvavyāghāta ityalīkamātraparamevedam | nanu tayorniraṃśatayā
pāramārthikāprathamānarūpāsambhavepi kālpanikamasambhedamādāya tatprathanaṃ
syādityata āha | kālpanikasyāpīti | aṃśāṃśikalpanāyāmapi
bhedāgraho mūlaṃ sa coktarītyā nirasta evetyarthaḥ | na ca viśeṣa
darśane satyevāhāryāroparūpā kalpanā syāditi vācyam | tathā
satyaprathamānatvavirodhāt kalpanāyā eva tatprathanatvāt - - - - - -
daśāyāṃ ca niraṃśatātādavasthyāt ||
raghuº ṭīº | tṛtīyaṃ śaṅkate | bhedāgrahāditi | abheda
vyavahāro hi vyāvartakena rūpeṇānupasthitayorupasthitayośca sādhāraṇena
bhedāgrahādbhavet na ceha tatsambhava ityāha | sambhavedapītyādi |
niṣedharūpatāṃ vidhivilakṣaṇarūpatām | ubhayorapi | bhavatāmiti
śeṣaḥ | niraṃśatayā nirddharmakatayā | prakārāntaraṃ sādhāraṇaṃ rūpam |
upasthitayorvyāvartakavidhitvaniṣedhatvāgraheṇābhedavyavahāra ityapi
nāsti svatovilakṣaṇatadubhayātiriktayorvidhitvaniṣedhatvayorbhavatā
tatrānabhyupagamāt tava tayornirdharmakatvādityāha | aprathamāneti |
nirddharmakayorapi tayoḥ kālpanikābhyāmeva vidhitvaniṣedhatvābhyāṃ saha
kālpaniko dharmadharmibhāvo bhaviṣyatītyāha | kālpanikasyeti |
aṃśāṃśibhāvo dharmadharmibhāvaḥ | ata eva nityaṃ viśeṣadarśana
grastatvādeva | mūle bhedāgrahe | tadadhīnatvāt kalpanāyāḥ |
athāsatkhyātyupanītasya vidhitvasya niṣedhatvasya ca vidhau niṣedhe ca
grāhako vikalpa eva viśeṣadarśanam atastadvirahadaśāyāṃ bhedāgraho
na viruddhyata iti cenna | tava vidhervikalpāsaṃsparśāt asatkhyāti
nirāsāt gotvādau pratīyamānasya vidhitvasya vāstavatve bādhakā
bhāvācceti ||
sādhāraṇaṃ ca rūpaṃ vikalpagocaraḥ na cālīkaṃ
tathā bhavitumarhati | tasya hi deśakālānugamo na
svābhāvikaḥ1 tucchatvāt | na kālpanikaḥ tasyāḥ kṣaṇi
katvāt | nāropitaḥ2 anyatrāpyaprasiddheḥ |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | prakārāntareṇa vidhisphuraṇaṃ sādhayati |
sādhāraṇaṃ ceti | anugatapratyayo'nugatadharmādhīno na cālīka
manugatamityarthaḥ | bhāvikaḥ svābhāvikaḥ | tucchatvāt | niḥsvabhāva
tvāt | nanu kalpanā saṃvṛttiḥ sā svakīyamanugamaṃ gotvādāvalīke
grahīṣyatītyata āha | na kālpanika iti | kalpanāyā api
saṃvṛtterdeśataḥ kālataścānanugamāt jñānatvena tasyā api kṣaṇika
tvādityarthaḥ | nanu gotvādi yadyapyalīkamananugataṃ ca tathāpyanyatra
dṛṣṭaṃ deśatvānugamaṃ tatrāropayiṣyatītyata āha | nāpyāropita
iti | tādṛśasya kasyāpi tvayā'nabhyupagamādityarthaḥ ||
bhāvika iti śaṅkaramiśrabhagīrathaṭhakkurasammataḥ pāṭhaḥ |
nāpyāropita iti śaṅkaramiśrasammataḥ pāṭhaḥ |
bhagīº ṭīº | dūṣaṇāntaramāha | sādhāraṇaṃ ceti | nānā
deśakālānugatamityarthaḥ | bhāvikaḥ pāramārthikaḥ | tucchatvāt
niḥsvabhāvatvāt | kālpanika iti | kalpanāyā nānādeśa
kālānugamaḥ paramparāsambandhena viṣaye bhāsata iti kalpanaivopādhi
riti vivakṣitaṃ kalpanāviṣayīkṛta iti vā | ādye tasyā
iti | kalpanaiva kṣaṇikatvenānanugatā kathaṃ tadupādhikamanugatatva
mityarthaḥ | antye nā''ropita iti | asatkhyāteśca nirāsā
diti bhāvaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | prakārāntareṇa vāstavavidhisphuraṇaṃ sādhayati |
sādhāraṇaṃ ceti | sādhāraṇaṃ bahutaradeśakālasambaddham | tasya
alīkasya | kālpanika iti ko'rthaḥ ? kiṃ kalpanopādhikaḥ
tathā ca svadharma eva bahudeśakālasambaddhaḥ kalpanayā gotvādau gṛhyata
iti ? athānyadīya evāyaṃ kalpanāyā viṣaya iti | ādyepi
sambandho viṣayitvaṃ vṛttirvā | nādyaḥ gotvādi nānādeśakāla
viṣayakamiti pratītyāpatteḥ | antye tvāha | kṣaṇikatvāditi |
bahukālānavasthāyitvādityarthaḥ | bahukālāvṛttitvāccetyapi draṣṭa
vyam | dvitīyaṃ dūṣayati | nāropita iti | asatkhyāteśca
nirāsāditi bhāvaḥ ||
bhedāgrahādekatvamātramanusandhīyata iti cet | na,
bhāvikasya bhedasyābhāvāt, bhāve vā kālpanikatvasya
vyāghātāt, paramārthāsataḥ paramārthābhedaparyavasāyitvāt
āropitasyāgrahānupapatteḥ, abhedāropānavakāśācca,
āropitāsattvasya paramārthasattvaprasaṅgāt, catuḥkoṭi
nirmuktasya cātiprasañjakatvāt, tadagrahasya trailokyepi
sulabhatvāt | anyatra pāramārthikabhedapratītau kathamabheda
āropyatāmiti cet | evaṃ tarhi yasya pratibhāse
yannāropyate niyamena tasyaivāprakāśe tadāropyam, na tu
taṃnnāmakamātrasya atiprasañjakatvāt | ata eva na
vyadhikaraṇasyāpi sato'sato vā bhedasyāgraho'bhedāro
popayogīti |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | nanu vikalpaviṣayāṇāmalīkānāṃ parasparabhedo
na gṛhyate etāvatā'nugatapratyayaḥ syāditi śaṅkate | bhedeti |
pāramārthikastāvadalīkānāṃ bhedo nāsti yadagrahaḥ syādityāha |
bhāvikasyeti | nanvastu teṣāṃ pāramārthiko bheda ityata āha |
bhāve veti | pāramārthikadharmāśrayatvena vikalpe viṣayāṇāṃ
pāramārthikatvaprasaṅgādityarthaḥ | nanu yathā rajate rajatabhedaḥ
paramārthato'sanneva na gṛhyate tathā vikalpaviṣayāṇāṃ pāramārthi
ko'sanneva bhedaḥ syādityata āha | paramārtheti | yathā rajatasya
tatra paramārthābhedaḥ paryavasyati tathā kalpanāviṣayāṇāmapi
paramārthābhedaḥ syāt | tathā ca siddhaṃ vikalpaviṣayāṇāṃ deśa
kālānugamopi viṣayatvaṃ cetyarthaḥ | nanu vikalpaviṣayeṣu yo bheda
āropitaḥ tasyā'grahaṃ brūma ityata āha | āropitasyeti |
āropaścāgrahaśceti virodha ityarthaḥ | nanu yasya bhedasyāsattva
māropyate tasyāgrahaḥ syādityata āha | āropiteti | asattvaṃ
cedāropitaṃ tadāpi paramārthasanneva bhedastatra syāt tathā ca
punaralīkatvaprasaṅga ityarthaḥ | koṭiḥ prakāraḥ | trailokyeti | tathā
ca sarvatraivānugatapratyayaḥ syāditi bhāvaḥ | nanu ghaṭapaṭādāvatyanta
vilakṣaṇe bhedapratītirevāstyato na bhedāgraho na ca tadadhīnā'nu
gatapratyaya iti āha | anyatreti | pāramārthikabhedagrahaśceda
bhedāropaparipanthī tadā pāramārthikabhedāgraha evābhedāropānuguṇaḥ
syāditi vikalpaviṣayāṇāṃ pāramārthikabhedo'bhyupagantavyo yada
graheṇābhedāropaḥ syāditi pāramārthikadharmakatayā1 siddhaṃ pāra
mārthikatvaṃ vikalpaviṣayāṇāmityarthaḥ | tannāmaketi | avyapadeśya
bhedasyetyarthaḥ | ata eveti | atiprasañjakatvādevetyarthaḥ | na hi
yamajayorbhedo na gṛhyate etāvataiva śuktirajatayorabheda āropyate |
ghaṭasya vā svātmapratiyogiko'sadbhedo na gṛhyata etāvataiva śukti
rajatayorabheda āropyate ityarthaḥ |
bhagīº ṭīº | nanu vikalpaviṣayāṇāmalīkānāṃ bhedāgrahāda
līkatvamātragraha evānugatatvabhānamityāha | bhedāgrahāditi |
alīkānāṃ bhedaḥ pāramārthiko vā pāramārthikāsattāko vā
āropito vā āropitāsattāko vā alīko vā vyadhikaraṇo
dharmavattayā iti 2 puº pāº |
vā | ādye bhāvikasyeti | dvitīye paramārtheti | tṛtīye
āropitasyeti | āropitasyaiva tadgrahatvādityarthaḥ | caturthe
āropitāsattvasyeti | pañcame catuḥkoṭīti | uktacatuḥkoṭyatiriktā
vyapadeśyabhedāgrahādabhedārope trailokye'pyabhedāropaḥ syādityarthaḥ |
nanvalīkabhedāgrahasya sarvatra sambhavepi yatra ghaṭapaṭādau pāramārthika
bhedasyāgrahastatraivābheda āropyate'to yatra tadgrahastatra nābhedāropaḥ
syādityāha | anyatreti | tathā sati pāramārthikabhedasyaivā
graho'bhadāropaheturityalīkabhedāgrahepyabhedāropo na syādityāha |
evaṃ tarhīti | yaditi tādātmyam | ṣaṣṭhaṃ nirākaroti |
ata eveti | ghaṭapaṭayoḥ pāramārthiko bhedaḥ śaśaśṛṅgakūrmaromṇośca
kālpanikoyobhedaḥ tadanayoragraho'pi nābhedāropahetuḥ anya
bhedāgrahādanyatrārope'tiprasaṅgādevetyarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | ananugatānāmevālīkānāṃ bhedāgrahādabhedā
ropeṇānugatavyavahāra ityāha | bhedāgrahāditi | alīkānāṃ bhedaḥ
pāramārthiko vā paramārthāsattāko vā āropito vā āropitā
sattāko vā alīko vā vyadhikaraṇo vā | ādye bhāvikasyeti | bhāve
ceti | tadgatabhedasya pāramārthikatve tasyāpi pāramārthikatvāt asataḥ
sadāśrayatvānupagamāt | dvitīye paramārtheti | tadbhedasya tatrāsattvaṃ
yadi pāramārthikaṃ tadā tatra tadabhedo'pi pāramārthiko yathā
svalakṣaṇe svabhedāsattvasya pāramārthikatve svābhedaḥ pāramārthikaḥ tathā
ca siddhaṃ naḥ samīhitamiti | tṛtīye āropitasyeti | āro-
pitasyaiva tadgraharūpatvāt bhedagrahe cābhedāropānavakāśāt āro
pitabhedasya pāramārthikābhedaparyavasāyitvāt āropyāropaviṣaya
pāramārthikattvamantareṇāropānupapatteḥ | etena kālāntarāropitasya
tadānīmagraha ityapi pratyuktam | caturthe āropitāsattvasyeti |
bhedasya ca pāramārthikatve pratiyogyanuyoginorapi pāramārthika
tvānnālīkatvamiti | pañcame catuḥkoṭīti | koṭiḥ prakāraḥ |
alīkabhedāgrahasyābhedāropahetutve tasya sārvatrikatayā sarvatraivā
bhedāropaḥ syādityarthaḥ | alīkabhedāgrahasya sattvepi pāramārthika
bhedagraheṇa pratibandhānnābhedāropa ityāśaṅkate | anyatreti | tarhi
pāramārthikabhedagrahasya pratibandhakatāyā āvaśyakatve alīkabhedāgrahasya
tathātve mānābhāva ityāha | evamiti | kathaṃ tarhi rajata eva
rajatabhedagrahe na rajatābhedapratyaya iti cet raṅgādau sataḥ pāra
mārthikasya rajatabhedasyāropeṇa pratibandhāditi pratīhi | kūrma
romavājiviṣāṇayoḥ kathaṃ nābhedapratyaya iti cet paramārthasatoreva
romaviṣāṇayorāropitakūrmavājisambandhayoḥ pāramārthikabhedagraheṇa
pratibandhāditi gṛhāṇa | evaṃ śaśaśṛṅgavājiviṣāṇayorapyanusandheyam
asatkhyātau sādhakābhāvasyoktatvāt | ṣaṣṭhe ata eveti | asata iti |
pareṣāmasaddvayabhedasyāsattvāt | vyadhikaraṇasya yasya kasyacidbhedasyā
'graho yadyabhedagrahe hetuḥ tadā tasya sārvatrikatvāt gṛhyamāṇabhedā
nāmapyabhedapratyayaprasaṅgaḥ | atha nikhilānāmeva teṣāmagrahastathā
tarhi yayoḥ kayościdapi bhedagrahe kvāpyabhedapratyayo na syāditi ||
nāpi nyāyādanyāpohasiddhiḥ tadabhāvāt | yad
bhāvābhāvasādhāraṇaṃ tadanyavyāvṛttiniṣṭhaṃ yathā'mūrtatvam,
yaccātyantavilakṣaṇānāṃ sālakṣaṇyavyavahārahetustadanya
vyāvṛttirūpam iti nyāyau sta iti cet | na |
kālātyayāpadeśāt | na hi prathamānasya niṣṭhā nyāya
sādhyā nāma, prathanaśarīraṃ tu cintitameveti niṣphalaḥ
prayāsaḥ | yadā cānalīka eva dhruvaṃ nyāyasyānubhavābhāsaḥ
tadā kaiva kathā'līke | na hi tasyāpratīyamānamapi
kiñcidasti yannyāyena sādhyamityuktam |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | gotvādīnāmanyavyāvṛttirūpatve pramāṇaṃ śaṅkate |
yaditi | bhāvābhāvasādhāraṇyamastināstipratyayaviṣayatvaṃ āśraya
nāśānāśayorapyanāśitvaṃ vā | anyavyāvṛttirniṣṭhā svarūpaṃ yasyetyarthaḥ |
tathā ca gotvamanyavyāvṛttisvarūpaṃ bhāvābhāvasādhāraṇatvāt atyanta
vilakṣaṇānāṃ śabaladhavalādīnāṃ sālakṣaṇyavyavahārahetutvādvā |
sālakṣaṇyaṃ samānalakṣaṇatvaṃ sādṛśyaṃ vā | atrobhayatra bādhamāha |
neti | pratyakṣato vidheḥ sphuraṇasya vyavasthāpitatvāditi bhāvaḥ |
etadevāha | na hīti | yadeti | anauṣṇyasādhakamapi
nyāyamauṣṇyagrāhi pratyakṣaṃ bādhate cettadā alīkasādhakaṃ sutarāṃ
tadvirodhi pratyakṣaṃ bādhiṣyata ityarthaḥ | nanu pratyakṣamapi svaviṣaye
nyāyaṃ bādhatāṃ, viṣayāntare nyāyaḥ pravarttiṣyata evālīkepītyata
āha | na hīti ||
bhagīº ṭīº | bhāvābhāvāsādhāraṇyamāśrayanāśānāśayora
vināśitvamityarthaḥ | niṣṭhā rūpam | yacceti | mitho vyāvṛttānā
manugatavyavahārahetutvamityarthaḥ | ubhayatrāpyamūrtatvaṃ dṛṣṭāntaḥ | bādhaṃ
spaṣṭayati | na hīti | yaddhi yadrūṣeṇa prathate tasya saiva niṣṭhā |
prathanaṃ ca vidhitvenaiveti tādrūpyameva tasyeti niṣedharūpatāsādhanaṃ
dharmigrāhakamānabādhitamityarthaḥ | yadi ca niṣedharūpatayaiva prathanaṃ
tadā tata eva tādrūpyasiddhau vyarthamanumānamiti bhāvaḥ | analīka
syaikena rūpeṇa prathanepi rūpāntareṇā'prathanaṃ sambhavet | alīke tu
tadapi nāsti tat kiṃ nyāyena sādhyamityāha | yadā ceti ||
raghuº ṭīº | vyāvṛttiniṣṭhamiti | niṣṭhā svarūpam |
iti anena prakāreṇa | tenānurūpopanayalābhaḥ | kālātyayāpa
deśāt dharmigrāhakapratyakṣeṇa vidhitvenaivollekhāt | anekarūpa
śālinopi vidheḥ sambhavadapyagṛhyamāṇaṃ rūpaṃ yadānubhavabādhānna
siddhyati tadā kathamasambhavadapyagṛhyamāṇarūpasyālīkasyāgṛhyamāṇa
manubhavabādhitaṃ rūpaṃ setsyatītyāha | yadā ceti ||
kiñcedaṃ bhāvābhāvasādhāraṇyaṃ na tāvadubhayarūpatvaṃ
virodhāt | na taddharmatvamanabhyupagamāt | na hi
gotvamabhāvasyāpi dharma ityabhyupagamyate | na taddharmitvama
naikāntāt | vyaktirapi bhāvābhāvadharmaśālinī na
niṣedhaikarūpeti | na tadubhayasādṛśyamasambhavāt |
atannivṛttyaiva tathātve sādhyāviśeṣāt | nāpyasti
nāstisāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ virodhāt anyathāsiddheśca |
na hi yadasti tadeva nāstītipratyayagocaraḥ syāt |
prakārāntaramāśritya syādeveti cet | evaṃ tarhi tameva
prakārabhedamupādāya vidhivyavasthāyāṃ ko virodho yena
pratibandhaḥ siddhyet | tasya vidhirūpatāyāmasti nāma
1kimadhikamupaneyamiti cet | niṣedharūpatvepi nāsti
nāma ki2madhikamupaneyamiti samānam | ata eva
sādhāraṇyamiti cet | tathāpi kiṃ tadubhayātmakatva
mubhayaparīhāro vetyaśakyametat |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | kiṃ ca nyāyopi vicāraṃ na sahata ityāha |
kiṃ ceti | virodhāditi | na hi ya eva bhāvaḥ sa evābhāva
iti bhavatītyarthaḥ | na hi gotvāderbhāvābhāvobhayadharmatvamasmā
bhirabhyupagamyata ityāha | na taditi | nanu gotve jātitvaṃ varttate
varttate ca guṇādyatyantābhāva ityubhayadharmitvameva bhāvābhāvasādhāraṇyaṃ
syādityata āha | na taddharmitvamiti | anaikāntikatvamāha |
vyaktirapīti | nanu vyakterapi svābhāvaniṣedhātmakattvamastyevetyata
āha | niṣedhaiketi | vidhitvasyāpi tatra sattvādityarthaḥ |
asambhavāditi | bhāvābhāvayorhi sādṛśyaṃ tadubhayavṛttitāyāṃ
astinā kimiti raghunāthaśiromaṇisammataḥ pāṭhaḥ |
nāstinā kimiti raghunāthaśiromaṇisammataḥ pāṭhaḥ |
gotvāderbhavet | nacaitatsambhavatītyarthaḥ | nanu bhāve cābhāve cātadvyā
vṛttirastyeveti tatsvarūpaṃ gotvaṃ kathaṃ tadubhayasādṛśyaṃ na bhavedityata
āha | atadvyāvṛttyaiveti | gotvāderatadvyāvṛttirūpatāyāṃ siddhāyāṃ tathā
syāttadrūpatā ca na siddhetyarthaḥ | kecittu bhāvābhāvābhyāṃ gotvādeḥ
sādṛśyamiti śaṅkārthamāhuḥ | gotve ca na bhāvatvaṃ nāpyabhāvatvamiti
parihārārthaṃ bādhitavantaḥ | taccintyam | astināstisāmānādhi
karaṇyamiti | astināstipratyayaviṣayatvamityarthaḥ | tadubhayapada
vācyatvaṃ vā | virodhameva vivṛṇoti | na hīti | ekasya vidhi
niṣedhapratyayāviṣayatvādityarthaḥ | anyathāsiddhiṃ vivarītumāśaṅkate |
prakārāntaramiti | āśrayanāśānāśaprayuktamastināstisāmānādhi
karaṇyamityarthaḥ | tarhi tadaghaṭitaṃ vidherapi gotvasyāstināsti
sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ nānyavyāvṛttirūpatāsādhanāyāmanyathāsiddhi-1
rityāha | tarhīti | pratibandha iti | yadbhāvābhāvasādhāraṇaṃ
tadanyavyāvṛttiniṣṭhamiti pratibandha ityarthaḥ | tasyeti | sāmānyasya
gotvādeḥ tathā ca gauretāvataivāstitve labdhe'stīti punaruktamityarthaḥ |
nāstīti viruddhamityapi draṣṭavyam | niṣedheti | nāstīti punaruktaṃ
astīti viruddhamiti samānamityarthaḥ | ata eveti | asmādeva
virodhapaunaruktyabhayādityarthaḥ | ubhayātmakatvaṃ bhāvābhāvātmakatvaṃ
ubhayaparīhāro na bhāvatvaṃ nāpyabhāvatvam | aśakyamiti | paraspara
virodhe hi na prakārāntarasthitirityarthaḥ ||
siddheḥ--pāº 2 puº |
bhagīº ṭīº | ubhayeti | bhāvābhāvarūpatvamityarthaḥ | taddharmatvaṃ
bhāvābhāvadharmatvam | taddharmitvaṃ bhāvābhāvarūpadharmaśālitvamityarthaḥ |
asambhavāditi | gotvasya bhāvābhāvābhyāṃ na sādṛśyamasti | na hi
bhāvatvābhāvatve sādṛśyaṃ gotve dvayasyāpyavṛtteḥ | nāpyatannivṛttyā
śrayatvameva tat vyaktāvanaikāntādityuktatvādityarthaḥ | nanu cātanni
vṛttitvamātreṇa tadubhayasādṛśyaṃ syādityata āha | atannivṛttyeti |
gotvasyātannivṛttirūpatvasyaiva sādhyatvādityarthaḥ | sāmānādhikaraṇya
mastināstidhīviṣayatvaṃ tatpadavācyatvaṃ vetyarthaḥ | tadyadyekarūpeṇa
vivakṣitaṃ tatrāha | virodhāditi | atha rūpāntareṇa tat | tatrāha |
anyatheti | anyathāsiddhiṃ sphuṭayitumāha | prakārāntaramiti |
astināstisāmānādhikaraṇyānupapattyā tasya bhāvābhāvarūpatvamityeva
bhāvābhāvasāmānādhikaraṇyamastvityarthaḥ | aśakyamiti | ubhaya
trāpi vyāghātādityarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | ubhayeti | bhāvābhāvāvubhayam | niṣedhaiketi |
svābhāvaniṣedharūpatvepi svato vidhitvāt | sādṛśyam sādṛśya
rūpatvam | asambhavāt | abhāvāvṛttitvena tathātvāsambhavāt ubhayavṛttereva
dharmasya sādṛśyatvāt | bhavedevaṃ yadi gotvaṃ bhāvo bhavet, na tvevam,
kintu gavānyātmakamahiṣādivyāvṛttiḥ, sā ca nirātmake abhāve
gavātmani varttata ityata āha | ataditi | nivṛttyā nivṛtti
rūpatvena | sādhyāviśeṣāt | nivṛttirūpatvasyaiva sādhyatvāt | kecittu
gottvasya bhāvābhāvasādṛśyaṃ na bhāvatvābhāvatvam, asambhavāt | nāpyanya-
vyāvṛttimattvaṃ vyaktāvanekāntāt, nāpyanyavyāvṛttirūpatvam, bhāve
abhāvāt | yadi cābhāvamātrasādṛśyamanyavyāvṛttirūpatvaṃ hetūkuryātta
trāha | sādhyāviśeṣāditītyāhuḥ | astināstisāmānādhikaraṇyam,
tādṛśasya vikalpasya vyapadeśasya vā viṣayatvam, svalakṣaṇa tu na
vikalpasya na vā vyapadeśasya viṣayaḥ, dharmadharmiṇoścābhedo nāto
vyabhicāra iti bhāvaḥ | tadekena rūpeṇa vivakṣitaṃ rūpāntareṇa vā |
ādye virodhāditi | dvitīye anyatheti | virodhaṃ vivṛṇoti |
na hīti | na hi yadyena rūpeṇāstītivikalpavyapadeśayorviṣayaḥ
tenaiva rūpeṇa nāstīti vikalpavyapadeśayorapītyarthaḥ | pratyayaḥ
pratītirvyapadeśaśca pratīyate'neneti vyutpattyā | vidhirūpatve bādhakaṃ
śaṅkate | tasyeti | astina vidhitvabodhakena | upaneyam
vidheyam | tathā cāstīti punaruktam | vidhitvaśūnyatvabodhakaṃ
ca nāstīti viruddhamityapi draṣṭavyam | niṣedhatvam vidhitva
śūnyatvam | apaneyam niṣedhyam | atrāstīti viruddhamityapi
draṣṭavyam | ata eva paunaruktyavirodhābhyāmeva | bhāvābhāva
bodhakāstināstivyapadeśayogyatvameva bhāvābhāvasādhāraṇyamabhāvatva
sādhakam, ekaikavyapadeśāyogyatvenaikaikānyātmakatvaṃ ekaikātmakatva
viraho vā siddhyat, arthādbhāvābhāvātmakatve bhāvābhāvātmakatvavirahe
vā paryavasyet, tacca virodhānna sambhavatītyāha | tathāpīti ||

pādhiniyamo veti sārthakatvaṃ tayoḥ | tadetadvidhāvapi

bhagīº ṭīº | yastviti | govikalpo bāhyasya gorbhāve'bhāve

pratibhāso govikalpo nāśvaviṣayastathā bāhyagorūpaviṣayopi

sādhyasya bādha iti naipuṇam, tasya viṣayanirūpyatayā viṣaya
vidhitvagrahe kasmānna bādha iti tanmanyatā | yadi tadaviṣayatvameva

iti doṣaṃ parijihīrṣurnipuṇammanyo na tu nipuṇaḥ | govikalpa

svalakṣaṇasya vikalpāgocaratvāt, gocaratve vā bādhaḥ, gaurgaurityanu
gatavyavahārahetuttvena pakṣatvamiti yadi tadā tādṛśavyavahāra

śaṅkaº ṭīº | nanu yo vikalpo yatrāstyādiviśeṣākāṅkṣā

kṣitetyata āha | athāstyādīti | govikalpasyāśvagocarākāṅkṣo
tthāpakatvenāśvāviṣayattvaṃ yathā tathā gogocarākāṅkṣotthāpakatvena
gavāviṣayatvaṃ sādhyaṃ tatra govikalpasyāśvagocarākāṅkṣotthāpakattvameva
nāsti yenāśvāviṣayatvaṃ prasādhya taddṛṣṭāntena gavāviṣayattvaṃ setsyatī
tyarthaḥ | etadevāha | na hīti | dṛṣṭānta evāyamanupapannaḥ, sādha
navikalattvaparyavasāyitvāt sāmānyatastadākāṃkṣotthāpakattvasya sādha
nasyaiva tato vyāvṛtterata evāsyāsādhāraṇyamityarthaḥ1 | nanu

meti | gehe goṣṭhe vā gauriti taddharmaniyāmakattvaṃ tadviṣayatayā
vyāptamato virodhāttadaviṣayatāṃ na sādhayatītyarthaḥ | virodhameva
sphuṭayati | na hīti | nanu kathamayaṃ virodha ityata āha |
gojñānasyeti | aśvāviṣayatvenaivobhayasiddhatvenetyarthaḥ2 ||
bhagīº ṭīº | atheti | tatra bhāvābhāvākāṅkṣottthāpakatva

viśeṣā deśakālakṛtā nāstītipadopasandāne niyamyante, tathā

bhagīº ṭīº | pūrvaṃ sadasattvamātrānupadarśakatvaṃ hetūkṛtam,
idānīṃ dharmāntarānupadarśakatvaṃ hetumāha | yanneti | dṛṣṭānte
śabdapadaṃ tajjanyajñānaparam | yadvā bodhanapade bhāvakaraṇavyutpattyā
hetudvaye krameṇa govikalpagośabdau dṛṣṭāntau | nanu gośabda
vikalpayorgotvatvātmakadharmopadarśakatvāddhetvasiddhirata āha | nīla
tvādīti | tadbodhanepi nīlatvāderabodhanamastyeveti yāvattadgata

gotvasya vyāvṛttitvam, tathāpi vikalpatvāt svātiriktapāramārthikā

grāhakamāha | dharmibodhepīti | dharmāṇāmiti nirdhāraṇe ṣaṣṭhī |

grahe sakalopādhiviśiṣṭatadgrahaḥ syādityarthaḥ | tadāha |
ekopakārake grāhye nopakārāstatopare |

sāmagrībhedāddharmibodhepi kasyaciddharmasya bodhepi kasyacidabodhaḥ

śaṅkaº ṭīº | bhedāditi | dharmadharmiṇorbhedādityarthaḥ |
śabdaliṅgābhyāṃ yathā vahne rūpaparimāṇādikaṃ na gṛhyate, kiṃ tu
vahnisvarūpamātraṃ, tathā pratyakṣamapi dharmimātraviṣayamastu, pramāṇānāṃ
tulyapratibhāsasāmānyā1diti bhāvaḥ | śabdaliṅgasvābhāvyaṃ karṇasparśaḥ,
tadvadeva pratyakṣasvābhāvyāpādanaṃ kaṭicālanam | yadvā yāvaddharmāṇāma
grahaṇaṃ karṇasparśaḥ, tadvadeva dharmiṇopyagrahaṇāpādanaṃ kaṭicālanam |
yadvā yāvaddharmaviśiṣṭadharmyagrahaṇaṃ cediti karṇasparśaḥ, tadā vikalpa
kānāmatadvyāvṛttiviṣayatāpādanaṃ kaṭicālanam | yathā śabdaliṅge
upādhiṃ na gṛhṇītaḥ, tathā pratyakṣamapyupādhiṃ na gṛhṇīyādityāpādane
vaiyyadhikaraṇyānmūlaśaithilyamuktvā iṣṭāpādanamāha | tattaditi |
tarkamūlavyāptāvupādhimāha | vicitreti | śaktivaicitryānna tulyā
bhāsaniyama ityarthaḥ | vicitraśaktikatvamevāha | liṅgasyeti |
prasiddho dṛḍhatarapramāṇāvadhārito yaḥ pratibandhastatpratisandhānaṃ
pakṣadharme saiva śaktiryasyetyarthaḥ | samayaḥ saṅketaḥ | saiva sīmā maryādā
tadāyattovikramaḥ pravṛttiryasyetyarthaḥ | arthaśakteriti | tathā cendri
yārthasannikarṣādijanyaṃ pratyakṣamato yāvadbhirupādhibhiḥ sannikarṣastāva
dupādhiviśiṣṭasya dharmiṇo grahaṇaṃ syādevetyarthaḥ | nanu rūpasparśa
saṅkhyāparimāṇādiviśiṣṭasyaiva vahnervyāpyo dhūmaḥ śabdaśca vastugatyā
tāvadupādhiviśiṣṭa eva saṅketita iti tābhyāmapyupādhi2viśiṣṭa
dharmigrahaḥ syādityata āha | natviti | tāvadupādhivaiśiṣṭyena na
sāmarthyā--pāº 1 puº |
tāvadupādhi--pāº 1 puº |
vyāpakatā na vā vācyatetyarthaḥ | yadvā nanu yāvadupādhīndriyasanni
karṣe cettāvatāmupādhīnāṃ grahaṇaṃ tadā sarvopādhiviśiṣṭagrahaṇaṃ
pratyakṣeṇāpādyata ityata āha | na tviti | tatrāpi dṛṣṭānti
kānuvidhānānniyama ityarthaḥ | vyāpakatāvacchedakasya śakyatāvaccheda
kasya vā vahnitvāderupalambha eva liṅgaśabdābhyāṃ vahnirbhāsate iti
tadanupalambhe vā vahnirna tābhyāṃ bhāsatāmiti cet sādhyate tadā
siddhasādhanamityāha | yasyeti | sarveti | kasyāpyupādheranupalambha
ityarthaḥ ||
bhagī ṭīº | eteneti | dharmāṇāṃ bhinnasāmagrībodhyatvavyutpāda
nenetyarthaḥ | ekasya pramāṇasya dharmaviśeṣābodhakatvenānyasyāpi tasya
tadbodhakatvamiti bhrāntirupahāsabījam | na tviti | cakṣuṣā
rūpagrahe, tadgatagatyādigrahaprasaṅgādityarthaḥ | nanvevaṃ dharmadharmiṇorbhedā
dbhinnasāmagrībodhyatvena kadācinnirddharmakasyāpi dharmiṇo bodhaḥ
syāt, na caivam, antataḥ sattvasyāpi grahādityata āha | yasya
tviti | yena karaṇenetyarthaḥ | sarvopādhyanupalambhovetyatra nopalabhyata
ityanuṣañjanīyam ||
raghuº ṭīº | etena dharmāṇāṃ bhinnasāmagrībodhyatvena |
bhedāccedapratītirityanvayaḥ | pramāṇānāṃ dharmibodhakatvāviśeṣe
dharmabodhakatvābodhakatvalakṣaṇo viśeṣaḥ kutastya ityata āha |
vicitreti | pratisandhānaṃ pakṣadharmatāniścayaḥ | arthasya śaktiryogya-
tādiḥ | atiprasaṅgāt rūpādipratītau rasāderapi pratyayaprasaṅgāt |
ekasyeva sarveṣāmapi dharmāṇāmagrahe dharmigrahaṇāpattirata āha |
yasya tviti | yena pramāṇena | yathā gṛhyamāṇe eva rūpe nayanena
dravyaṃ vyāpakatāvacchedake ca liṅgena vyāpakamiti | sa dharmī |
sarvopādhyanupalambhe vā sa nopalabhyata iti yujyate ||
syādetat | yadīndriyeṇa samānaviṣayāveva liṅga
śabdau, tataḥ pratibhāsabhedo'nupapannaḥ | ekaviṣayatvaṃ
hi pratibhāsābhedena vyāptaṃ savyetaranayanadṛṣṭavat dṛṣṭam,
na ceha tathā, yathā hi pratyakṣe cetasi deśakālāvasthā
niyatāni parisphuṭarūpāṇi svalakṣaṇāni pratibhānti,
na tathā śabde laiṅgikavikalpepi | tatra hi vijā
tīyavyāvṛttamiva parasparākārasaṅkīrṇamivāsphuṭamiva
pratyakṣāparicitaṃ kiñcidrūpamābhāsamānamanubhavaviṣayaḥ,
na copāyabhedamātreṇa pratibhāsabheda upapadyate, na hi
pratipattyupāyāḥ pratipattyākāraṃ parivarttayitumīśate, na
caikaṃ vastu dvyākāramiti pratibandhasiddhiḥ | asya
prayogaḥ, yo'yaṃ kvacidvastuni pratyakṣapratibhāsādviparītaḥ
pratibhāso nāsau tenaikaviṣayo yathā ghaṭagrahāt paṭa
pratibhāsaḥ, tathā ca gavi pratyakṣapratibhāsādviparītaḥ
pratibhāso vikalpakāla iti |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | yathendriyaṃ svalakṣaṇaviṣayaṃ, tathā liṅgaśabdāvapi
yadi tadviṣayau syātāṃ tadā pratibhāsāvailakṣaṇyaṃ na syāt atastau
na svalakṣaṇaṃ spṛśata ityāha | syādetaditi | yathetyādinā
pratibhāsabhedameva sphuṭayati | parivarttayitum anyathākarttum | nanu
vastusvābhāvyameva dvirūpamastu bhinnapramāṇapratibhāsaṃ yena syādityata
āha | na caikamiti | pratibandheti | yadbhāvābhāvasādhāraṇaṃ
tadanyavyāvṛttiniṣṭhamiti pratibandhasiddhirityarthaḥ | bhāvābhāva
sādhāraṇatvasyaiva hetoranena prakāreṇa prapañcanāt | asya prayoga
iti | ayaṃ praghaṭṭakārthaḥ, prayogamāropya daśyata ityarthaḥ | etatprati
bandhādhīnaḥ prayogo vetyarthaḥ | vastunīti sphuṭārtham, pratyakṣaprati
bhāsatvāvacchinnādvaiparītyaṃ na vivakṣitaṃ, tena na dṛṣṭāntāsiddhiḥ, anyathā
parapratibhāsasyāpi pratyakṣapratibhāsatvādvaiparītyāsiddherdṛṣṭāntāsiddhiḥ
syāt | gavīti | svalakṣaṇe yaḥ pratyakṣapratibhāso nirvikalpakaṃ
tadviparītaṃ sacikalpakamiti na tasya svalakṣaṇaviṣayatetyarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | nanu yadyena sahaikaviṣayaṃ tattena sahānyūnāna
tiriktaviṣayaṃ, yathā vāmadakṣiṇacakṣurjanye jñāne, indriyeṇa samāna
viṣayau ca śabdavikalpāviti tayorapi tathātvāpattirityāha |
yadīti | pratibhāsabhedaḥ parasparāviṣayaviṣayakatvam | dṛṣṭavadityatra
bhāve ktaḥ | pratibhāsabhedamāha | vyāvṛttamiveti | sajātīya
vyaktīnāmapi mitho vyāvṛttirbhāsata ityarthaḥ | asphuṭamiveti |
asādhāraṇo dharmo na gṛhyata ityarthaḥ | nanu jñānakaraṇabhedādupa-
patsyata ityata āha | na hīti | tāvatā jñāne paraṃ vaijātyaṃ syāt,
na tu viṣayabhedaniyama ityarthaḥ | bhinnakaraṇajajñānayostvayāpya
bhinnapratibhāsatvopagamāditi bhāvaḥ | yo ya iti | vivādapadaṃ
vikalpo na pratyakṣeṇa samānaviṣayaḥ, tenānyūnānatiriktaviṣayatva
virahitvādityarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | samānaviṣayatvaṃ vyāpārānubandhitayā | prati
bhāseti | pratibhāsasya bhedo nyūnādhikaviṣayatvaṃ, tadvirahaścābhedaḥ,
tadvyāpyamityarthaḥ | dṛṣṭavaditi saptamīsamarthādvatiḥ | nayanābhyāṃ dṛṣṭe
nayanayorekaviṣayatvaṃ pratibhāsābhedaśceti | cetasi jñāne | vijā
tīyavyāvṛttamiveti | vyāvarttakagotvādisphūrttāvapi vyāvṛtterasphura
ṇāt | etacca gotvādervidhirūpatāmate | vyāvṛttirūpatānaye tu
vyāvarttakadharmāsphuraṇāt | paraspareti | sajātīyāntarādvyāvṛttera
sphuraṇāt | asphuṭamiti | asādhāraṇadharmāsphuraṇāt | vaiyadhikaraṇyaṃ
nirasyannāha | asya prayoga iti | kvacidvastunīti yatkiñcidviṣayā
pekṣayā nyūnatvasya lābhāya | tathā ca yo yatpratibhāsaviṣaya
yatkiñcidvastvaviṣayako nāsau tadviṣayaviṣayaka iti vyāptiḥ ||
idamapyavadyam | citrācitrapratibhāsābhyāṃ mitho
viruddhābhyāmekanīlabiṣayābhyāmanaikāntāt | na hi
citrādhyakṣe yannīlaṃ cakāsti tadeva paścānna kevalaṃ tadaiva
vā puruṣāntarasya | yenākāreṇaikaviṣayatvaṃ tayorna tenaiva
virodho yena ca virodho na tenaikaviṣayatvam | dharmā
ntarākāreṇa virodho nīlamātrākāreṇa caikaviṣayateti
cet, nanvihāpi dharmāntarākāreṇa virodho gotva
vatpiṇḍamātrākāreṇa caikaviṣayateti tāvanmātranirā
karaṇe'siddho hetuḥ | pūrvatra siddhasādhanam | na hi
śābdalaiṅgikavikalpakāle deśakālaniyamādayopi sarva
eva dharmaviśeṣā viṣayabhāvamāsādayantītyabhyupagacchāmaḥ |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | ekameva nīlaṃ samastacitrapaṭadarśinā citratvena
savṛtāparabhāgapaṭadarśinā cācitratvena pratīyate, pratibhāsabhedepi na
viṣayabheda ityanaikānta ityāha | citrācitreti | yadyapi tatra
nīle'citrabuddhirbhrāntā tathāpi pratibhāsabhedo'styevetyarthaḥ | nanu
citratvācitratvābhyāṃ virodho nīlatvena caikaviṣayateti na tatrānai
kāntikamiti śaṅkate | yeneti | gotvavadvyaktiviṣayatayā samāna
viṣayatvaṃ sādhayāmaḥ prasibhāsabhedaśca deśakālaniyatattvāniyatatva
sphuṭāsphuṭatvādibhiḥ tvadupadarśitairiti tulyamiti pariharati |
nanvihāpīti | tāvanmātreti | śabdaliṅgavikalpānāṃ svalakṣaṇa
viṣayatānirākaraṇe prasibhāsabhedo hetuḥ svarūpāsiddhaḥ, vastuni
sarveṣāṃ samānapratibhāsattvādityarthaḥ | pūrvatreti | deśakālaniyamādiṣu
pratibhāsabhedena bhinnaviṣayattvaṃ yadi sādhyate tadā siddhasādhanaṃ, na
hi ye deśāvacchedāḥ pratyakṣeṇa bhāsante te śabdaliṅgābhyāmapītyarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | pratibhāsabhedo yadi viṣayabhedakṛta eva vivakṣitaḥ
syāt, tadā sādhyāviśeṣaḥ syāditi svarūpata eva sa vācyaḥ, tatrāha |
citreti | na hīti | yadeva citrādhyakṣe nīlaṃ bhātaṃ tadeva kevalamapi
paścāt tasya puruṣasya nīlabuddhau na bhāsata iti nāsti, api tu
tadeva bhāsata ityarthaḥ | kṣaṇabhaṅgamūlikāṃ parasyāsiddhiṃ nivārayati |
tadaiva veti | yadekaṃ nīlaṃ yadekasya nīlabuddhau cakāsti, tadevā
nyasya kevalaṃ tannīlaṃ na cakāstīti netyarthaḥ | yenākāreṇa nīlatvena |
yena virodhaḥ citratvena | dharmāntaraṃ citratvaṃ citravikalpe, kevala
nīlavikalpe ca tadaviṣayatvam | asiddha iti | viruddhadharmāntare
ṇaikaviṣayatvāvirodhāt sandigdhānaikāntikatvena vyāpyatvāsiddho
heturityarthaḥ | nanviheti | yena rūpeṇa virodhastenaikaviṣayatvasya
naiyāyikairanabhyupagamādityarthaḥ | tadeva viśadayati | na hīti |
tathā ca pratyakṣe ye dharmā bhāsante tadaviṣayakatvepi laiṅgikādi
vikalpānāṃ dharmiviṣayatvamaviruddhamiti bhāvaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | pareṣāṃ bhāvānāṃ kṣaṇikatvādāha | tadevetyādi |
yenākāreṇa nīlattvena | yena virodhaścitratvena | athaivaṃ yatpratibhāsa
viṣayayadarthāviṣayako yaḥ pratibhāso nāsau tenārthena tatsamāna
viṣaya iti paryavasitā vyāptiḥ, tathā ca yadi pratyakṣaviṣayagotva
vatpiṇḍāviṣayatvaṃ hetūkriyate tadā svarūpāsiddhiḥ, pratyakṣavacchabdā
divikalpasyāpi gotvavatpiṇḍaviṣayatvopagamāt | pratyakṣaviṣaya
deśādiniyamāviṣayatvaṃ, tadā siddhasādhanaṃ, deśādiniyamenārthena
pratyakṣasamānaviṣayatāvirahasya śabdādivikalpe'smābhirabhyupagamā
dityāha | nanvihāpītyādinā | dharmāntaraṃ deśakālaniyamādi |
tāvanmātraṃ gotvavatpiṇḍākāreṇaikaviṣayatvam | pūrvatra pūrvābhihita
dharmmāntarākāreṇaikaviṣayatāyā nirākaraṇe ||
nanu dharmiṇyeva sphuṭāsphuṭapratibhāsabhedaḥ katham | na
kathañcit | yathā yathā hi dharmāḥ pratibhānti tathā
tathā sphuṭeti pratibhānavyavahāraḥ, yathā yathā ca dharmā
ṇāmapratipatti stathā tatha pratibhānasya māndyavyavahāro
dūrāntikādau pratyakṣepi lokānām, na tu sarvathaivā
pratipattau |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | nanu yadi śabdaliṅgayorapi dharmyeva viṣa
yastadā sa evaikatra sphuṭo'nyatrāsphuṭaḥ kathaṃ bhāsatāmityāha |
nanviti | prakāśaḥ sarva eva sphuṭaḥ, sphuṭāsphuṭavyavahāraśca bahu
tarālpataradharmaviṣayatānibandhana ityāha | na kathañciditi |
etadevāha | yathā yatheti | na tviti | yadi śabdaliṅga
yorddharmiviṣayatā na syāttadā tatrāsphuṭatāpi na bhavedityarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | nanu pratyakṣasya sphuṭapratibhāsatvaṃ dharmiviṣayatvaṃ
tadaviṣayatvaṃ ca laiṅgikādivikalpānāmasphuṭatvamiti tadanyathānupapattyā
teṣāmalīkasāmānyamātraviṣayatvamadhyakṣasya dharmiviṣayatvaṃ ca kalpyata
ityāha | nanviti | ubhayordharmiviṣayatvepi bhūyastaddharmaviṣayatvā
viṣayatvābhyāmeva tadupapatterna tatkalpanamityāha | na kathañciditi |
tadeva sphuṭayati | yathā yatheti | ataeva dharmiviṣayakepi
dūrāntikapratyakṣe sphuṭāsphuṭapratibhāsatvaṃ dṛṣṭamityāha | dūreti |
na tviti | asphuṭatvamiti śeṣaḥ | dharmiṇo'pratītāveva nāsphu
ṭatvamityathaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | pratyayānāṃ sphuṭāsphuṭapratibhāsatvaṃ, na caikārthaḥ
sphuṭo'sphuṭaśca sambhavati, virodhāt, ataḥ sphuṭapratibhāsasyādhyakṣasya
sphuṭasvalakṣaṇaviṣayatvaṃ, asphuṭapratibhāsasya laiṅgikādivikalpasyā
sphuṭālīkaviṣayatvamityāśaṅkate | nanviti | adhyakṣāṇāṃ nīla
pītādyākārabhedavadadhyakṣalaiṅgikayorapi sphuṭāsphuṭapratibhāsatvabhedo
viṣayabheda vinā'nupapanna ityāśaṅkate | nanviti | ityapi kaścit |
dharmiṇyeva ekasminneva dharmiṇi | bahutarālpataradharmmavaddharmiviṣayatvameva
sphuṭāsphuṭapratibhābhatvaṃ, nādhikaṃ, mānābhāvāt, tacca naikaviṣayatva
virodhītyāha | na kathañciditi | pratyakṣe ekaviṣayepi | na
tviti | tadagrāhiṇastatrāsphuṭapratibhāsatvānupapatteriti ||
vidūrādipratyayopi pakṣa eveti cet | astu | na tu
tāvatāpi dharmadharmibhedasiddhau pratyakṣabādhasya tatsandehepi
sandigdhānaikāntikasya vā parihāraḥ, tāvatāpi prati
bhāsabhedasyopapatteḥ |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | pakṣa eveti | tatrāpi sphuṭāsphuṭapratibhāsa
prabhedena saddravyapārthivādipratibhāsabhedena vā viṣayabhedaṃ sādhayiṣyāma
ityarthaḥ | atadvyāvṛttiviṣayatāṃ yadi dūrādipratyayānāṃ sādhayasi
tadā pratyakṣebādha eva, vidhisphuraṇasya sādhitatvāt | viṣayabheda
pratibhāsabhedena dharmiṇorbhede dūrāntikapratyayānāṃ dharmyaviṣayatve sādhye
bādha ityanye | taccintyam | pratibhāsabhedena viṣayabhedamātra
sādhanaṃ tu sandigdhānaikāntikaparāhatam | pratibhāsabhedopi syānna
tu viṣayabheda iti vipakṣabādhakābhāvāt | tatsandehe dharmadharmibheda
sandehe vā bādhasandehe vā ||
bhagīº ṭīº | nanu dūrādisavikalpakānāmapi dharmiviṣaya
tvamasiddhamityāha | dūrādīti |1 yadi dharmadharmiṇorabhedaḥ
syāttadā kiñciddharmābhāne dharmyabhānaṃ syāt, na tvevam, kintu tayo
rbhedaḥ, tathā ca dūrāntikapratyayānāṃ dharmyaviṣayatve sādhye bādhaḥ,
anuvyavasāyena dharmiviṣayatvasya pramiteḥ, bādhasandehepi sandigdhānai
kāntikam, dharmiviṣayakatvepi kiñciddharmāviṣayakatvenāsphuṭatvopa
pattiruktatvādityāha | na tviti ||
raghuº ṭīº | dūradūratarādipratyayā api nāsmākaṃ svalakṣaṇa
sākṣiṇo na vā sākṣātkāriṇaḥ para tvalīkālambanā anādi
vikalpavāsanāsamutthāḥ samāropitasākṣātkārā ityāśaṅkate |
dūrādīti pāṭhamanusṛtyavyākhyātam |
vidūrādīti | pakṣaḥ pakṣatulyakakṣaḥ | natvityādi | yamarthamanva
bhinavaṃ tameva paśyāmīti laiṅgikapratyakṣayorekaviṣayatāgrāhako
'nuvyavasāyo dharmmadharmiṇorabhedāt tattaddharmāgrāhiṇo laiṅgika
pratyathasya dharmiviṣayatvānupapatyā bādhakenāpramāṇīkarttavyaḥ, siddhe ca
dharmmadharmiṇorbhede bādhakābhāvāt pramāṇenānuvyavasāyena bādhitaṃ
laiṅgikādhyakṣayorekaviṣayatvābhāvasādhakamanumānaṃ, yadā tu dharma
dharmiṇorbhedasandehastadā bādhakasandehādāpātato'nuvyavasāyasya prāmā
ṇyasandehepi dūrādipratyayaiḥ sandigdhānaikāntyaṃ tadityarthaḥ | atha
dūrādipratyayā api pakṣakukṣau nikṣipyante ? tadā'prayojakatvamityāha |
tāvatāpīti | dharmmadharmmiṇorabhedasādhakaṃ tu na mānamastītyāśayaḥ ||
yadi ca naivaṃ, dūratamādipratyayeṣu vaḥ samāśvāsa
viṣayaḥ | yasyārtho labhyata iti cet | nanu lābho'pi
pūrvapūrvopalabdhānupamardanenaiva | na hi sattvadravyatvapārthi
vatvavṛkṣatvādikaṃ paribhūya śiṃśapā labhyate |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | yadi ca naivamiti | na viṣayābhedaḥ, kiṃ
tu dūradūratarādipratyayā bhinnaviṣayā evetyarthaḥ | dharmajñānaviṣayasya
prāptireva jñānasamādhīheturityāha | yasyeti | saddravyaṃ pṛthivī
vṛkṣaḥ śiṃśapeti dūrādipratyayā jāyante | tatra śiṃśapālābhepi
sadādīnāṃ lābho'stīti tāvaddharmaviśiṣṭapiṇḍagocarā eva sarve
pratibhāsā na tu viṣayabheda ityarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | yadi ca kramikasaddravyapārthivatvādipratyayānāṃ
prāmāṇyaṃ, tadā samānaviṣayatvameva, athaikasya pramātvam, tadā kasya
taditi nāśvāsaḥ syādityāha | yadi ceti | arthalābhaḥ viṣaya
lābhaḥ | arthalābhopi sarvasyaiva kramikatattatpratyayasyāviśeṣādityāha |
nanviti | pūrvānupamarddamevāha | na hīti ||
raghuº ṭīº | dūratamādau saddravyamityādayaḥ kramikāḥ pratyayāḥ
yadi naikaviṣayā na tarhi sarve pramāṇaṃ, na khalūttarottarapratyayo
llikhitarūparahitaṃ pūrvapūrvapratyayagocaro vastvantaraṃ nāma | athaika
eva pramāṇaṃ, ekatamastatheti kuto nirṇaya ityāha | yadi ceti |
anubhūyamānāyāmanugatākārasya vidhirūpatāyāṃ vikalpasya ca
dharmiviṣayatāyāṃ na kiñcidapi bādhakamastīti bhāvaḥ | bhāvārtha
mabhyupetyāha | yasyeti | artho viṣayaḥ ||
yatrārthakriyāsiddhiriti cet, sarveṣāmanuvṛtteḥ kasyārtha
kriyeti kiṃ niścāyakam | na kiñcit, kintu saṅkī
rṇārthakriyāvirahādekameva tatra vastu, na caikasmin prati
bhāsabheda ityeka eva pratyayastatra sālambana iti brūma
iti cet, tathāpi katama ityaniścaye sa evānāśvāsaḥ |
asaṅkīrṇāpi cārthakriyā na vyaktitaḥ, sāmagrītaḥ sarva
sambhavāt | ataeva na santānataḥ | na hyekasantāna-
niyatā kācidarthakriyā nāma | kāñcidarthakriyāṃ prati
pratyakṣānupalambhagocara eva tathā vyavasthāpyata iti cet,
tarhi dūratamādyupalabdhā api tathā vyavasthāpyāḥ |
sarveṣāmeva teṣāṃ tāṃ tāmarthakriyāṃ prati prayojakatāyā
anvayavyatirekagocaratvāditi |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | patrakāṃḍādiviśeṣalakṣaṇārthakriyā śiṃśapāyā
eveti tallābha evātastatpratibhāsa eva samāśvāsa ityāha | yatreti |
satvādīnāṃ pūrvapūrvapratibhāsaviṣayāṇāṃ cennopamardastadā saivārthakriyā
kasyeti niścāyakaṃ nāstītyāha | kasyeti | yadyapi bahavaḥ prati
bhāsā dṛśyante tathāpyarthakriyā cedekaiva tadā tadviṣaya eva vastubhūto
'nye ca pratibhāsā avastuviṣayā evetyāha | na kiñciditi |
niścāyakamityanuṣajyate | sālambana iti | pāramārthikaviṣaya
ityarthaḥ | sadādipratyayānāṃ katamaḥ pratyayaḥ prametyaniścaye pravṛttya
nadhyavasāya evetyāha | tathāpīti | dūṣaṇāntaramāha | asaṅgīrṇā
pīti | asaṅkīrṇārthakriyayāpi vyaktiviśeṣaniścayaḥ tadā syādyadi
sārthakriyā vyaktiviśeṣamātrādbhavenna tvevaṃ, kiṃ tu sāmagrītaḥ sarva
sambhava ityarthaḥ | nanu tayārthakriyayā ekāṃ vyaktirmā niścīyatāṃ,
santāno niśceṣyata ityata āha | ataeveti | sāmagrītaḥ
sarvasambhavo yata ityarthaḥ | tadeva sphuṭayati | na hīti | na
hyaṃkuropi bījasantānādekasmāt, kintu tatrāpi dharaṇyādisantānā
pekṣāyā darśitattvādityarthaḥ | nanu yadyapi sāmagryadhīnā'rthakriyā tathā-
pyanvayavyatirekābhyāṃ prādhānyenāṅkuraṃ prati bījasyaiva prayojakattvaṃ
gṛhītamiti tayā muktiparyantantadeva vidhīyata1 ityata āha |
kāñciditi | tarhi dravyaṃ pṛthivī vṛkṣaścāyaṃ śiṃśapetyatrāpi
dravyatvena saṃyogaṃ prati pṛthivītvena gandhaṃ prati vṛkṣatvena patrakāṇḍā
dikaṃ prati śiṃśapātvena tadviśeṣaṃ prati anvayavyatirekābhyāṃ kāraṇa
tvāvadhāraṇāt sarve pratyayā yathārthā ityāyātamityāha | tarhīti |
bhagīº ṭīº | yatreti | arthakriyākāritvameva sattvamiti
yasyārthakriyā tadeva sadityarthaḥ | sarveṣāmiti | arthakriyāpi
viśiṣya kasyeti na niścaya ityanāśvāsastadavastha evetyarthaḥ | na
kiñciditi | viśiṣyāniścayepyekameva tatra pramāṇamityāśvāsa
evetyarthaḥ | kintviti | dṛśyamānārthakriyā yadi sarvasya
syāttadā nānārūpā syāt, na ca tathopalabhyata iti yasyaikasyārtha
kriyopalabhyate tadeva sālambanaṃ paramārthasadviṣayakamityarthaḥ | tathā
pīti | sarveṣāmeva sadādipratyayānāṃ tathātvādarthakriyāprayojakatva
miti prāmāṇyerthaviṣayatvamevetyarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | arthakriyākāriṇa eva satvāt yasyārthakriyā
dṛśyate tadviṣayaka eva pratyayaḥ prametyāśaṅkate | yatreti | sarveṣāṃ
sadādipratyayagocarāṇām | na kiñcit, niścāyakamiti śeṣaḥ |
patrakāṇḍaviśeṣādilakṣaṇārthakriyā na sadādeḥ panasāderapi tatpra-
tayārthakriyayā tadeva niścīyata ityata āha |--pāº 2 puº |
saṅgāt kintu śiṃśapāyā evetyasti viśeṣaniścāyakamata āha |
asaṅkīrṇāpīti | na vyaktito naikavyaktimātrāt | tathā ca pūrva
bhāvitvasya niyāmakasahakārisamavadhānasya cāviśeṣāt sarveṣāmeva
kuto na sā'rthakriyeti | yatsantānaniyatā yārthakriyā sā tasyaiva
netarasya, tatsattvepi tadanutpatterityāśaṅkya nirācaṣṭe | ataeveti |
tatsāntānikasatvepi tattatsahakāriviraheṇa tattadarthakriyāviraha
darśanānna niyama iti | anvayavyatirekābhyāṃ vijātīyakāryāṇi
prati vijātīyānāṃ kāraṇānāṃ hetuttve sudṛḍhe sadādeḥ kāraṇatāyāṃ
mānābhāvenāsattvāttadviṣayāḥ pratyayāḥ na pramāṇānītyāśaṅkate |
kāñciditi | nirākaroti | tarhīti | tathā ca vṛkṣaḥ śiṃśapeti
bījaṃ dhānyaṃ śāliḥ kalama iti pratyayā upalabhyamānasāmānya
viśeṣabhāvāpannapatrakāṇḍāṅkuralakṣaṇārthakriyāsadviṣayatayā pramāṇī
bhavanto'bhinnaviṣayatayā'vatiṣṭhanta iti ||
syādetat | na dharmāntarākāreṇa pratibhāsabhedo
bhedahetuḥ kintu parokṣāparokṣarūpatayā | sā hi na
dharmabhedānapyupādāya samarthayituṃ śakyā, teṣṭhapi parokṣā
parokṣajñānodayāt, tatrāpi dharmāntarānusaraṇe'navasthā
nāditi cet |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | pratyakṣāllaiṅgikādivikalpānāṃ pratibhāsabhedā
dviṣayabhedaṃ śaṅkate | syādetaditi | dharmāntarākāramevāha |
parokṣāparokṣarūpatayeti | nanu vastudharmāveva parokṣāparokṣatve, tadvi
ṣayatayā pratibhāso'pi kaścit parokṣaḥ kaścidaparokṣaṃ ityata
āha | sā hīti | sā parokṣāparokṣarūpatā | teṣvapi dharmabhedeṣvapi |
dharmaparokṣatādhīnā cet parokṣatā tatrāparokṣajñānaṃ na syādevetyarthaḥ |
tatrāpīti | parokṣe dharme aparā parokṣatā'parokṣe cāparā parokṣatā
cettadā'navasthetyarthaḥ | tathā ca parokṣāparokṣalakṣaṇapratibhāsabhedā
dviṣayabhedaḥ pratyakṣalaiṅgikādijñānānāmāvaśyaka iti bhāvaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | nanu pratyakṣalaiṅgikavikalpayoḥ parokṣatvāparokṣatva
rūpapratibhāsādviṣayabhedaḥ syādityāha | na dharmāntareti | nanu paro
kṣatvāparokṣatve viṣayasyaiva dharmau, tathā cāparokṣatvadharmaviśiṣṭaṃ pratyakṣasya
viṣayo laiṅgikādestu parokṣatvadharmaviśiṣṭamiti na te jñānadharmā
vityāha | sā hīti | tvanmate teṣvapi viṣayadharmabhedeṣu parokṣā
parokṣajñānotpatteḥ, na ca parokṣatvādāvapi parokṣatvādyantaradharma
svīkāro'navasthiterityarthaḥ | tathā ca parokṣatvāparokṣatvayormitho
virodhāt pratyakṣalaiṅgikavikalpayoḥ pratiniyataviṣayateti bhāvaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | kiṃ tviti | pārokṣyāpārokṣye parokṣāparokṣa
viṣayakatve | na caikaṃ vastu parokṣamaparokṣaṃ ca sambhavati, virodhāt,
tathātve vā tadviṣayakasyaikasya vijñānasya parokṣāparokṣobhayarūpatā
patteḥ | parokṣatvāparokṣatve ca rūpasparśāviva dharmiṇo dharmmabhedau
tadviśiṣṭaśca dharmī parokṣāparokṣayorvijñānayorviṣayo rūpasparśa-
viśiṣṭa iva nāyanaspārśanayorityāśaṅkāṃ nirākaroti | sā
hīti | teṣvapīti | tava mata ityādi | parokṣepi yogināma
parokṣajñānopagamāt aparokṣeṣu ca śābdādiparokṣajñānopagamāt ||
na, tayoraviṣayākāratvāt | dvividho hi jñānadharmo
viṣayāvacchedo jātibhedaśca | tatra viṣayāvacchedabhedena
viṣayasya bhedasthitirabhedanirākaraṇaṃ vā, na tu dvitīyena,
tasya kāraṇabhedenaivopapatteḥ śrutyanumitismṛtivat | yathā
ca viṣayabhedepi kāraṇabhedādevāparokṣajātīyamindriyajaṃ
jñānaṃ tathā viṣayābhedepi kāraṇabhedādeva parokṣāparokṣa
jātīyamindriyaliṅgajñānaṃ bhavat kena vāryate | vāraṇe
vā kāryabhedaṃ prati kāraṇabhedo'prayojakaḥ syāt, tathā
cākasmikaḥ sa āpadyeta | jātibhedo'yaṃ na tūpādhibheda
iti kimatra niṣṭaṅkaṃ kāraṇamiti cet, anubhava eva |
na hi vyavasāyakāle pārokṣyāpārokṣyasmṛtitvānubhūti
tvāni parisphuranti, asāvagnimānayamagnimān so'gni
māniti sphuraṇāt | anuvyavasāyakāle tu tatpratibhāsaḥ,
amumanuminomi imaṃ paśyāmi taṃ smarāmītyullekhāt |
kathaṃ tarhi parokṣo'rthaḥ pratyakṣaśceti vyavahāraḥ | yathā
numito dṛṣṭaḥ smṛta iti |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | pariharati | na tayoriti | parokṣatvāparo
kṣatvayorviṣayāghaṭitatvādityarthaḥ | tadevopapādayati | dvividho
hīti | viṣayāvacchedo viṣayanibandhano yathā ghaṭajñānapaṭajñāna
yorupādhibhedaḥ | jātibhedaḥ kāraṇabhedaprayojyānumititvasākṣātva
vadityarthaḥ | tatreti | viṣayakṛte pratibhāsabhede viṣayabheda eva
tantram, natu jātikṛte, tatra kāraṇasyaiva tantratvāt | yathā tatraiva
viṣaye sākṣākārijñānamānumānikaṃ ca jñānaṃ, tathā tatraiva parokṣama
parokṣaṃ cetyarthaḥ | viṣayabhedepi | ghaṭapaṭādilakṣaṇaviṣayabhedepītyarthaḥ |
viṣayābhedepīti | vahnirūpaviṣayābhedepīndriyādaparokṣaṃ śabda
liṅgābhyāṃ ca parokṣaṃ jñānaṃ syādityarthaḥ | kāraṇeti | kāraṇabheda
paratantro yadi kāryabhedo na syāttadā kāryyavaijātyamākasmikaṃ
syādityarthaḥ | jātibheda iti | parokṣattvāparokṣattvaṃ ca jātibhedo
na tu viṣayakṛta upādhibheda ityatra kiṃ niścāyakamityarthaḥ |
anubhava eveti | anuvyavasāya evetyarthaḥ | tadeva viśadayati |
na hīti | so'gnimāniti smaraṇākāraṃ darśayitvā trayāṇāmapi
jñānānāmanuvyavasāyākāraṃ darśayati ||
bhagīº ṭīº | viṣayāvacchedo viṣayaghaṭita upādhibhedo
yathā ghaṭapaṭajñānayorityarthaḥ | dvitīyena jātibhedenetyarthaḥ |
śrutīti | yathā parokṣaviṣayatve tulyepi śābdatvānumititvasmṛtitva
rūpajñānagatajñānajātibhedaḥ kāraṇabhedādeva bauddhānāṃ tathāyamapī
tyarthaḥ | yathā ceti | yadīdaṃ vairūpyaṃ viṣayabhedamātraprayojyaṃ syāttadā
bhinnaviṣayakaṃ jñānadvayamaparokṣajātīyaṃ na syāditi yathā tatra
viṣayabhedāprayojakatve kāraṇabheda eva prayojakaḥ, tathā viṣayā
bhedepi vaijātye kāraṇabhedaḥ prayojaka ityarthaḥ | ākasmika iti |
idaṃ jñānaṃ yadi tadvijātīyaṃ na syāt tadviruddhakāraṇajanyaṃ na
syādityarthaḥ | upādhibhedo viṣayabhedaḥ | niṣṭaṅko niścayaḥ |
anubhavaḥ, anuvyavasāya ityarthaḥ | na hīti | yadi hi tadviṣaya
dharmaḥ syāt tarhi jñānābhāvepi tadviṣayajñāna eva bhāseta, na ca
tathetyarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | viṣayāvacchedo viṣayaviṣayakatvaṃ | jātibhedo
viṣayāsparśī dharmaḥ, parokṣatvasyānubhavatvasaṅkarāpatyā sākṣātkārī
tarajñānatvarūpatvopagamāt ekasminneva viṣaye śabdaliṅgādirūpa
kāraṇavaijātyāt śābdānumititvarūpajñānānāṃ vaijātyaṃ bhinnepi
ca ghaṭapaṭādāvindriyanayanādirūpakāraṇasājātye sākṣātkāritva
cākṣuṣattvādirūpaṃ sājātyamityubhayato vyabhicārāt jñānavaijātya
sājātyayorviṣayabhedābhedau na tantraṃ kintvanvayavyatirekābhyāṃ kāraṇa
vaijātyasājātye evetyāha | na tu dvitīyenetyādinā praghaṭṭakena |
upādhibhedo viṣayabhedaḥ | asāviti ayamagnimāniti pratyakṣānu
mitiśābdīnāṃ sognimāniti ca smṛtyanumitiśābdīnāṃ mitīnā
mudayācchabdabhedopyakiṃcitkaraḥ ||
yadapyatyantavilakṣaṇānāmityādi, tadapi sandigdhānai
kāntikam, vidhināpi tathābhūtena sālakṣaṇyavyavahārasya
nirvāhāt | tathā hyayaṃ vyavahāro na nirnimitto
nāpyanekanimitto nāpyanekāsaṃsargaikanimittaḥ, ati
prasaṅgāt | tato'nekasaṃsargaikanimitto'yaṃ pariśiṣyate,
tathā ca tādṛśasya vidhirūpatve ko virodhaḥ, yena vyāptiḥ
syāt, pratyuta niṣedharūpatāyāmeva virodho darśitaḥ
prāgiti kṛtaṃ pallavasamullāsaiḥ |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | anumityādidvitīyaṃ parānumānaṃ dūṣayati |
yadapīti | sandigdheti | sālakṣaṇyavyavahārahetutve hetutvepyatadvyā
vṛtti1rūpaṃ māstvityatra vipakṣe bādhakābhāvādityarthaḥ | anyathā
siddhimukhena sandigdhānaikāntikatvameva sphuṭayati | vidhināpīti |
vidhiratra jātiriti vyavasthāpayati | tathā hīti | nirnimittatve
nityatvaprasaṅgaḥ, anekanimittatve cānanugatākāratvaprasaṅgaḥ, aneka
saṃjñaikanimittattve'pi tathetyarthaḥ | tādṛśa iti2 ṣaṣṭhī | vyāptiḥ
syāditi | yadatyantavilakṣaṇānāṃ sālakṣaṇyavyavahārahetustadanya
vyāvṛttiniṣṭhamiti tadupadarśitā vyāptiḥ siddhyedityarthaḥ | pūrvoktaṃ
bādhaṃ smārayati | pratyuteti ||
heturapyatadvyāvṛtti--pāº 1 puº |
tādṛśa iti pāṭhamālambya vyākhyātam |
bhagīº ṭīº | sandigdheti | vipakṣe bādhakābhāvādityarthaḥ |
tadevāha | vidhināpīti | bādhakamāha | pratyuteti ||
raghuº ṭīº |
nāpi pravṛttyādivyavahāranirvāhakatvamapohakalpa
nāyāḥ, anyāvabhāsādanyatra pravṛttāvatiprasaṅgāt | adhya
vasāyādayamadoṣa iti cet | atha ko'yamadhyavasāyaḥ |
kimalīkasya vastudharmatayāvabhāsaḥ, kiṃ vā vastvātmaka
tayā, tato bhedāgraho vastuvāsanāsamutthaṃ veti |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | apohe bādhakāntaramāha | pravṛttyādīti1 |
vastu yadi vikalpe na bhāseta tadā tatra pravṛttireva tato na
syādevetyarthaḥ | anyāvabhāsāditi | vyāvṛttyavabhāsanādvastuni vṛttirna
syādityarthaḥ | jñānasya svaviṣaya eva pravarttakattvamanyathā ghaṭajñānāt
paṭe'pi pravṛttiḥ syādityarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | savikalpakajñānasya pravarttakatvamapi na syāditya
pohe bādhakāntaramāha | nāpīti | jñānasya svaviṣaya eva pravartta-
vyāvṛttyādīti kvacitpāṭhaḥ |
katvāt, anyathā gojñānasyāśve pravṛttyāpatterghaṭādyaviṣayakādvikalpā
ttatra pravṛttirna syādityāha | anyeti ||
raghuº ṭīº | apohamātrāvalambī vikalpo na svalakṣaṇaṃ spṛśa
tīti pakṣaṃ nirasyati | nāpīti | apohaviśiṣṭaṃ svalakṣaṇa
mālambate vikalpa iti mataṃ punaragre nirasanīyam ||
na prathamaḥ, vikalpe tadanavabhāsanāt | na dvitīyaḥ,
asādhāraṇaviṣayatayā śabdavikalpayorapravṛttiprasaṅgāt
tasyāsāmayikatvāt tasmādvikalpavastunoścakṣūrasavat
sarvathā virodha eva, sādhāraṇaviṣayatve tu vastutvāprati
bhāsanam, tasyāsādhāraṇatvāt |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | vikalpa iti | savikalpakattvena tvanmate
vastudharmāgrahādityarthaḥ | grahe vā siddhaṃ naḥ samīhitamiti
bhāvaḥ | apravṛttiprasaṅgāt anutpattiprasaṅgāt | tasyeti |
svalakṣaṇasyetyarthaḥ | ānantyavyabhicārābhyāṃ svalakṣaṇe samayagrahānupapatteḥ
vikalpopyanugatadharmapuraskāreṇa syāt, na ca svalakṣaṇaṃ tatheti bhāvaḥ |
tasmāditi | vikalpasyānugatadharmaviṣayatvādvastunaścānanugatatvā
dvirodha evetyarthaḥ | virodhameva darśayati | sādhāraṇeti |
tasyeti | vastuna ityarthaḥ | tathā ca vastvātmatayā bhānamadhya
vasāya iti yaduktaṃ tadanupapannamiti bhāvaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | vikalpa iti | nirvikalpakamātravedyasya
vastudharmasya savikalpake'navabhāsādityarthaḥ | asādhāraṇeti | svalakṣaṇa
viṣayatayetyarthaḥ | tasyeti | svalakṣaṇasyāsāmayikatvāt saṅketā
viṣayatvāt, tatra deśakālānanugame ānantyavyabhicārābhyāṃ saṅketa
grahasyāśakyatvādityarthaḥ | tasmāditi | tava mate deśakālānanugata
vastubhāne nānanugatibhānaṃ tadbhāne ca nāsādhāraṇavastubhānamityarthaḥ |
avirodhe vā paryavasitaṃ vivādeneti bhāvaḥ | sādhāraṇeti |
nānādeśakālānugatālīkaviṣayatva ityarthaḥ | tasya vastutvasya
svalakṣaṇātmakasyetyarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | vikalpa iti | vastudharmmasya vastvanatirikta
tvādvastvabhāne vastudharmmatvabhānāsambhavācca vastvanavagāhino vikalpasya
na vastudharmmatvāvagāhitvamiti | asādhāraṇeti | vastunaḥ svalakṣa
ṇasyāsādhāraṇattvāttadanatiriktaṃ tattādātmyamapyasādhāraṇaṃ tadviṣayatve
cā'sādhāraṇaviṣayatvaṃ syāttathā ca śabdavikalpayorapravṛttiḥ saṅketa
grahādhīnapravṛttiko hi śabdaḥ saṅketaścānugatarūpamapuraskṛtya svalakṣa
ṇeṣvaśakyo grahītumānantyādviśiṣyānupasthitatvācca | na cānugatasyā
sato rūpasya satā svalakṣaṇena sambandhosti, vikalpopi cānugatama
santaṃ bāhyamākāramālambyaiva pravarttata iti | tasya svalakṣaṇasya |
tasya vastuttvasya vastvanatirekiṇaḥ ||
na tṛtīyaḥ, pravṛttisāmānādhikaraṇyaniyamānupapatteḥ,
bhedāgrahasya sarvatra sulabhatvāt | atebhyo bhedo gṛhīta
iti cet, kimateṣu gṛhyamāṇeṣṭhagṛhyamāṇeṣu vā | nādyaḥ,
ateṣāmapi svalakṣaṇānāṃ vikalpāgocaratvāt | na
dvitīyaḥ, avijñātā1vadherbhedasyāprathanāt, prathane vā'dhya
vaseyābhimatasvalakṣaṇādapi bhedo gṛhyeta, aviśeṣāt |
gṛhītādagraho bhedasyāgṛhītebhyastu tadgraha iti cet,
yadi dharmalakṣaṇo bhedaḥ, tadā viparyayaḥ | svarūpalakṣaṇa
ścet, aviśeṣāt sarvatastadgraho'nyatra tādātmyagrahāt |
niḥsvarūpatvāttasya kva svarūpalakṣaṇo bheda iti cet,
agṛhītādapi tathā syāt, aviśeṣāt | niḥsvarūpa
mapi sasvarūpamiva bhinnamiva prathitamiti cet, tat
kimadhyavaseyāpekṣayā sasvarūpamiva na prathitam, adhya
vaseyasvarūpamiva vā sphuritam | ādye apratipattirvā
syāt, aviśeṣāt, niḥsvarūpapratipattirvā syāt,
ubhayathāpi sāmānādhikaraṇyapravṛttī na syātām |
dvitīyastu prāgeva dūṣitaḥ |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | pravṛttīti | pravṛttiniyamasya śābdasāmānā
dhikaraṇyaniyamasya cānupapatteḥ bhedāgrahāt kutra pravṛttiḥ syāt kutra
anirṇītā iti 1 puº pāº |
vāyaṃ gauriti sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ pratīyeta | aniyame hetumāha |
bhedeti | pravṛttisāmānādhikaraṇyaniyamo jñānaviṣaya eva pravṛtti
ritiniyamo na syādityeke | pravṛttyā saha jñānasya sāmānādhikaraṇya
niyamaḥ samānaviṣayatāniyamaḥ sa na syādityarthaḥ ityanye | nanu
sāmānādhikaraṇyaniyamabhaṅgastadā bhavedyadi govikalpādaśve pravartteta, na
caivaṃ, govikalpo hyagovyāvṛttoyamityākāreṇa jāyamānośvādi
vyavacchedaṃ kurvan kathamaśvādiṣu pravarttayedityāśaṅkate | atebhya iti |
atebhyaḥ aśvādibhyaḥ | ateṣāmiti | vikalpāgocaratvāttebhyo
bhedagraho'nupapanna ityarthaḥ | avijñāteti | pratiyogyasphuraṇe bhedasyā
sphuraṇādityarthaḥ | nanu pratiyogyasphuraṇepi bhedasphuraṇamastu ko doṣa
ityata āha | prathana iti | evaṃ sati gosvalakṣaṇādapi govi
kalpo bhedaṃ gṛhṇīyādityapravṛttireva syādityarthaḥ | adhyavaseyeti |
(san) svalakṣaṇo gosvalakṣaṇaḥ | gṛhītāditi | grahaṇaṃ nirvikalpakaṃ
tadanantaraṃ yatsavikalpakamutpadyate, tadgrahaṇasamānapratibhāsamataḥ sārū
pyādgolakṣaṇādbhedo na gṛhyate mahiṣādibhyastu bhedo gṛhyata eveti
govikalpo gavi pravarttayati | na tu mahiṣamātaṃgādāvityarthaḥ |
svalakṣaṇānyavyāvṛttibhyo grahaṇaviṣayattvasārūpyādbhedo na gṛhyata iti
tatra pravṛttirityanye | tanna | ubhayorgrahaṇaviṣayatvasya pareṇānaṅgī
kārāt | viparyaya iti | apohe tātvikadharmābhāvādityarthaḥ |
yadvā grahaṇaviṣayīkṛte dharmiṇi bheda eva gṛhyate na tu bhedāgraha
ityarthaḥ | svarūpeti | yathā mahiṣādibhyo bhedagrahastathā gosva
lakṣaṇādapi syādevāpohasyevetyarthaḥ | anyatreti | tādātmyagraha eva
bhedagrahe pratibandhakaḥ, sa cāpohasya kenāpi vastunā nāstīti
sarvatra pravṛttirapravṛttirvā syādityarthaḥ | tasyeti | apohasyetyarthaḥ |
agṛhītādapīti | tathā syāditi | bhedāgraha eva syāditya
śvādāvapi sa eva pravṛttiprasaṅgaḥ, na hi tadapekṣayā'poho na niḥsva
rūpa ityarthaḥ | niḥsvarūpamapīti | tathā cāśvādito bhedagraha
eveti tatra na pravarttata ityarthaḥ | tat kimiti | yathā'śvāderbhinna
miva prathitaṃ tathādhyavaseyādgosvalakṣaṇādapi kathaṃ na tathā pratheteti
tadbhedagrahāttatrāpi na pravṛttiḥ syādityarthaḥ | adhyavaseyeti | svalakṣaṇa
svarūpamiva vetyarthaḥ | ādya iti | sasvarūpāprathā cāpratipattau niḥsva
rūpapratipattau ca syādityarthaḥ | ubhayathāpīti | nahyapratipattau gauraya
miti sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ pravṛttirvā tatra bhavatyevaṃ niḥsvarūpapratipattāva
pītyarthaḥ | prāgeveti | svalakṣaṇasya vikalpāsaṃsparśādityuktatvādityarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | pravṛttīti | pravṛtteḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ svaviṣa
yatvamityarthaḥ | yadvā ubhayathetyādyagrimagranthoparodhāt pravṛtteḥ
sāmānādhikaraṇyasya ca śābdasya gaurayamityādirūpasya niyamo na
syādityarthaḥ | na ca bhedāgrahāttadupapattirityāha | bhedāgrahasyeti |
atebhyo goviṣayakajñānajanyapravṛttyaviṣayebhyo'śvādibhyo goviṣaya
vyāvṛtterbhedo gṛhīta evetyarthaḥ | avijñāteti | yadyapi pravṛttya
viṣayasvalakṣaṇānāṃ nirvikalpakāntaravedyatvamastyeva, tathāpi bhedaviṣaya
jñānaṃ pratiyogyaviṣayaṃ na bhavatītyarthaḥ | vikalpe svalakṣaṇa
bhānānabhyupagamāt | gṛhītāditi | gṛhītayoḥ svalakṣaṇānya-
vyāvṛttyorgṛhyamāṇatvarūpasārūpyādagraho bhedasyāgṛhītebhyaśca gṛhya
māṇatvāgṛhyamāṇatvarūpavaidharmyādbhedagraha ityarthaḥ | yadīti | tāttvika
bhedarūpadharmavattvaṃ vyāvṛttāvalīkāyāṃ na sambhavatīti kasyāgraha ityarthaḥ |
aviśeṣāditi | vyāvṛttiviṣayāviṣayasvalakṣaṇayordvayorapyalīkāyā
vyāvṛtterbhedo gṛhyata evetyarthaḥ | anyatreti | tādātmyagrahasya prati
bandhakatvāttata eva tadbhedagraha ityarthaḥ | agṛhītāditi | gotva
vikalpāviṣayādaśvāditopi na tarhi bhedagrahaḥ syādityarthaḥ | niḥsva
rūpamapi | alīkamapītyarthaḥ | bhinnamiveti | aśvādyapekṣayetyarthaḥ |
tat kimiti | adhyavaseyaṃ gotvasvalakṣaṇaṃ tadapekṣayā satsvarūpamiva
na prathitam, tattadaprathanāttatprathanepi niḥsvarūpatayā prathanādvetyarthaḥ |
ubhayathāpīti | yadyapi niḥsvarūpatayā alīke pravrttirnāstyeva,
svalakṣaṇe tu pravṛttistadapekṣayā niḥsvarūpatayālīkasya bhāne svarūpa
lakṣaṇabhedāgrahādeva syāttathāpyaśvāpekṣayā sasvarūpatayā bhānamadhyava
seyāpekṣayā tu niḥsvarūpatayetyatraiva niyāmakābhāvādekarūpatayā
bhāne pravṛttiniyamo na syāditi bhāvaḥ | dvitīyastviti |
svalakṣaṇasya vikalpāviṣayatvādevetyarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | pravṛttīti | pravṛtteḥ śābdasya cedaṃ rajatamityādeḥ
sāmānādhikaraṇyasya niyamānupapatterityarthaḥ | atebhyaḥ adhyavaseyasva
lakṣaṇabhinnasvalakṣaṇebhyaḥ | ateṣāmapīti | na ca nirvikalpakenopa
sthitānyatāni svalakṣaṇānītivācyam, svalakṣaṇāsparśinā vikalpenā
pohāgrāhiṇā ca vikalpena tadubhayabhedasya grahītumaśakyatvāt anupa-
sthitasvalakṣaṇāntare pravṛtterdurvāratvāt ihopavane surasāni sahakāra
phalānītyādivākyānniyataviṣayecchānutpādācca | gṛhyamāṇasā
dharmyādagṛhyamāṇavaidharmyācca jñāyamānatvādapohe gṛhyamāṇebhyo bhedasyā
graho grahaścāgṛhyamāṇebhya ityāśaṃkate | gṛhītāditi | nirākaroti |
yadīti | dharmo'nyonyābhāvaḥ | viparyaya iti | jñāyamānasyaiva prati
yogino'nyonyābhāvogṛhyate nājñāyamānasyetyarthaḥ | jñāyamānatvācca
bhedāgrahe'nadhyavaseyasvalakṣaṇānāmapi tadānīṃ jñāyamānattvāttadbhedā
grahāttatrāpi pravṛttiḥ syādityapi draṣṭavyam | svarūpamadhikaraṇasvarūpam |
aviśeṣāditi | svarūpasya pratiyogiviśeṣāniyaṃtritatvādaniyama
ityarthaḥ | tadātmatayāpratīyamānamadhikaraṇaṃ na tadbhedavyavahāraheturata
āha | anyatra tādātmyagrahāditi | nirddharmmake cālīke na vaidharmyasya
saṃbhāvanā vaidharmyatvena ca tasya bhānaṃ pratiyogyālaṃbanaṃ svarūpabhānaṃ ca
sādhāraṇamiti bhāvaḥ | niḥsvarūpamapīti | anadhyavaseyāpekṣayā
sasvarūpamiva, svarūpaṃ ca bhedo'tobhinnamivetyarthaḥ | ubhayathāpi ajñāne
niḥsvarūpatājñāne ca | śābdasāmānādhikaraṇyapravṛttī niyate na
syātāṃ nahyajñāyamānabhedāgrahaḥ pravṛttyādihetuḥ idaṃ rajatamityā
divikalpasya sattva ivāsatvepi svalakṣaṇeṣu nirvikalpakāt pravṛttyādyā
patteḥ niḥkharūpatayā jñāyamānabhedāgrahepi na tathā, idamalīka
mitijñānādapi tadāpatteḥ | sasvarūpabhānamitikorthaḥ kiṃ svarūpa
vattāmātrabhānaṃ atatsvarūpavattāmātrabhānaṃ vā | nādyaḥ kiṃcidi
tarāpekṣamiti kutoniyamaḥ | dvitīye cātatsvarūpatayā bhāsamāne
kathamatebhyo bhedagrahaḥ śabdāditastvajñāyamāne vikalpaḥ kutoniyamā-
dadhyavaseyāpekṣayā niḥsvarūpamanadhyavaseyāpekṣayā ca svarūpamavagāhate
