apoham | dvitīyastviti | svalakṣaṇasya vikalpaviṣayattvāyogāt ||
nāpi caturthaḥ nīlānubhavavāsanāsamutthasya pītānu
bhavasya nīle pravarttakatvaprasaṅgāt | nānubhavaḥ pravarttakaḥ
api tu vikalpaḥ sa ca yasmāt tasyaiva viṣaya iti cet |
yasmāditi sākṣāt paramparayā vā | prathame śābda
laiṅgikajñānānāmapravarttakatvaprasaṅgaḥ | dvitīye tu sa
evātiprasaṅgaḥ |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | vastuvāsanāsamutpannatvaṃ veti pakṣaṃ dūṣayati |
nāpīti | svavāsanāparipākavaśādupajāyamānaiva sā buddhira
paśyantyapi bāhyaṃ bāhye pravṛttimātanātīti jñānaśriyā yatsamāhitaṃ
tadapi na sambhavatītyarthaḥ | anubhavarūpā vāsanā anubhavavāsanā
tanmate tadatiriktasthāyisaṃskārābhāvāt | tathā ca pītānubhavopi
nīle pravarttayedityāha | nīlānubhaveti | pītānubhavasyāpi
nīlānubhavasamutthatvādityarthaḥ | nīlānubhavo nīlanirvikalpakaṃ,
tacca na pravarttakamapi tu nīlasavikalpaka, tacca nīlānubhavenaiva
janitamatastadviṣaye nīlasvalakṣaṇa eva pravarttayatītyāha | nānubhava
iti | śābdeti | śābdalaiṅgikavikalpānāṃ sākṣānnirvikalpakā
janyatvenāpravarttakatvaprasaṅga ityarthaḥ | sa eveti | nīlānubhavopi
paramparayā pītasavikalpakaṃ janayatīti tasyāpi nīle pravarttakatva
prasaṅga ityarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | vāsanā saṃskāraḥ sthāyī tanmate nāstīti
tajjanyajñānāntarameva vāsanā | tato nīlajñānānantarapītajñānāt
sarvasiddhāt nīle pravṛttiprasaṅga ityarthaḥ | nanu nirvikalpakaṃ na
pravarttakam api tu vikalpaḥ | sa ca yasmādanubhavādutpannastadviṣaye
pravarttayatīti niyama ityāha | nānubhava iti | śābdeti |
parokṣavikalpānāṃ vyāptisaṅketavikalpajanyatvāt tasya ca svalakṣaṇā
viṣayatvāttatra pravarttakatvaṃ na syāt sākṣādanubhavājanyatvādityarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | vastuvāsanā vastugrahajanyaḥ saṃskāraḥ sa cātī
ndriyo vā taduttarabhāvijñānasantāno vā | nādyo bhavadbhistadanabhyupa
gamāt | na dvitīyaḥ nīlagrahajanyapītānubhavajanitapītavikalpā
nnīle pravṛttiprasaṅgāt | atha vastuno grahaṇameva vāsyate aneneti
vyutpattyā vāsaneti cettajjanyo vastugrahaṇasamutthatvena tādṛśavikalpa
tvena vā | ādye nīleti | dvitīyaṃ śaṅkate | nānubhava iti |
yasmāt anubhavāt | tasyaiva viṣaye tadviṣayasāntānike | vikalpa
janakānubhavaviṣayasya cirātītatvāt | pravarttaka ityanuṣajyate |
nirvikalpakapṛṣṭhabhāvinaḥ savikalpakasya sākṣāttvāropamātrasya sākṣā
danubhavajanyatvāt tamupekṣyāha | śābdeti | teṣāṃ ciramatīte
'nubhave saparikaraśabdaliṅgajñānajanyatvāt ||
anubhavavyāpārapuraskārānniyama iti cet | kaḥ pura
skārārthaḥ | na tāvadanubhavaikaviṣayatvaṃ vikalpena tada
saṃsparśāt | nāpyanubhavatvāropaḥ svātmani kalpanā
poḍhābhrāntatvāt viṣaye cābhilāpasaṃsargayogyaprati
bhāsatvāt tathānavabhāse vā vikalpatvavyāghātāt viśe
ṣopalabdhau cāropāsambhavāt |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | nanu nīlānubhavasya vyāpāraṃ nīlavikalpa eva
puraskaroti, na tu pītavikalpaka iti na tasya nīle pravarttakattvaṃ,
kintu nīlavikalpasyaiva tatra pravarttakatvamityāha | anubhaveti |
vyāpārapuraskāraśca janyajanakabhāvavyavasthitaye tvayāpi vācya eveti
bhāvaḥ | tadasaṃsparśāditi | anubhavaviṣayasya svalakṣaṇasyāsaṃsparśā
dityarthaḥ | nanvāropitanīlānubhavātmā nīlavikalpo nīle
pravarttayati, pītavikalpe tu vaidharmyānnīlānubhavatvānāropādityata
āha | nāpīti | anubhavatvaṃ vikalpasvarūpe vā samāropyate
tadviṣaye vā | nādya ityāha | svātmanīti | kalpanāpoḍhatvena
kalpanāvyāvṛttatvenābhrāntatvāt | na hi vikalpaḥ svātmani vastu
bhūte kalpanā, kiṃ tu viṣaye'līke, tathā ca kathamāropa ityarthaḥ |
antya āha | viṣaye ceti | abhilāpasaṃsargayogyo vikalpa1
viṣayo'līkaṃ tatra tvāropo na sambhavati, viśeṣadarśanapratihatatvā
dityarthaḥ | nanu māstu vikalpo'bhilāpasaṃsargayogyapratibhāsa ityata
saṃsargayogyapratibhāsatvādvikalpa--pāº 2 puº |
āha | tatheti | nanu bhavatvabhilāpasaṃsargayogyapratibhāsastathāpyāropa
upapadyatāmata āha | viśeṣeti ||
bhagīº ṭīº | nanu sākṣāt paramparayeti vā na vivakṣitam
kintu yo vikalpo yasyānubhavasya vyāpāraṃ puraskaroti sa tasyaiva
viṣaye pravarttayati, puraskāraśca upādhirūpaṃ dharmāntarameva pravṛttya
nyathānupapattyā kalpyata ityāha | anubhaveti | tadasaṃsparśāditi |
anubhavaviṣayasvalakṣaṇāviṣayīkaraṇādityarthaḥ | āropaḥ kiṃ vika
lpātmani tadviṣaye vā | ādye ātmanīti | vikalpasya svaprakāśa
tayā viśeṣadarśanānnāropa ityarthaḥ | antye viṣayeti | tathā
vidhañcālīkamevetyalīkatvena gṛhyamāṇe viśeṣadarśanānnāropa ityarthaḥ |
na caitadasiddhamityata āha | tatheti ||
raghuº ṭīº | yo vikalpo yasyānubhavasya vyāpāraṃ puraskurute
sa tasya viṣaye pravarttayatīti nātiprasaṅga ityāśaṅkate | anubhaveti |
vyāpāro dharmmaḥ | sa ca svalakṣaṇaviṣayatvamanubhavatvaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ
bhedānavagāhitvaṃ, tacca svarūpato viṣayataśca, ādyamātmano anubhava
bhedānavagāhitvaṃ, dvitīyaṃ svaviṣayasyānubhavaviṣayabhedānavagāhitvaṃ
apārokṣyaṃ svarūpaviṣayatvaṃ sārūpyaṃ ca svalakṣaṇālīkayorekarūpa
śālitvaṃ puraskāraścānubhavatvaprāmāṇyayorāropo'pareṣāmāśrayatvam |
sarvāṇi dūṣayituṃ pṛcchati | ka iti | puraskārārthaḥ puraskā
rāntārthaḥ | tadasaṃsparśāt anubhavaviṣayāsaṃsparśāt | anubhavatvāropaḥ
svātmani svaviṣaye vā | ādyasyāsambhavamāha | svātmanīti |
kalpanāpoḍhaḥ kalpanāvyāvṛttaḥ prameti yāvat | ato'bhrāntatvāt
anāropatvāt gurūṇāmiva bhavatāmapi sarvajñānānāṃ1 svātmanyanu
bhavarūpatvāt | yadvā kalpanāpoḍhatvāt asatkhyātivyāvarttakatvāditi
paramatena | abhrāntatvāditi svamatena | asvaprakāśepi tadakṣateḥ |
dvitīyasyāpi tamāha | viṣayeti | abhilāpasaṃsargayogyaṃ bāhyamalīkaṃ |
mā bhavatu vā vikalpaḥ ātmanyapyanubhavarūpaḥ sambhavatu vā anubhavatvā
ropastatra tadviṣaye vā, tathāpi niyatapravṛttyanupapattiḥ anubhavatvasya
sarvanirvikalpakasādhāraṇatvāt, tatra nīlādyanubhavatvaṃ tu nīlādya
grāhiṇā vikalpena grahītumaśakyamiti ||
nāpi taddharmaprāmāṇyāropaḥ tasyāniyataviṣayatve
pravṛttiniyamānupapatteḥ | paramārthasadviṣayatve ca tasya
vikalpasaṃsargaprasaṅgāt | alīkaviṣayatve cāpravṛtteḥ |
alīkasyānalīkatayā sphuraṇaṃ tu niṣiddham |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | nanvanubhavasya prāmāṇyaṃ vikalpe samāropyate,
tenānubhavaviṣaye vikalpaḥ pravarttayatīti nātiprasaṅga ityata āha |
nāpīti | prāmāṇyasāmānyamāropyate viṣayaviśeṣopahitaṃ vā
prāmāṇyam | ādye tasyeti | viṣayaniyamābhāvāt pravṛttiniyamā
nupapatterityarthaḥ | dvitīye paramārtheti | prāmāṇye hyupadhāyakaṃ
sarvajanānāmiti 2 puº pāº |
vastu vācyaṃ tacca na vikalpe bhāsata ityarthaḥ | nanvalīkamevopa
dhāyakamastu | tathā ca tatprāmāṇyameva tatrāropyatāmityata āha |
alīketi | nanu vikalpaviṣayasyālīkasyānalīkatayā bhānaṃ
pravarttakaṃ syādityata āha | alīkasyeti | analīkatayā pāra
mārthikatayā'līkasya bhānaṃ tadā bhavedyadi paramārthasadviṣayo vikalpaḥ
syāt, tacca tvayā niṣiddhamityarthaḥ | yadvā'līkasya tādrūpyeṇaiva
pratīteḥ kathamanalīkatayā bhānaṃ syādviśeṣadarśanapratihatatvādityarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | taddharmmaḥ tasyānubhavasya dharmaḥ prāmāṇyam tatrā
ropo vikalpa āropa ityarthaḥ | tadapi yatra kvacidāropyate
niyate vā viṣaye | ādye tasyeti | tasya prāmāṇyasya | dvitīye
paramārthasati viṣaye āropo'līke vā | ādye paramārtheti | antye
alīketi | alīke viṣaye tatprāmāṇyameveti pravṛttirnna syādityarthaḥ |
na cālīkasyānalīkatayā bhānaṃ sambhavatītyāha | alīkasyeti ||
raghuº ṭīº | taddharmmaḥ tasyānubhavasya dharmmaḥ prāmāṇyaṃ prāmāṇyā
poho vā tattatsvalakṣaṇātmakaviṣayagarbhaṃ vā tadanyāpoharūpaviṣaya
ghaṭitaṃ vā | ādye tasyeti | tasya prāmāṇyasya | aniyataviṣayatve
viṣayāniyamitatve viṣayāghaṭitatva iti yāvat | pravṛttiniyamānu
papatteḥ gavānyāpohasya sakalagosādhāraṇyavat prāmāṇyāpohasya
sakalānubhavasādhāraṇyāt | tadanyāpohasya taddharmmatvānabhyupagame tu na
tathā taddharmmavattvāropatvasambhavaḥ | tadanyāpohastatsvarūpameveti cet | na |
anubhavāgrāhiṇo vikalpasya tatsvarūpatadanyāpohagrāhitvāyogāt |
dvitīye paramārtheti | paramārthasadviṣayatve paramārthasatsvalakṣaṇātmaka
viṣayaghaṭitatve | tasya svalakṣaṇasya | vikalpeti | tadagrāhiṇastad
ghaṭitaprāmāṇyagrāhivāyogāditi bhāvaḥ | tṛtīye alīketi |
alīkaviṣayatve alīkarūpaviṣayaghaṭitatve | asattvādalīkasyānu
bhavāgocaratvācca tadghaṭitaprāmāṇyasyānubhavādharmmatvādasadgarbhatayā viro
dhena durjñeyatvācca na tadāropātpravṛttyupapattirityarthaḥ | asataḥ sattvā
ropātkhaṇḍaśaḥ prasiddhyā''ropa ityapi nāstītyāha | alīkasyeti ||
nāpyanubhavāt svātmano bhedāgraha eva tadvyāpāra
puraskāraḥ svarūpasya svato'vagateḥ viṣayabhedasya ca
prāgeva nirūpaṇāt | nāpyapārokṣyam tasyāpi svātmani
sarvajñānasādha raṇatvāt | viṣaye ca vikalpasya tada
bhāvāt | tathābhāvepyanyatra niyatapravṛttyanupapatteḥ |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | nanu nīlānubhavanīlavikalpayorbhedo na gṛhyata
eva tāvataiva nīlavikalpo nīlānubhavaviṣaye nīle pravarttayatītyata
āha | nāpyanubhavāditi | atra jñānayorbhedāgrahastadviṣayayorvā |
ādya āha | svarūpasyeti | vikalpasya svaprakāśatayā'nubhavabhedenaiva
grahādityarthaḥ | antya āha | viṣayeti | alīke grahaviṣaye
pāramārthikabhedāsambhavādityādinā dūṣitatvādityarthaḥ | nanu yathā
nubhave'pārokṣyaṃ tathā vikalpepītyeva kṛtvā vikalponubhavaviṣaye
pravarttayatītyata āha | nāpīti | anubhavavyāpārapuraskāra ityanu
ṣajyate | apārokṣyamātrasya1 prayojakatve svātmani sarvavikalpānā
maparokṣatayā sarvaṃ jñānaṃ sarvatra pravartayedityāha | tasyeti | nanu
yathā'nubhavasya viṣayo'parokṣastathā vikalpasyāpīti pravṛttiniyamaḥ
syādityata āha | viṣaye ceti | na hyalīkamaparokṣaṃ nāmetyarthaḥ |
abhyupetyāha | tatheti | naitat pravṛttiniyāmakamityarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | svātmano vikalpātmana ityarthaḥ | yasya yadya
nubhavāt svarūpabhedo na gṛhyate tatrāha | svarūpasyeti | bauddhānāṃ
svaprakāśamaryyādayā svarūpabhedasya svataeva grahādityarthaḥ | atha
viṣayataḥ sa na gṛhyate tatrāha | viṣayeti | alīkasya viṣayasya
pāramārthikabhedāsambhavādityādinā tannirāsādityarthaḥ | nanu
vikalpo'parokṣarūpa ātmāṃśe'parokṣarūpānubhavaviṣaye pravarttayatīti
niyamaḥ syādityata āha | nāpīti | anubhavavyāpārapuraskāra
ityanuṣajyate | ātmani sarvameva jñānamaparokṣamatastena bhedāgraho
pyanyatrāstīti pravṛttyaniyamastadavastha evetyarthaḥ | nanu yenānubhavena
vikalpasya viṣaye sākṣāttvamādhīyate tadviṣaye'nubhavaḥ pravarttayatītyata
āha | viṣaye ceti | sākṣāttvasya viṣayadharmmatvābhāvādanubhavena
tanniṣṭhasyānādhānādityarthaḥ | tathābhāvepīti | sākṣāttvasya viṣaya
dharmmatvepi nānyajñānādanyatra pravṛttiḥ pravṛttau vā na svalakṣaṇa eva
pravartteta pravṛttau vā kadācidalīkepi pravṛttiprasaṅga ityarthaḥ ||
aparokṣa--pāº 2 puº |
raghuº ṭīº | bhedāgraho bhedagrāhitvābhāvavatvam | svarūpasyeti |
anubhavātmano bhedasya svaprakāśatayā svataevāvagamādityarthaḥ |
anubhavāgrāhakatvādvikalpena tadbhedāgrahaṇaṃ tu svalakṣaṇāntarānubhava
sādhāraṇam | apārokṣyaṃ apārokṣyavattvam ||
nāpi viṣayasārūpyaṃ | tadabhāvāt | kā hi para
mārthasadalīkayoḥ samānarūpatā nāma | yadi rūpaśabdo
dharmmivācakaḥ samānaśabdaścaikaparyyāyaḥ kvārthasaṅgatiḥ
prakṛte | yadi vā rūpaṃ dharmmaḥ samānaścaiko vaikajātīyo
veti tathāpi kvārthasaṅgatiḥ prakṛte | atadvyāvṛttiriti
cet | na | tasya cālīkānalīkaniṣṭhatayā ekatvaika
jātīyatvayorabhāvāt | ābhimānikoyaṃ sārūpyavyava
hāro na pāramārthika iti cet | na | abhimānasyaiva
cintyamānatvāt | na hi cintitaprakārān paribhūyā
paro'bhimāno nāma |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | viṣayeti | anubhavaviṣayavikalpaviṣayayoḥ
sārūpyamapi nānubhavavyāpārapuraskāra ityarthaḥ | sārūpyābhāvameva
darśayati | kā hīti | prameyatvādināpi sā durlabhetyarthaḥ |
na hi vastvavastunoreko dharmī nāpi vastvavastunoreka ekajātīyo
vā dharma ityāha | yadīti | ubhayatrānabhyupagamādevāsaṃgateriti
bhāvaḥ | nanvatadvyāvṛttireko dharma ubhayasādhāraṇa iti kathaṃ nārtha
saṅgatirityāha | atadvyāvṛttiriti | atadvyāvṛttireko vā eka
jātīyo vā dharma ityanuṣajyate | atrāpyanabhyupagamamāha tasyeti |
atadvyāvṛttirūpasārūpyasyetyarthaḥ | tasyā iti pāṭhe vyāvṛtterityarthaḥ |
alīkaniṣṭhatayā naikatvamanalīkaniṣṭhatayā ca naikajātīyatvamiti
sādhyadvaye hetudvayametat | alīkānalīkaniṣṭhatayetyeka eva vā
heturubhayatra | abhimānasyaiveti | abhimāna eva nānāprakāreṇa
vikalpito, na tu tena pravṛttiniyama upapādita ityarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | nanu savikalpakaviṣayālīkena nirvikalpaka
viṣayasvalakṣaṇasya sārūpyaṃ tadvyāpārapuraskāraḥ svalakṣaṇe pravarttaka
mityata āha | nāpīti | keti | na hi svalakṣaṇālīke
kasyacidekasya dharmmāvityarthaḥ | tathāpīti | na hi tayoreka
ekajātīyo vā dharmmaḥ samastītyarthaḥ | nanu cātadvyāvṛttistayoḥ
sārūpya syāt vyāvṛtteralīkatayā'līkadharmmatāyāṃ virodhābhāvā
dityāha | ataditi | atadvyāvṛttiryadi vastudharmmastadā nālīkā
tathātve vā'līkadharmmatvamityāha | tasyā iti | atadvyāvṛtterityarthaḥ |
tasyeti pāṭhe sārūpyasyetyarthaḥ | alīkānalīkatayeti hetudvayam |
na hīti | tatrānupapattiruktaiveti bhāvaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | viṣayasārūpyaṃ sarūpaviṣayakatvaśālitvaṃ | na
hi sadasatoḥ kaścideko dharmī dharmo vā ekaḥ ekajātīyo vā
abhyupeyate ityāha | yadītyādinā | asati vidhervirodhādvidhireva
sadasatsādhāraṇo neṣyate niṣedhaḥ punariṣyate evetyāśaṅkate | atadvyā
vṛttiriti | yadyapi yatkiñcidatadvyāvṛttiratasminnapi, yāvadatadvyā
vṛttistu nālīkepi | tathāpi paramārthasadyāvadatadvyāvṛttirgrāhyetya
doṣaḥ | nirākaroti | tasyā iti | tasyeti pāṭhe tadā dharmma
parāmarṣaḥ | alīkaniṣṭhatayā'nalīkaniṣṭhatayā ca alīkānalīka
niṣṭhayorasatsadrūpayorekatvaikajātīyatvayorabhāvāt | sadasatoḥ saṃsargāna
bhyupagamādityarthaḥ | nīlavikalpaviṣayasyāpi vyāvṛtterapītayāva
dvastuvyāvṛttatvānnīlavikalpasyāpi pīte pravarttakatvaprasaṅgaḥ | uktaṃ
ca anugatatattatpadārthānabhyupagame na śakyamatadvyāvṛttisvarūpanirū
paṇamiti |
svabhāvādeva kaścidvikalpaḥ kasmiṃścidevāsphuritepi
pravarttayati | kimatra kriyatām | sa cāsya svabhāvabhedaḥ
svakāraṇādevāyātaḥ | tatra kaḥ paryyanuyojyatāmiti
cet | tat kimapratyāsanna eva vikalpastatra pravarttayati
pratyāsattyantarābhāvāt svabhāvapratyāsanno vā vyavahṛti
reva vā pratyāsattiḥ | na prathamaḥ atiprasaṅgāt | dvitīye
tu svabhāvenottaraṃ syāt kintu tadeva sphuraṇam | na hi
vyavahāre pravarttayitavye svabhāvapratyāsattimavadhūya jñāna
jñeyayoraparaḥ kaścidviṣayaviṣayibhāvaḥ | sadasadanirvaca-
nīyārthakhyātivādibhirapi svabhāvapratyāsatteravarjjanīya
tvāditi vakṣyamāṇatvāt | tṛtīye tu vyaktamātmāśrayaḥ
1svavyavahāraniyamaṃ pratyeva nimittā2nusaraṇāt |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | pravṛttiniyāmakaṃ jñānaśriyo bījasarvasvamutthāpa
yati | svabhāvāditi | taduktaṃ jñānaśriyā niyataśaktayo hi
bhāvāḥ pramāṇapariniṣṭhitasvabhāvā na śaktisāṅkaryaparyyanuyogabhājaḥ
kāraṇaśakterasadutpattiniyamāditi | nanu svabhāvabheda eva katha
(midṛśa)mityata āha | sa ceti | svabhāvapratyāsatterabhāvā ? dityagre
sambaddham | svabhāvapratyāsattireva jñānaviṣayayorviṣayaviṣayibhāvaḥ |
sasvattva ? iti siddhā vikalpasya vastuviṣayateti siddhaṃ naḥ samīhita
mityāha | dvitīye tviti | na hīti | nanu tadgocaravyavahāra
janakatvameva jñānasya viṣayapratyāsattirityata āha | tṛtīye tviti ||
bhagīº ṭīº | asphuritepīti | aviṣayepītyarthaḥ | kintviti |
svabhāvapratyāsattivāde'smatpakṣapraveśa evetyarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | śaṅkate | svabhāvāditi | nirākaroti |
tatkimityādinā | ekasminneva viṣaye buddhīnāmicchānāṃ kṛtīnāṃ
cotpādāttattadvikalpasya cānanugatatvādanugatakāryasya cānugatakāraṇa
avyavahāra iti 2 puº pāº |
nibandhānusaº iti 2 puº pāº |
prayojyatvādatiriktasvabhāvabhede pramāṇābhāvānna tasyāpyanugatasyānugata
kāraṇamantareṇāsambhavādanubhūyamānasya cāsambhavadbādhakasya vikalpānā
micchādiviṣayaviṣayakatvasyāpalapitumaśakyatvātsamānaviṣayatvenaiva
pravṛttivikalpayoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāva iti siddhāntatātparyasaṅkṣepaḥ ||
kāraṇaśakterasadutpattivanniyama iti cet | satyam |
etaccintanīyaṃ kāraṇaśaktyāpi niyatajātiniyatayā
bhavitavyam | anyathā jvalanavikalpājjalepi pravṛtti
prasaṅgāt |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | nanu yathā pūrvasattvāviśeṣepi daṇḍād ghaṭa eva
jāyate na tu paṭastathā govikalpād gavyeva pravṛttirnāśva ityāha |
kāraṇeti | yathā daṇḍatvāvacchinnasyānvayavyatirekau ghaṭatvāvacchinnaṃ
kāryamanuvidhatte tathā gavi pravṛttiṃ prati vikalpasya jātiprati
niyamastvanmate durupapāda ityāha | kāraṇaśaktyāpīti | niyāmaka
mantareṇa sa evātiprasaṅga ityāha | anyatheti |
bhagīº ṭīº | nanu yathā kāraṇaṃ daṇḍādi kāryeṇa ghaṭādinā
'sambaddhatvāviśeṣe'pi niyatameva kāryaṃ janayati svabhāvāt tathā
jñānamapi niyataviṣaye pravṛttiheturityāha | kāraṇeti | svabhāva
niyamo'nvayavyatirekāvacchedake niyatarūpāvacchede satyeva syāditi
tadviṣayajñānatvenaiva pravarttakatvaṃ vācyamityāha | kāraṇaśaktyeti |
jātipadamanugatadharmmaparam | anyatheti | anvayavyatirekāvacchedaka
rūpāpuraskāra ityarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | niyatajātiniyatayeti | anugatarūpāvacchinna
yetyarthaḥ | anugatakāryasyānugatakāraṇaniyamyatvāt ||
dāhādisamarthākāravikalpajātīyaṃ tāttvike vahnau
pravarttayatīti jātirvopādhirvā niyāmaka iti cet |
na tarhi ratnamarīcinicaye tataḥ pravartteta | tajjātīyasya
daina eva pravarttanasāmarthyāt | tādrūpyeṇa tasyaiva prathanā
diti cet | prathatām | na tu tasya pravarttanayogyatā
tatra prathananiyatā vahnisvalakṣaṇe vahnivikalpādapravṛtti
prasaṅgāt | svīkuru vā tasyāpi tatra sphuraṇaṃ parihara
vā vahnivikalpādavahnau pravṛttimiti |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | nanu vahnirayamityākāravikalpatvāvacchinnameva
vahnau pravarttakam | tādṛśavikalpatvaṃ ca jātirupādhirvetyanyadetat |
na hi tavāpi jātyaiva kāraṇatā'vacchidyate kālākāśadiśāṃ
pratiniyatakāryaṃ pratyakāraṇatāpatterityāśaṅkate | dāheti | tata
iti | vahnivikalpādityarthaḥ | na hi vījādaṅkurasambandhāt
kuñjarotpattiriti bhāvaḥ | evaṃ ratnanicayavikalpāt vahni-
svalakṣaṇepi pravṛttirna syādityapi draṣṭavyam | tādrūpyeṇeti |
vahnitvena tasyaiva ratnanicayasyaiva | prathatāmiti | tvanmate pravṛtti
viṣayaprathanamatantramityarthaḥ | vahnivikalpāditi | vahnisvalakṣaṇa
prathanasya tvayā tatrānaṅgīkārādaṅgīkāre vā siddhaṃ naḥ samīhita
mityarthaḥ | svīkuru veti | seyamubhayataḥpāśā rajjurityarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | nanu dāhādisamarthatvena jñāte pravṛttirnnānyatreti
niyamaḥ syāt paramevaṃ marīcinicayopi tathātvena jñāta evetyāha |
tādrūpyeṇeti | yadyevaṃ tadā tvanmate svalakṣaṇāviṣayakādvikalpāttatra
na pravarttetetyāha | na tviti | tasyāpi vahnisvalakṣaṇasyāpi |
tatra vahnivikalpe | avahnau ratnamarīcinicaya ityarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | vināpi svalakṣaṇaviṣayatvamākāraviśeṣādeva
vikalpānāṃ svalakṣaṇaviśeṣe pravarttakatvānnātiprasaṅga ityāśaṅkate |
dāhādīti | ādipadāt pākādiparigrahaḥ | dāhādisāmarthyaṃ
dāhādyasamarthavyāvṛttirvahnitvam | tatsamartheti ca tattatphalārthina
mapekṣya | satyapi vahnirayamiti vikalpe dāhādisamarthoyamiti
vikalpaṃ vinā dāhārthino'pravṛtterāvaśyakatvātsa eva pravarttaka iti
vādyabhiprāyaḥ | tadākāratā ca bauddhānāṃ mate jñānagata ākārabhedo
jātirūpo'nyeṣāṃ tadviṣayatvam | nirākaroti | na tarhīti | tato
vahnivikalpāt | tatrāpi tasyaiva pravarttakatve marīcivikalpāttadarthī
tatra pravartteta | tasyāpītipakṣe'niyamo mitho vyabhicāraśca | evaṃ
marīcinicayavikalpāttadarthī vahnisvalakṣaṇe na pravartteteti | prathatā-
miti | taditi vipariṇatenānvayaḥ | yadṛcchayā cedam | marīci
svalakṣaṇānāṃ vikalpaviṣayatāyāḥ parairanabhyupagamāt | tasyāpi
vahnisvalakṣaṇasyāpi | tatra vahnivikalpe ||
etenākārasārūpyaṃ niyamaheturapāstaḥ | arthanīya
sārūpyābhāvepi pravṛttidarśanāt anarthanīyasārūpya
mātrasya cātiprasañjakatvāt |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | yaduktaṃ jñānaśriyā pratyāsatticintāyāṃ tadvi
kalpopi vahnerjananākāratvavikalpollekhasyāpi tāvatā tatraiva pravarttana
śaktijananavikalpasya na tu jalādāviti tadatideśena dūṣayati |
eteneti | marīcinicaye tataḥ pravṛttyabhāvaprasaṅgenetyarthaḥ | eta
devāha | arthanīyeti | arthanīyaḥ pravṛttiviṣayatayā iṣṭo ratna
nicayastasya ca vahnivikalpena sārūpyābhāvādityarthaḥ | tathāpi
vahninā vahnivikalpasya sārūpyamastyevetyata āha | anarthanīyeti |
na hi tatra vahniravalambanīyaḥ kintu vahninicaya evetyarthaḥ |
yadvā jvalanavikalpājjalepi pravṛttiprasaṅgādityarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | nanu svaviṣayepi jñānasya pravarttakatve nāti
prasaṅgaḥ yaddharmmaviśiṣṭo'rthastatraiva taddharmmaviśiṣṭajñānasya pravarttakatvā
dityata āha | eteneti | vahnyākārajñānāttatsvarūpe vahnau
pravṛttisambhavepi marīcinicaye pravṛttirnna syāt tatra vahnitvasya
pravarttakajñānasārūpyasyābhāvādityarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | ākārasārūpyaṃ vikalpapravṛttiviṣayayorekā
kāratvam | arthanīyasārūpyaṃ dvayoriṣṭatāvacchedakaikākāraśālitvaṃ |
tadabhāvepi rajatākāreṇa vikalpena rajatārthino raṅgepi pravarttanāt |
anarthanīyasārūpyaṃ iṣṭatānavacchedakaikākāraśālitvam | atiprasañja
katvāt saddravyaṃ rajatamiti vikalpādrajatārthino lauhepi pravṛtti
prasaṅgāt ||
na ca bāhyavāde jñānajñeyayorvivakṣitasārūpyasambhavaḥ
sāmagrīvaiṣamyāt | sāmye vā jāḍyacaitanyayorekaśeṣa
prasaṅgāt | na ca sāmyepyavāntaraviśeṣāt kāryyaviśeṣa
vyavasthā mithaḥ sāmagryananuvidhānena jāyamānatvāt |
na ca kāryyonneyaṃ sāmagrīsāmyaṃ, bāhye dhūmādyanu
vidhīyamānasya kāraṇasya dṛśyatvāt dhūmajñānasya ca
tadvyabhicāropalambhāt | na ca tadeva kāraṇamekatra
dṛśyamadṛśyaṃ cānyatreti yuktam |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | etacca sārūpyamaṅgīkṛtyoktaṃ vastutaḥ sārūpyameva
nāstītyāha | na ceti | vivakṣita iti | pravṛttiniyāmakatveneṣṭa
ityarthaḥ | sāmye veti | abhinnasāmagrīkatvena sarvamajñānaṃ syāt
jñānameva vā syādvaijātyaṃ tu na bhavedityarthaḥ | nanu jñānasukhayoryathā
sāmagrīsāmyepi kiñcitkāraṇabhedādvaijātyaṃ tathā jaḍ.acaitanyayorapi
syādityata āha | na ceti | ubhayorapi prakāśatamasorvilakṣaṇa
sāmagrījanyatvādityarthaḥ | dhūmādyanuvidhīyamānasyeti | dhūmādinānu
vidhīyamānasya vahnyādeḥ kāraṇasya dṛśyatvāt dhūmajñānasya ca vahniṃ
vināpi jāyamānatvāt dhūmadhūmajñānayoḥ kva sāmagrīsāmyamityarthaḥ |
nanu dhūmajñānepyadṛśyo vahniḥ kāraṇaṃ syāditi kathaṃ na sāmagrī
sāmyamata āha | na ceti ||
bhagīº ṭīº | dūṣaṇāntaramāha | na ceti | pravṛttiniyāma
katvenābhimataṃ jñānajñeyayoryat sārūpyaṃ tadvijñānavāda eva sambhavati,
tayoḥ sāmagrīsājātyāt, bāhyavāde tanna sambhavatītyarthaḥ |
sāmye veti | sāmagrīsāmye bāhyajñānayorvaijātyaṃ na syādityarthaḥ |
nanu tayoraikajātyaprayojakādaikajātyepi viśeṣasāmagrīto
vāntaravaijātyamapi syādityata āha | na ceti | aikajātyaprayojaka
sāmagrīsāmyāsiddherityarthaḥ | nanu bāhyatajjñānayoraikajātyātta
tprayojakatvamiṣyata ityata āha | na ceti | bāhye tajjātīyatā
prayojakadṛśyakāraṇavyabhicāreṇa jñānasya na tajjātīyatvamityarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | vijñānavāde jñeyasya jñānābhinnatvātsāmagrī
sājātyāt bādhakābhāvācca jñānajñeyayorākārasāmyaṃ sambhavati na
tu bāhyavāda ityāha | na ceti | na ca jñānajñeyayorekākāratā-
prayojikā kācanānugatānatiprasaktā sāmagrī yena tatsāmyepi
viśeṣasāmagrībhedātkāryabheda ityāha | na ceti | kāryasājātyo
nneyaṃ sāmagrīsājātyaṃ dūṣayati | na ceti | vastuto bāhyabāde
vijñānasya tadviṣayatvātirikte tadākāratve na kiñcitpramāṇa
masti yena tadbalādatīndriyameva kiñcitprayojakaṃ kalpanīya
miti bhāvaḥ ||
yadi ca nīlimādirvijñānasya jātiviśeṣaḥ kathaṃ
tadatipatya jñeyaṃ spṛśet, jñeyasya cet kathaṃ jñānaṃ
tadviśiṃṣyāditi jātisaṅkarāpādanaprastāve cintita
prāyam | tasmāt sphurita eva jñānaṃ pravarttayatīti
gale pādukayāpyaṅgīkārayitavyo gatyantarābhāvāt |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | ākārasārūpyādvikalpaḥ svalakṣaṇe pravarttaya
tītyatra dūṣaṇāntaramāha | yadi ceti | ākāro hi nīlatvaṃ,
tadyadi jñānagatā jātistadā sā jñeye nīle na varttate, jñeya
gatā cettadā jñāne kathaṃ varttatāmiti nākārasāmyamityarthaḥ |
nanūbhayatra varttatāṃ ko doṣa ityata āha | jātisaṅkareti |
evaṃ sati jñānatvānubhavatvasākṣāttvādibhiḥ sāṅkaryaṃ syādityarthaḥ |
prakṛtamupasaṃharati | tasmāditi ||
bhagīº ṭīº | ākārasārūpye dūṣaṇāntaramāha | yadi ceti ||
raghuº ṭīº | jātisaṅkaraṃ sājātye bādhakamāha | yadi ceti ||
tarhi sphurite svākāre eva pravarttayatu, tatra pravṛtta
eva cārthī tatsadṛśamarthamāsādayati prabhāyāṃ pravṛtto
maṇivaditi cet | na | abhimatārthakriyāsāmarthya
virahiṇyapravṛtteḥ | na ca bāhye vikalpākārāropasambhavaḥ
tasya tenāsaṃsparśāt | na cākāre bāhyatvāropaḥ svarūpe
sphuratyasvarūpāropānavakāśāt | prabhāyāṃ tu maṇi
buddhyaiva maṇyarthī pravarttate na tu tadabuddhyeti dṛṣṭāntopyā
bhāsaḥ |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | tadanena praghaṭṭakena śabdaliṅgavikalpānā
malīkaviṣayatvaṃ nirākṛtya ākāro veti sautrāntikamataṃ dūṣayitu
māśaṅkate | tarhīti | vikalpānāṃ prāmāṇyābhimānamupapādayati |
tatreti | saṃvādātpramāṇatvenābhimāna iti bhāvaḥ | pariharati |
neti | arthakriyāsamarthepyarthe'rthakriyārthī pravarttate na tu jñānā
kārastathetyarthaḥ | nanu bāhyerthakriyāsamarthe jñānākārāropātpravṛttiḥ
syādata āha | na ca bāhya iti | bāhyasya tvanmate vikalpenā
saṃsparśāt | nanu jñānākāra eva bāhyatvamāropya pravṛttiḥ syātta
darthakriyāsamarthameva yata ityata āha | na ceti | svarūpa iti |
svaprakāśena jñānākāre sphurati tatra viśeṣadarśanādāropānupapatti-
rityarthaḥ | anyaviṣayajñānādanyatra pravṛttirityatra dṛṣṭāntopi sādhya
vikala ityāha | prabhāyāṃ tviti1 ||
bhagīº ṭīº | tadevamalīkaṃ veti pakṣaṃ nirākṛtyākāro veti
pakṣamutthāpayati | tarhīti | pravṛttisamvādamupapādayati | tatreti |
ākāre yadi jñānavṛttitayā jñāte pravṛttistatrāha | abhimateti |
jñānākārasya na dāhādisāmarthyamiti pramāpayatastadasamarthe tatra
pravṛttirnna syādityarthaḥ | nanu bāhyaniṣṭhatayā svākāre jñāte
pravṛttiriti noktadoṣa ityata āha | na ceti | bāhyasvalakṣaṇasya
vikalpenāviṣayīkaraṇāt, na cāropaviṣayājñāne tatsambhava
ityarthaḥ | na ca jñānākārasya jñānābhinnatayā svaprakāśatve tatrārtha
kriyāsāmarthyamāropyamityapi sambhavatītyāha | na ceti | svaprakāśa
tayā svarūpe viśeṣe jñānatvena sphuratyasvarūpasya bāhyatvasyāropā
sambhava ityarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | iyatā prabandhenālīkaṃ veti pakṣaṃ nirākṛtyā
kāro veti pakṣaṃ nirākarttumutthāpayati | tarhīti | anyatra
pravṛttau kathamanyalābha ityata āha | tatreti | maṇivaditi
dvitīyāsamarthādvatiḥ | nirākaroti | netyādi | sāmarthyavira
hiṇi samarthattvenājñāte | na khalu lokena vahnivikalpaḥ pākādi
samarthattvena jñāto'pi tu bahniḥ | na cākāragṛhītārthakriyāsāmarthya-
prabhāyāstviti--pāṭhaḥ |
bāhyayorabhedāropātpravṛttiḥ | āropo hi bāhye svākārasya
ākāre vā bāhyasya | ādye na ceti | tasya bāhyasya | tena
vikalpena | dvitīye na ceti | ākārākāriṇorabhedātsvaprakāśena
jñānarūpatve gṛhyamāṇe bāhyābhedāropāsambhavāt | vastuto bāhyānu
bhavasya vikalpākārāgrāhitvāt vikalpasya ca bāhyāsparśitvādāropyā
ropaviṣayobhayāgrāhiṇaścāroparūpatvāyogādbāhyānubhavo vā ākāra
vān vikalpo vā vikalpāntaraṃ vā na vikalpākāre bāhyābhedā
ropo bhavitumarthatīti | maṇibuddhyā maṇitvena prabhāyā buddhyā |
tasyāḥ prabhāyā abuddhyā | ābhāsa iti | maṇiprabhāpravṛttamaṇyarthi
samāsādyatvenopanyasto maṇirdṛṣṭānto'bhimatādākārāvabhāsasyaiva
pravarttakatvāt viparīte bāhyāvabhāsapravarttakatve paryavasyannābhāsa ityarthaḥ |
jñānasya svaviṣaya eva pravarttakatayā bhavatāpyabhyupagamāt | atha yathā
bhavatā prabhāyāṃ pravṛttasya maṇiprāptiḥ tathāsmākamapyākāre pravṛttasya
bāhyaprāptirityabhiprāyaḥ, sopi na yuktaḥ, pravṛtto hi maṇiprabhāyāṃ
tatsannidhānāvinābhāvānmaṇimāsādayati, na cākārasya tathā sambhava
iti bhāvaḥ ||
na cākāravāde'sphurato'rthasya sattāyāṃ pramāṇa
mapyasti | ākārakādācitkatvasya taimirikakeśādyā
kāreṇānaikāntikatvāt |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | sautrāntikamate doṣāntaramāha | na ceti |
asphurato'rthasya nīlādeḥ | nanvākārakādācitkatvādeva viṣaya-
siddhiḥ syāt, na hi nīlasannidhānamantareṇa nīlākāraṃ jñānaṃ
kādācitkaṃ bhavet, sarvadaiva tadākārajñānaprasaṅgādityata āha |
ākāreti | kādācitkatvasyāpyākārasyārthavyabhicāradarśanādityarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | jñānasya sākāratvaṃ nirākaroti | na ceti
jñānaṃ hi bāhyamavagāhate na vā | ādye tata eva rajatajñāna
mityādivyavahārādyupapattāvatirikte ākāre pramāṇābhāvaḥ | na hi
jñānaṃ rajatamiti kaścidvyavaharati pratyeti vā, parantu rajatasya
jñānamiti | dvitīye tu na bāhyasiddhiḥ | rajatamidamityādikaṃ
ca jñānaṃ rajatādikamavagāhamānaṃ rajatādisiddhirabhidhīyate |
taccenna tadavagāhi kuto rajatādisiddhiḥ | ākārātkāryātkāraṇasya
viṣayasya siddhiṃ nirākaroti | ākāreti | kāryāddhi sāmā
nyataḥ kāraṇamātraṃ viśeṣataśca gṛhītahetubhāvaṃ siddhyati | ādye na
tena dahanādinaiva bhavitavyaṃ | dvitīye tu vināpi dahanādikaṃ
dahanādyākāravikalpopagamena vyabhicārāt dahanādyaprasiddhyā ca na
kāraṇatāgrahasambhavaḥ ||
arthakriyāsamvādasyāpi sphuritasyākāramātraśarīra
tvāt bāhyasya cāsiddheḥ | nirālambanārthākāravacca
kvacidvāsanāvaśādarthakriyākāropi nirālambana eva
bhaviṣyatīti vipakṣe bādhakābhāvāt pratibandhasyāpya
siddheḥ | tasmādbāhyasiddhiḥ sākāraṃ ca jñānamiti bāla
lolupatvamiti |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | nanu bāhyārthakriyaiva bāhye pramāṇaṃ syādityata
āha | arthakriyeti | arthakriyāyā apyākāraśarīratvādityarthaḥ |
kiṃ ca yadi bāhyaṃ siddhyettadārthakriyāpi pratiniyatā siddhyettadeva
tu nāstītyāha | bāhyasya ceti | na cārthakriyā bāhye pramāṇaṃ
bhavitumarhati, tena taimirikakeśajñānavadarthakriyājñānasyāpi vāsanā
samutthatvenopaplavayituṃ śakyatvādityāha | nirālambaneti | nirā
lambanārthākārastaimirikakeśajñānākāraḥ | pratibandhasyāpīti | artha
kriyākārabāhyayoḥ pratibandhasyāsiddheḥ kathamarthakriyāsamvādena
bāhyārthasiddhiḥ syādityarthaḥ | bāhyasyārthakriyaiva nāstītyapinā
samuccinoti ||
bhagīº ṭīº | nanvarthakriyāviśeṣādarthaviśeṣaḥ kalpyata ityāha |
arthakriyeti | tajjñānasya svākāramātrasamūrttikatayā tatrāpi
mānābhāva ityarthaḥ | anākārā cārthakriyā tvayā nābhyupeyata
ityāha | bāhyasya ceti | nirālambano bāhyārthānāhitaḥ taimi
rikakeśādyākāra ityarthaḥ | kalpanāpi svākāramātraviṣayā nārthaṃ
spṛśatīti na tatopyarthasiddhirityāha | tasmāditi | na cākārasya
sākṣājjñānaviṣayatvaṃ tajjñānajanakatayā bāhyārthenāpi paramparāsambandha
itīyameva viṣayasiddhiriti vācyam | atrāpi mānābhāvāt
vaiparītyāpatteśca ||
raghu ṭīº | mābhūt jñānagatāddahanādyākārāt kāryāddaha
nādisiddhirddāhādestu syādata āha | artheti | sphuritasya
svaprakāśenollikhitasya | bāhyasya dāhādeḥ asiddherdāhādyākāreṇa
vijñānenāgrahaṇāt | na cāgṛhītaṃ liṅgaṃ laiṅgikamanumāpayati |
mābhūdbāhyo dāhādirdahanāderanumāpako jñānākārastu syāt na hi
vinā dāhādikaṃ dāhādyākāraṃ jñānaṃ, na ca vinā dahanādi
dāhādikamata āha | nirālambaneti | nirālambano bāhyāprayuktaḥ |
arthākāro dahanādyākāraḥ | arthakriyākāro dāhādyākāraḥ |
sandigdhānaikāntikatvaṃ sthalaviśeṣābhiprāyeṇa | prāyeṇa tu niścita
vyabhicāratvameva | bālalolupatvamiti | bāhyavilope hi
raṅgajñānaṃ rajatajñānamiti viśeṣo na vinākāraṃ sambhavatīti
siddhyedākāraḥ, bāhyopagame tu tattadviṣayatvenaiva tadupapattāvākāre
pramāṇābhāvāt1 ||
astu tarhi bāhyameva svalakṣaṇaṃ vikalpasya viṣayaḥ |
yadyapi svarūpeṇāsāmayikatayā tannābhilāpasaṃsarga
yogyam tathāpyatadrūpaparāvṛttipratyāsattyā sādhāraṇarūpa-
pramāṇābhāvaḥ--pāṭhaḥ |
tāmāpannaṃ sat tathā bhavatyeva | yathā hyeko gaurago
vyāvṛttastathā'parepi gāva iti cet | atha ko'yamagau
rnāma | kimekasya gosvalakṣaṇasyānātmā āhosvi
ttadgatadharmmavirahī |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | samprati bāhyaṃ vastu veti vaibhāṣikamatamutthā
payan tṛtīyaṃ vikalpaṃ dūṣayati | astu tarhīti | nanūktaṃ svalakṣaṇaṃ
nābhilāpasaṃsargayogyapratibhāsamata āha | yadyapīti | atadrūpeti |
agovyāvṛttilakṣaṇayā pratyāsattyā svalakṣaṇābhilāpasaṃsargayogyatā
sambhavādityarthaḥ | tathā bhavatyeva abhilāpasaṃsargayogyaṃ bhavatye
vetyarthaḥ | tāmeva pratyāsattimāha | yathā hīti || gopiṇḍa
bhinno vā gotvajātiśūnyo vā agauriti vikalpārthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | tṛtīyaṃ kalpamutthāpayati | astu tarhīti |
svarūpeṇeti | ānantyavyabhicārābhyāṃ tatra śaktigrahābhāvādityarthaḥ |
tathāpīti | yadyapi vyāvṛttiralīkā na vastudharmmastathāpi
vastubhūtaiva sā taddharmmo bhaviṣyatīti nānugatadhīrbhāvarūpe sāmānye
mānamiti bhāvaḥ | tadgateti | gotvasāmānyaśūnya ityarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | bāhyaṃ vastu veti tṛtīyaṃ pakṣamutthāpayati |
astviti | tathāpīti | bhavatāṃ vidhirūpasyeva niṣedharūpasyāpi
gotvasya yogāt saṅketādiviṣayatvamityarthaḥ | tathā abhilāpa-
saṃsargayogyaṃ | yadyapi teṣāmasatyāḥ vyāvṛtteḥ satā sambandhasya
sattvasya vā'bhyupagame'pasiddhāntastathāpi tasya tairdoṣatvānabhyupagamāt
doṣāntaramāha | atheti ||
prathame na gavāntarepi gośabdavikalpau pravartteyātām,
aśvādivadanātmatvāviśeṣāt | atiprasaṅgaśca, mahiṣa
mātaṅgādyagovyāvṛttyā'śvepi govyavahāraprasaṅgāt | sa
gorapi vyāvarttata iti cet | tat kimabhimato gaurgo
rapi na vyāvarttate | vyāvarttate kintu svayamapyasau
gauriti cet | yadyagovyāvṛttirevāsya gotvaṃ tadaśvepi
samānam | anyaccettaducyatām |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | gavāntara iti | tasyāpi agotvādityarthaḥ |
mahiṣādagormātaṅgāccāśvasyāpi vyāvṛttatve govyavahāraḥ | aśvādi
rgorapi vyāvarttata iti na tatra govyavahāra ityāha | sa gorapīti |
ekasmād gopiṇḍādaparopi gopiṇḍo vyāvarttata iti tatrāpi
govyavahārābhāvaprasaṅga ityāha | tatkimiti | gopiṇḍādekasmā
dbhinnopi gopiṇḍo gaurbhavatyeveti tatra govyavahāraḥ syādevetyāha |
vyāvarttata iti | tadaśve'pīti | mahiṣādagorvyāvṛtto'śvopi
gaureva syādityarthaḥ | anyaditi | gotvāvacchinnapratiyogikā
nyonyābhāvavānagaustadanyaśca gaurityarthaḥ | tathā ca siddhaṃ gotva
miti bhāvaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | yadyagaurekagosvalakṣaṇānātmā tadāśvādivadga
vāntaramapyagauriti na tatra govyavahāraḥ syādityāha | prathama iti |
atiprasaṅgamevāha | mahiṣa iti | sa gorapīti | ago
vyāvṛttopi yo goto na vyāvarttate sa govyavahāraheturaśvaśca gotopi
vyāvarttata iti na tathetyarthaḥ | tat kimiti | evaṃ gaurapi
govyavahāraviṣayo na syāt yatkiñcidgostasyāpi vyāvṛttatvādityarthaḥ |
nanu sakalagovyāvṛttimānaśvādirgauśca na tathā svatastasyāvyāvṛtte
rityāha | kintviti | svayamapyayaṃ gaurgotvayogāt | gotvaṃ ca
yadi yatkiñcidagovyāvṛttatvam tadā'śvepyagorūpamahiṣādivyāvṛtta
tvādgotvaprasaṅga ityāha | yadīti | anyaditi | yadi ca gotva
jātimān gaustadā vastubhūtaṃ sāmānyaṃ siddhamevetyarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | ekagosvalakṣaṇabhinnebhyo yāvadbhyo vyāvṛttiryataḥ
kutaścidvā | ādye gavāntarepīti | dvitīye atiprasaṅgaśceti |
atiprasaṅgastadayogye tatprasaṅgaḥ | tadupapādayati | mahiṣeti |
kathañcitprakārabhedāt | prasaṅgāditi pañcamī samarthanīyā | gotvā
vacchinnavyāvṛttayāvadvyāvṛttirgovyavahāre nimittamityāśaṅkate | sa
iti | gotvamananugatamanugataṃ vā | ādye tat kimiti | dvitīyaṃ
śaṅkate | vyāvarttata iti | anugataṃ gotvaṃ vidhirūpaṃ cetsiddhaṃ naḥ
samīhitam | niṣedharūpaṃ cettatrāha | yadīti | agovyāvṛttireka
gosvalakṣaṇānātmakebhyo yāvadbhyo vyāvṛttiruta tādṛśādyataḥ kutaścit |
ādye na tasya gotvaṃ tasyāpyekagosvalakṣaṇabhinnatvāt | dvitīye
tvāha | tadā'śvepīti | aśvasyāpyekagosvalakṣaṇānātmakayatkiñci
nmahiṣādivyāvṛttatvāt | tathā ca gotvāvacchinnavyāvṛttyavacchinna
mahiṣādivyāvṛttimattvāttatrāpi govyavahārāpattiḥ | vidheranyaccānu
gatānatiprasaktaṃ durvacamityāha | anyaccediti | etena yāvadgovyakti
vyāvṛttayāvadvyāvṛttirgovyavahāranimittamityapi nirastam | viśiṣya
yāvadgovyaktīnāmasarvajñāvedyatvāt ekadharmopagrahaṃ vinā yāvadgo
vyaktivyāvṛtterdurjñeyatvāt ||
dvitīye tu tadgatadharmmavirahivyāvṛttastadvāneva syāt |
tatra ca na vivādaḥ |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | tadgateti | gotvātyantābhāvavadanyo gotva
vānevetyarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | dharmmāntarasya sakalagovyaktivṛtteranyasyābhāvā
dgotvasyaiva tathātvamiti vācyam tathā ca siddhamīhitamityāha |
dvitīye tviti ||
raghuº ṭīº | yatkiñcittadgatadharmmaśūnyatvamatiprasaktaṃ yāvattad
gatadharmmaśūnyatvaṃ cāprasiddhamatastadgatagotvaśūnyatvaṃ vaktavyaṃ | tathā ca
siddhamīhitamityāha | tadgateti ||
mithaḥ sambhinnākārāḥ piṇḍā eva sādhāraṇaṃ rūpamastu
kṛtamatadrūpaparāvṛttyeti cet | na | sambhedābhāvāt | sa
hi na vāstavaḥ piṇḍānāṃ viruddhadharmmādhyastatvāt |
nābhimānikaḥ śābaleyāderbhedenaiva prathanāt | taddharmmāṇāṃ
sambhedābhimāna iti cet | na | dharmmyatiriktadharmmānabhyupa
gamāt | abhyupagame vā paryyavasitaṃ vivādena |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | kīrttimatenānugatapratyayasyānyathāsiddhiṃ śaṅkate |
mitha iti | yadāha kīrttiḥ |
pararūpaṃ svarūpeṇa yayā1 saṃvriyate dhiyā |
ekārthapratibhāsinyā bhāvānāśritya bhedinaḥ ||
tayā saṃvṛtanānārthāḥ saṃvṛtyā bhedinaḥ svayam |
abhedina ivābhānti bhāvā2rūpeṇa kenacit ||
iti | sa hīti | sambheda ityarthaḥ | piṇḍānāṃ vāstavamekatvaṃ
ābhimānikaṃ vā | ādya āha | piṇḍānāmiti | bhedenaiveti |
tathā ca kvaikattvābhimāna ityarthaḥ | taddharmāṇāṃ śābaleyādi
dharmāṇām | sameda aikyam | śābaleyādibhinnāstvanmate dharmā eva
na santi yeṣāṃ sambhedaḥ syādityāha | neti | tebhyo bhinnāsteṣāṃ
dharmāścettadā paryavasitaṃ vivādenetyāha | abhyupagame veti ||
bhagīº ṭīº | mitha iti | anugatabuddhergopiṇḍānāmaikyaṃ
biṣaya iti na tataḥ sāmānyasiddhirityarthaḥ | bhedenaiveti | mayā
bhede bhāsamāna evābhedabuddherjātinimittakatvopagamādityarthaḥ |
yathā--pāṭhaḥ |
bhāva--pāṭhaḥ |
paryyavasitamiti | mithobhinnagosvalakṣaṇavṛttidharmmasya vastunaḥ
siddherityarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | ākārābheda evānugatamaterālambanamityā
śaṅkate | mitha iti | sambhedo'bhedaḥ | ākāro dharmī taddharmo
vā | ādye sa hīti | atra hetumāha | piṇḍānāmityādi |
dvitīyaṃ śaṅkate | taddharmāṇāmiti | ananugatānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ bhedāva
bhāsādanugato dharmo'bhyupagantavyastathā ca siddhamīhitamityāha |
abhyupagame veti ||
syādetat | bhinnānāmeva svalakṣaṇānāṃ samānākāra
vikalpajananasāmarthyamastu | tadapekṣayā ca kecidgāva
iti vyapadiśyante kecidagāva iti | tacca sāmarthya
svakāraṇaniyatatvādaparyyanuyojyam | anyathā sāmā
nyeṣṭhapi sāmānyāntaraṃ kalpyeta anugatavyavahārānu
rodhāt, tathā gopiṇḍeṣṭhapi gotvasya teṣṭheva vyavasthityanu
rodhāt, ubhayamukhī caivamanavasthā syāditi cet |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | kīrttimatamāśaṅkate | syādetaditi | yathāha1
kīrttiḥ |
ekapratyavamarṣasya hetutvāddhīrabhedinī |
ekadhīhetubhāvena vyaktīnāmapyabhinnatā ||
yadāha--pāº 2 puº |
iti | tadapekṣayeti | yeṣāṃ gabākārānugatadhījanakasvābhāvyaṃ
piṇḍānāṃ te gāvaḥ yeṣāṃ tu na tathā sāmarthyaṃ te piṇḍā agāva
ityarthaḥ | nanu tādṛśaṃ sāmarthyameva kuta ityata āha | tacceti |
etacca tvayāpi svīkarttavyamityāha | anyatheti | gotvāśvatvamahiṣatvā
diṣvidaṃ sāmānyamidaṃ sāmānyamityanugatapratyayātteṣvapi sāmā
nyāntaramaṅgīkriyetetyarthaḥ | kiṃ ca gotvaṃ gopiṇḍeṣveva varttate
nānyatreti tadvṛttiniyāmikā aparā kācidevaṃ tadvṛttiniyāmikā
cāparetyadhodhāvantī anavasthā syāt | sāmānye ca sāmānyāntarā
bhyupagame corddhvaṃ dhāvantītyubhayamukhyanavasthetyarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | nanvanugatamatiḥ sāmānyasiddhau mānam | sā
cānyathāsiddhaiva | ekajātīyavikalpajanakatvādupādherbhinnānāṃ vyaktīnāṃ
tadviṣayatvādityākṣipati | bhinnānāmeveti | tadapekṣayeti |
tattadgavāśvādivikalpajananasāmarthyādgavāśvādivyavahāra ityarthaḥ | nanva
nanugatāt kathamanugatadhīrityata āha | anyatheti | tavāpīdaṃ
sāmānyamidaṃ sāmānyamityanugatamateḥ sattvāt sāmānyatvaṃ sāmā
nyāntaraṃ syādityarthaḥ | tathā gopiṇḍeṣvapīti | sāmānyāntaraṃ
kalpyetetyanuṣajyate | gotvaṃ yadi gotvānāśraye varttate tadā'śvepi
vartteteti tadīyakvācitkatvaniyamārthaṃ niyāmakāpekṣāyāmanavasthānā
dityarthaḥ | ubhayamukhīti | ūrddhvaṃ dhāvantyadhodhāvantī cetyarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | anugataṃ sāmānyamanugatavikalpajananārthaṃ vā
kalpyate anugatavyavahārālambanatayā vā | nādyo bhinnānāmapi svakāra
ṇādhīnāt sāmarthyaviśeṣādanugatavikalpajananopapatteḥ | na dvitīyaḥ
tādṛśavikalpajanakatvasyaiva vyavahārālambanatvāt | yadi cānugata
vikalpajanakatvādatiriktamapyanugatavyavahārālambanaṃ kalpanīyaṃ tadā
sāmānyepyanugatasāmānyavyavahārālambanaṃ sāmānyāntaraṃ kalpyaṃ tatrāpi
ca sāmānyavyavahārāt tasya ca svātmani vṛttivirodhāt tatsādhā
raṇamaparaṃ, evaṃ tatra tatrāpītyanavasthā | evaṃ yadi svabhāvaniyata
vṛtterapi sāmarthyasya vṛttiniyamārthaṃ sāmānyaṃ kalpyaṃ tadā tasyāpi
vṛttiniyamārthamanyadevaṃ tasya tasyāpītyanavasthetyāśaṅkate | syādeta
dityādinā | vikalpānāṃ samānatvamākāraviśeṣaḥ |
yadyevaṃ nimittāntaramanapekṣyaikavyavahāro'tyantabhinnaiḥ,
evaṃ bhinnavyavahāra evābhinnenaikena kenacit kiṃ na
sādhyate, śaktisvabhāvāvalambanasyobhayatrāpi tulyatvāt |
athaivaṃ satyekavyavahāraḥ kvacidapi na syāt nirnimitto
vā bhavet, ubhayamapyaniṣṭam | tadetattulyam | aneka
vyavahāropyevaṃ sati na syāt nirnimitto vā bhavet,
ubhayamapyaniṣṭam | tasmādekenaikavyavahāravadanekenāpya
nekavyavahāra eveti sāmarthyaniyamaḥ |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | yathātyantabhinnānāmabhedavyavahārahetutvaṃ tathā
abhinnānāṃ bhedavyavahārahetutvameva kiṃ na syādityekaikopi gopiṇḍo
bhedenaiva vyavahriyetetyāha | yadyevamiti | ekenānekavyavahāraścada
nupapannastadā1 anekairekavyavahāropyanupapanna evetyāha | athaivamiti |
tulyatāmeva darśayati | aneketi | ekenaiva sāmānyena gotvādinā
gavādipiṇḍānāmanugatavyavahāra ityupasaṃharati | tasmāditi |
bhagīº ṭīº | anekenānekavyavahāra eveti niyamānabhyupagame
ekenaikavyavahāra evetyapi niyamo na syāditi svalakṣaṇamapi
tyajyatāmiti bāhyavādavyāghāta iti samādhatte | yadyevamiti |
abhinneneti | yathā sarvvatrādvaitavādibhirbrahmaṇaikenānekavyavahāro
bhyupagamyata ityarthaḥ | athaivamiti | itarānimittako'yaṃ vyavahāro
yadi tannimittako na syāt animittako vā syādityarthaḥ |
raghuº ṭīº | sāmarthyaṃ yadi tādṛśanikhilavyaktiniṣṭhamekaṃ
tarhi kimaparāddhaṃ pratyakṣasiddhena gottvādinā, atha prativyakti bhinnaṃ
na tarhi tasyānugatavikalpotpādaniyāmakatvaṃ mitho vyabhicārādi
tyāśayena nirākaroti | yadyevamiti |
kā gatistarhi sāmānyeṣṭhanekeṣṭhekavyavahārasya | yā
candramasyekasminnanekavyavahārasya | bhrānto'sāviti cet |
tathā--pāṭhaḥ |
ayamapi bhrānta eva | bādhakasyobhayatrāpi tulyatvāt |
sarvvatra bhrānto'stviti cet | bhedavyavahāropi tathā
kiṃ na syāt | arthakriyāsthiteriti cet | vyakti
bhedābhedavyavasthāpakārthakriyābhedābhedavat sajātīyā
sajātīyatvavyavasthāpakārthakriyāsājātyavaijātye api
kiṃ na paśyasi | te api bhrānte iti cet | arthakriyā
bhedopi bhrānta iti tulyam | astvevamiti cet | tyaja
tarhi bāhyavyasanam | ayamevāśaya iti cet | tatra
vakṣyāmaḥ |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | parāpāditāmanavasthāmuddharttumāha | kā gati
riti | yathā kadācidekenāpyanekavyavahārastathā kvacidanekenāpyeka
vyavahāra iti pratibaṃdimukhenottaramāha | yeti | vastutaḥ
sāmānyeṣvapi taditarāvṛttitve sati sakalatadvṛttitvaṃ nityatve
satyanekavṛttitvamupādhisāmānyamekamastīti bhāvaḥ | sarvvatreti |
gopiṇḍādiṣvanugatavyavahāro bhrāntostvityarthaḥ | vedāntimata
mālambyāha | bhedavyavahāropīti1 | arthakriyābhedāt vyaktīnā
mapi bheda ityāha | artheti | arthakriyāsājātyavaijātyanibandhanaṃ
tarhi vyaktīnāmapi sājātyavaijātye svīkārye eva anyathā tadākasmi
katvaprasaṅgādityāha | vyaktīti | te apīti | arthakriyāsājātya
vaijātye ityarthaḥ | tarhi vyaktibhedako'rthakriyābhedopi bhrānta eveti
hāreṇeti--pāṭhaḥ |
vyaktibhedopi na syāditi jitaṃ vedāntibhirityāha | artha
kriyeti | vyaktibhedopi māstu kiṃ naśchinnamityāha | astviti |
tarhi cidrūpaṃ brahmaivaikamastu kiṃ bāhyenetyāha | tyajeti | labdhāvakāśo
vedāntyāha | ayameveti | bauddhābhimānaṃ nirākṛtya tavāpyabhi
mānamagre nirākariṣyāma ityāha | tatreti |
bhagīº ṭīº | kā gatiriti | yadyekenaivaikavyavahāra iti
śeṣaḥ | candradvayavyavahāravat sāmānye'pyekavyavahāro bhrānta evetyarthaḥ |
yadyapi sāmānye jāterabhāvepi taditarāvṛttitve sati sakala
tadvṛttitvarūpamupādhisāmānyamastyevānugatamateḥ sattvāt, tathāpi yadi
sākṣātsamaveta eva jātirūpo dharmmastayā viṣayīkriyate tadā tadvyava
hārasya bhramatvamuktam | sarvvatreti | gopiṇḍeṣvapītyarthaḥ | bādhakaṃ
vinā vyavahārasya bhrāntatve bhedadhīrapyabhedanibandhanā na syāt bhramatvā
dityāha | bhedeti | vyaktīti | vyaktyekatvanānātvasiddhau yathā'rtha
kriyaikatvanānātve mānam tathā vyaktyāśritasajātīyatvavijātīyatvayo
rapyarthakriyāsājātyavaijātye mānamityarthaḥ | tasmādbādhakaṃ vinā
yadyarthakriyāsājātyadhīrbhramaḥ syāt tadā'rthakriyābhedajñānasyāpi bhramatve
vyaktibhedāsiddhau bāhyavilopa ityāha | tyajeti ||
raghuº ṭīº | abhyupetyāha | yā candramasīti | vastuto nityāneka
samavetatvalakṣaṇaupādhikasāmānyanibandhano gotvādāvanugatasāmānya
vyavahāra iti bhāvaḥ | sarvatra gavādipiṇḍeṣvapi | pratibandhi-
māha | bhedeti | te arthakriyāsājātyavaijātye | bhrānte bhrāntyu
llikhite | yadi vinaiva bādhakaṃ buddhīnāṃ bhramatvaṃ tadā bāhyavilopa
prasaṅga ityāha | tyajeti ||
mābhūdvā'rthakriyāsājātyavaijātyāvagamaḥ | bhrāntya
nugamopyekaṃ nimittamanādṛtya katham, tadapi hi kāryya
mājātyaṃ sāmagrīsājātyamantareṇākasmikamāpadyeta |
anyathā tatparamparālambanamapi viḍambanameva | bhinnaistai
stairabhedavyavahārasiddhau vyaktibhireva tathābhūtābhirabhi
matasiddhestadanusaraṇaprayāsavaiphalyāt | tasmādāropavyava
hārasyāpyanāropitajātyanādare asambhava eveti |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | mābhūdveti | arthakriyāsājātyaṃ kāraṇa
sājātyonnāyakaṃ māstu, kiñcijjñānaṃ bhrāntaṃ kiñcidabhrāntamityamapi
vyavasthā kāraṇasājātyanibandhanaiva syādanyathā sarvaṃ bhrāntamabhrāntameva
vā bhavedityarthaḥ | bhrāntitvenānugatamatirapi bhramaḥ syādityartha
ityanye | tadapi bhrāntatvamapi | nanu bhramatve sāmagrīsājātyā
prayojakatvepyanākasmikatvaṃ syādityata āha | anyatheti | tatparamparā
lambanamapīti | bhramaparamparālambanamapītyarthaḥ | tadanusaraṇaprayāso
bhramaparamparānusaraṇaprayāsaḥ | tadayamarthaḥ |
ekapratyavamarṣasya hetutvāddhīrabhedinī |
ekadhīhetubhāvena vyaktīnāmapyabhinnatā ||
ityatra pratyavamarṣasya pratisandhānasyaikatvabhramādanugatapratyayānā
mekatvabhramācca vyaktīnāmekatvabhrama iti yā bhramaparamparā tvayoktā, sāpi
tava viḍambanameva dhikkāra eva, bhramakāraṇasyāpyanugatasya tvayānaṅgī
kārāditi | yadvā ekapratyavamarṣasyetyekajātīyapratyavamarṣasyeti tvayā
vācyam tathā ca siddho jātikṛtānugama1 ityarthaḥ | tathā ca
tvatkārikāyāṃ tatparamparānusaraṇaṃ tajjātīyatvaparamparānusaraṇa
mityarthaḥ | yadvā vyaktīnāṃ bhinnānāmeva sāmarthyāt sarvatrābhedavyava
hārostu kiṃ pratyavamarṣānugatadhīparamparānusaraṇena kārikāsthenetyarthaḥ |
ekajātīyaṃ vāstavamanusaraṇīyamevetyupasaṃharati | tasmāditi | yadvā
pratyavamarṣo vyavahāraḥ | dhīrvikalpakarūpānugatadhīḥ tatparamparānu
saraṇamaphalaṃ vyaktisvābhāvyādeva tadupapatterityarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | bhrāntyanugama iti | sarvvadhībhramatvavādino
bhrāntitvamapyekaṃ vastu na siddhyet tatrāpyanugatamaterbhramatvāt yadi
sāmagrīsājātyaṃ nādriyetetyarthaḥ | anyatheti | anugatadharmmānabhyupa
game paramparayā sāmānyepi sāmānyāntaraṃ vyaktirūpamanugatavyavahāra
heturalambanamiti yaducyate tadviḍambanameva nimittānyathopapatteḥ
svayamabhyupagamāt | yadvā'nugatadharmmānabhyupagame kāraṇatvagraha eva na
syāt ānantyavyabhicārābhyāṃ vyaktau tadasambhavāt | yadvā'nugata
dharmmānabhyupagame vyāptasya pakṣadharmmatvamityanumānamapi viḍambanamityarthaḥ |
anyathākhyātipakṣamāśrityāha | tasmāditi ||
nugatapratyayaḥ--pāº 2 puº |
raghuº ṭīº | yadi ca vinaiva kāraṇasājātyaṃ kāryasājātyaṃ tadā
yathā bhinnabhinnaireva piṇḍairabhedavyavahāraḥ tathā bhinnabhinnaireva bījādi
vyaktiviśeṣairanugatāṅkurādikāryajananopapattāvaṅkurādisājātyānuro
dhena bījādivyaktiviśeṣatatkāraṇaparamparāsu kurvadrūpatvaparamparākalpanaṃ
viphalameva bhavatāmityāha | anyatheti | tatparamparetyasya bījadhānya
śālikalamādiṣvaṅkurādisāmānyaviśeṣakāryyaprayojakakurvadrūpatvasamu
dāyo vā'rthaḥ | vinā bādhakaṃ tadbuddhīnāṃ bhramatvāyogāttadbalātsājātya
vaijātye sādhayitvā samprati bhramasyāropyaprasiddhimantareṇāsambhavāda
satkhyāternirāsādbhramabalādeva te sādhayannupasaṃharati | tasmāditi ||
astu tarhi jātyādau bādhakādapohasiddhiriti cet |
vyavahārasyānanyathāsiddhau kva bādhakam | anyathā vipakṣe
balavadbādhakamupanīyānanyathāsiddhiviśrāntopi svabhāva
heturbādhakaśaṅkayāpyupahanyeta | tato bādhakavyasanamapa
hāyānugamavyavahṛtiranyathāpyupapādyatām | na caitacchakyaṃ
gatyantarābhāvāt |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | bādhakāt agre vakṣyamāṇāt | vyavahārasya
anugatavyavahārasya | anyathā sudṛḍhanirūpitonirūpaṇortho1 bādhyaḥ
syādityāha | anyatheti | svabhāvahetuḥ prasaṅgabhinno hetuḥ |
upahanyeta ābhāsaḥ syāt | naitaditi | anugatavyavahārasyānyathopa-
nirūpito'pyartho--pāṭhaḥ |
pādanaṃ na śakyamityarthaḥ | gatyantarābhāvāditi | anyāpohāde
rnirastatvādityarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | jātyādāvityādipadādanekavṛttyekasaṃyogāvaya
vyādiparigrahaḥ | vyavahārasyeti | vyavahārānanyathāsiddhereva na
bādhakamityarthaḥ | nāpi bādhaśaṅkā tasyā eva vipakṣabādhakatvāt
anyathā tava svadarśanavyāghāta ityāha | anyatheti | yadi vipakṣa
bādhakasadbhāvepi śaṅketyarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | jātyādāvityādipadādanekavṛttisaṃyogādi
parigrahaḥ | bādhakaṃ hi śaṅkitaṃ niścitaṃ vā | ādye vyavahārasyeti |
bādhakaṃ śaṅkitam | svabhāvaheturanumāpako hetuḥ | gatyantareti |
atha koyamagaurityādipūrvoktāvyavahitagranthena apohāderanugatavyava
hārānupapatterupadarśitatvādityarthaḥ ||
na ca bādhakamapyasti | taddhi svarūpato vā syāt
jñānato vā syāt | svarūpato'pyanupalambho vā viruddha
dharmmādhyāso vā |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | nanu balavadbādhakaṃ cedasti tadā prakārānta
reṇāpyanugatavyavahāraḥ paraṃ cintayitumarhatītyata āha | na ceti |
svarūpata iti | jātyādikamevāhatya bādhyate jātyādijñānaṃ
vā bādhyata ityarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | svarūpato vastugatyetyarthaḥ | jñānata āropata
ityarthaḥ | yadvā tajjñānasāmānyanirāsenetyarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | balavati bādhake jāgrati nānyathānupapatterapi
sādhakatvasambhava iti dvitīyaṃ nirākaroti | na ceti | svarūpato
jātisvarūpe sākṣāt | jñānato jātiviṣayakajñānasvarūpatadeka
tvādinirāsadvārā ||
na prathamaḥ asiddheḥ | sphurata eva hi sādhāraṇākārasya
śarīraṃ cintayitumārabdham nāsphurataḥ | adhyakṣe sādhā
raṇasphuraṇaṃ vyāsedhāmo na tu vikalpe, tasya samānasaṅketa
grahatimiranikurambakarambitadṛṣṭibhirevopapādanāt na
tvasmābhiḥ, kalpanākoṣasyānantaprasaratayā tattvāvyavasthā
pakatvāditi cet | na | śabdānusandhānavirahepi jāya
mānatvāt |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | asiddheriti | upalambhasya sādhitatvādityarthaḥ |
etadevāha | sphurata eveti | adhyakṣa iti | nirvikalpaka ityarthaḥ |
tanmātrameva pramāṇaṃ yata ityartha | nanu nirvikalpakābhāvepi
vikalparūpa eva jātyādyupalambhostītyata āha | na tviti |
samānaśabdasaṅketagraha eva timiranikurambastena karambitā kaluṣitā
dṛṣṭiryeṣāṃ tairevopapādanāt | na tvasmābhiriti | tattvamātradṛṣṭibhi-
rityarthaḥ | tathā ca vikalpe gavādipadasaṅketagrahādhīnā nāma
jātyādiyojanā na tu vāstavītyarthaḥ | tadevāha | kalpaneti |
agṛhītasaṅketānāmapi nāmajātyādisphuraṇādityāha | neti ||
bhagīº ṭīº | nanu vikalpe sādhāraṇākāreṇāsphuraṇepi
nārthasiddhistasyāvastuviṣayatvāt kintu nirvikalpādeva setyāha |
adhyakṣa iti | bhramabījamāha | tasyeti | samānaśabdo gośabdādiḥ |
evambhūtadṛṣṭibhiranyairityarthaḥ | na tvasmābhiḥ upapādanādityanuṣañja
nīyam | atra hetumāha | kalpanākoṣasyeti | vikalpe kālpa
nikasyaiva bhānānna tato'rthasiddhirityarthaḥ | śabdeti | (evaṃ) sati
gopadavācyānākalane'nunatirnna bhāsetetyarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | anupalambhaḥ kiṃ sarvathaivāntarāle vā vivicya
vā | ādye neti | adhyakṣa iti | adhyakṣameva doṣājanyatayā
pramāṇa na tu doṣasamuttho vikalpa iti bhāvaḥ | prakṛte doṣamāha |
tasyeti | nikurambaḥ stomaḥ | karambitaṃ kaluṣitam | astu
vikalpādapi vastusiddhistatrāha | kalpaneti ||
tathāpi tadvāsanāta eveti cet | kimekasaṅketa
viṣayābhāvepi samānaśabdasaṅketagrahavāsanāvaśādekā
kāraparāmarśastatsadbhāve vā | na tāvadādyaḥ nānā
sāsnādimadvyaktivat svargalocanabāṇāmbukuliśādiṣṭhapi
gośabdasaṅketagrahavāsanāvaśāttathāvidhapratyayānugamaprasa
ṅgāt | iṣṭa evāsāvartha1 iti cet | so'yaṃ sāsnādi
matīṣu vyaktiṣu sādhāraṇaṃ rūpaṃ na paśyati paśyati tu
gośabdavācyeṣu daśasviti kimatra vaktavyaṃ nūnaṃ rucire
vāsya2 locanamiti |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | prāktanī saṅketagrahavāsanā tatrāpyastītyāha |
vāsaneti | sopi saṅketagraha eva jātyādinimittaṃ tiraskṛtya
puraskṛtya veti vikalpārthaḥ | bhinnapravṛttinimitteṣu gopadavācyeṣu
gavādiṣu tathā satyanugatapratyayaḥ syādityāha | nāneti | asā
viti | anugatapratyaya ityarthaḥ | ekajātīyāsu vyaktiṣvanu
gatadhīnimittaṃ kiñcinna paśyati vijātīyāsu paśyatītīcchāmātraṃ
na tu pramāṇānurodhaḥ kaścidityarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | soyamiti | tathā sati lokavirodha iti
bhāvaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | tadvāsanātaḥ śabdavāsanāta eva doṣāt |
daśasu svargeṣupaśuviśeṣavāgvajradiṅnayanamayūkhapṛthivīpāthaḥsu ||
iṣṭa evāyama--pāṭhaḥ |
ruciramevāsya--pāṭhaḥ |
śakyamidamitareṇāpi vaktumiti cet | śakyam, na
tu vyavahārastanmūlo viparyyāsayitum |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | śakyamidamiti | gośabdavācyeṣu sādhāraṇa
rūpaṃ na paśyati paśyati tu sāsnādimatīti saugatenāpi śakyaṃ
vaktumityarthaḥ | śakyamiti | vāṅmātraṃ śakyaṃ, tāttviko vyavahāro
nyathākarttuṃ na śakya ityarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | śakyamidamiti | gośabdavācyeṣu sādhāraṇaṃ
rūpaṃ na paśyati paśyati tu sāsnādimadvyaktiṣviti saugatenāpi
vaktu śakyata ityarthaḥ | na tviti | śābdo vyavahāraḥ saṅketagraha
mūlakaḥ, sa ca na vyaktiṣu śakyaḥ, vyāvṛttiścānugatāpi nirastaiveti
sāsnādimadvyaktiṣu śabdānusandhānavirahiṇāmapyanugatamateranugataṃ
sāmānyamabhyupeyam, svargādiṣu samānapadavācyatāṃ pratisandadhānasyaivā
nugatadhīriti na tadanyathāsiddhau na tatastatsiddhirityarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | idaṃ idamākāraṃ | svargādiṣu na paśyati
paśyati sāsnādimatīṣu vyaktiṣviti | vyavahāro'nugatavyavahāraḥ |
tanmūlo'nugatadharmmamūlaḥ | viparyāsayitumanyathākarttuṃ | kathaṃ tarhi
svargādāvanugatadharmopagrahamantareṇānugatavyavahāraḥ, anugatapratyayāt |
sopi kathamantareṇānugatadharmaṃ, ka evamāha | kastarhyasau, gośabda
vācyatvaṃ | prakṛtepi tathaiva kiṃ na syāt, avyutpannānāmapi sāsnādi
matīṣu vyaktīṣvanugatagopratyayāt | na ca svargādau tathāsti | na
vānugatadharmopagrahamantareṇānantāsu vyaktiṣu vyutpattiḥ sambhavati | na
ca tāmantareṇāpūrvavyaktau padaviśeṣavācyatānibandhano vyavahāraḥ |
svargādiṣu cānugatasvargatvādinibandhanā vyutpattiriti ||
nanvetāvatāpi vikalpaḥ siddhyatu, anubhavastu katham |
savastukavikalpasiddhereva | kathaṃ tasya savastukateti cet |
śabdavāsanādikāraṇāntaravidhvaṃsāditi tūṣṇīmbhava |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | bhāsatāṃ savikalpakepi jātiranubhavaścejjātiṃ
na viṣayīkaroti tadā na sā prāmāṇikītyarthaḥ | kathamiti |
jātigocaraḥ setsyatītyarthaḥ | savastuketi | vikalpaviṣayasya bādhaka
mantareṇānubhavaviṣayatvadhrauvyādityarthaḥ | adyayāvadvikalpa eva savastuko
na siddho'stītyāha | kathamiti | śabdeti | śabdavāsanādikāraṇa
niṣedhe gaurayamityādivikalpānāmarthasāmarthyasamutthatvamāvaśyakam |
tathā ca gotvādikamapi vastubhūtamevetyarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | etadeva spaṣṭayati | nanviti | nirvvi
kalpakādeva vastusiddhirityanugatadharmmaviṣayakasavikalpakasiddhāvapi
tasyālīkaviṣayatayā na tato'rthasiddhirityarthaḥ | savastuketi |
savikalpakasyālīkaviṣayakatvānupapattau pāriśeṣyeṇa vastuviṣayatva
siddherityarthaḥ | etadeva spaṣṭayati | śabdeti ||
raghuº ṭīº | nirvikalpakādeva vastusiddhirna savikalpakā
datiprasaṅgādityāśayena pṛcchati | nanviti | vikalpo'tiriktā
nugatadharmāvalambī siddhyatu | asati bādhake savikalpakādeva vastu
siddhirityāśayenottarayati | savastuka iti ||
antarāle kimiti nopalabhyata iti cet | upalabdhi
kāraṇābhāvāt |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | anupalambhāntaraṃ jātau bādhakamāśaṅkate |
antarāla iti | piṇḍayorantarāla ityarthaḥ | jātervyaktirabhi
vyaktikāraṇam sā cāntarāle nāstīti kathamupalabhyatāmiti
pariharati | upalabdhīti ||
bhagīº ṭīº | nanu gopiṇḍayorantarāle yadi na gotvaṃ
tadā tatrotpadyamānavyaktau gotvaṃ na syāditi tatrāpi tatsattve tadupa
labhyetetyāha | antarāla iti | satopi tatra tasya sāsvādi
madvyaktervyañjikāyā abhāvānnopalabdhirityāha | upalabdhīti | na
ca tatra tatsattvasādhakamānābhāvaḥ apratisaṅkramāditarkasahāyasya
sāmānyasādhakasya pratyakṣasyaiva tadvyāpakatvasādhakatvāt ||
raghuº ṭīº | jātiravyāpikā cetprācīvarttini piṇḍe pari
dṛṣṭā pratīcīvarttini nopalabhyeta pratisaṅkramaṇādyasambhavādato vyāpi
kaiva vācyā, tatra dvitīyamanupalambhabādhakamāśaṅkate | antarāla
iti | madhyadeśa ityarthaḥ | yadvā jātiranityā cetpūrvapiṇḍanāśe
uttarapiṇḍe nopalabhyeta tena nityā vācyā, tatrāśaṅkate | antarāla
iti | ekapiṇḍanāśānantaraṃ piṇḍāntarānutpādakakāla ityarthaḥ |
upalabdheḥ kāraṇasya vyakterabhāvāditi ||
piṇḍa eva kuṇḍe badaravat kuto nopalabhyata iti
cet | na | ananyadeśatvāt | bhedena tūpalabhyata eva,
piṇḍāntarāsaṃsargiṇi piṇḍe'nubhūyamāne tatsaṃsargitayā
'nubhavāt |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | tarhi piṇḍepi vivekenopalabhyatām, nopalabhyate
cennūnaṃ nāstītyāha | piṇḍa eveti | vivekenopalambho yadi
piṇḍabhinnadeśa upalambhastatrāha | ananyadeśeti | yadi ca bheda
mātropalambho vivekenopalambhastatrāha | bhedeneti | viśeṣaṇasya
gotvasya viśeṣyasya gopiṇḍasya bhedenopalambhasya sattvādityarthaḥ |
nanvayaṃ gauriti viśiṣṭabuddhau gopiṇḍāntarameva viśeṣaṇatvena bhāsatāṃ
kiṃ gotvenetyata āha | piṇḍāntareti | piṇḍāntaraṃ sambaddhaṃ
viśeṣaṇaṃ bhavenna tvasambaddhamapītyarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | nanu yadi piṇḍasaṃsargi gotvaṃ tadā kuṇḍa
saṃsargibadaravattathātvenopalabhyetetyāha | piṇḍa eveti | tathātve
netyasya vibhinnadeśatayetyarthaḥ svarūpabhedeneti vā piṇḍasaṃsargitayeti
vā | ādye ananyeti | dvitīye bhedeneti | piṇḍādbhedenopa-
labhyata eveti iṣṭāpattirityarthaḥ | tṛtīye piṇḍāntareti | atrāpi
sampratipattirevetyarthaḥ | piṇḍāntarāsaṃsargiṇīti piṇḍatādātmya
nirāsārtham | yadi piṇḍagotvayorabhedastadā piṇḍāsambaddha
piṇḍāntarasaṃsargitayā nānubhūyetetyarthaḥ | tatsadbhāve veti pakṣastviṣyata
eveti na dūṣitaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | tṛtīyamanupalambhamāśaṅkate | piṇḍa eveti |
vivicyopalambho hi vibhinnadeśatvenopalambho bhedena vā | ādye
'nanyeti | badarasya kuṇḍetarasvāvayavadeśatvavajjāteḥ piṇḍetarādeśa
tvāt | dvitīye bhedeneti | piṇḍāntarāsaṃsargiṇi piṇḍāntarā
nātmake | ekasyānekatādātmyānupapattipradarśanāya cedam ||
nāpi dvitīyaṃ bādhakam avayavisamānayogakṣema
tvāt | jāyamānapiṇḍasambandhānupapattirapratisaṅkramātta
trāsattvādanutpādācceti cet | kathaṃ punastatrāsattvaṃ tvayā
vyajñāyi | tatra sattve tatratyākāśāderapi gotvaprasaṅgā
diti cet | na caitat paścādapi tatratyākāśādinā
sambadhyate | yena ca piṇḍena sambadhyate na tatra kadāpi
tannāsti | tat kuto virodhaḥ |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | viruddhadharmmādhyāso veti vikalpitavikalpaṃ
dūṣayati | nāpīti | avayavini kārtsnyaikadeśavikalpanirāsava-
dihāpi tannirasanīyaṃ na kārtsnyena varttate naikadeśena kintu
svarūpeṇetyarthaḥ | nanu jāyamānapiṇḍasambandhaḥ prakāratrayeṇa sambhavati |
piṇḍāntarādgotvasya gamanādvā pūrvameva tatsattvādvā piṇḍena saha
jāyamānatvādvā | tadetat trayamapyanupapannamityāha | jāyamāneti |
apratisaṅkramāt agamanāt | gotvaprasaṅgāditi | tathā ca tadanu
bhavavyavahārayoḥ prasaṅgādityarthaḥ | samavāyavṛttyā tatsattvaṃ vyavahāre
tantraṃ na tu svarūpato'pīti bhāvaḥ | yadi samavāyenākāśādau gotvaṃ
syāttadā paścādapi syānna caivamityāha | na caitaditi | sambadhyate
samavaitītyarthaḥ | jātepi tatra piṇḍe gotvamākāśāsambandhyevetyarthaḥ |
tarhi piṇḍenāpi tatra na sambadhyetetyāha | yena cati | tatra jātaḥ
sambandhaścetyeka eva kāla iti piṇḍena kadācidapi na tasyāsambandha
ityarthaḥ | kuto virodha iti | piṇḍotpatteḥ pūrvamākāśādau
gotvaṃ nāsīdutpanne ca piṇḍe tatra gotvamiti virodho na
sambhavatītyarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | dvitīyaṃ bādhakaṃ kārtsnyaikadeśavikalpena viruddha
dharmmādhyāsarūpam | avayavisthāpanāvasara eva dūṣyatvādityarthaḥ |
nanu jāyamānapiṇḍe gotvaṃ na gavā sambadhyate tasya niṣkriyatvāt |
nāpi taddeśe jātiḥ sthitā tasyāpi gotvāpatteḥ | nāpi piṇḍena
sambaddhaivotpadyate nityatvāditi sambandhavyāpakatrayavyāvṛttau sambandho
'nupapanna ityāha | jāyamāneti | ākāśādideśenāsambaddhameva
svarūpasat sāmānyaṃ vyaktyā svasamavetaṃ vyajyata ityabhipretyāha |
kathamiti | tatretyanenākāśādirvvivakṣitaḥ piṇḍo vā | ādye
āpādyāpādakayorvaiyyadhikaraṇyam, na cākāśādinā sahāsambandhe
piṇḍasambandho viruddha iti bhāvaḥ | piṇḍenāsambandhastatsambandha
virodhī, sa ca jātipiṇḍasambandhasya nityatvādeva nāstītyāha |
yena ceti ||
raghuº ṭīº | viruddhadharmmasaṃsargovayavivadihāpi nirasanīya
ityāha | nāpītyādi | nanu gotvādau jāyamāne gavi gotvasya
sambandho na rajjvādivaddeśāntarādāgamanāt niḥkriyatvāt | na
karīṣādivattatraiva sattvāt prāgapyupalambhaprasaṅgāt | na piṇḍarūpa
vattadotpādāt prācīnapiṇḍānāmagotvaprasaṅgāt | na ca prakārāntaraṃ
sambandhopapādakamastītyāśaṅkate | jāyamāneti | tatrāsatopi
svabhāvaniyamādeva sambandho nānupapannaḥ satopi ca vyañjakavyakti
virahādevānupalambha ityāśayavānāha | kathaṃ punariti | tatra pūrvaṃ
gotvasattve tatratyatvāviśeṣāddravyāntarepi gotvasambandhe tatrāpi gauriti
pratyayāpattirityakṣaratātparyābhyāmāśaṅkate | tatra sattva iti | gotvasya
yathākathañcitsambandho na gauritipratyayaniyāmakaḥ kiṃ tu samavāyaḥ
sa ceduttarakālaṃ dravyāntare gotvasya syātkalpyetāpi pūrvaṃ tatra
tadabhāvopapattaye gotvasyāsattvamityāśayavānāha | na caitaditi |
atha tatratyatvāviśeṣepi kkacideva gotvasamavāyo nānyatreti kuto
niyama iti cet svabhāvaniyamāditi gṛhāṇa | atha piṇḍa
evotpattikāle sato gotvasyottarakāle sambandho vinopasarpaṇādikaṃ
virudhyeta iti cedatrāha | yena cetyādi | jātaḥ sambaddhaścetyekaḥ
kāla ityabhyupagamādityarthaḥ ||
atha piṇḍamantargaḍumupādāyopalakṣaṇatayā tatreti
vyavahāraḥ, tadā tadupasarpaṇāpasarpaṇotpattivināśaireva
tadupapattī na yātītyādiraparāddheṣoriva dhānuṣkasya
kaṇṭhaḍambaraḥ |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | nanu piṇḍo nirūpakamātraṃ na tu tatra gotvaṃ
samavaiti tathā ca tena rūpeṇa nirūpyamāṇa gotvamākāśādau
prāgāsīccettadā govyavahāraḥ syāditi brūma ityāha | atheti |
antargaḍutvaṃ nirūpakamātram | evaṃ sati yathā piṇḍasattvāsattvādhīne
gotvasattvāsattve tathā gaurasti gaurnāsti gaurjāto gaurnaṣṭo
gaurgacchatītyādivyavahārā api piṇḍopādhikā eva, tathā
cotpādavināśapratyayo gotvabādhakatvenāśaṅkito na manāgapi pada
mādadhāti, teṣāṃ piṇḍotpādavināśaviṣayatvāt |
na yāti na ca tatrāsīnna cotpannaṃ na cāṃśavat |
jahāti pūrvamādhāramaho vyasanasantatiḥ ||
iti kīrtteḥ virodhakīrttanasya lakṣyaṃ gotvaṃ, tacca tataḥ pracyutaṃ
vyaktau patitamityaparāddheṣutā ||
bhagīº ṭīº | nanviha deśe gauriti pratīteḥ paramparayā
ākāśādināpi gotvasambandho neha gauritidhīviṣayagotvāsambandhena
viruddhaḥ syādityāha | atheti | antargaḍum nirūpakamātram na
tu gotvasyādhāramityarthaḥ | tathā ca piṇḍe gotvamiti vyavahāro
na mukhyaḥ kintu lākṣaṇika ityarthaḥ | ākāśādideśe neha gaurneha
gotvamastyāsīditi vyavahārāḥ piṇḍopasarpaṇādinaivopapannā iti na
tatra sambandhāsambandhau paramparayāpi yatra piṇḍe samavaiti gotvaṃ tatraiva
paraṃ govyavahāraṃ karotīti
na yāti na ca tatrāsīnna cotpannaṃ na cāṃśavat |
jahāti pūrvaṃ nādhāramaho vyasanasantatiḥ ||
iti kīrttyuktavyāghāto lakṣyacyutaśarasya dhanvinaḥ kaṇṭhaḍambara iva
govyaktiniṣthakarmmādīnāṃ paramparāsambandhenaivasamāhitatvāt gopiṇḍe'rtha
sambandhasyābhāvādasambandhakāle gopiṇḍasyaivāsatvādityāha | tadeti |
raghuº ṭīº | antargaḍum sambandhaghaṭakam | upalakṣaṇatayā
paramparayā | tatreti vyavahāraḥ, kadācittatreti kadācicca na tatreti
vyavahāraḥ | taditi | upasarpaṇotpattibhyāmapasarpaṇavināśābhyāṃ ca
tayoḥ sattvāsattvavyavahārayorupapattau
na yāti na ca tatrāsīnna cotpannaṃ na cāṃśavat |
jahāti pūrvamādhāramaho vyasanasantatiḥ ||
iti kīrttikaṇṭhaḍambaraḥ | pūrvamityanena bhajate paramityapi
sūcitam | svasvāvayavakriyānimittake pūrvāparadeśatyāgāvāptī na
yāti nāṃśavadityanena pratiṣiddhe ||
tathā hi piṇḍamadhikṛtyopasarpaṇāpasarpaṇābhāvastadupa
lakṣitaṃ deśamadhikṛtya ca sattvāsattve sāmānyasyeti kiṃ
kena saṅgatam | athāpyanutpanne piṇḍe tasyāsattvaṃ sulabha
meva tadasattvāditi hṛdayam, tanna | svarūpasattvāsattvayo
rdvitīyānapekṣatvāt sambaddhatvāsambaddhatve tu dvitīyāpekṣe |
tatastatrāsati nāstīti ko'rthaḥ |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | nanu sāmānyaṃ piṇḍaṃ nopasarppati na vāpasarpati
cet tadā tadupalakṣite deśe sāmānyasattvāsattve syātāmiti maha
dvaiśasamiti sopahāsamāha | tathā hīti | upasarpaṇāpasarpaṇābhāva
ityatra sāmānyasyetyagretanena sambandhaḥ | yadvā nanu vyakterupasarpaṇāpa
sarpaṇāttadupalakṣite deśe sattvāsattve na sāmānyasyeti yathāśrute
sopahāsamāha | tathā hīti | piṇḍe cennopasarppaṇāpasarppaṇe tarhi
tadupalakṣitākāśadeśe sāmānyasya sattvāsattve syātāmityatyanta
masaṅgatamityarthaḥ | nanu sāmānyaṃ svarūpataḥ taddeśādāvasti cedastu
tathāpi yaḥ piṇḍa utpanna eva nāsti tena tatsambandhaḥ kathaṃ syāt |
na hi sambandhyabhāvepi sambandha iti pūrvapakṣiṇo hṛdayamāha |
athāpīti | sāmānyaṃ svarūpataḥ sarvatra deśe kāle'stītyukte tatkatha
manutpannena piṇḍena sambadhyatāmityapi kiṃ kena saṅgatamityarthaḥ |
nanu piṇḍānutpattidaśāyāmasatā piṇḍena kathaṃ sambadhyatāmityetadeva
praśnaviṣaya ityata āha | tata iti ||
bhagīº ṭīº | tathā ca piṇḍamadhikṛtya sāmānyasyopasarpaṇādya
bhāvaḥ tadupalakṣitaṃ deśamadhikṛtya tasyaiva sambandhāsambandhe vaiyadhi
karaṇyamityāha | tathā sāmānyasyeti śeṣaḥ | nanu piṇḍānutpatti
daśāyāṃ tatrāvarttamānaṃ tasminnutpanne kathaṃ tadvarttetetyāha | atheti |
tasya sāmānyasya | tadasattvāt piṇḍāsattvādityarthaḥ | nātra virodho
na hi piṇḍotpatteḥ pūrvaṃ tatra tasyāsattve svarūpasattvaṃ nivarttate, na
hi tadapi tasya sambandhāpekṣaṃ, sambandhinaḥ piṇḍasyābhāvāt sambandhaḥ
paraṃ na syādityāha | svarūpeti | nanu piṇḍānutpattikālepi
gotvaṃ svarūpasadeva nāstīti buddheḥ ko viṣaya ityāha | tata iti ||
raghuº ṭīº | piṇḍe upasarpaṇasya piṇḍāccāpasarppaṇasya cābhāvā
tsāmānyasya kiṃ piṇḍopalakṣitadeśe sattvāsattve nopapadyete kiṃ vā
piṇḍa eva | ādye piṇḍamadhikṛtyeti | piṇḍasyopasarpaṇādibhireva
tadupapatteriti bhāvaḥ | dvitīye tu satyeva piṇḍe tatrāsattva
prāgeva nirastaṃ | tena śiṣyamāṇamasati piṇḍe tatrāsatvamāśaṅkya
nirākaroti | athāpīti | tasya sāmānyasya | tadasattvāt piṇḍā
satvāt | sattvāsattve yadi varttamānatvāvarttamānatve tatrāha | svarūpeti |
dvitīyānapekṣatvāt piṇḍādyādhārānapekṣatvāt | na vā sāmānyasya
kadācidapyasattvaṃ nityatvāt | sambaddhatveti | yadyapi sambandho'tra
samavāyaḥ sa ca nitya eva, tathāpi tadviśeṣitaḥ samavāyo
nāstītyasambandhitvamaṅgīkṛtam ||
tenāsatā na sambadhyata iti cet | taccaivametat |
paścāt kathaṃ sambadhyatāmiti cet | tasya sattvāt asa
mbaddhatvasya tadasattvaprayuktatvāt | tataḥ prāgasan piṇḍaḥ
paścāt kathamupapadyatāmiti codyaniṣṭhā, sā ca satkāryya
vādamanupatatītyabhuktavāntiḥ |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | asatā sambandho na bhavatyevetyāha | tacceti |
tasyeti | piṇḍasyetyarthaḥ | tadasattvaprayuktatvāt piṇḍāsattvaprayuktatvāt |
sambandhini sati sambandho bhavatīti sarvajanasiddhepi tatra kathaṃ
tavābhiprāya evamunnīyate | yaḥ piṇḍaḥ pūrvvaṃ nāsīt sa paścātkatha
mutpadyata ityāha | tata iti | codyaniṣṭhā deśyaparyavasānam |
abhuktavāntiriti | sāṅkhyamataṃ tvayā na bhuktaṃ na pācitamidānīṃ
tadeva vamasītyarthaḥ | deśe kāle ca sāmānyasvarūpamasti, piṇḍopa
gamāpagamādinā gaurasti gaurnāstīti vyavahāraḥ, yathā'vicalati
caitre daṇḍopagamāpagamābhyāṃ daṇḍī caitro nāyaṃ daṇḍīti vyavahāra
iti praghaṭṭakārthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | yadyapi tayoḥ sambandhaḥ samavāyaḥ sa cāstyeva
tathāpyasatā piṇḍena tannirūpaṇaṃ nāstītyāha | teneti | tasya
piṇḍasyetyarthaḥ | niṣṭhā paryyavasānam ||
raghuº ṭīº | tasya piṇḍasya | tatra ca piṇḍe sataḥ sāmā
nyasya tanniṣṭhābhāvapratiyogitvarūpaṃ na tatrāsattvaṃ, yāvatsattvaṃ tatra
sāmānyasya sattvāt asataścābhāvādhikaraṇatvāyogāt | codyaniṣṭhā
pūrvapakṣamaryādā ||
tathāpi sāmānyatadvatoratyantabhede kathaṃ sāmānā
dhikaraṇyamiti cet | kimidam | samānenādhikaraṇena
hi sambandhaḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyam tasya ca bhedena ko
virodha iti nādhigacchāmaḥ | gavāśvayorapi tathābhāva
prasaṅga iti cet | nanu vyatirekadṛṣṭāntasthānaṃ tat na tu
virodhasthānam | tacca maitratanayopi yadi kaścidaśyāmaḥ
syāt paridṛśyamānānāmapi tathābhāvaprasaṅga iti kva
nāma durlabham |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | dharmmadharmiṇorbhedābhedavādyāha | tathāpīti |
atyantabhinnayorgavāśvayoḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyābhāvādityarthaḥ | atyanta
bhedepi sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ nānupapannamityāha | kimidamiti |
nanu bhinnayoḥ sāmānādhikaraṇye gavāśvayorapi sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ
syāditi śaṅkate | gavāśvayoriti | na brūmo yayorbhedastayoḥ
sāmānādhikaraṇyamāvaśyakamiti, api tu kvacidbhede sati sāmā
nādhikaraṇyaṃ tadabhāvaśca gavāśvayoriti vyatirekadṛṣṭāntasthānaṃ
gavāśvamityāha | nanviti | tacceti | tacca vyatirekadṛṣṭāntasthānaṃ
kva nāma durlabhamiti sambandhaḥ, kintu sulabhamevetyarthaḥ | saulabhyameva
darśayati | maitratanayopīti | yathā mitrātanayaḥ śyāma utsargo
na ca tāvatā śyāmatvena nirṇīto mitrātanayaḥ kvacidaśyāmasyāpi
darśanāt, śyāmatvena nirṇīto'pi mitrātanayaḥ syādaśyāmastathā
bhede sati sāmānādhikaraṇyamityukte asāmānādhikaraṇyena
nirṇītayorapi gavāśvayoḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ na prasajyata ityarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | dharmmadharmmiṇorbhedābhedavādyāha | tathāpīti |
atyantabhinnayorgavāśvayostadabhāvādityarthaḥ | samāneneti | abheda
eva tadviruddhamiti bhāvaḥ | na cānyonyābhāvasya nityābhāvavṛtti
dharmmatvenāvyāvṛttidharmmatvamanumeyam (?) | ekasyaiva bhāvābhāvayoravaccheda
bhedaniyatatvāt tasya cātrābhāvena bādhā ||
raghuº ṭīº | dharmadharmiṇorātyantikamabhedaṃ nirasya pākṣikaṃ
taṃ nirasituṃ bhedābhedavādinamutthāpayati | tathāpīti | kimida
mityāścarye | tadeva darśayati | samāneneti | tulyenetyarthaḥ | tathā
ca samānāni tulyāni adhikaraṇāni yasya, tattathā, tasya bhāvaḥ
sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ | yadyapi samānamekamadhikaraṇaṃ yayorityādika
marthāntaramapyasti tathāpi tasya prakṛte asambhavāt nyāyakusumāñjalau
vistṛtatvācca neha prastutaṃ | na tviti | vyatirekayoḥ sahacāra
mātreṇa virodhāsiddheriti bhāvaḥ ||
tathāpi viśeṣo vācya iti cet | asti svābhāviko
viśeṣo yat kiñcideva kenacit sambaddhaṃ na sarvvaṃ sarvveṇeti |
tathā'nugamaniyamopi svabhāvādeva kiṃ na syāditi
cet | ekasyānekasambandhe'nekasya caikasambandhe'virodhāt
ekānekayoranekaikavyavahāravirodhāditi |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | viśeṣa iti | bhinnayoḥ kvacitsāmānādhi
karaṇyaṃ kvacicca netyatra viśeṣo vācya ityarthaḥ | svabhāva evātra
niyāmaka ityāha | astīti | tataḥ svabhāvaḥ pratītisākṣika
iti bhāvaḥ | tarhi vyaktiviśeṣānugatamatiniyamo'pi svabhāvā
devāstu kiṃ jātyetyāha | tatheti | ekasyeti | yadyeko dharmmo
'nekasambandhī na bhavati tadā tenānugatapratyayo na bhavet, na caivam,
yadi vā'nekeṣāṃ dharmiṇāmekadharmmasambandhavirodhaḥ syāttadā tathā
kalpyeta, na cātra virodha ityartha | ekānekayoriti | ekena
yathā nānekavyavahāraḥ tathā piṇḍairekavyavahāropi na sambhavatītyarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | viśeṣaḥ satyapi bhede sāmānādhikaraṇyapratīti
niyāmaka ityarthaḥ | astīti | anena bhedābhedasādhake sāmā
nādhikaraṇyavyatirekānumāne sādhyābhāvaprayukto na sādhanābhāvaḥ kintu
svabhāvabhedābhāvaprayukta ityupādhirapyuktaḥ | tatheti | tathā ca
sāmānyaṃ tanniyāmakaṃ na siddhyeteti bhāvaḥ | atiriktasāmānye
bādhake satyeva svabhāvavādālambanamityabhipretya bādhakamuddharati |
ekasyeti | tatra ya ekaḥ so'nekavṛttirna bhavatīti vyāptirbādhikā
syāt, sā ca nāsti, svalakṣaṇasyāpyekasya hānāpatteḥ, ekasya
paramāṇoḥ ṣaṭkena yugapadyogāt | tasmādyathaikadānekasambandho na
viruddhastathā'nekatraikasambandhopītyarthaḥ | tathāpi sādhakābhāva eva
bādhakaḥ syādityata āha | ekānekayoriti | ekavyavahāro
'nugatavyavahāraḥ | yathāsaṅkhyamanvayaḥ | tathā cānanyathāsiddhānugata
pratyakṣameva tatsādhakamityarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | ekasya vijñānasya yathānekaviṣayasambandhitvaṃ
yathā cānekasya viṣayasyaikavijñānasambandhitvaṃ tathaikasya sāmānya
syānekapiṇḍasambandhitvaṃ anekasya piṇḍasyaikasāmānyasambandhitvaṃ na
virudhyate, mānābhāṣāt, antareṇa caikadharmamanekeṣvekavyavahāro na
sambhavati kāraṇābhāvādanyathā'tiprasaṅgāccetyāha | ekasyetyādi |
eketi | yathā ekasmādanekavyavahāro nopapadyate tathānekebhyopyeka
vyavahāro nopapadyata ityarthaḥ ||
nāpi jñānato bādhakam | tatsvarūpapratikṣepasyānubhava
bādhitatvāt | kāraṇapratikṣepasya ca janmanaivāpāsta
tvāt | ekatvapratikṣepasya ca viruddhadharmmādhyāsaviraha
pratihatatvāt | pārokṣyāpārokṣyāderasiddheḥ | viṣayama
pratikṣipya tatprāmāṇyasya pratikṣeptumaśakyatvāt tada
pratikṣepasya ca darśitatvāt | indriyajatvapratikṣepasya
cendriyānvayavyatirekānuvidhānabādhitatvāt | sākṣā
tkāritvaviśrānte ca tadanuvidhānasyāvyabhicārāt |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | mūlavikalpadvaye dvitīyaṃ vikalpaṃ dūṣayati |
nāpīti | jñānato bādhakamiti ko'rthaḥ | kiṃ sāmānyaviṣayaṃ
jñānameva nāsti akāraṇakaṃ vā nānāviṣayakaṃ vā parokṣākāraṃ vā
nirviṣayatvenāpramārūpaṃ vā anindriyajaṃ vā asākṣātkāri vā |
tatra nādya ityāha | tatsvarūpeti | dvitīyaṃ dūṣayati | kāraṇeti |
tṛtīye tvāha | ekatveti | caturthaṃ dūṣayati | pārokṣyeti |
viṣaye tāvanna pārokṣyaṃ nāpyapārokṣyaṃ tadubhayasya jñānadharmmatvāt |
tathā ca jātigocarajñānamindriyajamaparokṣamevānidriyajaṃ tu parokṣa
miti naitat jātau bādhakamityarthaḥ | pañcamaṃ dūṣayati | viṣaya
miti | viṣayapratikṣepādhīno hi prāmāṇyapratikṣepaḥ sa ca prakṛte
nāstītyarthaḥ | ṣaṣṭhaṃ dūṣayati | indriyajeti | saptamaṃ dūṣayati |
sākṣāditi | ayaṃ gaurityādivikalpānāṃ sākṣātvamanubhavasiddha
matopīndriyajatvamityarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | nanvanugatadharmmajñānasyānupalambho bādhakaḥ
syādityata āha | nāpīti | pūrvaṃ jñānaviṣayasyaivānupalabdhi
rnirastetyapaunaruktyam | kāraṇeti | anugatadharmmajñānarūpakāryyasya
tatkāraṇaṃ vinānupapatterityarthaḥ | nanu viruddhadharmmādhyāsādekatvaṃ tatra
bādhitamityāha | ekatveti | nanu sāmānyaṃ naikaṃ vyaktibhedena
pratyakṣānumānaviṣayatayā tatra pārokṣyāpārokṣyaviruddhadharmmādhyāsā
dityata āha | pārokṣyeti | pārokṣyāpārokṣye viṣayiṇo
dharmmo na viṣayasya, tathāvidhajñānaviṣayatvādevārthe tadvyavahārādityarthaḥ |
nanu jñānaprāmāṇyapratikṣepo'stu bādhaka ityata āha | viṣaya iti |
aśakyatvāditi | na cārthajanyajñānatvamabhilāpāsaṃsargitvena vyāpta
miti vācyam | nirvvikalpakatvasyopādhitvāt aprayojakatvācca |
nanu sāmānyaviṣayakavikalpasyānindriyajatvāt prāmāṇyapratikṣepo
'stvityata āha | indriyajatveti | vyaktijñānasyāsyaivānanyathā
siddhānvayavyatirekānuvidhāyitvāt kāraṇatāgrahe tadasambhava ityarthaḥ |
na ca nirvvikalpakotpattāveva tadupakṣayaḥ taddhi yadīndriyasannikarṣā
vyabhicāri tadā tatkaraṇatvamavarjjanīyam | atha kākatālīyasta
tsannidhistadā kadācidindriyārthasannikarṣaṃ vināpi sākṣātkārī
vikalpa utpadyeta | na ca sākṣātkāritvaṃ tasyāsiddhamityāha |
sākṣātkāritveti | tadgatatvenānuvyavasīyamānasya bādhakaṃ vinā
taddharmmitvāt | tathā cendriyajanyatve sākṣātvamātraṃ prayojakaṃ na tu
tadviśeṣa ityarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | jñānato veti dvitīyaṃ vikalpaṃ nirasyati |
nāpīti | bādhakaṃ hi jñānasvarūpe | tadekatve vā | tadeveda
miti vijñānaṃ tadidantāspadayorekadharmmavatvamavagāhamānaṃ sāmānye
pramāṇaṃ bhavet yadi ca tadidaṅgrāhiṇī vijñāne mitho bhinne kva
tadā sāmānyasiddhivārtteti bhavati jñānaikatvabādhātsāmānyabādhaḥ |
tatprāmāṇye vā | ādyamapi jñānasyānupalambho vā kāraṇābhāvo
vā | ādye tatsvarūpamiti | carame kāraṇeti | dvitīye
ekatveti | pārokṣyāpārokṣyalakṣaṇaviruddhadharmādhyāsostītyata āha |
pārokṣyati | saṃskāreṇa smṛtyā copanīte viśeṣaṇepi viśiṣṭa
jñānasyāparokṣatāyā vyutpāditatvāt | tṛtīyamapi viṣayabādho vā
vyāpakānupalambho vā | ādye viṣayamiti | syādetat | artha
sambaddhaṃ hi jñānaṃ pramā, arthanirapekṣāṇāṃ vāsanāmātrasamutthānāṃ
śaśaviṣāṇādivikalpānāmapramāṇatvāt, arthaścendriyasāpekṣa eva pramā
mādhatte, na ca vikalpā indriyajanmāna iti dvitīyaṃ nirasyati |
indriyajatveti | atha vināpīndriyavyāpāraṃ śaśaviṣāṇādivikalpo
tpādādvyabhicāreṇa vikalpākāraṇamindriyaṃ tajjanakanirvikalpaka
evopakṣīṇaṃ vahnyanumitijanakadhūmajñāna ivetyata āha | sākṣā
tkāritveti | sākṣātkāritvāvacchinnaṃ pratyavyabhicāreṇendriyasya
kāraṇatvāt ||
anyathā nirvvikalpakasyāpyanindriyajatvaprasaṅgāt |
kāmāturakāminījñānasya tadantareṇāpyupapatteḥ |
bādhakābhāvācca darśanavyāpāraupādhikatvakalpanānava
kāśāt | avakāśe vā viparyyayakalpanāyā api
prasaṅgāt | indriyamanapekṣya sākṣātkārisamanantara
pratyayamahimamātreṇa sākṣātkārivikalpopapattau tadvi
parītānutpattiprasaṅgāt | prathamamanutpatteḥ pūrvvasmaraṇādi
sahakārivaidhuryyanibandhanatvādityeṣā dik |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | anyatheti | sākṣāttve satyapyanindriyajatvaṃ
cedityarthaḥ | nanu nirvikalpakānantarabhāvitvādhīnaṃ tasya sākṣāttvaṃ
na tu indriyajatvādhīnamityata āha | kāmātureti | yatra
stambhādau kāminīsamāropastatra nirvikalpakaṃ vināpi indriya
jatvamātrādeva tasya sākṣāttvamityarthaḥ | tadantareṇāpi--nirvikalpaka
mantareṇāpi | nanu gaurayamiti vikalpaḥ sākṣātkāro na bhava
tyeva yenendriyajaḥ syāt | sākṣāttvaṃ tu tasya nirvikalpasākṣāttvau
pādhikamityata āha | bādhakābhāvāditi | darśanavyāpāraḥ
sākṣāttvam | yadvā darśana sākṣātkārijñānaṃ tadvyāpārastatkāryo
vikalpa ityayamevopādhiḥ savikalpakasākṣāttva ityarthaḥ | svābhāvika
bādhake satyevopādhikalpanā, tacceha nāstītyarthaḥ | vipakṣadaṇḍamāha |
avakāśe veti | savikalpakasākṣāttvameva nirvikalpake'pyupādhiḥ
syādityarthaḥ | nanvastu vikalpepi svābhāvikaṃ sākṣāttvaṃ na tvindriya
jatvādhīnaṃ, kintu sākṣātkārijñānajanitatvamātreṇetyata āha |
indriyamiti | evaṃ tarhi sākṣātkāriṇaḥ samanantarapratyayāda
sākṣātkārijñānaṃ na syādeva, tacca tavānanumatamityarthaḥ | nanvindriya
meva yadi sākṣātkārisavikalpakajanakaṃ tadendriyāpātamātreṇaiva
jāyeta samarthasya kṣepāyogādityata āha | prathamamiti |
sahakārivilambena vilambasya sthirapakṣopādhitvādityarthaḥ | nanva
bhilāpasaṃsargayogyapratibhāsatvānna tadindriyajamityata āha | ityeṣā
digiti | indriyajatvepyabhilāpasaṃsargayogyapratibhāsatvamaviruddha
mityādi tātparyyapariśuddhau vistara ityarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | nanu vyabhicārānnendriyaṃ tatra hetuḥ kāmā
turakāminīsavikalpakasyendriyārthasannikarṣaṃ vināpyutpatterityata āha |
anyatheti | evaṃ nirvvikalpakamātraṃ tādṛśaṃ nendriyajaṃ syādityarthaḥ |
vastuto yatra purovarttini kāminītvamāropyate tenārthenendriyasanni
karṣo'styeveti bhāvaḥ | nanu savikalpake sākṣāttvaṃ nirvvikalpako
pādhikamanubhūyata iti na tatrendriyajatvasiddhirityata āha |
bādhaketi | darśanavyāpāraḥ sākṣātkāritvam | anyathā savikalpaka
meva sākṣātkāri tadupādhikameva nirvvikalpakena sākṣāttvamanubhūyata
ityāha | avakāśe veti | nanu nirvvikalpakādeva samanantara
pratyayāt savikalpakaṃ sākṣātkāryyupeyate na tvindriyajamityata
āha | indriyamiti | tathā sati tadviparītamasākṣātkāri
savikalpakaṃ nirvvikalpakānnotpadyetetyarthaḥ | nanvindriyaṃ yadi savi
kalpakajanakaṃ tadā nirvvikalpakotpattikāla eva tajjanayedityata
āha | prathamamiti | indriyaṃ viśiṣṭajñāne janayitavye viśiṣṭa
jñānatayā nirvvikalpakamapekṣate pratyabhijñāne tattāsmṛtyapekṣamityarthaḥ |

bhagīº ṭīº | svavāgvirodhasyeti | svalakṣaṇaṃ na śābdavyavahāra

virodhamevāha | tathā hīti | śabdasya saṅketādhīnapravṛttikatayā
saṅketasya cānugatadharmmapuraskāreṇa sambhavāt svalakṣaṇasya cāsādhāraṇa
tayā saṅketāviṣayatvānna tacchabdaviṣayaḥ vikalpasyābhilāpasaṃsarga
yogyatvātsvalakṣaṇe tadabhāvādvyāvṛttiviṣayatayā svalakṣaṇaṃ na viṣaya
iti vicāre yadi śabdasya vastuni vidhiniṣedhagocaratvaṃ svīkṛtaṃ

svavacanapratirodhaḥ na kasyāpi vyavahārasyaṃ viṣaya ityasyaiva vyavahārasya
tatra svīkārādityarthaḥ | viṣayeti | dharmmasya kasyacidavastunītya
vastuni viṣaye tenoktaṃ vastuviṣaye cāsmābhirityarthaḥ ||

bhagīº ṭīº | bauddhairatra vikalpya yaduktaṃ tatra dūṣaṇamāha

śaṅkaº ṭīº | dvitīyamātmani bādhakaṃ nirākarttumutthā
payati | vijñāneti | jāgarūka iti | bāhyanīlādisthairya

ca kṣaṇamātrasthāyi nīlapītādyākāramiti yogācāraḥ | sidhyatu
sthairyyaṃ tathā ca siddhaṃ naḥ samīhitaṃ tacca sthiracidānandasvarūpaṃ
brahmaiva, bāhyaṃ tu nīlādiprapañcamātramalīkamanādyavidyākāranikara
pratibhāsamātramityekadaṇḍinaḥ | ekameva vijñānaṃ paramārthasanna tu
nīlādyapi vastusat, paraṃ tvanādivāsanāparīpākamātrāsādita
nīlādyākāranikarakarambitamata eva taccitramityucyata iti tadeka
deśinaḥ | tadeteṣāṃ jāgarūkatayā kva bāhyasyātmanaḥ siddhiśaṅkā |
bhede sati grāhyagrāhakabhāva eva nāsti na vā dharmmadharmmibhāva iti
bhāvaḥ | bāhyameveti | sāmānyābhāve viśeṣābhāvasya sulabhatvāt |
jñānānātmakasya sarvvasyaiva bāhyatvāditi bhāvaḥ | sa vijñānavādī |
idamagre vakṣyamāṇam | pakṣatayā'bhiprāyaṃ vikalpayati | paramārtheti |
nīlādi svagrāhakajñānajātīyamalīkameva veti vikalpārthaḥ | atra
prameyatvaṃ jñānatvavyāpyaṃ na vā, vivādapadaṃ nīlādi jñānatvāśrayo
na vā, jñānatvaṃ prameyatvavyāpakaṃ na vā, jñānaviṣayatā jñānatvānāśraye
varttate na veti vipratipattayaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | dvitīyamātmani bādhakaṃ śaṅkate | vijñāna
vādinīti | jāgarūka ityanena kṣaṇabhaṅganirāsepi na tanni
rāsa iti darśitam | bāhyaṃ jñānavibhinnameva vastu nāsti
tadviśeṣasyātmanaḥ kutaḥ siddhirityarthaḥ | sa vijñānavādī | idaṃ
vakṣyamāṇaṃ pakṣatrayam | kiṃ ta iti | grāhyaṃ pāramārthikamalīkaṃ
vā | ādyepi grāhakajñānavyaktyabhinnaṃ tayorbhede satyeva jñānajātīyaṃ
veti vikalpārthaḥ | prameyatvaṃ jñānatvavyāpyaṃ na vā | koṭiḥ
parasyālīke prasiddhā | vivādapadaṃ jñānatvāśrayo na veti
vipratipattiḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | bāhyārthabhaṅgaṃ dvitīyaṃ bādhakamāśaṅkate | vijñāna
vādinītyādi | bāhyaṃ jñānabhinnaṃ ātmāpi ca bāhyabheda
eveti bhāvaḥ | atra jñānatvaṃ prameyatvasya sattvasya vā vyāpakaṃ na
veti vipratipattiḥ | alīkasya grāhyatvepi na prameyatvaṃ tadaṃśe
jñānasyāpramātvāditi sampradāyaḥ | etajjñānaviṣayo nīlādireta
jjñānābhinno na veti navyāḥ |
tatra prathame sādhye yaḥ kaściddheturupādīyate saho
palambhaniyamo vā grāhyatvaṃ vā prakāśamānatvaṃ vā
sa vyaktamābhāsaḥ |

tadaviṣayakajñānāviṣayatvaṃ hetvarthaḥ | ābhāsa iti | kālātya
yāpadeśādanaikāntikatvādvā aṅgulīnirddeśyagrāhyātmakatāyā jñānasya
bādhitatvāt viruddhadharmmasaṃsargapratihatatvādvetyarthaḥ |
bhagīº ṭīº | sahopalambheti | yadyapi sahārthasya bheda
garbhatvenābhede sādhye virodhastathāpi tadaviṣayakajñānāviṣayatvaṃ
hetvarthaḥ | nanu yadi grāhyaṃ pakṣīkṛtya jñānābhede sādhye jñānā
viṣayakapratītyaviṣayatvaṃ hetustadā naiyāyikānāmasiddhiḥ tairjñānasya
svaprakāśatvā'svīkārāt ghaṭo'yamiti jñāne jñānasyāprakāśāt |
atha jñānaṃ pakṣīkṛtyārthābhedaḥ sādhyate tathāpyarthāviṣayakapratītya
viṣayatvaṃ heturasiddhaḥ arthapratītiṃ vināpi jñānapadāttatpratīteḥ |
atrāhuḥ | arthasya jñānābhede sādhye svaprakāśapakṣāśrayaṇānnā
siddhiḥ | jñānapakṣatvepi na hetvasiddhiḥ | tathā hi yadi
viṣayitvaṃ jñānatvam, tadā jñānapadādapi viṣayo bhāsate | atha
jātibhedaḥ tathāpi viṣayaghaṭitamūrttāveva jñāne jñānapadaśakti
grahāttato viṣayopi bhāsate | niyamato yadrūpaviśiṣṭe yatpada
śaktigrahastatpadāttasyāpyupasthitiriti vyutpatteḥ | grāhyatvaṃ veti |
ghaṭajñānaṃ ghaṭābhinnaṃ ghaṭo vā ghaṭajñānābhinnaḥ etajjñāna-
viṣayatvāt ghaṭavat tajjñānavacca | jñānasvaprakāśatvānnāsiddhi
rityarthaḥ | prakāśamānatvamiti | pūrvvaṃ grahaṇaviṣayatvamātraṃ hetvartho
'tra tu prakāśasambandhitvamātramityapaunaruktyam | yadvā jñānaviṣayatva
mātraṃ pūrvvahetvarthaḥ tadviśeṣasākṣātkāraviṣayatvamuttarahetvarthaḥ | atrā
bhede sādhye prathamo heturanaikāntikaḥ pratiyogisahopalambhepyabhāva
pratiyogibhedāt svaprakāśatāniṣedhena jñānānupalambhepi nīlādyupa
lambhāt svarūpāsiddhiḥ jñāne'rthasahopalambhepyaprayojakatvaṃ viruddha
dharmmādhyāsābhāvaścopādhiriti dūṣaṇe satyeva dūṣaṇāntaramāha | sa
vyaktamiti ||
raghuº ṭīº | atra grāhyagrāhakayorabhede sarva eva hetu
rābhāsaḥ | tathā hi heturhi pakṣadharmmatayā jñāyamāno'numiti
nimittam, anumitirapi ca pakṣe sādhyaviṣayiṇī | tathā ca parā
marṣahetupakṣasādhyānumitīnāmabhede kuto hetuhetumadbhāvaḥ | kiṃ ca
bhinnasya grāhyatve sarvajñānānāṃ sarvaviṣayatāpattirityādirati
prasaṃgo yadi na gṛhīto na tarhi vyāptisiddhirvipakṣe bādhakā
bhāvāt, gṛhītaścet kathamanyenānyagrahaṇamasyaivārthasyānekapadārtha
ghaṭitasyaikena grahaṇāditi, sahopalambhaniyamo niyamenaikavitti
vedyatvaṃ tadaviṣayakajñānāviṣayatvaṃ vā teṣāṃ jñānasya (sva)prakāśatvāt
