jñānajñeyayorabhedena jñānajñeyagrāhakābhyāṃ jñeyajñānayorapi grahaṇā
nnāsiddhiḥ | jñeyasya jñānābhinnatve sādhye grāhyatvaṃ hetuḥ jñānasya
jñeyābhede ca ṇijarthāntarbhāvāt prakāśamānatvaṃ svaprakāśakatvamiti |
grāhyasya jñānasya grāhakajñānābhinnatve sādhye tadgrāhyatvaṃ
hetuḥ grāhakajñānasya ca tadgrāhyābhinnatve sādhye prakāśamānatvaṃ
tasya grāhakatvamiti yāvat | teṣāṃ grāhyagrāhakayoḥ svaprakāśatvānna
dṛṣṭāntāsiddhirityeke |
ekatra sākṣātkāro'nyatra jñānasāmānyamato bheda ityanye |
tathāhi nīladhavalādiparasparaviruddhākāranika
rāvagāhi vijñānamanubhūyate tadidaṃ tasya svavadhāya
kṛtyotthāpanam |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | tadeva spaṣṭayati | tathāhīti | yogācāra
mate vedāntimate ca samānaṃ doṣamāha | nīladhavalādīti |
samūhālambane yogācārasya nīladhavalādyātmakatvaṃ vedāntināṃ tu
tatrānyatrāpi 1kramavannīlādijñāne virodhāpādanameva | ekasyaiva
jñānasya tanmate kramikanīladhavalādyātmakatvāt | tadidamiti |
ākāranikarāvagāhitvamityarthaḥ | svavadhāya svabhedāya ||
bhagīº ṭīº | tadidamiti | idaṃ biruddhadharmmāvagāhitvam |
tasya jñānasya vijñānavādino vā kṛtyārūpamityarthaḥ ||
kramānnīlādijñāne iti 3 puº pāº |
raghuº ṭīº | idaṃ viruddhānekāvagāhitvam | tasya jñānasya |
svavadhāya svabhedāya | kṛtyārūpaṃ jātam ||
yadi hi mithaḥ pratyanīkadharmmānullikhet kathamekaṃ
sattadātmakaṃ bhavet | na cedullikhet kathaṃ tadākāraṃ
nāma | svasamvedanasyānullikhitarūpābhāvāt |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | pratyanīkadharmmān virodhino nīladhavalādi
dharmmān | kathaṃ tadātmakamiti | ekasyānekātmakatvānupapatteḥ |
kathaṃ tadākāramiti | tadullikhitasyaivākāratvādityarthaḥ | nanvevaṃ
buddhisvarūpameva nāsti, tathā ca vicāroyaṃ nirāśraya iti cet
taduktam--
“bāhyaṃ na paśyati bhidātmatayā'tha sattvā-
darthakriyāvirahasaṅkaratā tvabhede |
buddhistu naśyati bhideva sattvā-
ccitrāpyato na bhidameti kimatra kurmma”
iti | maivam | buddheranubhūyamānatvāt | tasyāstu viṣayabhedā
bhedābhyāṃ vivādāt ||
bhagīº ṭīº | tadeva spaṣṭayati | yadi hīti | nanu
viruddhasya viṣayatvepi nollekha ityata āha | svasamvedaneti |
svaprakāśapakṣe prakāśasyaiva yāvadviṣayollekhitvādityarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | tadeva spaṣṭayati | yadi hīti | athaika
tvānyathānupapattyā'nubhūyamānamapi nānātvāvagāhitvamapalapanīyaṃ,
tatrāha | na cediti | athānullikhitopyākāro bhaviṣyati
tatrāha | svasamvedaneti | tavākārākāriṇorabhedāditi bhāvaḥ |
bhedepi virodho'gre vyaktībhaviṣyati | vastuto nānāviṣayatvamekatvaṃ
ca svasamvedanenānuvyavasāyena vā siddhaṃ na bādhyabādhakabhāvamāsādayati
avirodhādvinigamakābhāvācca, grāhyagrāhakabhāvastu vinā'pyabhedamupa
padyamāno na taṃ sādhayitumīṣṭa iti ||
bāhyasyaivamvidhaviruddhadharmmādhyāsādbhayam, tathātvepya
bhede'rthakriyācetanapravṛttīnāṃ saṅkaraprasaṅgāt vivecanā
nupapattiprasaṅgācca, na tu vijñānasya, na hi
tasyārthakriyādhīnaṃ sattvam, api tu pratibhāsamātrā
dhīnam, nāpi tatrārthakriyārthinaḥ kācit pravṛttiḥ
svarasavāhivijñānapravāhātiriktāyā arthakriyāyā
stadarthinaścābhāvāt, vivecanābhāvaśca paramo
nirvvāhaḥ, svasamviditarū(drū)patvāditi cet |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | ratnakīrtteḥ samādhimatra dūṣayitumupanyasyati |
bāhyasyaivamiti | bāhye viruddhadharmmādhyāsabhayaṃ darśayati | tathātva
iti | viruddhadharmmādhyāse'pyabhede nīladhavalādīnāṃ pratiniyatārtha
kriyākāritvaṃ dṛṣṭameva vighaṭeta, na ca pratiniyatā pravṛttiḥ
syāt | bhayāntaramāha | vivecaneti | vivicyate hi nīlaṃ
dhavalabhinnatvena tadetanna syādityarthaḥ | na tu vijñānasyetyatra
viruddhadharmmādhyāsādbhayamityanuṣajyate | pratibhāsamātrādhīnaṃ svaprakāśa
mātrādhīnam | nāpīti | na hi ghaṭapaṭārthino jñāne pravarttante
api tu tantukapālādāveva | nanvatrāpi bhayaṃ tadavasthamevetyata
āha | svaraseti | arthakriyā pravṛttiḥ tadarthināmapi jñānātma
katvādityarthaḥ | nanvidaṃ nīlajñānamidaṃ pītajñānamiti vivecanaṃ
jñānepyasti, tathā ca viruddhadharmmādhyāse'pyabhede tanna syādityata
āha | vivecaneti | paramo nirvvāha iti | atyantasādhakaḥ
siddhirvvetyarthaḥ | svasamviditeti | jñānayorhi bhedagraho na
tābhyāmeva tayoḥ svamātragrāhyatvāt, bhedasya ca svabhinnatvenāgrāhya
tvāt ata eva (na) jñānāntareṇāpītyarthaḥ | taduktaṃ jñānaśriyā--
“bhāvaṃ kañcitpuraskṛtya bhedābhedāvudīrayet |
deśakālādibhedena cinmātre tatra kaḥ krama” ||
iti | kīrttirapyāha--
“svarūpabuddhiraparairna yāti na bhinatti ca |
svaparapravibhāgo hi dhiyo yācitamaṇḍanam” ||
iti |
bhagīº ṭīº | nanu bāhye viruddhadharmmādhyāso bhedako na
jñānepītyāha | bāhyasyeti | tadupapādayati | tathātvepīti |
yadi viruddhadharmmādhyāsādapi bāhye na bhedastadārthakriyātadarthi
pravṛttyoḥ saṅkaraḥ syāt | tathāhi paṭo yadi ghaṭābhinnaḥ syāt
tadā tadasādhāraṇārthakriyājanakaḥ syāt ghaṭārthipravṛttiviṣayaḥ
syādityarthaḥ | bhedajñānaṃ ca bāhye na syāt tannimittasya viruddha
dharmmādhyāsasyābhedepyupagamādityāha | vivecaneti | vivecanaṃ
bhedajñānam | yadvā pratijñāhetvādivibhāgarūpavivecanaṃ na syādi
tyāha | vivecaneti | na tu vijñānasya bhayamityanuṣajyate |
bāhye yadbhedopapādakaṃ tanna vijñāna ityāha | na hīti | tarhi
jñānasya sattvameva na syāt tvanmate'rthakriyāyāḥ sattvarūpatvādityata
āha | api tviti | tasya svaprakāśatayā svamātrapramāṇakatva
mityarthaḥ | mātrapadamarthakriyādhīnasattvanirākaraṇārtham | nāpyartha
kriyārthipravṛttisaṅkaraḥ, tatrāpravṛtterityāha | nāpīti | svara
seti | svaprakāśāvacchinnajñānaparamparābhinnāyā ityarthaḥ | tathāpi
vivecanānupapattyā viruddhadharmmādhyāso bhedako'stvityata āha |
vivecaneti | nīlataddhiyorabhedādvivecanānupapattiriṣṭaiveti na
dūṣaṇam, bhede viṣayaviṣayibhāvātiprasakteḥ | na ca jñānagrāhaka
mānasya tadbhinnasyābhāvāttadasiddhiḥ, svaprakāśatayā svamānakatvā
ttasyetyarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | tathātvepi viruddhadharmādhyāsepi yadyabhedastadā
dahanādudanyopaśamanamudakācca dāhaḥ syādityarthakriyāsaṅkaraḥ evaṃ
dāhārthamudake udanyopaśamārthaṃ ca dahane pravṛttiḥ syāditi pravṛtti
saṅkaraḥ | vivecanaṃ ekāgrahe'nyasya grahaṇaṃ bhedajñānamityanye | parama
iti | bhede hi kadācidekāgrahepītaradgṛhyate, na ceha tadasti,
nīladhavalākāratvenaiva svaprakāśena grahaṇāt bhinnatvādeva ca jñānā
ntareṇāgrahaṇāttathā ca vivecanābhāvādevābhedasiddhirityarthaḥ ||
tat kimaṅga ? pariṇataśānterāśramapadamiva vijñāna
māsādya vyālanakulāderiva nīladhavalādeḥ śāśva
tikavirodhatyāgo nibhṛtavairāṇāṃ tatphalatyāgo vā |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | aṅgeti sambodhane | jñānākārāṇāṃ nīla
dhavalādīnāṃ virodha eva nāsti | virodhe satyapi vā bhedakatvaṃ
nāstīti vikalpārthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | jñāne viruddhadharmmādhyāsādyanna bhayaṃ tat kiṃ
tanniṣṭhadharmmayorvirodha eva nāsti yadvā bhavannapi sa na bhedāye
tyāha | tat kimiti | aṅgeti sākṣepasambodhanam ||
raghuº ṭīº | tatkimityādi | nīladhavalādīnāṃ jñāne na
virodhaḥ satyapi vā tasminna jñānabhedakatvamiti vikalpārthaḥ ||
na tāvat prathamaḥ, parasparaniṣedhavidhināntarī
yakavidhiniṣedhayoravirodhe jagati virodhoccheda
prasaṅgāt | na caivamastvityuttarepi nirvṛtiḥ, kathama
pyuktarūpatāyā anivṛtteḥ, tāvanmātraśarīratvācca
virodhasya | tatsiddhireva ca bhedasiddhirato na
dvitīyopi |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | paraspareti | parasparavidhivyāpyaniṣedhayoḥ para
sparaniṣedhavyāpyavidhyorvvetyarthaḥ | ādyo nīlapītādīnāmantyo bhāvā
bhāvayorvirodhaḥ na cāvirodhe virodhocchedaprasaṅga ityāpādyā
pādakābhedaḥ | evambhūtayoravirodhe kvāpi virodho na syāditi
sāmānyaviśeṣabhāvamāśrityāpādyāpādakayorbhedāt | yadvā nīlatvaṃ
yadi pītatvābhāvavyāpyaṃ na syāt pītavṛtti syāditi viśiṣyaivā
pādyam | nanu virodhopi jñānābhinna evātaḥ sopi māstu,
kinnaśchinnamityata āha | na ceti | uktarūpatāyā iti |
nīlādīnāṃ parasparavirahavyāpyarūpatāyā ityarthaḥ | nanu bhavatvevaṃ
kiñcāta ityata āha | tāvanmātreti | parasparavirahavyāpyatā
mātraśarīratvādityarthaḥ | virodhābhāve vipratipatteranudayāt kathā
pravṛttireva na syāt na syācca jñānānāmapi mitho bheda iti
bhāvaḥ | tatsiddhiriti | virodhasiddhirityarthaḥ | na dvitīyopīti |
nimṛtavairāṇāṃ tatphalaparityāgo vetyapi pakṣo nāsti | ayameva
hi bhedo bhedaheturvā yadviruddhadharmmādhyāsaḥ kāraṇabhedo veti
tvayaivābhidhānādityarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | paraspareti | parasparābhāvavyāpyayorityarthaḥ |
avirodha iti | atra yadyapyāpādyāpādakayorabhedastathāpi viruddhatva
prakārakapramāviṣayatvābhāva āpādyaḥ | yadvā nīlatvaṃ yadi pīta
tvābhāvavyāpyaṃ na syāt pītavṛtti syāditi viśiṣyaivāpādanam |
nanu nīlapītau jñānātmakāvatajjñāne sahopalambhānna tayorvirodha
iṣṭāpattirityāha | na cavamiti | uktarūpatāyā viruddharūpa
tāyā ityarthaḥ | evaṃ sarveṣāmavirodhe vipratipattyabhāvāt kathāyāṃ
pravṛttirna syāt, antato virodho'sti virodho nāstītyanayo
rapyuktarītyā virodho na syāditi vyāghātāttayorviruddharūpatā
mantavyetyarthaḥ | tāvanmātreti | nīlapītayorvirodhe bhāsamāna eva
jñāyamānatvādvirodhastadubhayākārapratibhāsanādeva siddhyati, anyathā
jñānānāmapi na mitho bheda ityekajñānamātraparyavasānādadvaitamata
praveśa ityarthaḥ | kecittvidamagrimagranthena yojayanti, tāvanmātra
śarīratvāt viruddhadharmmamātrātmakatvāt, tathā ca viruddhadharmma
siddhireva bhedasiddhiriti dvitīyapakṣopi nāstītyarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | paraspareti | yadyapi nīladhavalādīnāmeka
vidhāvitaraniṣedhadhrauvyepi naikaniṣedhe itaravidhidhrauvyam, tṛtīya
prakārasyāpi sambhavāt, tathāpi parasparābhāvavyāpyatvamātre tātpa
ryam | samudita bhāvābhāvābhiprāyeṇa, nīladhavalādyabhiprāyeṇa
cādyamātra1mityapi vadanti | parasparābhāvavyāpyayorapi nīla
dhavalayoravirodhe'viśeṣāttathāvidhānāmitareṣāmapyavirodhāpattiḥ,
tathā ca bāhyānāmapi nīladhavalādīnāṃ gavāśvādīnāṃ ca bhedo
na siddhyet, tanmūlasya viruddhadharmmādhyāsasya nirāsāditi bhāvaḥ |
vijñānavādināṃ nedamaniṣṭamityabhiprāyikāmāśaṅkāṃ nirasyati |
na caivamiti | uktarūpatāyāḥ parasparābhāvavyāpyatāyāḥ | tāva-
nāntarīyakāntam iti 3 puº ṭippanī vartate |
nmātraśarīratvāt parasparābhāvavyāpyatvamātrarūpatvāt | anyathā
bāhyānāṃ bāhyavijñānayorvijñānānāṃ ca bhedavirahe'dvaitamatāva
lambanam, na ca vinā bhedābhyupagamaṃ vicārārambhasambhava ityagre
vyaktībhaviṣyati | tatsiddhireva virodhasiddhireva bhedasiddhi
statparyavasāyinī vā ||
yastu bāhye virodhaparipālanāya viśeṣo darśitaḥ
sa teṣāmevāstu | yadi hi viruddhadharmmādhyāsasya
bhedasādhakatvaṃ prati samāśvāsaḥ, kimarthakriyāpratiniya
mopanyāsena | na cet, tathāpi kiṃ tena, sopi
hyarthakriyayorviruddhadharmmādhyāsena bhede sati syāt |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | nanvarthakriyāpratiniyamaḥ pravṛttiniyamaśca bāhye
bhedaka uktaḥ, sa ca jñāne nāstīti jñānaṃ kathaṃ bhidyatāmata
āha | yastviti | bāhyepi tayorbhedakatvaṃ virodhādhīnaṃ, sa
cedvirodho jñānepyasti tadā tadapi bhidyetaiva, anyathā arthakriyāṇāṃ
pravṛttīnāñca bhedo na syādyato bāhyaṃ bhidyetetyarthaḥ | viśeṣa iti |
arthakriyāpratiniyamarūpa ityarthaḥ | sa teṣāmiti | arthakriyāprati
niyamena bāhyānāmeva bhedo'stviti | yadi hīti | tadayaṃ
samudāyārthaḥ, viruddhadharmmādhyāso bhedako na vā, prathame jñānamapi
nīladhavalākāraṃ tato bhidyeta | antye'rthakriyābhedopi na syānna
syācca tadadhīno bāhyabhedaḥ | kimartheti | tadantareṇāpi viruddha-
dharmmādhyāsenaiva bāhyabhedasiddheḥ | na cediti | viruddhadharmmādhyāso
yadi na bhedakastadā'rthakriyāpratiniyamopi na syādityarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | nanu parasparābhāvavyāpyatvamātraṃ na virodha
śarīram, kintvarthakriyāpratibhāsaniyamamantarbhāvyetyata āha |
yastviti | kevalo yadi viruddhadharmmādhyāso na bhedakastadārtha
kriyāpratiniyamo na syāt, na hi tasyā api bhedo'rthakriyā
ntarabhedāt, anavasthānāt, tathā ca tāṃ vinā kevalāttatra bheda
siddhāvanyatrāpi tatheti kimarthakriyāpratiniyamenetyarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | sa teṣāmevāstviti sopahāsam | sopi
arthakriyāniyamopi | arthakriyāyā arthakriyāntarānusaraṇe'na
vasthā, na cānavasthitārthakriyāsantāno'sarvajñapuruṣavedya iti ||
anyacca yathā bāhye'rthakriyāpratiniyamo na syāditi
daṇḍastathā jñānepi pratibhāsaniyamo na syāditi
daṇḍa eva |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | nanu yathā yadi bāhyānāṃ parasparaṃ bhedo
na syāttadārthapratiniyamo na syāditi bāhyabhedasādhane vipakṣa
daṇḍaḥ tathā jñāne nāsti yena tadbhedoṅgīkriyetetyata āha |
anyacceti | pratibhāsaniyamo na syāditi | nīlajñānamapi
pītākāraṃ bhavet pītajñānamapi nīlākāraṃ bhavedityarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | kiñca yathā ghaṭapaṭayoravirodhe'rthakriyā
pratiniyamo na syādityaniṣṭāpattirevaṃ nīlapītayoranyonya
jñāne'nyonyaṃ na bhāsata iti pratibhāsaniyamo na syāt, nīla
pītayorbhedābhāvāt, tathā ca tayoranyonyajñāne'nyonyaṃ bhāsetetya
niṣṭamāpadyetetyarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | atha bāhyānāṃ bhede sādhye'rthakriyāniyamā
nupapattirasti vipakṣe bādhikā na tu jñānasya bhede kimapī
tyata āha | anyacceti ||
kva pratibhāsāsāṅkaryaniyamaḥ, sahaiva pratibhāsopi
syāditi cet, na sahānupalambhamasāṅkaryaṃ brūmaḥ, kintu
nīlasyaiva pītatvena pītasyaiva nīlatvenānupalambham |
sa eva mūlaṃ sarvavirodhānām |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | nanu pratibhāsaniyamo na syāditi nedama
niṣṭaṃ, nīladhavalādīnāṃ sahaivopalambhasya mayābhyupagamāditi
śaṅkate | kveti | nīlapītādīnāṃ sahaivopalambhena pratibhāsa
sāṅkaryyepi nīlasyaiva pītatvena pītasyaiva nīlatvena bhānaṃ tvayā
neṣyate tadevāpādyate, nīlapītādīnāṃ virodhābhāvāditi pari
harati | na sahānupalambhamiti | sarvavirodhānāmiti | bāhyepi
virodhānāṃ tadeva mūlaṃ yadekasyāparātmatayā'nupalambha ityarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | nanu nīlasya pītādinā sahopalambhadarśanānna
tatpratiniyama itīṣṭāpattirityāha | kveti | na viṣayaprati
niyamamātraṃ pratibhāsāsāṅkaryaṃ brūmaḥ, kintu pītatvenopalambhānnīla
tvenopalambho bhinna iti, tathā ca prakārataḥ pratibhāsaniyamo
na syādekajñānābhinnatvānnīlapītayorityāpādanārtha ityāha |
saheti | sa eveti | prakārataḥ pratibhāsaniyamaḥ, prakārata eva
virodhanirūpaṇādityarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | pratibhāsasya niyamo'sāṅkaryam, tacca svarūpataḥ
prakārataśca, tatrādyasyāsiddhiṃ śaṅkate | kveti | sahaiveti | nīla
pītāvagāhino jñānasya nīlapītākārayostenaiva pratibhāsanā
dityarthaḥ | dvitīyamabhyupetya nirākaroti | neti | kintviti |
nīlākārasya jñānasya pītākāratvena pītākārasya ca nīlākāra
tvenānupalambhaṃ tayorabhedabādhakaṃ brūma ityarthaḥ | tayorabhede hi
ekaikākārasyāpi jñānasyobhayākāratāyāmubhayākāratvenopalambha
prasaṅgāt | sa eva ekasyānyātmanānupalambha eva | sarvavirodhā
nām bāhyāntaravirodhānām ||
anyathopalambhānupalambhayorapyasiddhireva | yadapi
nopalabhyata ityucyate tadapyupalabhyata eva, yadidamaśvā
dikamupalabhyate tannopalabhyata ityuktyaiva nirvṛtteḥ |
tenātmanā nopalabhyata iti cet, tat kiṃ sahopa-
lambhepi nīlātmanā pītamupalabhyate yato na virodhaḥ
syāt | tasmādubhāvapi virodhau samau kṣamau cābheda
visarjane | kevalamekasya prauḍhiḥ subhagābhikṣukanyāyena
yadi syāt |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | nīladhavalādīnāṃ sahopalambhādavirodhaścettadopa
lambhānupalambhayorapi virodho na syāt, kadācittayorapi
sahopalambhasambhavādityāha | anyatheti | asiddhireveti |
virodhādhīno hi bhedo virodhaścennāsti tadaikaśeṣa evetyekatarā
siddhirityarthaḥ | etadevāha | yadapīti | anupalambhasyābhāvā
dityarthaḥ | maitrastvayā nopalabdha iti pṛṣṭonupalabdhamaitropyupalabdha
eva maitra ityukteranivṛttiprasaṅgādityāha | yadidamiti | nanu1
yadyupalambhonupalambhātmanā upalabhyetānupalambho vā upalambhātmanā
veti tadā tayoravirodhaḥ syānna caivamityāha | teneti | nīla
dhavalādāvapi sahopalambhamātraṃ na tvekātmanā'nyasyopalambha iti
kathaṃ na tatra virodhaḥ syādityāha | tatkimiti | pratibhāsa
bhedāya tatrāpi virodhadhrauvyamupasaṃharati | tasmāditi | ubhāvapi
bāhyagatajñānagatau bhedau pravṛttiniyamakṛtāvityarthaḥ | pravṛttiprati
niyamādhīnasya bāhyabhedasya tvayāpi puraskṛtasya saubhāgyāt prauḍhi
rasmadāpādyamānasya pratibhāsādhīnajñānabhedasya tvayā'nabhyupagamāda
prauḍhirityarthaḥ | bhikṣuvisarjane durbhagāyāḥ prādhānyamasahamānayā
nanvayamupalambho iti 3 puº pāº |
subhagayā svayameva bhikṣurvisarjjita iti subhagābhikṣukanyāyaḥ | yadi
syādityatra tadā syāditi śeṣaḥ | yadvā yadiparamasahyastu viraha
itivanna śeṣāpekṣā ||
bhagīº ṭīº | yadi ca naivaṃ tadopalambhānupalambhayorapyeka
jñānagocaratvenāvirodhe yadupalabhyate tannopalabhyate yacca nopalabhyate
tadupalabhyata eveti tayorvirodhagraha eva na syādityāha | anya
theti | yadidamiti | idaṃ bhūtalam | yadupalabhyate sa eva
ghaṭavattvopalambha ityuktyaiva nirvṛttirityarthaḥ | teneti | upalambhatve
nānupalambhastattvena copalambho nānubhūyata ityarthaḥ | tat kimiti |
tarhi nīlapītayorekajñānaviṣayatvepyanyatarasādhāraṇaikaprakāravattayā
nānubhūyata iti prakāratāsāṅkaryamastyevetyarthaḥ | ubhāvapīti |
ubhau bāhyajñānavṛttī virodhau | abhedavisarjane bhede samarthau |
samatvādityekasyaiva jñānavṛttereva tasya prauḍhirbhikṣukaprasthāpanepi
durbhagāyāḥ prādhānyamasahamānayā subhagayaiva prasthāpita iti nyāyena
yadi syādityarthaḥ |
raghuº ṭīº | upalambhānupalambhayośca rūpabhedāniveśane upa
labhyamānatvānupalabhyamānatvavyavasthā na syādanupalabhyamānatvenābhi
matasyopalabhyamānatāyā upalabhyamānatvenopetasyacānupalabhyamānatāyāḥ
suvacatvādityāha | anyatheti | yadapi gavādikam | kathaṃ
tadupalabhyata ityata āha | yadidamaśvādikamiti | evaṃ yada-
śvādikamupalabhyata ityucyate tannopalabhyate, kathaṃ tannopalabhyate,
yannopalabhyate gavādikaṃ tadeva taditi | atha gaurgotvenopalabhyate
nāśvatvena, aśvastu aśvatvena na gotveneti na tayorabheda iti yadi
tadaikajñānagocarāvapi nīlapītākārau nīlapītākārābhyāmupa
labhyete na pītanīlākāratvābhyāmiti tayorapi nābhedaḥ | na caikaṃ
jñānaṃ bhinnobhayākāraṃ bhavitumarhati, tavākārākāriṇorabhedā
diti śaṅkottarābhyāmāha | tenetyādi | sahopalambhe nīla
pītādisamūhālambane | ubhau bāhyārthajñānaniṣṭhau | etenaikameva
vicitraṃ jñānaṃ nīlapītābhyāmākārābhyāmupalabhyata iti pratyuktam,
gavāśvayoriva nīlapītākārayorapi vijñānayoḥ pratibhāsabhedā
dinā niyatabhedasiddheḥ, anyathā tayorapi kvacit saṅkaraprasaṅgāt |
samau pramāṇapratītatvāt ||
etena vivecanābhāvopi nirastaḥ, ākārayorasa
mbhedena vedanasyaiva vivecanatvāt |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | tadevaṃ vijñānasya viruddhadharmmādhyāsādbhayaṃ
nāstīti yatpareṇoktaṃ tannirākṛtya vivecanābhāvastu paramo
nirbāha(ka) iti yatpareṇoktaṃ tannirākaroti | eteneti | prati
bhāsabhedavivecanenetyarthaḥ | ākārayoriti | nīladhavalākārayo
rasadbhedaścetsādhitastadā tadākārajñānasyāpi bhedenaiva vivecanaṃ
siddhaṃ yata ityarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | jñāne bāhyavanna vivecanamityatra dūṣaṇamāha |
eteneti | virodhopasthāpanena | nīlapītādyākārayorasāṅkaryeṇa
vedanameva vivecanapadārtha ityāha | ākārayoriti ||
raghuº ṭīº | asiddhatvena vivecanābhāvo na jñānābhedasādhaka
ityāha | eteneti ||
api ca kṣaṇikatāyamekapuruṣāpekṣayā bāhyasyāpi
kuto vivecanam | nānāpuruṣāpekṣayāpi sandigdham |
pareṇa parasyāvedanāt kva sandeha iti cet, abhedenaiva,
tattvavivecanaṃ sādhyam, tathā ca kiṃ tenopanyastenāpi |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | api ca bāhyajñānayorubhayorapi vivecanā
bhāvastulya ityāha | api ceti | kveti | bāhyasya kṣaṇikatvena
bhedagrahakāle vināśāt kva vivecanamityarthaḥ | yadvā bāhyena
sahopalambhaniyamādyathā jñāne vivecanābhāvastayostathā sahopa
labdhayornnīlapītayostena puruṣeṇa vivecanābhāva ityarthaḥ | nanu yau
nīlapītāvekena puruṣeṇa sahopalabdhau tayostadānīmeva puruṣānta
reṇa vivecanaṃ sambhavatyevetyata āha | nāneti | puruṣāntareṇa
tadā tayorvivecanamiti niścayo nāsti sandehastu tajjñānepi
sahopalabdhayorapi nīlatajjñānayoḥ puruṣāntareṇa vivecanasambhavā
dityarthaḥ | nanu puruṣāntareṇa jñānayorgrāhyagrāhakayorvā bhedo
grahīṣyata ityādyākāramsandehaḥ tadā syādyadi bhedena grāhyagrāhaka
bhāvo bhavenna caitadastītyāha | pareṇeti | jñāne vivecanānupa
pattyā grāhyagrāhakayorabhedastvayā sādhyate tadubhayābhede ca vivecanā
nupapattirityanyonyāśraya ityata āha | abhedenaiveti ||
bhagīº ṭīº | tatraiva dūṣaṇāntaramāha | api ceti | yadi
yena jñānena saha yadupalabhyate tena saha tasyābhedaḥ sahopalambha
niyama iti jñāne vivecanābhāvastadā kṣaṇikayornīlapītayoḥ
sahopalabdhayorna kālāntare tenaiva puruṣeṇa pṛthagupalambha iti
bāhyepi vivecanābhāva evetyarthaḥ | nanu tadaiva tayoḥ puruṣāntareṇa
pṛthagupalambho vivecanaṃ syādityata āha | nāneti | atra
niścayābhāvāt sandeho vācyaḥ sa ca jñānepīti na viśeṣa ityarthaḥ |
nanu pareṇa paravedane na viṣayaviṣayibhāvaniyāmakamiti svenaiva
svasya vedanānna jñāne tatsandeha ityāha | pareṇeti | jñānasya
svagrāhyābhede sādhye vivecanānupapattiḥ sādhanamuktam, tatrāsiddhyu
ddhārārthamabhedenaiva grāhyagrāhakabhāva uktastatra ca sādhyāviśeṣa
ityāha | abhedenaiveti ||
raghuº ṭīº | athaikāgrahaṇe'nyasya grahaṇaṃ vivecanaṃ, na ca vicitra
jñānagatayornīlapītākārayostathā sambhavati, svasamvedanasamvedyatvāt,
avicitrajñānagatau ca nīlapītākārāvanyāveva, ākāriṇāṃ bhede
tadabhinnānāmākārāṇāmabhedānupapatterityata āha | api ceti |
vivecanābhāvastasyāṃ vyaktau tajjātīye sarvatra vā | ādyepyekasya
puṃsaḥ puruṣāntarasyāpi vā | prathame, kṣaṇikatāyāmiti |
kṣaṇikayornīlapītayorekapuruṣīyaikajñānagrāhyayostena puṃsā vive
canasyābhāvādityarthaḥ | carame, nāneti | ekapuruṣavedyasya
nīlādeḥ puruṣāntareṇa grahaṇe niścayābhāvāt sandeho vācyaḥ,
sa ca jñānākārepi tulya ityarthaḥ | etena tenaiva puṃsā kālāntare
bāhyasya smaraṇādilakṣaṇaṃ vivecanaṃ pratyuktaṃ veditavyam | anyenānyasyā
vedanāttadbhinnena puruṣāntarīyajñānena na tajjñānākāravivecana
sambhāvanetyāśaṅkate | pareṇeti | nirākaroti | abhedenaiveti |
abhedasiddhiparyavasāyinyā bhede grāhyagrāhakabhāvānupapattyaivāvivecanaṃ
sādhyam, tathā ca kimantargaḍunā'vivecanena | na caivamevāstu, tasyā
apyasiddheḥ | api ca bhinnayorna cedgrāhyagrāhakabhāvaḥ, kathaṃ tarhi
bāhyayorapi sahopalabdhayornīlapītayorvivecanam | ekaikagrāhiṇā
jñānāntareṇeti cet, tadapi tato bhinnamabhinnaṃ vā | bhinnaṃ cet,
na tarhi grāhyagrāhakabhāvaḥ | abhinnaṃ cet, paryavasitaṃ tarhi pañcānā
mabhedena, tadabhinnābhinnasya tadabhinnatvāt, tathā ca kuto
vivecanam | evaṃ ca sahopalambhaniyame niyamāṃśo vyartha iti
draṣṭavyam | paraṃ ca vivecanābhāvajñānaṃ vivecanaṃ gṛhṇāti na vā |
gṛhṇāti cet, siddhaṃ tarhi bhinnasyāpi grāhyatvam, vivecanasyāneka
padārthaghaṭitamūrtikatvāt | na cet, nābhedānumāpakam, abhāva
mātrasyānaikāntikatvāt | vastugatyā vivecanasyābhāvo nānai
kāntika iti cet, astvidameva jñānaṃ taṃ tamarthaṃ gṛhṇāti na
veti vivicyatām | grahaṇe bhinnasyāpi grāhyatvamagrahaṇe tu na
niyama iti | evaṃ pareṇa parasyāvedanādavivecanaṃ sādhyam,
tadyadi na jñātam, kutaḥ sādhyasiddhiḥ | jñātaṃ cet, siddhaṃ
parasya pareṇa vedanam ||
tajjātīyasya tu bāhyavadvijñānasyāpi vivecana
meveti | svasamvedanabādhito'yaṃ biruddhadharmmādhyāso
na bhedasādhaka iti uṣṭralaguḍakam, samvedanenaivāsya
sādhitatvāt |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | nanu kṣaṇikatayaivaikā nīlavyaktiḥ pītavyaktita
stena puruṣeṇa vivicyatāṃ, nīlajātīyaṃ pītajātīyādbhinnamiti
bāhye vivecanamastyevetyata āha | tajjātīyasyeti | tarhi nīla
jñānajātīyaṃ pītajñānajātīyādbhinnamiti vijñānepi vivecana
mastyevetyarthaḥ | nanu nīlapītaviṣayakaikajñānasyaikatvenānubhavā
dviruddhadharmmādhyāsena tadbhedasādhanaṃ bādhitamityata āha | samvedaneti |
evaṃ samvedanameva hantumupakrāntaṃ tadeva bhedaṃ haniṣyati, tathā ca
kurūpo hanyatāmiti śrutvā kurūpahananāya prathamamuṣṭreṇaiva laguḍakaṃ
gṛhītamiti nyāyamanubhavatītyarthaḥ | nīlāt pītaṃ bhinnaṃ nīla
jātīyāt pītaṃ bhinnamiti bāhyepi samvedanādhīna eva bhedaḥ
sa kathaṃ tenaiva bādhyatāmiti siddhaṃ viruddhadvayākāraṃ jñānamapi
viruddhadharmmādhyāsādbhinnamiti bhāvaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | bāhyatajjātīye vivecanamastyeveti jñānepi
tusyamityāha | tajjātīyasyeti | nanu nīlapītajñānasya viruddha
dharmmādhyāsena bhedasādhanaṃ bādhitam, nīlapītayorvirodhe'nubhūya
mānepi tadviṣayajñānasyābhedādityata āha | samvedaneti |
kurūpahananaprastāve kurūpatara uṣṭra eva laguḍaṃ gṛhītvopasthita
iti nyāyamidamanuharatītyarthaḥ | atra hetumāha | samvedane
naiveti | nīlamidaṃ na pītamiti jñānenaiva virodhasya sādhita
tvāt tenaiva kathaṃ tadbādhaḥ, anyathā'viruddhadharmmādhyāsena jñānaikyameva
kiṃ na sādhyate, yadi tajjñānaikyaṃ samvedanabalādāsthīyate, tadā
viruddhadharmmasyāpi tata eva siddhiriti jñānaviṣayayorabheda eva
bādhyata ityarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | dvitīye, tajjātīyeti | viruddhadharmmādhyāsāt
samvidbhedaḥ sādhyaḥ, sa eva tu nāstyanubhavabādhitatvādityāśaṅkya
nirākaroti | samvedaneti | evaṃ bruvataḥ katamobhiprāyaḥ, kiṃ
nīlatvādīnāṃ virodha eva nāsti, kiṃ vā vijñānasya tadvattvam
atha tadanavagāhitvam | nādyaḥ teṣāṃ virodhasya sādhitatvāt |
dvitīye tu siddhaṃ jñānānātmanopi grāhyatvam | tṛtīyetvāha |
uṣṭralaguḍakamiti | athāyamāśayaḥ, yathā bhavatāṃ nīlapītā
dyārabdhe'vayavinyekatrānekarūpasamavāyāyogādatiriktaṃ citraṃ rūpam,
tathā'smākamapyekatra vijñāne'nekākārāsambhavādatirikta eva
citrākāra iti, sambhāvyetāpyayamidaṃ citramiti jñāne, na tvidaṃ
nīlamidaṃ ca pītamete nīlapīte mitho bhinne ityādike |
vyaktībhaviṣyati cedamagre ||
hinastu tarhi prakāśamānatā'nekatvaṃ viruddhadharmmā
dhyāsopyekatām, tathāpyekatvānekatvavikalanīlā
dyākāraprakāśasvarūpe kimāyātamiti cet, tadidaṃ
bhautaiḥ kṣetranināyanam | niyatākāratvameva hyekatvama
niyatākāratvaṃ cānekatā, tannivṛttau ca na nīlā
kāraṃ nāpi nīlapītādyākāramityanākāra
mevāvaśiṣyate |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | nanu nīladhavalādyekajñānakukṣāveva prakāśamāna
tvānurodhāt praviṣṭamapi tadjñānaṃ kathamanekaṃ syānna ca tadekameva
bhavitumarhati, viruddhadharmmādhyāsādityekatvamanekatvaṃ ca vivādapada
jñāne mānaṃ māstu jñānasvarūpaṃ tu svasamvedanasiddhaṃ durnnirasanam |
taduktaṃ jñānaśriyā--
“dvitraikavyavahāropi bhedāpohaparomataḥ |
ekānekatvavikalaḥ prakāśaḥ kevalo'tra san” ||
ityāha | hinastviti | tarhi tajjñānaṃ naikasvarūpaṃ na
vā'nekasvarūpamiti niḥsvarūpameva paryavasannamityāha | tadida
miti | bhautairbarbaraiḥ kṣetranilāyanaṃ kṣetrakevalīkaraṇam | sasya
rakṣāyai tṛṇe nirasanīye sasyamapi nirastameveti yathetyarthaḥ |
etadevāha | niyateti ||
bhagīº ṭīº | nanu bādhakabalādekatvānekatvayordharmmayormitho
virodhenaikatrābhāvepi dharmmisvarūpeṇa jñānasyābhedo'stvityata āha |
hinastviti | tadidaṃ sasyopacayāya tṛṇe nirākartavye barbareṇa
sasyamapi nirākṛtamitivadityāha | tadidamiti | tat spaṣṭa
yati | niyateti ||
raghuº ṭīº | śaṅkate | hinastviti | prakāśamānatā
anekatvamiti bhedagrāhyatvāyogāt1 | prakāśamānatā ekatvena
prakāśa ityanye | prakāśasvarūparakṣaṇāyaikatvānekatvanirākaraṇam,
tasmiṃśca sati prakāśasvarūpameva na syādityāha | tadidamiti |
bhautaiḥ anabhijñaiḥ | tadeva vyutpādayati | niyateti | tannivṛttau
niyatāniyatākārasvarūpaikatvānekatvanivṛttau | nirākārameveti |
tathā ca nīlādyākāraprakāśasvarūpa iti yaduktaṃ tadvyāhata
miti bhāvaḥ ||
syādetat | pāramārthiko viruddhadharmmādhyāso bheda
heturayaṃ kālpanika iti cet, evaṃ tarhi sutarāma
yatnasiddhaṃ sphaṭikavadbodhasya nirākāraśuddhatvam, ākāra
nikarastvanātmeva sphuratītyubhayathaiva kālātyayāpa
diṣṭāḥ sahopalambhādayaḥ |
grāhyatvāropāt iti 3 puº pāº |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | nanu nīlapītādīnāmavastutvāttadghaṭito
viruddhadharmmādhyāsopyavastubhūtaḥ katha jñānaṃ bhindyādityāha | syādeta
diti | ubhayatheti | nīlādīnāṃ pāramārthikatve 'pāramārthikatve
cetyarthaḥ | tatra pāramārthikatve viruddhadharmmādhyāsāduktādeva bādho
jñānasya nīlādyabhede sādhye aparamārthasato jñānasyāpāramārthika
nīlādyabhede sādhye tu sutarāṃ bādha ityarthaḥ | ubhayatheti |
paramārthasadākāratve nirākāratve cetyartha iti kecit ||
bhagīº ṭīº | nirākāraśuddhatvaṃ svātmībhūtākāraśūnyatva
mityarthaḥ | ubhayatheti | jñānasya pāramārthikatve'pāramārthikatve ca ||
raghuº ṭīº | ubhayathāpīti | prakāśamānasya jñānā(nā)tmano
nīlādyākārasya pāramārthikatve kālpanikatve cetyarthaḥ ||
api ca āstāṃ tāvadviruddhadharmmādhyāsacintā |
yo'yaṃ grāhyagrāhakabhāgabhedo grāhyanīlādibhedo vā
cakāsti, sa kiṃ satyo'satyo vā | satyatve sa eva
doṣaḥ | asatyatve nāyamātmā vijñānasyetyanātmanyapi
sahopalambhaniyamādayogyatā ityanekāntāḥ | bhedo na
prathata eveti cet, evaṃ tarhi astu tāvat sarva
janīnapratītivirodhaḥ svavāgvirodho vā | amiddhā-
starhi hetavaḥ | na hi bhedāprathane sahārthaṃ tadvyāpyatāṃ
vā paśyāmaḥ | tadasphuraṇepi pakṣādipravibhāgopi
katham, kaṃ ca bodhayituṃ pravṛtto'si kimarthaṃ ca, anvaya
vyatirekāpratītau kiṃ ca hetorbalam, kutaśca viprati
pattiḥ kīdṛśe ceti | so'yaṃ vicāramārabhate, bhedaṃ
tu sāmvṛtamapi necchati, nūnamunmattopyanena jitaḥ |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | ekadaṇḍimatamantarbhāvya doṣāntaramāha | api
ceti | āstāṃ tāvaditi | doṣāntaramevātra draḍhīya iti
bhāvaḥ | sa eveti | bhāsamānasya bhedasya satyatve grāhyābheda
sādhane bādha evetyarthaḥ | anekāntā iti | asatyasya
bhedasya grāhyatve sahopalambhaniyatatvāditi hetusattvepi sādhyasya
grāhyābhedasyāsattvādanaikāntikatvamityarthaḥ | svavāgvirodha iti |
bhedapadamuccārayato bhedo na prathata iti svavāgvirodha ityarthaḥ |
asiddhāḥ svarūpāsiddhāḥ | tadvyāpyatāmiti | tasya (vyāpya)vyāpya
vyāpakabhāvasya bhedagarbhatvādityarthaḥ | pakṣādīti | pakṣasādhyahetu
dṛṣṭāntādīnāṃ bhede satyeva anumānapravṛtterityarthaḥ | kiṃ ceti |
vādinorapi bhedābhāvādityarthaḥ | kimarthaṃ ceti | tattvanirṇaya
vijayādīnāmuddeśyānāmasattvādityarthaḥ | anvayavyatirekayorapi
bhedābhāve pratītiranupapannā, pratītibhedābhāve viruddhā pratipatti
rvipratipattirapi na syāttadabhāvācca na vivādapadapravṛttiriti
sarvathā sarvvatra bhedatajjñānayorapekṣetyāha | anvayeti ||
bhagīº ṭīº | tathāhi, nīlapītaviṣayakajñānasya pakṣatve bādhaḥ,
ekasya viruddhākāratādātmyānupapatteḥ | alīkaviṣayakajñānasya
ca pakṣatve grāhyābhedasādhane bādhaḥ, analīkajñānasyālīkaviṣaya
tādātmyāsambhavādityarthaḥ | sa eva bādha evetyarthaḥ | anaikāntā
iti | yadi kāsāñcidbuddhīnāṃ pakṣādbahirbhāvaḥ, tadaitadanaikānti
kābhidhānam, sarvāsāṃ pakṣatve tatra sādhyābhāve bādha eveti bhāvaḥ |
svavāgvirodha iti | bhedo na prathata ityatraiva bhedaprathanādityarthaḥ |
nanu tadaviṣayapratītyaviṣayatvaṃ sahārtho vyāpyatvaṃ cābhedepi na viru
ddhyata ityata āha | tadasphuraṇa iti | balaṃ pakṣasattvādi |
kutaśceti | bhedajñānaṃ vinā virodhajñānābhāvena vipratipatte
rabhāvādityarthaḥ | sāmvṛtamapīti | jñāyamānamātramapītyarthaḥ |
unmattopīti | unmatto hyaniṣṭasādhane tattvājñānāt pravarttate, ayaṃ
tu bhedo vidvānapi sāmvṛtamapi taṃ necchatītyanena sa jita ityarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | sa eva bādha eva | evaṃ grāhyayorbhede satya
tvāṅgīkāre grāhakasya tadubhayābhede bādhaḥ | nāyamiti bhedasya
jñānātmakatve jñānasya jñeyabhinnatvāpatteriti bhāvaḥ | vināpi bhedaṃ
tadviṣayakapratītiviṣayatvarūpaḥ sahopalambhaḥ sambhavatītyata āha |
tadvyāpyatāmiti | tannaiyatyam | taddhi tadaviṣayakapratītyaviṣaya
tvādirūpaṃ na vinā bhedaṃ sambhavatīti | tadvyāpyatāṃ teṣāṃ hetūnāṃ
sādhyavyāpyatām, vyāpterbhedagarbhatvāditi vā'rthaḥ ||
vikalpārūḍha eva bhedo vyavahārāṅgaṃ nānubhavārūḍha
iti cet, sopi satyo'satyo vā bhāsate na veti
vikalpānnātivartate |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | vikalpaḥ savikalpakaḥ | anubhavo nirvi
kalpakam | tathā cāpāramārthika eva bheda iti bhāvaḥ | satya
iti | satyo bhedo bhāsate ca yadi tadā siddhaṃ naḥ samīhitaṃ
jñānamapi tvanmate bhedātmakaṃ syāt tadanātmakatve ca bhedepi grāhya
grāhakabhāvasiddhiḥ | yadi ca satyo bhedo na bhāsate tadā bheda
vyavahārānupapattirnna hyabhāsamānaṃ kiñcidvyavahriyate | athāsatya eva
bhedo bhāsate tadā tadabhedāt jñānamapyasadeva syādanyathā bhede
grāhyagrāhakabhāvasiddhiḥ | atha na bhāsate tadā na bhedavyavahāra
ityarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | nanu nirvikalpakaviṣayatvena prāmāṇika eva
bheda ekatvavirodhī, ayaṃ tu kalpanāviṣayatvenāsan vyavahāra
mātrāṅgamityāha | vikalpeti | anubhavo nirvikalpakam | sopi
vikalpārūḍhopītyarthaḥ | satya iti | satyatve kvaikasya viruddha
tādātmyam, asatyatve tu kvālīkajñānayorabhedaḥ, bhedenaiva viṣayatve
hetavastatraivānekāntā ityarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | astu tarhi sāmvṛta eva bheda ityāśayavānā
śaṅkate | vikalpeti | nānubhaveti | anubhavo nirvikalpakam | tasya
sanmātrālambanatvena kālpanikollekhāyogāt | sopīti | abhāsane
kevalasya vā bhedasya bhāsane vicārānārambhāt pratiyogyādi
militasya ca sato'sato vā bhedasya naikasadvijñānatādātmyamiti
kathaṃ grāhyatvamiti ||
asannevāsphurannevādhyavasīyata iti cet, adhya
vasīyata iti vivaraṇārhametat | tadviṣayavyavahāra
jananamadhyavasāyārtha iti cet, vyavahāropi yadya
jñānarūpaḥ, kathamasaṃstena janyatām | jñānarūpaścet,
kathaṃ niyāmakaṃ vinā tadviṣayaḥ | svakāraṇasāmagrī
sāmarthyāditi cet, so'yaṃ vyavahṛtirūpajñānālīka
bhedayorniyāmakāntarābhāvepi kāraṇasāmarthyamāśritya
viṣayaviṣayibhāvamicchati, na tvanubhavānubhāvyayoriti
kṣīraṃ vihāya rucirarocakagrastasya sauvīre |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | asphuranniti | ajñāyamāna ityarthaḥ | vicāra
ṇīyamiti | vicārāsahametadityarthaḥ | jñānāviṣayepi bheda
vyavahāraṃ karoti vikalpa ityāha | tadviṣayeti | vyavahāropīti |
tvanmate jñānātiriktasyāsattvāditi bhāvaḥ | tadviṣaya iti | bheda
viṣaya ityarthaḥ | evaṃ sati nīlādīnāmapi jñānaviṣayatvasiddhi
riti bhāvaḥ | vyavahārasvarūpaṃ jñānaṃ svakāraṇabalāttathotpannaṃ
yathā'līkaṃ bhedaṃ viṣayīkarotītyāha | svakāraṇeti | vyavahṛti
rūpajñānañcālīkabhedaśceti dvandvaḥ samāsaḥ | anubhavānubhāvyayoriti
nirvikalpakavastugrāhyayorityarthaḥ | vastubhūtaṃ nīlādi svakāraṇa
sāmarthyādeva bhinnamapi viṣayīkarotu kinniyāmakāntareṇeti
bhāvaḥ | vastuviṣayatāyāṃ svakāraṇasāmarthyasambhavaḥ kṣīramiṣṭam,
avastuviṣayatāyāṃ tadasambhavaḥ | sauvīraṃ kāñjikam1 ||
bhagīº ṭīº | nanu cāsanneva bhedaḥ savikalpake bhāsate, tatra
ca jñānabhinnasyaiva viṣayatvam, mayā ca nirvikalpakaṃ pakṣīkṛtya
nirvikalpakatvādeva viṣayābhedaḥ sādhyata iti nānekānta ityāha |
asannaveti | asphuran nirvikalpakāviṣayībhavannityarthaḥ | yadyajñāna
rūpa iti | jñānabhinnasya cā'līkatvābhyupagamādityarthaḥ | vyavahṛti
rūpajñānaṃ cālīkabhedaśceti dvandvaḥ | anubhaveti | nirvikalpaka
tadviṣayayorityarthaḥ | savikalpakavannirvikalpakepi bhede satyeva
svakāraṇasāmarthyādeva viṣayaviṣayibhāvasambhave vipakṣabādhakābhāvā
nnānumānamabhedasādhakamiti bhāvaḥ | kṣīramiti | nirvikalpaka
viṣayasya sattvāt tatra kāraṇasāmarthyaṃ sambhavatīti tat kṣīramiva,
alīkaviṣayakasavikalpake tu tannāstīti tat sauvīramevetyarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | asphuran abhāsamānaḥ | adhyavasīyate vika
lpena viṣayīkriyate iti prasiddhe'rthe anātmanopi bhānamasphura
nnityanena virodhaścetyāśayena pṛcchati | adhyavasīyata itīti |
sauvīraṃ kāśmīram--pāṭhaḥ |
tadviṣayeti | tathā cādhyavasīyate vikalpena svajanyavyavahāraviṣayī
kriyata ityarthaḥ | svakāraṇabalāyātaścāyaṃ vikalpasya svabhāvabhedo
yat kaścideva vikalpaḥ kañcidevāsantamaviṣayamapi vyavahārayati
na sarvaḥ sarvamiti bhāvaḥ |
kecittu asphuran nirvikalpakāviṣayaḥ, tatraivānātmabhānaṃ
niṣiddhamityabhiprāyaḥ | itthaṃ ca nirvikalpakatadviṣayayoreva grāhya
grāhakābhyāmabhedaḥ sādhanīyaḥ, sahopalambhādau copalambhaḥ sākṣātkāro
vivakṣaṇīyo'to nāṃśato bādho nāpyanaikāntikamityāhuḥ |
kathamasanniti | vijñānavāde jñānātiriktamātrasyāsattvāt |
yadyapi vyavahārātmakajñānasyāsadbhedaviṣayatve siddhameva bhinnasyāpi
grāhyatvam, tathāpyanyenānyasya grahaṇe'tiprasaṅgaṃ paramukhenaiva nirā
karttumāha | kathamiti | svakāraṇeti | evaṃ ca vyavahāravattajjanaka
jñānasyāpyasadbhedaviṣayatvaṃ kāraṇasāmarthyādaviruddhamityapi mantavyam |
anubhaveti | anubhavaḥ sākṣātkāraḥ | tadviṣayastvanubhāvyaḥ1 |
sato hi jñānaviṣayatve indriyasannikarṣādikaṃ niyāmakaṃ
sambhavatīti kṣīratulyatā | sauvīram kāñjikam ||
bhedopi vikalpākāra eva, na tu bāhya iti cet,
yadyasannevāsau, kathaṃ vikalpākāraḥ | tadākāraścet,
kathamasanniti paribhāvaya | astu tarhi sanneveti cet,
tadviṣayaḥ sannanubhāvya iti 3 puº pāº |
nanvadvayadarśi cedvijñānam, kathaṃ bhedaprathā | ākāra
dvayadarśi cet, kathamekaṃ saddvayātmakam | citrākāra
miti cet, citramekamanekaṃ veti vikalpagilitameva
tava paśyataḥ | anekatve kva ekavijñānatādātmyam |
vijñānasyāpi yāvadākāramanekatve kva citrākāra
samvedanam, svasvamātramagnatvāt | ekatve kva bhedapratītiḥ |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | nanu vikalpādbhinnasyālīkabhedasya viṣayatāṃ
nāṅgīkurmma ityāha | bhedepīti | kathamiti | vastvavastunostādā
tmyānupapatterityarthaḥ | tadākāra iti | ākārākāriṇorabhedā
diti bhāvaḥ | astviti | sanneva bhedo vikalpākārostu tathā
ca na pūrvadoṣa ityarthaḥ | advayeti | yayorbhedo gṛhyate tadubhayā
viṣayaṃ cedityarthaḥ | na hi pratiyogyanuyoginornīlapītayora
jñānepi bhedajñānamiti bhāvaḥ | nanu nīlapītākārayoranuyogi
pratiyoginorjñāne satyeva bhedajñānamastu ko doṣa ityata āha |
ākāreti | tarhi viruddhadvayākāraṃ jñānamapi virodhādekaṃ na
syādityarthaḥ | ratnakīrtimataṃ śaṅkate | citrākāra(dvaya)miti |
na dvayadarśi nāpyadvayadarśi kiṃ tu citrākāramityarthaḥ | atrāpi
naiyāyikābhimataikaguṇaparaścitraśabdaḥ karburārtho vā'nekaguṇapara iti
vikalpayati | citramapīti | ekaṃ tāvanna bhavati viruddha
dharmmādhyāsā, nnāpyanekamekajñānatādātmyābhāvaprasaṅgāt etadevāha |
anekatva iti | tava paśyata ityanādare ṣaṣṭhī tvāṃ paśyantamapyanā
dṛtyetyarthaḥ | nanvākāranikarānurodhādvijñānamapi bhidyatāmata
āha | vijñānasyāpīti | tathā ca tvadanumataṃ citrādvaitamanupapanna
miti bhāvaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | kathamiti | ākārākāriṇorabhedādityarthaḥ |
astviti | vikalpākārasya bhedasya vikalpābhinnatayā bhedaḥ sanneva,
na tvalīka ityarthaḥ | yayorbhedo vikalpaviṣayastaddvayaṃ yadi na
vikalpaviṣayastatrāha | advayeti | pratiyogyanuyoginorajñānā
dbhedajñānābhāvādityarthaḥ | tadubhayagrahaṇapakṣe doṣamāha | ākāreti |
ekasya vikalpasya viruddhākāradvayānātmakatvādityarthaḥ | citratvaṃ
yadyekānekobhayātmakatvaṃ, tadā virodha eva | atha jñānavṛtti
rjātistadviśiṣṭajñānādbhedavyavahāraḥ, tatrāha | citramapīti | citra
tvajātiviśiṣṭamapītyarthaḥ | tavetyanādare ṣaṣṭhī | vikalpya dūṣaṇamāha |
anekatva iti | atha tadākāraṃ jñānamapi naikaṃ, tatrāha | vijñānasyeti |
mitho viruddhānekākārāvagāhitvānna citratvaṃ tatretyarthaḥ | ekatva iti
vijñānasyetyanuṣajyate, ekasya bhinnākāratādātmyābhāvādityarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | syādetat | vikalpollikhito bhedo yadi tato
bhidyeta, tadā deśyetāpyanyenānyasya grahaṇam, na tvetadasti, kiṃ tu
vikalpākāra eva, na cākāra ākāriṇo bhidyata ityāśaṅkate |
bhedopīti | apiśabdānnīlādirapi | tathā ca jñānākārayoreva
nīlapītayorjñānākāro bhedo vikalpenollikhita iti na bāhya
samvedanasaṅkathāpīti bhāvaḥ | advayadarśi nīlapītādyākāradvayādarśi |
pratiyogyanuyogyanullekhino jñānasya tādṛśavyavahārānaṅgatvādityukta
tvāt | atha nairantaryeṇa yugapadeva votpannāni trīṇi jñānāni
bhedaṃ vyavahārayantīti cet, ekaṃ cedvijñānaṃ nānekadarśi, kathamasyai
vārthasya siddhiḥ | anekadarśi cet, ekasyānekatādātmyavirodhā
tsiddhamanyenānyasya grahaṇam | gūḍhābhisandhiḥ śaṅkate | citreti |
citrākāratvaṃ hi nīlapītādyatiriktākāraviśeṣaśālitvaṃ vā
nīlādyanekākāratvaṃ veti vikalpena nirākaroti | citramapīti |
kva citrākārasambedanam kva nīlādyanekākārasaṃvedanam asamvedane
kathaṃ tadbhedagrahaṇam | ekatva iti | nīlādyatiriktaikākāraśālitve
nīlapītādyanullekhe tadbhedollekho na sambhavatītyarthaḥ ||
anīlādyanekavyāvṛttikṛto'nekatvādhyavasāya eveti
cet, atādātmye kathaṃ vyāvṛttīnāmullekhaḥ | tādātmye
kathamanekatvam | ekatvepi kva tatkṛtopi bhedādhyavasāyaḥ |
ullekhoyamasya vijñānasya yadanekatvaṃ nāma, na punasta
ttvāntaramiti cet, svarūpamasvarūpaṃ veti vācyam |
ādye anekasvarūpamekamiti ko'nyā vadedasusthāt |
dvitīyastviṣyata evāsmābhiḥ, kiṃ tu tvayeṣyatām |
bhrāntirasāviti cet, tasyāmapi svarūpamasvarūpaṃ vā
prakāśeta, prakārāntarābhāvāditi |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | atra jñānaśriyaḥ samādhānaṃ śaṅkate | anī
leti | taduktaṃ jñānaśriyā--
“yadi svarūpamākārāścitrataikadhiyaḥ katham |
bhedaḥ pratyarthatā buddhestadā'nyonyasya vedanam ||
mithastathāpi vyāvṛttau bāhyavastukṣaṇasthitiḥ |
bhedepyevaṃ dhiyasteṣāṃ prakāśaghaṭanā katham” ||
ityāśaṅkyāha--
“alīkamanyatve'pīdaṃ vyāvṛttyantaramīritam” |
tadetatpariharati | atādātmya iti | vyāvṛttayo yadi
jñānabhinnāstadā kathaṃ prakāśantām | jñānābhinnā eva cettadā
jñānābhedena tāsāmapyabheda eveti kva citrākāratvam | nanvastu
vyāvṛttīnāmapyabheda evetyāha | ekatvepīti | tathā cānekatvā
dhyavasāyamātratvaṃ tvanujānīma iti ratnakīrtteḥ svavacanavirodha
ityarthaḥ | nanu pratiśabdavadavāstava evāyamullekho na tu vāstavo
yenānekatvaṃ tadanurodhāt jñānasya bhavedityāśaṅkate | ullekhoyamiti |
na punariti | anekatvameva na vastusiddhaṃ yaccitrākāre jñāne
tvayā''pādyata ityarthaḥ | pariharati | svarūpamiti | yadanekatva
mullikhyate tadyadi jñānasvarūpameva tadā jñānasyānekatvamavarjjanīyam |
athāsvarūpaṃ jñānādbhinnameva jñānenollikhyate tadā bhedepi grāhya
grāhakabhāva iti siddhaṃ naḥ samīhitamityarthaḥ | tvayeti | tavedama
tyantamaniṣṭamityarthaḥ | asāviti | anekatvāvagāhī citrapratyaya
ityarthaḥ | bhrāntirapi hi jñānameva | tatrāpi pūrvokto vikalpa
stadavasya evetyarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | nanu nīlapītādyātmakasvalakṣaṇe'nekatvaṃ nāstyeva,
anekādhyavasāyaśca vyāvṛttiviṣaya evetyāha | alīkādīti |
jñānādvyāvṛttīnāṃ bhede kathaṃ viṣayatvamityāha | atādātmya iti |
athaikajñānādvyāvṛttīnāmabhedaḥ, tatrāha | tādātmya iti | eka
jñānatādātmye vyāvṛttīnāṃ nānekatvamityarthaḥ | ekatva iti | vyāvṛtte
rityanuṣañjanīyam | ullekho'yamiti | jñānaviṣayamātramanekatvaṃ na
pāramārthikamityarthaḥ, tathā ca pāramārthikaviṣayatvena viśeṣitāḥ
sahopalambhādayo hetava iti nānaikāntā iti bhāvaḥ | svarūpa
miti | anekatvena samaṃ jñānasya tādātmyamatādātmyaṃ vetyarthaḥ |
kiṃ tviti | apāramārthikasya bhede sati viṣayatvavat pāramā
rthikepi tadastviti tvayeṣyatām, bhede grāhyalakṣaṇānupapatterbādhi
kāyā abhāvādityarthaḥ | bhrāntiriti | hetuṣu pramārūpaṃ jñānaṃ
vivakṣitamiti nānaikāntikamiti bhāvaḥ | tasyāmapīti |
atrāpi pūrvokta eva bhāvaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | bhavatāṃ nīlapītādirūpavilakṣaṇacitrarūpavada
smākaṃ nīlādyākāravilakṣaṇo vijñānasya citrākāraḥ, tasya
caikatvepyanīlākārādyanekavyāvṛttinibandhanastatrānekatvollekha ityabhi
sandhiṃ prakāśayati | anīleti | tā api vyāvṛttayo vijñānādbhinnā
na vā | bhinnāścet, kathaṃ vijñānena tadgrahaḥ | agṛhītānāṃ ca tāsāṃ
na bhedādhyavasāyanimittatvam | abhinnāścet, kathamekajñānābhi
nnānāṃ tāsāmanekatvam | ekatve ca kathaṃ tatkṛto bhedādhyavasāya
iti nirākaroti | atādātmya iti | syādetat | mā
bhūdanīlādyanekavyāvṛttinibandhano'nekatvādhyavasāyaḥ, svakāraṇa
sāmarthāyātastu syāt, taccānekatvaṃ kālpanikamiti na vāstavīṃ
vikalpaikatāṃ viruṇaddhītyāśaṅkate | ullekha iti | ullekhaḥ ullekha
mātram, ullikhyate paraṃ vikalpenānekatvaṃ na tu vāstavamityarthaḥ |
svarūpamiti | tadanekatvaṃ jñānādabhinnaṃ bhinnaṃ vetyarthaḥ | dvitīya
iti | jñānena svabhinnasyānekatvasya prakāśa ityarthaḥ | vikalpasya
bhramatvāttatrāsatprakāśo na viruddhyate 'satprakāśanasvabhāvatvādbhrānteḥ,
viruddhyate tu nirvikalpake, tasya tanmātraprakāśanaśīlatvādityā
śaṅkate | bhrāntirasāviti | nirākaroti | tasyāmapīti ||
syādetat | yathā'tat tattayā parisphuradapi na
vastugatyā tadeva, tathā tadapyatattayā parisphuradapi
nātadeva, tataḥ svarūpasyātattayā prathanepi na kācit
grāhyalakṣaṇakṣatiriti cet, yadyatattāpi parisphurantī
svarūpamevāsya syāt, syādapyasyopanyāsasya prastuto
payogaḥ | asvarūpasya kathaṃ prakāśa iti cet yadyapi tathā
vakṣyāmaḥ, tathāpyatattā kathaṃ tasya svarūpamitītopi
dīyatāṃ dṛṣṭiḥ |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | na hyavidyāsamāropitākāraḥ paryyanuyoga
marhatīti kīrtimatamāśaṅkate | syādetaditi | ataditi |
arajataṃ śuktisvarūpaṃ tattayā rajatatayā sphuradapi yathā na vastu-
gatyā rajatameva tathā tadapyekamapi jñānaṃ atattayā anekatayā
sphuradapi na vastugatyā anekameva tataḥ svarūpasya vijñānasyā
tattayānekatayā sphuraṇepi bhedena grāhyagrāhakabhāvo bhavatyeva,
nāsmanmate grāhyalakṣaṇakṣatirityarthaḥ | yadīti | atattā anekatā
citrapratyaye sphurantī yadi citrapratyayātmā bhavettadāyaṃ samādhiḥ
syādapi, na tvevamekasya citrapratyayasyānekātmakatvaprasaṅgasya durvāra
tvādityarthaḥ | nanu tattā cet sphurati tadā sā svarūpameva vācyā
asvarūpasya sphuraṇānupapatterityāha | asvarūpasyeti | yadyapīti |
sarvatrāsvarūpameva grāhakajñānabhinnameva sphuratīti grāhyagrāhakalakṣaṇaṃ
vakṣyāma evetyarthaḥ | ataditi | asvarūpamanekatvamityarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | yatheti | yathā rajatatayā bhāsamānāpi
śuktirna rajatameva, na vā śuktiḥ śuktyanātmatayā bhāsamānā
śukterbhinnā, tathā citrapratyayasya yadyapyanekatvaṃ jñānatādātmyameva
tathāpyanātmatayā bhāsata ityabhedānna grāhyalakṣaṇakṣatirityarthaḥ |
tathā ca bhinnatvaṃ jñānasya prakāro na viśeṣyam, grāhyatvādihetau
ca grahaṇaviśeṣyatvaṃ vivakṣitamato nānaikānta iti bhāvaḥ |
yadīti | viśiṣṭajñāne viśeṣyavadviśeṣaṇasyāpi viṣayatvādbhede
ca tadabhāvāt tatsvarūpatvamapi jñānasyāvarjanīyamityukta eva doṣa
ityarthaḥ | asvarūpasyeti | bhinnayorviṣayaviṣayibhāve niyāmakā
bhāvādityarthaḥ | yadyapīti | tatra niyāmakaṃ vakṣyāma eva--dena
viṣayatve kathamatattā jñānabhinnā tadviṣaya ityapi dṛśyatāmityarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | vikalpenānyasyāsata iva nirvikalpakenāpyanyasya
sataḥ prakāśanamaviruddham anyenānyasya sata ivāsatopi prakāśane
'tiprasaṅgaḥ samāno na hi ghaṭādivikalpāḥ kūrmmaromādikamapi
viṣayīkurvanti, kāraṇasāmarthyena niyamanaṃ tu nirvikalpakasyāpi
na vāryata iti, grāhyatvaṃ hi grahaviśeṣyatvaṃ bhede viruddhyate, tena
na nirvikalpakasya svabhinnaviśeṣyakatvam, na tu grahaviśeṣaṇatvamapi,
bhrāntau cānyadviśeṣaṇameva, na cāsadviśeṣaṇabhānādeva vastunaḥ svarūpa
hānirityāśaṅkate | syādetaditi | yatheti | yathā sthāṇuḥ puruṣa
tvenābāhyo vā jñānākāro vā bāhyatvena bhāsamāno na puruṣo na
vā bāhyaḥ, tathā'bhinno vikalpopi bhinnatvena bhāsamāno na bhinna
iti grahaviśeṣyatvaṃ nānupapannamityarthaḥ | anyasyānyatra viśeṣaṇatve
sarvasya sarvatra viśeṣaṇatvāpātādanāyatyā viśeṣaṇatvamapyabhedenaiva tvayā
vācyamityāśayavānnirākaroti | yadīti | anyasyānyaviśeṣyatve
sarvasya sarvaviśeṣyatvaṃ syādityāśayavān śaṅkate | asvarūpasyeti |
prakāśo jñānaviśeṣyatvam | bhede viśeṣyatve'tiprasaṅgena bhede viśe
ṣaṇatve'tiprasaṅgo na vāryata ityāśayavānāha | tathāpīti | tasmā
dbhede viśeṣaṇatvavadviśeṣyatvamapi svīkāryam, parihāryaṃ vā viśeṣyatva
vadviśeṣaṇatvamapītyubhayathāpi pakṣahānirbhavatāmiti bhāvaḥ ||
kaścāsvarūpasphuraṇe doṣaḥ | nāyaṃ bhinnayorvedya
vedakabhāvo vyāpāranibandhano niyatasya tasyābhāvāt,
nāpi tajjātinibandhanaḥ kaścitkañcitpratijñeya iti-
vyavasthānupapattiprasaṅgāt, na hi nisargasiddhānāṃ
gotvādīnāmīdṛśī rītiriti cet | nanvayamabhedepi
doṣastadavastha eva | tathāhi svasya vedanamiti nāyaṃ
vyāpāranibandhano vyavahāraḥ svātmani tadabhāvāt,
nāpi jātinibandhanaḥ sādhāraṇyaprasaṅgāt, na hi
jātyaiva gauḥ svātmānaṃ prati na tu paraṃ pratīti niyamo
dṛṣṭaḥ, na ca jñānaṃ svasyeva parasyāpi vedanaṃ sarva
sarvajñatvāpatteḥ |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | bhedepi na grāhyalakṣaṇakṣatiriti svapakṣa
nirvāhāya pṛcchati | kaśceti | asvarūpaṃ jñānabhinnaṃ bāhyaṃ tatsphu
raṇa ityarthaḥ | tatra ca jñānaśriyoktaṃ doṣamāśaṅkate | nāyamiti |
jñāne viṣayeṇa vyāpāra ādhīyate viṣaye jñānena vā | ādye
vyutpāditenaiva jñānasya viṣayakṛto vyāpāronyonyājñāne tāvadvi
ṣayatādhīno vyāpāro'nupalambhabādhita utpādakatayā tadīyatve
cakṣurādyapi viṣayaḥ syāt viṣaye ca jñānena jñātatārūpavyāpārā
dhāne'tītānāgataviṣayatā bhajyeta, taduktam--
“utpādamātre'tiśayāntare vā
jñānāt prakāśo na hi bāhyarāśeḥ |
prakāśarūpasya samudbhave tu
prasahya sādhāraṇatāprasaṅgaḥ” ||
iti | nanu jātinibandhana eva viṣayaviṣayibhāvostu bhede
pītyata āha | nāpīti | tathā sati yadekasya jñeyaṃ tatsarvasyaiva
syāt, etadevāha | na hīti | nanvityāmantraṇe | svātmanīti |
na hi tenaiva jñānena svātmani vyāpāraḥ kaścidādhīyata ityarthaḥ |
sādhāraṇyeti | tad jñānam | sarvasyaiva syādityarthaḥ | etadevāha |
na hīti | nanu bhavatu sarvasādhāraṇyaṃ ko doṣa ityata āha |
na ceti ||
bhagīº ṭīº | parihārāntaramāha | kaśceti | bhinnayo
rviṣayaviṣayibhāve na virodha ityarthaḥ | asvarūpasya jñānātmaka
syetyarthaḥ | paro doṣamāha | nāyamiti | yathā dhūmajñānasya
vahniviṣayatā svajanyānumitiviṣayatvena tathā neha svajanyajñāta
tādivyāpāranibandhanā viṣayatā, kvacittatsambhave'pyatītādiviṣaye
tadabhāvādityarthaḥ | nāpīti | na hi ghaṭajñānaṃ paṭāpekṣayā
na jñānajātīyamityarthaḥ | na hīti | na hi gauḥ kiñcida
pekṣyāgaurityarthaḥ | tadabhāvāt vyāpārābhāvādityarthaḥ | sādhā
raṇyeti | paṭaṃ pratyapi ghaṭajñānasya jñānajātīyatvādityarthaḥ |
iṣṭāpattimāśaṅkya nirākaroti | na ceti ||
raghuº ṭīº | svapakṣaṃ sthāpayituṃ pṛcchati | kaśceti | asva
rūpaṃ bāhyaṃ jñānabhinnaṃ tasya sphuraṇa ityarthaḥ | tatra ca jñānaśriyoktaṃ
doṣamāha | nāyamityādi | viṣayaviṣayibhāvo na kāryakāraṇa
bhāvanibandhano grahaṇendriyayorapi tatprasaṅgāt | nāpi vyāpāra
nibandhano jñānenātītānāgatayorarthayostābhyāṃ vā jñāne vyāpārā
dhānāyogāt, vartamānārthakasthale'pi jñāne vyāpārasya yogyasya
anupalambhabādhāt, ayogye ca mānābhāvāt arthe jñātatābhyupagamepi
tasyā avyāpakatvenātantratvāt | etena jñāne ākārādhānamapi
pratyuktam | taduktam, niyatasyeti | ākārādhānepi1 niyāma
kasyābhāvāt, bhāve vā vyāpāragaveṣaṇavaiyarthyāt, tata eva tatsambhavāt |
nāpi jātinibandhanaḥ, paṭatvāderniyāmakatve paṭādeḥ sarvajñānaviṣaya
tāpatteḥ, jñānatvasya niyāmakatve sarvajñānānāṃ paṭaviṣayatvāpatteḥ, tatta
tpaṭādivyaktiviṣayatāniyāmakaṃ ca jñānavaijātyamanupalambhabādhitam,
samūhālambanādau saṅkaraprasaṅgaśceti | svātmani tadabhāvāt vyāpārā
bhāvāt | sādhāraṇyaprasaṅgāt sarvaviṣayatvaprasaṅgāt | atha jātyaiva
sarvaṃ vijñānaṃ svaviṣayamiti cet, kimidaṃ svaṃ nāma | yadyekā
vijñānavyaktiḥ, sarvajñānānāṃ tadviṣayatāpattiḥ, atha vijñānamātram,
sarveṣāṃ vijñānānāṃ sarvavijñānavijñatāpattiriti ||
na tat kasyacit, kiṃ tu vedanamātramiti cet,
tathā'pi svātmanyajaḍavat paratrāpyajaḍaṃ syāt, para
sminnandhavat svasminnapyandhaṃ prasajyeta, jātyaiva tadrūpatvāt |
jātyāpi svakāraṇāt kvacinniyatarūpameva tadutpanna
miti cet, naivamuccairbrūyāḥ, parairapi kadācidevaṃ śrūyeta |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | nanu na jñānaṃ svātmānaṃ prakāśayati yena prati
bandiriyaṃ syāt, taduktam--
vyāpārādhāne'pi iti 3 puº pāº |
“vijñānaṃ jaḍarūpebhyo vyāvṛttamupajāyate |
iyamevātmasambittistasya yā 'jaḍarūpatā” ||
“yathā tathetyayaṃ śūnyatā yadutpādavāraṇāt”1 | ityādi |
tadetadāśaṅkate | na tatkasyaciditi | yathā tadīyā svātmanya
jaḍarūpatā tathā paraṃ prati tathā syāt parasminnevaṃ cetsvasminnapi
tayā syāditi saiva pratibandirityāha | tathāpīti | nanu paraṃ
pratyajaḍaṃ syāditi paramapi gṛhṇīyādityartho vā parāpekṣayāpya
jaḍarūpatayā vyavahriyatāmiti vā | nādyaḥ, uktadoṣāt | nāntyaḥ,
iṣṭāpatteḥ | maivam | iyameva cet svaprakāśatā tadā paraprakāśatā
pīyameva syādityaviśeṣāpādanamātratātparyakatvāt | paraprakāśe
doṣasyoddharaṇīyatvāditi | nanu svasminnajaḍaṃ cet tadā paratrāpi
tathā syāt, andhaṃ cet tadā svasminnapi tathā syādityatra
kimāpādakamata āha | jātyaiveti | tajjātīyaṃ yat tatsarvaṃ prati
tathaiveti tathā darśanādityarthaḥ | svakāraṇabalāt svasminneva
tadajaḍarūpamityāśaṅkate | jātyāpīti ||
bhagīº ṭīº | nanu parasyeva jñānaṃ svasyāpi na bhavati, kiṃ
ghaṭādibhyo jaḍarūpebhyo'yamevāsya viśeṣo yadidamajaḍarūpamutpadyate |
yadāhuḥ |
vijñānaṃ jaḍarūpebhyo vyāvṛttamupajāyate |
iyamevātmasamvittirasya yā 'jaḍarūpatā ||
yathā tathetyaśūnyatāyā yadutparavyāpāravāraṇāt iti 4 puº pāº |
ityāha | na taditi | ghaṭajñānasya yadi jñānātmatvameva
tadviṣayatvam, tadā paṭāpekṣayāpi tattathaiveti tadviṣayatvamapi
syādityāha | tathāpīti | nanu jātyā tadrūpatvepi svakāraṇā
ttatkvacittadviṣaye sambaddhasvabhāvaṃ tajjāyata ityāha | jātyāpīti |
tarhi bhedepi tata eva niyamo'stvityāha | maivamiti ||
raghuº ṭīº | svasya svasamvedanamityevārtho nopeyata ityā
śaṅkate | na tatkasyaciditi | taduktam--
“vijñānaṃ jaḍarūpebhyo vyāvṛttamupajāyate |
iyamevātmasamvittirasya yā 'jaḍarūpatā” || iti |
nirākaroti | tathāpīti | ajaḍam svasākṣi | andham
asākṣi | vijñānaṃ svasminniva parasmin bāhyepi sākṣi syāt, tathā
ca tata eva siddhaṃ bāhyam, atha parasminnasākṣi, svasminnapi sākṣi
na syāt, tathā ca parāsākṣikaṃ tanna siddhyet, mānābhāvāt | atha
svaparāsākṣikamapi vijñānaṃ paramārthasattatvena ca vyavahriyate, tarhi
bāhyamapi svaparāsākṣikameva paramārthasadastu vyavahriyatāṃ ca
tattveneti kuto bāhyārthabhaṅgaḥ | bādhakātpramāṇā(bhāvā)diti cet,
bādhakaṃ yadi svāviṣayamapi bādhate tadā vijñānamapi bādheta,
aviśeṣāditi kuto vijñānavādaḥ | svaviṣayameva cet, kathaṃ na
pareṇa parasambedanam ||
abhedo'stu mā vā, bhedaṃ tu prakāśamānatvena
vyāsedhāma iti cenna | vastuni bhedanivṛtterevābheda
rūpatvāt |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | tadetattulyamityāha | abheda iti | nanu
prakāśamānatvādibhirhetubhirjñānābhedo nīlādīnāṃ na mayā sādhyate
kintu jñānādbhedamātraṃ nirākriyate, tathā cābhedepi prakāśamānatā
nirākaraṇamatantramityāha | jātyāpīti | tadeva tulyamityāha |
abheda iti | bhedanirākaraṇamevābhedasādhanamiti na prakārabheda
ityāha | (na) vastunīti | alīke bhedābhedanirākaraṇamasambhavītyata
uktaṃ vastunīti ||
bhagīº ṭīº | vastunītyalīkavyāvṛttyartham ||
raghuº ṭīº | vastunīti | teṣāmalīkavyāvṛttaye ||
astu tarhi bhedābhedavidhurameva citram, cetobhede
prakāśamānatvāyogāt, abhede citratvānupapatteriti
cenna, mithoviruddhavidhidvayavidhivat tadubhayaniṣedhasyā
pyekatra viruddhatvāt | na ca so'pyastviti vācyam |
syādvādāvatāre tavāpi digambaratvaprasaṅgāt |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | nanu nīladhavalākāraṃ ceto na nīlādibhyo
bhinnaṃ, nāpyabhinnaṃ, bhede sati nīlādīnāṃ prakāśamānatvaṃ na
syādabhede sati nīladhavalādīnāmekarūpatāpattau citratvameva
jñānasya bhajyetetyata āha | astu tarhīti | yathā bhedābhedā
vekatra vidhātuṃ na śakyete tathā niṣeddhumapītyāha | mitha iti |
nanvekatra viruddhobhayaniṣedhayoryo virodha āpādyate sopyastu
tasyāpi jñānaviṣayatvena jñānakukṣipraviṣṭatvādityata āha | syā
dvādeti | syādityevaṃrūpo vādaḥ syādvādaḥ, tathā ca yadyadaniṣṭa
māpādyate tatra tatreṣṭatāpādane digambaramatānupraveśa ityarthaḥ | yadvā
evaṃ gatatrapasya tava vastratyāgopi na lajjāmāpādayedityarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | bhedābhedavidhuratve krameṇa hetudvayamāha | bheda
iti | citratvam nīlapītādiviruddhatādātmyamityarthaḥ | mitha
iti | bhedābhedau hi mitho niṣedharūpatayā viruddhāviti tayo
ryathā naikatra vidhirvirodhāt, tathā niṣedhopi, bhāvābhāvābhyāṃ
tṛtīyaprakārābhāvādityarthaḥ | sopi viruddhopītyarthaḥ | syā
dvādeti | evaṃ yadyadaniṣṭamāpādyate tatra tatsyādityuttare digambarāṇā
miva tavāpi viruddhasvīkārādunmattatayā nagnatvāpattirityarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | citratvam mitho viruddhanīlapītādyākāratvam |
mitho viruddheti | parasparaviraharūpetyarthaḥ | sopi viruddhastadu
bhayaniṣedhopi | syādvādāvatāra iti | syāditi tiṅantaprati-
rūpako nipāto'nekāntavācī | digambaro vastūnāṃ sattvāsattvāni
rvacanīyatvāni anirddhāritāni pratijānīte | tathāhi te sapta
bhaṅgīnāmakaṃ nayamācakṣate, syādasti, syānnāsti, syādavaktavyaśca,
syādasti ca nāsti ca, syādasti cāvaktavyaḥ, syānnāsti cāvaktavyaśca,
syādasti ca nāsti cāvaktavyaśceti | vastu sattvāśraya ityanirdhā
ritam, tathā'sattvāśraya iti, anirvacanīyatvāśraya iti, sattvā
sattvāśraya iti, sattvānirvaktavyatvāśraya iti, asattvānirvaktavyatvāśraya
iti, sattvāsattvānirvacanīyatvāśraya iti, evaṃ saptadhāpyanirdhārita
ityarthaḥ | evaṃ tavāpyanirdhāraṇamātravāditve tanmatapraveśa eva syāt,
tanmataṃ ca ānubhavikasya sattvasya pramāṇāntarābādhyatvena nirdhāraṇāt
asattvānirvacanīyatvayostatra tatra dūṣitatvāt dvayordvayostrayāṇāṃ vā
virodhenaikatrāsambhavādvirodhyubhayagocarasya jñānasya saṃśayatvenā
pramāṇatvācca samuccayapakṣasya nirastatvādduṣṭamiti bhāvaḥ ||
astu tarhi catuḥśikharīśūnyameva citram, āścarya
rūpatvāt, ekānekatvavirahepi sattvamityāścaryārtho
hi citraśabda iti cet, atha catuḥśikharaśekharameva
kiṃ na syāt, āścaryarūpatāyuktestulyatvāt, ekaika
pakṣānupapattiśca yathā tanniṣedhaparyavasāyinī tathā
taditaravidhiparyavasāyinyapi syāditi |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | astviti | bhedavidhirabhedavidhirbhedaniṣedho-
'bhedaniṣedha iti taccatvāri buddhaviśeṣakoṭayastacchūnyamityarthaḥ | nāyaṃ
citra śabdaḥ karburārthaḥ kiṃ tvāścaryārtha ityāha | ekāneketi | nīla
dhavalādyākāraṃ jñānaṃ viruddhadharmādhyāsānnāpyanekaṃ pratiniyataprati
bhāsaprasaṅgādevaṃ virodhe satyapi caitādṛśaṃ jñānamiti mahadevāścarya
mityarthaḥ | catuṣkoṭiśūnyatāpekṣayā catuṣkoṭimattāyā eva
lāghavenābhyupagantumucitatvādityāha | atheti | catuḥśikharaśekharaṃ
catuṣkoṭipradhānamityarthaḥ | yathā śūnyatāyāmāścaryaṃ tathā catu
ṣkoṭividhāvapi virodhastūbhayatrāpi tulya ityāha | āścaryeti |
nanvekaikapakṣānupapattyā sarvakoṭyabhāvāt śūnyatā syādityata āha |
ekaiketi | yaḥ pakṣe nopapadyate tasya yathā niṣedhastathā tadvipa
rītapakṣasya vidhirityarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | bhedābhedau tayorvyatirekāviti catvāri
śikharāṇītyarthaḥ | nanu citratvaṃ karburatvaṃ jñāne bādhitamityanyathopa
pādayati | āścaryeti | tatra hetumāha | eketi | atheti |
etasyāpi virodhānnaikatra sambhavaḥ, yadi ca viruddhavyāpyekatrābhyupa
gamastadā catuḥśikharameva kuto nābhyupagamyate, tadabhāvepi tasyopa
jīvyatayā lāghavāttathaivābhyupagantumucitatvādityarthaḥ | nanu sarvatra
pakṣe doṣasambhavāt sarvavyatirekaḥ syādityata āha | ekaiketi |
bhedānupapattiryathā bhedaniṣedhaparyavasāyinī, evamanyatrāpi, viruddhaika
pakṣānupapattāvitarapakṣasyāvaśyakatvādityarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | bhedābhedau tayorvyatirekāviti catvāri śikha
rāṇi koṭayaḥ | abhedastādātmyam ekaniṣedhasyāparavidhiparyava
sāyitvāt kathametat, tatrāha | citramiti | (viruddhaṃ) citratvaṃ
karburatvaṃ naitadupapādakamata āha | āścaryeti | āścaryamāha |
ekāneketi | ekatvānekatvetyarthaḥ | ekatvamabhedaḥ, anekatvaṃ bhedaḥ |
citraṃ jñānamiti prayoge citrapadasyāścaryārthatāvyākhyānānurodhādeva
cedviruddhadharmasaṃsargitvamupeyam, tadvaraṃ prathamopasthitatvāllāghavācca catuḥ
śikharaśālitvamevopeyatāmityāha | atheti | atha tattatpakṣānupa
pattyā'vaśyaṃ tattadabhāvairbhavitavyam, tatrāha | ekaiketi | paraspara
vidhiniṣedhanāntarīyakavidhiniṣedhayorekataraniṣedhe'paravidhirapyā
vaśyaka iti ||
api cātra vastutaścatuṣkoṭivirahe cetaso bhāṣā
ntareṇedamuktam, yadanātmāna evaitāścatasraḥ koṭayo
bhāsante na vā pratibhāntīti | tatrāpratibhāsana
manuttaram | pratibhāsane tu grāhyalakṣaṇāyogepi grāhya
bhāva iti citrametat | tathā ca citrādvaitādvaraṃ citra
dvaitamastu pratibhāsanānurodhāditi |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | kiṃ caitāścatasraḥ koṭayo bhāsante na vā |
ādye jñānābhinna eva bhāsanta iti pakṣaḥ svavacanavirodhādeva
tyājyaḥ, abhāne catuṣkoṭiśabdaprayogasyaivānupapattirityāha | api
ceti | citradvaitamiti | grāhyalakṣaṇābhāvepi grahaṇamityekaṃ citraṃ tacca
grahaṇamekatvānekatvavidhuramiti tanmatānusārādaparañcitramityarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | api ceti | viruddhakoṭicatuṣṭayaviṣayaka
jñānasya yadi tadātmakatvaṃ tadā jñānātmakatvaṃ tasya syāt, bhede
grāhyatvābhāvāt | atha viruddhakoṭicatuṣṭayaviṣayakaṃ na jñānaṃ
tarhyajñāte pravṛttyabhāvaḥ syādityarthaḥ | tatreti | catasraḥ koṭayo
na bhāsanta iti śabdādeva tajjñānādityarthaḥ | na bhedena grāhyatvaṃ
nāpyabhedena, viruddhakoṭicatuṣṭayātmakatvasyāsambhavādityanekātmaka
mevaikātmakaṃ tajjñānamiti citrādvaitamabhyupeyam, tathā caitasmādvi
ruddhādvaraṃ citradvaitamevāstu, evaṃ sati mithoviruddhākāraprati
bhāsopyanurodhitaḥ syādityāha | tathā ceti ||
raghuº ṭīº | kiṃ coktakoṭicatuṣṭayābhāvavattayā citrajñānaṃ
gṛhyate na vā, na cet, na citratvasiddhiḥ svavacanavirodhaśca |
gṛhyate cet, koṭicatuṣṭayabhānamāvaśyakamabhāvamātragrahe citratvā
siddhiḥ | na ca koṭicatuṣṭayātmakamekaṃ vijñānaṃ bhavitumarhatī
tyanāyatyā anyonyasya grahaṇamabhyupagantavyam | tathā ca pramāṇabādhitaṃ
citrasya mithoviruddhadharmmavadanekasyādvaita(mabheda)mupekṣya citrasya dvaitaṃ
bheda evāṅgīkriyatām | tathā sati nīlapītādyanekollekhitvamekatvaṃ
ca jñānasyānubhūyamānamanuruddhaṃ bhavatītyāha | api ceti |
grāhyalakṣaṇamabhedaḥ ||
syādetat | bahirantarubhayathāpi grāhyalakṣaṇakṣati
rastu, prakāśamānatvaṃ tu nīlādīnāmaśakyāpahnavam,
tāvanmātraṃ cāsmākamabhimatamiti cet, tadetadvikrīta
gavīrakṣaṇam | kimidaṃ (hi) prakāśamānatvaṃ yat sarvathā
grāhyalakṣaṇakṣatāvapi na kṣīṇam | na prakāśasambandhaḥ,
niyamānupapatterityuktam | na prakāśatādātmyam,
citratvānupapatterityuktam | tasmānnīlādīnāṃ prakāśa
mānatvaṃ paripālayatā grāhyalakṣaṇe yatnaḥ kartavyaḥ
pariharttavyaṃ vā prakāśamānatvam | anyathā tapanīya
mapanīya vāsasi granthikartāramupahasasi, svayaṃ ca
kanakamupādāya gaganāñcale granthiṃ karoṣīti | seyaṃ
sarvaprakāramasiddhiḥ sarvaprakāraṃ cānaikāntikatvamiti |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | nanu nīlādayaḥ prakāśātmānaḥ prakāśamānatvā
dityetāvanmātramatrāsmadabhimataṃ, na tu svasya parasya vā vedanamitya
smadabhimatamihetyāśaṅkate | syādetaditi | taduktaṃ jñānaśriyā--
“prakāśamānaṃ nīlādi jaḍaṃ vā 'jaḍameva vā |
iti prakaraṇe'smābhirbuddhitve heturucyate” || iti |
bahirantariti | svasambedane parasamvedane vā grāhyalakṣaṇa
kṣatirastvityarthaḥ | nīlādīnāṃ prakāśamānatvaṃ tvayaiva dūrīkṛtaṃ tvayaiva
ca jñānābhinnatve sādhye hetutvenopādīyata ityupahamati | tadeta-
diti | na prakāśeti | vyāpārādhānamantareṇa niyamānupapanegiti
tvayoktam, na prakāśatādātmyaṃ viruddhadharmmādhyāsena citrākāra
jñānasya bhedaprasaṅgāditi mayoktaṃ, tathā cobhayathāpi prakāśa
mānatvaṃ nīlādīnāmanupapannaṃ, tathā ca bhedepi viṣayaviṣayibhāvo
bhyupagantavya ityupasaṃharati | tasmāditi | atra jñānaśriyā taddvaya
mākārabāhyatāmatibāhya bāhyavādavyasanino bhedasādhanavidhistapa
nīyamapanīya vāsasi granthikaraṇavṛttāntamanuharatīti sotprāsamuktaṃ,
tadidānīmavasaraprāptenopahāsāntareṇa śithilayannāha | anyatheti |
nīlādīnāṃ jñānākārabhāvaṃ tapanīyaṃ tattvayā parityaktaṃ bāhyaṃ vastu
vāsasi granthiḥ sa ca kriyate | taccānupapannam | na hi jñānā
kāratiraskāre grāhyalakṣaṇasthitiraparopahāsārthaḥ | yathā bhede
grāhyalakṣaṇābhāvastathā svasamvedanepi, tathā ca sarvathā grāhyalakṣaṇā
bhāvepi prakāśamānatvasya gaganāñcalagrantheḥ karaṇamiti paraṃ prati
naiyāyikānāmupahāsaḥ | seyamiti | nīlaṃ jñānābhinnaṃ prakāśa
mānatvāt, sahopalambhādvetyādīnāṃ nīlādibāhyānabhyupagame
āśrayāsiddhatvaṃ bhede'bhedepi ca grāhyalakṣaṇābhāvāt svarūpā
siddhatvam | tadvṛttiyāvaddharmmavattvaṃ hi tadabhede sādhye upādhiriti
sopādhitvādvyāpyatvāsiddhatvaṃ cetyarthaḥ | sarveti | prakāśamānatvātsaho
palambhādvetyasyālīke bhedepi gatatvāt sādhāraṇatvaṃ sapakṣavipakṣa
vyāvṛttatvādvā'sādhāraṇatvamata eva cānupasaṃhāritvaṃ cetyarthaḥ | yadya
pyekatra sādhāraṇānaikāntikatvamasādhāraṇānaikāntikatvaṃ cānupapannaṃ
tathāpi vikalpa ūhanīyamiti ||
bhagīº ṭīº | nanu yadyapi jñānādbhedābhedayorubhayorapi na
grāhyalakṣaṇayogaḥ, tathāpi prakāśamānatvamānena jñānaviṣayayorabhedaḥ
sādhyata ityāha | bahiriti | prakāśamānatvaṃ tvayā tyaktamiti
tadrakṣā vikrītagavīrakṣaṇavanniṣphaletyāha | tadetaditi | prakāśa
mānatvasya tyāge hetumāha | kimidamiti | atra sākāra
vādinā jñānaśriyā''kāraṃ niṣidhya bāhyasvīkaraṇaṃ tapanīya
mapanīya vāsasi granthikaraṇamivetyupahasitam, ākārasya viṣayatā
niyāmakasya suvarṇasyeva rakṣaṇāya granthitulyaṃ bāhyam, tadarakṣaṇe
tu tanniṣphalamiti, tadudāharati | tapanīyamiti | suvarṇa
rakṣaṇepi vāsasi granthirbhavati, gaganāñcale na tatsambhava ityāha |
svayaṃ ceti | anuvyavasāyapramāṇakaṃ nīlādīnāṃ prakāśamānatvaṃ
gṛhītvā sarvathā grāhyalakṣaṇābhāve grāhyatvenaivābhedasādhanaṃ gagana
granthivadasambhavītyarthaḥ | sarvaprakāramiti | tadaviṣayakapratītya
viṣayakatvaṃ jñānasvaprakāśaniṣedhāt svarūpāsiddham, tadavṛttidharmma
śūnyatvasyopādheḥ sattvādvyāpyatvāsiddham, sarveṣāṃ pakṣatve'nupasaṃhāryam,
viśiṣya hetupakṣanirvacane sādhāraṇānaikāntikamityarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | nīlādīnāṃ bāhyatve jñānātmakatve ca grāhyatvā
sambhavāttanmāstu, prakāśamānatvādeva teṣāṃ jñānābhedaḥ sādhayitavya
ityāśaṅkate | syādetaditi | grahaṇānāṃ kvācitkanīlapītādyā
kārasya kāraṇatayā bāhyaṃ nīlādikamupeyam, ākāraṃ parityajya
bāhyāṅgīkaraṇaṃ kāñcanaparihāreṇa vasane granthiḥ, bāhyatyāge
nīlādīnāmasambhavataḥ prakāśamānatvasya hetutvenopādānaṃ gagane granthiḥ |
sarvaprakāramiti | yadi kvacidbhedepi grāhyatvaṃ yadi vā na kvāpi
bhede grāhyatvamubhayathāpi vipakṣe bādhakābhāvānna vyāptisiddhiḥ,
evaṃ bhede grāhyatve grāhyatvādervipakṣavṛttitvaṃ bhede cāgrāhyatve svapra
kāśaniṣedhāt citrapratyayānupapattyā cābhede grāhyatvāyogāt
sapakṣavipakṣavyāvṛttatvamityeke vadanti |
anye punaḥ (sa)prakāramasiddhyāderevāhuḥ | tathāhi nīlāderjñānā
kārasya nīlākārajñānavādināṃ bāhyasya ca vijñānavādināma
siddhatvādubhayasādhāraṇanīlatvādyabhāvāt jñāne siddhasādhanāt bāhye
ca bādhādāśrayaviśeṣaṇasandehābhāvāccāśrayāsiddhiḥ, svaprakāśa
niṣedhāt sahopalambhaniyamasya svarūpāsiddhiḥ, vipakṣe bādhakābhāvāt
tadavṛttidharmmaśūnyatvasyopādhitvācca sarveṣāṃ vyāpyatvāsiddhiḥ, evaṃ sarveṣāṃ
pakṣatve'nupasaṃhāryyatvam, viśiṣya pakṣatve tajjñānābhede sādhye grāhyatvasya
sādhāraṇyam, tajjñānagrāhyatvasya ca svaprakāśaniṣedhādasādhāraṇyam,
sādhāraṇyamapi vicitrajñānavedye'līke bheda iti |
kecittu prakāro vicitrasyetyāhuḥ ||
etena dvitīyaḥ pakṣaḥ pratyuktaḥ | na hi sajātīyatvena
grāhyalakṣaṇavaidhuryamutsāryate, atiprasaṅgasya tāda
vasthyāt | jaḍatve prakāśāsambhāvanaiveti cenna, tulya
tvāt | yathā hyasvasamvedanavādinaḥ paraṃ prati prakāśa
mapi jñānamātmani jaḍameva, tathā svasamvedanavādinopi
svātmani prakāśamapi jñānaṃ paraṃ prati jaḍameva |
kathañcit buddhyantarepyajaḍaṃ cet, bāhyepi tathā kiṃ na
syāditi sandigdhavipakṣavṛttitvam |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | eteneti | grāhyalakṣaṇābhāvenetyarthaḥ | anaikānti
katvenetyanye | dvitīyaḥ pakṣaḥ nīlādīnāṃ jñānābhinnajātīyatvam |
sajātīyasyāpi grahe grāhyalakṣaṇakṣatistadavasthetyāha | na hīti |
atiprasaṅgasyeti | ghaṭapaṭādīnāṃ sarveṣāṃ jñānajātīyatayā ghaṭa
jñānasya paṭaviṣayatvaprasaṅgastadavastha evetyarthaḥ | prakāśamānatvena jñāna
sajātīyatvaṃ setsyati, jaḍasya prakāśatvānupapattirityāśaṅkate |
jaḍatva iti | tulyatvāditi | yathā bhinnatayā jaḍaṃ na prakāśate
tadvadevājaḍamapītyarthaḥ | etadevāha | yathā hīti | naiyāyikānāṃ
jñānaṃ svātmani jaḍaṃ bauddhānāṃ tu svabhinnajñānajātīyamapi
jaḍameva, tathā ca tadapi kathaṃ gṛhṇīyādityarthaḥ | nanu jñānajātīyaṃ
svabhinnamapi prakāśayati, na tu jaḍajātīyamityata āha |
kathañciditi | jñānānāṃ svabhinnaprakāśanasāmarthyaṃ yadi tadā
svabhinnaṃ jaḍamapi prakāśayatviti vipakṣe bādhakābhāva ityarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | etenānaikāntikatvena | dvitīyaḥ pakṣo'bhinna
jātīyatvam | na hīti | jñānatvena ghaṭajñānasya paṭasājātyāt
paṭaviṣayatvaprasaṅgatādavasthyādityarthaḥ | nanu nīlāderaprakāśātmatve
prakāśamānatvānupapattiḥ, tasya prakāśatvavyāpyatvādityāha | jaḍatva
iti | prakāśatvepi svameva prakāśayennānyam, yadi ca sāmagrīvaśā
danyamapi prakāśayati, tadā jaḍarūpasyānyasya prakāśyatve na doṣa
ityāha | tulyatvāt | tadeva spaṣṭayati | yathā hīti ||
raghuº ṭīº | etena grāhyalakṣaṇavaidhuryeṇāsiddhatvena ca |
dvitīyaḥ pakṣo'bhinnajātīyatvam | atiprasaṅgasyeti | sājātyasya
niyāmakatve sarvajñānānāṃ sarvagrāhyatvāpātādityarthaḥ | prakāśakatvaṃ
prakāśyatvavyāpaka(tva)m, na ca vinā vyāpakaṃ vyāpyasambhava ityāśaṅkate |
jaḍatva iti | jaḍatvamaprakāśakatvam | prakāśāsambhāvanā prakāśyatvā
sambhāvanā | jñānajātīyamapi kiñcideva kiñcidgṛhṇāti na sarvaṃ
sarvam, atra yadyabhedo niyāmako na tarhyanyena jñānenānyajñānagrahaṇam |
atha kāraṇasāmarthyam, tadā bāhyasyāpi grahaṇam, bādhakābhāvā
dityāha | tulyatvāditi | prakāśayatīti | prakāśam indriya
sannikarṣādivirahādātmani jaḍameva, abhedavirahāt paraṃ prati
jaḍameva, tathā ca svamātrasamvedanavādināmiva tavāpi nānyenānya
grahaṇam, kathañcit svakāraṇasāmarthyāt jñānatvena sādhye grāhyatvasya
hetoḥ sandigdhavipakṣavṛttitvamityākhaṇḍalārthaḥ ||
nanu bāhye sarvathaiva grāhyalakṣaṇakṣatiḥ, iha tu
samānopādānatāniyamena citrākārāṇāṃ paramārtha
bhinnānāmeva vyativedanasiddhiḥ | na | mithaḥ prathā
niyame hyupādānamukhena sāmānyato vā sāmagrī-
sāmarthyameva vaktavyam, anyathā tathāvidhakāryānutpatteḥ,
tathā ca bāhyagrāhyaniyatasvabhāvajñānotpattāvapi
sulabhametaditi pūrvaka eva doṣaḥ |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | nanu bhinnamapi samānopādānaṃ gṛhṇātīti
niyamaḥ sa ca bāhyānāṃ jñānajātīyatve sambhavati, na tu bhinna
jātīyatva ityāha | nanviti | citrākārāṇāṃ nīladhavalādyā
kārāṇām | vyatirekavedanamanyonyavedanam | na mitha iti |
jñānānāṃ bhede grāhyagrāhakabhāvastāvattvayāpyaṅgīkṛta eva | tatra
niyāmakaṃ samānopādānatvaṃ tvayocyate, mayā tu svasāmagrītastathaiva
tajjñānamutpadyate yena ghaṭameva gṛhṇāti na tu paṭamapīti
tulyamityarthaḥ | upādānamukhena viśeṣataḥ, kāraṇamātramukhena
sāmānyataḥ | tathāvidheti | jñānajātīyamapi svabhinnaṃ nīlameva
gṛhṇāti na tu pītamapīti niyāmakaṃ tavāpi kāraṇaśaktibheda
evetyarthaḥ | tadetattulyamityāha | tathā ceti | pūrvaka eveti |
sandigdhavipakṣavṛttitvamevetyarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | nanu samānopādānakatayā grāhyagrāhakabhāva
niyamaḥ, bhinnajātīyatve ca grāhyasya tadasambhavaḥ, samānajātīya
kāraṇasyaivopādānatvāditi grāhyaṃ jñānajātīyamabhyupeyamityāha |
nanviti | abhedena grāhyagrāhakabhāve niyāmakamāha | citrā
kārāṇāmiti | vyatibhedanaṃ vibhinnavedanamanyonyavedanaṃ vā |
evamapi tatra sāmagryeva niyāmikā, tathā ca viṣayajaḍatvepi tata
eva tanniyamopapattau tadviśeṣopādānasya vyarthatvāt sandigdhānai
kāntikatvamevetyāha | mitha iti | upādānamukhena viśeṣataḥ,
kāraṇamātramukhena sāmānyata ityarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | syādetat | bhedasya sājātyasya vā grāhyatva
niyāmakatve'tiprasaṅgādabhedasya tathātve ca citrapratyayānupapatterna
tadastu, abhinnopādānakatvaṃ tu tathā bhavet, na ca bāhyavijñānayo
rekopādānakatvaṃ, nāma, sajātīyakāraṇatvasyaivopādānatvāt, tacca
svasyeva svasahotpannasya vijñānāntarasyāpyaviśiṣṭam, tena sahotpannā
nīlapītādipratyayāḥ svātmānaṃ paraṃ ca gṛhṇanto bhavanti vicitra
pratyayā ityāśaṅkate | nanviti | iha vijñāne | citrākārāṇāṃ
nīlapītādipratyayānām | vyativedanam mithograhaṇam | eva
mapi svakāraṇasāmarthyāt vijñānaṃ niyatajñānagrāhakamityāyātam,
tathā ca tata eva niyatabāhyagrāhakamapi bhavediti sandigdhānai
kāntikatvamiti dūṣayati | neti | hiśabdo hetau | upādānaṃ
yadi kṣaṇikaṃ syāt syādapi tatsāmarthyaṃ niyāmakam, na tvetadasti,
sthairyasya pratisandhānāditi sāmagrīsāmarthyaṃ niyāmakaṃ vaktavyam |
sāmānyataḥ kāraṇamātramukhena | tathāvidhaṃ kāryaṃ niyataviṣayakaṃ
vijñānam | athāyamāśayaḥ, tajjñānagrāhyatve tatsāmagrījanyatvaṃ
niyāmakamiti | naitadapi | citrapratyayānupapatteḥ, sāmagryabhede
kāryabhedāyogāt | kutaścedamavadhāritam | tatsāmagryajanyasya tadbāhya-
tve'tiprasaṅgāditi cet, kasya tāvadetāvānartho vijñānasya sāmagryā
janito yenāyaṃ viṣayīkṛta iti vibhāvyatām | etena tatsāmagrī
janyatvaṃ tadgrāhyatve niyāmakamityādikaṃ vyākhyātam | ata eva
vaināśikānāṃ tadupādānopādeyatvaṃ niyāmakamiti pratyuktam ||
astu tarhi tṛtīyaḥ, sarvathā grāhyalakṣaṇānupapatteḥ,
tadabhāve sāmagrīsāmarthyasyāpyāśrayitumaśakyatvāt,
vicārasiddhe hi vastuni kāraṇacintanāvasaro na
tvavivecita iti cet, kiṃ grāhyalakṣaṇānirvaktavyatayā
prakāśamānatvamamīṣāṃ nivarttate sattvaṃ vā |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | grāhyāṃśasyālīkatvamutthāpayati | astviti |
tarhīti | tajjātīyatvepi grāhyalakṣaṇamanupapannamityarthaḥ | atra
hetumāha | sarvatheti | bhede'bhede ca grāhyalakṣaṇānupapatterityarthaḥ |
tadabhāva iti | grāhyābhāva ityarthaḥ | tadabhāvasyālīkatvāditi
bhāvaḥ | kathametadityata āha | vicāreti |
kecittu tadabhāvo grāhyagrāhakalakṣaṇābhāva ityāhuḥ |
yadi grāhyagrāhakabhāvalakṣaṇaṃ bhavettadārthasāmagrīsāmarthyābhidhānaṃ
ghaṭetāpi, na tu tadabhāvepītyarthaḥ | taduktaṃ jñānaśriyā--
vedyavedakarūpaṃ hi niyataṃ yadi lakṣitam |
tadupādānaparyeṣe sāmagrīśaktirantaram ||1
ruttaramiti 3 puº pāº |
vedyavedakayo rūpaṃ na cādyāpi nivarttate |
tataḥ svarūpe vaktavye sāmagrīparikīrttanam ||
“aprastutābhidhānaṃ vā dihnikākāra eva vā”1 | ityādi |
pariharati | tatkimiti | grāhyalakṣaṇantāvanmama, svavacana
meva tvayā nirvaktuṃ na śakyata etāvatā nīlādīnāṃ prakāśamānatvaṃ
nivarttate sattvaṃ vetyarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | tṛtīyaḥ pakṣo grāhyasyālīkatvam | tatra hetu
māha | sarvatheti | bhinnatvābhinnatvābhyāṃ grāhyālīkatvapakṣe sāmagryā
niyāmakatvaṃ dūṣayati | tadabhāva iti | grāhyābhāva ityarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | tṛtīyaḥ pakṣo grāhyāṃśasyālīkatvam | atra
hetumāha | sarvatheti | bhinnatve'bhinnatve ca sati grāhyalakṣaṇānupapatte
riti | mā bhūtsati grāhyalakṣaṇam, grāhyatvaṃ tu grāhyasya grāhakasya
vā sāmagryāḥ sāmarthyādeva bhaviṣyatītyata āha | tadabhāva iti |
lakṣaṇābhāve lakṣyasyāsambhāvitatayā sāmagrīsāmarthyasyākiñcitkaratvā
dityarthaḥ ||
na prathamaḥ | na hi lakṣaṇāparijñānamātreṇa spaṣṭa
dṛṣṭamapi lakṣyamapahnotuṃ śakyate, aparijñānasya durūha
tvenāpyupapatteḥ, teṣāmapratibhāse tanniṣedhasyānupapatteḥ |
bāhyamāśritya eva vā iti 3 puº pāº |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | spaṣṭadṛṣṭamiti | pūrvā(sarvā)nubhavasiddhamityarthaḥ |
nanu grāhyalakṣaṇaṃ na jñāyate cennūnaṃ nāstītyata āha | apari
jñānasyeti | teṣāmiti | yadi bāhyānāmapratibhāso bhavettadā
tatra grāhyalakṣaṇaṃ nāstītyayamapi niṣedho na ghaṭate grāhyatvena
teṣāmevābhidhānādityarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | spaṣṭadṛṣṭam sakalānubhavasākṣikam | teṣā
miti | grāhyalakṣaṇamanupapannamiti jñānasya tajjñānaṃ vinā'nupa
pattestadavaśyaṃ svīkāryamityarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | spaṣṭadṛṣṭam sarvānubhavasiddham | apari
jñānam viśiṣyānirṇayaḥ | atha nāstyeva bāhye grāhyalakṣaṇam,
nipuṇaparibhāvanepi prajñāśālibhiranākalanāt, na ca lakṣaṇā
bhāve lakṣyasya grāhyatvasya sambhava ityata āha | teṣāmiti |
bāhyānāmabhāve bāhyeṣu grāhyalakṣaṇaṃ nāstīti pratyayopi nopapadyate,
tathā cānāyatyaiva tatra grāhyatvamupeyam, siddhe ca grāhyatve tadanyathā
nupapattyaiva lakṣaṇaṃ setsyatīti ||
na dvitīyaḥ, tadā hi tallakṣaṇānupapattiḥ sattvaṃ
nivarttayet, yadyasattve lakṣaṇamupapadyeta, ubhayathāpya
nupapattau ko'nurāgo'sattve | tadeva lakṣaṇamiti cet,
sattvameva kiṃ na syāt | atiprasaṅgāditi cet, tulyam |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | tadā hīti | yadyasattvaṃ grāhyalakṣaṇanirvāhyaṃ
bhavettadā tatkalpayitumucitamiti bhāvaḥ | ubhayathāpīti |
sattve'sattve cetyarthaḥ | tadeveti | asattvameva grāhyalakṣaṇamityarthaḥ |
sattvameveti | vinigamanāvirahādityarthaḥ | atiprasaṅga iti |
sattve bhede ca grāhyatve ghaṭajñānaṃ paṭaviṣayakamapi syādityarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | tadā hīti | anupapattyā hyupapādakaḥ
kalpyaḥ, na ca sattvamivāsattvamapi tadupapādakamityarthaḥ | tadeva
asattvamityarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | tadeveti | asattvamevetyarthaḥ | tulyamiti |
ekasyāsato bhāne sarvāsadbhānaprasaṅga ityarthaḥ ||
vedanādhīnavyavahāragocaratvamiti cet, astu
tāvadidam, tasyai veti tu niyamaḥ kutaḥ | sāmagrīta
stathā vedanotpattiriti cet, tadetat sambhāvyate
sati, na tvasatīti viśeṣaḥ | yathā hi sati jñānenā
bhilāṣaḥ, tena yatnaḥ, tena pravṛttiḥ, tayā tatprāptiḥ
kriyate, na tathā alīke tasya prāptumaśakyatvāt,
śakyatve vā'nalīkatvāt | vyavahāropyayamalīka iti
cet, tarhi sutarāṃ lakṣaṇābhāvaḥ, taddvārasyāpyabhāvāt |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | grāhyalakṣaṇāntaraṃ śaṅkate | vedaneti | astu
tāvaditi | ghaṭajñānena ghaṭa eva vyavahāro janyate na tu paṭa
ityatra kiṃ niyāmakamityarthaḥ | upekṣājñānāvyāpakañcedamiti
bhāvaḥ | sāmagrīsāmarthyaṃ tatra niyāmakamityāha | sāmagrīta
iti | tadetaditi | arthasāmarthyasamutthatvājjñānasyetyarthaḥ | bāhyasya
sattve vyavahārotpattirnāsattve ityāha | yathā hīti | pravṛttiriha
ceṣṭā | tasya prāptuṃ ityupalakṣaṇam | jñātumabhilaṣitumityapi
draṣṭavyam | alīka iti | tathā cālīkanirvāhya ityarthaḥ | tadbādha
syāpīti | tathā ca vedanādhīnavyavahāragocaratvaṃ yad grāhyalakṣaṇaṃ
kṛtaṃ tat sutarāṃ na sambhavati ityarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | grāhyalakṣaṇāntaramāha | vedaneti | astviti |
tena vedanena tatraiva vyavahāraḥ kartavya ityatraiva kiṃniyāmaka
mityarthaḥ | vastuta upekṣājñāne tadapi nāsti, vyavahāraśca yadi
jñānātmakaḥ, tadā''tmāśrayaḥ, tenaiva tannirūpaṇāt, tadanyarūpaścet,
tadā bāhyasvīkāra ityarthaḥ | sambhāvyata ityanenāpātataḥ sandigdha
vipakṣavṛttitvamuktvā na tvasatītyanena viruddhatvamuktam | taddvārasyāpi
vyavahārarūpadvārasyetyarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | lakṣaṇāntaramāśaṅkate | vedaneti | astviti |
upekṣājñānāvyāpakamiti bhāvaḥ | tasyaiveti | kenacidvedanena kvaci
deva vyavahāro janyata ityeva niyamaḥ kathamityarthaḥ | vyavahāro
yadi vedanāntaraṃ tadā'navasthā, atha pravṛttyādikaṃ, tadapi sada
sadvā, ādye siddhamīhitam, tasyaiva sattvopagamāt, avastuno
vāstavapravṛttyādigocaratvāyogāccetyāha | tadetaditi | etat
satyeva sambhavatītyarthaḥ | dvitīyaṃ śaṅkate | vyavahāropīti |
taddvārasyeti | asato'janyatvāditi bhāvaḥ | yadi cāsatopi
pravṛttyāderjanyatvamupeyate tadā sata eva tadgocaratvamastviti na
tato'sattvasiddhiriti ||
astu tarhi sarvathā vicārāsahatvameva viśvasyeti
cet, tatkimidānīṃ tattvopaplava eva, kāṣṭhāśūnyatā
vā | na prathamaḥ, iyatīṃ bhūmimārūḍhasyāpi vicārasya
niścalatāyāṃ pramāṇābhāvāt, bhāve vā kathaṃ tattvopa
plavaḥ, asyaiva vicārasyānupaplavāt, tatsamānanyāya
syānyasyāpi tathābhāvaprāpteḥ, niṣphalatvācca |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | nanu grāhyatvaṃ na sattvena nāpyasattvena na bhinnatvena
nāpyabhinnatvena vicārayituṃ śakyate cettadā viśvasya vicārāsahatva
mevocitamityāha | astu tarhīti | idānīmiti | vijñāna
vādadaśāyāmityarthaḥ | kāṣṭhā paryavasānameva | tad varaṃ vicāraḥ
pravarttitastenaitatsiddhaṃ yat kimapi tattvaṃ nāsti sarvaṃ vā śūnyamiti
bhāvaḥ | jāyatāmiti | anena vicāreṇa tattvopaplave siddhe
vicārasya upaplavo na vā | ādye keyamanena tatsiddhiḥ antye
vicāra eva vastusiddha iti kathaṃ tattvopaplavo vicārasyānupaplave
vicārya ātmā sa ca jñānabhinno nityavi(bhu)śuddhaścetyādyapi siddha
mevetyāha | tatsamāneti | idānīṃ vicārasyaivānārambhaṇīyatva
māha | niṣphalatvācceti ||
bhagīº ṭīº | sarvathā grāhyasya sattvāsattvābhyāṃ bhinnatvābhinna
tvābhyāṃ nirvaktumaśaktyetyarthaḥ | idānīmiti | vijñānavāde'sya
prasaṅgasaṅgatipradarśanārtham | tattvopaplavo grāhyasya sattvāsattvayorubhayo
rdoṣadarśanenānadhyavasāyaḥ | tatra kāṣṭhā paryavasānam | śūnyatāpakṣā
datra jñānābhyupagama iti viśeṣaḥ | sarvopaplave sarvamupaplutamityaya
mapi vicāra upapluta evetyetadviṣayasyānupaplutatvamasiddhamityāha |
iyatīmiti | niścalatāyām anupaplava ityarthaḥ | athāyaṃ
vicāro nopaplutaḥ, tatrāha | bhāve veti | tāttvikatve vetyarthaḥ |
yena nyāyenāyaṃ vicārastāttvikastenānyaviṣayakavicāropi tathetyāha |
tatsamāneti | niṣphalatvāditi | svasādhanasyopaplave tatsādhyaṃ
kathāsvarūpameva na niṣpadyetetyarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | yadi bāhyasya sattve'sattve ca grāhyalakṣaṇaṃ nopa
padyate, tadā sattvāsattvābhyāṃ vicārāsahatvamevāstvityāśaṅkate
astu tarhīti | idānīṃ bāhyasyāsattvamupekṣya vicārāsahatvā
śrayaṇadaśāyām | upaplavo doṣavattvam | anadhyavasāya ityanye | kāṣṭhā
maryādā viśrāmasthānam tattvopaplavamukhena śūnyatā vā | alīkatā
pakṣe asadeva bāhyaṃ gṛhyate, śūnyatāpakṣe jñānamapi nāstīti
viśeṣaḥ | vijñānavādaprasaṅgādavāntaravādāntarāvatāro'yam |
niścalatvaṃ nirdoṣatvam | tathā ca svayaṃ doṣavatā vicāreṇa nānya
duṣṭatvasādhanamiti bhāvaḥ | anyasya ātmāstitvādisādhakasya |
bhavatāmetadvicārārambhopi na yukta ityāha | niṣphaleti | asya
vicārasyeti śeṣaḥ ||
na hyasyātipravṛttiḥ phalam, gaganāsvādanenātṛpteḥ,
jvālā(alīka)kalāpāliṅganena tāpānapanodanāt |
nāpyatinivṛttiḥ, jaḍībhāvamātrepyupanipātiduḥkhā
nivṛtteḥ | na ca duḥkhamapi vicārāsahamityaheyameva,
tathāvidhasya vicārepyanadhikārāt | nāpi yathālokaṃ
vyavasthitiḥ, vicārāt prāgapi tasyāḥ pāmarādivada
yatnasiddheḥ | nāpi paralokamātrānnivṛttiḥ, tasyaihika
tulyatvāt | dṛśyate hi tāvadayamiti cet, yadi
jñānavacano dṛśistadāparopi tathā | sākṣātkāra
vacanaścet, ihaivānumānāderapravṛttiprasaṅgaḥ | tadapi
pratyakṣamiti cet, āmuṣmikamapi pratyakṣameva, tathā
'pi kiṃ vicāreṇa, tamantareṇāpi tasyāḥ sulabha
tvāt, tāmevāyaṃ puṣṇātīti cet tulyalakṣaṇatvāt |
arucereva tatra na pravṛttiriti cet, aviśeṣādihāpi
puṣṇīyāditi |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | nanu pradhānādevaṃ niyatā pravṛttirmā bhūdeta
darthaṃ vicārārambha ityāha na hīti | tathā sati gaganādāvapi
pravartteta | na ca tataḥ sukhamiti naitat phalamityarthaḥ | nanu
sukhārthināṃ mumukṣūṇāmaniyatā pravṛttiḥ syādetadarthaṃ vicārārambha
ityata āha | jvāleti | bhavedevaṃ yadi tatra pravṛttau duḥkhopaśamaḥ
syānna caivamityarthaḥ | nanvanena vicāreṇa tattvopaplave jñāte mumukṣūṇāṃ
sarvato nivṛttau duḥkhahāniḥ syāt, etadarthaṃ vicārārambhaḥ ityata
āha | nāpīti | syādevaṃ yadi nivṛttau duḥkhavirahaḥ syāt
na caivamityarthaḥ | nanvatinivṛttireva vicāraphalaṃ, jaḍabhūtasyāpi
duḥkhopanipātastathāniṣṭaṃ bhaved yadi duḥkhaṃ heyaṃ syāt, na caiva
mityata āha | na ceti | tathāvidhasyeti | taduktam--
“heyahīnasya kā muktiḥ kena vāpyupadiśyate”
ityarthaḥ | yathā lokavyavasthitirityatra vicāraphalamityanuṣajyate |
lokataḥ siddhādanyatkimapi na tāttvikamityeva vicāraphalamityapi
nāstītyarthaḥ | nāpīti | vicāreṇa tattvopaplave jñāte svargārthināṃ
narakabhīrūṇāñca yāgahiṃsādau pravṛttinivṛttī na syātāmityarthaḥ |
ayamiti | ihaloka ityarthaḥ | tathā ca pravṛttinivṛttī syātā
meveti bhāvaḥ | tadā paropīti | āgamāt paralokasyāpi
jñānāt | ihaiveti | sākṣāt kriyamāṇe vahnyādau pravṛttidarśanā
nnāyaṃ niyama ityarthaḥ | svargasukhaṃ narakaduḥkhaṃ ca pratyakṣamevetyāha |
āmuṣmiketi | tulyalakṣaṇatvāditi | sukhatvaṃ duḥkhatvaṃ ca pratyakṣa
lakṣaṇantayorapi tulyamityarthaḥ | na hi sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ ca sākṣātkārā-
viṣayaśceti bhāvaḥ | nanu paraloke svarasata icchaiva na bhavatyato
na pravṛttirityāha | aruceriti | vicāraphalaṃ vicāryyate ani
cchādhīnā pravṛttirna tat phalamityāha | tathāpīti | tāmeveti |
vicāreṇa paralokopaplave sutarāṃ tatrārucirityarthaḥ | evaṃ tattvopaplave
jñāte ceṣṭārthepyaruciḥ syādityāha | ihāpīti ||
bhagīº ṭīº | asya vicārasya | atipravṛttiḥ aniyatā
pravṛttiḥ | tṛptyāderuddeśyasya copaplavajñāne pravṛttirna syādityāha |
gaganeti | tathāvidhasya heyahīnasya | tatsādhyaprayojanasya jñānaṃ
vinā vicāre'pyapravṛtterityarthaḥ | yathālokamaparīkṣakasādhāraṇyena
vyavasthitiḥ phalamityanuṣajyate | mātrapadādaihikaphalasādhane
pravṛttireveti bhāvaḥ | tasyeti | tena vicāreṇaihikaphalasādhanasyā
pyupaplavādityarthaḥ | ayam ihalokaḥ | paraḥ paralokaḥ | āmuṣmikaṃ
svargādi | yadyarucistattvopaplavaṃ vicāraṃ vinā tatrāha | tathāpīti |
nanu tatsādhyaiva setyāha | tāmeveti | evamihalokepyaruciḥ syāt
tasyāpi vicāreṇa tattvopaplavādityāha | ihāpīti ||
raghuº ṭīº | tāttvikīṃ sāṃvṛtīṃ vā hitāvāptimahitanivṛttiṃ
coddiśya pravṛttiḥ, na ca yatra kvacitpravṛttyā tatsampattirityāha |
gaganetyādinā | vastutaḥ phalasyātāttvikatvaniścaye tadarthaṃ pravṛtti
reva na sambhavatīti draṣṭavyam | jaḍībhāveti | na cāpravṛttau
śramasya karmāśayānutpattyā cā'nāgatasya duḥkhasyānutpāda iti
vācyam | duḥkhasyāpāramārthikatve taddhānārthaṃ prekṣāvatpravṛttyanupapatteḥ,
pāramārthikatve tu śūnyatvāyogāt | tathāvidhasya heyopādeyajñāna
vidhurasya pāralaukikasya sukhasya duḥkhasya cāpāramārthikatve tadarthaṃ
vrataniyamādau na pravṛttiḥ tadbhayācca na svacchandapānabhakṣaṇāde
rnivṛttirityāśaṅkya nirācaṣṭe | nāpīti | ayamiti | loka iti
śeṣaḥ | ihaiveti | sādhanasya vahnyādeḥ kvacitsarvatra ca heyopādeya
sukhaduḥkhayorānumānikatvāt | tadapīti | sādhanamindriyasannikarṣa
daśāyām, sukhaduḥkhe cotpādānantaram | ihāpīti | vicāre
ṇaihikasyāpyupaplutatvāt ||
so'yaṃ pavanatanayavārtāmupaśrutya tatsparddhayā bāla
vānaraḥ kiyadapi dūramutplutya mahārṇave patitaḥ prāha,
apāra evāyamakūpāro mithyā rāmāyaṇa1miti, tat
kimanena | evaṃ jñātuṃ nirvaktuṃ vā na śakyate kīdṛśaṃ
