jagadityetāvanmātramapi pāmaradaśāvanniṣphalameva | na
ca niṣphalatvepi śraddheyamidaṃ, tāvatparāmarśapāṭavā
bhāvenāpyupapatteḥ | na hi jātyandho nīlaṃ jñātuṃ
nirvaktuṃ vā na śakta ityajñeyānirvācyameva talloka iti |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | vicārakuśalasparddhayā vicārākuśalastvaṃ tattvopa
plavaṃ vicāravikalamādarśayannupahasanīyo'sīti dṛṣṭāntena darśayati |
soyamiti | vicārasya phalāntaramāśaṅkate | evamiti |
rāmāyaṇī katheti 3 puº pāº |
taduktam--
“buddhyā vivicyamānānāṃ svabhāvo nāvadhāryate |
ato nirabhilapyāste niḥsvabhāvamidaṃ jagat ||” iti |
pariharati | etāvanmātram iti | vicāraṃ vināpi pāmarasādhā
raṇamidaṃ phalamityarthaḥ | mahatā vicāreṇa siddhyatvanirvacanīyatvaṃ
viśvasya, tadapi mokṣānanukūlatayā niṣphalamevetyāha | na
ceti | atra heyatāyāṃ nimittamāha | tāvaditi | vicāraṃ
vināpi tasyānyathāsiddhatvādityarthaḥ | nirvvaktuṃ jñātuṃ cāśakyamapi
jñeyaṃ nirvāhyañca bhavatītyāha | na hīti ||
bhagīº ṭīº | tasmāt sūkṣmadarśisparddhayā mandadhīstvaṃ tattvaṃ
vivecayitumudyatastatrāśaktyā vicārāsahameva viśvaṃ brūṣa iti
nidarśanenopahasati | soyamiti | na ca nirvacanasandeha evā
nirvacanīyatvam, kvacidapi nirvacanābhāve tatkoṭikasaṃśayānupapatteḥ,
kvacidapyaniścaye sādhyābhāve vāditvābhāvāccetyāha | evamiti |
nāpyāpātato niścayābhāve guruṇā tattvavicāreṇātattvavicāreṇa
tanniścaya evānirvacanīyatvam, yāvatā parāmarṣeṇa tanniścayaḥ
tadabhāve puruṣāśaktyā na vastvevānirvacanīyaṃ syāditi sanidarśana
māha | ceti ||
raghuº ṭīº | vicārakuśalasparddhayā ca vicārayituṃ pravṛttaṃ
mandabuddhiṃ tadasāmarthyādvicāryameva vicārāsahaṃ bruvāṇaṃ nidarśane-
nopahasati | so'yamiti | bāhyasyānirvācyatvaṃ nirākṛtya vaktu
rnirvacanāsāmarthyaṃ nirākaroti | evamiti | atha vakturnirvacanā
sāmarthye vācyasya na nirvācyatvamiti cet, bhavedevaṃ yadi sarva
eva vaktārastathā bhaveyuḥ, na tvetadastītyāha | na1 hītyādinā |
idamanirvācyatvam | sattvāsattvayorbādhādanirvācyateti cenna, vyāghā
tenobhayabādhāsambhavāt, sattve bādhakasya bahuśo nirākāryatvāt,
bādhakasya cābādhyatve tasyaiva tāttvikatvāt, bādhyatve ca tenetara
bādhāyogāt ||
astu tarhi śūnyataiva paramaṃ nirvāṇamiti cenna, sā
hi yadyasiddhā, kathaṃ tadavaśeṣamapi viśvamabhidhīyate,
vāṅmātrasya sarvatra sulabhatvāt | parataścet siddhā,
paro'pyabhyupagantavyo grāhyalakṣaṇaṃ cāvarjanīyamiti | ma
ca paro yadi saṃvṛtireva, viśvaśūnyatayorna kaścidvi
śeṣaḥ, kathaṃ tadapyavaśiṣyeta | asaṃvṛtirūpaścet paraḥ,
parata eva tasya siddhāvanavasthā | svayamasiddhaścet, kathaṃ
śūnyatvamapi sādhayet | svataḥ siddhaścet, āyāto'mi
mārgeṇa |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | mādhyamikamataṃ dvitīyaṃ pakṣamāha | astu
tarhīti | paramaṃ nirvāṇaṃ jñānasyāpi lopāt | yathā dīpasya
nirvvāṇato mahāndhakāra iti bhāvaḥ |
na cetyādinā iti 3 puº pāº |
bāhmajñānayorabhāve na kutopi bhītiriti paramā nirvṛtti
rityartha ityanye |
śūnyatāyāṃ yadi pramāṇamasti tadā na śūnyatā | yadi ca na
pramāṇaṃ tadā pūrṇatayā kimaparāddhamityāha | sā hīti | parata
iti | pramāṇādityarthaḥ | bhinnāyā eva śūnyatāyā grahaṇe siddhamasya
grāhyalakṣaṇamityarthaḥ | nanu na pramāṇaṃ paraśabdenocyate kiṃ tu samvṛti
stathā ca na grāhyalakṣaṇaṃ na vā śūnyatābhaṅga ityāha | sa ceti |
sambṛtyā viśvasyāpi viṣayīkaraṇādityarthaḥ | kathamiti | śūnyatā
vādinaḥ sambṛterabhyupagame śūnyatākṣatirevetyarthaḥ | asambṛtīti |
pramāṇāntarāpekṣāyāmanavasthetyarthaḥ | svayamiti | anavasthābhayena
pramāṇena pramāṇāntarānanusaraṇe mūlaparyantamasiddherityarthaḥ | svata
iti | svaprakāśatvādeva śūnyatāsiddhau nānavasthetyarthaḥ | atra taṭastho
vedāntī svamataparyyavasānamālocyāha | āyātosīti ||
bhagīº ṭīº | mādhyamikamatamāha | astviti | tathā ca
bāhyajñānayorabhāve na kutopi bhītiriti paramā nirvṛtirityarthaḥ |
sarvaśūnyatāpakṣe śūnyatāgrāhakamānasyāpi śūnyatvānna tatsiddhiḥ, mānaṃ
vināpi tatsiddhāvaviśeṣeṇa pūrṇataiva kiṃ na syādityāha | sā
hīti | atha tadgrāhakamaśūnyam, na tarhi sarvaśūnyatā, tanmānajanyā
buddhirgrāhikā grāhyā ca śūnyateti, tadvat paramārthasatyapi viśvasmin
viṣayaviṣayibhāvaḥ syādityāha | parataścediti | sambṛtiḥ buddhiḥ |
tathā ca tadvadanyatrāpi viṣayaviṣayibhāvaḥ syādityāha | viśveti |
asambṛttirūpasya yadi siddhiḥ parataḥ, tadā tatsiddhirapi parata
evetyanavasthetyāha | asamvṛttīti | nanu buddhirūpaḥ paraḥ, sa ca
prakāśa iti nānavasthetyāha | svata iti | atra taṭastho vedā
ntyāha | āyāto'sīti | mārgeṇa, vedāntināṃ svaprakāśabrahmā
dvaitapakṣasya nirdoṣatvādityarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | sarvaśūnyatāvādī mādhyamikaḥ pratyavatiṣṭhate |
astu tarhīti | heyopādeyatatsādhanavirahe dveṣabhayarāgādivira
hāt paramā nirvṛtiḥ | tamenaṃ vedāntinayena nirākurute |
sā hīti | asiddhatvāviśeṣādviśvameva kiṃ na syāt | paropīti |
paraḥ pramāṇāntaram | tathāca kva sarvaśūnyatvam | avarjanīyamiti |
śūnyatāpramāṇayorviṣayaviṣayibhāvāṅgīkāreṇetyarthaḥ | samvṛtirvikalpaḥ |
kathaṃ tadapi śūnyatvamapi kathamavaśiṣyate | viśvasya samvṛti
siddhatvāt | asaṃvṛtirūpo'nubhavarūpaḥ | kathamiti | asiddhenaiva
śūnyatāsādhane vā viśvameva kiṃ na sādhayet | mārgeṇa aupaniṣadena ||
tathāhi | svataḥ siddhatayā tadanubhavarūpam, śūnya
tvādeva ca na tasya kālāvaccheda iti nityam, ata
eva ca na deśāvaccheda iti vyāpakam, ata eva tanni
rdharmmakamiti vicārāspṛṣṭam, tasya dharmmadharmmibhāvamupā
dāya pravṛtteḥ, ata eva viśeṣābhāva ityadvaitam, prapañca
syāpāramārthikatvācca, niṣpratiyogikamiti vidhi-
rūpam, avicāritaprapañcāpekṣayā tu śūnyamiti vyava
hāraḥ | tathāpi prapañcaśūnyasyānubhavamātrasya prapañcena
saha kaḥ sambandhaḥ, na ca nāyaṃ prakāśata iti cet,
vastugatyā na kaścit, saṃvṛttyā tu gaganagandharvanagarayo
rādhārādheyabhāva iva viṣayaviṣayibhāvaḥ, sa ca yathā
naiyāyikaiḥ samarthayiṣyate tathaiva, vedyaniṣṭhastvasāvasmin
darśana iti viśeṣaḥ | avidyaiva hi tathā tathā viva
rttate yathā yathā'nubhāvyatayā1 vyavahriyate | tatta
nmāyopanītopādhibhedāccānubhūtirapi bhinneva vyava
hārapathamavatarati gaganamiva svapnadṛṣṭaghaṭakaṭāhakoṭara
kuṭīkoṭibhiḥ | tadāstāṃ tāvat, kimārdrakavaṇijo
vahitracintayā |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | vedāntī svamatamupaskaroti | tathāhīti |
anubhavarūpaṃ svaprakāśajñānātmakam | śūnyatvāditi | prapañcasya
mithyātvādityarthaḥ | nityaṃ vijñānamānandaṃ brahmeti śrautaṃ nityatvaṃ
kālasya kālopādhīnāñcāsattvādeva na tadavaccheda etāvataivopa
caritamityarthaḥ | ata eveti | śūnyatvādeva deśābhāvādityarthaḥ |
tasyeti | vicārasyetyarthaḥ | viśeṣābhāvo vaidharmyābhāvastadabhāvā
ccānyonyābhāvābhāva iti dvaitābhāva ityarthaḥ | sa ca brahmātmaka
eveti bhāvaḥ | nanu prapañcabhinnatvāttanniṣedharūpameva tanna kathamata
'nubhavanīyatayā iti 3 puº pāº |
āha | prapañcasyeti | brahmabhinnatvaṃ yadi paramārthasadbhavet tadā
tatpratiyogikaniṣedharūpatā syāt na tvevamityarthaḥ | tarhi sati
svaprakāśajñāne śūnyatvābhidhānaṃ kathamityata āha | avicāri
teti | jñānabhinnaṃ kimapi nāstītyeva śūnyatetyarthaḥ | tathāpīti |
viṣayaviṣayibhāvasya tvayā'nabhyupagamāditi bhāvaḥ | vastugatyeti |
tasyāpi prapañcāntargatatvādityarthaḥ | vyavahāraṃ samarthayati | sambṛtyeti |
nanu viṣayaviṣayibhāvaḥ ka ityata āha | sa ceti | vedyaniṣṭha iti |
tena prapañcena sahaiva nivarttata ityarthaḥ | na ca naiyāyikānāmiva
jñānaniṣṭhaḥ jñānasyāpāramārthikaprapañcena sambandhābhāvāditi bhāva |
asmin darśane vedāntadarśane | nanvevaṃ ghaṭapaṭādīnāṃ ghaṭajñānapaṭa
jñānādīnāṃ ca kathaṃ bhedābhimāna ityata āha | avidyaiva hīti |
anādyavidyāvaśāttathā'nubhava ityarthaḥ | eka evānubhavo brahmātmakaḥ
kathamavidyāvaśādapi bhedena bhāsatāmityanupapattiṃ dṛṣṭāntena nira
syati | gaganamiveti | tadāstāmiti | idānīṃ yogācāra
matanirāsāya pravṛtto'haṃ vedāntimatamagre nirākariṣyāmītyarthaḥ |
vedāntimatasya sunirasatvamupahāsena darśayati | kimiti |
vahitrasya cirasādhyatvamārdrakasyāpi ca nivarttanīyatvaṃ yathā tathā
yogācāramatasya durnirasatvamasya tu sunirasatvamityarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | teṣāmeva mataṃ prapañcayati | tathāhīti |
svaprakāśatayā tajjñānarūpamityarthaḥ | evaṃ śrautaṃ nityatvādivyapadeśaṃ
samarthayati | śūnyatvādeveti | kālāvacchedakānāmupādhīnāma
bhāvādeva brahmaṇi na kālāvaccheda iti nityatvamuktaṃ śrutau vastuto
na tatra dharmmaḥ kaścidityarthaḥ | ataeva deśasya śūnyatvādeva viśeṣā
bhāvaḥ bhedarūpadharmmābhāva ityarthaḥ | prapañco jñānabhinno ghaṭādiḥ |
avicāriteti | sattvāsattvābhyāmanirvacanīyaghaṭādyapekṣayetyarthaḥ | nanu
prapañcaḥ prakāśata ityanubhavasiddham, tasya jñānāntaraprakāśyatve dvaitā
pattyā brahmaprakāśyatāyāṃ brahmavat prapañcopi vāstavaḥ syāt, brahmaṇaśca
pramāṇatvādgrāhyalakṣaṇaṃ cāvarjanīyamityāha | tathāpīti | brahmaṇaḥ
svātmani dharmmiṇi pramāṇatvepi bādhakāt prapañcāṃśe bhramatvamevetyāha |
vastugatyeti | samvṛttyā tviti | yathā tayorādhārādheyabhāvo na
tāttvikastathā'smākaṃ samvṛttyā viṣayaviṣayibhāvopītyarthaḥ | vedyaniṣṭha
iti | asmin vedāntanaye | sa viṣayaviṣayibhāvaḥ | vedyaniṣṭhaḥ,
na tu naiyāyikānāmiva jñānātmakabrahmaṇā pāramārthikenāpāramā
rthikaprapañcasya sambandhābhāvādityarthaḥ | avidyaiveti | jñānā
sambandhepi prapañcasya prapañcasambandhitāvyavahāro na satyaḥ, kintvavidyā
nibandhana ityarthaḥ | nanu ghaṭajñānapaṭajñānayorbhedavyavahāro na syāt,
brahmaṇo nirūpakasyābhedādityata āha | tattaditi | avidyāta
ekamapi tattadviṣayopadhānena bhinnamiva bhāsata ityarthaḥ | tadayaṃ
vedāntipakṣo nedānīṃ dūṣyate, aprasaktatvāt, jñānabhinnaṃ grāhyama
līkamityabhyupagamācca, yogācāramatanirāsasyaiva prakṛtatvādityāha |
tadāstāmiti ||
raghuº ṭīº | aupacārikaṃ nityatvādivyavahāraṃ samarthayati |
śūnyatvādevetyādinā | śūnyatvāt dvitīyavirahāt | nanu bādhyopi
tāvatprapañcaḥ prakāśate, prakāśaścāsya yadi jñānāntaraṃ ? tadā dvaitā
pattiratha brahmaiva, tadā yathārthānubhavasya brahmaṇo viṣayatvāt prapañcasya
pāramārthikatvaprasaṅga ityāśayena pṛcchati | tathāpīti | vastutaḥ prapañcaḥ
prakāśata ityeva na, āvidyakastu tathā vyavahāra iti pariharati |
vastugatyeti | saṃvṛttyā avidyayā | vedyaniṣṭha iti | āvidyakasya
āvidyakaprapañcasambandhasya ca tasya paramārthasati brahmaṇyasambhavāditi
bhāvaḥ | ghaṭapaṭādyanubhavabhedavyavahāraṃ samarthayati | tattaditi |
evaṃ ca prapañcavattasyā''vidyakaprakāśāntarasvīkārepi na kṣatirityapi
mantavyam | atha nirasyantu śūnyatāmaupaniṣadā dvaitavādinastu katham |
tathaiva | tathāhi, asiddhaiva cecchūnyatopeyate kimaparāddhaṃ vyavahāra
siddhayā pūrṇatayā | anubhavabalāditi cet, tadidaṃ viparītam |
na khalu svapnepi śūnyatā svārasikasya kasyāpyanubhavasya gocaro'pi
tu pūrṇataiva, anubhavopagame ca kva nāma śūnyatā | prapañce bādhakā
diti cet, na, prāgeva dattottaratvāt | api ca kimidaṃ
śūnyatvaṃ nāma ? | abhāva iti cenna, avirodhāt | sārvadiko'bhāva
iti cet, tathāpyavirodha eva, kvacit kasyacidabhāvopagamāt |
sārvatrika iti cet, tathāpi tathaiva, ekena sambandhena sato'pi
sambandhāntareṇāsattvopagamāt | sarveṇa sambandheneti cet, kasyābhāva
iti vaktavyam | sarveṣāmiti cet, sarvakāladeśasambandhaprati
yogināmupagamepi śūnyataiveti mahadāścaryam ||
tasmādanubhavavyavasthitau anātmāpi sphuratītyavarja
nīyametat | tatsiddhau tallakṣaṇamapi kiñcidastyeva |
tacca bāhyāvirodhe jñānānityatāyāṃ tanniṣṭhamubhayaniṣṭhaṃ
vā, bāhyavirodhe jñānaniṣṭhameva, tannityatāyāṃ tu grāhya
niṣṭhameveti | tathāhi, lakṣyastāvadatra viṣayaviṣayi
bhāvaḥ | sa ca prakāśasya satastadīyatāmātrarūpaḥ
svabhāvaviśeṣaḥ | svabhāvatvādeva ca nopakārāntara
mapekṣate, tanmātrīyatvādeva ca nānyadīyaḥ |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | tasmāditi | bāhyasyālīkatvepi tadanubhavastāva
dasti, tathā cānātmā sphuratīti tvayā svīkarttavyamiti prakāśa
mānatvādīnāṃ hetūnāmanaikāntikatvāditi bhāvaḥ | tatsiddhāviti |
anātmasphuraṇasiddhāvityarthaḥ | tallakṣaṇaṃ grāhyalakṣaṇam | bāhyāvirodhe
bāhyapāramārthikatve | tanniṣṭhamiti | jñānaniṣṭhamityarthaḥ | ubhayaniṣṭha
miti | jñānajñeyaniṣṭhamityarthaḥ | etacca sākāravijñānamate |
jñānanityatāyāmiti | vedāntipakṣe grāhyaniṣṭhameva | anyathā
ghaṭaṃ jānāmīti sarvadā'nuvyavasāyaprasaṅgāt | idānīṃ svamatena
viṣayaviṣayibhāvamupapādayati | tathāhīti | prakāśasyeti vadatā
jñāyateneneti vā jñānaṃ jānātīti vā jñānaṃ jñaptirvā jñāna
mityādi jñānaśriyā jñānapade kṛtaṃ vikalpajātaṃ nirastam |
sata ityanena śūnyatānirāsaḥ | tadīyateti | ghaṭajñānaṃ paṭajñāna
mityatra ṣaṣṭhyarthonubhūyamāna upapāditaḥ, mātrapadena ghaṭajñānasya
paṭaviṣayatāprasaṅgo nirastaḥ, svabhāvapadena copakārādyadhīnatvaṃ
viṣayitvasya nirastam | viśeṣapadena ca jñānābhāvajñānasamavāyayoḥ
svarūpasambandhepi viṣayatvaṃ nirastam | nanvetāvatā jñānaviṣayayoḥ
svarūpaṃ viṣayaviṣayibhāva ityukta bhavati, taccātiprasaktaṃ, caitraḥ
kiñcit jānātyayañca ghaṭa iti svarūpadvayajñānepi tadviṣayatāyā
ajñānādatiriktaiva sā vācyā, svarūpaṃ ca pratisvamagnamityananugamaḥ |
maivam | svarūpadvayajñānepi tadupaśliṣṭatāyā ajñānāt | anyathā
viṣayatāmādāyāpyapratīkārāt, bhavati hi caitro jānāti kvaci
dasya jñānasya viṣayateti jānatoyaṃ ghaṭaṃ jānāti na veti sandehaḥ,
viṣayatayāpi jñānasya svarūpasambandhasyaivābhyupagamāt | anyathāti
prasaṅgāt | ananugamastu na prakṛte doṣaḥ | anugataṃ tu tannirūpaṇa
yogyatvaṃ tadviṣayatvamiti | tanmātrīyatvādeveti | tannirūpaṇā
dhīnanirūpaṇatvādityarthaḥ | etādṛśī ca saviṣayatecchākṛtyorapi,
paraṃ tu na sā svābhāvikī, kiṃ tu jñānaupādhikī, jñānasya
tu svābhāvikīti viśeṣaḥ | ata eva viṣayapravaṇatvaṃ jñānasyaiva,
na tu tayoḥ, lakṣaṇamapi tadeva jñānasya | yadicchādhikaraṇa
kṣaṇāvyavahitapūrvvakṣaṇasthitikasamānādhikaraṇajñānasyaivecchāyā viṣaya
pratinibandhanaprayojakatvādevañceśvarecchāyā api svaviṣayatāyāṃ
nityajñānasyaiva niyāmakatvamiti bhāvaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | tasmāditi | anubhavabalājjñānabhinnameva
tatra bhāsata ityabhyupagame grāhyagrāhakayorabhedasādhanānyanaikāntikā
nītyarthaḥ | tacceti | bāhyaṃ pāramārthikaṃ jñānamanityamiti
naiyāyikapakṣe jñānaniṣṭhameva tadviṣayatvaṃ vācyam, jñānanityatve tu
tasya jñānaniṣṭhatvājjānāmītyanuvyavasāyaḥ sadaiva syādityarthaḥ |
sākāravijñānavādimatam, ubhayeti | jñānamarthaścetyubhayam |
yogācāramataṃ bāhyeti | bāhyālīkatve pāramārthikajñānaniṣṭhameva
tadityarthaḥ | sāṅkhyamatam, tannityatāyāmiti | atroktaiva yuktiḥ |
svamate jñānaniṣṭhasya viṣayaviṣayibhāvasya lakṣaṇamāha | sa ceti |
nanu ko'yaṃ svabhāvaḥ | svasya bhāvo dharmmo vā svabhāvaḥ sva
eva vā bhāvaḥ | nādyaḥ, jñānasya dharmmo ghaṭatvādītyabhyupagame
sākāramatapraveśāpatteḥ | nāntyaḥ, viṣayasyāpi jñānātmani praveśe
vijñānavādimatāpatteḥ, svarūpamātrasyātiprasañjakatvāt | svarūpa
viśeṣasya cāvyāpakatvāt | kiñca tadīyeti chapratyayasya tasyeda
mityarthe'nuśāsanāt viṣayasambandhitvamarthaḥ pratīyate, tadyadi jñāna
niṣṭham, tadā ghaṭo jñānaviṣaya iti sāmānādhikaraṇyadhīrna
syāt | atha viṣayaniṣṭhameva, tadā jñānāgrahepi tadgrahaprasaṅgāt |
api ca jñānena tatprāgabhāvasamavāyayorapi svarūpasambandhāttayorapi
viṣayatvāpattiḥ, ghaṭapaṭobhayaviṣayakasamūhālambane ghaṭatvena ghaṭo
viṣayo na paṭatveneti paṭatvaprakārakaviṣayatāyāṃ ghaṭatvaprakāraka
viṣayatayā samaṃ bhedagrahādekameva jñānaṃ svato bhidyeta, kiñcaivaṃ
vastuto ghaṭaviṣayakajñānavatyeva kiñcidayaṃ jānātīti jñāne ghaṭe
ca jñāte ghaṭaviṣayakajñānavānayaṃ na veti saṃśayo na syāt, jñāna
ghaṭasvarūpayorniścayāt, ato viṣayatākhyaṃ dharmmāntarameva jñāna
viśeṣaṇatārūpaṃ svīkāryam | atha jñānajanyavyavahāraviṣayatvam,
na cātmāśrayaḥ, viṣayatvasya sāmānyataḥ siddheḥ, anyathā''śrayāsiddhe
rlakṣaṇasyeti cenna | upekṣājñānāvyāpteḥ, tena vyavahārājananāt,
tadyogyatāyāstadavacchedakarūpāparicaye'jñānāt, tatparicaye vā
tasyaiva lakṣaṇatāpatteḥ |
atrāhuḥ | jñānasvarūpameva viṣayatvam, na cātiprasaṅgaḥ, eka
jñānasvarūpasya taditarajñānānātmakatvāt | viśiṣya tu ghaṭajñāna
ghaṭayostatsvarūpameva tadviṣayatvam | tattadghaṭajñānānāṃ pratisvaṃ bhedepi
ghaṭatvenaivānugatadhīrdaṇḍatveneva daṇḍinām |
yadvā jñānasvarūpatvepi viṣayatāyāmanugamo jñānatvaupādhika
eva, jñānamātrasyaiva saviṣayakatvāt, chapratyayārthaśca sambandhastatra
viśiṣṭabuddhyādijanakatvameva, sambandhāntarābhāve tasyaiva sambandha
rūpatvāt, rūpasya samavāya itivat samavāyasyaikatvāt | na ca
samūhālambane'nupapattiḥ, samavāyavadavacchedabhedenaiva tadupapatteḥ |
nāpi saṃśayānupapattiḥ, jñānaghaṭasvarūpagrahepi sambandhāntaraṃ vinā
tadviśiṣṭadhījanakatvasya tadīyatvasyāgrahāt | anuvyavasāyollekha
yogyāsādhāraṇadharmmāgrahasya pratibandhakatvācca | anyathā'tirikta
viṣayatāpakṣepi tatpratītisambhavenāpratīkārāt |
yadvā jñānavṛttitadanuvyavasāyakāraṇatāvacchedakatvameva jñāna
viṣayatvam | na ca tadanuvyavasāyasya tadviṣayakavyavasāyarūpatāyā
mātmāśrayaḥ, sāmānyato viṣayatvasya jñānatvādityuktatvāt |
yadvā jñānajanyecchāgocaratvayogyatā tadviṣayatā | yogyatā
vacchedakaṃ ca tattatsvarūpameveti nopekṣājñānāvyāptiḥ | prakāśasyeti
tvicchādivyāvarttanārtham | janakajñānaviṣayaupādhikatvenaiva saviṣa
yakatvavyavahāropapatteḥ |
nanu kimatra niyāmakam, vaiparītyasyāpi suvacatvāt | atha
sarvaṃ na saviṣayakam, kintu kiñcidevetyatra niyāmakaṃ nātmadharmmatvam,
adṛṣṭe'tivyāpteḥ, tadajñānepi tathāvyavahārācca, kintu jñānatvam,
icchādau tadaupādhikam, na tu vaiparītyam, jñāne tadasambhavāt,
upādhitvenābhimatānāmicchādīnāmagretanatvāt, teṣāṃ viṣayaprati
niyame jñānaviṣayatvasyaiva niyāmakatvācca, upekṣājñāne tadasambhavācca,
ata eva jñānatvanibandhana eva viṣayatānugama iti na tadartha
matiriktaviṣayatā'bhyupagamyate | maivam | kiṃ jñānaviṣayataiva
tajjanyecchāviṣayatā, kiṃ vā tadviṣayakajñānajanyatvamevecchāyā
stadviṣayatvam | nādyaḥ, jñānanāśe sati icchāyā nirviṣayatāpatteḥ |
nāntyaḥ, jñānānavagamepyavagamyamānatvāt, janakajñānasyāniyataviṣaya
tvepīcchāyā niyataviṣayatvācca |
atrāhuḥ | yathā ghaṭādinā svasambandhe samavāyasyābhedenaiva
sambandharūpatvam, rūpādisambandhe tu tattvena, tathā jñānasyāpi
ghaṭādinā svasambandhe svasambandharūpatvamabhedena, icchādisambandha
rūpatvantu bhedena | nanvayaṃ paurvāparyasambandho'nugatadharmagarbho na ca
ghaṭecchātvādikaṃ jātirasti, ghaṭagocarecchātvādinaiva tattve'nyo
nyāśraya iti cenna, na hīcchākāraṇatvameva jñānasyecchāsambandha
rūpatvam, kintu jñānasvarūpameva tathā, niyāmako hi janyajanaka
bhāvaḥ saṃskāravat | na caivaṃ janakajñānopagame sannapi prayatno
nirviṣayaḥ syāt, tathā ca pravṛttyaniyamaḥ syāditi vācyam |
tathāpi taṃ karomi na tu vedmīti kadācijjñānopagamāt,
jñānāntaraṃ tatrotpadyata iti tu tulyam | tathāpi prayatnajanakaṃ
jñānaṃ nāsti, tacca sambandharūpamiti cet, na, tadviṣayatvena tasya
kāraṇatā, tadviṣayajñānamātrasyaiva sambandhatvarūpatvāt | na caivamīśva
recchādikamaviṣayaṃ syāt, janakajñānābhāvāditi vācyam |
yadviṣayakasya jñānasya yadviṣayakecchādhikaraṇakṣaṇāvyavahitapūrvakṣaṇe
niyamena yatsattvam, tajjñānaupādhikamicchāyāstadviṣayatvamityasye
śvarecchāsādhāraṇasya niyāmakatvāditi saṅkṣepaḥ |
nanu tadīyatāniyāmakaṃ tenopakṛtatvaṃ tanniṣṭhopakārajanakatvaṃ
vā tatra nāstītyata āha | svabhāvādeveti | upakārādhānepi
svabhāva eva niyāmaka iti bhāvaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | tasmāditi | anubhavo hi kaścididaṃ nīla
miti, kaścicceme nīlapīte mithobhinne iti, na ceyaṃ vyavasthā
jñānākāreṇopapādayituṃ śakyate iti sato'sato vā jñānabhinnasya
bhānamāvaśyakamityarthaḥ | tatsiddhau bāhyagrāhyatvasiddhau | tallakṣaṇaṃ
grāhyatvaniyāmakam | tacca vyavahāraviśeṣanimittaṃ jñānārthayo
rviṣayaviṣayibhāvarūpaṃ, bāhyāvirodhe bāhyasya pāramārthikatve, tanniṣṭhaṃ
jñānaniṣṭham | ubhayaniṣṭhaṃ jñānamarthaścetyubhayam | grāhyamalīkaṃ jñānaṃ
cānityamitiyogācāramate prāha | bāhyeti | jñānaṃ nityaṃ prapañcastu
atāttvika iti vedāntimate tvāha | tannityatāyāmiti |
nimittamuktaṃ prāk |
kecittu ghaṭādivyavahāraprayojakasya tadviṣayatvasya nityajñāna
niṣṭhatve sarvadā tadvyavahārāpattiḥ, nityajñānasvarūpānatiriktasya ca
tasya sāmagrīviśeṣajanyatāyā vaktumaśakyatvāt | evaṃ ghaṭaviṣayatvenānu
vyavasāyadaśāyāṃ paṭaviṣayatvenāpi tadāpattirityāhuḥ | taccintyam |
prakāśasyetyādi | tadīyatā tatsambandhitvam | svabhāvaḥ svarūpam |
tathā ca jñānasvarūpameva jñānasyārthena sambandhaḥ, sambandhasambandhino
ścābhedo na doṣāya, sarvatra svarūpasambandhe tathaiva kalpanāt |
sāmānyataśca viṣayatā jñānasvarūpam, ghaṭādiviṣayatā tu sambandhinā
ghaṭādinā anugatā, jñānaviśeṣā eva saṃyogaviśeṣā iva ghaṭā
dīnāṃ sambandhāḥ, vyavahāranimittaṃ ca jñānaniṣṭhamarthasambandhitvam,
nārthaniṣṭhaṃ jñānasambandhitvam, atītānāgatajñānavyavahārānurodhā
diti vadanti |
daṇḍapuruṣasaṃyogāḥ jñānaghaṭaviṣayatā itivacca jñānaghaṭāviti
samūhālambanepi na viśiṣṭavyavahārādiḥ jñānaviśeṣasyaiva tatra
tantratvāditi |
atra vadanti | yadi jñānasvarūpameva viṣayatā, tadā ghaṭa
paṭāviti samūhālambanasya paṭatvaghaṭatvāvacchinnaghaṭapaṭīyasvātmaka
viṣayatāśālitvādbhramatvāpattiḥ | atha yathā samavāyo'navacchinna
eva sattāyā, rūpasaṃyogādyavacchinnaśca rūpasaṃyogādeḥ sambandhastathā
nirvikalpakaṃ jñānamanavacchinnameva, savikalpakaṃ tu tattatprakārāva
cchinnaṃ viṣayatā, samūhālambane ghaṭapaṭatvādyavacchinnaṃ jñānaṃ ghaṭāde
rbhrame tu ghaṭatvādyavacchinnaṃ paṭāderityadoṣa iti cet, tarhi
ghaṭajñānaṃ jñāto ghaṭa ityeva syāt, na tu ghaṭatvena ghaṭajñānaṃ
ghaṭatvena ghaṭo jñāta iti, ghaṭatvasya sambandhakoṭau praveśāt, na hi
bhavati nīlatvena nīlo ghaṭo nīlatvena ghaṭanīlimeti,1
tadavacchinnatvaṃ ca yadi dharmmāntaraṃ, tadā bhāṣāntareṇātirikta
viṣayatāsvīkāraḥ, atha tadubhayameva, tadā'tītānāgataviśeṣaṇake
'pratīkāraḥ | api ca yadi vijñānaṃ svarūpeṇa ghaṭādibhiḥ
sambaddhamiti teṣu vyavahāramādhatte, tadā svātmani svābhāve
svakālādāvapyādadhyāttairapi samaṃ tasya svarūpeṇa sambaddhatvāt | kiṃ
ca yadi viṣayatā tattvaṃ vā nātiricyate, tadā kathaṃ tadviṣaya
kecchādisāmānye tadviṣayakajñānānāṃ kāraṇatvamananugatatvāt,
sambandhatvena cānugame'tadviṣayake tatsambandhāntaraśālini jñāne
'tiprasaṅgaḥ, tasmādatiriktaiva viṣayatā, tadviśeṣāstu prakāratvādayaḥ,
evaṃ viṣayatātvādikamapi | etena pratiyogitvādhikaraṇatvādayo
vyākhyātāḥ | saptapadārthīpravādastu vaiśeṣikaprasiddhimanuruddhyaiva |
athaivaṃ sambandhānantye'navasthā syāt, syādeva, yadi kvacidapi svarūpa
sambandhena na pratīkāraḥ, anyathā'nupapatterdurvāratvāt, sā ca jñāna
niṣṭhā jñānasya ca niyatakāryajanakatāvacchedakatayā kalpanīyā,
tatpratiyogitayā cārthe viṣayavyavahāraḥ |
pare tu viṣayatvaviṣayitve bhinne evārthajñānayoḥ pratiyogi
tvānuyogitve iva bhāvābhāvayorityāhuḥ |
nīlamiti 2 puº pāº |
yattu tadgocaravyavahārajanakatvameva tadviṣayatvamiti, tatrāstāṃ
vyavahārasya tadgocaratvavicāraḥ, kiñcideva vijñānaṃ kvacideva
vyavahāramādhatte nānyatretyatra niyāmakaṃ vaktavyam, janakatvaṃ ca na
phalopadhānam, sarvatra tadabhāvāt | nāpi yogyatā, avacche
dakānirvacanāt | itthaṃ ca svabhāveti svīyabhāvārthakaṃ, prakāśasyeti
icchādinirāsāyetyuttaragranthānurodhena varṇayanti |
vastuta icchādayopi saviṣayakā eva | teṣāṃ janakajñānopādhikaṃ
saviṣayatvamiti cet, janakajñānaviṣayatvaṃ janakaṃ jñānaṃ vā na
tadviṣayatvam, atiprasaṅgāt, īśvarecchādāvabhāvācca | atha yadviṣayatvena
jñānasyecchājanakatvam tadviṣayakaṃ jñānameva tadviṣayatvamiti cet, na
tarhīśvarecchādikaṃ sarvaviṣayaṃ syāt, sarvaviṣayatvenecchādyanutpādaka
tvāt | syācca sukhādīcchāyā api duḥkhābhāvādiviṣayatvam | atha
yadviṣayakajñānasya yadviṣayakasamānādhikaraṇecchādisamayāvyavahita
pūrvasamaye tādṛśecchādisamaye vā niyamataḥ sattvaṃ tadviṣayakaṃ
jñānameva tathā | suvacaśca mahāpralayāvyavahitapūrvakṣaṇa eveśvarecchādhi
karaṇasamayāvyavahitapūrvaḥ samaya iti cet, tarhi pākādīcchāyā
iṣṭasādhanatādiviṣayatāpi syāt, na syācca kṛteḥ pākādiviṣayatvaṃ,
tadavyavahitapūrvakṣaṇe pākādijñānāntare mānābhāvāt | syāccecchāyāḥ
kṛtyutpādasamaye nirviṣayatvam, icchānantaraṃ tādṛśaṃ jñānaṃ tadanantaraṃ
kṛtiḥ, tadanantaraṃ tādṛśaṃ jñānāntaraṃ kiṃ vā yugapadyogyātmaguṇa
dvayotpādamupetyecchākṛtyutpādasamaye niyamatastādṛśaṃ jñānāntaraṃ
kalpanīyamiti cet, tarhi lāghavāt saṃskāre gatyantarābhāvācca
teṣāṃ svataḥ saviṣayatvasyaiva kalpayitumucitatvāt, bādhakābhāvāt |
etena kimasmākamanugatarūpavivecanena, kiñcit jñānaṃ kācidvā
tadviṣayatā kasyacidicchāderviṣayatvamiti parāstamiti kṛtaṃ
pallavitena |
kimasya phalamiti praśnaprasaṅgepi bahistadgocaravyava
hārapravṛttirāntaramapi tena jñānanirūpaṇam | kuto'
yamīdṛgityanuyogepi sāmagrīśaktirevottaraṃ kāryakāraṇa
vat | anyathā tatrāpyupakārāntarāpekṣāyāmanavasthā,
tadanapekṣāyāṃ (vā) sādhāraṇyaṃ kena vāryam1 | tena tadeva
kriyate, anenāpyetadeva viṣayīkriyata iti viveca
nīyam | viṣayīkriyata iti ko'rthaḥ, kriyata ityapi
ko'rtha iti vicāraṇīyam, kāryotpādanameva karaṇaṃ,
tadīyatayotpattireva viṣayīkaraṇamiti vivecanīyam |
upakārastu yathā'tra vijñānasvarūpātirikto nāsti,
tathā'trāpi kāryasvarūpātirikto nāstīti prati
sandheyamiti |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | kimasyeti | viṣayaviṣayibhāvasambandhasya kiṃ
phalamityarthaḥ | phalamantareṇārthakriyājanakatvarūpaṃ sattvamevāsya na
syāditi bhāvaḥ | bāhirvyavahāra eva phalamantare'pi jñānanirūpaṇa
mityāha | bahiriti | yadyapyupekṣājñāne bahiṣphalaṃ nāsti jñāna-
vāryeta iti 3 puº pāº |
vādhāvirāme cāntaḥ phalaṃ nāsti, tathāpi svaviṣayaviṣayaka
saṃskārotpādanamubhayatrāpi phalamityarthaḥ | īdṛgiti | niyataviṣaya
ityarthaḥ | sāmagrīti | svakāraṇabalānniyataviṣayamevotpannamityarthaḥ |
svaprakāśe'pi sāmagrīśaktereva tvayā niyāmakatvopagamāditi
bhāvaḥ | kāryakāraṇavaditi | yathā kāryyasya tādrūpye kāraṇameva
niyāmakamityarthaḥ | anyatheti | yadi kāraṇena kārye kaści
dupakāraḥ pratiniyamaṃ pratyādhīyata ityabhyupagamyeta tadopakārarūpepi
kāryye syādupakārādhānamityanavasthā syādityarthaḥ | sādhāraṇyaṃ
ekasyaiva sarvakāryakāritvam | pūrvvapakṣyāha | teneti | siddhāntyāha |
anenāpīti | pūrvvapakṣyāha | viṣayīkriyata iti | siddhāntyāha |
kriyata iti | pūrvvapakṣyāha | (viṣaya)kāryeti | siddhāntyāha |
tadīyatayeti | nanu tathāpi viṣayapratiniyamaṃ prati kaścidupa
kāro'bhyupeya evetyāha | upakārastviti | upakārāntare'navasthāyā
uktatvāditi bhāvaḥ | kāraṇasvābhāvyameva pratiniyataviṣayaka
jñānotpattau niyāmakaṃ, jñānasvābhāvyameva tanmātraviṣayatāyāmiti
siddhāntasāraṃ prativandimukhena draṣṭavyam ||
bhagīº ṭīº | kimasyeti | phalaṃ vinā'rthakriyājanakatva
lakṣaṇaṃ sattvaṃ na syādityarthaḥ | bahistadgocarapravṛttiḥ phalam, antastena
viṣayeṇa saha jñānanirūpaṇaṃ phalamityarthaḥ | īdṛk niyataviṣaya
ityarthaḥ | kāryeti | tayā sāmagryā tadeva janyata iti yathetyarthaḥ |
tatrāpi kāryakāraṇabhāvepītyarthaḥ | sādhāraṇyam aniyatakārya-
kāritvamityarthaḥ | teneti pūrvapakṣiṇo vacanam | aneneti siddhā
ntinaḥ | viṣayīti | anenedaṃ viṣayīkṛtamiti dhībalādatiriktaṃ
viṣayatvamaṅgīkāryamityarthaḥ | kriyata iti siddhāntino vacanam |
kāryeti pūrvapakṣiṇaḥ | tadīyatayeti siddhāntinaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | phalam prayojyam | praśnaprasaṅgepīti | kāryā
nanuguṇatvepi sattvāvirodhāditi hṛdyam ||
ataeva kāryakāraṇabhāvo'pyupekṣitavya iti tu maha
tsāhasam, tathā sati hi syādeva na syādevetyādyā
padyeta, tathā ca prakāśatamasoranyatarasya kauṭasthyaprasaṅgaḥ |
sāṃvṛto'stviti cet, viṣayaviṣayibhāvo'pyevamastu,
yadi viṣayakāryayorbalavatī bādheti sāṃvṛtaḥ nocedeva
miti dvayī gatiḥ |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | upakārādhāne'navasthā tadanādhāne ca sādhā
raṇyamityetasmādeva doṣāt kāryakāraṇabhāva eva vayaṃ vipratipadyā
mahe, kiṃ taddṛṣṭāntena viṣayaviṣayibhāvasādhanamityāśaṅkyāha |
ata eveti | sāhasameva darśayati | tathā satīti | syādeveti |
nityaṃ syādityarthaḥ | na syādeveti | alīkaṃ syādityarthaḥ |
kāraṇarāhityasya nityatvālīkatvānyataravyāpyatvādanyatarāpādanam,
yathā devadattasya gṛhāsattvaṃ maraṇānyatrasattvānyataravyāpyatvādanyatarā-
pādakamiti bhāvaḥ | apavyākhyānamanyat | kāryakāraṇabhāvā
bhāvepi vipakṣadaṇḍamuktvā viṣayaviṣayibhāvābhāve vipakṣadaṇḍa
māha | tathā ceti | viṣayaviṣayibhāvābhāvo yadi jñānā
bhāvādhīnastadā tamaḥkauṭasthyaṃ viṣayābhāvādhīnaścettadā prakāśa
kauṭasthyam jagatāmāndhyameva tamaḥ | nanu kāryakāraṇabhāvaṃ nāva
jānīmahe, yena syādeva na syādeveti vā syādapi tu sāmvṛto
stītyāha | sāmvṛta iti | dvayī gatiriti | balavati bādhake
sāmvṛtatvamasati bādhake vāstavatvamityarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | ata eveti | upakārānupakārayorana
vasthāsādhāraṇyadoṣādevetyarthaḥ | tathā satīti |
nanu cāhetukatvenaikena vyāpyena viruddhaṃ vyāpakadvayaṃ kathamāpādyate,
na hyekaṃ mitho virodhidvayavyāpakam |
atrāhuḥ | etatkālīnotpattiko 'bhāvo yadyetatpūrvakālāna
pekṣotpattikaḥ syādetatpūrvakālīnaḥ syāt sakalakālāvṛttīdaṃ
kāryaṃ yadi nirapekṣaṃ syāt kiñcitkālāvṛttitve sati
kiñcitkālavṛtti na syādityāpādanārthaḥ | nanu kāryakāraṇa
bhāvabhāve bādhakasattve'pi viṣayaviṣayibhāvasattvena kiñcidbādhakamiti
brūyāttatrāha | tathā ceti | prakāśo jñānam | tamo bāhyam |
bāhyaṃ yadi jñānatvaprayojakaprayojyaṃ syāt jñānajātīyaṃ syāt, evaṃ
jñānepi bāhyajātīyatvamāpādyam | tadanayorjñānabāhyayormadhye
'nyatarakauṭasthyamekasya sadā sattvaṃ syādityarthaḥ |
yadvā viṣayābhāvādvā viṣayaviṣayibhāvābhāvo viṣayyabhāvādvā |
ādye prakāśasyaiva sattvam, antye viṣayasyaiva sattvamityarthaḥ | nanūbhayā
bhāvāttadabhāva iti śūnyatvameva syāt, jñānaviṣayayorvyavahāraśca
sāmvṛto na vāstava ityāha | sāmvṛta iti ||
raghuº ṭīº | syādevetyevakāreṇa prāgasattvasya na syādevetyeva
kāreṇa kādācitkatvasya vyavacchedaḥ | ādye anāditvaṃ, antye
cālīkatvam | matabhedena cedam | ekadeśotkīrtanena nikhilameva
kusumāñjalāvabhihitaṃ smāritam | sāmānyato'bhihitaṃ bādhakaṃ
prakṛte viśeṣe yojayati | tathā ceti | prakāśasya kāraṇāna
pekṣatve yadyanāditvaṃ tadā'nāderbhāvasyāvināśitvāt prakāśasya
jñānasya kauṭasthyaṃ sārvadikatvaṃ syāt, yadi cālīkatvaṃ, tadā
tamaso jñānābhāvasya kauṭasthyaṃ syāditi kva kṣaṇikavijñānavādaḥ |
yattu kāryakāraṇabhāvābhāve bādhakamuktvā viṣayaviṣayibhāve
tadāha | tathā ceti | tamo bāhyam | kauṭasthyam ekaśeṣaḥ |
viṣayasyābhāvādyadi tadabhāvastadā prakāśasyaiva sattvaṃ, atha viṣayiṇo
'bhāvāt tadā bāhyasyaivetyarthaḥ, atho bhayābhāvastadā śūnyataiveti bhāva
iti | tatpūrvāparagranthasandarbhābodhavijṛmbhitam | sāṃvṛto'stu kārya
kāraṇabhāva ityanuṣajyate | iti dvayīti | yadyubhayatra balavadbādhakaṃ,
tadobhayorapi sāṃvṛtatvam, atha tadabhāvastadā vāstavatvamityarthaḥ ||
tadatra tattvam | na tāvadubhayaniṣṭhaṃ lakṣaṇam, sato
'sato vā sthirasyāpi sphuraṇāt, | na ca jñānanitya
tāyāṃ pāramārthikabāhyaniṣṭham satkāryavādavyāvṛtteḥ
sāṅkhyaprakriyāvidhvaṃsāt | na khalu pūrvvāpara(pūrva)tiro
bhāvāvirbhāvāvantareṇa vicārasyāpyavasaraḥ | nāpyalīka
grāhyatayā kṣaṇikajñānaniṣṭhamiti, tucchasya viśeṣā
bhāvāt, jñānasya ca nirākāratvāt, anyatrāpya
(pra)siddherāropayitumaśakyatvāt |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | siddhaṃ svapakṣaṃ pāriśeṣyeṇa draḍhayati | tada
treti | bauddhamate viṣayaviṣayibhāva nirasyati | na tāvaditi |
ubhayaniṣṭhatāyāṃ viṣayasthairye tatpratibaddhasvabhāvaṃ jñānamapi sthiraṃ
syāditi doṣaḥ | sāṅkhyapakṣe tadanupapattimāha | na jñāneti |
buddhernnityatvāt tatpariṇāmo jñānamapi nityaṃ viṣayāstvāvirbhavanti
tirobhavanti ceti viṣayaniṣṭhaiva viṣayatā, tena na sarvadā viṣaya
prakāśa iti sāṅkhyamata, tacca tadā syādyadi satkāryavādaḥ syāt
sa ca nirākṛta evetyarthaḥ | satkāryavādanirāse yuktimāha | na
khalviti | vicāreṇa hyapūrvaṃ jñānamutpādyaṃ pūrvañca nāśyaṃ anyathā
sa niṣphala eva syādityarthaḥ | yogācāramataṃ nirācaṣṭe |
nāpīti | nīlapītādīnāmalīkatve jñānameva kena viśeṣya
mityarthaḥ | nanu svākāra eva jñānaṃ viśiṣyādityata āha |
jñānasya ceti | nanvāropitena nīladhavalādinā jñānaṃ viśi
ṣyatāṃ raktaḥ sphaṭika itivadityata āha | anyatrāpīti ||
bhagīº ṭīº | pūrvvoktakalpeṣvanyatra bādhakāt svapakṣaṃ draḍhayati |
na tāvaditi | jñānaṃ viṣayaścetyubhayam | viṣayasya kṣaṇikatve jñāna
viṣayau mithaḥ sambaddhāvevotpannāvityubhayaviṣayakatvalakṣaṇasattvepi
sato'sato vā sthirasya viṣayatvāttatkālotpannaṃ jñānameva viṣaṣa
sambaddharūpamutpadyata iti tanniṣṭhameva tallakṣaṇamityāha | sata iti |
yadi jñānaṃ nityaṃ syāttadā viṣaya eva tatsambaddharūpa āvirbhavatīti
sāṅkhyarāddhāntaḥ syāt, na caivam, tatparibhāṣānirāsādityāha |
na ceti | pūrvāparetyatra tirobhāvāvirbhāvābhyāṃ yathāsaṅkhyamanvayaḥ |
nāpīti | nirākāratvādbuddhīnāṃ viṣayakṛta eva viśeṣaḥ, alīke
ca viśeṣo nāstītyalīkaviṣayajñānayoraviśeṣaprasaṅga ityarthaḥ |
jñānasyeti | sākāravijñānapakṣe ākāropi viśeṣakaḥ syānnirā
kārapakṣe tu sopi nāstītyarthaḥ | na cānyatrākāraḥ siddho yenā
līke tadāropaḥ syādityāha | anyatrāpīti | pramitasyaivāropā
dityarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | jñānajñeyayorviṣayitvaviṣayatve jñeyajñānayośca
tannirūpakatve iti jñeye viṣayatvaṃ jñāne ca tannirūpakatāmātram,
tatrāpi jñeyaṃ pāramārthikamalīkaṃ ca jñānaṃ nityamanityaṃ ceti
matāni pāramārthikagrāhyanirūpitamanityajñānaniṣṭhaṃ viṣayitvamiti
kaṇṭharaveṇa chalataśca svamataṃ vyavasthāpayituṃ nirasyati | na tāvaditi |
lakṣaṇaṃ vyavahāraniyāmakaṃ rūpam1 | kṣaṇikayoḥ sahotpannayorjñeya-
satye vartamānasya asato'tītānāgatasya ityadhikaṃ 2 pustake |
jñānayorviṣayitvaviṣayatve sambhavata ityata āha | sthirasyāpīti |
tathā cāvaśyake jñāne viṣayitve jñeye'tiriktaviṣayatve mānābhāva
iti bhāvaḥ | nityajñāne viṣayitvopagame sadā vyavahārāpattyā
tanniyāmakamāvaśyakaṃ kṣaṇike grāhye viṣayatvam, jñānasya tu tanni
rūpakatāmātramiti mataṃ nirasyati | na cetyādinā | jñānasya
nityatve tadutpādavināśayorasambhavena viparītapūrvajñānanivṛtti
yathārthāpūrvajñānotpattyarthako vicāro viphalaḥ syādityarthaḥ | tiro
bhāvāvirbhāvau vināśotpādau | nāpīti | viṣayasya nirviśeṣatayā
viṣayakṛtasya nirākāratayā cākārakṛtasya viśeṣasyāsambhavena nīla
pītādijñānānāṃ viśeṣānubhavānupapatterityarthaḥ | vāstavaviśeṣā
bhāvepyāropaḥ syāttatrāha | anyatreti ||
asanta eva viśeṣakāścakāsatīti cenna, asanta iti
hyatatkālā ataddeśā iti vā akiñcidrūpā iti
vā niyatavyāvṛttimātrarūpā iti vā | prathame kāla
deśāntarayoḥ sattvaprasaṅgaḥ | dvitīye tvaviśeṣatā |
tṛtīye nīlasyālīkasyānīlavyāvṛttirūpatāyāmanī
lānāṃ pāramārthikatvaprasaṅgaḥ, teṣāmalīkatve tadvyāvṛ
ttyātmano nīlasyānalīkatvāpattiḥ | tathāpyalīkatve
'viśeṣatvam ||
śaṅkaº ṭīº | nanvatītānāgatānāmasatāmeva yathā jñānaviśeṣa
katvaṃ tathā nīladhavalādīnāmasatāmeva viśeṣakatvaṃ syādata āha |
asanta iti | prathama iti | mama tvatītānāgatādīnāṃ kālāntara
satāmeva viśeṣakatvamiti bhāvaḥ | dvitīya iti | tucchatvānna
viśeṣakatetyarthaḥ | tṛtīya iti | yatpratiyogikā vyāvṛtti
rnnīlādistatparamārthasadityarthaḥ | tadapyalīkamiti yadi, tadā tadvyā
vṛttirūpaṃ nīlādyeva pāramārthikamityāyātamityāha | teṣāmiti |
ubhayamapyalīkamiti yadi, tadā jñānaṃ kenaviśeṣyatāmiti
pūrvapakṣa eva doṣa ityāha | tathāpīti ||
bhagīº ṭīº | asatkhyātipakṣamāśrityāha | asanta eveti |
prathama iti | viśeṣaniṣedhasya śeṣābhyanujñāphalakatvādityarthaḥ |
aviśeṣaḥ alīkasya jñānāviśeṣakatvādityarthaḥ | anīlaṃ yadya
nalīkaṃ, tatrāha | nīlasyeti | atha tadalīkaṃ tatrāha | teṣā
miti | tathāpīti | virodhamanādṛtya nīlasyālīkatva ityarthaḥ |
raghuº ṭīº | asatkhyātinayenā''śaṅkate | asanta iti |
tatkālataddeśayorasanta ityarthaḥ | niyateti | kācidvyāvṛttiranīla
mātrāt kāciccāpītamātrādityādirniyamaḥ | kāletyādi | viśeṣa
niṣedhasya śeṣābhyanujñāphalakatvāt, anyathā viśeṣopādānavaiyarthyāt |
anīlavyāvṛtternīlasyālīkatve'nīlānāṃ pāramārthikatvaṃ vyāvṛttiprati
yogināmanīlānāmalīkatve vyāvṛtternīlasyāpāramārthikatvam, vidhi
niṣedhayorekatarāpāramārthikatve'nyatarapāramārthikatvadhrauvyasyollaṅghane ca
dvayorapyalīkatve na viśeṣa ityāha | nīlasyetyādinā ||
tena rūpeṇāviśeṣatvameveti cet, atha viśeṣaḥ kena |
nīlapītādineti cet tat kiṃ tato'dhikam ? analīkaṃ
tarhi syāt | anadhikaṃ cet kutastenāpīti ||
śaṅkaº ṭīº | nanu nīlādīnāmalīkatvena rūpeṇa na jñāna
viśeṣakatvaṃ brūma ityāha | teneti | tarhi yena rūpeṇa jñāna
viśeṣakatvaṃ nīlādīnāṃ tadalīkameva vācyamityāśayena pṛcchati |
atheti | tenāpīti | atra viśeṣa ityanuṣaṅgaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | nanvalīkayoralīkatvena na mitho virodha ityāha |
teneti | taditi | tat nīlādi tato'līkādadhikaṃ bhinna
mityarthaḥ | anadhikamiti | nīlādyalīkādanadhikamabhinnamiti
cet, tato na viśeṣakatvaṃ tasyetyarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | yathā bhavatāṃ sattvenāviśiṣṭānāmapi nīlapītādīnāṃ
mitho viśeṣastathā'smākamasattvenāviśiṣṭānāmapi syādityāśaṅkate |
tena rūpeṇeti | tat nīlādikam | tataḥ alīkāt | adhikaṃ
bhinnam | anadhikaṃ alīkādabhinnaṃ cet, kutastenāpi viśeṣa iti |
asmākaṃ tu nīlapītādīnāṃ pāramārthikānāṃ nīlatvapītatvādinaiva
viśeṣa iti bhāvaḥ |
vāsanāvaśādviśeṣāḥ sphurantīti cet, sphurantu, kaḥ
kāraṇe vipratipadyate, te tu nīlādayo yadyakiñcidrūpāḥ,
kathaṃ viśeṣāḥ, taditararūpeṇākiñcidrūpatve tena rūpeṇa
kiñcidrūpā eveti brūmaḥ | vicārāsahatāmātramalī
katvamiti cet, tathāpi bhāṣāparivarttanamātram,
vicārāsahatāyāḥ kiñcidrūpatvaviroghitvāt, avirodhe
vā tvadvicārāsahanā api kiñcidrūpā eva nīlādayaḥ
iti vicārasya durvicāratvaprasaṅgaḥ tena nīlādīnāṃ
chāyāmātrasyāpyanākrānteḥ, praviśa vā anirvacanīya
khyātikukṣim, tiṣṭha vā matikarddamamapahāya nyāya
nayānusāreṇa nīlādīnāṃ pāramārthikatve ||
śaṅkaº ṭīº | vāsaneti | vāsanāviśeṣādasantopi sphura
ntyato jñānasya viśeṣakā bhaviṣyantīti bhāvaḥ1 | asatāṃ
viśeṣakatvamanupapannamityāha | sphurantīti | viśeṣakāścennūnaṃ santa
evetyāha | te taditararūpeṇeti | nīlādīnāṃ yadrūpaṃ na bhāsate
tenākiñcitkaratvepi bhāsamānena rūpeṇa jñānaviśeṣakatvāt
kiñcitkarā evetyarthaḥ | nīlādayaḥ sphuranti jñānamapi viśeṣayanti,
paraṃ tu vicāraṃ na sahanta ityetāvatā'līkatvaṃ teṣāmiti śaṅkate |
vicāreti | etāvatā tucchatvameva paryavasyatītyāha | tathāpīti |
bhāṣāparivarttastucchatvasyaiva vicārāsahatvenābhidhānam | na hi
kiñcidrūpavadvicārāsahañceti sambhavati, tenaiva rūpeṇa vicārasahatvā
dityarthaḥ | nanu nīlādi vicārāsahamapi syāt kiñcidrūpavadapi
bhavatu, ko virodha ityata āha | avirodheti | yadi tadvicāreṇa
śeṣa iti 2 puº pāº |
nīlādīnāṃ svarūpaṃ na khaṇḍitaṃ tadā tatphalakatvenābhimanyamāno
vicāro durvicāra eva paryavasanna ityarthaḥ | atra hetumāha | teneti |
nīlādīnāṃ svarūpasya vicāreṇākhaṇḍitatvādityarthaḥ | praviśa veti |
asatkhyātyabhimānaṃ hitvā vedāntimatamālambasvetyarthaḥ | tiṣṭha
veti | naiyāyikamatamālambasvetyarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | nanvalīkajñānayorvaiṣayikaviśeṣābhāvepi kāraṇa
kṛta eva viśeṣaḥ syādityāha | vāsaneti | svasvāsādhāraṇaheto
rityarthaḥ | tāvatā'līkajñānānāṃ viṣayakṛto viśeṣo na samarthita
ityāha | sphurantviti | vicāreti | nāsattvamalīkatvam, kiṃ tu
sadasattvābhyāṃ vicārāsahatvam, nīlādīnāṃ tattvamityarthaḥ | vicārā
sahatvamaśeṣavastuvirodhi na vā, ādye vyāghātaḥ, vicārasyāpi
vicārāsahatvāt, nīlādīnāṃ kiñcidrūpavirodhaścetyāha | vicārā
sahatāyā iti | antye, avirodhe veti | vastumātravirodhapravṛttasya
kiñcidrūpasahiṣṇutayā vicārasya durvicāratvaprasaṅga ityarthaḥ |
tadevāha | teneti ||
raghuº ṭīº | tvadabhimataṃ vicārāsahatvaṃ nīlādīnāṃ kiñci
drūpatāṃ viruṇaddhi na vā, ādye'kiñcidrūpāṇāṃ nīlādīnāṃ na
viśeṣa iti kutastatkṛto jñānādīnāṃ viśeṣaḥ | dvitīye tu
nīlādīnāṃ kiñcidrūpatābādhanāya pravṛttasya vicārasya tatrāsāmarthyā
ddurvicāratvaprasaṅga ityāha | tathāpītyādinā ||
tasmāt,
na grāhyabhedamavadhūya dhiyo'sti vṛtti-
stadbādhane balini vedanaye jayaśrīḥ |
no cedanindyamidamīdṛśameva viśvaṃ
tathyaṃ tathāgatamatasya tu ko'vakāśaḥ || 1 ||
śaṅkaº ṭīº | anyataramatapraveśamantareṇa nānyā gatirityupa
saṃharati | tasmāditi | grāhyabhedaṃ grāhyānāṃ nīladhavalādīnāṃ
parasparaṃ bhedaṃ tasyaivājñānasya bhedamavadhūya tiraskṛtya dhiyāṃ vṛtti
rvviṣayaviṣayibhāvaḥ sambandho na siddhyatītyarthaḥ | tadvādhana iti |
grāhyabhedabādhana ityarthaḥ | vedanayo vedāntastasya balavattvamekamevā
dvitīyaṃ brahmetyādiśrutyupaṣṭambhāt | nanu śrutivākyaṃ ghaṭātpaṭo
bhinna ityādipratyakṣabādhitaṃ grāvaplavanaśrutivadanyatātparyakamityāha |
nocediti | anindyaṃ paroktadoṣāspṛṣṭam | īdṛśaṃ yathāpratīyamānaṃ
tathyamabādhitam | tathāgato bauddhaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | na grāhyeti | viṣayabhedaṃ vinā na nīla
pītabuddhyorbhedaḥ, na ca taṃ vinā buddhervṛttirviṣayaviṣayibhāvalakṣaṇaḥ
sambandha ityarthaḥ | tadbādhane bhedāṃśabādhane | vedanaye vedāntanaye |
tathyaṃ pāramārthikaṃ viśvaṃ siddhamato na bauddhamatāvakāśa ityarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | upasaṃharati | tasmāditi | grāhyāṇāṃ
nīladhavalādīnāṃ hi bhedāt pratiniyatatadviṣayakāṇāṃ jñānānāṃ
bhedasiddhiḥ, grāhyabhedabādhane ca jñānabhedasādhakasya pratiniyata
viṣayatvasyābhāvāt kṣaṇikānekavijñānadhārākalpane gauravāt,
ekatve ca lāghavāt balavatyaupaniṣadanaye jayaśrīḥ, ekamevā
dvitīyaṃ brahma satyaṃ vijñānamānandaṃ brahma satyaṃ jñānamanantaṃ brahmetyādayo
hyupaniṣado nityamadvitīyaṃ jñānaṃ pratipādayantīti ||
tatrālīkaṃ vicārāsahamanirvacanīyaṃ vā yamāśritya
jagadudgīyate sa eva vicāraścintyatāṃ ko'sau
kīdṛśaśceti | satarkaṃ pramāṇameva vākyārūḍhamiti
cet, taccedvicārāsahaṃ, kiṃ tena bhautavicārakalpena |
tathāhi, kenacidbhautena rājadvāri dviradamavalokya
vikalpitam, kimayamandhakāro mūlakamatti, āho
svit jalavāho balākān varṣati garjati ca, yadvā
bāndhavo'yaṃ, “rājadvāre śmaśāne ca yastiṣṭhati sa
bāndhava” iti paramācāryavacanāt, athavā yo'yaṃ
bhūmau dṛśyate tasya chāyeti |
dūṣitañca, tatra nādyaḥ, śūrpayugalaprasphoṭanānupa
patteḥ1 | na dvitīyaḥ, tasya stambhacatuṣṭayābhāvāt | na
tṛtīyaḥ, tasya laguḍabhrāmaṇābhāvāt | na caturthaḥ,
nābhāvāt iti 3 puº pāº |
tasya naraśiraḥśatodgiraṇābhāvāt | tato na kiñci
didamiti |
kimetāvatā dviradasvarūpaṃ nivartatām, yadvā vara
metasmādyoyaṃ soyamiti vādī dvitīyo bhautaḥ | tadvi
cārasahamiti cet, evaṃ tarhi svayameva vilīnamalī
kādivādaiḥ, nottarapratīkṣaṇamapi |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | matabhedena vicāraphalaṃ darśayitvā vicārasvarūpaṃ
pṛcchati | kosāviti | vākyārūḍhaṃ pañcāvayavavākyaviṣayaḥ |
kiṃ teneti | vicārasya vicārāsahatve tatphalasyālīkatvādi
siddhermmithyātvamiti siddhaṃ naḥ samīhitamityarthaḥ | bhauto barvvaraḥ |
barvvarāntaravicāramupadarśyopahasati | tathāhīti | hastini
tamastvaṃ dantadvaye ca mūlakatvamāropitam | karṇe śūrpatvaṃ jaṅghā
catuṣṭaye stambhatvaṃ lāṅgūle śuṇḍādaṇḍe vā laguḍatvaṃ purīṣapiṇḍeṣu
naraśirastvamāropyate | atra hastini meghatvaṃ dante balākātvaṃ mūtre
madakṣaraṇe vā varṣaṇatvaṃ vṛṃhite garjitamāropitam | yadveti | atra
hastini bāndhavatvāropaḥ | atha veti | chāyāyāṃ hastitvāropo
hastini cchāyāropaḥ | karṇadvaye śūrpatvaṃ jaṅghācatuṣṭaye stambhatvaṃ
lāṅgūle vā laguḍatvaṃ purīṣapiṇḍeṣu naraśirastvaṃ āropyate |
yoyaṃ soyamitīti | avādhitapratyakṣeṇa yathā viṣayīkriyate
tathetyarthaḥ | taditi | satarkaṃ pramāṇamityarthaḥ | svayameveti |
vicārasyaivānalīkatvāt nirvacanīyatvāccetyarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | nanu grāhyabhedepi viṣayasyālīkatvāt kuta
stathyatvamityata āha | tatreti | alīkamaprāmāṇikaṃ, vicārā
sahamapratiruddhapramāṇāviṣayaḥ, anirvacanīyaṃ sadasattvābhyāṃ nirvaktu
maśakyam | vākyaṃ pañcāvayavarūpaṃ tadārūḍhaṃ tatpratipādyam | yena
pramāṇena vicārāsahatvaṃ tadvicārasahaṃ na vā, ādye, taccediti |
tathā ca tasya vicārāsahatvameveti bhāvaḥ | kimityādi | atra
hastī nīlatvenāndhakāratayā''ropitaḥ, taddantadvayaṃ mūlakatvena, agre sa
eva meghatvena, tadeva balākātvena, madakṣaraṇaṃ varṣatvena, karicchāyopari
dṛṣṭo hastī cchāyātvena, tatkarṇadvayaṃ śūrpayugaladvayam, jaṅghācatuṣṭayaṃ
stambhatvena, hasto laguḍatvena, śakṛtpiṇḍo naraśirastvenāropitaḥ |
dvitīyaṃ śaṅkate | tadvicāreti | tat pramāṇam | evaṃ sati
sarvaṃ vicārāsahamiti na siddhyati, tasyaiva vicārasahatvāditi
pariharati | evaṃ tarhīti ||
raghuº ṭīº | jagato vicārāsahatvādiparīvādamapākartuṃ
pṛcchati | tatretyādi | yaṃ vicāram | ko'sāviti svarūpe
kīdṛśa iti prakāre praśnaḥ | vākyaṃ nyāyādi | jagadalīkatvādi
sādhakaṃ pramāṇaṃ vicārasahaṃ na vā, antye, taccediti | tat satarkaṃ
pramāṇam | ādyaṃ śaṅkate | taditi | nirākaroti | evaṃ
tarhīti | tarkapramāṇavākyānāṃ pāramārthikatve viṣayavaktṛprayojana
vattvādīnāmapi pāramārthikatvamavarjanīyamiti kuto jagato'līka
tvādikamityarthaḥ ||
lokasiddhamiti cet, tarhi tasya parikaraśuddhirapi
tathaiva grāhyā, anyathā lokasyāpi vyatikrame vicā
rasya yādṛcchikavāṅmātratvāpatteḥ | loke cākāṅkṣā
yogyatāsattimattayā pratisaṃhitamaśliṣṭārthaṃ pramāṇā
ntarāpratihataṃ svavacanasvakriyāsvajñānavyāghātādi
doṣarahitaṃ svārthapratikṣepakayukteranākṣepakaṃ vākyamartha
pratipatteraṅgam, yathā parvato'yaṃ vahnimāniti | anaṅga
mitarat, yathā'yaṃ parvato devadatto gaura iti, jala
hrado vahnimāniti, girirdevadattena bhuktamagnimāniti,
śveto ḍittho dhāvatīti, śaśo viṣāṇīti, mātā
vandhyeti, ahaṃ mūka iti, imaṃ na jānāmīti, mama
karṇe praviśya gajo garjati bheṣajamucyatāmiti |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | tat pañcāvayavavākyārūḍhaṃ pramāṇaṃ yathālokasiddhaṃ
grāhyaṃ, na tvetāvataivālīkatvādikṣatirityāha | loketi | pari
karaśuddhiḥ sahakāricakraśuddhiḥ | anyatheti | lokasiddhātikrame
ityarthaḥ | śiṣyabuddhivaiśadyāya parikaramāha | ākāṅkṣeti | smārita
tadākṣiptāvinābhāve sati śvobhavitari tatpādāsaṃsargāvagamaḥ prāga
bhāvaḥ | na ca prāgabhāvasya kāryamātrahetutvena nāsādhāraṇakāraṇateti
vācyam | tadutpādāsaṃsargāvagamarūpapratiyogiviśeṣitasyāsādhāraṇa
tvāt | na ca yogyatāsatyorakāraṇatāpattiḥ, anyatrāpi kārye
kāraṇatāntaravilopāpatteḥ | abhidhānāparyyaksānamākāṅkṣā, aparyava
sānaṃ ca yena vinā yasya na svārthānvayānubhāvakatvaṃ ityādāvapi
aparyavasānādeḥ prāgabhāvarūpatayā doṣasāmyādityādi mayūkhe
vistīrṇam | bādhakapramāviraho yogyatā | avyavadhānena prakṛta
saṃsargapratiyogyupasthitirāsattiḥ | svarūpasatyaścaitāḥ śābdapramā
prayojikāḥ | tena pratisaṃhitamiti | pratipadaṃ saṅghaṭitamiti
vyākhyeyam |
ākāṅkṣā sattayā heturitare ca jñāte ityācāryyāḥ |
sarvā eva jñātā ityapare |
nirākāṅkṣasyodāharaṇaṃ, yathāyaṃ parvata iti | ayogyasyodāharaṇaṃ
jalahrada iti | anāsannasya giririti śliṣṭasya śveta iti |
pramāṇāntarapratihatasya śaśoviṣāṇīti | yadyapyayogyamapyetattathāpi
pramāṇāntarapratīghāto'tra sphuṭatara iti tathoktam | svavacana
pratihatasya māteti | janakastrītvamajanakastrītvañca parasparaviruddha
mityarthaḥ | svakriyāpratihatasyāhamiti | atra vacanalakṣaṇayā
svakriyayaiva mūkatvaṃ svasya pratihatam | ajñānapratihatasyodā
haraṇamiti | jñānaviṣayataivedantā na jānāmītyanena pratihatā |
svārthapratikṣepakayukterākṣepakamudāharati | mama karṇa iti | na hi
karṇe gajapraveśaḥ sambhavati yadvāraṇārthaṃ bheṣajopanyāsaḥ | yadvā gaja
praveśena bādhiryaṃ vākyārthaḥ | bheṣajaśuśrūṣayā ca tatpratikṣepaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | lokasiddhaṃ vyavahāramātrasiddhamityarthaḥ |
parikaraḥ sahakāricakraṃ, tasya śuddhiranābhāsatvam | tathaiva loka
siddhatayaiva | tathā ca sādhanārthamupajīvyaṃ lokasiddhamanyadapīti
tadbādhitaṃ vicārāsahatvasādhanamityarthaḥ | tadāha | loke ceti |
nanvākāṅkṣā śrotari tadutpādyasaṃsargāvagamaprāgabhāvaḥ, sa (ha) ca
svarūpasanneva hetuḥ, tadutpādyasaṃsargāvagame jñāte tatprāgabhāvarūpā
kāṅkṣājñānaṃ, tadutpādyasaṃsargāvagamaścākāṅkṣājñāne satītyanyonyāśrayaḥ |
maivam | na prāgabhāvarūpākāṅkṣā, ayogyānāsannayostadabhāvā
(devā)nvayajñānānutpattau yogyatāsattyorahetutāpatteḥ, prāgabhāvābhāvasya
kāraṇāntarābhāvavyāpyatayā tata eva kāryābhāva ityākāṅkṣāyā
ahetutāpatteḥ, prāgabhāvasya kāryamātrahetutvenākāṅkṣāyāḥ śābdajñānā
sādhāraṇahetutānāpatteḥ, kintvabhidhānāparyavasānamākāṅkṣā, yena
vinā yasya na svārthānvayānubhāvakatvaṃ tasya tadaparyavasānam,
prakṛtipratyayādīnāmanyonyaṃ vinā svārthānvayānanubhāvakatvāt |
yogyatā ca na bādhakamānābhāvaḥ, anyatra yadbādhakaṃ tasyāyogyepi
sattvāt, prakṛtasaṃsarge ca na tadabhāvaḥ, siddhyasiddhivyāghātāt |
nanu prakṛtasaṃsarge'nyatra siddhabādhakasyābhāvaḥ, prakṛtasaṃsargasya prāga
jñānāt | sajātīye darśanaṃ ca na yogyatā, yathākathañcit
padārthatāvacchedakābhyāṃ sājātyavikalpagrāsāt | na cānvayaprayo
jakarūpavattvaṃ sājātyam, anāptokte payasā siñcatītyatrāpyanvaya
bodhāpatteḥ, anvayaprayojakadravadravyatvasya sattvāt | nāpi sama
bhivyāhvatapadārthasasargavyāpyadharmavattvam, vākyārthasyānumeyatāpatteḥ,
kintvekapadārthasaṃsarge'parapadārthaniṣṭhātyantābhāvapratiyogitvapramāviśe
ṣyatvābhāvaḥ | āsattiścāvyavadhānenānvayapratiyogijñānam, tāśca
jñātā vākyārthadhīhetavo na svarūpasatyaḥ, jñāyamānakaraṇajñāno-
payogivyabhicārivailakṣaṇyatvāt, vyāptivacchabdaśaktivacca | na
cāprayojakatvam, ākāṅkṣādyasattve tajjñānādanvayabodhābhāvāpatteḥ,
ayameti putro rājñaḥ puruṣo'pasāryatāmityatra rājā puruṣamā
kāṅkṣati putraṃ veti saṃśaye tadviparyaye cānvayadhīpratibandhāt, yada
bhāvasaṃśayaviparyayau yatra pratibandhakau tatsattvaniścayasya tatra hetutvāt |
yogyatāyāśca saṃśayasādhāraṇaṃ jñānamātrameva hetuḥ, tatsaṃśayepyanvaya
bodhāt, bādhasaṃśayasya pramāyāmapratibandhakatvāt, anyathā pramāṇa
mātrocchedāditi saṅkṣepaḥ |
aśliṣṭārthamiti | yadyapi yatrānekārthaparatayā śliṣṭaṃ vākya
muccāryate tatrānekārthadhīrbhavatyeva, yatra caikatra tātparyābhāvastatra
na śleṣāvakāśaḥ, tathāpi yatrānekārthaparatvasyājñānaṃ tatparo'yaṃ
granthaḥ, etanmūlaka eva sakṛduccarite sakṛdarthapratyāyakatvamiti
bhāvaḥ | pramāṇāntareti | yadyapi yatra saṃsargadhīrmānāntareṇa
bādhyate, tatrāyogyatvameveti yogyatayaiva tadgatārthaḥ, tathāpi
tasyāstatkālīnābhāvapramāvirahatvādasya ca pratītyuttarakāla
vivakṣayābhidhānāt | yogyatāvivaraṇaparamevottaraṃ sarvam | kriyā
padamupāttavacanādītarakriyāparam | eteṣāṃ hetutvaniścayārthameva
tadabhāvādanvayabodhābhāvodāharaṇāni krameṇāha | yathetyādi |
imaṃ na jānāmītyatra imamityākāreṇaiva jñānādvirodhaḥ |
mameti | ahaṃ na śṛṇomi bheṣajamucyatāmiti virodhaḥ |
nivāryāsambhavāttannivārakāsambhavasya svārthasya pratikṣepe vā ||
raghuº ṭīº | tarhīti | tathā copajīvyavirodhāttvadīyo
vicāra evābhāsa iti bhāvaḥ | ākāṅkṣādīnāṃ jñātānāṃ prayo
jakatvapakṣe pratisaṃhitaṃ jñātaṃ, itarathā tu sambaddhamityarthaḥ | aśliṣṭārtha
miti kathābhiprāyeṇa | pramāṇāntareti1 | pramāṇāntarapratihataṃ
yadyapyarthabādhādayogyameva, tathāpi sajātīye'nvayadarśanaṃ yogyatetyabhi
prāyeṇedamityeke |
ayogyatvepi pramāṇāntarapratīghātasyodbhaṭatvātpṛthagupanyāsa
ityanye |
yogyatāvivaraṇamevottaramityapare |
svavacanavyāghātaḥ svavacanayormithoviruddhārthakatvam | svakriyā
vyāghātaḥ svakriyāsādhyenāhaṃ mūka iti vākyenaiva tadarthabādhaḥ | svajñāna
vyāghātaḥ svakriyayā imaṃ na jānāmīti vākyenākṣiptenedamākāra
jñānena tadarthabādhaḥ | svārthasya karṇapraviṣṭagajagarjananivāraṇārthaṃ
bheṣajābhidhānasya pratikṣepikā yuktiratyantāsato nivāryasya nivā
raṇārthaṃ bheṣajābhidhānāyogyatvam |
kecittu na śṛṇomīti garjatyantārthaḥ paryavasitaḥ, tathā ca
svārthasya śravaṇāthakabheṣajābhidhānasya pratikṣepikā yuktiraśrota
ryabhidhānavaiphalyamityāhuḥ ||
tadarthaśca sādhanaṃ dūṣaṇaṃ ca, tatra sādhanaṃ vyāptipakṣa
dharmataupayikarūpapañcakopetaṃ liṅgam, yathā viśiṣṭa
dhūmavattvāditi | liṅgābhāsamitarat, yathā jalāśaya-
pramāṇeti 3 puº pāº |
tvāditi | tatparikaraśca tarkaḥ | sopi vyāptibala
mālambyāniṣṭaprasaṅgarūpaḥ | aniṣṭaṃ ca dvividhaṃ prāmā
ṇikaparityāgo'prāmāṇikaparigrahaśca,1 yathā yadyudakaṃ
pipāsāduḥkhaṃ na śamayet na pīyeta, yadi ca tadeva
paramantarddahet tadāviśiṣṭaṃ māmapi dahet | itarastu
tarkābhāsaḥ | yathā yadi jalaṃ pipāsāduḥkhaṃ nāśa
mayiṣyat rūpavadapi nābhaviṣyat, yathā''kāśam, yadi
ca tadeva paramantaradhakṣyat māmapi surabhimakariṣya
diti | dūṣaṇamapi svapratikṣepakayukteranākṣepakaṃ dūṣyā
sādhakatvāvinābhūtaṃ siddhaṃ ca | yathāgnimattve sādhye
prameyatvamanaikāntikatvādaheturiti | anyathā tu tadā
bhāse, yathā'yaṃ dhūmo nāgnisādhakaḥ sarvathānupalabhya
mānopādhiśaṅkāgrastatvāt prameyatvāt viruddhatvācceti |
itaradapi pramāṇamanumānacchāyayaiva vicārāṅgaṃ, tarka
mananyathāsiddhiṃ ca puraskṛtya pravṛtteḥ, tatastatrāpyeṣaiva
rītiranugantavyeti |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | tadartha iti | vākyārtha ityarthaḥ | rūpapañca
keti | yadyapi kevalānvayikevalavyatirekiṇoścatūrūpamapi liṅgaṃ
tathāpi parasyānabhyupagamāttadarthamupanyāsaḥ | viśiṣṭeti santato
rddhagāmitvādiviśiṣṭopādānam | parvato'gnimāniti pratijñāyā
meva liṅgābhāsamudāharati | yatheti | atra na vyāptirna vā
kābhyupagamaśca iti 3 puº pāº |
pakṣadharmatetyarthaḥ | prāmāṇikaparityāgamaniṣṭamudāharati | na
pīyeteti | toyapānasyeṣṭatvāt | aprāmāṇikaparigrahamudāharati |
yadi toyamanyapuruṣamapyantardahettadā tatpuruṣāviśiṣṭaṃ māmapyanta
rdahet | atra toyadāho na pramāṇasiddhaḥ sa evāpādyate iti |
yathā yadīti | ubhayatrāpi mūlaśaithilyādābhāsatvam | svārtheti |
svavyāghātakatvaśūnyamityarthaḥ | dūṣyasādhakatvāvinābhūtamiti jātyu
ttarāṇāṃ nirākaraṇāya | siddhamiti chalānāṃ nirākaraṇāya |
dūṣyo hetupakṣadṛṣṭāntādistadasādhakatvāvinābhāve sati | tatra
satyapi siddhatvaṃ pakṣadharmatvaṃ nāsti | prameyatvamaheturiti | prameyatvaṃ
prakṛtasādhyāsādhakamityarthaḥ | atra hetumāha | anaikāntikatvā
diti | anaikāntikatvaṃ hi dūṣyāsādhakāvinābhūtaṃ ca prameyatve
siddhañcetyarthaḥ | dūṣaṇābhāseṣu madhye svapratikṣepakayuktyākṣepakamudā
harati | sarvatheti | idaṃ hi dūṣaṇaṃ svātmānamapi vyāhantītyarthaḥ |
dūṣyāsādhakatvāvinābhāvaśūnyasudāharati | prameyatvāditi | na
hi yat prameyaṃ tadvanhyasādhakaṃ dhūmādau vyabhicārāt | asiddha
mudāharati | viruddhatvāditi | na hi vahnisādhakatvenopapatti
viruddhatvamasti | nanu satarkaṃ pramāṇaṃ vākyārūḍhamiti yadvicāra
lakṣaṇaṃ kṛtaṃ tat kathāyāṃ pratyakṣopanyāsasthale śabdopanyāsasthale
cāvyāpakamata āha | itaradapīti | anumānacchāyā anu
mānetikarttavyatā | tāmevāha | tarkamiti | yadvā nanviyamiti
karttavyatā'numānamātrasyoktā, pramāṇāntarantu kathaṃ vyavatiṣṭhatāmityata
āha | itaradapīti ||
bhagīº ṭīº | tadarthaḥ pañcāvayavavākyārthaḥ | tat khalviti |
vākyamityarthaḥ | tatra sādhanadūṣaṇayormadhye | rūpapañcaketi | yadyapi
catūrūpasampannamapi liṅgaṃ, tathāpi bauddhairanvayavyatirekiṇa eva
gamakatvābhyupagamādetaduktam | gamakarūpamātropalakṣaṇaparaṃ vā |
viśiṣṭeti | avicchinnamūlatvādibhirityarthaḥ | prāmāṇikatyāgodā
haraṇaṃ yatheti | aprāmāṇikaparigrahe, yadīti | nanvetasyaiva
sādhanadūṣaṇaprayojakatve pratyakṣaśabdayorupanyāsāvyāptirityāha | itara
dapīti | cchāyāmevāha | tarkamiti | na ca pratyakṣādāveva
tarkasahakāritvam, vyabhicārāditi bhāvaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | tadarthaḥ kathāntargatavākyaviśeṣārthaḥ | tatra
sādhanadūṣaṇayormadhye | vyāptīti | gamakataupayiketyarthaḥ | pañcaketi
paramatānusāreṇa, tenānvayavyatirekiṇa evānumānatvopagamāt |
yathādvayānantaraṃ* parvato vahnimāniti pūraṇīyam | avicchinna
mūlatvādirviśeṣaḥ | jalāśayatve pakṣasattvādīnāṃ trayāṇāṃ vyatirekaḥ |
svapratikṣepaketi | yadyapi tadākṣepake'sādhakatvāvinābhāvopi
nāsti, tathāpi tattvasyodbhaṭatvātpṛthagupanyāsaḥ | nanvīdṛśayoreva
sādhanadūṣaṇayoḥ kathāyāmupanyāse kathaṃ pratyakṣādyupanyāsa ityata
āha | itaradapīti | chāyāmāha | tarkamiti ||
yathāśabdadvayānantaramityarthaḥ |
evaṃ vyavasthite lokavyavahāre sādhanopakrameṇa yadi
vicārayasi, pratijñaiva tāvannāṅgaṃ dhārayati | tathāhi |
na kiñcidasti na kiñcitsatyaṃ na kiñcitkārakaṃ na
kiñcidvicārasahaṃ na kiñcitsālambanaṃ na kiñciddarśanaṃ
na kaścitsiddhānta ityādau svārthapratikṣepastāvadduruddharaḥ1 |
pratijñāpi hi na syānna satyā na kārikā na vicāra
sahā, tadvijñānamapi na sālambanaṃ, tatphalamapi na
darśanaṃ, tadarthopi na siddhānta ityāpadyeta ||
śaṅkaº ṭīº | nanu bhavatvetādṛśo lokavyavahārastathāpi sauga
tādibhiralīkatvaṃ vā śūnyatāyā vicārāsahatvādi vā yat
sādhyate tatra ko doṣa ityata āha | evamiti | na kiñcida
stītyādau kiñcitpadārthaḥ | pratijñāpi cettadāha | pratijñāpi
hīti ||
bhagīº ṭīº | na kiñcidastītyādipratijñāsu hetavo dṛṣṭāntā
ścāgre bhaviṣyantīti vyāghātamevāha | yadi hīti ||
raghuº ṭīº | atha lokavyavahārasiddhaparikaraśuddhereva vicā
rādīhitamasmadīyaṃ setsyatītyata āha | evamiti | na kiñci
dasti jñeyatvāt rajjusarpavat na kiñcitsatyaṃ jñānatvādrajjusarpajñānavat,
na kiñcitkārakamasattvācchaśaviṣāṇavat, na kiñcidvicārasahaṃ
ddurvāra iti 1 puº pāº |
vikalpānupapatteḥ darpaṇamukhavat, sattve bādhyatvasyāsattve vyavahāryatvasya
cāyogāt, na kiñcitsālambanaṃ pratyayatvāt svapnapratyayavat, na
kiñciddarśanaṃ karmānupapatteḥ chedyānupapattau chidāvat, na kaścit
siddhāntaḥ mitho vyāghātāt, mithaḥ śoṣakanirvāpakānalasalilavat |
pratijñāpītyādi | na satyeti | satyatvamabādhyatvam | satyatvaṃ
pramātvamityabhiprāyeṇa tu pratijñājñānaṃ vaktavyam | tadvijñānaṃ
pratijñājñānam | tatphalaṃ pratijñājanyaṃ phalam | darśanaṃ dṛṣṭiḥ ||
iṣyata evedamiti cenna, icchāmātreṇa vyāghātā
nivṛtteḥ | yadi hi na (jñātaṃ)1 kiñcidastītyādi
pratijñārthaḥ pratijñāṃ spṛśet kathamayamarthaḥ pratyetavyaḥ | na
cet kathaṃ sānupapannā | tadanupapannatve ca kathaṃ punaḥ
pratijñārtha upapadyate | tadidamāyātaṃ svaviṣamūrchitā
bhujaṅgī ātmānameva2 daśatīti ||
śaṅkaº ṭīº | kathamayamiti | tatra pratijñāyāṃ asattve bhavat
pratijñārthaḥ kathaṃ pratyetavya ityarthaḥ | atha pratijñāṃ pratijñārthopi na
spṛśati tadā na kiñcidastītyādipratijñārthaḥ kathaṃ siddhyet, prati
jñāyā eva sattvāt, satyatvāt kārakatvādvicārasahatvāt sālambana
tvāt darśanatvāt siddhāntatvāccetyāha | na cediti ||
jñātamiti 1 pustake nāsti |
svātmānamapi iti 1 puº pāº |
bhagīº ṭīº | na kiñcidastītyabhyupagame pratijñā'sti na vā,
antye kathamiti | etadarthapratītau pratijñāyāḥ kāraṇatvādityarthaḥ |
ādye na cediti ||
raghuº ṭīº | vyāghātaṃ vivṛṇoti | yadi hīti | pratijñāṃ
spṛśet svarūpato'rthataśca | arthataḥ sparśe pratijñārthasyāsatyatvāt
tadviparītasya satyatvam, asparśe tu tasyaiva satyatvāt kathaṃ sarvāsatyatvam |
pratijñāyāḥ sādhanānaṅgatve codāharaṇādeḥ sattve bādho'naikāntikatvaṃ
vā, asattve tu na tadarthasiddhiriti | evaṃ yadi sarvaṃ jñānamaprameti
jñānamapramā, tarhi siddhaṃ jñānaprāmāṇyam, atha pramā, na tarhi sarva
jñānāprāmāṇyamityādikamunneyam ||
tattvata iti viśeṣaṇādayamadoṣa iti cet, tadvi
cāro vā syāt lokamaryādātikramo vā | prathamaḥ
pūrvameva nirastaḥ, tasya pratijñārūpatayā kulīrasyeva
svaprasūtayuktyapatyenaiva pratihatatvāt | dvitīye tu
svacchāyātikramavat sa eva vyāghātaḥ | yadi hi loka
maryādātikramo na vicārasvarūpasthitiḥ tatsvarūpa
sthitiścenna tadatikrama1 ityarthaḥ |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | nanu pratijñāyāḥ sattvāsatyatvādikaṃ vyāvahārikaṃ
svīkurma eva tena na kiñcidastītyādipratijñāyāṃ tattvata iti viśeṣaṇaṃ
iti pratiṣedhyasiddhyasiddhibhyāṃ vyāghātāt iti 1 puº pāº |
deyamityāha | tattvata iti | tattvapade prakṛtibhūte tacchabdārthaṃ
pṛcchati | taditi | pūrvameveti | vicārasya sattve na sarvāsattvaṃ tada
sattve'pi na tadadhīnaṃ sarvāsattvaṃ vicārasyaiva durvicāratvādityarthaḥ |
tadevāha | tasyeti | pratijñādyātmakasya vicārasya sarvāsattvasādhakasya
pratijñādisattvenaiva nirastatvāt yathā kulīraḥ svāpatyanāśya ityarthaḥ |
sa eveti | vicārasattvāsattvavikalpaghaṭita evetyarthaḥ | etadeva
sphuṭayati | yadi hīti | vicārasya lokamaryādāyattatayā
tadatikrame durvicāratvaṃ suvicāratve ca na tadatikrama ityarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | tattvata iti | tattvato na kiñcidastīti
pratijñeti na vyāghāta ityarthaḥ | tattvaśabdaprakṛtitacchabdārthaṃ
vikalpayati | taddhīti | tasyeti | vicārasya pratijñādirūpasya
sattvāsattvābhyāṃ vyāghāta ityarthaḥ | sa eveti | vicārasahatvāsahatva
ghaṭita ityarthaḥ | etadeva sphuṭayati | yaditi ||
raghuº ṭīº | vyāvahārikaṃ sattvādikamaṅgīkurmahe na tu
tāttvikamityāśaṅkate | tattvata iti | taditi tadā tattvaparāmarśaḥ |
vyāghātaṃ vivṛṇoti | yadi hīti ||
pratiṣedhyasiddhyasiddhivyāghātaśca | yadi hi pratiṣedhyaṃ
siddhaṃ nātyantāya pratiṣedhaḥ | na cennatarām | loka
vyavahārasiddhamiti cet, siddhameva hi tarhi, na hyanya-
topi kiñcitsiddhyati | nāyamabādhyo vyavahāra iti
cet, na, yadi naikatra, anyatrāpi tathābhāvaprasaṅgāt |
sarvatra bādhyata iti cet, tadapekṣasiddhinā vyavahāre
ṇānapekṣeṇa vā avyavahāreṇaiva veti | yastāvattada
pekṣasiddhiḥ sa kathaṃ tameva bādheta, na hyanuṣṇatvānumāne
noṣṇatvagrāhipratyakṣabādho loke | dvitīyastvasambhavī,
na hi niṣedhakaṃ pramāṇaṃ niṣedhyasiddhinirapekṣaṃ bhavituṃ
kṣamate | tṛtīye tu tadviparītāpattiḥ, vicārabādhyatva
mupakramyāvicāreṇa mudraṇāt1 ||
śaṅkaº ṭīº | pratijñāsu doṣāntaramāha | niṣedhyeti | prathama
pratijñāyāṃ niṣedhyaṃ sattvaṃ dvitīyādiṣu satyatvādi, tat siddhañcet
kathamatyantaniṣedhaḥ | na siddhañcettadā kathaṃ niṣedhaḥ, pramitaprati
yogikasyaiva niṣedhatvāt ityarthaḥ | etadeva sphuṭayati | yadi hīti |
jñānamātramabhipretyāha | loketi | yadi lokavyavahāraḥ pramāṇaṃ
tadāha | siddhamiti | etadevābhipretyāha | nahīti | asat
khyātimabhipretyāha | nāyamiti | anyathākhyātimabhipretyāha |
yaditi | ekatra śuktau rajatatvañcennābādhyaṃ anyatra vaṇigvīthyāṃ
tathābhāvādabādhyatvasambhavādityarthaḥ | apirabhyupagame | atyantā
sattvamabhipretyāha | sarvatreti | tadapekṣeti | yadbādhyatvenābhimataṃ
tat sāpekṣaṃ vā bādhakatvābhimataṃ pramāṇaṃ tadanapekṣaṃ vā apramāṇameva
vā taditi vikalpārthaḥ | vyavahārapadaṃ pramāṇaparam | ādyaṃ dūṣa-
vicārabādhyatvena bṛṃhaṇāt iti 1 puº pāº |
yati | yastāvaditi | na hīti | na hyupajīvakenopajīvyaṃ bādhyate
tatrodāharaṇamāha | na hīti | auṣṇyasiddhimantareṇānauṣṇyasyopa
saṃharttumaśakyatvāt | dvitīyaṃ nirācaṣṭe | dvitīyastviti | prati
yogiprasiddhyarthamavaśyaṃ tadapekṣāyāḥ sattvāt | tadevāha | na hīti |
viparīteti | bādhyatvābhimatasyaiva siddhirevaṃ sati syāt na hyapramā
ṇena kiñcidbādhyate | etadevāha | vicāreti | vicārabādhyaṃ
viśvamityabhidhāyāvicārabādhyatvena paryavasānāt ||
bhagīº ṭīº | lokavyavahāro yadi pramāṇaṃ tatrāha | siddha
meveti | nanu pratiṣedhe pratiṣedhyasya jñānamātraṃ heturna tu prametyāha |
nāyamiti | yadi pratiṣedhyaṃ viśeṣe nāstīti pratiṣedhārthastadā'rthā
ddeśāntare'stītyāyātamityāha | yadīti | apiśabdo'bhyupagame |
nanu cāsatkhyātipakṣamāśritya sarvatra niṣedha iti na tathātvamityāha |
sarvatreti | na hyanuṣṇatveti | yadyapi na kiñcidasti jñeyatvāditya
syopajīvyaṃ vyāptyādijñānaṃ tadanena na bādhyate, tathāpi yadanu
mānāt prāṅ niyamataḥ pratyayāntaramutpadyate tenaiva tasya bādha iti
bhāvaḥ | mudraṇāt paryavasānādityarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | tattvaṃ paramārthaḥ, tathā ca paramārthato na kiñci
dapi sadityādikaṃ pratijñārtha ityata āha | pratiṣedhyeti |
vyāghātaṃ vivṛṇoti | yadi hīti | siddhaṃ pramitam | natarā
miti | niṣedhyapramāyā niṣedhabuddhihetutvāditi bhāvaḥ | niṣedhya
jñānamātraṃ tathetyāśayenā''śaṅkate | loketi | abādhyādeva
lokavyavahārādarthasiddhiranyathā'tiprasaṅgādityāśaṅkate | nāyamiti |
kimayaṃ vyavahāraḥ kvacideva bādhyaḥ sarvatra vā, ādye yadīti |
apirabhyupagame, anyatrā(pya)bhyupagantavya ityarthaḥ | dvitīyaṃ śaṅkate |
sarvatreti | tadapekṣasiddhinā niṣedhyādhīnasiddhinā | vyavahāreṇa
pramāṇena | bādhyata ityanuṣajyate | yastāvaditi | pratiyogi
jñānādhīnapravṛttikaṃ niṣedhakaṃ pramāṇaṃ nopajīvyapratiyogijñāna
bādhakamityarthaḥ | api ca hetorvyāptigraho niṣedhamātreṇa samaṃ
sattvādisambalitaniṣedhena vā | ādye na tataḥ sattvādiniṣedhaḥ |
dvitīye tūpajīvyavirodhaḥ | evaṃ niṣedhakamapi pramāṇaṃ niṣedha
mātramavagāhate sattvādisamvalitaniṣedhaṃ vā | ādye na sattvādi
niṣedho mānābhāvāt | dvitīye sattvādernātyantiko niṣedhaḥ
pramāṇasiddhatvāt | viparītāpattiṃ vivṛṇoti | vicāreti |
mudraṇāt vicārabādhyatvasyāvaraṇāt | paryavasānādityartha ityanye ||
na caitadapi nirvyūḍham | sa hyayatnasiddhamadhyakṣaṃ vā
syāt aniṣṭimātraṃ vā | ādye virodho'siddhiśca |
dvitīye lokātikramaḥ, parāniṣṭyā tvadaniṣṭibādha
prasaṅgaśceti ||
śaṅkaº ṭīº | na caitaditi | svavyavahārabādhyatvamapi na
siddhamastītyarthaḥ | kiñca vyavahāro'pi na tāvat vyavasthita ityāha |
sa hīti | viśeṣādarśanasādhāraṇamadhyakṣameva nāvyavahāraḥ tathā mati
pratyakṣaprāmāṇyā'bhyupagamavirodha ityāha | ādya iti | asiddhirna
prativicārabādhyaṃ jagaditi pratyakṣasyāsiddherityarthaḥ | loketi | na
hyaniṣṭimātreṇa kiñcidbādhyata iti spaṣṭamityarthaḥ | doṣāntaramāha |
pareti | mayānviṣyamāṇāyāstvadaniṣṭernāpabādhyatvaṃ syādityarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | etadapi vicārabādhyamānatvamapītyarthaḥ | avi
cāreṇa sattvameva kuto na syāditi bhāvaḥ | so'vicāraḥ |
virodhaḥ tathā sati pratyakṣaprāmāṇyāṅgīkārādityarthaḥ | asiddhiḥ
sarvathā vicārabādhyo'yamartha iti pratyakṣābhāvādityarthaḥ | pareti |
tvadaniṣṭirapi pareṇa neṣṭavyeti sāpi bādhyetetyarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | etat 1vicārabādhyatvam | saḥ avicāraḥ |
virodhaḥ adhyakṣasyaiva sattvābhyupagamāt | asiddhirapi adhyakṣeṇa
sattvāderevāvagāhanāt | tvadaniṣṭīti pakṣasyāpi saṅgrāhakam ||
etena hetavo nirastāḥ | te hi jñeyatvāt jñānatvāt
asattvāt vikalpānupapatteḥ pratyayatvāt karmānupapatteḥ
mitho vyāghātādityādayaḥ | ete hi sarva eva svārtha
kriyāpratikṣepikāṃ yuktimākṣipanti, niṣedhyasiddhi
ñcāpekṣante | anaikāntikau ca prathamadvitīyau svaphala
eva vyabhicārāt, asiddhau tṛtīyacaturthau, anaikānti
kaśca pañcamaḥ pūrvavat, asiddhau vyāghātenānaikāntikaśca
ṣaṣṭhaḥ, asiddho'naikāntikaśca saptamaḥ, sarva eva kālā
tyayāpadiṣṭā iti ||
etadavicāreti 2 puº pāº |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | eteneti | vyāghātenaivetyarthaḥ | tadiyaṃ prayoga
pariśuddhirnakiñcidasti jñeyatvāt rajjusarpavat, na kiñcit satyaṃ
jñānatvāt rajjusarpajñānavat, na kiñcit kārakamasattvāt śaśaviṣāṇa
vat, na kiñcit vicārasahaṃ vikalpānupapatteḥ darpaṇamukhavat, na
kiñcit sālamvanaṃ pratyayatvāt svapnapratyayavat, na kiñcid darśanaṃ
karmatvānupapatteḥ cchedyānupapattau cchidāvat, na kaścit siddhāntaḥ
mitho vyāghātāt mithaḥ śoṣakanirvāpakānalasalilavat | sarva
hetūnāṃ sādhāraṇaṃ doṣamāha | svārtheti | hetūnāṃ yo'rthastatprati
kṣepikāmapavādikāṃ yuktimākṣipantītyarthaḥ | tathāhi | jñeyatvamapi
jñeyaṃ na vā, ādye heturapi na syāt, tasyāpi jñeyatvāt | antye
hetutvānupapatteḥ, na hyajñātasya hetutvamupapadyate | jñeyaṃ hi rajjyā
dāvāropitaṃ sarpatvaṃ hyasadityubhayasiddhaṃ | taduktam |
“māyāmātramida viśvaṃ jagat sthāvarajaṅgamam” | iti |
jñānatvāditi | rajjusarpata ityarthaḥ | niṣedhyeti | pratijñāpadeṣu
yanniṣedhyaṃ sattvaṃ satyatvaṃ sālambanatvaṃ kārakatvaṃ darśanatvaṃ siddhāntatvaṃ
vā, tacca yadi na kvacit siddhaṃ tadā tadabhāvopyasiddha
eveti vyāptigrahābhāvāt vyāpyatvāsiddhā eva hetava ityarthaḥ |
viśeṣadoṣamāha | anaikāntikāviti | anumitirasti tajjñeyā
ceti anumitiḥ satyā jñānañceti sādhyābhāvavattvānumitā tvaphala
evetyarthaḥ | na cedetasyā anumiteḥ sattvaṃ satyatvambā tadā siddha
naḥ samīhitamiti bhāvaḥ | asattvāditi tṛtīyo vikalpānupa
patteriti caturthastvasiddhāvityāha | asiddhāviti | bāhyasattvastha
sādhanāt bikalpānāñcopapādanāditi bhāvaḥ | pratyayatvāditi
pañcamasya hetoḥ svaphalaṃ eva vyabhicārādityāha | anaikāntika
iti | karmatvānupapatteriti ṣaṣṭhahetuṃ dūṣayati | asiddha iti |
karmatvasya grāhyatvasyopapādanādasiddhatvaṃ svaphala eva cānaikāntikatvaṃ
tasya tvayā saviṣayatvābhyupagamāt jñānaviṣayasyaiva jñānakarma
tvāt na kiñcid darśanamityākārameva tvaddarśanaṃ tasya ca tadeva
karmeti vyāghātaḥ | mithovyāghātāditi | saptamaṃ hetuṃ dūṣayati |
asiddho'naikāntikaśceti | ekasyaiva siddhāntasya prāmāṇikatvā
danyasya tadvirodhinaḥ pramāṇābhāsamūlakatvāt kva mitho virodhaḥ |
na kaścit siddhānta ityayameva ca siddhānta iti heturayaṃ anai
kānta ityarthaḥ | kālātyayāpadiṣṭā iti | sarvasatyatvādereva
sādhyābhāvasya pramāṇasiddhatvādityarthaḥ | etacca dṛṣṭāntānāṃ dūṣaṇe
vyaktībhaviṣyati ||
bhagīº ṭīº | pratijñāsu krameṇa hetūnāha | te hīti |
vikalpeti | sattvāsattvayorubhayatra doṣādityarthaḥ | karmeti | karma
lakṣaṇānupapatterdṛśyābhāvena darśanābhāvādityarthaḥ | mitha iti |
śabdanityatvānityatvābhyāmityarthaḥ | svaphala eveti | anumānasya
phalamasattvānumitiḥ, tasyā asattve viṣayasya sattvameva syāditi
tasyāḥ sattvaṃ vācyamatastatraivānekānta ityarthaḥ | pūrvavaditi |
svaphala evetyarthaḥ | asiddha iti darśanakarmatopapādanādityarthaḥ |
vyāhata iti | darśanakarmatvānupapattereva darśanakarmatvābhyupagamādi
tyarthaḥ | anaikāntikaśceti | svaphala evetyarthaḥ | asiddha iti |
ekasyaiva prāmāṇikatvābhyupagamena viruddhe tātparyābhāvādityarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | ete hetavaḥ | svārthasya svasādhyārthasya sarvā
sattvādeḥ pratikṣepikāṃ yuktimudgiranti | asato hetutvānupapattyā
hetoreva sattvāt | asatyasyānumitihetutvānupapattyā hetujñāna
syaiva satyatvāt | hetuprayogasya hetujñānaṃ prati tasya cānumitiṃ
prati kāraṇatvāt anyathā prayogavaiyarthyāt | vicārāsahasya hetutyā
nupapattyā hetostajjñānasya ca vicārasahatvāt | hetvādya1nāla
mbanasya pratyayasyānumitihetutvānupapattyā hetvādipratyayānāṃ hetvādyā
lambanatvāt | hetusādhyadṛṣṭereva darśanatvāt anyathā hetvādyasiddheḥ |
hetusādhyāderevābhyupagamyamānatvena siddhāntatvāt | niṣedhyeti |
niṣedhyasya siddhau nātyantikastanniṣedhaḥ asiddhau ca na tadabhāvasya
siddhiḥ na vā'nvayato vyatirekato vā vyāptigraha iti | anai
kāntikāviti | abhāve sādhye pratiyogisāmānādhikaraṇyamevā
naikāntikatvamityarthaḥ | svasya hetoḥ phale'numitau | tasyā asattve
sādhyāsiddhiḥ, asatyatve ca viparītāpattiḥ | tṛtīyasyāsiddhi
raprasiddhiḥ | caturthasya svarūpāsiddhiḥ bāhyasyābādhyatvena satyatvopapatteḥ |
pūrvavat svaphala eva | karma hi viṣayo vā kriyājanyaphalaśāli
vā dhātvarthatāvacchedakaphalaśāli vā | ādye tadanupapattirasiddhā,
jñānamātrasya sadviṣayakatvāt | dvitīye bhāgāsiddhiḥ prāyaśo
jñeyasya jñānajanyopādānādiśālitvāt | tṛtīye tu jñānamātrasyaiva
majñānatvāpattau ajñātasya hetorgamakatve vyāghātaḥ sādhyasyāsiddhi
prasaṅgaśca | atha tayorjñānamupeyate tadā tatraiva vyabhicāra iti |
hetvādyālambanasya iti 2 puº pāº |
mithovyāghātaśca mithobādhyatvaṃ vā mithovirodhitvamātraṃ vā |
ādye asiddhiḥ prāmāṇikasya pakṣasyāprāmāṇikenetareṇābādhanāt |
dvitīye vyabhicāraḥ | matpakṣaviruddhapakṣasya tvatsiddhāntatvāditi ||
etena dṛṣṭāntā api visarjanīyāḥ | te hi rajju
sarpavat tajjñānavat śaśaviṣāṇavat darpaṇamukhavat
svapnapratyayavat cchedyānupapattau cchidāvat mithaḥ śoṣaka
nirvāpakānalasalilavadityādayaḥ | yena ca tatra sarpa
syāsattvaṃ tajjñānasya mithyātvaṃ śaśaviṣāṇasyākārakatvaṃ
darpaṇamukhasya vicārāsahatvaṃ svapnajñānasya nirālambanatvaṃ
cchedyānupapattau cchidānupapattiścāvadhāritāni tenaiva
tatra rajjoḥ sattvaṃ asarpajñānasya satyatvaṃ śaśasyānyatra
gavāderviṣāṇa eva kārakatvaṃ darpaṇasya vicārasahatvaṃ
asvapnajñānasya sālambanatvaṃ cchedyaniṣṭhā cchidā siddhau
jñānaṃ karma copapāditāni | tadanupapattau vā sādhya
vikalatayā sarva evaite dṛṣṭāntābhāsāḥ | antimastu
sādhanavikalaḥ | siddhāntānāṃ vyāghātaḥ paraspara
viraharūpatvalakṣaṇaḥ jalānalayostu vadhyaghātakasvabhā
vatvalakṣaṇaḥ, na ca śabdasāmyenānumānamityeṣā dik |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | tadevāha | te hīti | vyaktamanyat | śaśasyānyatra
lomādau | gavādeḥ svaviṣāṇa eva kārakatvādityarthaḥ | śabda
sāmyeneti | anyathā gotvādīnāmapi viṣāṇitvaṃ syāditi bhāvaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | etena svārthapratikṣepādinetyarthaḥ | tadanupa
pattāviti | yadi rajjvādeḥ sarpāditvaṃ tāttvikaṃ tadā sādhya
vikalā dṛṣṭāntā ityarthaḥ | sādhaneti | pakṣadṛṣṭāntasādhāraṇa
syaikasya mithovyāghātasyābhāvādityarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | mithyātvaṃ pramātvavirahaḥ | svapnajñānasya nirā
lambanatvamityabhyupetya, vastutastasyāpyanyathākhyātirūpatayā sālambana
tvāt sāvalambanasyāprasiddhau sādhyāprasiddhiḥ | tenaiva tattulyena vā |
tatra anyatra vā | rajjoḥ anyasya vetyādi neyam | tadanupa
pattau kvacidapi sattvādyaprasiddhau sādhyavikalatayā sattvādyabhāvarūpa
sādhyavattvenāniścitatayā ||
astu tarhi dūṣaṇopakrameṇa vicāra iti cet, tamapi
paśyāmaḥ kīdṛśo'sāviti | nedaṃ sthūlaṃ viruddhadharmmā
saṃsargaprasaṅgāt, nāsthūlaṃ tathā pratibhāsaprasaṅgāt, na
parānapekṣaṃ sadātanatvaprasaṅgāt, na parāpekṣaṃ sada
sadvyatirekaprasaṅgāt, naikaṃ tathā pratibhāsaprasaṅgāt,
nānekaṃ bhedavyavasthitiprasaṅgāt, na ca vyāpakaṃ
niṣkriyatvaprasaṅgāt, nāvyāpakaṃ avigheyatvaprasaṅgā
dityādiriti cenna | mithovirodhamūlaśaithilyeṣṭāpāda
nānukūlatvaviparyayāparyavasānaistarkābhāsatvāt |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | avayavinirāse sarvapratyakṣavilope tanmūlakasarva
pramāṇavilope svaprakāśajñānātmakaṃ jagat syādatha vā śūnyataiva
syāt taduktam “sarvāgrahaṇamavayavyasiddhe”rityabhiprāyeṇa paro'vayavi
nirāsāya pratijānīte | nedaṃ sthūlamiti | ayameva ca dūṣaṇopakramo
yadasmāt siddhāntavyatirekasthāpanā prāthamikī | tatrāvayavini
vipratipattayaḥ dravyatvaṃ aṇutvavyāpyaṃ na vā paramāṇuḥ svabhinnopādeyo
pādānaṃ na vā mūrttatvaṃ aṇutvavyāpyaṃ na vā evaṃ sparśavattvādi pakṣī
kṛtyohyam idaṃ ghaṭādi yadi sthūlaṃ syādviruddhadharmāsaṃsṛṣṭaṃ syādityarthaḥ |
viruddhadharmasya grahaṇādervakṣyamāṇatvāditi bhāvaḥ | tathā pratibhāseti |
asthūlatvena pratibhāsaprasaṅgādityarthaḥ | parasparavirodhe hi na prakārā
ntarasthitiriti bhāvaḥ | sadātaneti | ahetukaṃ hi sadeva vā yathā
ākāśaṃ asadeva vā yathā śaśaviṣāṇamiti bhāvaḥ | sadasaditi |
na hi ghaṭaḥ kāraṇavyāpārāt prāk sanneva daṇḍādibhirjanyate
nāpyasan asattvāviśeṣeṇa ghaṭakāraṇāt paṭo'pi syādityarthaḥ |
naikamiti | rūpādisamudāyo hi ghaṭo'nubhūyate ekatve tu rūpādi
vinākṛtaṃ ghaṭamātraṃ pratibhāsetetyarthaḥ | bhedeti | bhedavyavasthāyāśca
dūṣyatvāditi bhāvaḥ | avidheyatveti | deśabhedena vidhiniṣedho jñāna
eva pratibandhasiddhiḥ | asattvāditi | sattvasya vyavasthāpayitumaśakya
tvādityarthaḥ | vikalpānupapatteriti | viśvamidaṃ sadasadubhayātmaka
manubhayātmakaṃ vā ādyamapi nityamanityaṃ vā nityamapyekamanekaṃ vā
ekamapi bhāvātmakamabhāvātmakaṃ vā iti vikalpeṣu vinigamaka
pramāṇābhāvādanupapattiḥ | karmatvānupapattiriti | parasamaveta-
kriyāphalabhāgitā hi karmatā, sā ca dṛśikarmaṇi naiyāyikairnābhyupa
gamyate mīmāṃsakaiḥ prākaṭyābhyupagamepi svabhāvaniyamābhāvādupa
kāropi durghaṭa ityādidoṣaduṣṭameva tathā ca dṛśyābhāve darśanābhāva
iti siddham | mithovyāghātāditi | vādināṃ parasparaṃ vyāghātā
bhyupagamāt siddham | eteṣāṃ hetūnāṃ sādhāraṇaṃ doṣamāha | ete
hīti | hetūnāṃ hetvavayavānāṃ yaḥ svātmajñeyatvajñānatvādi, tasyāpi
pratikṣepo'mībhirhetubhiḥ kriyate na vā ityarthaḥ | vidhiniṣedho
bhayaviṣayatvaṃ avyāpakatvaṃ vidheyatvantu vidhimātraviṣayatvaṃ tathā
cobhayaviṣayatve hyekamātraviṣayatvamityarthaḥ | yadvā iha ghaṭosti upa
labhyamānatvādityanena prakāreṇa ghaṭasya vidheyatvaṃ na syāt |
avyāpakatvādvyāptyapratiyogitvāditi chalam | mithovirodhaḥ paraspara
pratikṣepakatvam | mūlaśaithilyaṃ tarkamūlabhūtavyāptivirahaḥ | iṣṭāpādanaṃ
vādisvīkṛtārthāpādanam | anukūlatvaṃ prativādyabhyupagatapramāṇopa
ṣṭambhakatvam | viparyayāparyavasānaṃ vyatirekavyāptyabhāvaḥ | yadyapi mūla
śaithilyanāntarīyakametat | tathāpyanvayavyatireka(rūpa)viṣayabhedena
doṣadvaidhaṃ draṣṭavyam |
bhagīº ṭīº | yadyapyavayavinirākaraṇaṃ na vijñānavādinayānu
kūlaṃ na vātmani bādhakaṃ, tathāpyavayavini niraste tadupajī(vi)(vya)
siddhikapratyakṣābhāvāttanmūlakamānāntarasyāpyabhāve svaprakāśaṃ jñāna
mātramavaśiṣyate śūnyatā vetyavayavini bādhakamāha | nedamiti |
yadyapi parasya sthalāprasiddhau na tanniṣedhaḥ, tathāpi dravyatvamaṇutvavyāpya
na vā paramāṇuḥ svabhinnopādeyopādānaṃ na veti saṃśayaḥ | idaṃ
ghaṭādi yadyavayavi syāt viruddhadharmāsaṃsṛṣṭaṃ syāt, na caivam,
grahaṇāgrahaṇādiviruddhadharmasaṃsargasya vakṣyamāṇatvādityarthaḥ | na ca
sthūlāsthūlābhyāmanyaḥ prakāro'stīti bhāvaḥ | evamagrepi | sadātana
tveti | ahetukākāśavacchaśaśṛṅgavadvā nityaṃ syādityarthaḥ | sada
saditi | ghaṭaḥ sanneva na svakāraṇena janyate siddhatvāt, nāpyasan
asattvāt, paṭavat, anyathā tvasattvāviśeṣādanyadapi janyeteti janyaṃ
sadasadbhinnaṃ syādityarthaḥ | na cāpādyāprasiddhiḥ, idaṃ sadasadātmakaṃ
yadi sāpekṣaṃ syāt asanna syādityarthaḥ | tatheti | ghaṭapaṭādīnā
mekātmatānubhavāpātādityarthaḥ | bhedeti | anekatve bhedavyavasthā
pattiḥ sā cāgre nirasyetyarthaḥ | avidheyatveti | deśabhedena sattvā
sattvavyāpakatvaṃ, tathā caikadā ghaṭādeḥ kvacidvidheyatvaṃ na syāt na
hyekadā vidhiniṣedhātmakatvamekasya sambhavatītyarthaḥ | mithovirodhaḥ
anyonyārthapratikṣepakatvam | mūlaśaithilyaṃ tarkamūlavyāptyabhāvaḥ |
anukūlatvaṃ asmadabhyupagatārthānugrāhakatvam | viparyayāparyavasānaṃ vyati
rekavyāptyabhāvaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | avayavinirāse sarvapratyakṣavilope tanmūlaka
pramāṇāntarāsambhavāt svaprakāśajñānamātramavaśiṣyate, tathā ca sūtraṃ
sarvāgrahaṇamavayavyasiddherityāśayenāvayavinaṃ nirasyati | neda
mityādinā | idaṃ ghaṭādi bāhyaṃ, sāmbṛtī niṣedhyādisiddhiriti
bhāvaḥ | viruddheti | darśayiṣyate ca viruddhadharmasaṃsarga iti bhāvaḥ |
tathā'sthūlatvena1 | sadātanatvamādimattvavirahaḥ | sadasaditi | sato
gaganāderasataśca śaśaviṣāṇādeḥ parāpekṣatvavirahāt |
kāraṇena na sadeva sādhyate sataḥ sādhyatvāyogāt nāpyasat
asattvāviśeṣeṇa paṭādikāraṇāt ghaṭādisiddhiprasaṅgādityanye |
naikaṃ parasparamabhinnam | tathā parasparābhinnatvena | bhedeti |
bhedasya svarūpādyātmano'gre nirasyatvāt | vyāpakatvaṃ sarvatra sattvam |
avyāpakatvaṃ kvacidasattvam | vidheyatvaṃ sattvena pramāpaṇīyatvam | na
cāsatastatsambhavatīti hṛdayam | mithovirodhaḥ parasparārthaprati
kṣepakatvam | mūlaśaithilyaṃ, tarkasya mūlamāpādyāpādakavyāpti
niścayāpādakābhyupagamau tacchaithilyaṃ tadanyataravyatirekaḥ | anu
kūlatvaṃ vādyabhyupagatārthasiddhyanukūlatvam asthūlatvādiṣu tathāprati
bhāsādiprasaṅgānāṃ viparyayaiḥ sādhyānāṃ sthūlatvādīnāṃ vādinā'bhyupa
gatatvāt | yatreṣṭāpādanaṃ tatrāpādyavyatirekasyāpakṣadharmatvāt
viparyayāparyavasānaṃ pratibandhasyāsiddheraniścayāt, kvacidāpādakāna
bhyupagamāccetyapi draṣṭavyam ||
yathā hi nāyaṃ parvato niragniḥ nirdhūmatvaprasaṅgāt
nāpyagnimān tathopalabdhiprasaṅgāt ityanayoreka
ābhāsaḥ, parasparārtha-pratikṣepakayorubhayoranābhāsa
tvānupapatteḥ, tathātrāpi | na hyasthūlatādiniṣedhādanyaḥ
sthūlatādividhiḥ tanniṣedhādvānyo'sthūlatādividhiriti |
tathā'nukūlatvena iti 2 puº pāº |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | mithovirodhamāha | yathā hīti | tatheti |
vahnimattayetyarthaḥ | ekābhāsatāyāṃ hetumāha | tayoriti | anyathā
vastudvairūpyatāpatteriti bhāvaḥ | dṛṣṭānte virodhamuktvā dārṣṭāntike
tamāha | tatheti | virodhamevopapādayati | na hīti ||
śithilamūlāścaite pratibandhasyāsiddheḥ | siddhau vā
vyāpyavyāpakatadadhikaraṇānāṃ siddhau vivādanivṛtteḥ |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | śithileti | parābhyupagamamanurudhya, anyathā na
parānapekṣaṃ na vyāpakamityanayorvyāptisattvāt sarvopagraho mandaḥ
syāt | parābhyupagamameva sphuṭayati | siddhau veti | vivādeti |
vyāptyādisiddhereva śūnyatādyanupapatterityarthaḥ |
bhagīº ṭīº | vivādeti | vyāptyādīnāmeva vastutve sarvā
siddhyabhāvādityarthaḥ |
iṣṭāpādanaṃ ca prathame, anubhūtāvasite sthūle viruddha
dharmāsaṃsargasyeṣṭatvāt | tathā ca vakṣyāmaḥ |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | prathama iti | nedaṃ sthūlamityatra ||
bhagīº ṭīº | anubhūteti | pūrvamanubhṛte nirvikalpakaviṣayī
kṛte paścādavasite savikalpakaviṣaya ityarthaḥ | vakṣyāmaḥ viruddha
dharmāsaṃsargamiti śeṣaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | prathamamanubhūte paścādavasite | anubhavāvasāyau
nirvikalpakasavikalpakau | necchāmātrādbādhanivṛttirata āha |
tathā ceti | viruddhadharmāsaṃsargasādhakaṃ prakāraṃ vakṣyāma ityarthaḥ ||
anukūlaśca dvitīyaḥ | asthūlatāpratikṣepasya sthūla
topalambhānugrāhakatvāt tadrūpatāvyavahārasya tathā
pratibhāsavyāptatvācca | evaṃ tṛtīyopi | anapekṣatva
pratikṣepasya sāpekṣatvopalambhānugrāhakatvāt anapekṣatva
vidheḥ sadātanatvavyāptatvācca | caturthastvaprasiddhavyāpakaḥ,
sadasattvasya virodhenaikatra vidhivanniṣedhasyāpyanupapattaḥ |
pañcamastvanukūla eva | anekatvābhimate vastunyakatā
pratikṣepasyānekatopalambhopaṣṭambhakatvāt | tādrūpyavyava
hārasya tathā pratibhāsavyāptatvācceti | ṣaṣṭhastviṣṭa
evāsmākam |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | sthūlopalambheti | tathā cāsmadanukūlameva
sādhitaṃ syādityarthaḥ | dvitīyasya sattarkatvamāha | tadrūpateti |
tadrūpatāyāstathāpratibhāsavyāptatvāt iti vaktavye vyavahārapadaṃ tadrūpatā
dāḍhyārtham | pratibhāsaḥ kādācitko vivakṣita aiśvaro vā | eva
miti | anukūlaḥ sattarkaścetyarthaḥ | anukūlatvamāha | anapekṣatveti |
sattarkatvamāha | anapekṣatvavidheriti | caturthe āpādyāprasiddhimāha |
caturthastviti | aprasiddhimeva darśayati | sadusattvasyeti | nacavayya
vini ekatvaniṣedho nānukūla ityata āha | anekatvābhimata iti |
sattarkatvamāha | tādrūpyeti | yadanekaṃ tatra kadācittathā pratibhāso
bhavatyevetyarthaḥ | iṣṭa eveti | anekatvābhimataṃ vastu bhedena
vyavatiṣṭhata evetyarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | asthūlateti | sthūle ghaṭādāvasthūlatāpratikṣepasya
sthūlatvānubhavānukūlatvādityarthaḥ | tadrūpateti | yatra vastuto'sthūlatvaṃ
tatra tathā pratibhāso'pyastyeveti prakṛte na kiñcidduṣyatītyarthaḥ |
anapekṣatveti | sāpekṣe ghaṭādāvanapekṣatvapratikṣepo'nukūla evetyarthaḥ |
anapekṣatveti | yatrānapekṣatvaṃ tatra sadātanatvamiṣyata evetyarthaḥ |
aprasiddheti | āpādyāprasiddhyā tarkasyābhāsatvamityarthaḥ | pañcama
stviti | ekatvopalambhābhāvasyānekatopalambhopaṣṭambhakatvādityarthaḥ |
tādrūpyeti | ekatraikatvavyavahāropyastyevetyarthaḥ | ṣaṣṭhastviti | bheda
vyavasthā svīkriyata evetyarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | asthūlatāyāḥ pratikṣepasya karaṇavyutpattyā prati
kṣepakasyāsthūlatve'niṣṭaprasaṅgasya sthūlatvopalambhaḥ sthūlatvasiddhiḥ | eva
magrepi neyam | āpādyapādakayorvyāptiṃ vinā na tarkasya tādṛśānu
kūlatvamiti tāṃ darśayati | tadrūpatāvyavahārasyeti | vyavahriya
māṇāyāstadrūpatāyāḥ | anapekṣatvavidheḥ vidhīyamānasyānapekṣatvasya |
aprasiddhavyāpakaḥ sattvāsattvobhayavyatirekaḥ | sattvaṃ yadi vastutvaṃ na
tarhi tadvyatirekaprasiddhiḥ | atha sattvāśālitvamarthakriyākāritvaṃ
vā, tadvyatirekaścāsattvaṃ, na tarhi kvacidapi tadubhayavyatirekaprasiddhi
riti | sattvasyāsattvasya ca vyāpakasya parānapekṣatvasya vyatireke parā
pekṣatve sattvasyāsattvasya ca vyatirekaprasaṅga evobhayavyatirekaprasaṅga
iti cedatrāha | sadasattvasyetyādi | athaivaṃ vilīna vyāpakānupa
labdhyeti cet, na vilīnaṃ, vyatirekiṇo dharmasya bhāvābhāvobhaya
vyāpakatvāyogāt | tādrūpya vyavahārasya vyavahriyamāṇatādrūpyasya ||
nanu bhedaḥ svarūpaṃ vā syāditaretarābhāvo vā
dharmāntaraṃ vā | na pūrvaḥ, ghaṭo bhinna iti sahaprayogā
nupapatteḥ | nāparaḥ, pratītāvātmāśrayaprasaṅgāt, bhinna
pratiyoginirūpaṇāddhi tadabhāvo nirūpyastanni
rūpaṇameva ca bhedanirūpaṇam | nottaraḥ, anavasthā
prasaṅgāt | tat kathamasau 1vyavatiṣṭhatāmiti cet |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | nanu bheda eva nāsti kathaṃ tadavyavastheti
vedāntyāha | nanviti | sahaprayogānupapatterityupalakṣaṇam | bhedo
ghaṭaviśeṣaṇatvena na bhāseta ityapi draṣṭavyam | na hi svameva svavi
śeṣaṇaṃ bhavati | ātmāśrayeti | bhinnatayā pratiyogijñāne sati
bhedagraha iti tenaiva tannirūpaṇamityarthaḥ | ātmāśrayameva vivṛṇoti |
bhinneti | bhinnatvena pratiyoginirūpaṇādityarthaḥ | anavastheti |
vaidharmyaṃ hi ghaṭapaṭayorghaṭatvaṃ paṭatvañca | tatrāpi vaidharmyāntaraṃ vācya-
bhavatu iṣyatāmiti 2 puº pāº |
mevaṃ tatra tatrāpītyarthaḥ | tat kathamiti | bhidyata iti bhedo
bhidyate aneneti bhedo bhedanaṃ bheda iti prakāratrayasyāpi duṣṭatvā
dityarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | bhidyata iti bhedo bhedanaṃ bhedo bhidyate
'neneti bheda iti vyutpattyā krameṇa svarūpādyabhidhīyata iti
tadvikalpayati | nanviti | saheti | svarūpasya ghaṭapadenoktatvāt
bhinnapadaṃ punaruktamityarthaḥ | ātmāśrayeti | bhinnapratiyogi
jñānanirūpyo'nyonyābhāvo bhedaścānyonyābhāva eveti tenaiva tanni
rūpaṇādityarthaḥ | etadeva spaṣṭayati | bhinneti | anavastheti |
vaidharmyaṃ cedabhinnaṃ kathaṃ tadyogāttadāśrayo bhinnaḥ, atha bhinnaṃ tadā
tatrāpi bhedāntaraṃ syādityanavasthetyarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | dharmmāntaraṃ anuyogitāvacchedakavadvṛttivaidharmyā
ntaraṃ, yadvakṣyati paṭo'yaṃ na ghaṭastantumayaśceti | sahaprayogeti |
svarūpaṃ hi svasyānuyogino rūpaṃ dharmo'nuyogitāvacchedako
ghaṭatvādiḥ svayameva rūpamanuyogyātmakaṃ vā | ādye punaruktatvādantye
ca svasya svānadhikaraṇatvenāyogyatvānmilita prayogānupapattiḥ | ghaṭa
ityādau ca ghaṭatvādikaṃ svarūpeṇa sambandhaśca saṃsargamaryādayā bhāsate
