bhinna ityatra ca ghaṭatvādikaṃ ghaṭatvatvādinā āśrayatvaṃ cāśrayatvatvena
prakārībhūyetyapaunaruktyasamarthanepi ghaṭatvavān bhinna ityādau pauna
ruktyatādavasthyamiti bhāvaṃ varṇayanti | bhinneti | itarabhinnayo-
rekārthatvāt | na ca bhinnanirūpaṇaṃ vinā tadabhāvanirūpaṇamiti |
anavastheti | vaidharmye vaidharmyābhāve tadadvaite dharmidvaitānupapatteriti
bhāvaḥ | asau bhedaḥ ||
tat kiṃ bhedajñānameva nāsti, sadapi vā nityaṃ,
anityamapi1 vā nirhetukaṃ, sahetukamapi vā nirviṣa
yakaṃ, saviṣayakamapi vā bādhyamānaviṣayakamiti | tatra
prathamaḥ sarvato virodhādanuttaraḥ | dvitīyaḥ suṣuptyavasthā
nurodhādupekṣaṇīyaḥ | tṛtīyopi virodhāddheyaḥ | catu
rthastu bhedollekhādeva tyājyaḥ | pañcamastu cintyate,
kimeteṣṭhanyatamātmā tasya viṣayaḥ tadanyo veti | tatra
yadyanya eva, kimetābhirvyadhikaraṇānupapattibhistasya
bādhyeta | evaṃ hi caurāparādhena vyaktamayaṃ māṇḍavya
nigrahaḥ syāt |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | tat kimiti | jñānasya jñeyanirūpyatayā
bhedasiddhiparyavasānādityarthaḥ | sarvata iti2 | bhedajñānaṃ nāstīti
sarvānubhavasiddhajñānāpalāpaḥ pratiyogyaprasiddhiḥ svavacanavirodhaḥ |
na hi bhedamajñātvā tadabhilāpasambhavaḥ | vādiprativādinorbhedena
jñāne satyeva kathāpravṛttiśceti | suṣupteti | jñānābhāvadaśāyā
eva suṣuptitvādityarthaḥ | virodhāditi | ahetukatve'nityatvānupa
patterityarthaḥ | bhedollekhādityupalakṣaṇam | jñānasya saviṣayatva-
anityameva iti 2 puº pāº |
sarvatreti 1 puº pāº |
niyamādityapi draṣṭavyam | anyatamo'sya viṣayo yo bādhyatvenā
bhimata iti śeṣaḥ | yadyanya eveti | tvayā tveteṣāmeva trayāṇāṃ
bādhopanyāsādvaiyadhikaraṇyamityarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | sarvata iti | sarvānubhavasiddhabhedajñānāpalāpaḥ
pratiyogyasattve niṣedhānupapattiḥ svavacanavirodho vādiprativādi
bhedajñānaṃ vinā kathāpravṛttyayogaśceti | virodhāt ahetukatve
kādācitkatvavirodhāt | bhedollekhāditi | ghaṭajñānamityādau
ghaṭādiviṣayatvasyeva bhedajñānamityatrāpi bhedaviṣayatāyāḥ sarvānu
bhavasiddhatvāt kvacidapi saviṣayatvasyāprasiddhau ca tanniṣedhā
nupapattiḥ ||
athānyatamātmā,1 tatrāpi yadi dharmāntarameveti
tattvaṃ, tadā'navasthābhiyā tadadhika eva pravāhastyajyatāṃ
tasya kutastyāgaḥ | na hyanavasthā pratibhāsamānamarthaṃ
nivarttayati, kintu pravāhaṃ parihāpayati, gandhe
gandhāntaravat |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | vaidharmyabhede bādhamuddharati tatrāpīti | svarūpa
bhedenaiva ghaṭatvapaṭatvayorapi bhedavyavahārasiddherityarthaḥ | pratibhāsa
mānamiti | balavatpramāṇaviṣayībhūtasya tyāgādityarthaḥ ||
athānyatamo'sya viṣaya iti 2 puº pāº |
bhagīº ṭīº | tasya tviti | ghaṭatvādeḥ pratyakṣasiddhatvādi
tyarthaḥ | na hīti | anavasthāyāḥ pramāṇābhāvamūlakatvāditi bhāvaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | tadadhika iti | nanūktaṃ vaidharmye vaidharmyābhāve tadadvaite
dharmidvaitānupapattiriti, abhinnasya cobhayavṛtterdharmasyaikatarabhedatve
svasmādapi bhedāpattiḥ | na ca vaidharmyaṃ na bhinnaṃ, nāpyabhinnaṃ,
parasparaviraharūpobhayarūpaparityāgānupapatteriti cenna | vaidharmye
svarūpādereva bhedasyopagamāt | dharmāntarameveti tu ghaṭapaṭabhedā
bhiprāyam |
vaidharmyepi vaidharmyāntaramastyeva, prāmāṇikī cānavasthā na
doṣāya | pravāhastyajyatāmiti tu tantumayatvāderbhedarūpatve bādhakaṃ
nāstītyetāvatparamityapi vadanti ||
athetaretarābhāvameva bhedajñānamavalambata iti tattvaṃ,
tatrāpi kvātmāśrayaḥ, tena hi bhedajñānameva na syāt,
asti ca tat, tato hetvantaramākṣipet, na tu svātmani
svayamahetutve svayameva nivartate | abidyāvaśāditi
cet, kiñcātaḥ | na hyavidyetyevā1tmāśrayanivṛttiḥ,
tathā sati ghaṭādayopi kulālādinirapekṣāḥ svayameva
bhaveyuḥ | athātmāśrayadoṣopahatatayā tanna svasyaiva
kāraṇaṃ, tato yataḥ kutaścit tasya janma, tacca durnirūpa-
na hyavidyetyevamātmā iti 1 puº pāº |
mato'vidyetyucyata iti vicārārthaḥ, nāmni tarhi
vivādaḥ | na ca tadapi durnirūpam, pratiyogirūpatve
nāpratītāvadhikaraṇapratītiradhikaraṇasvabhāvatvenāsmṛtau
pratiyogismṛtiścetaretarābhāvagrahaṇakāraṇamiti nirū
paṇāt |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | svayameveti | svasya svaṃ pratyajanakatayā'nyonyā
bhāvabhedālambanā buddhireva notpadyeta, utpadyate ca, tathā ca
kāraṇāntaramanusartumarhatīti bhāvaḥ | avidyeti | bhedajñānamāvidyakaṃ
na kāraṇāntarāpekṣamityarthaḥ | kiñcāta iti | bhedajñānaṃ cettvayā
'ṅgīkṛtaṃ tadā'vidyā kāraṇatvena tvayopanyasyata ityasmadanukūla
mevācaritamityarthaḥ | yadvā āvidyakamapi bhedajñānaṃ na kāraṇa
nirapekṣaṃ na vā svajanyamiti kāraṇāntaraṃ tatrāvaśyaṃ vācyamityarthaḥ |
tathā satīti | tvanmate ghaṭādīnāmapyavidyāvivarttatvena tvayopanya
syatāṃ svayamevotpattiḥ syādityarthaḥ | svasmādeva tāvadbhedajñānaṃ
notpadyate yata utpadyate tad durnirūpamityavidyetyucyate ityāha |
atheti | nāmnīti | yat kāraṇaṃ mayā'bhipretaṃ tadevāvidyāpadena
tvayocyata ityarthaḥ | ghaṭaḥ paṭo na bhavatītyatra ghaṭāvṛtti paṭatvaṃ
paṭāvṛttighaṭavṛttighaṭatvasvarūpeṇa jñātaṃ sadanyonyābhāvapratīti
kāraṇaṃ, na tu pratiyogivṛttitvenādhikaraṇavṛttitvena yena prati
yogitvādhikaraṇatvagrahagarbho'nyonyābhāvagraha ityātmāśrayaḥ syādityata
āha | na ca tadapīti |
bhagīº ṭīº | avidyāpadenānyonyābhāva evocyate'nyadvā, ādye
kiñceti | antye atheti | nāmnīti | anyonyābhāvanirūpakasyānya
syābhyupagamādityarthaḥ | pratiyogīti | rūpatvaṃ dharmaḥ (svābhāve dharmaḥ)
svabhāvaḥ | tathā ca pratiyogitvānirūpakadharmeṇādhikaraṇajñānamadhi
karaṇatvānirūpakadharmeṇa pratiyogijñānamanyonyābhāvarūpabhedajñāna
heturityarthaḥ | abhinne'pi kvacidbhedagrahastasminnasatyapi bhedāgrahaśca
doṣātsahācceti bhāvaḥ | nanu pratiyogino jñānamātraṃ vivakṣitaṃ
smṛtirvā | nādyaḥ, itaretarābhāvagrahakāraṇamityatra itaretarapada
vaiyarthyāpatteḥ abhāvagrahamātra eva tasya hetutvāt | na ca prameyapada
janyābhāvagrahe na taddhetuḥ, tathā sati tajjanyānyonyābhāvagrahepi
taddhetutānāpatteḥ | na cānyonyābhāvatvena grahasāmagrī, ghaṭātiriktaṃ
prameyamiti śabdajatādṛśajñāne vyabhicārāt | api ca yatkiñci
tpratiyogitvādhikaraṇatvābhyāṃ graho na kāraṇam, atiprasaṅgāt,
tatpratiyogitvādinā tadgrahasya hetutve ātmāśrayāpatteḥ, anyonyā
bhāvatvena pratyakṣe anyonyābhāvagrahe sāmagrīyam | yadvā tadghaṭātyantā
bhāvagrahastadghaṭepi bhavati, na ca tatra pratiyogitāvacchedakarūpabhinna
madhikaraṇarūpamiti saṃsargābhāvagrahamātre vyabhicārānnedaṃ taddhetuḥ,
pratiyogyādisvarūpagrahasyaiva tatprayojakatvādityabhiprāyaḥ | na ca
bhedabhramasthale bhedagrahaprasaṅgaḥ, doṣasyaiva pratibandhakatvāt, yatra ca na
pratibandhako doṣastadanyajijñāsādika vā, tatrānyahetusampattau bhedaḥ
pratīyata eva ||
raghuº ṭīº | avidyāvaśāditi ko'rthaḥ, kimavidyāprabhāvādbheda
jñāna svasmādeva jāyate iti, kiṃ vā avidyārūpātkāraṇāditi |
ādye kiṃ ceti | dvitīyamāśaṅkate | athetyādi | itarayoradhi
karaṇapratiyoginoritaratvena jñānaṃ na heturyenātmāśrayaḥ syādityā
śayenāha | na cetyādi | pratiyogirūpatvaṃ pratiyogitāvacchedaka
rūpavattvam | adhikaraṇasvabhāvatvaṃ adhikaraṇatāvacchedakarūpavattvam |
smṛtidvayaṃ jñānamātraparam | svasminnapi svātyantābhāvagrahaṇādita
retareti | grahaṇaṃ pratyakṣam | bhinnābhyāṃ rūpābhyāṃ pratiyogyadhikara
ṇayorjñānaṃ kāraṇam; pratibandhakastvadhikaraṇatāvacchedakavati prati
yogitāvacchedakādigrahaḥ ||
atha svarūpameva bhedapratibhāsasya viṣaya iti tattvam,
tathāpi sahaprayoga evānupapannastyajyatām, bhedena tu
kimaparāddham | so'pi dṛśyata iti cet, naimittikastu
syāt, na svarūpataḥ | na hi ghaṭamānaya paṭamavaloka
yetyādau bhedapadamapi prekṣāvānupādatte | vyākhyāyāṃ tu
mūḍhaprabodhanāya ghaṭaḥ kumbha itivat sahaprayogepi
na doṣaḥ |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | tathāpīti | svarūpabhedasya bhedajñānaviṣayatvena
tvayā'bhyupagamāt tatra bādhakaṃ dvayorapyāvayornirasanīyamityarthaḥ |
so'pīti | yathā bhedajñānamasti tathā sahaprayogopyasti tathā ca
tadvalād bhadajñānameva nivartatāmityarthaḥ | na hi ghaṭo bheda iti
sahaprayogosti ghaṭo bhinna iti tu bhedasya vaidharmyasyānyonyābhāvasya
vā vaiśiṣṭyaṃ ghaṭe bhāsate, bhavatu vā kathañcit sahaprayogaḥ samūha
pratītyarthaṃ bhavatīti na doṣa ityāha naimittikamiti ||
bhagīº ṭīº | naimittika iti | yo ghaṭa ityukte bhedatvaṃ
tasya ..... nārthamityarthaḥ | tadeva sphorayati | na hīti ||
tathāpi kaḥ paramārthaḥ ? yathāyathaṃ trayamapi | paṭasya
hi ghaṭātmanā'pratītiraghaṭātmanā ca pratītistato
vaiśiṣṭyapratītiścetyanubhavasiddham, tatrābhāvasya, prathama
mātram, abhāvāntaradharmāntarayorabhāvāt, sāmānyā
diṣu triṣu dvayaṃ, dharmāntarābhāvāt | dravyādiṣu triṣu
trayaṃ, trayasyāpi sambhavāt | bhavati paṭo'yaṃ na ghaṭa
stantumayaśceti, gandho'yaṃ na rūpaṃ surabhiśceti, gatiriyaṃ
notkṣepaṇaṃ tiryak ceti | lakṣaṇaṃ ca svarūpabhedasya
tādrūpyeṇāpratītau pratītiḥ, itaretarābhāvasya tvabādhitaḥ
samānādhikaraṇo niṣedhapratyayaḥ, vaidharmyasya tu virodhaḥ,
sa caikadharmyasamāveśa ityeṣā dik |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | suhṛdbhāvena pṛcchati tathāpīti | yathāyatha
miti | yatra yat pramāṇasiddhaṃ tatra sa eva bheda ityarthaḥ |
dravye trayamapi prāmāṇikam | tatra svarūpabhedamāha | paṭasya
hīti | ghaṭādyātmanā'pratītau satyāṃ paṭasya svarūpapratītireva
svarūpabhedalakṣaṇamityarthaḥ | anyathā paṭamānayeti niyukto ghaṭa
mapyānayediti bhāvaḥ | anyonyābhāvamāha | aghaṭeti | ghaṭānyo
nyābhāvavattayetyarthaḥ | yadyapi paṭānyonyābhāvapratītirneyaṃ tathāpi
paṭaniṣṭhaghaṭānyonyābhāvapratītistāvadiyamiti bhāvaḥ | tata iti |
ghaṭaniṣṭhātyantābhāvapratiyogidharmaviśiṣṭapratipattiścetyarthaḥ | yathā
yathamiti yaduktaṃ tadeva sphuṭayati | tatreti | prathamaḥ svarūpabhedaḥ |
abhāvāntareti | tatrābhāvāntarābhyupagame'navasthāpattiriti bhāvaḥ |
dharmāntareti | sāmānyarūpasya vaidharmyasyeti bhāvaḥ | vastutaḥ prati
yogyādighaṭitaṃ vaidharmyaṃ tatrāstīti bhāvaḥ | dvayamiti | anyonyā
bhāvasvarūpabhedāvityarthaḥ | atrāpi vaidharmyasyābhāvābhidhānaṃ jātipara
vaidharmyamityabhipretya, anyathā'nyonyābhāvagrahopi na syāt, etacca
tantumayaśceti vaidharmyabhedābhidhānena svayameva sphuṭīkariṣyati | tiryaktvaṃ
gatau jātiviśeṣaḥ | tādrūpyeṇeti | svānyonyābhāvavattayā'pratītau
svarūpapratītirityarthaḥ | tathā ca pratīyamānaṃ svarūpameva svarūpabheda
iti bhāvaḥ | vastuto bhidyata iti vyutpattyā bhedapadaṃ ghaṭādau
pravartate, bhedavyavahārastu vaidharmyānyonyābhyāmeva, abhāvepi tayo
rdarśitatvāt | samānādhikaraṇa iti | pratiyogisamānakālīna
samānādhikaraṇo niṣedha ityarthaḥ | pratīyata iti pratyayo niṣedha
ścāsau pratyayaśceti niṣedhapratyayaḥ pratīyamāno niṣedha ityarthaḥ |
virodha iti | sahānavasthitau dharmau gotvāśvatve gavāśvayorvaidharmyaṃ
bheda ityarthaḥ | etadeva darśayati | sa ceti |
digiti | nanu ghaṭe paṭatvātyantābhāvādhīna eva tadanyonyā
bhāvavyavahāro'stu kimadhikeneti cenna | idamidaṃ na bhavatīti
dharmisamabhivyāhṛtanañā dharmābhāvāsaṃsparśāt, idamidaṃ na bhavati
nedamiheti pratītibhyāmevābhāvadvayavibhāgāt | tādātmyāvacchinna
pratiyogitākatvasaṃsargāvacchinnapratiyogitākatvayoścānyonyābhāva
saṃsargābhāvayorvailakṣaṇyāditi digityarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | pūrvopadarśitavyutpattitrayamabhisandhāyāha | yathā
yathamiti | na caivaṃ bhedapadasya nānārthatvāpattiḥ, lāghavādbhedanaṃ
bheda iti prakṛtyartha eva bhedapadasya śaktervaidharmyāderlakṣaṇayā'nyalabhya
tvāt | tadeva krameṇa viśadayati | paṭasya hīti | prathameti |
svarūpabheda ityarthaḥ | nanu bhāvādabhāvatvaṃ vaidharmyameva bhedosti, mitho
bhedakaṃ cātyantābhāvatvādikameva, evamanyonyābhāvo na bhavatīti
pratīteḥ, tādṛśabuddheścānyonyābhāvaviṣayakatvāt |
atrāhuḥ | atyantābhāvānyonyābhāvayorbhedavyavahārasya svarūpata
evopapatternābhāvāntaram, tatrānavasthābhayādityevaṃparo granthaḥ |
ananyathāsiddhapratītibalādabhāve'pyabhāvadhīrabhāvanibandhanā, prameyatva
ivātmāśrayatvasyādoṣatvāt, pramāṇasiddhatvāt |
idamevābhipretyābhāvāntara netyuktamanyathā'ntarapadavaiyarthyādityeke |
yadi ghaṭābhāvo ghaṭātyantābhāvavānna syāt na ca bhāvatva
mupādhiḥ sādhanavyāpakatvāditi tarkasahitānanyathāsiddhabuddherabhāve
pyabhāvāntaramastyeva, na cānavasthā, dvitīyābhāvamātrāṅgīkāre
tadabhāvāt, tṛtīyādikamādāya tadabhāvāt, pramāṇābhāvasya
tanmūlatvāt, anyathā''dyepyabhāve bhāvāpattirityanye |
sāmānyādiṣviti | svarūpabhedonyonyābhāvaśceti dvayam |
yadyapi sāmānyādiṣvapi lakṣaṇarūpaṃ vaidharmyamasti, antato nirddharma
katvasyāpi taddharmatvātaddharmatvābhyāṃ vyāghātāt, anyathā'nyonyābhāva
syāpi kathaṃ tatra nirūpaṇam, tasya vaidharmyagrahanirūpyatvāt | na ca
tadāśrayavyaktereva tatra vaidharmyarūpatvam, tathā sati vyāvṛttāvanyonyajñāna
janyānyonyavyāvṛttadhīrityanyonyāśrayānnaikamapi vyāvṛttamavagamyeta |
tathāpi sākṣātsambaddhadharmābhāvamabhipretyāyaṃ granthaḥ, lakṣaṇānāmupādhi
rūpatayā parasparāsambandhāt | paṭo'yamiti svarūpabhedakathanam |
na ghaṭa ityanyonyābhāvasya, tantumayaśceti vaidharmyasya, evaṃ guṇakarmaṇo
rapi krameṇodāharaṇam |
nanu svarūpaṃ na bhedaḥ, abhedasaṃśayaviparyayocchedāpatteḥ, svarūpā
grahe tayoranavakāśāt | na ca bhedagrahepi bhedatvaṃ tatra na gṛhītam,
tacca tadaviṣayadhīviṣayatvaṃ viśiṣyaiva nirvaktavyamiti vācyam |
tasyaiva bhedatvāpatteḥ, tasya vaidharmyarūpatvāt | bhedasya sapratiyogikatve
niḥpratiyogikasvarūpātmakatvāsambhavācca | yadi ca svarūpaṃ ghaṭādikaṃ
bhedastadā tadyogādanyo bhinnaḥ syāt, bhinnatve vā nāsau bhedaḥ |
nāpyanyonyābhāvo bhedaḥ, tadgraho hi pratiyogyadhikaraṇagrahaṇe sati
syāt, tayośca grahaṇaṃ dharmisvarūpeṇaiva pratiyogitvādhikaraṇatvābhyāṃ
vā, ādye rajatamidamiti bhramo na syāt, purovarttirajatasvarūpa
grahe'nyonyābhāvagrahāpatteḥ, antye yatkiñcitpratiyogitvādigrahe'ti-
prasaṅgaḥ, tatpratiyogitvādigrahe cātmāśrayaḥ | nāpi vaidharmyaṃ bhedaḥ,
sa hi na svarūpeṇa, bhramādyanupapatteḥ, nāpi virodhitayā, bhedā
nirūpaṇe tadanirūpaṇāt, vaidharmyasya ghaṭatvādirūpatayā niḥprati
yogikatvācca, vaidharmye'navasthābhiyā vaidharmyāntarāsvīkāre tadabhedā
ttadāśrayayorapyabhedāpatteḥ | yaśca kaścidbhedo vācyaḥ, sa bhinne
dharmiṇi viśate'bhinne vā | ādye tenaiva bhedena bhinne'nyena vā |
prathame svaviśiṣṭe svavṛttāvātmāśrayaḥ | antye'navasthā | abhinne tu
bhedavirodha eveti |
atrāhuḥ | bhidyate vyāvarttyate'bhedabuddhivirodhidhīviṣayī
kriyata iti vyutpattyā bhedapadaṃ vyutpannaṃ, svātmanā ca paṭastathā
kriyata iti tasya bhedatvam | bhedārthopi sapratiyogika eva,
pratiyoginā sahavartamānatvāt | tathābhūta eva tatra pramāṇaprasarāt |
na tu pratiyogighaṭitamūrtiḥ sapratiyogikaḥ, tathā sati prati
yogyabhinnatayā pratiyoginā saheti sahārthasyaivābhāvānniṣprati
yogikatāpatteḥ, paṭasvarūpaṃ ca yadyapītaranirākāṅkṣam, ghaṭo
nirūpyamāṇo yathokta nirūpaṇaviṣayo bhavan bhedo bhavati | prati
yogitvaṃ ca prakṛte grāhyabhedadhīkāraṇībhūtajñānaviśeṣaviṣayatvam |
doṣavaśāttadrūpāparicaye cābhedasaṃśayādiḥ | bhinnatvadhīrapi svarūpa
eva | na hi tatra tadyogaḥ | anyonyābhāvepi bhede noktadoṣaḥ |
tathā hi | adhikaraṇatayā buddhireva nānyonyābhāvadhīkaraṇatayā
yatkiñcidadhikaraṇatayā'nyonyābhāvasyottarakāraṇavedyatvāt, adhi
karaṇatvasyotpattyādyarthamapekṣyamāṇatvarūpatvācca | yadrūpatayā ca yasyā-
nupalabdhistatsvarūpabuddhirevānyonyābhāvadhīheturabhimatā | vaidharmya
bhedepi nānavasthā | yadi hi vaidharmyameva paraṃ bhedastadā vaidharmyadhī
vyavahārārthaṃ tatrāpi vaidharmyāntarāpekṣā syāt, na caivam, tatra
svarūpādereva bhedatvāt |
etena yatkiñciduktam, anavasthāpīṣyata eva, na hi kasyāpi
nirdharmakatvam, nirddharmakatvasyāpi taddharmatvātaddharmatvābhyāṃ vyāghātā
diti, tadapyapāstam | vaidharmyabhedajñānasya svarūpabhedenaivopapatteḥ |
yadā ca jātivaidharmyameva bhedastadā vaidharmyāntarānavagamānna
bhedaḥ, tasya tatpratītimānakatvāt, na hi bhedo nāstītyetāvataivā
bhedaḥ, mā hi bhūdabhedo nāstītyetāvataiva bhedaḥ, tathā ca vaidharmyaṃ
na bhinnaṃ na cābhinnaṃ syāditi virodhaḥ |
yacca bhedaḥ kiṃ bhinne vartate'bhinne vetyuktam, tanna,
anavasthā bhāsaprasañjanasya prasaṅgasamatvāt | bhedopalakṣite vastuni
pramāṇapratītasyaikasyānekasya vā bhedasya vṛttyupagamāt, na tūpa
lakṣaṇasyāpyadhikaraṇakoṭāvantarbhāvaḥ | kiñca kutra vartate bheda
ityatra praśne yatra pramīyata ityevottaram | kva pramīyata ityatra
yatrāstītyeva |
etena kiṃ gavi gotvamutā gavi gotvamityādi pratyuktam |
gotvasya vyaktau viśeṣaṇatvepi svavyāvṛttyā tadupalakṣakatvāt svakriyā
vyāghātaśca | khaṇḍakakhaṇḍanīyavibhāgāparicaye bhavatastadarthaṃ pravṛttya
nupapatteriti saṅkṣepaḥ |
tādrūpyeṇeti | paṭasya ghaṭatvenāpratītau pratītirityarthaḥ | nanu
pratītiḥ pratyetavye na lakṣaṇaṃ tatrāvṛtteḥ, bhidyata iti vyutpattyā
dharmyeva bhedaḥ pūrvamukto'dhunā ca pratītirucyate'to virodhaḥ |
atrāhuḥ | pramāviṣayatvaṃ svarūpabhedaḥ, etaccāvyāvartakamapi bheda
pravṛttinimittam, svānyonyābhāvātyantābhāvavattvaṃ vā | itaretareti |
nanvanena pratiyogisamānādhikaraṇo'bhāvonyonyābhāva ityuktam, tacca
dhvaṃsaprāgabhāvayorativyāpakam | na ca sadātanatvena viśeṣaṇīyam,
tathāpyavyāpyavṛttyatyantābhāvātivyāpteḥ | pratyayaviṣayatvaṃ ca vyartham |
atrāhuḥ | ekasminnavacchede ekasmin kāle pratiyogi
samānādhikaraṇo'bhāvonyonyābhāvaḥ | pratyayapadaṃ tu tatra pramāṇa
sūcanārtham |
yadvā pratiyogyavṛttiḥ sadātano'bhāvo'nyonyābhāvaḥ | na ca
kālānyonyābhāvāvyāptiḥ, tasya pratiyogini kālepi vṛtteḥ,
anyathā sakalakālavṛttitvarūpanityatvamapyasya na syāditi vācyam |
vṛttipadena dharmitvasya vivakṣitatvāt, kāle tvādhāratāmātratvāt,
tasyāśca dharmitvabhinnāyā viśeṣaṇatābhedatvāt | ata eva sakala
lakṣaṇānāṃ kāle'tivyāpakatvamapāstam |
yadvā idamiha nāstīti saṃsargeṇa pratiyogitā'vacchidyate,
idamidaṃ na bhavatīti tādātmyena, tādātmyaṃ ca tadekavṛttirdharmaḥ,
ekavṛttitvaṃ ca svasamānādhikaraṇadharmavirodhidharmāsāmānādhi
karaṇyam | saṃsargastu naikavṛttirddharmaḥ | avacchedakatvaṃ tannirūpakatvam |
tathā caikavṛttimātradharmāvacchinnapratiyogitāko'nyonyābhāvaḥ |
vyāsajyapratiyogikaścānyonyābhāvo nābhyupagamyate | saṃsargāvacchinna-
pratiyogitāko'bhāvaḥ saṃsargābhāvaḥ | na ca gṛhasaṃsargighaṭabhinno
'yaṃ ghaṭa ityatra naikavṛttidharmeṇa pratiyogitā'vacchidyate, kintu
saṃsargeṇeti tatrātivyāptiriti vācyam | tatrāpyekavṛttereva dharmasya
pratiyogitāvacchedakatvāt, kathamanyathā gṛhasaṃsargadaśāyāmapyeta
dghaṭabhinno'yaṃ ghaṭa iti pratītiḥ |
nanu dharmātyantābhāvenaiva dharmiṇo'nyonyābhāvavyavahāropapattiḥ,
saviśeṣaṇeti nyāyena ghaṭo'yaṃ neti dharmasyaiva niṣedhāt | anyathā
pākadaśāyāṃ raktoyaṃ ghaṭo na śyāma iti pratītestatraiva tadanyonyā
bhāvaḥ syāt, dharmābhāvenaivopapattiriti tulyam | na ca dharmyanyonyā
bhāvenaiva dharmātyantābhāvopapattiḥ, evaṃ satyākāśa evāvyāpyavṛttya
tyantābhāvavyavahārānupapatteḥ, ākāśānyonyābhāvasyākāśe'bhāvāt |
atrāhuḥ | ayaṃ ghaṭo neti dharmipratiyogiko'bhāvonubhūyate
na dharmapratiyogikaḥ, bādhakaṃ vinā caitadanādare'tiprasaṅgaḥ |
dharmābhāvagrahepi taddharmāntarātyantābhāvagrahasambhave kvacidapyaviśrānteḥ |
adhikaṃ tu dvitīyādhyāyaprakāśe prapañcitamiti |
vaidharmyasya tviti | vyatirekidharmatvaṃ vaidharmyamātralakṣaṇam |
viśiṣya tu tadanyonyābhāvavyāpyadharmatvaṃ tadvaidharmyamityarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | dharmāntaretyabhyupagamavādena | dharmapadaṃ samavetaparam,
agre ca tantumaya iti samavetadharmāntaropalakṣakamityapi kecit |
nanu svarūpasya bhedatve ida tanna veti saṃśayo nedaṃ taditi
viparyayaśca na syāt, dharmiṇo grahe bhedasyaiva grahāt, agrahe ca tayo-
ranutpādāt, svasya svāvṛttitvādidaṃ bhinnamitipratītyanupapattiśca,
dharmibhedasya dharmasvarūpasya dharmivṛttitayā tatraiva tadbhedapratītyādi
prasaṅgaḥ, niṣpratiyogikasya svarūpasya sapratiyogikatvāyogaśceti |
atra vadanti | svarūpagrahepi tadbhedatvāgrahātsaṃśayādiḥ | tadbhedatvaṃ
ca na tadaviṣayakapratītiviṣayatvam, acākṣuṣatvāpātāt | kintu
vilakṣaṇaḥ pratiyogyanuyogibhāvalakṣaṇaḥ sambandhaḥ | sa ca svarūpa
matirikto vetyanyadetat | tadbhānamapi sambandhavidhayā prakāratayā
vetyapi tathā | sambandhaviśeṣeṇa svasya svavṛttitvaṃ svāśrayāvṛttitvaṃ ca
nānupapannam | svasya svābhāvapratiyogikatvavat svabhinnapratiyogi
katvamapi tathā | etena vaidharmyaṃ vyākhyātam | anyonyābhāvastu bhāva
vadabhāvāntare svasmiṃśca vartate, bhinnatāpratīteraviśeṣāt | anyonyā
bhāvāntarakalpanamanyonyāśrayānavasthācakrakānyatamaṃ cāpekṣyātmāśraya
syaivocitatvāt | etenātyantābhāvo vyākhyātaḥ | abhāvatvānyonyā
bhāvatvasaṃsargābhāvatvādinā cābhāvādbhedaḥ svarūpaṃ vaidharmyamanyonyābhāvo
vā | tattadabhāvabhedastu nādhiko bhedānantyaprasaṅgāt | ghaṭapaṭābhāva
svarūpayormitho bhedatve tayoḥ parasparāśrayatvātsvasmādapi bhedāpattiḥ,
parasparānāśritatve ca ghaṭapaṭābhāvayoḥ paṭaghaṭau na sta iti
pratītyanupapattiḥ | tadubhayasvarūpamapi tayornāstīti cet, tarhi
ghaṭaśūnyasya paṭavataḥ paṭaśūnyatvaṃ paṭaśūnyasya ca ghaṭavato ghaṭaśūnyatvaṃ
syāt, tasmādbhedānantyameva jyāyaḥ | prāmāṇikaṃ tvānantyaṃ na
doṣāya | evaṃ yadi svarūpasambandhena na nirvāhastadā sambandhānantya
mapyastu | na cottarottareṇa pūrvapūrvakāryakaraṇasambhavāt pūrvapūrvavaiyarthyam,
pūrvasya sambandhatāpratītyanyathānupapattyā kalpitena tadutsāraṇāyogā
dityapi vadanti |
atyantābhāvasyātyantābhāvāntarābhyupagamepi nānavasthā | abhā
vābhāvasyaiva svābhāvābhāvatvāt | etena dhvaṃsaprāgabhāvayoḥ prāgabhāva
dhvaṃsau vyākhyātau |
idaṃ tvavadhātavyam | yad anyonyābhāvasambhave svarūpavaidharmyayo
rbhedatvakalpanamanyāyyamiti | bhidyate vyāvṛttatvena pratyāyyate'yamanena
veti vyutpattibhedādeva svarūpavaidharmyayorbhedavyavahāra ityapi vadanti |
kecittu pratiyogitāvacchedakadharmātyantābhāva eva tadanyonyā
bhāvaḥ | vaiparītyameva kiṃ na syāditi cenna, anavabodhāt,
ekasyaivobhayarūpatābhyupagamāt | avṛttigaganāderatyantābhāvasyaivā
vaśyopeyatvācca | athaivamavyāpyavṛttidharmavadanyonyābhāvopyavyāpyavṛttiḥ
syāditi cet na, iṣṭatvāt | astu vā tatsahacaritavyāpyavṛtti
dharmāntarātyantābhāva eva tathā | atha ghaṭavati bhūtale nedaṃ ghaṭa
itivannātra ghaṭa ityāpi syāt, syācca ghaṭatve na ghaṭatvamitivadghaṭatvaṃ
na ghaṭatvamityapīti cet, yathā hi ghaṭābhāvapaṭābhāvarūpayoḥ
parasparapratiyogikameva bhedatvaṃ ghaṭapaṭapratiyogikameva cātyantā
bhāvatvaṃ, anyathā ghaṭapaṭaśūnye tadubhayābhāvaśūnyatāyā ghaṭapaṭayośca
svātyantābhāvavatoḥ svabhedavattāyā durvāratvāt bhedānantyaprasaṅgādvā,
tathā tasyāpi dharmapratiyogikamevātyantābhāvatvaṃ dharmipratiyogika
meva cānyonyābhāvatvamityadoṣāt | bhāvasyevābhāvasyāpi bhedo
viruddhadharmādhyāsādeveti vadanti |
tādrūpyeṇeti | apratītau apramitau | tathā ca tādātmyapramā
viṣayatvābhāva eva lakṣaṇam | pratītistu vyavahāranimittamuktā |
samānādhikaraṇa iti | samānādhikaraṇaḥ samānādhikaraṇasamabhi
vyāhṛtajanyaḥ | sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ ca samānavibhaktikatvam | tathā
cānuyogyupasthāpakapadasamānavibhaktikapratiyogyupasthāpakapadasamabhi
vyāhṛtena nañā janyo niṣedhapratyaya ityarthaḥ | tādṛśanañpratipādyatvaṃ
tu phalitārthaḥ | bhūtalaṃ ghaṭo netyatra padadvayasyāpi prathamāntatvāt |
nanvetadapratipādyamānatādaśāyāmavyāpakam, sakalatadvyaktīnāṃ
tādṛśābhilāpo'sambhavī pramāṇaśūnyaḥ, yogyatāyāścānugatarūpa
nirūpyatvāt | atha pratiyoginaḥ samānādhikaraṇo niṣedhapratyayaḥ
pratīyamāno niṣedhaḥ, tathā ca pratiyogisamānādhikaraṇābhāvatvaṃ
phalitārthaḥ | na ca prāgabhāvapradhvaṃsayoravyāpyavṛttyantābhāve cāti
vyāptiḥ, ekadā ekāvacchedena sāmānādhikaraṇyasya vivakṣitatvā
diti cenna | yatkiñcitpratiyogisāmānādhikaraṇyasyātiprasaktatvāt,
svapratiyogisāmānādhikaraṇyasya cānanugatatvāt, sambandhāntareṇa
pratiyogisamānādhikaraṇe sambandhāntareṇābhāve'tiṣyāpteḥ, avṛtti
gaganādipratiyogikānyonyābhāve cāvyāpteḥ | atha pratiyogya
vṛttisārvadikābhāvatvaṃ tat | na ca kālānyonyābhāvāvyāptiḥ,
kāle dravyabhedadravyatvābhāvayorvṛttāvapi kālo na dravyaṃ kāle na
dravyatvamityapratyayāt tādṛśapratītiniyāmakavṛttervivakṣitatvāditi
cenna, sāmānyaṃ sat satī satteti pratyayānurodhādekārthasamavāyena
svarūpasambandhaviśeṣeṇa ca sattāyāmapi sattāyā vṛttirupeyā, tena
ca sambandhena sattāviraho na sattāvṛttiriti tatrātivyāpteḥ, pūrvokta
doṣācca | athāropya niṣidhyate, saṃyogādinā ca pratiyogyārope
saṃsargābhāvaḥ, tādātmyena ca tasminnanyonyābhāvaḥ pratīyate, tathā
ca tādātmyasambandhāropajanyapratītikābhāvatvamanyonyābhāvatvamiti |
maivam | pratiyogyāropasyābhāvadhīhetutve mānābhāvāt, anāhāryā
ropasya virodhitvādāhāryasya cābhāvapratyayātprāgasambhavāt | athaivaṃ
saṃsargābhāvapratyayakāle'nyonyābhāvopi pratīyeteti cet, satyapi
pratibandhakābhāvādau na pratīyata iti kaḥ prāha | upeyatāṃ
vā''ropaniyāmakameva tatra niyāmakam | astu vā abhāvasya
pratyayaviśeṣahetutvaṃ na tu pratyayamātre, anumityādau vyabhicārāt,
tathā cātīndriyānyonyābhāvāvyāptiriti | athaikasambandhena prati
yogimatyapi sambandhāntareṇābhāvasattvāt sambandhaviśeṣopi prati
yogitāvacchedakobhyupeyate, tathā ca tādātmyāvacchinnapratiyogi
tākābhāvatvaṃ tatheti cet, tādātmyaṃ hi tadvṛttidharmaviśeṣaḥ |
saṃyoginaśca tādātmyaṃ saṃyoga eva, tathā ca saṃyogasambandhena
saṃyogino'tyantābhāve'tivyāptiḥ | saṃyogitādātmyaṃ saṃyogitvam,
na tu saṃyoga iti cenna, śuddhasyāpi saṃyogasya viśeṣaṇatvasambhavena
tādātmyatvāt | dhvaṃsaprāgabhāvānyonyābhāvapratiyogitāyāṃ sambandha
bhedānupraveśe mānābhāvācca | athaivaṃ sambandhāvacchinnapratiyogitākatva
śūnyanityābhāvatvameva tadastviti cenna, vinā'nyonyābhāvaṃ sambandhatvasya
durvacatvāt | abhedena ca viśiṣṭajñāne tādātmyameva sambandho
bhāsate, tacca ghaṭatvādikamevetyanyonyābhāvasyāpi saṃsargāvacchinnaprati-
yogitākatvāt | avacchedakatāyāṃ viśeṣasya durvacatvāt, śūnya
tvasyānirvacanāt, nityatvasyānirukteḥ | prākpradhvaṃsātyantābhāvāprati
yogitvaṃ tat, gandhānādhārasamayānādhārābhāvaḥ prāgabhāvaḥ, tatprati
yogī cābhāvaḥ pradhvaṃsa iti cet, gandhābhāvādhāratvaṃ jalāvacchedena
gotvādivṛtti, gandhādhāratvābhāvavattvaṃ ca sarveṣāmeva samayānām,
gandhādhārabhinnatvaṃ ca bhedaghaṭitaṃ, tādṛśasamayasiddhiśca na vinā
pradhvaṃsādipratyayam | gandhatvaṃ svādhikaraṇānadhikaraṇasamayavṛtti,
kāryamātravṛttijātitvāt, caitratvādivaditi tatsiddhiriti cenna,
pakṣatāvacchedakasya gandhatvasya gandhetarāsamavetatvaghaṭitatvenānyonyā
bhāvaghaṭitatvāt, svattvānanugamāt, kāryatvasya prāgabhāvagarbhatvāt,
jātitvasya nityatvasamavetatvaghaṭitatvāt, samavāyatvasya vinā'nyonyā
bhāvaṃ durvacatvāt | svapratiyogyadhikaraṇayāvatkālavṛttyavadhika
sāmayikaparatvāśrayayāvadvyaktyadhikaraṇakṣaṇavṛttiḥ kādācitko'bhāvaḥ
prāgabhāvaḥ, svapratiyogyavadhikatvaṃ vā paratvasya vaktavyam | aparatvā
nādhārayorapi guṇakarmaṇoḥ paratvāvadhitvapratīterbādhakaṃ vinā
bhrāntitvāyogāt | ata eva khaṇḍapralaye janyadravyāṇāmasattvepi na
kṣatiḥ, sāmayiketi ca jātiviśeṣaparicāyakamiti cenna |
svattvānanugamāt, sāmayikatvasya vinā'nyonyābhāvaṃ durvacatvāt |
kiṃ cotpanne paratve tajjñānātprāgabhāvādijñānaṃ jñāte ca prāga
bhāvādau tadghaṭitabahutaratapanaparispandāntaritajanmakatvasya; kṣaṇamātra
jyāyasopi paratvāt pūrvakālotpannatvasya vā jñānātparatvotpatteritya
nyonyāśrayāt | kṣaṇajanma(āntaritatvasya) dhvaṃsādyanyataraghaṭitatvācca |
etena svapratiyogyadhikaraṇakālāpekṣikādhikaraṇakālavṛtti
yāva(tsamāna)kālīnakādācitkābhāvatvaṃ tattvamiti parāstam |
yathākathañcidadhikakālavṛttitvasya samānakālotpanne tataściraṃjīvi
nyapi sattvāt, itarasya ca vinā dhvaṃsaprāgabhāvau durvacatvāditi |
athātra nityatvaṃ gotvādeḥ pṛthivyā vā vyāpakatvam, idaṃ ca
kālikaṃ grāhyamiti cet, tadvyāpakatvaṃ tatsamānādhikaraṇā
tyantābhāvāpratiyogitvaṃ, sarve cānyonyābhāvāḥ pratiyogitāvacche
dakātmakasyātiriktasya vā samayavṛtteratyantābhāvasya pratiyogina
iti | pratiyogyasāmānādhikaraṇyamatyantābhāve viśeṣaṇamiti cet,
taddhi na pratiyogyadhikaraṇavṛttitvābhāvaḥ, sarveṣāmatyantābhāvānāṃ
pratiyogyadhikaraṇe'ntato mahākāla eva vṛtteḥ | nāpi prati
yogyabhāvādhikaraṇavṛttitvam, vaiyarthyāt | atyantābhāvānirukteśca |
pratiyogyadhikaraṇabhinnavṛttitvaṃ ca bhedagarbham |
atra vadanti | abhāvatvānyonyābhāvatvaprāgabhāvatvapradhvaṃsābhāva
tvādayaḥ pratītiviśeṣasākṣikā akhaṇḍā evopādhayo'tiriktāḥ
padārthāḥ | tadeva cānyonyābhāvatvaṃ tādṛśa-nañ-pratipādyatā
vacchedakamiti ||
saptamo'pyanukūla eva, ghaṭādau vyāpakatāprati
kṣepasyāvyāpakatopalambhopaṣṭambhakatvāt, vyāpakatvasya
niṣkriyatvavyāptatvācca |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | saptamopīti | na vyāpakaṃ niṣkriyatvaprasaṅgā
dityanukūla evetyarthaḥ | nanvayamanukūlastadā syādyadi sattarkaḥ syādataḥ
sattarkatāṃ darśayati | vyāpakatvasyeti ||
aṣṭamastu kvacidiṣṭa eva | yata eva hi kvacida
vidheyo'ta eva kvacidvidheyo'vyāpaka iti vyavahriyate |
sarvatreti cenna | vyāptyasiddheḥ, virodhācca | na hi yada
vyāpakaṃ tat sarvatrāvidheyamiti pratibandhaḥ | kvacida
stītyavyāpakārthaḥ sarvatra nāstīti cāvidheyārthastavābhi
matastadanayorvirodho'pi syāt |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | aṣṭamastviti | avidheyatvaprasaṅgalakṣaṇaḥ |
kvaciditi | svābhāvasthale | na hi yatra ghaṭābhāvastatrāpi ghaṭo
vidhīyate | kvācitkenāvidheyatvena kvācitkaṃ yadvidheyatvaṃ tadevā
vyāpakatvārtha ityarthaḥ | sarvatreti | sarvatraivāvidheyatvamāpādyata
ityarthaḥ | avyāptimāha | na hīti | virodhamāha | kvaciditi ||
bhagīº ṭīº | avyāpakatvena kvacidavidheyatvaṃ yadyāpādyate
tadeṣṭāpattirityāha | yata eveti | nanu cāvyāpakatvena sarvatrā
vidheyatvamāpādyata ityāha | sarvatreti | vyāptyasiddhiṃ spaṣṭayati |
na hīti | virodhaṃ vivṛṇoti | kvaciditi ||
raghuº ṭīº | kvacidavidheyatvaṃ vā''pādyaṃ sarvatrāvidheyatvaṃ vā |
ādya āha | aṣṭamastviti | avidheyatve kvaciditi viśeṣaṇo
pādānabalātkvacidvidheyatvaṃ labhyate | anyathā'vidheyatvamātrasyaiva
vaktumucitatvādityāha | yata evetyādi | dvitīyaṃ śaṅkate |
sarvatreti | nirākaroti | neti | vyāptyasiddhiṃ vivṛṇoti | na
hīti | sarvatrāvidheyatvaṃ yadyaprasiddhaṃ na tarhi vyāptigrahaḥ | atha
kathañcidgaganādāvalīke vā tāvattatprasiddhirupeyeta, tathāpyekatrā
satopyanyatra sattvena vidheyatvopapattyā na vyāptisiddhirityarthaḥ |
virodhaṃ vivṛṇoti | kvaciditi | avyāpakārthaḥ avyāpakatva
niruktibalāyāto'rthaḥ | avyāpakatve kvacidasattvaviśeṣaṇopanyāsā
tkvacitsattvasya lābhāt | avidheyārthaḥ avidheyatvākṣiptorthaḥ |
sarvatrāsattvamasmākamaprasiddhamata uktaṃ tavābhimata iti |
vṛttigarbhaṃ sattvaṃ tadvyatireko gaganādau prasiddha ityapi kecit |
anayoḥ kvacidastitvasarvatranāstitvayoḥ | yadyapi sattvenāpratīya
mānatvasyāpi kvacidastitvena samaṃ virodha eva, tathāpi śābdaṃ
virodhamabhipretya sarvatra nāstitvamupāttam | athavā avyāpakatvaṃ
sarvatrāsattvaṃ kvacidasattvaṃ vā tasmin sati kvacitsattvaṃ vā | ādye
aprasiddhiḥ svarūpāsiddhirvā | dvitīyatṛtīye vyāptyasiddhiviro
dhābhyāṃ nirasyati | netyādi | śeṣamaśeṣaṃ pūrvavat ||
yadvidheyasvabhāvaṃ tat kathaṃ pratiṣedhyamiti cenna |
pratiṣedhasvabhāvatā hi vidheyasya viruddhā, na tu prati-
ṣedhapratiyogitāpi | atha yosti kathaṃ tasya prati
ṣedhopyastīti cet, ko doṣaḥ | anayoravirodhaprasaṅga
iti cet, prakārabhedena prasa(kto)ṅgopi na doṣamāva
hati | tadabhedena tu vidhiniṣedhau kena svīkṛtau yaṃ
pratyavirodhaḥ prasajyeteti | etena kālabhedādinā'pya
virodho draṣṭavyaḥ |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | nanu pratiṣedhyatvaṃ vidheyatvaṃ caikasya viruddha
svābhāvyādanupapannamityāha | yaditi | pratiṣedhyatvavidheyatvayorna
virodho'pi tu pratiṣedhatvavidheyatvayorityāha | pratiṣedhyeti | nanu
vastunaḥ kathamabhāvapratiyogitā syādasti nāstīti pratītyorekatrā
sambhavāditi śaṅkate | atheti | prakārabhedeneti | prasaktopi sanna
prakārabhedena doṣamāvahatīti yojyam | tadabhedeneti | prakārā
bhedena | ekatrāpyadhikaraṇe'vacchedakabhedena saṃyogatadabhāvayoḥ
pratīyamānatvāt, deśabhedena tu bhāvābhāvayorvirodhagandhopi
nāstīti bhāvaḥ | nanvavacchedakabhedaṃ vinā'pyekatra kapāle ghaṭata
tprāgabhāvapradhvaṃsadarśanāt kathaṃ na virodha ityata āha | eteneti ||
bhagīº ṭīº | yadvidheyeti | ekasya vidhipratiṣedhayo
rvirodhādityarthaḥ | pratiṣedheti | vidhipratiṣedhayoraikātmyaṃ neṣyate,
pratiṣedhapratiyogitā tviṣyate, sā cāviruddhetyarthaḥ | atheti |
sato niṣedhapratiyogitvameva viruddham, sattvāsattvayorekatra virodhā-
dityarthaḥ | ka iti | tayorvirodhagrāhaka mānamastītyarthaḥ | prakāra
bhedena deśakālabhedenetyarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | vyāpakayorastitvanāstitvayorvirodhādvyāpyayo
rvidheyatvapratiṣedhyatvayorapi virodha evetyāśayenāśaṅkate | yaditi |
tatrāstitva tatra nāstitvayorvirodho na punarastitva tatra nāstitva
yorityāśayenottarayati | pratiṣedheti | śaṅkitā''śayaṃ prakāśayituṃ
pṛcchati | atheti | āśayaṃ prakāśayati | anayoriti | astitva
nāstitvayorityarthaḥ | prakāreti | prakāro deśaḥ | deśābhedena
virodhepi na deśabhedena virodha ityarthaḥ | athaivaṃ kāryasya samavāyinya
vyāpyavṛtteścaikatra dharmiṇi sattvāsattve na syātāmata āha | eteneti ||
astu tarhi sthūlaghātī virūddhadharmādhyāso grahaṇā
grahaṇādiḥ pañcavidhaḥ | na | asiddheḥ |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | sthūlaghātīti | avayavini bādhaka ityarthaḥ |
pañcavidha iti | grahaṇāgrahaṇāvṛtānāvṛtatvakampākamparaktāraktasaṃyuktā
saṃyuktarūpa ityarthaḥ | vṛttivikalpena saha vā pañcatvam | nāsiddheriti |
samāveśasyāsiddheḥ | yadvā virodhāsiddheḥ samāveśādevetyarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | asiddheriti | yādṛśaṃ viruddhaṃ tatra tannāsti
yacca tatrāsti tanna viruddhamityarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | asiddheriti | yādṛśasya virodho na
tasyādhyāso yādṛśasya cādhyāso na tasya virodha ityarthaḥ ||
tathāhi | yo yena yatraiva yadaivopalabhyate sa tena
tatraiva tadaiva nopalabhyata iti nānubhavaḥ, nāpyabhyupa
gamaḥ | ekāvayavasahitasyopalambhe'nyāvayavasahitasyā
nupalambha iti cet, evaṃ tarhyavayavinyupalabhyamāne
kaścidavayava upalabhyate kaścinneti vākyārthaḥ, saviśeṣaṇe
hi vidhiniṣedhau viśeṣaṇamupasaṅkrāmata iti nyāyāt,
tathā cāvayavānāmupalambhānupalambhāvavayavini sañcārya
prasaṅgastadalamanena |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | grahaṇāgrahaṇe hi tadā viruddhe syātāṃ yadi
kālābhedena puruṣābhedena viṣayābhedena syātāmityarthaḥ | nanveka eva
ghaṭa ekadā ekenaiva puruṣeṇārvāgbhāgāvacchedena gṛhyate parabhāgāva
cchedena na gṛhyata iti kathaṃ na virodha iti śaṅkate | ekāvaya
veti | evamiti | upalambhānupalambhayoravayavini samāveśo
nopapādita ityarthaḥ | sañcāryeti | avayavagatāvupalambhānupalambhāva
vayavini sañcāritāvityarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | tathā ceti | kiñcidavayavānāmagrahepi
avayavino grahāttasya grahaṇāgrahaṇe na sta ityarthaḥ ||
etenāvṛtatvānāvṛtatvaṃ vyākhyātam | anāvaraṇa
daśāvat katipayāvayavāvaraṇepi tathāvidhasthaulyopa
lambhaḥ kiṃ na syāditi tvavaśiṣyate | tadapyasat |
tasya parimāṇagatasāmānyaviśeṣasya tato'nyasya niyata
sāmagrīvedyasya tadabhāve tadupalambhepyanupalambhāt |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | eteneti | avayavini tadubhayasamāveśā
bhāvenetyarthaḥ | atra doṣamāśaṅkya nirākaroti | anāvaraṇeti |
tathāvidheti | dvihastatvatrihastatvādirūpasthaulyopalambhaprasaṅga ityarthaḥ |
tatonyasyeti | avayavinonyasyetyarthaḥ | niyatā sāmagrī bhūyova
yavāvacchedenendriyasannikarṣaḥ | tadupalambhepīti | avayavinaḥ pari
māṇasya copalambhepītyarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | nanu kiñcidavayavāvaraṇe'vayavī yadyāvṛtastadā
parabhāgāvacchedenevārvāgbhāgāvacchedenāpi sa nopalabhyeta, athānā
vṛtastadā parabhāgāvacchedenāpi sa gṛhyetetyanāvaraṇadaśāvattādṛśa
sthaulyopalambha ityapyavayavānāmevāvṛtatvānāvṛtatve avayavī tvanāvṛta
eveti na tatra viruddhadharmādhyāsa ityanena nirasta ityāha | eteneti |
nanvevamanāvaraṇadaśāvaddvihastatvādijātimatparimāṇagrahaṇaprasaṅga ityata
āha | anāvaraṇeti | avayavigrahe tatparimāṇagrahepi tadgata
jātiviśeṣasya tāvadavayavagrahavyaṅgyatayā tadabhāvādevāgraha ityarthaḥ |
nanu kiṃ tāvattvaṃ yāvattvaṃ bahutvaṃ vā | nādyo'sambhavāt, arvāgbhāga
vyavadhāne madhyaparabhāgayoragrahāt | nāntyaḥ, nānāsthāneṣu paramāṇu
mātrāntaritasyāpyavayavinaḥ sthaulyopalambhāpātāt | na | sannikarṣa
viśeṣasya kāryadarśanakalpyatvāt ||
raghuº ṭīº | etena kasyacidavayavasyāvaraṇepyavayavinastada
bhāvena | tathāvidheti | tādṛśajātiviśeṣaviśiṣṭetyarthaḥ | tadupa
lambhepi parimāṇopalambhepi ||
etena kampākampasaṃsargo nirastaḥ | sāmagrī
bhedenāvayavaniyatakampotpāde tasyāṃ daśāyāmavayavino
niścalatvāt | evaṃ tarhi kampākampayoravayavayorvibhā
gāt saṃyoganāśe dravyanāśaḥ syāditi cet | tataḥ
kim | apasiddhānta iti cenna | evamapi kvacidabhyu
pagamāt | sarvatraivaṃ prasaṅga iti cet, tathāpyavayavinaḥ
kimatyāhitam | na caivamapi | karmaṇo dravyārambhaka
saṃyogapratidvandivibhāgajanananiyamānabhyupagamāt |
kāraṇaviśeṣāt kasyacideva karmaṇastathābhūtaviśeṣo
palabdheḥ |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | eteneti | avayavinyekadā jñānasamāveśā
bhāvenetyarthaḥ | sāmagrīti | avayavakampasāmagrīto'vayavikampasāmagryā
bhinnatvena tadubhayo1papatterityarthaḥ | evaṃ tarhīti | katipayāvayava
kampepi katipayāvayavaniścalatāyāmityarthaḥ | apasiddhānta iti |
tasyāṃ daśāyāmavayavināśasya tvayā'nabhyupagamādityarthaṃ evetyarthaḥ |
evamapīti | dravyanāśasyāpītyarthaḥ | sarvatreti | yatrāpi tvayā
nābhyupagamyate tatrāpītyarthaḥ | tathāpīti | etāvatā'pyavayavī siddha
evetyarthaḥ | atyāhitam mahābhayam | na ceti | avayavakarmaṇā
dravyārambhakasaṃyogavirodhivibhāgājananāt | anyathotpalādau pratya
bhijñānaṃ na syāditi bhāvaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | eteneti | sāmānyato'siddhyetyarthaḥ | tadupa
lambhe'pyavayaviparimāṇopalambhepītyarthaḥ | nanvavayaveṣu kampamāneṣva
??

svīkāryaḥ, tathā ca (virodha) ityata āha | sāmagrīti | ava
yavikampasya sakalāvayavakampaniyatatvāt kvacidavayavakampe'pyavayavī
niṣkampa evetyarthaḥ | na ca saṃyogavatkarmāvyāpyavṛtti bhavatviti
vācyam | mānābhāvāt, avayavini yathoktenaivopapatteḥ | avayaveṣu
sakalāvacchedenaiva kampopalambhāt | vibhāgāditi | anyatarakarmajā
dityarthaḥ | saṃyoganāśe dravyārambhakasaṃyoganāśa ityarthaḥ | tata iti |
gryasiddhānta iti tritvena tadubhayo iti 2 puº pāº |

'vayavī naśyati ityabhyupagamyata ityarthaḥ | evamapīti | dravyā
rammakasaṃyogavirodhivibhāgajanakakriyā yatrāvayaveṣūtpadyate tatra
tathā'bhyupagama ityarthaḥ | tathāpīti | arthāntaraṃ nāma nigraha
syānamityarthaḥ | atyāhitaṃ mahābhayam | na ceti | anyathā sarvatra
dravyānāśaprasaṅga ityarthaḥ | na ceṣṭāpattiḥ, avayavinastādrūpyeṇaiva
pratyabhijñānāt | nanu karmatvāviśeṣāt kuto'yaṃ niyama ityata
āha | kāraṇeti | tasya ca kāryadarśanaikamānatvādityarthaḥ |
raghuº ṭīº | etena asiddhatvena | nanvavayave karmotpāde'vaśya
mavayavini karma, anyathā sarvāvayavakampepi niṣkampo'vayavyupalabhyeteti
calāvayavāvacchedenāvayavini karma niścalāvayavāvacchedena niścala
tvopalambhāt karmābhāvopīti nāsiddhamata āha | sāmagrīti |

'vayavinyavayavaparamparāyāṃ kṣudrakṣudratarādyavayavāvacchedena tattatsaṃyogā
bhāvopalambhādaṇumātravṛttitve'tīndriyatvaṃ ghaṭāderapratyakṣatvamanutpattiśca
syāditi tasyāvyāpyavṛttitvamāsthīyate, cale cāvayave karma vyāpaka
mevopalabhyate, avayavini ca tasyāvyāpakatve karmatvasya tadubhaya-
karmaṇyapi iti 2 puº pāº |
vṛttitvānupapattiḥ, saviṣayāvṛttijātervyāpyāvyāpyavṛttivṛttitvaviro
dhāt vepate pallavo na tu mahīruha ityanubhavācceti sampradāyaḥ |
yatraikasminnavayave niścale'pyavayavī calatīti pratīyate tatrā
vyāpyavṛttyeva karma, saviṣayāvṛttītyādeḥ paribhāṣāmātratvāt, etena
rūpādayo vyākhyātā ityapi kecit |
saṃyoganāśe dravyārambhakasaṃyoganāśe | tathāpīti | vināśasya
pratiyoginyabādhakatvāt pratyuta sādhakatvādeveti bhāvaḥ | karmaṇa
ityādi | avayavakampe'pyavayavinaḥ pratyabhijñānāditi bhāvaḥ |
nanu karmatvāviśeṣepi kiñcideva karma dravyārambhakasaṃyogavirodhinaṃ
vibhāgamārabhate netaraditi kuto viśeṣa ityata āha | kāraṇeti ||
etena pāṇau calati tanmūlabhūtaḥ paramāṇurapi
calet, tato'calattadbhujaparamāṇorvibhāgaḥ, tato yo
yena saṃyujyate vibhajyate vā sa tatkāryadravyeṇāpīti
nyāyena bhujapāṇyorapi vibhāgaḥ, tataḥ saṃyoganāśaḥ,
tataḥ śarīranāśa iti nirastam |
na hi pāṇiparamāṇukriyā bhujaparamāṇuvibhāga
mārabhate niyamena | tadanārambhakatve karmalakṣaṇakṣati
riti cenna | ākāśādideśavibhāgajananādapi tadu
papatteḥ, nudyakarmavat | kuto'yaṃ viśeṣa iti cet,
kāraṇaviśeṣādityuktam | evaṃ tarhi yadyavayavakampe
'pyakampa evāvayavī hantāvayavasaṃyogivibhāgibhyā-
mākāśādideśābhyāṃ na saṃyujyeta na vibhajyeteti
cenna | avayavasaṃyogavibhāgābhyāmeva tatsiddheḥ | etacca
samyagavaboddhuṃ vaiśeṣikamanu1sandheyam | tarhi calada
vayavasamāśrito'pyacalannevāvayavyupalabhyeteti cet,
nedamaniṣṭam, pāṇau kampamāne śarīraṃ na kampata iti
pratyayāt |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | eteneti | sarveṣāmavayavakarmaṇāṃ dravyavirodhi
vibhāgajanakatvānabhyupagamenetyarthaḥ | tata iti | calataḥ pāṇipara
māṇoracalabhujaparamāṇuvibhāge pāṇibhujavibhāgo'pi syādityarthaḥ |
saṃyoganāśa iti | śarīrārambhakabhujapāṇisaṃyoganāśa ityarthaḥ |
yadi tu pāṇirbhujāvayavastadā'vayavāntaraparamāṇukarmodāhāryam |
karmalakṣaṇeti | saṃyogavibhāgayoranapekṣaṃ kāraṇaṃ karmeti lakṣaṇa
kṣatiriti bhāvaḥ | tadupapatteriti | karmalakṣaṇopapatterityarthaḥ |
atha nudyakarmavaditi | yathā nudyaniṣṭhena karmaṇā nodakena saha
vibhāgājananepyākāśādivibhāgajananena karmalakṣaṇopapattirityarthaḥ |
ayamiti | kiñcitkarma dravyārambhakasaṃyogavirodhivibhāgajanakaṃ
kiñcinna tatheti viśeṣa ityarthaḥ | avayavakampenākāśādavayavasya
saṃyogavibhāgayorutpādepi niṣkampasyāvayavinaḥ kathamākāśādi
deśāt tau syātāmityāśaṅkate | yadyevamiti | evaṃ kāraṇasaṃyoga
vibhāgābhyāṃ kāryasya tāvityabhyupagamādityarthaḥ | nanu tatraiva na
madhīṣva iti 2 puº pāº |
pramāṇamityata āha | etacceti | nanvevaṃ pāṇau calatyapi
tadavacchinno'vayavī niścala evopalabhyetetyata āha | tarhīti ||
bhagīº ṭīº | eteneti | calācalaparamāṇvorvibhāge satyantarā
kāraṇavibhāgādbhujaparamāṇunā saha pāṇeḥ pāṇiparamāṇunā bhujasya
vibhāga ityarthaḥ | tadanārambha iti | saṃyogavibhāgānapekṣakāraṇatvasya
karmalakṣaṇatvādityarthaḥ | ayamiti | dravyārambhakasaṃyogāvirodhi
vibhāgarūpa ityarthaḥ | nanvavayavakriyātastasyākāśādinā vibhāge
pyavayavinaḥ sa na syāttasya niṣkarmakatvāt, avayavakarmaṇaśca vyadhi
karaṇatvādato'vayavī cale'vayave'vaśyaṃ cala ityupeyamityāha | evaṃ
tarhīti | avayaveti | avayavini karmābhāvepi kāraṇākāraṇa
vibhāgābhyāmeva vibhāgajavibhāgotpatterityarthaḥ | nanu vibhāgasya
vibhāgajanakatve karmatvāpattirityata āha | etacceti | nanvavaya
vino niścalatve(na) caladavayavāśritatayopalabhyamānatve calatīti
dhīviṣayatvaṃ na syādityāha | tarhīti | pāṇipadaṃ śarīrāvayavo
palakṣaṇam ||
raghuº ṭīº | bhujaparamāṇorityupalakṣaṇam, bhujādityapi
draṣṭavyam, tulyanyāyatvāt | bhujapāṇyorapītyasya dvyaṇukādivibhāga
krameṇetyādiḥ | bhujaparamāṇuvibhāgaṃ bhujatatparamāṇuvibhāgam |
karmalakṣaṇasya kṣatiḥ vibhāgajanakatvagarbhatvāttasya | ākāśādīti
prakṛte sambhavitvena1 | vastuto jananayogyatvaṃ lakṣaṇam, na tūpadhānam |
ata eva vinaśyadavasthepi dravye karmotpādaṃ sāmagrīsambhavādupa
gacchanti | nudyakarmavaditi | yathā nodakādvibhāgamajanayadapi
nudyakarmā''kāśādivibhāgajanakamityarthaḥ | ayaṃ viśeṣo dravyā
rambhakasaṃyogavirodhivibhāgajanakatvalakṣaṇaḥ | na saṃyujyetetyādi |
saṃyogādikāraṇasya karmaṇo'nyataratrāpyasambhavāt2 | na cāvayavakarmaiva
tatra kāraṇaikārthapratyāsattyā'samavāyikāraṇaṃ vācyam, avayavāvayavādau
calite'vayavini saṃyogādyanutpādaprasaṅgāt iti bhāvaḥ | saṃyogādeḥ
saṃyogādijanakatve kiṃ mānamityata āha | etacceti ||
athavā yo yadāśritatayopalabhyate sa tasmiṃścalatya
calopi cala eva vibhāvyate darpaṇamukhavat jalacandra
vaccetyapi draṣṭavyam | kṛtaṃ pratītikalahena, evamapi
sarvatra cala evopalabhyeteti cet, calatyavayave sarvatra
tathaiveti na kiñcidanupapannam | acale tu kathaṃ tathopa
labhyatām | tathāpi calācalāśrayasya calācalatayā
pratītau calācalajalacandravat dvaitapratyayopi syāditi
cet, syādapi yadyāśrayavicchedaḥ syāt | na hyekasminneva
jale'vicchinnāvayavabhedena dvicandrabhramo nāma | kintu
vāstavitvena iti 2 puº pāº |
pyabhāvāditi 2 puº pāº |
sa evaikaścale cala upalabhyate'cale tvacala iti |
vīciṣu sopi sahasranibha iti cet, evametat, tāsāṃ
vicchedenākalanāt |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | nanu pāṇyavacchedenāpyavayavino niścalasyopalambha
iti durghaṭamityanuśayenāha | atha veti | niścalopi calāśrita
ścalatīti na pratītiviṣayo bhavatīti dṛṣṭatvādduṣṭamityarthaḥ | calā
śritaśceccala upalabhyate tadā niścalapādāvacchinnenāpi śarīraṃ
calamevopalabhyetetyāśaṅkate | evamapīti | acale tviti |
tadavacchedena śarīrasya calāśritatvābhāvādityarthaḥ | dvaiteti | tatra
śarīre dvitvaṃ pratīyetetyarthaḥ | āśrayaviccheda iti | calācalayo
rāśrayayoryatra vibhāgastatraivaṃ, na tu sarvatra tathā pratibhāsaniyama
ityarthaḥ | na hīti | yatra jalamacalaṃ tatra candrabimbamapyekameva
bhāsata ityarthaḥ | tathā cāśrayavicchedo dvitvavibhrame mūlamiti
bhāvaḥ | āśrayacalatvādhīna āśritacalatvapratyaya iti draḍhayati |
kiṃ tviti | vīciṣviti | āśrayāvicchedābhimānenāśaṅkā |
āśrayavicchedapratyayena samādhimāha | tāsāmiti ||
bhagīº ṭīº | athaveti | avayavavṛttitvenānubhūyamānakarmā
vayavinyāropyata ityarthaḥ | evamapīti | calapāṇyagrahepi yadā
niścalāvayavavṛttitvenāvayavī gṛhyate tadāpi calatīti dhīḥ syā
dityarthaḥ | calatīti | yatra sakalāvayavakarmānubhūyate tatreṣṭāpattiḥ,
yatra calāvayavasyāgrahe niścalāvayavavṛttitayā'vayavigrahastatrānubhūya-
mānakarmāropasāmagryeva nāstītyarthaḥ | nanvevaṃ calācalāvayavavṛttitvena
calācalatayā'nubhūyamāno'vayavī dvaitadhīviṣayaḥ syāt calācala
vṛttitayā calācalatvenānubhūyamānacandravadityāha | tathāpīti |
tathāvidhe yā dvaitadhīstatrāśrayavicchedavaiśiṣṭyaṃ prayojakatayā sādhanā
vacchinnasādhyavyāpakamupādhiriha tu tadabhāvaḥ, sayogasyāviralatvā
dityāha | syādapīti | prayojakatvameva tasyāha | na hīti |
nanvāśrayavicchedo na tadvyāpakastaḍāgarūpāśrayāvicchedepi tadvīciṣu
candradvaitabuddhyutpatterityāha | vīciṣviti | tatrāpyāśrayaviccheda
vuddhirastyeva, tadabhāve candrabuddhirapi nāstītyāha | evametaditi ||
raghuº ṭīº | athaivaṃ niścalaikadvyavayavopyavayavī calatvena nopa
labhyetetyata āha | atha veti | yadyavayavacalanagrahaṇādevāvayavini
calatīti pratyayo niścalāvayavāvacchedenāpi tadā bhavet, avyāpake
tu karmaṇyupagate nāyaṃ doṣastadavacchedenāvṛtterityāśaṅkate |
evamapīti | yatrāśraye calanaṃ gṛhyate tadavacchedenaiva tadāropyata
iti phalabalātkalpyata ityuttarayati | calatīti | āśrayeti |

śaṅkaº ṭīº | yadi pāṇau calatyapi śarīramacalameva tadā
pāṇiśarīrayoḥ sambaddhayorasambaddhayorapi vidyamānatvaṃ syādityāha |
astu tarhīti | nanu dvayorasambaddhavidyamānatvaṃ kṣaṇikatvavādinā
nābhyupeyata iti na prasaṅga ityāha | svayamiti | nanu tarkaḥ
parābhyupagamādhīnapravṛttika evetyāha | na ceti | āpādakasya
parābhyupagamastarke prayojako na tvāpādyāpādakayorvyāptāvapītyarthaḥ |
na caivamiti | calācalayoryutasiddhiriti naiyāyikopi nābhyupa
gacchatītyarthaḥ | vastrodakādau darśanabalādavaśyaṃ tathā svīkartavya
mityāha | vastreti | tantupaṭayostathā darśanādvyabhicārānnaivaṃ
vyāptirityarthaḥ | tantupaṭayorapyasambaddhavidyamānatvamastyeva, sambandhānu
bhavastu bhrānta ityāha | idamiti | tatkathaṃ satyamiti | vastro-
yutasiddhāveva iti 3 puº pāº |
dakayorasambaddhavidyamānatvadarśanamityarthaḥ | abādhāditi | vastrāt
skhalitamapi jalaṃ vastrasambaddhameveti kasyāpi nātra bādhāvatāra
iti tatsatyamityarthaḥ | iheti | calācalayostantupaṭayoḥ sambaddhayoḥ
sattvepi na bādhakamastītyarthaḥ | calācalatvamasambaddhavidyamānatva
vyāpyamityuktamityāha | calācalatvamiti | calācalayorapi tantu
paṭayordarśanena calācalatvamayutasiddhatvavyāpyaṃ kiṃ na syāddarśanasyobhayatra
tulyatvādityāha | yutasiddhāviti | tathā ca saṃyoginoścalācalatvaṃ
yutasiddhatvavyāpyaṃ na tvasaṃyoginorapi pāṇiśarīrayoriti bhāvaḥ |
bhagīº ṭīº | nanvevamavayavāvayavinau yutasiddhau syātām,
yasmiṃścalepi yadacalaṃ tattena yutasiddhamiti vyāptervastrodakādau grahā
dityāha | astviti | asambaddhayorvidyamānatā yutasiddhiḥ,
kṣaṇikayostathotpannayorastyekasmiṃścalepyacalatvaṃ, na ca tayorasambaddhayoḥ
sattvaṃ kṣaṇikatvādityāha | svayamiti | nanu parasiddhena parasyā
pādanaṃ syādityata āha | na ceti | āpādakamātreṇa parasiddhena
tarkaḥ pravarttate vyāptiśca svasiddhaiva tanmūlamityarthaḥ | na caivamiti |
avayavinyeva parasya tathātvāsiddherityarthaḥ | evamiti | asambaddhayo
rvidyamānatvamityarthaḥ | viparyayasya asambaddhayoravidyamānatvasyetyarthaḥ |
yutasiddhāveveti | calācalatayā yathā vastrodakadṛṣṭāntenāva
yavāvayavinoryutasiddhirāpādyā, tathā ca tata evāvayavidṛṣṭāntena
vastrodakayorayutasiddhireva kiṃ nāpādyata ityarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | yutasiddhirasambaddhayorvidyamānatvam | svayamiti |
nirantarotpannaniścalaparamāṇudvayasambaddhayoścalācalayoḥ kṣaṇika
nirantaraparamāṇvorasambaddhavidyamānatvābhāvāt | pararītyā parasyā
pādyatāmityata āha | na caivamiti | tādṛśavyāptau na kasyāpya
bhyupagama ityarthaḥ | sthairye vyabhicārādarśanātsahacāranidarśanācca tathā
vyāptiniścayaḥ syāt ityāśaṅkate | vastraviti | vyabhicāradarśana
māha | tantviti | tantuvastrādau satyapi calācalatve viparyayasyā
sambaddhayoravidyamānatvasya darśanāditi | idaṃ vyabhicāradarśanam |
tat sahacāradarśanam | vipakṣe bādhakābhāvānna sahacāradarśanamātrā
dvyāptiniścaya ityāśayenāha | yuteti ||
raktāraktavirodha iti cenna | bhrāntatvāt | tanmūla
rāgidravyasaṃyogāsaṃyogavirodho'stviti cenna | para
māṇuvādinaṃ prati prāgeva parihṛtatvāt | itaraṃ prati
kā vārtteti cet, saiva tāvat tathaivāvirodhāt | prakāra
bhedenāpi virodhābhyupagame vyāpterasiddheḥ saṃyogatada
bhāvayorevāsiddheḥ | siddhau vā prakārabhedāviruddha
svābhāvasādeśyāparityāgāt | na caivaṃ padārthāntara
vaidharmyeṇa saṃyoga eva nirākarttavyaḥ, tadvaidharmyeṇa teṣāmeva
nirākaraṇaprasaṅgāt |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | raktāraktavirodha iti | avayavini bādhaka
iti śeṣaḥ | bhrāntatvāditi | raktaḥ paṭa iti pratīteriti śeṣaḥ |
tathā ca paṭasyāraktatvameveti na virodha iti bhāvaḥ | tarhi
mahārajanasaṃyogāsaṃyogāvevaikatra viruddhāvavayavibhedakāvityāha |
tanmūleti | paramāṇuvādinaṃ prati kṣaṇabhaṅganirākaraṇāvasare prakāra
bhedamādāya virodhasya parihṛtatvādityāha | paramāṇviti | itaraṃ
pratīti | jñānabhinnaparamāṇvanaṅgīkarttāraṃ pratītyarthaḥ | saiveti |
prakārabhedenāvirodhopapādakayukterihāpi tulyatvāt | anyathā
raktāraktaprakārakaikajñānepi virodhāpatteriti bhāvaḥ | yadi paṭo
mahārajanasaṃyogatadabhāvavān syāt bhidyeteti vyāptirevāsiddhetyarthaḥ |
kuta ityata āha | saṃyogeti | saṃyogatadabhāvasiddhau prakāra
bhedenāvirodho mūlam, tenāpi ca virodhe tāveva na syātā
mityarthaḥ | siddhau veti | yadi saṃyogatadabhāvayoḥ siddhistadā
prakārabhedenāviruddho yaḥ svābhāvastatsādeśyamādāyaivetyarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | nanu mahārajanaraktārdhaḥ paṭo yadi raktastadā
vayavāntaragrahepi raktapaṭa iti dhīḥ syādatha na raktabhāgepi rakta
dhīrna syāditi raktāraktatve vācye, tathā ca viruddhadharmādhyāsa
ityāha | rakteti | raktaḥ paṭa ityanubhavasya mahārajanalauhityaṃ
viṣayo na tu paṭe lauhityarūpasamavāyaḥ, tathā ca bhrama evetyāha |
bhrāntatvāditi | tathāpi tadbhramabījaṃ mahārajanasaṃyogo yadi
vyāpyavṛttistadā bhāgāntarepi tatra raktabhramaḥ syādathāvyāpyavṛttistadā
saṃyuktatvāsaṃyuktatvavirodha ityāha | tanmūleti | kṣaṇikaparamāṇo
rapyasya virodhasya durvāratvādityādinā kṣaṇabhaṅganirāsa eva prakāra-
bhedamupādāyāvirodha upapādita ityāha | paramāṇviti | itara
miti | yo jñānabhinnaṃ paramāṇuṃ na samarthayate taṃ pratītyarthaḥ |
tathaiva prakārabhedenaivetyarthaḥ | tathāpīti | prakārabhedenāpi cedvi
rodhastadā deśakālabhedepi virodhaḥ syādeveti saṃyogatadabhāvayo
rapyasiddhau kva tadantarbhāvenāpi vyāptirityarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | raktāraktatvavirodho rāgidravyārdharakte1 paṭādau |
raktatvaṃ tatra nāstyeva ekadeśe tatpratītistu bhrāntetyāha | bhrāntatvā
diti | tanmūleti | prādeśikabhramamūletyarthaḥ | prāgeva kṣaṇika
paramāṇorapyasya virodhasya durvāratvādityādinā parihṛtatvāt |
itaraṃ vijñānavādinam | tathaiva prakārabhedenaiva | vyāpteḥ saṃyoga
tadabhāvayorasamānādhikaraṇyaniyamasya asiddhiḥ | kuta ityata āha |
saṃyogeti | siddhau vā prakārabhedenāviruddhasya svābhāvasāmānādhi
karaṇyasyāparityāgādekatraivāvacchedabhedena saṃyogatadabhāvagrāhiṇā
pratyakṣeṇāvirodhasya svahastitatvāditi bhāvaḥ | tadvaidharmyeṇa hi
tattādātmyaṃ nirākriyate na tu svarūpameva, sarvaśūnyatāprasaṅgādityā
śayenāha | tadvaidharmyeṇeti ||
na caivameva nyāyyam, niyamavatā hi satyavaidharmyeṇe
tarannirākriyate, asatyavaidharmyeṇa satyatvasyaiva nirvāhāt,
niṣedhyapratītināntarīyakatvācca niṣedhasiddheḥ | śaśa-
rghalipte iti 2 puº pāº |
viṣāṇādau kalpitena niṣedhyena niṣedhasiddhiriti
cenna | nirākṛtatvāt, saṃyogasya vāṅmātreṇa kālpa
nikatvasiddhāvatiprasaṅgācca, śaśaśṛṅganyāyasya ca yogyā
nupalambhābhāvenāsiddheḥ, ita eva bādhakāt tatsiddhā
vitaretarāśrayatvam |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | na caivameveti | astu sarvapadārthanirākaraṇaṃ
nedamaniṣṭamityarthaḥ | tathā ca mamābhimatā śūnyataiva siddhyediti
bhāvaḥ | niyamavatā hīti | sādharmyāsamānādhikaraṇena vaidharmyeṇe
tyarthaḥ | prakṛte tu saṃyogasya sattvaguṇatvābhidheyatvaprameyatvādikaṃ
satyasādharmyamapyastīti bhāvaḥ | asatyavaidharmyeṇeti | sattvaprameyatvā
dinetyarthaḥ | doṣāntaramāha | niṣedhyeti | tathā ca saṃyoga
niṣedhamahimnaiva saṃyogasiddhirityarthaḥ | asatkhyātirūpaiva tarhi
pratītiratrāpītyāśaṅkate | śaśeti | nirākṛtatvāditi | kṣaṇikatā
vāde vyatirekibhaṅgāvasare | saṃyogasyeti | śabdādisvalakṣaṇārtha
kriyākāriṇaḥ saṃyogasya kālpanikatve nīlādyapi kālpanikaṃ
syādityarthaḥ | nanu yathā śaśe śṛṅgābhāvo yogyānupalambhena siddha
stathā saṃyogābhāvopi setsyatītyata āha | śaśaśṛṅgeti |
saṃyogasya yogyāyogyasādhāraṇatayā paramāṇvādau sayogānupalambhepi
yogyatāviśeṣaṇaṃ nāsti, ghaṭhapaṭādisaṃyoge tvanupalambha eva nāstī
tyarthaḥ | ita eveti | padārthāntaravaidharmyāt saṃyogābhāvasiddhā
vanupalambhopi siddha eva yadi, tadā'nyonyāśrayaḥ, saṃyogābhāve siddhe
yogyānupalambhasiddhistatsiddhau ca saṃyogābhāvasiddhirityarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | evameveti | saṃyogavaidharmyeṇa teṣāmeva nirā
karaṇamityarthaḥ | niyamavatā vyāptimatetyarthaḥ | niṣedhyeti | tathā
copajīvyavirodhānna nirākaraṇamityarthaḥ | ita eveti | svābhāva
sādeśyavirodhasiddhau kālpanikatvasiddhistatsiddhau ca virodhasiddhi
rityanyonyāśraya ityarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | śūnyataivāstvityāśaṅkya nirākaroti | na caivamiti |
niyameti | niyamatastadrūpāvacchinnavyāvṛttena 1hi dharmeṇa tādrūpyaṃ
nirākriyate | na ca kasyaciddharmasya satyamātrāvṛttitvaṃ kasyāpi
pramāṇasya viṣayo yena satyatvaṃ kkāpi nirākriyeta, pratyutāsatyavai
dharmyeṇa satyaniyatena dharmeṇārthakriyākāritvādinā satyatvasyaiva siddhe
rityarthaḥ | nirākṛtatvāt asatkhyātinirāsena | niṣedhakaṃ ca
pramāṇaṃ yadi niṣedhyaviśeṣaniyantritaṃ niṣedhamavagāheta tata eva
tarhi siddho niṣedhyaḥ, no cettanniṣedha eva kuta ityuktamanusarttavyam |
nanu śaśaśṛṅgavadyogyānupalambhabādhitatvātsaṃyogasya kālpanikatvaṃ na
tu vāṅmātrādata āha | śaśeti | ita eva kālpanikatvādeva |
tatsiddhau yogyānupalambhasiddhau | itaretarāśrayatvaṃ kālpanikatvasya
yogyānupalambhasādhyatvāt ||
śabdapratyabhijñānavat saṃyogapratīteranyathopapatti
mātreṇa bādhakapravṛttiriti cenna | anubhavasya tadanu-
vaidharmyeṇa iti 2 puº pāº |
rūpamupādhimukhapiṇḍamadatvā bhrāntatvenānyathopapattau
tadviparītānumānapravarttane'gnāvanuṣṇatvānumāne pravṛtti
prasaṅgāt | na ca pratyabhijñānasya sāmānyavat saṃyoga
pratyayasya tadanurūpamupādhyantaramasti | evambhūtamaryādā
tikrame tu tvadabhipretapratibandhapratyayasyāpi bhrāntatvenā
nyathāsiddhiprasaṅgaḥ kathaṃ vāryaḥ, tadavāraṇe śithilamūla
starkaḥ kathaṃ pravartteta | yathālokavyavasthānaṃ cādhyakṣāntara
vat saṃyogasyāpi śabdapākajādyarthakriyā1sthitestada
dhyakṣasyāpi prāmāṇyasiddherna bhrāntatvaśaṅkāvakāśa iti |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | nanu dravyayoraviraladeśotpādanibandhanā saṃyoga
pratītiryathā sa evāyaṃ gakāra iti jātyabhedālambanā pratītirna
gakārābhedamavalambate | tathā cānupalambha eva cet saṃyogasya
padārthāntaravaidharmyaṃ yat saṃyogabādhakaṃ tatpratītirapratyūhetyāśaṅkate |
śabdeti | tatra yathā gatvābhedo viṣayastathā saṃyuktapratītau saṃyogāti
riktaṃ na viṣayo yenānyathāsiddhiḥ syādaviraladeśotpādastvatīndriyo
na tathā bhavitumarhatīti pariharati | anubhavasyeti | ananyathā
siddhasyāpyanubhavasya tiraskāre vanhāvauṣṇyagrāhi pratyakṣamapyanauṣṇyānu
mānaparipanthi na bhavedityarthaḥ | na ceti | sa evāyaṃ gakāra
iti pratyabhijñānasya gatvasāmānyavadityarthaḥ | evambhūteti | ananyathā
siddhapratyakṣasya vastvanurodhātikrama ityarthaḥ | yadviruddhadharmādhyastaṃ na
siddheḥ iti 3 puº pāº |
tadekaṃ yathā gavāśvamahinakulaṃ, viruddhadharmādhyastaścaikatvenābhimanya
māno ghaṭādiriti tvadanumatapratibandhapratyayopi bhrānta eva syā
dityarthaḥ | pratibandhapratyayasya bhrāntatve daṇḍamāha | tadavadhāraṇa
iti | adhyakṣāntaravaditi | nīlādyadhyakṣavadityarthaḥ | nīlādīnā
marthakriyāsthiteryadi vyavasthitistadā prakṛte'pi tulyamityāha |
saṃyogasyāpīti ||
bhagīº ṭīº | nanu yathā sa evāyaṃ gakāra iti pratya
bhijñānaṃ gatvajātiviṣayatvenānyathopapannaṃ na gakāranityatve mānaṃ,
tathā saṃyogadhīrapyanyathopapannā na saṃyogasiddhau mānamityāha |
śabdeti | tadvadatra tasyā na niyamaḥ kaścidupādhirūpo viṣayaḥ
samasti yenānyathopapattistathāpi bhrāntatvakalpane'tiprasaṅga ityāha |
anubhavasyeti | yena nyāyena tvayā nirvikalpakāntarasya prāmāṇyaṃ
mantavyaṃ tena saṃyogaviṣayakasyāpi tasya, sarvāprāmāṇye tu vyāghāta
ityāha | yatheti | nanvarthakriyāvirahāt saṃyogasyāsattvamityata
āha | saṃyogasyāpīti | bherīdaṇḍasaṃyogācchabdo'gnisaṃyogā
tpākajāḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | yathā pratyabhijñānaṃ tajjātīyaviṣayatvenopa
padyamānaṃ na vyaktyabhede mānamiti śabdānityatvabādhakapramāṇapravṛtti
revaṃ saṃyogapravṛttirapyanyathopapadyamānā na tatra tattvāntare mānamiti
saṃyogabādhakapramāṇapravṛttirityāśaṅkate | śabdeti | anyathā'nya-
viṣayatvenopapattirbhrāntatvena vā | nādyaḥ, tādṛśānyasyābhāvāt |
nāntyaḥ, vinā bādhakaṃ tathātve'tiprasaṅgādityāha | anubhavasyeti | na
cetyādi | nanu nairantaryameva saṃyogasthāne'bhiṣicyatāṃ kṛtaṃ tattvānta
reṇeti cet, kimidaṃ nairantaryam | dvayormadhye mūrtadravyaviraha iti
cet, uṣṇaṃ jalaṃ śītalaṃ śilātalamityādau jalādimadhye tejaḥ
pāthasoḥ sattvena jalādyagrahaṇaprasaṅgāt | nibiḍadravyābhāvastatheti
cet, vicchedepi tathātve tvacā dravyagrahaṇaprasaṅgaḥ, nibiḍasaṃyuktayo
rmadhyāgrahaṇātsaṃyuktapratyayānudayaprasaṅgaścetyādi svayamūhanīyam | yadekaṃ
tanna viruddhadharmādhyastaṃ yathā kṣaṇikaṃ svalakṣaṇaṃ yacca viruddhadharmādhyastaṃ
na tadekaṃ yathā gavāśvamiti pratibandhaḥ | yadekaṃ tanna viruddha
dharmādhyastaṃ yathā kṣaṇikaḥ paramāṇurekaścābhyupeyate'vayavī pareṇeti
tarkaḥ | nanvarthakriyāśūnyaviṣayatvaṃ saṃyogapratyayasya prāmāṇyabādhakamata
āha | saṃyogasyāpīti ||
astu tarhi taddeśatvātaddeśatvarūpo virodhaḥ | na |
virodhalakṣaṇābhāvāt | na hi taddeśasaṃsargavidhau niya
mena deśāntarasaṃsarganiṣedhaḥ | taddeśatvatadadeśatvayostu
syāt, tatsaṃsargastu keneṣyate | adhyakṣamevaikasaṃsargapari
cchedakaṃ tadabhāvavyavacchedamukhena tadanyavyavacchedaphalamimaṃ
virodhamudgiratīti cet, syādapyevaṃ, yadi niyamenaika
saṃsṛṣṭasyānyasaṃsargaṃ pratikṣipadadhyakṣamudiyāt, na tveta
dasti, yugapadekasyānekasaṃsargapravṛttamadhyakṣamaviśeṣāt
sarvasaṃsargaṃ vā pratikṣipet, na vā kamapi, svātmānameva
vā, sarvathā na virodhaṃ dīpayet, antataḥ paramāṇo
rapyekasyānekaiḥ paramāṇubhiḥ saṃsargasvīkārācceti |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | ataddeśatvamiti | taddeśabhinnadeśatvaṃ nañaḥ
paryudāsārthatvamāśritya yadi vivakṣitaṃ tadā na virodha ityāha |
virodheti | virodhābhāvamevāha | na hīti | prasajyapratiṣedhārthatve
virodhamabhyupetya tadabhāvamāha | taddeśatveti | etaddeśasaṃsṛṣṭo'ya
mityadhyakṣaṃ naitaddeśāsaṃsṛṣṭa ityākāreṇa jāyamānaṃ naitaddeśabhinnadeśa
saṃsṛṣṭa ityapi phalato viṣayīkarotyeveti kathaṃ na virodha iti
śaṅkate | adhyakṣameveti | etādṛśamadhyakṣameva nodetītyāha |
syādapīti | pratyuta prakṛte viparītamadhyakṣamastītyāha | yugapaditi |
tantuṣu paṭa ityadhyakṣaṃ tāvadasti, tacca yadi tantvantarasaṃsargaṃ pratikṣipet
tantumātrasaṃsargameva pratikṣipet, sarvatantuṣu saṃsargagrahasyāviśeṣāt |
na vā kamapītyatra pratikṣipedityāvṛttena sambandhaḥ | evamagrepi |
ātmānamiti | notpadyataivetyarthaḥ | antata iti |
‘ṣaṭkena yugapadyogāt paramāṇoḥ ṣaḍaṃśatā-’
iti tvadabhyupagamādityarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | ataddeśatvamiti yadi paryudāse nañ tadā
taditaradeśavṛttitvamarthaḥ, tatrāha | virodheti | atha prasajyapratiṣedhe
nañ tadā taddeśāsambaddhatvamarthaḥ, tatrāha | taddeśatveti | na hi yadā
yaddeśe'vayavī varttate tadā tatraiva na vartata iti svīkurmaḥ | nanve-
kasyaikatra saṃsagaṃ viṣayīkurvadadhyakṣameva tadabhāvaṃ vyavacchindadvyāpyamanya
saṃsargaṃ vyavacchinattītyāha | adhyakṣameveti | ekāvayavavṛttitve
nāvayavāntarāvṛttitvaṃ rūpādivadanumātumapi śakyamiti bhāvaḥ |
ekasaṃsargaparicchedakamadhyakṣaṃ tadabhāvaṃ vyavachindadapyanyasaṃsargaṃ na vyava
cchinatti, ekenaivādhyakṣeṇaikadā'nekasaṃsargasya viṣayīkaraṇādityāha |
syādapīti | ātmānamapīti | pratikṣipedityanvayaḥ | pratyakṣa
mapyanekasaṃsargaṃ viṣayīkurvadanekasaṃsargītyavayavivattadapi na syādityarthaḥ |
antata iti | anekavṛtterekasyānabhyupagame ṣaṭparamāṇvavṛttiḥ
paramāṇurapyeko na syādityarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | ataddeśatvaṃ hi tadanyadeśatvaṃ vā taddeśatvābhāvo
vā | ādye virodheti | dvitīye taddeśatveti | sthirasya taddeśa
saṃyoginaḥ kadācit tadabhāvaḥ kālabhedādaviruddha iti bhāvaḥ |
etenāśrayanāśanāśyo vyākhyātaḥ | tadabhāvavyavacchedamukheneti |
vyāpakasya taddeśavṛttitvābhāvasya nivṛttau vyāpyasya tadanyavṛtti
tvasyāpi nivṛtteriti | ekatrānekasaṃsargitvasya pratyakṣasiddhatvānna
tādṛśī vyāptirityāha | syāditi | ātmānamiti | pratyakṣasyā
pyanekaviṣayasaṃsargitvāt ||
etena vṛttivikalpo nirastaḥ, paramāṇuvṛttyā'va
vayavivṛttestulyayogakṣematvāt |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | eteneti | avayavini sambhavenetyarthaḥ | vṛtti
vikalpa iti | avayavī yadyekasminnavayave kārtsnyena vartteta
tadā'vayavāntare na varttetaiva, ekatraiva parisamāpteḥ | nāpyekadeśena,
avayavabhinnasyaikadeśasyābhāvāt | tathā ca na varttata ityāyātam |
evaṃ saṃyogavibhāgasāmānyādīnāṃ pratikṣepa iti bauddhāḥ | atra
pratibandimāha | paramāṇviti | paramāṇau saṃyogalakṣaṇā vṛtti
ravayavini tu samavāya iti viśeṣaḥ | ekatrāvayavini kārtsnyaika
deśavyavasthaiva nāstīti na tadvikalpāvasara ityagre sphuṭībhaviṣyati ||
bhagīº ṭīº | nanvavayaveṣvavayavī yadi kārtsnyena varttate,
tadā'vayavāntare na varttate, na hyasti sambhavaḥ kārtsnyena tatraiva varttate
'vayavāntaravṛttiśceti | nāpyekadeśena varttate, ekadeśāntarābhāvā
diti vṛttivyāpakatadubhayābhāvānna varttata evetyata āha | eteneti |
ṣaḍbhiḥ paramāṇubhirekaḥ paramāṇuḥ saṃsṛṣṭaḥ kiṃ kārtsnyenaikadeśena
veti vikalpāt | athaikarūpe paramāṇau na kārtsnyaikadeśavikalpa
sambhavaḥ, tadā'vayavinyapi tulyamityarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | vṛttivikalpaḥ kārtsnyaikadeśābhyām | ekatra
kārtsnyena vṛttāvanyatra vṛttyasambhavaḥ, ekadeśena ca vṛttau tatra tatrāpyeka
deśāntarāpekṣāyāmanavasthā ||
astu tarhi citre nīlānīlādivirodhaḥ | na hi
tadekaṃ rūpaṃ citratvavirodhāt, nāpyanekam, ekāva
yavisamavāyavirodhāt | na cānekaṃ vyāpakaṃ, tathā
nupalammavirodhāt | na cāvyāpakaṃ, svābhāvavideśa
jātīyatvavirodhāt, anyathā virodhāvirodhavyavasthā
virodhāt | na cārūpa evāvayavī, cākṣuṣatvavirodhā
diti cenna |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | citraḥ paṭo guṇavirodhānnaikaḥ syādityākṣipati |
astviti | citratveti | nānābhūta eva vastuni citrapadaprayogā
dityarthaḥ | svābhāveti | rūpādīnāṃ vyāpyavṛttijātīyatvenāvyāpya
vṛttitvavirodhādityarthaḥ | nanu yathā harītakī guṇavirodhena
nīrasaiva, tathā paṭopi nīrūpa eva syādityata āha | na ceti ||
bhagīº ṭīº | nanu vijātīyavarṇanānātantvārabdhapaṭe nīla
pītādiviruddhadharmādhyāsānnaiko'vayavītyāha | astviti | tadupa
pādayati | na hīti | tādṛśe paṭe yadrūpaṃ tadyadyekaṃ tadā citraṃ
na syāt, nānābhūtasya citrapadavācyatvādityarthaḥ | nanvanekameva rūpaṃ
nīlatvādiviruddhajātimattayā citramucyata ityāha | nānekamiti |
viruddhānekajātīyarūpasyaikatrāvayavini virodhādavṛtterityarthaḥ | atha
tādṛśapaṭavṛtti rūpamanekaṃ ? tadvyāpyavṛttyavyāpyavṛtti vā | ādye na
cānekamiti | sakalāvayavāvacchedenāvayavini vijātīyāneka
rūpānupalabdherityarthaḥ | antye na ceti | saṃskāratvānyamūrtamātra-
vṛttiguṇavṛttiguṇatvavyāpyajāteravyāpyavṛttivṛttitvavirodhādityarthaḥ |
etacca caturthādhyāyaprakāśe vyutpāditamasmābhiḥ | anyatheti | parasparā
bhāvavyāpyayoḥ sāmānādhikaraṇya ityarthaḥ | na cārūpa iti | na
codbhūtarūpavadavayavasamavetatvaṃ dravyacākṣuṣatve prayojakam citrāvayavā
rabdhe tadabhāvāt | na ca sākṣātparamparāsādhāraṇamavayavatvam,
samavāyikāraṇasyaivāvayavatvāt, ārabhyārambhakavādasya niṣedhāt ||
raghuº ṭīº | citratvavirodhāt nānārūpāṇāmeva citra
padārthatvāt | ekāvayavīti | yugapadekatrānekarūpāṇāmavṛtteḥ,
anyathaikajātīyarūpārabdhe'pyanekarūpavṛttiprasaṅgāt | balavadbādhakāntara
māha | na cānekamiti | cākṣuṣatveti | na ca rūpavatsamavetatvaṃ
dravyacākṣuṣatve tantram, citrāvayavaparamparārabdhe tasyāpyasambhavāt,
ārabhyārambhakavādasya nirāsāt, nīlādyanekasvabhāve lāghavena
rūpavattvasyaiva prayojakatvena kalpanāt ||
citratvaṃ hi nānātvaṃ vā mithoviruddhanānājāti
samavāyaṃ vā'bhipretya yadi ekatvābhyupagame virodha
udbhāvyate, tadaivametat, na tu tathā'bhyupagamaḥ | na khalva
nekatvaṃ citratvam, śukleṣṭhapyanekeṣu citrapratyayaprasaṅgāt,
nāpyekasmin viruddhānekajātisamavāyaḥ, virodhenaiva
nirākṛtatvāt | api tu nīlatvādivaccitratvamapi
jātiviśeṣa eva, sa cāvayavavṛttivijātīyarūpasamā-
hārābhivyaṅgyatvānnaikarūpāvayavasahitasyāvayavina upa
lambhe'pyupalabhyate | ata eva tryaṇuke citrepi citra
pratyayo na kadāpi | tathāpyacitre pārśve citrapratyayo
mā bhūt, dhavalapratyayastu kuta iti cet, avayavarūpa
sañcāreṇāvayavinopi tathā pratyayāt | ata eva yatrā
vayavarūpaṃ na pratyakṣaṃ tatra trasareṇāvetadapi nāsti,
dṛśyameva (vā)hyālokarūpamāropya piñjarastvasareṇu
rālokyate |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | citraḥ paṭa iti pratītirna nānārūpāvalambanā,
na vā nīlatvapītatvaviruddhanānājātyāśrayaikarūpālambanā, kintu
taccitratvajātimadekacitrarūpavadavayavyālambaneti na virodhagandho
pīti pariharati | citratvaṃ hīti | evaṃ tarhi dhavalaikapārśvāva
cchedenopalabdhepi paṭe citrapratyayaḥ syādityata āha | sa ceti |
ata eveti | tatrāvayavarūpasya vyañjakasyāgrahādityarthaḥ | tarhi
tatra pārśve dhavalapratyayaḥ katham, na hi taddhavalaṃ rūpamapi tu citra
miti śaṅkate | tathāpīti | tatrāvayavirūpaṃ na gṛhyata eva, kiṃ
tvavayavarūpamātramiti pariharati | avayaveti | atrāpi trasa
reṇurūpaṃ dṛṣṭāntamāha | ata eveti | etadapi nāstīti |
dhavalādipratyayopi nāstītyarthaḥ | kīdṛśī tarhi trasareṇau rūpa
pratipattirityata āha | dṛśyameveti ||
bhagīº ṭīº | anabhyupagamabījamāha | na khalviti | api
tviti | yathā nīlādyākārānugatavyavahārānnīlatvaṃ jātiḥ, tathā
karburākārānugatavyavahārāccitratvamapi jātirityarthaḥ | tarhi nīla
rūpavadbhāgāvaraṇe śuklarūpavadavayavasahite'vayavini gṛhyamāṇepi
citradhīḥ syādityata āha | sa ceti |
nanu sarvaiścitratantubhiryatra paṭa ārabhyate tatrāvayavarūpāṇāmeka
jātīyatvāt kathaṃ citraṃ rūpam | atha tadārambhakaparamparārūpatvenaiva
kāraṇatvaṃ, tadā paramparayā rupavadavayavasamavetatvasyaiva cākṣuṣa(tva
prayojaka)tvāpatternīrūpa evāvayavyastu |
atrāhuḥ | tatrānyaiva rūpotpattisāmagrī, sākṣādavayavarūpāṇā
miva paramparāvayavarūpāṇāmapi kāraṇatāgrāhakamānataulyāt |
nanvevaṃ citratrasareṇurūpe citratvagraho na syāt, tadavayavarūpasyā
tīndriyatvādityata āha | ata eveti | iṣṭāpattirevetyarthaḥ |
tathāpīti | avayavini dhavalarūpābhāvādityarthaḥ | avayaveti |
avayavasamavetaṃ dhavalarūpamavayavinyāropyata ityarthaḥ | tatreti |
citratrasareṇoravayavarūpamavayavini nāropyate, avayavarūpasyaivāgrahā
dityarthaḥ | kathaṃ tarhi citratrasareṇau piñjaratvagrahaḥ, rūpatvavyāpya
jāteragrahādityata āha | dṛśyamiti ||
raghuº ṭīº | sa ceti | avayavatvamiha sākṣātparamparāsādhāraṇaṃ
vivakṣitam, tena citrārabdhe na citrapratyayānupapattiḥ | atha citra
rūpotpāda eva tatra katham, avayave vijātīyarūpavirahāditi
cenna | sākṣātparamparāsādhāraṇāvayavavṛtte-rmūlabhūtaparamāṇuvṛtterbā
vijātīyarūpasya citrarūpanimittakāraṇatvāditi kecit |
nīladhavalārabdhāt pītaraktārabdhamiva nīlādyārabdhādvijā
tīyameva citrārabdhaṃ citram, citramātre tvavayavarūpameva prayojakam,
viśeṣasāmagrīṇāṃ niyāmakatvācca na sarvatra citrotpāda ityapare |
ekadeśinastu vijātīyānekarūpasamāhāra eva citrapratyayā
lambanam, senāvanādivaccaikatvapratyayaḥ, nīlāderanīlādyanārambhakatvāt,
nīlādyārambhe bādhakābhāvācca, samavāyyanutpādādanā1rambhavatāpya
nekena tadutpāde ārambhasambhavāt, anīlādisamvalanasya pratibandhakatve
mānābhāvāt, svādhikaraṇāvayavāvacchedena ca nīlādyārambhāt tada
vyāpyavṛttinīlādimātrāvayavārabdhe tu tattatsāmagrīsamājājjāya
mānamekaṃ vyāpakam, saṃyogatadabhāvavaccaikatrādhyakṣasiddhatvātprakāra
bhedenāvirodha iti vadanti |
avayavarūpeti | avayavini citrarūpāgraho'vayavarūpasamāropa
ścāvayavirūpe vā citratvāgraho'vayavarūpajātyāropaścetyanyadetat ||
syādetat | yadi citratvaṃ nāma jātiviśeṣaḥ, kathaṃ
tarhi viruddhajātīyarūpasamāhāramātre 2citratvapratyaya
iti cet, na vai nīladhavalāruṇeṣu paṭeṣu kvacidapi
ranārabdhavatā'pyekena iti 2 puº pāº |
citrapratyaya iti 2 puº pāº |
1kārburārthaścitrapratyayaḥ 2kasyāpi, vaidharmyanimittastu
kena vāryate ? citraśabdasyākṣādipadavadanekārthatvāt |
nīlapītādiṣu mithaḥ saṃsṛṣṭeṣṭhanārabdhadravyeṣṭhapi karbura
pratyayo bhavatīti cet, satyam, dravyāntarotpādābhi
mānāt sthaulyātiśayapratyayavadupapatteriti |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | anārabdhadravyeṣu nīladhavalāditantuṣu kathaṃ na
citrapratyaya iti śaṅkate | yadi citratvamiti | tatra citratva
jātinibandhano na citrapratyayaḥ, kintu vaidharmyaṃ yadvailakṣaṇyaṃ vaicitrya
miti yāvat, tannibandhanamiti pariharati | na vai iti | tarhi
tatra citraśabdaprayogaḥ kathamata āha | citraśabdasyeti | citra
śabdastāvadanekārtho bhavatu karburapratyayaśabdau kathamanārabdhadravyasthale
samarthanīyāvityāśaṅkate | nīleti | yathā'nārabdhadravye dhānyarāśau
sthaulyapratyayaśabdau dravyāntarārambhabhrameṇa, tathā prakṛtepi karbura
pratyayaśabdāviti pariharati | satyamiti ||
bhagīº ṭīº | yadīti | vijātīyarūpeṣu paṭeṣu dravyānta
rānupapatteḥ kathaṃ citradhīrityarthaḥ | yadi karburaviṣayā citradhī
starhyasiddhirevetyāha | na vai iti | atha vaidharmyaviṣayā sā
dhīstadā tatra nānupapattirityāha | vaidharmyeti | asiddhau bādhaka
māha | nīleti | bhrāntastatra karburapratyayo yathārthasya ca tatrā-
kārye vārya iti 3 puº pāº |
kasyacidapi iti 2 puº pāº |
siddhiruktetyāha | dravyāntareti | atrānurūpaṃ nidarśanamāha |
sthaulyeti | ekapaṭagrahe yādṛśaṃ sthaulyaṃ gṛhyate tatotiśayitamanyonya
saṃsṛṣṭapaṭeṣu bhāsate, tadyathā''ropitaṃ tathaitadapītyarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | vaidharmyaṃ vailakṣaṇyam ||
astu tarhi paramāṇunivṛtteḥ sarvavilopaḥ | tathāhi |
bahubhiḥ paramāṇubhiḥ saṃsṛjyamānaḥ paramāṇuḥ pratyekaṃ
kimekadeśena saṃyujyate kārtsnyena vā, prakārāntarā
bhāvāt | na prathamaḥ, tasyaikadeśābhāvāt, bhāve vā
paramāṇutvavyāghātāt | na dvitīyaḥ, paramāṇvantareṇā
saṃsargaprasaṅgāt, na hyasti sambhavaḥ, ekatraiva parisamāpta
vṛttiranyatrāpi varttata iti |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | nanvavayavī tadā bhavedyadi tanmūlakāraṇa
paramāṇuḥ syāt, sa eva tu nāstīti śaṅkate | astviti |
sarvavilopa iti | bāhyasarvavilopa ityarthaḥ | vijñānavādī
paramāṇunirākaraṇayuktimāha | tathāhīti | vijñānavādinā para
māṇunirākaraṇāyoktā yuktiravayavanirākaraṇe'pīti bhāvaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | nanu paramāṇupratibandyā vṛttivikalpaḥ samā
dheyaḥ, sopi mā bhūdata eva doṣādityāha | astviti | tathā
ca bāhyamātranirāsāt siddho vijñānavāda iti bhāvaḥ ||
na | buddhyā samānayogakṣematvāt | tathāhi | buddhi
rapi santamasantaṃ vā'nekaṃ viṣayamālambamānā''kāraṃ
vā bibhratī kārtsnyena vā ekadeśena vā | na
prathamaḥ, pītādiviṣayākāravilopaprasaṅgāt | na hyasti
sambhavo nīla eva viṣaya ākāre vā parisamāptātmā
pītādisampṛktātmā ceti | na dvitīyaḥ, tadabhāvāt |
evamanākāratvamaviṣayatvaṃ ca buddheriṣyata eveti cet,
tat kiṃ yat pratibhāsate tadasat āhosvit na
pratibhāsata eva kiñcit | nādyaḥ, asatyapi nīla
pītādau jñānavṛttivikalpasya tadavasthatvāt | na hi
kṛtsnameva vijñānaṃ nīlollekhi, pītādyanu1llekhaprasaṅgāt |
nāpi tadekadeśaḥ, tadabhāvādityuktatvāt | na dvitīyaḥ,
bāhyepi vṛttivikalpasyānupapatteriti |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | siddhāntī yuktimimāṃ vijñānanirākaraṇe
'pyatidiśati | na buddhyeti | matabhedenāha | santamasantamiti |
matāntaramāha | svākāraṃ veti | pītādīti | pītādiviṣayā
kārayorvilopaprasaṅgādityarthaḥ | tadabhāvāditi | buddhāvekadeśā
bhāvādityarthaḥ | atra nirākārabuddhivādīṣṭāpattimāha | eva
miti | saviṣayatvaṃ buddherdraḍhayitumāha | tatkimiti | asadbhānepi
vijñāne kārtsnyaikadeśavikalpasyāparīhārādityāha | asatyapīti |
nullekhitva iti 3 puº pāº |
vṛttivikalpameva viśadayati | na hīti | bāhyepīti | na
cet kaścit pratibhāsate tadā bāhyaṃ nāstyeva, kutra vṛttivikalpaḥ
syādityarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | bāhyepīti | yadi na bhāsata eva kiñcit
tadā buddheraviṣayatve bāhyepi vṛttivikalpa āśrayāsiddha ityarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | bāhye vṛttivikalpasyānupapattirbāhyasyaivāsiddhatvāt ||
syādetat | niḥśeṣasamudāyī kṛtsnaśabdasyārthaḥ, samu
dāye kaścideva samudāyyekadeśapadārthaḥ, na ca buddhiḥ
samudāyasvabhāvā, tasyā ekarūpatvāt, 1tat kutaḥ
kṛtsnaikadeśavikalpotthānam, kathaṃ tarhi tadviṣayiṇī
tadākāravatī vā ? prakārāntarābhāvāditi yadi, tadā
svarūpeṇeti brūma iti cet | sphuṭaṃ niraṭaṅki tārkika
vedikāviṭaṅkena kevalamasmabhyamabhyasūyatā dūraṅgatveti |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | avayavini vṛttivikalpaṃ nirākarttuṃ buddhau
parasya tannirākaraṇaṃ śaṅkate | syādetaditi | ekasyā buddherna
samudāyatvaṃ na caikadeśatvamiti kutastadghaṭito vṛttivikalpo'va
kāśamāsādayatītyarthaḥ | kathaṃ tarhīti | tadviṣayatvaṃ tadākāratvaṃ
tadetat iti 2 puº pāº |
vā kārtsnyaikadeśayoranyatareṇa sambhāvyate taccennāsti tadānupapatti
rityāśaṅkārthaḥ | bauddha eva samādhatte | svarūpeṇeti brūma iti |
tadetattulyanyāyatayā pariharati | sphuṭamiti | tārkikavedikā
tārkikādhyāpanasthānaṃ tatra viṭaṅko dhūrttaḥ | dūraṃ gatvā svadoṣa
samādhānāvasare ||
bhagīº ṭīº | niḥśeṣa ityādinā kārtsnyena vikalpā
sambhava uktaḥ | samudāya ityādinaikadeśavikalpābhāvo darśitaḥ |
sphuṭamityādinā'vayavinopyavayaveṣu svarūpeṇa vṛttirastvityabhi
pretyopahasitam ||
raghuº ṭīº | tadviṣayiṇītyādau tadbhyāṃ samudāyaparāmarśaḥ |
tārkikavedikā tārkikāṇāṃ saṃmilanasthānaṃ tatra viṭaṅko dhūrttaḥ |
sudūraṃ gatvā svapakṣadūṣaṇanirasanāvasaramāsādya ||
etena tadataddeśatvaṃ nirastam | tathāhi | buddhe
rnīlākāratāṃ paricchindadadhyakṣaṃ tadabhāvavyavaccheda
mukhena tadavinābhūtāṃ pītādyākāratāmapi vyavacchi
ndyāt, tathā ca kathamekā buddhirnīlapītādyākārā
syāditi tulyo'nuyogaḥ | bhavedevaṃ yadi nīlādyā
kāratāyāḥ pītādyākāratvābhāvāvinābhāvaḥ syāt,
sa eva tu kutaḥ, nīlapītādyākārāyā buddheraikātmyenaiva
niścayāt | pratyākāraniyatatve citrapratipatterapyanupa
pattiriti cet, tadetat tulyaṃ paramāṇvavayavyādi
ṣṭhapi | na hi tatrāpyanekaparamāṇusaṃsṛṣṭasya paramāṇo
ranekāvayavasaṃsṛṣṭasyāvayavino vā naikātmatā'nubhūyate,
tathātve vā ekasyānekasaṃsargapratipattiḥ kadāpi na
syāditi tulyaivārthagatiḥ | vāci vaicitryaṃ tu kvopa
yujyata iti |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | eteneti | buddhipratibandidvāreṇetyarthaḥ |
pratibandimeva sphuṭayati | tathāhīti | parasamādhiṃ svamata
samādhānāya viśadayati | bhavedapyevamiti | yathā'nekaviṣayatva
manekākāratvaṃ vā buddhau sphuṭasiddhaṃ na doṣamāvahati, tathā'nekā
vathavāśritatvamavayavini bahusaṃyogitvaṃ ca paramāṇau na doṣamā
vahatītyāha | tadetaditi | tulyamiti | bauddhakoṭitulyatā
mevāha | na hīti ||
bhagīº ṭīº | citrapratipatteḥ anekaviṣayakajñānasyetyarthaḥ |
tulyaiveti | ekasyā buddheranekasaṃsargavirodhitve liṅgaliṅgisāmānā
dhikaraṇyānupapattau vyāptyagrahāt kathakatvavyāghāta iti bhāvaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | etena buddhipratibandhigraheṇa | tadavinābhūtāṃ
nīlākāratvābhāvavyāpyām | citrapratipatteḥ nīlādyanekākārā
lambanapratipatteḥ | ekaṃ hi vijñānaṃ yadyākāradvayaṃ nālambate na
tarhi tayorvirodhasiddhiḥ | ālambate cet, tasyaiva tadākāra
dvayākāratvādaviruddhamekasyobhayākāratvam, tadālambanatāyāstadā
kāratvānatirekāditi | kadāpi na syāditi | tathā caikatra
sādhanavattvādyagrahānnānumānādi-vārtteti ||
saṃyogavyavasthāpanenaiva ṣaṭkena yugapadyogāt digdeśa
bhedācchāyāvṛttibhyāmityādayo nirastāḥ |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | paramāṇau bauddhairyadbādhakamupanyastaṃ taddvaṣayitu
mupanyasyati | saṃyogeti |
“ṣaṭkena yugapadyogāt paramāṇoḥ ṣaḍaṃśatā |
digdeśabhedataśchāyāvṛttibhyāṃ cāpi sāṃśatā ||”
iti | bauddhakārikārthastu ekasya paramāṇordikcatuṣṭayavarttina
ścatvāraḥ paramāṇava uparyadhaśca dvau paramāṇū, tadevaṃ ṣaṭkena yugapat
ekakālaṃ yogāt ṣaḍavayavāḥ paramāṇoḥ prāptāḥ, na hi yadavacchede
naikaparamāṇusaṃyogastadavacchedenaivāparaparamāṇusaṃyogo mūrttānāṃ samāna
deśatāvirodhāt | kiṃ ca prācyaḥ paramāṇuḥ pratīcyaḥ paramāṇu
riti vyapadeśosti | sa ca sāvayavānāmeva dṛṣṭaḥ | kiṃ ca para
māṇunā cchāyā'vaśyaṃ jananīyā, kiṃ cāvaraṇaṃ jananīyam | tadubhayaṃ
sāvayavānāmeva dṛṣṭamataḥ paramāṇuḥ sāvayava iti siddham |
tadetadanupapannam, saṃyogastattaddigavacchedena, na tu paramāṇva
vacchedena, pramāṇābhāvāt, avyāpyavṛttitāpi tattaddigavacchinnātya
ntābhāvasāmānādhikaraṇyādeva digdeśabhedopyetaddigvarttitādhīnaḥ,
na tu sāvayavatvādhīnaḥ, chāyājanakatvamāvarakatvaṃ ca mūrttatvaprayuktaṃ, na
tu sāvayavatvaprayuktam, vastutastūbhayatra pramāṇābhāva eveti bhāvaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº |
ṣaṭkena yugapadyogāt paramāṇoḥ ṣaḍaṃśatā |
digdeśabhedācchāyāvṛttibhyāṃ cāpi sāṃśatā ||
iti bauddhakārikā | tasyā ayamāśayaḥ | ekaḥ paramāṇu
ruparyadhaścaturdikkrameṇa ṣaḍbhiḥ paramāṇubhirekadā saṃyujyate, tataḥ
paramāṇoḥ ṣaḍaṃśatā sādhyā ghaṭādivat | tathā digdeśabhedā
nmūrttatvena cchāyājanakatvādāvarakatvācca sādhyeti, tadetannirasyati |
saṃyogeti | buddhivat svarūpeṇaivaikasyānekasaṃsargavyavasthāpanenetyarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | sthūladravyāntaravarttinaḥ paramāṇoruparyadhaḥ prācyādi
dikcatuṣṭaye ca paramāṇuṣaṭkasaṃyogātṣaḍaṃśatā, aṃśabhedaṃ vinā
yugapadekatrānekamūrttasaṃyogāsambhavāt, tathā prācyaḥ paramāṇurityādi
vyapadeśasya mūrttatvāt siddhayośca cchāyāvaraṇayoḥ sāvayavatvaṃ
vinā'nupapattestasya sāvayavatvam, bhavatāṃ niravayave vihāyasi
sāmānye ca tadabhāvāt | taduktam |
‘ṣaṭkena yugapadyogātparamāṇoḥ ṣaḍaṃśatā |
digdeśabhedataścchāyāvṛttibhyāṃ cāsya sāṃśatā’ ||
iti | tadetannirasyati | saṃyogeti | svarūpanibandhanaṃ
saṃyogitvaṃ nāṃśamapekṣate, yugapadanekamūrtasaṃyogitvaṃ cānekadigava-
cchedenāviruddham, prācyādivyapadeśopi pratīcyādyasaṃyogitve sati
prācyādisaṃyogitvāt, sāvayave ca 1dīrghapiṇḍādau madhyavarttina
mapekṣya prācyādivyavahāravirahāt | chāyā ca yadi prāmāṇikī
tadā tejogatipratibandhakasaṃyogabhedāt | etenāvaraṇaṃ vyākhyātam ||
paramāṇusiddhyasiddhibhyāmeva mūrttatvādayo niravakā
śitāḥ |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | nanu paramāṇavaḥ sāvayavāḥ mūrttatvādavayavatvā
drūpavattvāt sparśavattvādityādau ko doṣa ityata āha |
paramāṇviti | na tvāropa evetyarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | nanu mūrttatvasparśavattvādinā paramāṇoḥ sāṃśatā
syādityata āha | paramāṇviti | paramāṇorasiddhyā āśrayā
siddhiḥ, siddhau ca lāghavādavayavānavasthārūpapratikūlatarkācca sa
niravayava eva siddha iti dharmigrāhakamānabādha ityarthaḥ |
yadyapi vyāpyatvāsiddhirapyatra, tathāpyayogavyavaccheda evakārārthaḥ |
atyantodbhaṭāparādhatvācca virodha evodbhāvitaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | paramāṇviti | lāghavādanavasthāprasaṅgācca nira
vayavasya paramāṇoḥ 2siddhyā dharmigrāhakamānabādhaḥ, asiddhau
dīrghadaṇḍādau iti 2 puº pāº |
siddhau iti 2 puº pāº |
cāśrayāsiddhiḥ | evakāreṇa dūṣaṇāntarāpekṣāvirahaḥ sūcitaḥ |
ādipadāt sparśavattvādiparigrahaḥ || ākāśavyatibhedādayastvasambhāvitā eva |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | nanvākāśaṃ paramāṇumadhye varttate na vā |
ādye sāvayavatvaṃ paramāṇoḥ siddham | antye cākāśasya sarva
gatatvamasiddhamata āha | ākāśeti | madhyābhāvādeva tadanupapatti
rityarthaḥ | ādipadādgatimattvādayaḥ saṅgṛhītāḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | nanvākāśasya sarvagatatvena paramāṇorapyantarā
kāśena sambandho bhaviṣyati, tataḥ sāvayavatvaṃ syādityata āha |
ākāśeti | paramāṇvabhyantare ākāśena sambandho vyatibhedaḥ, para
māṇorabhyantarābhāvādeva na tatrākāśasambandha ityarthaḥ | anenādi
padagrāhyamuktam ||
raghuº ṭīº | ākāśena paramāṇorvyatibhedo'bhyantare saṃyogo
'bhyantarābhāvādevāsambhavī, sarvagatatvaṃ tu vibhūnāṃ sarvamūrttasaṃyogitā
mātram ||
sarvatra cātra hetudaśāyāṃ pratijñāpadayorvyāghātaḥ,
kālātyayāpadeśaśca | prasaṅgadaśāyāmāśrayāsiddhi
rvyāptyasiddhiśca, dṛṣṭāntāsiddheḥ, anavasthālakṣaṇavipa-
rītatarkasya tadupaṣṭambhakatayā truṭerameyatvaprasaṅgasya ca
vidyamānatvāt |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | sarvatreti | niravayavadravyatvaṃ paramāṇutvam,
tacca sāvayavatvena vyāhatam | dharmigrāhakamānabādhamāha | kāleti |
nanu yadi paramāṇurniravayavaḥ syāt mūrtto na syāt, ṣaṭkena
yugapadyukto na syāt, āvarako na syādityādau kiṃ dūṣaṇamata
āha | prasaṅgeti | kuto vyāptyasiddhirata āha | dṛṣṭānteti |
paramāṇunivṛttau sarvavilopasya tvayaivoktatvenānvayino vyatirekiṇo
vā dṛṣṭāntasyāsiddheḥ kutra vyāptigraha ityarthaḥ | yadvā mūrttaścāsau
tasmānna niravayava ityupasaṃhārasthānasya dṛṣṭāntasyābhāvādviparyayā
paryavasānamavayavinastvayā'nabhyupagamāditi hṛdyam | paramāṇvavayava
kalpanāyāmanavasthā, anantāvayavārabdhatvena merusarṣapayostulyapari
māṇatvāpattiścetyāha | anavastheti | truṭistrasareṇuḥ, tasyāmeyatvaṃ
paridṛśyamānaparimāṇarahitatvaṃ tadadhikaparimāṇavattvaṃ vā tadavayava
syāpi mahattvaṃ tadavayavasya pratyakṣatvaṃ vā anantāvayavārabdhatvena
meruparimāṇatulyaparimāṇavattvaṃ vā''pādyam ||
bhagīº ṭīº | sarvatreti | hetau paramāṇuḥ sāvayava iti
pratijñāpadayorvyāghātaḥ, paramāṇupadasya niravayavavācakatvādityarthaḥ |
dṛṣṭānteti | rūpādīnāmapi paraiḥ paramāṇutvāṅgīkārāt |
pakṣatvamiti | mūrttatvamasiddhavyāptikam | yadvā sāvayavatvāsiddhau
sādhyavyatirekāsiddheranvayavyatirekitvaṃ na mūrttatvasya, bauddhairanvaya-
vyatirekiṇa eva gamakatvābhyupagamādityarthaḥ | na ca buddhireva
dṛṣṭāntaḥ, asatkhyātinayānusārādbuddhāveva niravayavatvasiddhiśca
syāditi vācyam | ādye buddhermūrttatvābhāvena sādhanavikalatvāt |
antye pratītyanādare tu pratyakṣabādha eveti bhāvaḥ | anavastheti |
mūrttatvāt paramāṇvavayavādīnāṃ sarveṣāṃ sāvayavatvasiddherityarthaḥ |
truṭeriti | tryaṇukāvayavo yadyavayavaparamparārabhyaḥ syāt pratyakṣaḥ
syādityameyatvāpādanārthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | niravayavasyāṇoḥ paramāṇuśabdārthatvāt para
māṇuḥ sāvayava iti pratijñāpadayorvyāghātaḥ | prasaṅgeti | nira
vayavatvena mūrttatvādyabhāvaprasañjane āśrayāsiddhiḥ, vijñānavādināṃ
bāhyāsiddhervyāptyasiddhiḥ, sāvayavatvasya kvacidapyaprasiddhyā tadabhāvasyā
pyaprasiddhāvanvayato vyatirekataśca dṛṣṭāntābhāvāt | avayavaparamparāyā
ānantye avayavānāmapi mahattaratamabhāvāttadārabdhasya trasareṇorapa
kṛṣṭatamaṃ mahattvaṃ na syāt, syāttu prakṛṣṭatamamiti ||
na ca pralayaḥ, paramāṇoḥ, asattvasādhakasya
pramāṇasyābhāvāt, sāvayavatvāpādakānāṃ ca hetū
nāmanavasthotthāpakatvāditi | tadanya evāyaṃ paramāṇū
raktabījo yasya 1bhāgā yukticāmuṇḍodaramapi bhitvā
niṣpatantīti |
bhedā iti 2 puº pāº |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | nanu paramāṇorapi vināśa evāstu, tathāpi
tvadabhyupagatahānirityata āha | na ceti | asattvasādhakasya dhvaṃsa
sādhakasya samavāyyasamavāyināśarūpasya pramāṇasyābhāvādityarthaḥ |
nanu paramāṇoḥ sāvayavatvādeva tadvināśakau svīkriyetāmata
āha | sāvayavatvādeveti | tadanya eveti | paramāṇoḥ sāva
yavatvasādhikā yuktireva cāmuṇḍā, tathā ca yathā yathā
tadavayavasādhanaṃ tathā tathā paramāṇusiddhirityarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | nāpi mūrttatvāt paramāṇordhvaṃsaḥ syādityāha |
