na ceti | dravyanāśakasya samavāyyasamavāyināśasya paramāṇāva
sambhavādityarthaḥ | nanu paramāṇoḥ sāvayavatvena tatra tau sambhaviṣyata
ityata āha | sāvayavatveti | tadanya eveti | yayā yuktyā
paramāṇoravayavaḥ kalpyaḥ saiva cāmuṇḍā tasyā udaraṃ nāśaka
samavadhānaṃ tasya bhedaḥ paramāṇvavayavasyaiva paramāṇutvāpattirityarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | vināśidravyatvāt paramāṇoḥ sāvayavatvaṃ
sādhyamata āha | na ceti | pralayo'sattvaṃ ca vināśaḥ |
sāvayavatvasādhakatvenopanyastā mūrttatvādaya eva pramāṇamata āha |
sāvayavatveti | samavāyyasamavāyināśaṃ vinā dravyanāśāsambhavā
tsamavāyikalpane cānavasthānānniravayavasyaiva nityasya paramāṇoḥ
siddhiḥ | tadanya eveti | paramāṇoravayavatvena kalpanīyasyaiva
paramāṇutvāpātāt ||
na ca kalpitāśrayāḥ kalpitapratibandhāśca prasaṅgā
bhaviṣyantīti yuktam | (sve)icchākalpitena vyavahāreṇa
sarvavidhiniṣedha1vyavahāravilopaprasaṅgāt | lokavyava
sthāpekṣaṇe tu tadvirodhenottarasya niṣedha(ka)syātmalābhā
bhāvādityasakṛdāveditatvāt |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | nanvasatkhyātyupanītaparamāṇvāśrayā eva prasaṅgāḥ
sāvayavatvasādhakāḥ syurityata āha | na ceti | tathā sati
kimapi na siddhyedityata āha | iccheti | nanu na
vidhiniṣedhavyavahāravilopo yathālokavyavahāraṃ tayoriṣyamāṇatvā
dityata āha | loketi | evaṃ satyavayavisaṃyogādiniṣedhakaṃ
yattatsarvaṃ jātyuttaramataḥ svavyāghātakatvāttasyātmalābha eva
nāstītyarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | iccheti | tathā ca tvadaniṣṭasya vidhistva
diṣṭasya niṣedhaḥ sādhayituṃ śakya ityarthaḥ ||
anyathā sarvametadbuddhāvapi samānam | sāpi hi
ṣaṭkena yugapadyogādibhiḥ sāvayavā prasajyeta | tasyāma
siddhāsta iti cenna | anumānasiddhatvāt | tathāhi
buddhiḥ ṣaṭkena yugapadyoginī mūrttimatī ca, sattvādvyava-
vyavahāravilopa iti 3 pustake nāsti |
harttavyatvādvā, bodhyavaditi śakyate | viparyayasyāpi
dharmigrāhakamānasādhitatvādanavakāśamidamiti cet,
evamanyatrāpi pratisandadhīthā ityeṣā dik |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | anyatheti | yadi jātyuttaramapi pratiṣedhaka
mityarthaḥ | uttarābhāsatvameva darśayati | sāpi hīti | bodhyava
diti | avayavyādivadityarthaḥ | viparyayasyeti | buddhau ṣaṭkayogitva
viparyayasya mūrttimattvaviparyayasya cetyarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | anumānetyupalakṣaṇam | ṣaṭkasamūhālambanāyā
buddheranuvyavasāyasākṣikatvādityapi draṣṭavyam | viparyayasyeti |
niravayavatvasyetyarthaḥ ||
anyastu cakṣuṣī nimīlya nirbhayībhavitumicchannāha,
astu tarhi buddherapi vilopa iti |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | nirbhayībhavitumiti | buddhipratibandyā vṛtti
vikalpādikaṃ pareṇoddhriyate, buddheranabhyupagame mama kuto bhayamityarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | samprati paramāṇvādau vṛttivikalpo buddhi
pratibandyā samādheyaḥ, tarhi tata eva buddhirapi mā bhūditi
mādhyamikamatamutthāpayati | anyastviti | aniṣṭasādhanatājñānā
dbhayaṃ jñānābhāve tu tannāstītyupahāsaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | buddhervilyepa iti | tathā ca na buddhiprati
bandyā 1bodhyabodhakanirākaraṇamiti bhāvaḥ ||
atra tu kiṃ vaktavyaṃ yatra hetvādivyavahāro nāsti |
astu paraṃ sāmvṛta iti cet, bhavedevaṃ yadi samvṛtirapi
paramārthasatī syāt | anyathā tu yathā na vāstavastathā
na sāmvṛtopi | samvṛtirapi samvṛtisatīti cet,
asyā apyasattve na kiñcidadhikamuktam | parasamvṛtestu
paramārthasattvasvīkāre saiva buddhirapariheyeti | satī ca
bādhakavatī ceti samvṛtisatī ceti cet, satyeva yadi
tat kathaṃ bādhakam, tathā cet kathaṃ tadālīḍhasya
sattvamiti |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | hetvādivyavahāra iti | vyavahārasya buddhyadhīna
tvena buddherabhāve hetupakṣadṛṣṭāntādīnāmabhāvādbuddhivilopaḥ kathaṃ sādhya
ityarthaḥ | pāramārthiko hetvādivyavahāro jagataḥ śūnyatāṃ vihanti,
na tu sāmvṛtopītyāha | astviti | sāmvṛtatvamapi satyā samvṛtyā
nirvahenna tvasatyetyāha | bhavediti | parasamvṛteriti | caramā samvṛti
ryadi paramārthasatī tadāpi na śūnyatā tasyā eva buddheḥ sattvāt |
nanu caramāpi buddhiḥ satī, paraṃ tu vivicyamānā sāpi bādhye
tyāha | satī ceti | tadālīḍhasyeti | bādhakākrāntasyetyarthaḥ ||
bodhyabādhaka iti 2 puº pāº |
bhagīº ṭīº | yatreti | tathā ca sādhakābhāvācchūnyatāpi na
siddhyedityarthaḥ | nanu pāramārthikahetvādyabhāvepi jñānaviṣayamātrā
ttasmācchūnyatā siddhyedityāha | astviti | samvṛtirapi satī na
vā | ādye kva śūnyatā, samvṛtereva buddhirūpāyāḥ sattvāt | antye
tu kva sāmvṛtopi hetvādirityāha | bhavedevamiti | nanu samvṛtirna
svarūpasatī kintu samvṛttyantarasatītyāha | samvṛtirapīti |
samvṛtyantarasyāpi sadasattvayoḥ pūrvadoṣānivṛttirityāha | tasyā
iti | dvitīyasamvṛterityarthaḥ | tasyā api sāmvṛtatve'navasthāyā
mantimabuddherasāmvṛtatve tadviṣayasya siddheravaśyaṃ tatsattvamaṅgīkārya
mityāha | pareti ||
raghuº ṭīº | tathā sāmvṛtopi | samvṛterasattve sāmvṛtatvā
nupapatteḥ | asyāḥ dvitīyasamvṛteḥ | tasyā api samvṛtyantaramevaṃ
tasyā apīti cet tatrāha | pareti | anavasthita eva samvṛti
santāna iti cet, kasyāścit samvṛteḥ sattvābhyupagame kathaṃ sarvaśūnyatā |
anyathā tu kathaṃ hetvādivyavasthā | api ca samvṛtiviṣayatvaṃ samvṛti
rūpasattāśālitvaṃ samvṛtiviṣayasattākatvaṃ samvṛtijanyavyavahāra
viṣayatvaṃ vā, yatkiñcitsamvṛtatvamabhidhīyate, tadyadi vāstavamupeyate
tadā kva nāma sarvaśūnyatā, no cedantareṇa hetvādikaṃ śūnyataiva kathaṃ
siddhyet, tathātve vā kimaparāddhaṃ pūrṇatayeti dik ||
dṛśyate tāvadevamiti cet, sattvaikārthasamavāyino
bādhakatvameva tarhi heyam | bādhakaikārthasamavāyinaḥ
sattvameva kinna hīyata iti cenna | bādhakasyāpi
tyāgaprasaṅgāt | ubhayamapyavarjanīyameva tarhi | eva
metat | mitho virodhastu heyaḥ | na hi viruddhayo
rekārthasamavāyastathābhūtayorvā virodhaḥ śakya upapāda
yitumṛte svasamayāt, na ca vicārāvasare svasamayā
vatāra iti | yathā yathā ca buddhinivāraṇāya yatna
stathā tathojvalaḥ prakāśaḥ, tannivāraṇamapi boddhavya
meveti | tadetadāyātaṃ pradīpāntareṇa pradīpaṃ nirvāpya
timirāpādanamiti |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | dṛśyata iti | āpātato yatra bādhakaṃ
nodeti tadapi sattvena vyavahriyata ityarthaḥ | yadi sattvaṃ tadā
krameṇāpi sphuradbādhakaṃ bādhakābhāsamevetyāha | sattvaikārtheti |
vaiparītyameva kinna syādityata āha | bādhakaikārtheti |
bādhaketi | sarvasattvatyāge bādhakasattāpi na bhavedityāyātā
pūrṇatetyarthaḥ | ubhayamapīti | sattvaṃ bādhakavattvaṃ cetyarthaḥ | mitho
virodha iti | asamāveśo heya ityarthaḥ | samayaḥ paribhāṣā |
nanvasmatparibhāṣayaiva sattvabādhakavattvayoḥ samāveśaḥ syādityata āha |
na hīti | buddhinirākaraṇasyāpi boddhavyatayā kathaṃ buddhinirāsa
ityarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | nanu sattvāsattvayorubhayatrāpi bādhakādanya
taradavadhārayituṃ na śakyamityāha | dṛśyata iti | mitho viruddhayoḥ
sattvabādhakayorekatrāsambhavādanyataradavaśyaṃ heyam, tadyadi bādhakameva
heyam, tadā sattvameva paryavasyatītyāha | sattvaiketi | vinigamakā
bhāvāt sattvameva hātavyamityāha | bādhaketi | tarhi bādhakaṃ
sadasadvā | ādye kva śūnyatā, antye kva tadadhīnamasattvamityāha |
bādhakasyeti | yadyekārthasamavāyitvaṃ bādhakasattvayostadā na virodhaḥ,
tathābhūtasya ca bādhaketi nāma paribhāṣitaṃ syādityāha | tathā
bhūtayoriti | ajñāyamānanna buddhinivāraṇamiti tannivāraka
mapi boddhavyameveti tannirāso'śakya evetyāha | yatheti ||
raghuº ṭīº | dṛśyata iti | sattvabādhakavattvayorubhayorapi
darśanānnaikatarāvadhāraṇamiti bhāvaḥ | bādhakasyāpīti | tasya sattve
śūnyatvāyogāt, asattve tu na tadbalādanyāsattvasiddhiriti bhāvaḥ |
nirākaraṇasyāsattvena jñānasya jñāpanasya vā bādhakajñānādhīnatvāt
jñānarūpatvāt jñānaghaṭitamūrtikatvādvā nirākaraṇaṃ na śakya
mityāha | yathāyatheti ||
etena hetuphalabhāvānupapatteḥ sarvavilopa iti
nirastam | tannirākaraṇaprayāsasya sāphalyavaiphalyābhyāṃ
tannirākaraṇānupapatteḥ, satkāryadūṣaṇasyeṣṭatvāt, asa-
tkāryadūṣaṇasya ca pratyakṣabādhitatvāt, tatprati
pādabasyāsata evotpattāvanaikāntikatvāt sattve vā
prayāsavai1phalyāditi |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | eteneti | buddhinirākaraṇavyavasthāpanenetyarthaḥ |
hetuphalabhāve satyavayavinaḥ kāryatvasya tanmūlakāraṇaparamāṇośca
siddhiḥ syāt, sa eva tu nāsti, evaṃ ca kāraṇādhīno
tpattikā buddhirapi nāstīti sarvavilopa ityarthaḥ | tannirā
karaṇeti | hetuphalabhāvanirākaraṇaṃ yadi saphalaṃ tadā siddha eva
hetuphalabhāvaḥ, atha niṣphalaṃ tadā tannirākaraṇaprayāso viphala
evetyarthaḥ | nanu sata eva ghaṭādernotpattiḥ sattvādeveti yadi
hetuphalabhāvo dūṣyate tadā'smadabhimatameva, athāsannapi ghaṭādi
rnotpadyate, asattvāviśeṣeṇa ghaṭa eva daṇḍāderutpadyate na tu paṭa
iti tanniyamānupapattiriti hetuphalabhāvaṃ dūṣayasi, tadā
pratyakṣabādhaḥ, na hi ghaṭotpatteḥ pūrvaṃ kenāpi ghaṭa upalabhyate,
niyamastu kāraṇasvābhāvyādhīno na niyoktuṃ paryanuyoktumarha
tītyarthaḥ | kiñca ghaṭo notpadyate 'sattvāditi dūṣaṇapratipādane
hetuphalabhāvanirākaraṇapratipādane cānaikāntikamityāha | tatprati
pādanasyeti | yadi ca tatpratipādanamapi pūrvaṃ sadeva tadā tadarthaṃ
tavāyaṃ prayāso viphala ityarthaḥ ||
vaiyarthyāditi 3 puº pāº |
bhagīº ṭīº | nanu hetuphalabhāvānupapattyā jñānaṃ na
sattadasattve ca tadadhīnasiddhikamapi neti nityānityābhāve śūnyatā
syādityata āha | eteneti | nanu sanna kāryaṃ sattvāt, asannapi
(na) kāryamatiprasaṅgādityatrāha | satkāryeti ||
raghuº ṭīº | syādetat | jñānaṃ jñeyaṃ vā ghaṭādikaṃ
kāraṇajanyamajanyaṃ vā, ajanyatve kādācitkatvānupapattiḥ, janyatvaṃ
cedasato janyatve'tiprasaṅgaḥ, sataśca janyatve sattvāviśeṣājjanyajanaka
bhāvaniyamānupapattiḥ, na ca janyatvājanyatvābhyāmanyaḥprakāraḥ sambhavatī
tyavayaviprabhṛteranityavargasya vilayaḥ, vilīne ca tasmiṃstadadhīna
siddhīnāṃ paramāṇvādīnāṃ nityānāmapi vilaya iti sarvavilopa
iti, tadetanmataṃ nirasyati | eteneti | bādhyabādhakabādhādi
jñānānāmavaśyopeyatvenāsato janyatve svabhāvaniyamānnātiprasaṅga
iti bhāvaḥ ||
syādetat | mā bhūvannetāni 1dūṣaṇānyavayavini,
anupalambhastu syāt, na hi paramāṇusañcayādaparaṃ
kiñcidupalabhyata iti cet, vailakṣyavi2ṣṭambhikeyam,
sthūlaikānubhavasya sarvajanasiddhatvāt |
bādhakānyavayavini iti 1 puº pāº |
vijṛmbhikeyamiti 1 puº pāº |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | vailakṣyeti | parājayena lajjitasya tava
jṛmbhaṇamityarthaḥ | idamekaṃ sthūlamityananyathāsiddhena pratyakṣeṇaivā
vayavina upalambhāt kvānupalambha ityāha | sthūlaiketi ||
bhagīº ṭīº | sthūlaiketi | ekasya paramāṇorasthūlatvāttāva
ddeśāvyāpakatvāttāvaddeśavyāpakānāṃ ca paramāṇūnāmanekatvādekaḥ sthūla
iti bādharahitaṃ pratyakṣamavayavini mānamityarthaḥ ||
vikalpamātraṃ taditi cenna | spaṣṭapratibhāsatvāt |
aupādhikamasya spaṣṭatvamiti cet, tathābhūtānubhavamanta
reṇopādherapyabhāvāt | anyathā nīlādivikalpānā
mapi tathaiva spaṣṭatvopapattau sarvapratyakṣocchedaprasaṅgāt,
gṛhītaniścita evārthe 1pratyakṣaprāmāṇyāt, niścayo
paplave tasyāpyupaplavāditi |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | vikalpamātramiti | savikalpakaṃ tat, tanna
pramāṇam, nirvikalpakaṃ ca tathā nāstītyarthaḥ | spaṣṭeti | sākṣā
tkāritvādityarthaḥ | aupādhikamiti | ato na ta(tta)dadhīnā
vastuvyavasthitirityarthaḥ | tatropādhirapi nirvikalpakameva, tathā ca
siddhaṃ tatprāmāṇyamityāha | tathābhūteti | anubhavo nirvikalpakam |
vipakṣe daṇḍamāha | anyatheti | gṛhītaniścite nirvikalpaka-
pratyakṣasya iti 1 puº pāº |
savikalpakaviṣaye | tasyāpīti | 1nirvikalpakasyāpītyarthaḥ |
niścayamātrapramāṇakatvāttasyeti bhāvaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | vikalpamātramiti | mātrapadenārthasattvaṃ
nivārayati | spaṣṭeti | sākṣātkāritvena tadanubhavāttasya
nirvikalpakatayā mānatvādityarthaḥ | aupādhikamiti | tatra
vikalpe nirvikalpakadharmaḥ sākṣāttvamanubhūyata ityarthaḥ | kimava
yaviviṣayakasyaiva tathātvamupādhiranyaviṣayakasya vā | ādye'nubhava
viṣayatayā'vayavī prāmāṇika evetyāha | tathāvidheti | antye
nīlādivikalpeṣvapi na samāśvāsa ityāha | anyatheti | grahaṇaṃ
nirvikalpakam | tasyāpīti | nirvikalpasyāpītyarthaḥ | tatprā
māṇyopapādakasavikalpakasyopaplavāditi bhāvaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | vikalpeti | tat ekaḥ sthūla iti jñānaṃ
nānubhavo'pi tu vikalpaḥ sa ca na pramāṇamityarthaḥ | mātraśabdena
viṣayasattvaṃ vyāvarttayatīti tu kaścit | spaṣṭatvaṃ sākṣāttvam | aupā
dhikamanubhavaupādhikam | asya sthūlaikavikalpasya samānākāro'nubhava
upādhirbhinnākāro vā | ādye tathābhūteti | tathābhūtaṃ samānā
kāramanubhavaṃ nirvikalpakam, tadabhyupagame tu tata eva sthūlaikasiddhi
riti bhāvaḥ | dvitīye anyatheti | grahaṇaṃ nirvikalpakam | niścayo
savikalpeti 2 puº pāº |
vikalpaḥ | niścayasyopaplave paramparayāpi viṣayānadhīnatve | tasya
nirvikalpakasya upaplavānniyataviṣayatvāsiddheḥ ||
na ca paramāṇava eva sthūlāḥ, tattvavyāghātāt |
na ca tatsamudāyastathā, tasya samuditasthānasya tvayā'na
bhyupagamāt, abhyupagame vā'vayavinā kimaparāddham |
na ca samuditā eva tathā pratibhāsitumarhanti, teṣāṃ1
pratyekamasthūlatvāt | na ca nānādigdeśavyāpitaiva
sthaulyam, paramāṇuṣu pratyekamasambhavāt | na ca nānā
tvaikārthasamavāyinyeva sā sthaulyamiti sāmpratam,
sthūla eka iti pratyayaniyamāt |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | tattvavyāghātāt paramāṇutvavyāghātādityarthaḥ |
abhyupagama iti | samudāyasyaiva vyāsajyavṛttitābhyupagamādityarthaḥ |
samuditā eveti | paramāṇava ityarthaḥ | nanu sthaulyaṃ na pari
māṇaviśeṣaḥ, kintu paramāṇūnāmeva nānādigdeśavyāpitā saiva
sthaulyamityata āha | na ceti | sāpi pratyekaṃ paramāṇūnāṃ na
sambhavatītyarthaḥ | seti | nānādigdeśavyāpitetyarthaḥ | sthūla
iti | tathā satyekatvasāmānādhikaraṇyānupapattirityarthaḥ ||
teṣāmasthūlatvāditi 1 puº pāº |
bhagīº ṭīº | tathā sthūla ityarthaḥ | samudāyaḥ samudāyi
bhinno na vā | ādye tasyeti | samudāyasya anekavṛtterekasya
tvayā'naṅgīkārāt, aṅgīkāre vā sa evāvayavītyarthaḥ | antye na
ceti | paramāṇūnāṃ pratyekamiva samudāyasyāpyasthūlatvādityarthaḥ |
nanvanyonyasambandhe sati paramāṇūnāmeva tāvaddeśavyāpitā sthaulyaṃ
syādityāha | na ceti | paramāṇūnāṃ pratyekaṃ tasyāpyasambhavaḥ,
bhinnānāṃ ca naikatvamityekaḥ sthūla iti pratyakṣametāvatāpi nopa
pāditaṃ pratyuta nānā sthūla iti dhīḥ syādityarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | tathā sthūlaḥ | tasya samudāyasya | samudita
sthānasya samuditāḥ sthānamāśrayo yasya tasya | samuditāḥ paramā
ṇava eva | tathā sthūlatvena | na ca nirantarāṇāṃ paramāṇūnāṃ
nānādigdeśavyāpitaiva sthaulyamiti | sā nānādigdeśavyāpitā ||
na ca bhāgeṣṭhevāropitenaikatvenedamupapattimat, tada
sambhavāt | na hi karacaraṇacibukanāsikādipara
māṇūnāmaikyaṃ kaścit 1kvacidāropayati | na ca2
teṣu bhedena prathamāneṣu na sthūlapratyayaḥ | na ca tattve
3sphuratyeva tadviparītātattvasamāropasambhavaḥ |
kaścidāropayet iti 1 puº pāº |
na ca teṣvabhedena prathamāneṣu sthūlapratyayaḥ iti 2 puº pāº |
parisphuratyeva iti 1 puº pāº |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | bhāgeṣu paramāṇuṣu | idamiti | ekatva
sāmānādhikaraṇyamityarthaḥ | avayaveṣu bhinnatayā'nubhūyamāneṣveka
tvāropo na sambhavatītyāha | na hīti | nanu yadi tatra naikatvā
ropastadā sthūlapratyayopi na tatretyata āha | na ceti | nanu
karacaraṇādīnāmanekatvena jñānepyekatvamāropyatāṃ ko doṣa ityata
āha | na ceti ||
raghuº ṭīº | bhāgeṣu paramāṇuṣu | idaṃ sthūla eka iti
pratibhānam ||
api caivamekaparamāṇvātmanā paramāṇukoṭirapyā
ropitā paramāṇumātratayaiva parisphuret, na sthūlatayā |
na ca nānādigdeśavyāpitvasyaiṣa mahimeti sāmpratam,
virodhāt | yadi hi nānādikkāḥ paramāṇavo deśa
tayā'vabhāseran naikatayā deśitayā cāropyeran, tathā
ca kasya nānādigdeśavyāpitā, deśino'parisphūrtteḥ |
atha tathātvenāropyeran ? na nānātvena deśatvena
vā'vabhāseran, tathā ca kasya nānādigdeśavyāpitā,
1deśino'parisphūrtteḥ | tasmādekatvārope 2paramāṇu
mātrāvabhāsa eva syāditi |
deśānāmapari iti 2 puº pāº |
paramāṇumātratvāvabhāsa iti 2 puº pāº |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | kiñcānyatrānanubhūtaṃ sthaulyaṃ paramāṇuṣu katha
māropyatāmityata āha | api ceti | nanūktaṃ sthaulyaṃ na pari
māṇabhedo'pi tu nānādigdeśavyāpitaiva tadityata āha | na
ceti | eṣa mahimeti | sthaulyapratītiviṣayatvamahimetyarthaḥ |
virodhameva sphuṭayati | yadi hīti | paramāṇūnāmādhāratayā
sphuraṇe sati nādheyatayā sphuraṇam | ādheyatayaiva sphuraṇe nādhāratayā
sphuraṇaṃ syāt, tathā caikatvaṃ sthaulyaṃ ca kutrāropyeta, āropa
viṣayānupasthiterityarthaḥ | paramāṇumātratāvabhāsa eva syānna tu
sthaulyāvabhāsa iti śeṣaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | nanu nānādigdeśasambandhamāhātmyādekātmatayā
sphuraṇe sthūlātmatayā sphuraṇaṃ syādityata āha | na ceti | ekatva
nānātvayorvirodhānnāropa ityarthaḥ | virodhaṃ sphuṭayati | yadi
hīti | paramāṇusamūho yadyāropaviṣayastadā nāropyasyaikatvasyopa
sthitiratha nānādigdeśavyāpitvamāropyaṃ tadāropaviṣayajñānaṃ
nāstītyubhayathāpyāropānupapattirityarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | eṣa mahimā yat paramāṇutvenāsphuraṇaṃ sphuraṇaṃ
ca sthūlatveneti | virodhameva vivṛṇoti | yadi hīti | ayamarthaḥ |
nānādigdeśavyāpitvameva sthaulyaṃ parimāṇabhedo vā | nādyaḥ,
digdeśā hi bhavatāṃ paramāṇava eva, te yadi nānātvena deśatvena
ca gṛhyante, na tarhi teṣvekatvasya deśitvasya vā''ropo, na cānyasya
deśino grahaṇamastīti kasya nānādigdeśavyāpitā pratyāyyā,
atha te ekatvena deśitvena cāropyante, na tarhi teṣāṃ nānātvena
deśatvena ca grahaṇam, na cānyeṣāṃ deśānāṃ grahaṇamastīti kathaṃ
nānādigdeśavyāpitā pratīyatām | na ca ghaṭādiparamāṇavo
deśino deśāśca bhūtalādiparamāṇava iti vācyam | bhūtalādāva
pyekatvasthūlatvapratyayāt | na ca deśadeśibhāvāpannānantaparamāṇu
samūha1santānaḥ pratyayagocara iti, deśāntarāgrahaṇepi cāndhakāre
karaparāmarśenaikaḥ sthūlo ghaṭa iti pratyayāt | dvitīye tvekaikaparamāṇau
tadasambhavena siddhastadāśrayo'vayavī | paramāṇuṣu vyāsajyavṛttestasyā
bhyupagame tu kimaparāddhamavayavinā | etau dvau ghaṭau saṃyuktā
vitivadete paramāṇavaḥ sthūlā iti pratyayaprasaṅgaśca ||
evaṃ tarhyanārabdhadravyarāśiṣu kā vārtteti cet, na
2tāvaddeśavyāptisāmyena tāvatparimāṇadravya3tvāropaḥ |
na cehāpi tathā syāt, anyatrāpyasiddheḥ | na cāsanne
vaikaḥ sthūlaḥ parisphurati, bādhakānāmapāstatvāt |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | evaṃ tarhīti | yadyanekeṣu na sthaulyāropa
ityarthaḥ | tāvaddeśeti | anyatra pratītasya sthaulyasya pratyakṣe sambhava
tyāropo na tat tvatpakṣa ityarthaḥ | ihāpīti | tvatpakṣepītyarthaḥ |
samūhaparamparā pra iti 1 puº pāº |
tāvaddeśavyāpitvasāmyena iti 2 puº pāº |
dravyavattvāropa iti 2 puº pāº |
nanvasatkhyātyupanītamekatva sthaulyaṃ ca bhāsatāmata āha | na
ceti | bādhakānāmiti | avayavini bādhakānāṃ raktārakta
virodhānāmapāstatvādityarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | kā vārttā, ekaḥ sthūla ityanubhavasyeti śeṣaḥ |
ihāpi paramāṇuṣvapītyarthaḥ | tathā syāt | ekasthūladravyāropaḥ
syādityarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | evaṃ tarhīti | yadyanekeṣu naikatvasthūlattvāropa
stadetyarthaḥ | tāvaditi | ekajanmānanubhūtasyāpi tādṛśadravyasya
janmāntarānubhūtasya daivādivaśāt smaraṇādāropa iti bhāvaḥ |
ihāpi | paramāṇuṣvapi | tathā tāvatparimāṇadravyavattvāropaḥ |
bādhakānāmiti | asatkhyātinirāsāccetyapi draṣṭavyam ||
etena pratibhāsadharmo'pi nirastaḥ | so'pi hyasan
bauddho vāstavo veti trayīṃ gatiṃ nātivarttata iti |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | eteneti | avayavini bādhakanirāsenaive
tyarthaḥ | pratibhāsadharma iti | pratibhāsa evānekadharmagocaraḥ
sthūlākāra utpadyata ityarthaḥ | so'pīti | pratibhāsākāro yadya
san kathaṃ bhāseta, buddhyantarādhīnaścedanavasthā, vāstavaścettadā viṣayasya
tādrūpyamantareṇa tādṛśajñānākārānupapattyā siddhaṃ sthaulyamityarthaḥ |
anyathā nīlādikamapi pratibhāsadharma eva syāditi bhāvaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | pratibhāsadharmaḥ sthaulyaṃ bāhye bhāsata ityapi
nāsti, bāhyavṛttitayā'nubhūyamāne tatra bādhakābhāvādityāha |
eteneti | na caikārthakriyākāritvaupādhikamekatvam, tadajñāne
pyekapratīteḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | vikalpenollikhitaṃ sthaulyādi paramāṇuṣvā
ropyata ityapi bādhakābhāvādinā nirastamityāha | eteneti |
bauddho buddhidharmaḥ | bāstavo bāhyāntaradharmaḥ | bauddhaḥ sāmvṛta
ityanye ||
atīndriyāśca pratyekamaṇavaḥ kathaṃ militā api
dṛśyeran, atīndriyasamūhasyāpyatīndriyatvāt | viśi
ṣṭotpādādaindriyakatvamiti cet, kimadyāpi svapne
hastaṃ prasārayasi |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | pūrvaṃ paramāṇusamūhasya pratyakṣatāmupagamyokta
midānīṃ tadapi nāstītyāha | atīndriyā iti | viśiṣṭo
tpādāditi | indriyagrahaṇayogyotpādādityarthaḥ | viśiṣṭotpāde
kṣaṇabhaṅgo mūlam, sa ca nirākṛta evetyāha | kimadyāpīti ||
bhagīº ṭīº | dūṣaṇāntaramāha | atīndriyāśceti |
nanvamilitānāmapi teṣāmatīndriyatve keṣāñcitsākṣādviṣayībhūyo-
tpādāt pratyakṣatvaṃ syādityāha | viśiṣṭeti | kṣaṇabhaṅgastanmūlam,
sa ca nirasta evetyāha | kimadyāpīti ||
raghuº ṭīº | tathotpādo na vinā kṣaṇabhaṅgam, sa ca prāgeva
nirākṛta ityāha | kimadyāpīti ||
astu vaivam, tathāpi kṣaṇabhedājjātibhedo nirā
kṛtaḥ, jātisaṅkaraprasaṅgāt | 1tadabhedena tūtpāde'pi
tadvā tādṛgveti tattvadṛśā na kaścidviśeṣaḥ |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | tathā cotpādamaṅgīkṛtyāha | astu veti |
aindriyakatvāvacchedikā paramāṇuṣu kurvadrūpatvaṃ jātistāvannāsti,
jātisaṅkarāpādanena pūrvameva nirākaraṇāt, jātyabhede tu ya eva
paramāṇavaḥ pūrvamatīndriyā āsan ta evāgre aindriyakāḥ syurantye
vā na kaścidviśeṣaḥ, tathā ca sañcitānāmapyatīndriyatvamasañcitānā
mapi kvacidaindriyakatvamityaniyamaḥ syāditi bhāvaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | kṣaṇabhaṅgepi paramāṇusamūhasyātīndriyatvā
dviśiṣṭasya kurvadrūpatvajātimataḥ kimutpādaḥ, atathābhūtasya vā,
ādyastajjātinirāsādeva nirasto'ntye tadvā tādṛgveti nyāyā
ttasyāpyatīndriyatvameveti na viśeṣa ityāha | tathāpīti ||
tadabhede'pi tattvadṛśā na kaścidviśeṣa iti 2 puº pāº |
raghuº ṭīº | kṣaṇabhaṅgepi hi viśiṣṭasyājanakādvyāvṛttasyotpādo
vaktavyaḥ, vyāvṛttiśca jātibhedarūpo jātisaṅkaraprasaṅgādevāsambhavī,
vyaktibhedarūpastu nānugatakāryaprayojaka ityāha | astu veti ||
bhavatu vā jātiviśeṣopi, tathāpi sthūlatvamevai
ndriyakatvaṃ prati 1prayojakaṃ mantavyam | anyathā sthūla
tāmanāpnuvanneko'pi paramāṇuḥ kadāpi tathotpannaḥ pratya
kṣatāmiyāt | niyamena tu tadviparītasya pratyakṣatā
2tathāvidhasyāpratyakṣatāyāmeva viśrāmyati, anvaya
vyatireka3phalatvāddhetuphalabhāvasya |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | nanu vaijātyameva tathotpādaprayojakamiti
kuto'yamaniyama ityata āha | bhavatu veti | anvayavyatirekābhyāṃ
sthaulyasya parimāṇaviśeṣasya pratyakṣajñānakāraṇatvāvadhāraṇāditi
sañcitānāmapi kvacitpratyakṣatvaṃ na syādityarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | satyapi jātiviśeṣe anvayavyatirekābhyāṃ
sthaulyameva tantram, tacca na paramāṇuṣu pratyekaṃ militeṣu veti kathaṃ
pratyakṣatvamityāha | bhavatu veti | anvayavyatirekāvevāha | anya
theti | yadi kurvadrūpatvameva tatprayojakamityarthaḥ ||
prayojakamāstheyam iti 1 puº pāº |
tathāvidhasya pratyakṣatāmiti 1 puº pāº |
anvayavyatirekagamyatvāddhetuphalabhāvasyeti 1 puº pāº |
raghuº ṭīº | jātiviśeṣābhyupagame'pyanvayavyatirekābhyāṃ sthaulya
meva pratyakṣaprayojakamityāha | bhavatu veti | sthūlatvaṃ mahattvam ||
na ca sañcitā api sthūlatayotpannāḥ | na ca
bahutvameva sthaulyaṃ tadviparyaya eva sūkṣmatā, vitatadeśā
nāmapi pratyakṣatvaprasaṅgāt | nairantaryamapi vivakṣita
miti cenna | tasya prakṛte'pyasambhavāt, rūpaparamāṇūnāṃ
rasādiparamāṇubhirantaritatvāt | na cāropyate naiṃra
ntaryam, itaretarāśrayaprasaṅgāt, nairantaryārope teṣāṃ
sthūlānāṃ grahaṇaṃ tadgrahaṇe ca sati nairantaryāropa iti |
tasmādaindriyakatve sthūlatāyāḥ prayojakatvāt aprayoja
katve vitatadeśānāmapi pratyakṣatvaprasaṅgāt teṣāṃ ca
pratyekamasthūlatvādatīndriyā eva paramāṇavaḥ, tathā ca
sarvāgrahaṇamavayavyasiddheriti |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | nairantaryamapīti | nirantarā bahavaḥ paramāṇava
eva sthūlapratyayaviṣayā ityarthaḥ | rūpeti | tvanmate rūparasagandha
sparśaparamāṇubhirantaritāḥ pṛthivyaptejovāyuparamāṇava eva ekaṃ dravya
mevāṣṭadravyako'ṇavaḥ śabda iti siddhāntādityarthaḥ | nanu paramāṇuṣu
nairantaryamāropya sthaulyāropaḥ syāt, ko doṣa ityata āha | na
ceti | anyonyāśrayameva sphuṭayati | nairantaryeti | sthaulyasya
pratyakṣakāraṇatvamupasaṃharati | tasmāditi | pāramarṣeṇa sūtreṇa
svoktāṃ yuktiṃ draḍhayati | tathā ceti | sarvāgrahaṇamavayavyasiddhe
riti | sūtramiti śeṣaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | atirohitārthamanyat ||
raghuº ṭīº | na ca bahutvameva sthaulyaṃ pratyakṣaprayojakam |
atha mā bhūdvāstavaṃ nairantaryaṃ prayojakamāropitaṃ tu syādata āha |
na ceti ||
astu tarhi kṣaṇamātrasthāyī sthūlo'rtha iti cenna |
bhāgabhāginoryugapadupalambhabādhitatvāt, ghaṭapaṭādi
bhaṅge tantukapālādīnāmutpāde samānopādānatayā
sapratighatvavyāghātācceti |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | nirākṛtamapi yuktyantaramabhidhātuṃ prastauti |
astviti | bhāgabhāginoriti | svopādānasamānakālīnatayā
'vayavina upalambhaḥ na kṣaṇikatābādhaka ityarthaḥ | dūṣaṇāntaramāha |
ghaṭapaṭādīti | utpattyagrimakṣaṇa eva yo ghaṭo naṣṭastaṃ prati
kapālamālā tāvadupādānam, tatra visabhāgasantānasya tvayā'bhyupa
gamāt, saiva ca kapālamālā agrimakapālamālāṃ pratyupādāna
kāraṇaṃ, tatra sabhāgasantānasya tvayā'bhyupagamāt, tathā caikaiva
kapālamālā ghaṭaṃ kapālamālāṃ cāgretanīṃ pratyupādānamiti
mūrttānāṃ samānadeśatāvirodha ityarthaḥ | ghaṭapaṭādibhaṅgābhidhānaṃ
tantukapālamālāsphoraṇārtham | sthairyapakṣe tu sabhāgasantānavyavasthaiva
nāstīti nāyaṃ doṣa iti bhāvaḥ | 1apavyākhyānamanyat ||
bhagīº ṭīº | bhāgeti | kṣaṇabhaṅge kāraṇānāmavayavānāṃ
kāryāvayavikṣaṇe nāśāttayorekadā grahaṇaṃ na syādityarthaḥ | nanvavaya
vimātraṃ kṣaṇikamavayavāstvakṣaṇikā iti noktadoṣa ityata āha |
ghaṭapaṭādīti | tathā sati ghaṭapaṭayorekadā nāśe'nantaraṃ tantu
kapālayorutpāde puñjāt puñjotpattiriti nyāyenobhayasyobhayo
pādeyasapratighayoḥ samānadeśatvāpattiḥ, sthira evāvayave dravyāntaro
tpādādityarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | atha ghaṭapaṭādyutpādadaśāyāṃ na santyeva tatra tantu
kapālādayastatpratyayastu bhrāntaḥ, santu vā, na tu te ghaṭapaṭādyupādānaṃ
sahotpannatvādata āha | ghaṭapaṭādibhaṅga iti | na santi ceduttara
tantvādayo notpadyeran, pūrvatantvādīnāmevottaratantvādyupādānatvasya
tvayā'bhyupagamāt | atha santi, kiṃ tvanye, tadaikatantūpādānayo
stantupaṭayoḥ sapratighatvaṃ vyāhanyetetyarthaḥ | sapratighatvaṃ mūrtatvaṃ tulya
kālayordvayoreva vā ekānupādānakatvam | atha tantoḥ paṭa iva
paṭādapi kaścittanturutpadyata iti matam, tathāpi dhāmadharaṇi
salilabījebhyo jāyamānānāmuttarottaradhāmādyaṅkurāṇāmekopā
dānakatvaprasaṅgaḥ | uttaradhāmādīnāmeva dhāmādaya upādānamaṅkurasya
kṛtavyākhyānamanyaditi 2 puº pāº |
tu bījamiti cet, tadetat kuto viśeṣāt, kāryasamavāyitva
syānabhyupagamāt, kāraṇatvasya cāviśiṣṭatvāt | sāmyāvasāyāt
prakṛtivikārabhāvācca | yathoktam |
‘abhrāntasamataikāvasāyaḥ prakṛtivikriye |
tato hetuphalasyopādānopādeyalakṣaṇamiti ||’
iti cenna | parasparavyabhicāreṇānayoraniyāmakatvāt | kā
ceyaṃ prakṛtiḥ | vijātīyaṃ kāraṇamiti cet, tat kimaṅkura
sajātīyā eva dharaṇidhāmādayaḥ | ucchinnajātīyaṃ kāraṇamiti
cet, paṭadaśāyāṃ tantujātīyānucchedasya sarvānubhavasiddhatvāttantoḥ
paṭānupādānatvaprasaṅgaḥ ||
so'yamadhikaraṇasiddhāntanyāyena sthūlatvasiddhau kṣaṇa
bhaṅgabhaṅgaḥ |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | soyamiti | sthaulyaṃ siddhyat sthairyamādāyaiva
siddhyati, avayavāvayavinoryugapadupalambhe sthaulyopalambha eva sthairyopa
lambhaparyavasanna ityarthaḥ | nanu pakṣadharmatābalalabhyortho'dhikaraṇa
siddhāntaḥ, prakṛte ca sthaulyapratyakṣa 1vyavasthāpitamata āha |
adhikaraṇasiddhāntanyāyeneti | yatsiddhāvanyasiddhiretāvatā tulya
nyāyeneti2 bhāvaḥ ||
vyavasthitamiti 2 puº pāº |
tulyanyāyatā'treti 2 puº pāº |
bhagīº ṭīº | soyamiti | adhikriyamāṇortho'vayavī
yamarthaṃ sthairyamādāyaiva siddhyati so'dhikaraṇasiddhānta ityarthaḥ | yadyapi
pakṣadharmatābalalabhyorthastathā, iha cāvayavisādhakatayā pratyakṣamupa
nyastamiti na tadavatāraḥ, tathāpi ghaṭārambhako'vayavaḥ svajanyasamāna
kālīnaḥ, samavāyikāraṇatvādityanumānādanyoddeśapravṛttādeva tat
siddhāvadhikaraṇasiddhāntāvirodhaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | adhikaraṇeti | abhyupagatavākyārthasiddhinānta
rīyakasiddhiko'rtho'dhikaraṇasiddhāntaḥ | vārttikam--vākyārtha
siddhau tadanuṣaṅgī yo'nyo'rthaḥ so'dhikaraṇasiddhānta iti | yena
kenāpi pramāṇena vākyārthasiddhau janyamānāyāṃ yo'nyo'rthaḥ siddhyati
sa tathetyarthaḥ | ṭīkā--heturīdṛśaḥ pakṣaśca vākyārtha iti | upa
lakṣaṇametat | udāharaṇaṃ bhāṣye, indriyavyatirikto jñātā darśana
sparśanābhyāmekārthagrahaṇāditi | atra hetuḥ pratisandhānaṃ siddhyat
svānuṣaṅgiguṇavyatiriktadravyādilakṣaṇārthāntarānvitameva siddhyatīti |
ṭīkāyāmutpattimattvena kṣityāderupalabdhimatpūrvakatvaṃ sādhyamānaṃ
svasiddhyantargatānuṣaṅgisarvajñatvādyanvitameva siddhyatīti |
kecittu pakṣadharmatābalalabhyortho'dhikaraṇasiddhāntaḥ, prakṛte ca
sthaulyagrāhipratyakṣagamyaṃ sthairyamata uktaṃ tannyāyeneti prāhuḥ ||
etena yat sat tanniravayavaṃ yathā vijñānaṃ saṃśca
vivādāspadībhūto ghaṭādiriti nirastam | viparyaye
bādhakābhāvena vyāptyasiddheḥ | yatsat tatsāvayavaṃ yathā
ghaṭaḥ sacca vijñānamiti cārvākaparivarttasyāpyava
kāśācca | samo vā samādhiḥ |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | eteneti | sthaulyavyavasthāpanenetyarthaḥ | viparyaya
iti | sadapi syānna tu niravayavamityatra bādhakaṃ nāstītyarthaḥ |
samo veti | etasyāsādhakatve tvadanumānamapi na sādhakam,
ubhayatrāpyanukūlatarkābhāvādityarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | eteneti | ekaḥ sthūla iti pratyakṣabādhene
tyarthaḥ | viparyaya iti | viruddhadharmādhyāsasya prāgeva nirāsādityarthaḥ ||
nanu niravayavameva vijñānaṃ svasamviditarūpaṃ, ghaṭasya
ca sāvayavatāyāmadyāpi vivāda eva, tat kathaṃ pari
varttaḥ kathaṃ vā samaḥ samādhiriti cet, śuṣkavivādasya
vijñāne'pi durvāratvāt | na hi kaścit kaṇṭhauṣṭhapārśva
jaṭharādiparihīnaṃ piṭharamanubhavati | astu vā sattvāt
sapratighatvasiddhirbuddhāvapratighatvaṃ vā ghaṭādāviti |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | nanu sattvasya sāvayavatvasādhakasya vijñāna eva
vyabhicāra iti kutaḥ sāmyamiti śaṅkate | nanviti | tvadabhi
matasya niravayavatvasādhakasya sattvasyāpi ghaṭa eva vyabhicāra ityabhi
prāyeṇāha | śuṣketi | parānumāne bādhamāha | na hi kaści-
diti | prakṛte'prayojakatāṃ darśayitumaprayojakāntaraṃ darśayati |
astu veti | sapratighattvaṃ mūrtattvam ||
bhagīº ṭīº | svasamviditarūpamiti | tathā ca tatra
sāvayavatvasādhane bādha ityarthaḥ | pratīteryadyanādarastadā jñānepi
vādaḥ sambhavati, tadādare tvavayavinyapi na tatsambhava ityāha |
śuṣketi ||
raghuº ṭīº | sapratighatvasiddhiriti | buddhāviti | pūrvai
kālayavijñānopādānakatvasyottarālayavijñāna-pravṛttivijñānayorbhava
dbhirupagamāt ||
api ca svatantrasādhanamidaṃ prasaṅgo vā | na prathamaḥ,
ghaṭādiśabdena sthūletarāṇāṃ rūpādīnāṃ paramāṇūnāṃ
vā pakṣīkaraṇe siddhasādhanāt, sthūlamekamabhyupagamya
pakṣavidhau kālātyayāpadeśāt, anabhyupagame tvāśrayā
siddheriti | nanu prāmāṇike'bhyupagame bādhaḥ syāt,
sarvathā'nabhyupagame cāśrayāsiddhiḥ syāt, na caivamatreti
cet, tadetannabhaḥsthalakamalaparimalasādhanasyāpi sāśra
yatāmāpādayadāśrayāsiddhidoṣamoṣāyetyalamanena |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | svatantrasādhanamiti | ghaṭo niravayavaḥ sattvāt,
vijñānavaditi sādhanamityarthaḥ | prasaṅgo veti | yadīdaṃ
satsyānniravayavaṃ syāditi tarka ityarthaḥ | atra paramāṇupakṣatve
siddhasādhanamavayavipakṣatve bādhaḥ sthūlāsvīkāre tvāśrayāsiddhi
rityāha | ghaṭādīti | sthūlatvenābhyupagatasyaiva pakṣatvam, na ca bādhaḥ,
tasya sāvayavatvena pramāvirahāt, na cāśrayāsiddhirāśrayasyābhyupagata
tvādityāśaṅkate | nanviti | tarhi gaganāravindaṃ surabhītyatrā
pyāśrayāsiddhirna syāt, asatkhyātyā'nyathākhyātyā vā tadupasthite
rityāha | tadetaditi ||
bhagīº ṭīº | prasaṅgo veti | yadīdaṃ satsyānniravayavaṃ
syāditi tarka ityarthaḥ | tadetaditi | gaganakamalasyāprāmāṇikā
bhyupagamasambhavādityarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | svatantrasādhanamanumānam | idaṃ yatsattannira
vayavamityādikam ||
parvatādivallokapratītisiddhān ghaṭādīnupādāya
niravayavatvānumānaṃ syāt, anyathā brahmavivarttādi
vipratipattivihatatayā dahanānumānamapi parvatādau
na syāditi cennaivam | avirodhāt | na hi brahmaviva
rttādisiddhāvapyāśrayādayo'nyaprakārāḥ 1sambhavanti,
tathāhi, sarvatra svapnaparvate svapnadhūmena svapnavahnireva
sādhyate, kevalaṃ sāmvṛtepi vyavahāre satyānṛtavyavasthā-
santi iti 1 puº pāº |
'stīti tasyāṃ nirbharaḥ karttavyaḥ | iha tu ghaṭādivyapa
deśena sthūla eva yadi pakṣīkṛtaḥ, kathaṃ niravayavatvena
sādhyena na virodhaḥ |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | nanu parvato'gnimānityādāvapi parvatapadārthāpari
cchedanibandhanā doṣāḥ prasajyerannityāśaṅkate | parvatādivaditi |
brahmapariṇāmapakṣo vā vivarttapakṣo vā | sarvatra parvatastadrūpa eva na
tvaparvata iti tatra nāśrayāsiddhirityāha | naivamiti | parvate
brahmavivartte tādṛśenaiva dhūmena tādṛśa eva vahniḥ sādhyata iti
na virodha ityarthaḥ | atrānurūpamudāharati | svapneti | prakṛte
vaiṣamyamityāha | iha tviti | ghaṭa iti padaṃ sthūlavācakaṃ paramāṇu
vācakaṃ veti vikalpataḥ kathaṃ bādhasiddhasādhane na syātāmityarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | iha tviti | nanu yathā nirvahneḥ parvatasya
pakṣatve vahnyanumāne bādhaḥ syāditi vastuto yaḥ savahniḥ parvatavat
tattvenājñāyamānaḥ parvatatvena jñāyamānaḥ sa pakṣaḥ, tathā vastutaḥ
paramāṇupuñja eva tattvenājñāyamāno ghaṭatvena jñāyamānaḥ pakṣaḥ
syāditi na virodhaḥ, ghaṭatvañca jātirvyāvṛttitvaṃ vetyanyadetat, na
vā yatra śabdādupasthitistatra sāvayavatvena bhānaṃ, tasyāśakyatvāt |
atrāhuḥ | bādhasyaivāyaṃ prasaṅgaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | iha tviti | na ca yathā vahnimataḥ pakṣatve
siddhasādhanaṃ nirvahneśca tattve bādha iti na dūṣaṇam, tadaudāsīnyena
parvatatvamātreṇa pakṣatvāt, tathehāpi paramāṇutvasthūlatvaudāsyena ghaṭatva
mātreṇa pakṣatvānna doṣa iti vācyam | paramāṇusthūlasādhāraṇasya
ghaṭatvasyaikasyābhāvāt, atadvyāvṛtterapi tadarthabhedena bhedāt, ghaṭa
padavācyatvasyāpi vyavahārādinā sthūla eva nirṇītatvāt, sthūla
pratyayaviṣayatvasya ca paramāṇāvasambhavāt | sāvayavatvaṃ ca yadi
1prasiddhaṃ tadā tatraiva sattvamanaikāntikam, aprasiddhaṃ cettanniṣedhā
nupapattiḥ sādhyena virodhaḥ pakṣasya tadabhāvavattvam ||
atha 2paramāṇureva, kathaṃ na siddhasādhanam | viprati
pannaṃ prati na tatheti cet, na vai kaścit paramāṇūnāṃ
niravayavatve vipratipadyate | lokavyāmohanibarhaṇāya
sādhanamiti cet, tathāpi yaṃ lokaḥ sthūlamekamupa
labdhavān tasya pakṣatve virodha eva, tato'nyasya pakṣatve
siddhasādhanameva | ekaḥ sthūlo'yamiti mithyeti cet,
etadeva tarhi sādhyatām, kimanenājāgalastana
kalpena sattvena | na ca tatraivedaṃ śakyamupasaṃharttum, vyadhi
karaṇatvāt, tasmādyena rūpeṇa yasya pakṣatvaṃ vivakṣitam,
tena siṣādhayiṣitadharmavirodhavivādābhyāṃ tatrānu
mānapravṛttirnāto'nyatheti |
kvacitpratyakṣamiti 1 puº pāº |
paramāṇvādireva iti 1 puº pāº |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | ghaṭapadavācyasya sāvayavatve yo vipratipadyate ta
prati siddhasādhanamabhidhātumayuktamityāśaṅkate | vipratipannamiti |
parīkṣakāṇāmavipratipattāvapi laukikānāṃ vipratipattirastyeveti
na siddhasādhanamityāśaṅkate | loketi | lokā nāṇudarśinaḥ,
kintu sthūlamātradarśinaḥ, teṣāṃ niravayavatve sādhye bādhāvatāra eveti
pariharati | tathāpīti | bādho hi viparītapramā, ekaḥ sthūla
iti dhīstu bhrama iti na tayā bādha iti śaṅkate | eka iti |
tarhi sthūlapratyayasya mithyātvasādhanameva taveṣṭamasmadaniṣṭaṃ ca nira
vayavatvasādhanamaprayojakamiti pariharati | etadeveti | nanu sthūla
pratyayo mithyā sattvādityeva mayā sādhanīyamityata āha | na
ceti | vyadhikaraṇatvāditi | tvadabhimataprāmāṇye nirvikalpake
vyabhicārādityarthaḥ | nanvevaṃ prasiddhānumānepi vahnimataḥ parvatasya
pakṣatve siddhasādhanaṃ nirvahneḥ pakṣatve bādha iti sakalānumānoccheda
iti cenna | tatra ca bahnimattvanirvahnitvakoṭyoḥ prasiddhatayā sandi
gdhasya pakṣatā yathā na tathā prakṛte, tvanmate sāvayavatvasya kvacidapya
prasiddheḥ | yadvā pratyakṣabādhaprapañca evāyam, ata eva tathaivopa
saṃharati | tasmāditi | pakṣatāvacchedakadharmāvacchedena yatra na
sādhyabādhaḥ saṃśayaśca tatrānumānapravṛttirityarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | vyadhikaraṇatvāditi | ekaḥ sthūlo'yamiti
dhīviṣayasya mithyātve sādhye sattvaṃ heturviruddhaḥ, tādṛśabuddherayathārthatve
ca sādhye arthāntaratvam, mūrtatvaṃ paramāṇubhinnavṛtti na veti
saṃśaye kathārambhādityarthaḥ | tasmāditi | atra tu tadvaiparītya
muktamiti bhāvaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | etadeva tarhi sādhyatām--tarhi etatsādhaka
mevopanyasyatām, kiṃ sattvenopanyastena | tatraiva mithyātva eva | idam
sattvam | vyadhikaraṇatvāditi | yadi sthūlasya mithyātvamalīkatvaṃ
sādhyate, tadā vyadhikaraṇatvaṃ viruddhatvam, sattvasya vāstavadharmatvāt |
atha sthūlapratyayasya mithyātvaṃ bhramatvam, tadā vyadhikaraṇatvaṃ
sādhyānadhikaraṇavṛttitvam, bhramabhinnasya svalakṣaṇasya nirvikalpakasya ca
sattvāt | avirodho bādhavirahaḥ | vivādena siddhasādhanavyudāsaḥ ||
nāpi dvitīyaḥ, viparyayāparyavasānāt, na ca
vivādaviṣayo niravayavastasmānna sanniti viparyayaḥ,
na caivaṃ sāvayavatvaṃ pakṣasyānicchatā pravarttayituṃ śakyate,
na ca tat tvayeṣyate, na ca tasyeṣṭau tenāsattvaṃ śakya
sādhanam, āśrayāsiddhervirodhādasādhāraṇyādvā, na ca
viparyayopi pareṣṭyā pravarttata iti |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | prasaṅgo veti pakṣaṃ dūṣayati | nāpīti |
yadi ghaṭaḥ san syāt niravayavaḥ syāt, na ca niravayavastasmānna
sanniti prasaṅgaviparyayaniṣṭhā, tatra na ca niravayava iti sāvayava
ścāyamityarthaḥ, sa ca tvayā neṣyata ityarthaḥ | nanu yadyayaṃ sāvayavaḥ
syāt asan syāditi prasaṅgaḥ syāditi cenna | āpādakā
prasiddhyā vyāpterasiddheḥ | teneti | sāvayavatvenetyarthaḥ | svāśrayeti |
ghaṭādirasan sāvayavatvāditi hi viparyayaḥ, tatra sāvayavatvasya
hetostvayā''śraya eva na svīkriyata ityāśrayāsiddhiḥ, svīkāre vā
virodhaḥ | sāvayavatvasya śaśaśṛṅgāderasataḥ sapakṣādiva vijñāna
paramāṇvādervipakṣādapi vyāvṛtterasādhāraṇyamityarthaḥ | nanu tvayā
sāvayavatvāśrayaḥ svīkriyata eva, tathā ca tvadabhyupagamamāśrityaiva
viparyayaḥ syādityata āha | na ceti | viparyayasyānumānatayā
svābhyupagamamātrādhīnapravṛttikatvādityarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | viparyayamāha | na ceti | tasya sāvayavatva
syetyarthaḥ | tena sāvayavatvenetyarthaḥ | āśrayeti | ekaḥ sthūla
iti dhīviṣayasyālīkasya pakṣatāyāmāśrayāsiddhiḥ, abādhita
tādṛśapratyakṣācca tatsattvasiddherasattvasādhane virodhaḥ, sāvayavatvāditi
hetorniravayavādalīkājjñānācca vyāvṛtterasādhāraṇānaikāntikatvaṃ
cetyarthaḥ | na ceti | yathā prasaṅgaḥ parābhyupagatenāpādakena pravarttate
na tathā viparyayaḥ, tasyānumānatayā svato'siddhyāpatterityarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | yat sat tanniravayavaṃ yathā vijñānaṃ, na ca
niravayavo ghaṭādiriti viparyayaḥ | tasmānna sanniti tu svamatā
vaṣṭambhena sāvayavatvasya hetutāyāḥ spaṣṭatvārtham, pareṇa nigamanasya
nyāyāṅgatvānaṅgīkārāt | sāvayavatvamiti | niravayavatvābhāvasya
sāvayavatvarūpatvāt | tat sāvayavatvam | tasya sāvayavatvasya | tena
sāvayavatvena | ghaṭāderasiddhāvāśrayāsiddhiḥ, siddhau dharmigrāhaka
pratyakṣabādhaḥ, vipakṣādvijñānādeḥ sapakṣācca śaśaviṣāṇādervyāvṛtta
tvādasādhāraṇyam | paramatenedam ||
kaḥ punaravayavini nyāyaḥ | tat kiṃ pratyakṣānnyāyo
garīyān | yadyevam, 1buddhāveva ko'sau | tasmāda
sārametat |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | pratyakṣamanyathāsiddhiśaṅkākalaṅkitamato'numānaṃ
pṛcchati | kaḥ punariti | ananyathāsiddherupapādanādāha | tat
kimiti | buddhāvapīti | tasyāstvayā svasambedyatvenānumāna
mantareṇaivābhyupagamāditi bhāvaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | etāvatā'vayavini pratyakṣopadarśanepi tatra
nyāyaṃ vinā na parituṣyan pṛcchati | ka iti | nyāyānupanyāsepi
tatsādhakaṃ sādhanamupanyastameva, nyāyasyāpi vyāptigrāhakaṃ pratyakṣameva
mūlamityāśayenottaram, tat kimiti | yadyevamiti | nyāyā
bhāvepi buddheḥ prakāśyasiddhatāyā bhavatopagamādityarthaḥ ||
tathāpi yannirastasamastaviruddhadharmādhyāsaṃ tadekameva
vyavaharttavyaṃ yathā vijñānam, tathā ca vivādādhyāsita
buddhāvapi ko'sau iti 1 puº pāº |
ekasthūlo'nubhavagocara iti svabhāvahetuḥ, tāva
nmātrānubandhitvādekatāvyavahārasya | na hyayamekavyava
hāro nirnimitto'niyamaprasaṅgāt, nāpyanyanimittaḥ,
dravakaṭhinaśātoṣṇādāvapi tathāvyavahāraprasaṅgāt |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | piśācaḥ piśācabhāṣayaiva bodhito1 bhava
tīti pararītyaivānumānamāha | yannirasteti | vivādādhyāsita
iti | 2māṣādirāśivyavacchedārthaṃ vyāptiṃ draḍhayati | tāva
nmātreti | anyathāsiddhiṃ nirasyati | na hīti | dravakaṭhina
śītoṣṇarūpeti pareṣāṃ pṛthivyaptejovāyūnāṃ paribhāṣā ||
bhagīº ṭīº | nyāyenāpi paritoṣayati | tathāpīti |
draveti | viruddhadharmādhyāsepyanyasmādekavyavahāre dravakaṭhinādāvapi
tadāpatteravaśyamekavyavahāro viruddhadharmānadhyāsanimitto'bhyupetavya
ityarthaḥ ||
astu tarhi bāhyeṣṭhartheṣu nityasandehaḥ, tathyātathya
vibhāgasyāśakyatvāditi cet, na tāvat sarvasya yathārtha
tvādeva vibhāgo'nupapannaḥ, uttaravirodhāt | tathāhi
viparītamavagataṃ mayeti laukikī pratipattiḥ anyathā-
bādhyo iti 2 puº pāº |
meṣādi iti 3 puº pāº |
khyātiriti ca vainayikī yathārthā1 na vā, ubhayathā
pyuttareṇa na sarvayāthārthyasiddhiḥ |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | nīlādipratyakṣāṇāmapyanyathāsiddhiśaṅkākala
ṅkitatvādāha | astu tarhīti | tathyātathye yāthārthyāyāthārthye
prāmāṇyāprāmāṇye iti yāvat | uttaravirodhāditi | yanmayā
praṣṭavyaṃ taduttarata eva vibhāgaḥ setsyatītyarthaḥ | uttaraṃ vidheyaṃ2
pṛcchati | viparītamiti | vinayaḥ śāstrādhīno vivekaḥ tatra
vyavasthitā vainayikī yathārthā cediyaṃ dhīstadā 3viṣayosyā
bhramo'thāyayārthā syāttadāsyā evā'yāthārthyamityubhayathā na
sarvāyāthārthyaṃ nāpi sarvayāthārthyamityarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | samprati bādhakānupapattāvapi sarveṣāṃ sādhaka
tvābhimatānāṃ vikalpagrāsādvibhāgo'śakya ityāha | astviti |
na tāvat sarvatra niścayābhāvādeva so'śakyaḥ, asyaiva sādhyasādhana
bhāvasya niścayena virodhāditi jñāne sarvatra yāthārthyaniścayāttathyā
tathyavibhāgāśakyatvaṃ vācyam, tatrāha | na tāvaditi | uttareti |
viparītamavagataṃ mayeti jñānaṃ pramā na veti praśne uttarakaraṇe
sarvathā virodha evetyarthaḥ | virodhamāha | tathāhīti |
'nyathā vā iti 1 puº pāº |
viṣayamiti 2 puº pāº |
viṣayabhūtāyādhiyo'yāthārthyaṃ anyathā tasyāyāthārthyamitya
bhavayāthārthyamiti 3 puº pāṭhaḥ |
vinayo vivekaḥ, tatra vyavasthitetyarthaḥ | ubhayatheti | tādṛśa
buddheryathārthatve tadviṣayo bhramaḥ siddha eva netipakṣe saiva buddhirbhrama
iti siddhamityarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | tathyātathyeti | jñānasya tathyātathyatve pramāṇatvā
pramāṇatve, arthasya tu prāmāṇikatvāprāmāṇikatve iti | uttareti |
yāthārthyāyāthārthyapraśne yaduttaraṃ tadvirodhādityarthaḥ | virodhaṃ
vivṛṇoti | tathāhīti | vinayaḥ śāstrārthajñānam, tadadhīnā
4pravṛttirvainayikī | ubhayathā yathārthatvenāyathārthatvena cottareṇa |
iyamanyathākhyātiriti pratīteryathārthatve tadviṣayasya khyāterna
yathārthatvasiddhiḥ, anyathā tvasyā eveti ||
śabdasaṃlāpamātrametanna pratītiriti cenna | vivādā
nupapatteḥ, na hi vyavahāramātre parīkṣakāṇāṃ vivādaḥ,
na ca nāyamastīti | śabdārthe vivāda iti cet, evaṃ
satyapratītasya niṣeddhumaśakyatvāt parābhiprāyaniṣe
dhārthatvācca vivādasya, abhyupagantṛpratiṣeddhroḥ pratiṣedhya
pratītiḥ kathaṃ nāstīti |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | śabdeti | viparītaṃ mayā'vagatamiti vāṅmātra
mityarthaḥ | vivādeti | khyātipañcakamadhikṛtya parīkṣakāṇāṃ
vivādānupapatterityarthaḥ | vivādānupapattimevāha | na hīti |
pratipattiriti 3 puº pāº |
vyavahāraḥ sarvajanasiddhastatra vivādo na sambhavatītyarthaḥ | nanu
vivāda eva nāsti, tadanurodhena viparītakhyātirapi kathaṃ kalpa
nīyetyata āha | na ca nāyamiti | nanu vivāda evātra
nāstīti netyarthaḥ | śabdārtha iti | anyathākhyātiśabdasya
yo'rthastatra vivāda ityarthaḥ | kecittadviśiṣṭajñānaṃ manvate kecittu
tadagṛhītabhedaṃ jñānadvayamiti tadarthe vivādastathā ca viśiṣṭajñānaṃ
bhramarūpaṃ yat pratiṣidhyate tadabhyupagacchatā naiyāyikena pratiṣeddhrā
mīmāṃsakena cāvaśyaṃ pratyetavyamityata āha | evamiti ||
bhagīº ṭīº | śabdeti | mātrapadenārthanairapekṣyaṃ pratīte
ruktam | na ceti | ayaṃ vyavahāro nāstīti netyarthaḥ | tathā ca
tanmātre vivādāsambhava iti bhāvaḥ | śabdārtha iti | anyathā
khyātipadasya gṛhītabhedajñā - - - - - - - - - jñāne viśeṣa iti
vivāda ityarthaḥ | evaṃ satīti | niṣedhyapratītiṃ vinā na
niṣedhapratītirityubhayorapyupagantṛniṣeddhroḥ pratītiyathārthatve kva
vivāda ityarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | śabdeti | iyamanyathākhyātiriti vāṅmātra
mityarthaḥ | na hīti | vyavahārasyobhayavādisampratipannatvānna
vivāda ityarthaḥ | na cāyaṃ vivādo nāstīti | śabdārtheti |
tādṛśavākyasyārthe purovarttijñānasyānyathākhyātitve pratiṣedhyasyānyathā-
khyātitvasya pratītiḥ kathaṃ nāstīti | tathā cobhayavādisiddha
tvānna vivādāvasara ityarthaḥ ||
na cānyajñānādanyatra pravṛttisambhavo'tiprasaṅgāt |
na ca tajjñānasānnidhyaṃ niyāmakamatiprasaṅgādeva | na
ca tatsahito bhedāgrahaḥ, agrahaprādhānye bhedāvivakṣāyāṃ
nivṛtterapi prasaṅgāt, taddhetorabhedāgrahasyāpi vidya
mānatvāt | nāsau nivarttakaḥ, api tu bhedagraha iti
cenna, rajata eva nedaṃ rajatamiti kṛtvā na nivartteta,
bhedagrahasya tatkāraṇasyābhāvāt, bhāve vā viparīta
khyātirabhinne bhedapratyayāt, tasmāt pravarttakavanniva
rttakopyagraha eva teṣāṃ svīkarttumucitaḥ, tathā ca sa
doṣastadavastha eva |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | idānīmidaṃ rajatamiti viśiṣṭajñānamiti
sādhayati | na ceti | rajatajñānācchuktau pravṛttirviśiṣṭajñāna
mantareṇānupapannetyarthaḥ | nanu śuktijñānasannihitameva rajatajñāna
miti kṛtvā rajatārthī śuktau pravarttata ityata āha | na ceti |
nanvagṛhītabhedaṃ jñānadvayaṃ pravarttakamato nātiprasaṅga ityata āha |
na ceti | tatsahita iṣṭajñānasahitaḥ | tathā ceṣṭabhedāgrahaḥ pravarttaka
ityarthaḥ | agrahaprādhānya iti | iṣṭabhedo vastugatyā'stu mā vā,
parantviṣṭabhedāgrahaḥ pravarttaka iti ceducyate tadāniṣṭabhedostu mā vā
tadagrahaḥ śuktau nivarttakopi syāditi yugapatpravṛttinivṛttī
syātāmityarthaḥ | etadevāha | taddhetoriti | nanviṣṭābhedāgraho
na nivarttakaḥ, kintviṣṭabhedagraha iti, sa ca prakṛte nāstīti na
nivarttata iti śaṅkate | nāsāviti | tatkāraṇasyeti | nivṛtti
kāraṇasyetyarthaḥ | nanu tatrāpi rajatabhedagrahostyevetyata āha |
bhāve veti | sa doṣa iti | yugapatpravṛttinivṛttiprasaṅgarūpo
doṣa ityarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | nanu pratyakṣeṇedamiti śuktirgṛhyate, doṣāttatra
śuktitvaṃ na gṛhyate, tadvṛttitayā gṛhītena śuklabhāsvaratvena rajataṃ
smaryate, doṣādeva tayorbhedo na gṛhyate, etāvatā rajatārthipravṛtti
rjāyate, satyeva rajatepi pravṛttau rajatena bhedāgrahostyeva, paraṃ tatrā
vidyamānatayā bhedo na gṛhyate, śuktirajatayostu sannapi doṣādi
tyevamupapattau viśiṣṭajñāne mānābhāva ityata āha | na ceti |
rajatajñānasya śuktyaviṣayatve tatra pravarttakatvaṃ na syāt, tadviṣayatāṃ
vinā tadviṣayapravṛttyajanakatvāt, jñānapravṛttyoḥ samānaviṣayatayā
hetuhetumadbhāvaniścayāt, pravṛttau vā ghaṭepi pravṛttiprasaṅga ityarthaḥ |
nanu śuktijñānasannihitarajatajñānaṃ śuktyaviṣayakamapi tatra pravarttakaṃ
syādityata āha | na ca tajjñāneti | tathāpi kadāpi ghaṭajñāna
sānnidhyāttatrāpi pravarttakaṃ syādityarthaḥ | na ceti | purovartti
rajatajñānasahito bhedāgrahaḥ pravṛttiniyāmaka ityapi netyarthaḥ |
bhedāgrahasya pravarttakatve kimagraho viśeṣyaḥ, agṛhyamāṇo bheda iti
bhedo vā viśeṣyaḥ, ādye satyarajatepi pravṛtteragrahamātraṃ vā pravarttakaṃ
bhedaviṣayakagrahābhāvo vā, ādye nivṛtterapīti | atra hetuḥ,
taddhetoriti | śuktau nedaṃ rajatamiti jñāne rajatābhedāgrahasya
nivarttakasya darśanācchuktau rajatabhrame pravarttakabhedāgrahavannivarttaka
rajatābhedāgrahasyāpi sattvānnivṛttirapi syādityarthaḥ | dvitīyaṃ
śaṅkate | nāsāviti | rajatabhedāgrahasya pravarttakatve tadabhāvo
rajatabhedagraho nivarttakaḥ, sa cātra nāstīti na nivṛttirityarthaḥ |
tasyānivarttakatve nedaṃ rajatamiti jñānānnivartteta, rajate rajata
bhedagrahe'nyathākhyātyāpatte rajate rajatābhedāgrahānnivṛttirvācyā,
tathā ca śuktāvidaṃ rajatamiti jñānepi rajatābhedāgrahānnivṛttiḥ
syādityāha | tarhīti ||
raghuº ṭīº | atha anyathātvaṃ vyadhikaraṇaprakārakatva khyātau
niṣiddhyate, taccecchādau pratītam | na ca niṣedhādhikaraṇe niṣedhya
pratītirapyaṅgam, mānābhāvāt | śuktyādau rajatatvādiprakārakajñānā
bhāve kathaṃ tatra rajatādyarthipravṛttiriti cet, rajatādigocarāt
pramuṣṭatattāṃśakādrajatamityādismaraṇāt | atrāha | na cetyādi |
na ca pravṛttiviṣayasya jñānaṃ niyāmakam, tatra rajatādibhedagrahepi
pravṛttyāpatterityāha | na ceti | tatsahitaḥ pravṛttiviṣayatajjñāna
sahitaḥ | svatantropasthitasyeṣṭasya bhedāgrahaḥ | bhedāgraha iti yatra
kvacitsato bhedasya pravṛttiviṣaye'graho vā tatrāgṛhyamāṇastanniṣṭho
bhedo vā | ādye agraheti | yadyapi pravṛttau bhedasya vivakṣāyāma
vivakṣāyāṃ ca samānameva nivṛttāvabhidhāsyamānaṃ dūṣaṇam tathāpi
vivakṣāpakṣe doṣāntaramabhidhātuṃ vikalpaḥ | 1iṣṭābhedasyāgraho vā
nivarttaka iṣṭabhedagraho vā | ādye nivṛtterapīti | antyaṃ śaṅkate |
nāsāviti | nirasyati | rajata eveti | upasaṃharati |
tasmāditi ||
atha bhedaḥ pradhānam, aṅgamagrahaḥ, tadā satyarajata
jñānādrajate na pravartteta, idamaṃśarajatāṃśayorbhedā
bhāvāditi svayamūhanīyam |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | nanu purovarttirajatayoryatra vāstavo bhedo
bhavati tatra bhedāgrahātpravṛttiḥ, prakṛte ca purovarttirajatayorasti
bheda iti tadagrahātpravarttata iti śaṅkate | atheti | bhedasya
prādhānyaṃ pravṛttiviṣayaniṣṭhatvam | parihāramāha | tadā satyeti |
tatra purovarttirajatayorvāstavabhedābhāvādityarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | agṛhyamāṇo bhedo rajatapurovarttijñāna
sahitaḥ pravarttaka iti kalpamāśaṅkya nirākaroti | atheti |
yena kenāpi bhedagrahasya pravarttakatve'tiprasaṅgādiṣṭena samaṃ bhedāgraho
vācyaḥ, sopi na yasya kasyacidatiprasaṅgādeva, api tu pravṛtti
viṣayasyeti vācyam, tathā ceṣṭena samaṃ purovarttinā bhedasyāgrahe
satyeva rajate pravṛttirna syāt, na hi tatreṣṭapratiyogiko bhedo'sti
yasyāgrahaḥ pravarttayedityarthaḥ ||
aniṣṭabhedasyāgraho iti 3 puº pāº |
raghuº ṭīº | dvitīyamāśaṅkya nirākaroti | atheti |
athopasthite dharmiṇi svatantropasthitayoriṣṭāniṣṭayorbhedāgrahau

bhagīº ṭīº | nanvevamāropaniyamopi na syāt, abhedā

cānyakāryasāmagrī anyakāryaniyāmikā, kāryayorabhedāpatteḥ, evaṃ
cārope'dṛṣṭaviśeṣādeva sāmagrīmadhyapraviṣṭānniyama ityāha |

tattva iti |
nanu satyarajate na pratiyogyaprasiddhiḥ, purovarttini bhede
rajatapratiyogitvajñānaviṣayatvābhāvasya purovarttinīṣṭabhinnatvaprakā
rakajñānaviṣayatvābhāvasya vā hetutvāt | atrāhuḥ | idaṃ rajata
mityatra purovarttināniṣṭabhedagrahe'nyathākhyātiḥ, tadagrahe cāniṣṭa
bhedāgrahānnivṛttirapi syāt | athāniṣṭatāvacchedakarūpeṇopasthitā
daniṣṭabhedāgrahānnivṛttirna cedantvamaniṣṭatāvacchedakam, evamapīdaṃ
rajataṃ na śuktirityatrāniṣṭatāvacchedakaśuktitvenopasthitāniṣṭa

nivṛttī, abhāvaviśeṣaṇatvenānupasthitiśca svātantryam, aniṣṭaṃ ca
tatrābhāvaviśeṣaṇatvenopasthitamiti na nivṛttirata eva nedaṃ rajata
miti jñānādrajate na pravṛttiḥ, abhāvāsaṃsargāgraha eva nakārārtha
iti nānyathākhyātiḥ | nanvabhāvaviśeṣaṇatvenopasthitāvapi pūrvaṃ
pratiyoginaḥ svātantryeṇopasthite śuktau vaṇigvīthīsthābhāvaprati
yogīdaṃ rajatamiti bhramajñānādapravṛttyāpatteśca | kiṃ ca rajata
raṅgayorise rajate iti bhramādiṣṭāniṣṭatāvacchedakarūpeṇa svā
tantryobhayabhedāgrahātpravṛttinivṛttisāṅkaryāpattiḥ | na caivambidhabhrame
mānābhāvaḥ | tathāvidhasatyajñānavatpratyekabhramasāmagryorekadā sattvena
tādṛśabhramasyānubhavikatvāt | atha rajataraṅgayo rajataraṅgarajata
bhedāgrahānna yugapat pravṛttinivṛttī | na cānyathākhyātiḥ, doṣa
vaśāt purovarttinaṃ vihāya smṛtaraṅgarajatābhyāṃ purovarttini
bhedāsaṃsargāgrahāt | na | ekaraṅgarajatamātrajñānānantaraṃ tayoreva
yamajayorviparītabhrame'tiprasaṅgāt | anyathākhyāteśca | rajate
rajatabhedāsaṃsargāsaṃsargasyāsaṃsargāgrahānnivṛttiriti cenna | bhedā
saṃsargāsaṃsargasya bhedasaṃsargarūpatve rajatabhedāsaṃsargāgrahādraṅge nivṛtti
prasaṅgāt, rajatabhedasaṃsargagrahe cānyathākhyātiḥ, rajatavṛttitayopa
sthitabhede rajatabhedena saha bhedāgrahaḥ pravṛttipratibandhakaḥ, evaṃ raṅge
nivṛttāvapīti cenna | śabdābhāsāt yugapatpravṛttinivṛttyāpatteḥ,
pravṛttinivṛttiviṣayarajataraṅgabhedayośca śabdādanupasthityā'prati
bandhakatvāt | atha rajate nedaṃ rajatamiti jñānaṃ rajatatvāsaṃsargā
saṃsargāgraharūpaṃ vā pratibandhakamiti cenna | anyavṛttitayopasthitasya
rajatatvāsaṃsargāsaṃsargāgrahasya rajatabhedasya ca raṅge asaṃsargāgrahā
nnivṛttiprasaṅgāt | mānaṃ tvanyathākhyātau jñānatvaṃ viśeṣyāvṛtti
prakārāvacchinnaviṣayatāpratiyogivṛtti, pravṛttihetupratyakṣātmaviśeṣa
guṇatvāt, icchātvavat, bhedāgrahakāritāyāṃ rajatatvena purovarttina
micchāmītyatrecchāyāṃ viśeṣyāvṛttinā rajatatvenāvacchedāditi
sāmānyataḥ | viśiṣya tu rajatecchājanyaśuktiviṣayakapravṛttijanakaṃ
rajataprakārakaṃ jñānaṃ śuktiviṣayakam, śuktiviṣayakapravṛttihetu
vijñānatvāt, śuktyarthina iyaṃ śuktiriti jñānavat, tādṛśamidaṃ
jñānaṃ vā rajatatvaprakārakaṃ, rajatecchājanyapravṛttihetujñānatvāt,
rajata idaṃ rajatamiti jñānavat | na ca grahaṇasmaraṇayorviśiṣṭajñānasya
vā pakṣatve bādha āśrayāsiddhirvā | ubhayasiddhena śuktiviṣayapravṛtti
hetutvena pakṣatvāt | anyathā sādhyatadabhāvāvādāya pakṣe vikalpe
'numānamātrocchedāpatteḥ | na ca visamvādipravṛttyajanakatvamupādhiḥ,
tvanmate tathāvidha idaṃ jñāne rajatajñāne ca sādhyāvyāpakatvāt |
nāpi nojanyatvam, parasya jñānamātre tathātvāt, anyathā tayoreva
sādhyavyāpakatvāt | na cāprayojakatvam, iṣṭapurovarttiviśiṣṭajñānasya
pravṛttihetutvāt | uktarītyā bhedāgrahasyāpravarttakatvāt | nanu tatra
hetvabhāvaḥ, śabdasyāptoktasya nirdoṣasya vā'hetutvāt, na ca
śabdābhāsastaddhetuḥ, yogyatāviśiṣṭasya śabdasya hetutvāt, nāpi
liṅgābhāsaḥ, liṅgaviśiṣṭapakṣajñānasyānumitihetutvāt, ābhāse
ca tadasaṃsargāgrahāt, indriyasya sambaddhagrāhakatvāt | maivam |
saṃskārendriyābhyāṃ viśiṣṭadhīsambhavāt, tasya jñānadvayatve'bhedo
cchedāpatteḥ, tasya tadekamānatvāt | na caikaviṣayatvena tayoḥ
sahakāritā, gauravāt | na cātiprasaṅgaḥ, bhedāgrahasyāpi
taddhetutvāt, pratyabhijñāyāstattāṃśe vyabhicārācceti saṅkṣepaḥ ||

nasyāsiddheḥ, prakāśatvasyāsādhāraṇatvāt, śabdasāmye

śaṅkaº ṭīº | nanvetāvatā prāmāṇyaṃ gṛhyata ityāyātam,

saṃśayaśca prakṛte vipratipattijanmā, tato vipratipattimāha |
svata iti |
tatra bhaṭṭagurumiśrasādhāraṇī svatastvavipratipattiḥ jñānaṃ
prāmāṇyāviṣayakapratītyaviṣayo na vā, yāvatī jñānagrāhikā
sāmagrī sā prāmāṇyagrāhakasāmagryabhinnā na vā, jñānaviṣayatā
prāmāṇyaviṣayatāvyāpyā na vā, jñānajñānatvaṃ prāmāṇyajñānatvaṃ ca
prāmāṇyajñānatvānyūnānatiriktavṛtti na vā | prasiddhistu sarvatra
svayamūhanīyā | prāmāṇyāprāmāṇyagrāhakasāmagryāmabhedena vyāpya
vyāpakabhāvāṅgīkāre (prāmāṇyajñānatve) ca yathāsaṅkhyamanvayakoṭi
prasiddhiḥ | vyatirekakoṭistu sarvatra sugrahaiva | yadi ca jñāna
padajanitajñānena nirvikalpake vā'prāmāṇyollekhinā ca jñānena
smaraṇena ca prāmāṇyaṃ na gṛhyate ityupadarśitavipratipattiṣu
keṣāñcidvipratipattiḥ, tadā prāmāṇyaṃ aprāmāṇyānullekhisaprakāraka-
saviṣayakayāvadanubhavagrāhakānubhava1grāhyaṃ na vā tajjñānaprāmāṇyaṃ
tajjñānaviṣayakajanyajñānājanyajanyajñānagrāhyaṃ na vetyādyūhyamityala
matipāṇḍityena |
viśiṣya tu ghaṭoyamitijñānaprāmāṇyametajjñānānubhavaviṣayatā
vyāpakānubhavaviṣayatāśrayo na vā; etajjñānaprāmāṇyametajjñāna
viṣayo na vā, anubhavānuvyavasāyatvaṃ prāmāṇyaviṣayatāvyāpyaṃ na vā,
tajjñānaprāmāṇyaṃ tajjñānabhinnasākṣātkāragrāhyaṃ na vā, tajjñāna
pramāṇyaṃ tajjñānaviṣayakajñānājanyānumitigrāhyaṃ na veti vā |
svasamvedanasyeti | jñānaṃ svātmānameva na gṛhṇāti dūre
svadharmaprāmāṇyagrahaśaṅketyarthaḥ | dharmadharmiṇorabhede cāprāmāṇyamapi
svata eva gṛhyeteti bhāvaḥ | jñānaṃ svavyavahāre prakāśāntarāna
pekṣam, prakāśatvāt, pradīpavaditi śaṅkate | prakāśatvasyeti |
prakāśatvaṃ yadi tejastvaṃ tadā svarūpāsiddhiryadi jñānatvaṃ (cet)
tadā sādhanavikalo dṛṣṭāntaḥ, prakāśaśabdavācyatvaṃ cet, tadā
gopadavācyatayā vāgādīnāmapi viṣāṇitvaprasaṅga ityāha |
asādhāraṇatvāditi | nanu jānāmīti pratyakṣameva svaprakāśe
pramāṇamityata āha | na ceti | grāhyajñānabhinnaṃ jñānaṃ tadeva vā
jñānamiti sandigdhabhedatvānna prakāśe pramāṇamityarthaḥ | iti
cedityantaṃ śaṅkate | apratyakṣeti | yadi jñānaṃ pratyakṣaṃ na bhave
ttadā'rthadṛṣṭireva na siddhyet jñānameva na siddhyedityarthaḥ | nanu
jñānāntareṇaiva jñānaṃ gṛhyatāmata āha | pareṇeti | jñānāntareṇa
anubhavaviṃṣayatāśrayo na vā iti 3 puº pāº |
grahaṇe doṣāntaramāha | na ceti | naiṣa doṣa iti | na
sandigdhabhedatvaṃ doṣa ityarthaḥ | tathā ca pariśeṣāt svameva
svasmin pramāṇam, tacca svaprakāśamantareṇa na syāditi bhāvaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | kathanteti | tadgrahaṇopāya ityarthaḥ |
svata iti | yadyapi jñānatvaniścāyakayāvanniścayatvaṃ asvatastvaṃ,
aprāmāṇyaniścāyakena tadaniścayāt | nāpyaprāmāṇyāgrāhakajñāna
grāhakayāvanniścayatvam, jñānādipadena jātipravṛttinimittakena
viṣayānuvyavasāyenāprāmāṇyagrāhakeṇa prāmāṇyāniścayāt, tathāpya
prāmāṇyollekhāsādhāṇaheturahitasaviṣayajñānagrāhakayāvadgrāhyatvaṃ svata
stvam | jñānādipadena ca na viṣayagrahaḥ | tajjñānaviṣayaka
jñānājanyasaprakārakajñānagrāhyatvaṃ vā | evañca svena tadanuvyavasāyena
jñātatānupapattikalpanayā vā grāhyatvaṃ saṅgṛhītam | viśiṣyaiva
vā ghaṭo'yamiti jñānaprāmāṇyametadviṣayaviśiṣṭaitadgrāhakamātragrāhyatvaṃ
svatogrāhyatvaṃ tadanyathāgrāhyatvaṃ ca paratastvam | tatra svātmanā yadi
svaṃ gṛhyeta tadā svadharmaḥ prāmāṇyaṃ gṛhyeta, dharmyagrahe dharmasyāgrahāt,
tadeva tvasiddhamityāha | svasamvedanasyeti | svaprakāśepi svamātra
grāhiṇaḥ svadharmagrāhakatvamasambhavi, dharmadharmiṇorabhede cāprāmāṇya
syāpi sva(to)grāhyatvaprasaṅga iti bhāvaḥ | nanu jñānaṃ svavyavahāre
sajātīyāntarānapekṣam, prakāśatvāt, dīpavaditi svaprakāśe māna
mityata āha | prakāśatvasyeti | prakāśatvaṃ yadi tejastvaṃ tadā
'siddhiḥ, jñānatvaṃ cettadā dīpādapi vyāvṛtterasādhāraṇyamityarthaḥ |
nanu svaprakāśaśabdavācyatvaṃ hetuḥ syādityata āha | śabdeti | mā
bhūdgośabdavācyatvena vāco'pi viṣāṇitvāpattirityarthaḥ | nanu
jñānasya prakāśatve pratyakṣameva mānam, jānāmīti pratyakṣeṇa svasya
viṣayīkaraṇādityata āha | nāpīti | kimetadvyavasāyarūpaṃ
kimvedamiti vyavasāyastaduttaramidamahaṃ jānāmītyanuvyavasāyo
mānasa iti sandigdhaṃ sat kathaṃ tatra mānamityarthaḥ | vastuto na
sandehaḥ, arthaniścayena hi pravṛttyādidarśanādvyavasāyasyārthaviṣayatva
mātramanubhūyate na tu svaviṣayatvamapi, svaviṣayatvasya pravṛttyādya
hetutvāt, gauravāt | pūrvaṃ svavyavahāre sajātīyāntarānapekṣatvaṃ
prakāśatvamuktamidānīṃ svaviṣayatvaṃ taducyata iti virodhaśceti bhāvaḥ |
pratyakṣeti | upalambho yasya mate svātmanyapratyakṣaḥ, tasya mānā
bhāvādarthadṛṣṭivadarthajñānaṃ na siddhyedityarthaḥ | nanu tadviṣayakajñānā
ntarāttatsiddhiḥ syādityata āha | pareṇeti | tadapi jñānāntarā
dhīnasiddhikamityanavasthānāddharmigrāhakamānasiddhameva svaprakāśatva
mityarthaḥ | na ceti | yadīyaṃ jñānakriyā sajātīyakriyā
nirūpitakarma syāt etatkarmatānirūpakakriyāsajātīyā na syāt,
cchidāvaditi tarkādanuvyavasāyatve bādhakādidamahaṃ jānāmī
tyanubhavasya vyavasāyatvaṃ niścīyata iti bhāvaḥ ||

śaṅkaº ṭīº | nanu jaḍatvena ghaṭādīnāṃ svavyavahārājanakatvepi
jñānaṃ svayameva svavyavahārajanakamastu, svasmin sati svavyavahārāda
sati tu tadabhāvāt, svavyavahārajanakatvameva svaviṣayakatvaṃ pāri
bhāṣikamiti cenna | vyavahārasya vyavaharttavyagocarajñānajanyatva
niyamāt, tacca svaviṣayatāyāṃ svabhinnajñānaviṣayatāyāṃ vā satyā
meva, tatra svajanakendriyapratyāsattyanadhikaraṇatvādeva na svaviṣayatva-
mato jñānāntaraviṣayatayaiva tasya vyavaharttavyatvopapatteḥ | svagrāhakeṇa
veti dvitīyaṃ pakṣaṃ dūṣayati | nāpīti | svagrāhakeṇānuvyavasāyena
prākaṭyaliṅgena vetyarthaḥ | vivecaneti | aprāmāṇyavyāvṛttaprāmāṇya
grahānupapatterityarthaḥ | aprāmāṇyaśaṅkākalaṅkābhāvo vā vivecanam |
tathā ca prākaṭyena liṅgenānuvyavasāyena vā jñāyamānaṃ niṣkampapravṛtti
janakaṃ na syādityarthaḥ | nanu prāmāṇyopahitajñānagrahaḥ pramāṇameva,
tathā ca kathaṃ na samāśvāsa ityata āha | na hīti | gṛhīta
prāmāṇyameva jñānaṃ pravarttakamityabhipretyāha | anyatheti ||
bhagīº ṭīº | nanu varttamānaṃ svajñānaṃ na mānasam, kintu
svayameva svavyavahārajanakam, svasmin satyeva svavyavahārāt, na tu
jñānāntaramapekṣate, tadanvayavyatirekānuvidhānāt, jñānāntarā
bhāvadaśāyāṃ svabhāvādeva svavyavahārābhāvāt, svata eva svavyavahāro
papattau jñānāntarakalpane gauravācca, icchādivyavahāre jñānāntarā
pekṣā'stu, vyavahārasya jñānajanyatvāt | na ca jñānamātraṃ na jñāna
vyavahāraheturapi tu vyavaharttavyaviṣayamiti jñānavyavahāropi
tadviṣayakajñānāntarāditi vācyam | svasyaiva svaviṣayakatvāt,
yadvyavahārānukūlaśaktiyuktaṃ yajjñānaṃ tasyaiva tadviṣayakatvāt | na ca
vyavaharttavyabhinnajñānatvena vyavahārahetutvaṃ, gauravāditi |
maivam | svajanakendriyapratyāsattyanāśrayatvena svasya svānāśrayāt,
viṣayatvaniyāmakasyendriyasannikarṣāderabhāve svaviṣayatvānupapatteḥ,
kāraṇaṃ vinā kāryānutpādāt, pratyakṣājanyasya pratyakṣaviṣayatvā-
nupapatteḥ, ātmadharmapratyāsattyanāśraye pratyakṣaviṣayatāyā janakatva
vyāptatvāt | jñānasya pratyakṣatvenendriyasannikarṣāśrayatvāt, tataśca
mānasatvāt, tasmādvivādapadamindriyajanyaṃ jñānaṃ naitajjñānaviṣayaḥ,
etajjanakendriyapratyāsattyanāśrayatvādetadajanakatvādvā, asannikṛṣṭavat,
jñānaṃ prameyamiti vyāptijñānaṃ jñānatvasāmānyapratyāsattyā svaviṣaya
mīśvarajñānamahetukatvāt sarvaviṣayamiti svaprakāśameveti saṅkṣepaḥ |

mantavyam | niścayeti | asau prāmāṇyaniścayaḥ | yadi jñāna
grāhakeṇaiva prāmāṇyagrahastadā niścite nāprāmāṇyaśaṅkā, atastadanu
rodhādanyadeva prāmāṇyagrāhakameṣitavyamityarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | sphuredapītyapinā svābhipretaṃ pāramārthikama
sphuraṇaṃ sūcitam | śaṅketyādi | tat prāmāṇyam | viparīta
koṭiśaṅkāśūnyaṃ prāmāṇyajñānameva tanniścaya ityarthaḥ | niścayaphalaṃ
prāmāṇyaniścayasya janakam | anyathā tasyājanakam | asau
prāmāṇyaniścayaḥ |
sphuraṇamātramapi tāvadastu svata iti cet, kiṃ tena |
na caitadapi, ananusaṃhitopādherupahitapratyayāyogāt |
na ca viṣayopadhānamātraṃ prāmāṇyam, tadābhāsasādhā
raṇyāt | api tvanubhavasya sato bhūtārthānusandhānam |
na cārthānusandhānepi tasya bhūtatvamanusandhīyate,
āropitatvavyāvarttakaviśeṣaṇānanusandhānāt | ananu
saṃhitasya cāropasādhāraṇyāt | kvacidviśeṣopyanu
sandhīyata iti cet, na kvāpi prāthamikena | anyathā
'nabhyāsadaśāyāṃ tatrāpi saṃśayo na syāt | abhyāsa-
daśotpanne tu anusandhānaṃ vyāptigrahajanitasaṃskāra
samudbhavasmaraṇabalena bhavat pramāṇāntaraśarīra eva pravi
śatīti parata evāvaśiṣyate |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | tābhyāṃ prāmāṇyasphuraṇaṃ tāvadastītyataḥ
svatastvaṃ siddhamevetyāha | sphuraṇamātramiti | tato niṣkampā
pravṛttiścenna bhavati tadā kiṃ tena prāmāṇyasphuraṇenetyāha | kiṃ
teneti | nanu tathāpi tvadabhimataṃ paratastvaṃ bhagnamevetyata āha |
na ceti | viśeṣyāvṛttyaprakāratvātmakasya svaprāmāṇyasya tatrāsphuraṇā
dityarthaḥ | prāmāṇyaghaṭakopādhyananusandhāne prāmāṇyopahitapratyayā
sambhavādityarthaḥ | nanu ghaṭaviṣayatvameva ghaṭajñānasya prāmāṇyam,
tacca jñānagrāhakagrāhyamevetyata āha | na ceti | ghaṭabhramepi
ghaṭaviṣayakatvasambhavādityarthaḥ | tarhi kiṃ tat prāmāṇyaṃ yat
svato grahītumaśakyamityata āha | api tviti | yathārthānu
bhavatvamityarthaḥ | yathārthatvañca viṣayatāsamānādhikaraṇaprakārāva
cchinnatvaṃ viṣayatāvyadhikaraṇaprakārānavacchinnatvaṃ vetyarthaḥ | tarhi
tadeva svato niścīyatāmata āha | na ceti | arthaviṣayakatva
grahepi tattvasya grahītumaśakyatvādityarthaḥ | āropitatvavyāvarttakaṃ
viśeṣaṇaṃ viśeṣyāvṛttyaprakārakatvādi | tadananusandhānañca pūrvaṃ tadanupa
sthitatvenetyāha | āropiteti | ananusaṃhitasyeti | tadviṣayakatva
mātrasyetyarthaḥ | kvaciditi | ghaṭa evāyamitītaravyavacchedamukhena
jāyamānajñāna ityarthaḥ | prāthamikeneti | prathamaṃ jñānagrāhiṇā
anuvyavasāyena jñātatāliṅgakānumānena vetyarthaḥ | kathaṃ netyata
āha | anyatheti | ayaṃ vahnirevetyaparicitavahnerapi śabdādinā
jāyamāne jñāne prāmāṇyasya svayaṃ grahaṇāpatteḥ, tathā ca prāmāṇyā
prāmāṇyakoṭikaḥ saṃśayo na syādityarthaḥ | nanu kvacidityabhyāsa
daśāpannameva jñānaṃ brūmaḥ, tacca svato gṛhyatām, na hi tatrāpi
saṃśayo'stītyata āha | abhyāsadaśeti | tatrāpi tajjātīyatvena
liṅgenaiva prāmāṇyaṃ gṛhyate | tathāhi | ayaṃ pṛthivītvenānubhavaḥ
pṛthivītvavati pṛthivītvaprakārakaḥ, gandhavadviśeṣyakapṛthivītvaprakāraka
niścayatvāt pūrvapṛthivītvaprakārakaniścayavat | evamayaṃ śarīra
tvenānubhavaḥ śarīratvavatyeva śarīratvaprakārakaḥ, karacaraṇādimadvi
śeṣyakaśarīratvaprakārakānubhavatvādityādyūhyam | tajjātīyatvaṃ lakṣaṇa
vadviśeṣyakalakṣyajñānatvaṃ draṣṭavyam | vyāptīti | yo gandha
vadviśeṣyakaḥ pṛthivītvaprakārakānubhavaḥ sa pṛthivītvavatyava pṛthivītva
prakāraka ityādiprakāreṇa yadvyāptigrahaṇaṃ tajjanito yaḥ saṃskāra
statprabhavaṃ yatsmaraṇamityarthaḥ | pramāṇāntaramanumānam, tatraivānta
rbhavatītyarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | nanu kvacidagre saṃśayābhāvāt pūrvaṃ prāmāṇya
niścayo bhavatyeva, māyāliṅgini sati jhaṭiti parivrājakabuddhi
vadityāha | sphuraṇamātramapīti | tādṛśasya prāmāṇyagrahasya viśeṣa
darśanājanyasyāpramāṇasādhāraṇatayā na niṣkampapravṛttyaṅgatvamityāha |
kiṃ teneti | viśeṣyāvṛttyaprakārakatvaṃ na jñānamātragrāhiṇā gṛhītuṃ
śakyamityāha | ananusaṃhiteti | viśeṣo viśeṣyāvṛttyaprakāraka
tvam | ananusaṃhitasyeti | tadviṣayajñānatvamātrasya cetyarthaḥ |
kvaciditi | karatalajñānādāvabhyāsadaśāpanna ityarthaḥ | prāthamikena
jñānagrāhakeṇetyarthaḥ | anyatheti | yadyanabhyāsadaśāpannadharmyeva na
gṛhītaḥ, kutaḥ saṃśayaḥ, dharmijñānasya taddhetutvāt, tadgrahe tu tatprā
māṇyasyāpi niścayāditi kutaḥ saṃśayaḥ | abhyāseti | jhaṭiti
liṅgānusandhānaprabhavatvenāpyupapadyamānaṃ na svatastvamākṣipatītyarthaḥ |
parata eveti |
nanu svagrāhyatvepi kadācit paragrāhyatvāt svasyāpyanyā
pekṣayā paratvāt bhaṭṭamate paragrāhyatvācca siddhasādhanam | na ca
grāhyaprāmāṇyāpekṣayā paratvaṃ prāmāṇyagrāhakasyāpi grāhyaprāmāṇyatayā
tadapekṣayā paratvābhāvāt agrāhyaprāmāṇyāpekṣayā parattve grāhyaprāmāṇya
syāprāmāṇyopapatteḥ | kiñci prāmāṇya parato jñāyate, anabhyāsa
daśāyāṃ sāṃśayikatvādityanumānamanaikāntikaṃ, jñāne niścite'pi
prāmāṇyasaṃśayāhitasaṃśayaviṣayatvāt | na ca jñānadharmatvena hetu
rviśeṣaṇīyaḥ, tathā sati yatra jñānaviṣayaprāmāṇyasandehe niścita
syāpi jñānadharmasya saṃśayitatvaṃ tatrānaikāntikam, anabhyāsadaśāyā
miti viśeṣaṇamasiddhivārakatvādvyartham |
maivam | anabhyāsadaśāpannajñānaprāmāṇyaṃ na svāśrayagrāhyam,
svāśraye satyapi taduttaratṛtīyakṣaṇavarttisaṃśayaviṣayatvāt, aprāmāṇya
saṃśayājanyasaṃśayaviṣayatvādvā, aprāmāṇyavat, arthe niścite'pi
na niścayānantaratṛtīyakṣaṇe'rthasaṃśayo na vā prāmāṇyasaṃśayaṃ
vineti na vyabhicāra ityarthāt | na ca svapadasya prāmāṇyamātrapara
tvāttadagrāhyatve bādhaḥ, svapadasya sambandhiśabdatvena samabhivyāhṛta
paratvāt, anyathā parasyāpi svatvāt svasyāpi paratvāt svataḥ
parato veti saṃśayo na syāt | vistarastvanyatra ||
raghuº ṭīº | kiṃ teneti | vinā viparītaśaṅkānirāsaṃ
prāmāṇyajñānamātrasya niṣkampapravṛttyakṣamatvādityarthaḥ | ghaṭo jñāta
iti pratyakṣaṃ na jñānasya vaiśiṣṭyamavagāhate, nayanāderātmaguṇā
grāhakatvāt, manasaśca bahirasvātantryāt, atīndriyatvācca jñānasya,
parantvatiriktāyā eva jñātatāyāḥ, sā ca viśeṣaṇaprakārikā
viśeṣyavṛttirayaṃ ghaṭatvena jñāta ityanubhavāt | janyate ca samāna
prakārakeṇa svāśrayaviśeṣyakeṇa jñānena | tayā cānumīyamāne
jñāne1 pramātvameva siddhyati | tathā hi | iyaṃ jñātatā ghaṭaviśe
ṣyakaghaṭatvaprakārakajñānajanyā, ghaṭaniṣṭhaghaṭatvaprakārakajñātatātvāt, yā
yanniṣṭhā yatprakārikā jñātatā sā tadviśeṣyakatatprakārakajñānajanyā,
yathā paṭaniṣṭhā paṭatvaprakārikā jñātatā paṭaviśeṣyakapaṭatvaprakāraka
jñānajanyeti sāmānyato, viśeṣato vā yathā ghaṭāntare ghaṭatvaprakārikā
jñātateti, avagāhate cendriyasannikarṣādivaśāt prāthamikamiva
jñātatāvagāhyapi pratyakṣaṃ dharmiṇo viśeṣaṇavattām | ata eva cāyaṃ
ghaṭo ghaṭatvena jñāta ityanubhavaḥ | ata eva cāpramāpi prametyeva
jñānaṃ pramātvenaiva siddhyati 1 puº pāº |
gṛhyate doṣavaśāt prāthamikasyeva caramasyāpi pratyakṣasya dharmiṇyasa
dviśeṣaṇavaiśiṣṭyāvagāhitvena liṅgabhramāditi bhāṭṭāḥ |
tadasat | atiriktāyāṃ jñātatāyāṃ pramāṇābhāvāt | ayaṃ
mayā jñāta iti kartturiva kriyāyā apyunayabalenaiva bhānasambhavāt,
anyathākhyātivādināmupanītabhānasyāvaśyakatvāt | ata evāyamiṣṭa
ityādiranubhavaḥ | na ca jñānamatīndriyaṃ, mānābhāvāt, ghaṭamicchā
mītivadghaṭaṃ jānāmīti pratyakṣasya sarvānubhavasiddhatvādityanyatra
vistṛtam | sāmānyato vyāptiśca yattadarthayoranugatayorabhāvenāsambha
vinī | viśeṣato vyāptiśca sādipadārthapramāyāṃ duravadhāraṇeti |
anuvyavasāyena vyavasāye gṛhyamāṇe tadupanītaṃ yathopasthitameva
viśeṣyaṃ viśeṣyatvena viśeṣaṇaṃ ca prakāratvena tatra viśeṣaṇībhūya
bhāsate, upasthite ca viśiṣṭe viśeṣaṇaparityāge hetvabhāvāt |
viśeṣyatvaprakāratvayośca pūrvānupasthitayoreva prakāratāyā ubhayavādi
siddhatvāt | ata evemaṃ ghaṭatvena parvataṃ vahnimattvena jānāmī
tyādiko'nubhavo lokānām | tathā ca tadvadeva ghaṭaṃ ghaṭatvena
jānāmītyanuvyavasāyādghaṭaviśeṣyakatvāvacchinnaṃ ghaṭatvaprakārakatvaṃ
prāmāṇyaṃ tena gṛhyata iti miśrāḥ |
atra vadanti | anabhyāsadaśāyāmanuvyavasāyānantaraṃ prāmāṇya
sandehasya sarvānubhavasiddhatvādvinā ca prāmāṇyasandehaṃ niścite
sandehasya sarvathaivānupapattestaddharmaviśiṣṭaviśeṣyakatvāvacchedena tatpra
kārakatvamanuvyavasāyena na gṛhyata ityeva (phalabalāt) kalpyate,
ananyagatikatvāt | gṛhyate ca viśeṣyatāvacchedakaviśiṣṭaviśeṣya-
katvāvacchedena viśeṣaṇaprakārakatvam | tenemaṃ ghaṭatvena jānāmī
tyanubhavo na viruddhyate | pramuṣṭatattāṃśakasya ca smaraṇasya ghaṭaṃ
smarāmi ghaṭatvena vā smarāmītyādikonubhavo na tu ghaṭaṃ ghaṭatvene
tyādikaḥ, tadviśeṣyakatvatatprakārakatvayoranupasthitayoḥ prakāratvā
yogāt sambandhavidhayaivānuvyavasāye bhānam, tena tatprakārakaḥ
prāmāṇyasandeho na viruddhyate | koṭidvayasmārakaṃ ca ghaṭatvajñāna
tvādisādhāraṇadharmadarśanamityapi kecit ||
tatrāpyanavastheti cet, na tāvadasau dṛṣṭāntadvārikā,
prāgeva tanniścayāt | phaladvārikā tu syādapi, yadi
prāmāṇyamavaśyaniśceyamabhyupeyate | ajñātaprāmāṇyena
kathaṃ paraprāmāṇyavedanamiti cet, yathā viṣayasaṃve
danam | astu tarhi dharmiliṅgadvārikā, tābhyā
maniścitābhyāmananumānāt tanniścayasya ca prāmāṇya
niścayamantareṇānupapatteḥ | na | dvaitābhāvāt | yatra hi
liṅgajñāne dharmijñāne vā tathyātathyabhāvena dvaitamupa
labhyate tatra tathyatvāniścaye liṅgamābhāsaśaṅkākrānta
tayā na niścīyate, yatra tu tajjñānaṃ tadekaniyataṃ
tatra tāvataiva liṅganiścayaḥ, tadābhāsaśaṅkānutthānāt |
ekakoṭiniyato hyanubhavo niścayaḥ | jñānataddharmagrāhiṇi
ca jñāne na dvaitamiti vyavasthitireva | prāmāṇya-
niścayastu tasyāpi parata eveti nyāyasampradāyaḥ | ita
eva viśeṣāttādṛśasya svata eveti tātparyācāryāḥ |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | tatrāpīti | tajjātīyatvena liṅgena prāmāṇya
grahe'pītyarthaḥ | na tāvaditi | dṛṣṭāntībhūtaṃ yatprāktanaṃ pṛthivītva
prakārakaṃ jñānaṃ tasyāpīdānīmeva prāmāṇyaṃ grāhyamevaṃ tatra tatrā
pītyanavasthā tāvanna bhavati, prāgeva tatprāmāṇyagrahādityarthaḥ | nanu
tajjātīyatvādinā liṅgena yā'numitiridānīmutpadyate sāpi
gṛhītaprāmāṇyā paraprāmāṇyaṃ niścāyayatyeva, sāpi sāpīti
phaladvārikā'navasthā syādityata āha | phaladvāriketi | prāmāṇya
syāvaśyajñeyatvānabhyupagamādeva neyamanavasthetyarthaḥ | yatheti | na hi
gṛhītaprāmāṇyameva jñānamarthaniścāyakam, tathā sati prathamamartha
niścayopi na syāditi bhāvaḥ | dharmīti | pakṣajñānaliṅga
jñānadvāriketyarthaḥ | anavasthāmeva sphorayati | tābhyāmiti |
dvaitābhāvāditi | prāmāṇyānumitau dharmi tāvajjñānameva, tadviṣayaṃ
ca jñānamanuvyavasāyarūpaṃ, tatra ca dvaitaṃ prāmāṇyāprāmāṇyobhayarūpatvaṃ
tacca nāsti, anuvyavasāyasya prāmāṇyaikaniyatatvāttatrāprāmāṇya
śaṅkānudayānna tatrāpi prāmāṇyagrahāpekṣetyarthaḥ | tarhi dharmijñānaṃ
liṅgajñānaṃ vā na kvāpi parīkṣyetetyata āha | yatra hīti |
tadekaniyatam prāmāṇyaikaniyatam | tāvataiva agṛhītaprāmāṇyajñāna
mātreṇaiva | kuta etadityata āha | tadābhāseti | dvaitābhāvāditi
saṅgrahavyākhyānamupasaṃharati | ekakoṭīti | nanvevamanuvyavasāya
prāmāṇye svatastvaṃ samāyātamityapasiddhānta ityata āha |
prāmāṇyeti | yadi vyasanitayā tatra prāmāṇyamanumīyate tadā
tatprāmāṇyamanumānādeva gṛhyate nyāyanaye prāmāṇyasya nityānu
meyatvādityarthaḥ | nanvanumānasya nirastasamastavibhramāśaṅkasya svata
eva prāmāṇyamiti kathaṃ ṭīkā, kathaṃ vā tavāpi tatra tādṛśameva
vyākhyānamata āha | ita eveti | tatrāpi svataḥ prāmāṇya
maprāmāṇyaśaṅkānāspadatvaṃ ṭīkākṛttātparyaviṣayo mamāpi tadabhi
prāyakameva tatra tathā vyākhyānamityarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | nanu yadi prāmāṇyaṃ parato jñāyeta tadā
prāmāṇyānumiterapi prāmāṇyaniścayārthaṃ tatprāmāṇyānumānapāra
mparyāt phalamukhyanavasthā vyāptipakṣaliṅgajñāne svaviṣayaniścayārthaṃ
prāmāṇyānumānapāramparyācca kāraṇamukhī sā syādityata āha |
anavastheti | tatra vyāptiniścaye dṛṣṭāntadvārikāmanavasthāṃ nirā
karoti | na tāvaditi | vyāptigrahaviṣayadṛṣṭāntajñānasya pūrvameva
dṛṣṭāntāntareṇa niścitaṃ prāmāṇyamanyathānumitireva na syādevaṃ tatra
tatrāpītyanāditaiva tatra parihāra ityarthaḥ | phaladvārikāṃ tāmapā
karoti | phaleti | phalaṃ prāmāṇyānumitiḥ | agṛhīta
prāmāṇyaiva prāmāṇyānumitiḥ svaviṣayaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ niścāyayatīti
na tatprāmāṇyānusaraṇamityarthaḥ | ajñāteti | anyathā vyavasāyopya
gṛhītaprāmāṇya eva svaviṣayaṃ niścāyayati, kiṃ viṣayaniścayārthaṃ
prāmāṇyagraheṇeti bhāvaḥ | yatheti | yathā vyavasāyādagṛhīta
prāmāṇyādapi viṣayaniścaya ityarthaḥ | na brūmo jñānaprāmāṇyā-
devārthaniścayaḥ, kintu yatrāprāmāṇyaśaṅkā nāsti karatalādijñāne,
tatra tata evārthaniścaye niṣkampapravṛttiḥ, yatra tu prāmāṇye
jñāne'prāmāṇyaśaṅkā tatra tatprāmāṇyaniścayādeva prāmāṇyaniścayaḥ, evaṃ
yāvadaprāmāṇyāśaṅkaṃ prāmāṇyānumitiḥ | na caivamanavasthā, carama
prāmāṇyajñānasya jñānābhāve prāmāṇyasaṃśayānavaśyambhāvāditi tu
sāram | pakṣādimukhīṃ tāmutthāpayati | astviti | dvaiteti |
yatra viśeṣadarśanagranthopasthito'prāmāṇyaśaṅkāyā abhāvastatra vyavasāyā
devārthaniścayaḥ, dharmijñāne sādhyavyāpyatayā'vadhṛtajñāne ca nāprāmāṇya
śaṅketyarthaḥ | jñāneti | na hyajānanneva jānāmītyanuvyavasyati, na
vā sākṣātkāri jñānamanuminomītyanuvyavasyatītyanuvyavasāye śaṅkāyā
abhāvānna tatprāmāṇyānusaraṇamiti nānavasthetyarthaḥ | evamaprāmāṇya
śaṅkāyā abhāvāttata eva yadyapi niṣkampā pravṛttistathāpi
prāmāṇyaṃ tatrānumānagamyameva, tasya nityānumeyatvādityata āha |
prāmāṇyeti | anumānasya nirastasamastavibhramāśaṅkasya svata eva
prāmāṇyamiti ṭīkāvirodhaṃ pariharati | ita eveti | dhūmavati
vahnijñānatvamanumiteḥ prāmāṇyaniyatamanuvyavasāyenopanītam | svato
viśeṣadarśanānna tatrāprāmāṇyaśaṅketi | prāmāṇyaniścayādivā
'prāmāṇyaśaṅkāvirahārthaṃ niścitya niṣkampaḥ pravarttata ityabhi
prāyastasyetyarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | prāgeveti | dṛṣṭānte ca kvaciddṛṣṭāntāntareṇa
kvacicca prakāravyāpyavadviśeṣyatvenopasthite jñāne manasaiva prāmāṇya
paricchidyate | aprāmāṇyamiva prakārābhāvavadvyāpyavadviśeṣyakatvenopa
sthite vijñāna iti | yatheti | dharmiṇi viparītakodyanullekhi
vijñānaṃ niścayaḥ, sa cāprāmāṇyagrahānākrāntastatkāryamarjayati,
kvaciccāprāmāṇyaśaṅkotsārakatvena prāmāṇyaniścaya upayujyate, na tu
tena vinā tasya svaviṣayaniścayatvamevāpaiti, anyathā prāmāṇya
niścayasyāpi tathātvārthaṃ prāmāṇyaniścayānusaraṇe'navasthāprasaṅgāditi
bhāvaḥ | dharmīti | dharmī pakṣaḥ | prāmāṇyaniścayamiti | aprāmāṇya
śaṅkākalaṅkitatvāditi bhāvaḥ | śaṅkotpādāsambhavena nirākurute |
na dvaitābhāvāditi | jñānataddharmagrāhiṇi ca jñāna iti jāgara
sākṣātkāramadhikṛtya | nanvevamanumānasya nirastasamastavibhramā
śaṅkasya svata eva prāmāṇyamiti ṭīkāvirodha ityata āha | ita
eveti | viśeṣadarśanagrastatvenāprāmāṇyaśaṅkānudayātsvata eveti
tattātparyamityarthaḥ | viśeṣaśca vyāpyavati vyāpakajñānatvam, tacca
liṅgopahitalaiṅgikabhānādanuvyavasāyagamyamiti ||
syānmatam | etadeva tu kathaṃ niśceyaṃ yadevambhūtameka
koṭiniyatameva yāvatā tatrāpyanavasthitiriti cenna |
vyāptijñānasya sākṣādātmanyapravṛttāvapi sarvopasaṃhāreṇa
yamupādhimādāya pravṛttistaddharmavattvāt tajjātīyatvaṃ
hi tatropādhistacca tatrāpyaviśiṣṭamanuvyavasāyatvāt |
na ca sāmānyato niyamaniścaye tadāliṅgite viśeṣe
dvaitaśaṅkāvakāśaḥ | yathā vācakaḥ śabda iti svātmano
vācakatvaṃ na sākṣādvidhatte vṛttivirodhāt, tathāpi
sāmānyena yamupādhimadhikṛtya pravṛttaḥ śabdastadvattvāt
śabdaśabdo vācako na veti śaṅkayā na paribhūyate
nāpyanavasthetyevamihāpīti |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | nanvanuvyavasāyaḥ prāmāṇyaikaniyata ityapi
niścayaḥ kathaṃ syāttatrāpyanumityapekṣāyāṃ punaranavasthaiveti śaṅkate |
syānmatamiti | yo yo'nuvyavasāyaḥ sa sarvaḥ pramāṇamevetyanu
vyavasāyatvāvacchedena gṛhītā vyāptiḥ prakṛtā'nuvyavasāyasyāpyanu
vyavasāyatvenaiva tajjātīyatvena liṅgenānuvyavasāyaprāmāṇyānumāna
mityarthaḥ | nanvevaṃ sarvatrānuvyavasāye prāmāṇyānumitirāyātetyana
vasthaiva punarityata āha | na ceti | atrāprāmāṇyaśaṅkaiva nodeti
yatra tvanumitīcchā tatrāyaṃ prakāra ityarthaḥ | atrānurūpamudā
haraṇamāha | yathā ceti | śabdatvāvacchedenaiva vācakatvagrahe śabda
śabdasyāpi vācakatvaṃ paricchidyata evātastatra yathā na śaṅkā
tathā prakṛte'pītyarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | vyāptijñānamukhīmanavasthāmutthāpayati |
syānmatamiti | sādhyaliṅgayorvyāptijñānaprāmāṇyānumitiparamparāyā
manavasthetyarthaḥ | sākṣāditi | yadyapi vyāptijñānamasādhāraṇa
tadvyaktitvādirūpapuraskāreṇa na svaviṣayam, tathāpi sādhāraṇa
rūpapuraskāreṇa tathetyarthaḥ | tatrāpīti | vyāptijñānagrāhiṇi
jñāne'pyanuvyavasāyatvaṃ sādhāraṇamevetyarthaḥ | na ceti | yatsāmānye
yanniścayastadvati viśeṣe na tatsaṃśayaḥ, vyāpyatāvacchedakarūpavattayā
jñānasyaiva saṃśayapratibandhakatvādityarthaḥ | etadevānurūpadṛṣṭāntena
spaṣṭayati | yathā ceti ||
raghuº ṭīº | nanu dharmijñānādau kuto na prāmāṇyasaṃśayaḥ, kiṃ
sādhāraṇadharmavirahāduta viśeṣadarśanāt, nādyaḥ, jñānatvādereva
sattvāt, viśeṣaśca prāmāṇyaṃ tasya darśanaṃ cānumitiḥ, sā
ca pakṣādijñānasāpekṣā, tatrāpyaprāmāṇyaśaṅkānirāsastatprāmāṇyānu
miterityevamanavastheti śaṅkate | syānmatamiti | na kevalaṃ koṭi
niścaya eva viparītaśaṅkāpratibandhako'pi tu vyāptyādidarśanamapī
tyāśayena nirākurute | na vyāptīti | sākṣāt viśiṣya |
ātmani viśeṣātmani | prakṛte anuvyavasāyadharmijñānādau |
taddharmavattvāt pravṛttiriti yāvat | anuvyavasāyatveti | dharmi
jñānatvavyāpyavadviśeṣyaka-vyāpaka-jñānatvayorapyupalakṣakam | sāmānyataḥ
prāmāṇyaniścayepi viśeṣataḥ kathaṃ na tatsaṃśaya ityata āha | na
ceti | yathā dhūmatvāvacchedena vahnivyāpyatvaniścaye'yaṃ dhūmo vahni
vyāpyo na veti yathā vā karacaraṇādikaṃ sthāṇutvābhāvavyāpyamiti
niścaye'yaṃ karacaraṇādimāniti grahe'yaṃ sthāṇurna veti na saṃśaya
iti | vistṛtaṃ cedamanyatra | vācakaḥ śaktaḥ śabdo'rthapratyāyakaḥ ||
tarkāścātra bhavanti | yadi dharmijñānaṃ vyabhicaret,
nirālambanamasadālambanaṃ vā bhavet, niṣiddhaṃ ca tat |
yadyanuvyavasāyo vyabhicaret, tadārthakarmakopi na
syāt, jñānetarasyārthaprāvaṇyābhāvāt | yadi tajjātīyaṃ
vyabhicaret avyabhicāro na kvacidvyavatiṣṭheta | tadavyava
sthitau vyabhicāropi na syāt, anyathākhyātirūpatvā
ttasya, tattvasthitau cānyathātvaṃ syāt, tadavadhikatvāt |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | atreti | dharmijñānaṃ pramāṇameva, anuvyavasāyaḥ
pramāṇameva, lakṣaṇavallakṣyajñānamavyabhicāryevetyādau | prathamavyāptau
tarkamāha | yadīti | dvitīyavyāptāvāha | yadyanuvyavasāya iti |
vyabhicaret vyavasāyamantareṇa syādevetyarthaḥ | arthakarmako na bhave
diti | arthaṃ bāhyaṃ karmatayā nollikhet, vyavasāyamantareṇa manasa
statrāsāmarthyāt | etadevāha | jñānetarasyeti | arthapravaṇaṃ jñānaṃ
viṣayīkurvata eva tasyārthakarmatvopapatteḥ | tṛtīyavyāptāvāha |
yadi tajjātīpamiti | tadavadhitvāditi | tattvasāpekṣatvādanya
thātvasyetyarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | tarkāścātreti | idaṃ jñānaṃ yadi viśeṣyāvṛttya
prakārakaṃ na syādajñānaṃ viśeṣyāvṛttiprakārakaṃ vā syāt, anuvyava
sāyo yadi vyabhicaret jñānaviṣayakaḥ sākṣātkāro (vā) na syāt,
anarthapravaṇasyārthapravaṇatayā sākṣātkārāsambhavāt, sāmagrīvirodhāt,
gandhavati pṛthivījñānatvaṃ yadi gandhaviṣayavṛtti na syāt, jñānavṛtti
na syāditi krameṇāpādanārthaḥ | tadavyavasthitāviti | pṛthivī-
jñānatvaṃ yadyavyabhicārivṛtti na syāt jñānamātranirūpitaviṣayatve
sati vyabhicārivṛtti na syādityarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | vyabhicaret sadviṣayakaṃ na syāt | nirālambana
miti svamatena | asadālambanamiti bauddhanayena | atrāpādake
jñānatve satīti draṣṭavyam | anyataratvenāpādyatā ityapi kaścit |
vyabhicaret jñānaviṣayako na syāt | arthakarmakaḥ arthapravaṇakarmakaḥ |
icchāderapyarthapravaṇatvamate tu icchādyaviṣayatvenāpādakaṃ viśeṣaṇīyam |
tajjātīyaṃ vyāpyavati vyāpakajñānam | gandhavati pṛthivītvaprakārakaṃ
jñānaṃ yadi pṛthivyāṃ pṛthivītvaprakārakaṃ na syāt gandhavati
pṛthivītvaprakārakaṃ na syāt yadi pṛthivīmātraviśeṣyakaṃ na syāt
gandhavanmātraviśeṣyakaṃ na syāt yadi pṛthivīmātraviśeṣyakaṃ na syāt
gandhavadviśeṣyakaṃ na syādityādi | pṛthivītvavyāpyavadviśeṣyakasyāpi
pṛthivyaviśeṣyakatve pṛthivīpramāmātravilope pṛthivyasiddhyā pṛthivī
bhinnāsiddhau pṛthivībhinne pṛthivītvaprakārakatvamaprāmāṇyamapi na
siddhyet | evamanyatrāpīti ||
etena svapnajāgarāvasthayoraviśeṣa iti nirastam |
asatkhyāterātmakhyāteśca 1nirākṛtatvāt, anyathā
khyāteśca tattvakhyātivyavasthāmantareṇānupapatteriti | sā
ca jāgarepi yadi na syāt, na syādeveti |
pratiṣedhāt iti 1 puº pāº |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | eteneti | tathyātathyavibhāgavyavasthāpane
netyarthaḥ | yadvā bhramasyānyathākhyātitvavyavasthāpanenetyarthaḥ | tathā ca
jāgarajñānaṃ na pramā jñānatvāt svapnajñānavadityādīnāmanavakāśa
iti bhāvaḥ | svapnajñānānāmaprāmāṇyamanyathākhyātirūpatayaiva vācyam |
sā ca tattvakhyātipūrvikaiva, tattvakhyātiśca jāgarāvasthajñānaviśeṣa
evetyāha | asatkhyāteriti ||
bhagīº ṭīº | jāgarajñānamapramā jñānatvādityapramāsādhakaṃ
pramātvopasthitau na sambhavatītyāha | eteneti ||
raghuº ṭīº | jāgarapratyayo bhrāntaḥ, pratyayatvāt, svapna
pratyayavaditi mataṃ nirasyati | eteneti | yatkiñcijjāgara
pratyayasya bhrāntatve sādhye siddhasādhanam, yāvatāṃ tathātve caitadanu
mitiprāmāṇyāprāmāṇyābhyāṃ vyāghāta iti ||
tathāpi kathamanayoravasthayorvibhāgaḥ karttavya iti
cenna | lokasiddhatvāt | kimanayorlakṣaṇamiti cet,
kartṛkarmakaraṇadeśakālaprabandhabādhaḥ kākatālīyasamvāda
vān svapnasya, prabandhe kākatālīyaḥ kasyacideva
viṣayasya bādho jāgarasyeti | etena bādhyaprabandho
'vasthāviśeṣaḥ svapnaḥ prabandhabādhakādirvādhyamāna
prabandhānto jāgaritamityapi draṣṭavyamityeṣā dik |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | bhavedevaṃ yadi lakṣaṇabhedo'nayoravasthayoḥ
syādityata āha | tathāpīti | nanu lokasyāpi bhedavyavasthiti
rlakṣaṇādhīnetyāha | kimiti | ahaṃ dhavalagṛhe madhyāhne hastena
pāyasaṃ bhuñja ityatra kartrādīnāṃ sarveṣāṃ bādhaḥ | nanu sarvabādhe
kathaṃ jñānaṃ nirālambanaṃ kathaṃ vā'nyathākhyātiḥ kutra vā''ropaḥ
kathaṃ vā jāgarānantaramapi kvacidapi samvāda ityata āha |
kākatālīyeti | anyathānupapattyaivāropaviṣayāṇāmantato bahi
rarthādīnāṃ mandataratamādibhāvena śabdādyupalambhāditi bhāvaḥ |
svapnasyeti | lakṣaṇamityanuvarttanīyam | evaṃ jāgarasyetyatrāpi |
eteneti | lakṣaṇāntareṇa vibhāgavyavasthāpanenetyarthaḥ | avasthā
viśeṣa iti | siddhopaplutāntaḥkaraṇāvasthāviśeṣaḥ, tathā svapna
vahanāḍīviśeṣasaṃyogajaṃ jñānaṃ svapnaḥ | taditarajñānaṃ jāgaraḥ |
svapnatvajāgaratve jātiviśeṣau vā | na cānumititvādinā parā
parabhāvānupapattiḥ, sarvasvapnānāṃ sākṣātkā(rya)risvabhāvarūpatvāt |
ata eva na smṛtitvasāṅkaryamapīti bhāvaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | bādhyaḥ prabandho yasyetyarthaḥ | prabandhasya
svapnasyaiva yadvādhakaṃ tadādau yasya, bādhyaḥ prabandhaḥ svapna evānte
yasya tattathetyarthaḥ | yadyapyetadyathāśrutamavyāpakamativyāpakaṃ ca,
tathāpi svapnavahanāḍīsaṃyogajaṃ jñānaṃ svapnaḥ, tadanyajñānaṃ jāgaraḥ |
jātiviśeṣo vā | na cānumititvena parāparabhāvānupapattiḥ,
svapne'numityasiddheḥ, nidrāsahakāriṇā manasā sarvatra viṣaye
sākṣātkāritvasyaivotpādāt ||
raghuº ṭīº | lokaprasiddhasyāpi vinā lakṣaṇaṃ vibhāgo'
1nupapanna ityāśayena pṛcchati | kimiti | svapnavahanāḍīmanaḥ
saṃyogajanyaṃ tannāḍīsaṃyuktamanojanyaṃ vā jñānaṃ svapnaḥ | svapnavahatvaṃ
tu nāḍīgato jātiviśeṣaḥ | svapnatvaṃ mānasatvavyāpyo jātiviśeṣo
vinaiva ca smaraṇamadṛṣṭodbuddhasaṃskārasahitānmanasastādṛśaṃ jñāna
mutpadyate | cākṣuṣatvādivadanumititvādikamapi saṃskāravaśāttatrā
