ropyata ityanye | svapnabhinnaṃ jñānaṃ jāgara iti ||
tasmāttathyameva viśvaṃ, mandaprayojanatvāttu satvarai
rmumukṣubhirupekṣitamiti yuktamutpaśyāmaḥ | tarhi
naiyāyikānāṃ jagatparirakṣaṇe koyamabhiniveśātiśaya
iti cet, sahasaiva tadupekṣāyāṃ nyāyābhāsāvakāśe
2pramāṇamātraviplavo bhavet, tathā ca nyāyaruciḥ
prekṣāvānna tattvamadhigacchediti bhiyeti |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | prakṛtamupasaṃharati | tasmāditi | tarhi
vedāntināṃ prapañcamithyātvapravādaḥ kinnibandhana ityata āha |
'śakya iti 2 puº pāº |
nyāyamārgaviplavo iti 1 puº pāº |
mandaprayojanatvāditi | upaniṣadabhyāsajanitātmasākṣātkārā
vedāntino mokṣāya tvaramāṇāḥ prapañcavicāre prayojanābhāva
mākalayantastatrodāsata ityarthaḥ | tarhi naiyāyikā api mumukṣava
steṣāṃ kathamatrāgraha ityata āha | tarhīti | śravaṇānantaraṃ
yanmananaṃ tatrānvīkṣikīpravṛttistatra manane hetudṛṣṭāntapakṣavyāptyādi
jñānaṃ pramārūpaṃ prayojakaṃ, pramā ca yathārthānubhavarūpeti prapañcasatyatve
paraṃ tadupapadyata iti tadartho'bhiniveśa ityarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | prakṛtamupasaṃharati | tasmāditi | samprati
loko'loko yajño'yajña ityādi śrutivirodhaṃ pariharati |
mandeti | utpannatattvasākṣātkārasya lokopajīvanamaphalamiti
śrutestātparyamityarthaḥ | nanvevaṃ tattvasākṣātkārāt prāk kimarthaṃ
tasya lokopajīvanamityata āha | tarhīti | lokasiddhaprāmāṇya
nyāyenātmani mananācchaṅkākalaṅkāpagamāt dhyānādau bahvāyāsa
sādhye pravṛttiriti tataḥ prāk tadupajīvanamityāha | sahasaiveti ||
|| iti bāhyārthabhaṅgavādaḥ ||
guṇaguṇibhedabhaṅgavādaprārambhaḥ |
astu tarhi guṇaguṇinorabhedānnairātmyam, kṣaṇika
jñānamātrapariśeṣāditi cet, ucyate | asti tāva
diha darśanasparśanābhyāmekārthānusandhānam | tadida
mekaikaviṣayaṃ vā syāt, samudāyaviṣayaṃ vā, tadati
riktaviṣayaṃ vā, vastvananurodhyākāraviṣayaṃ vā, alīka
viṣayaṃ vā |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | ātmani tṛtīyaṃ bādhakaṃ dūṣayitumupanyasyati |
astu tarhīti | jñānabhinna ātmā nāstītyeva hi nairātmyapakṣaḥ,
sa ca jñānātmanorabhedādeva paryavasanna ityarthaḥ | ātmā jñānā
bhinnaḥ, tadaviṣayakapratītyaviṣayatvāt, jñānaṃ vā ātmābhinnaṃ, tada
viṣayakapratītyaviṣayatvāditi viśeṣato guṇinaṃ pakṣayitvā guṇābhedo
guṇaṃ vā pakṣayitvā guṇyabhedasādhanaṃ vā sāmānyata eva veti | guṇa
bhinnaṃ guṇinaṃ sādhayitumupakramate | astīti | yamahamadrākṣaṃ tamahaṃ
spṛśāmi yaṃ vā'spārkṣaṃ taṃ paśyāmītyeka evārtha indriyābhyāṃ gṛhyate,
tena guṇabhinna eva guṇī siddhyatītyarthaḥ | pratisandhānasyānyathā
siddhimāśaṅkya nirākaroti | tadidamiti | ekaikaviṣayamiti |
rūpamātraviṣayaṃ sparśamātraviṣayaṃ vetyarthaḥ | samudāyeti | rūpasparśa
samudāyaviṣayamityarthaḥ | tadatirikteti | avayaviviṣayaṃ vetyarthaḥ |
ākāreti | jñānākāra eva tathollikhyata ityarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | tṛtīyamātmani bādhakaṃ dūṣayitumupanyasyati |
astviti | nairātmyaṃ jñānabhinnātmābhāvaḥ | guṇitvenābhimataṃ na
tadguṇabhinnaṃ, tadaviṣayakajñānāviṣayatvāt, tadguṇavat, yadvā tadguṇa
stadguṇyabhinnaḥ, tadguṇatvāditi vyatirekī, tathā cāśuvināśi
jñānamate nātmeti siddham | kṣaṇikapadaṃ dvitrikṣaṇāvasthāyiparam |
vijñānamātretyanena na vijñānavādābhyupagamaḥ, rūpādyabhinnaghaṭāde
rbāhyatvasyābhyupagamāt, tathā ca śuklaḥ paṭa iti sāmānādhikaraṇya
dhīrapi saṅgacchate | atra pratyakṣabādhamāha | astīti | yamaha
madrākṣaṃ tamahaṃ spṛśāmītyevaṃrūpam | tadidamiti | rūpamātrasparśa
mātraviṣayamityarthaḥ | samudāyo rūpasparśayoḥ | vastvananurodhī
jñānākāraḥ śaśaśṛṅgajñānasyeva ||
raghuº ṭīº | tṛtīyamātmani bādhakaṃ nirākarttumupanyasyati |
astu tarhīti | guṇaguṇinorabhedāt guṇātiriktasya guṇino
'bhāvāt | nairātmyaṃ jñānātiriktātmavyatirekaḥ | astu tarhi nityaṃ
vijñānamevātmetyata āha | kṣaṇiketi | svasamvedanasamviditebhyaḥ
kṣaṇikanīlādivijñānebhyo'tirikte nitye jñāne mānābhāvāditi
bhāvaḥ | ekārthānusandhānaṃ ekārthagrahaṇam, yamadrākṣaṃ taṃ spṛśāmī-
tyanubhavabalāt | tadidaṃ cākṣuṣaṃ spārśanaṃ ca pratyakṣaṃ rūpamātraviṣayaṃ
sparśamātraviṣayaṃ vā | samudāyo rūpasparśayoḥ ||
na tāvadadyaḥ, na hi yadeva rūpaṃ sa eva sparśa iti | na
ca rūpaṃ tvagindriyagrāhyam, andhasyāpi nīlādipratyaya
prasaṅgāt | na caikameva vastu karaṇabhedenānyathā prathata
iti yuktam, anātmakatvaprasaṅgāt, bhedābhedavyavasthā
nupapatteśca |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | rūpamātraviṣayatve doṣamāha | na hīti |
sparśamātraviṣayatve tu tadvaiparītyenāpādanam | doṣāntaramāha | na
ceti | rūpasya tvagindriyagrāhyatve doṣamāha | andhasyeti | nanu
rūpameva tvacā sparśatvena gṛhyata ityata āha | na ceti | indriya
bhedena janite jñāne prakārabhedānupalabdheḥ rūpatvasparśatve jātī paraṃ
bhinnendriyavedye na tu jātimadapi tatheti yadi tadā tadvastu na
rūpaṃ syānna vā sparśaḥ syāt, viruddhatvāt ityāha | anātmakatveti |
bhedābhedeti | abhinnasyaiva karaṇabhedena vibhinnaprakārakaprathāsambhavā
dityarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | nanu rūpasparśayorabhedepi rūpasparśatve jātī
bhinne, tatra rūpatvena tadgrahaścākṣuṣaḥ, sparśatvena tu spārśana ityāśaṅkya
nirākaroti | na caikameveti | anātmakatveti | vyaktiyogya
tayaiva jāteryogyatvādekendriyagrāhyatve rūpasparśayo rūpatvasparśatvayorapi
tathātvaprasaṅgānna rūpasparśātmakamityarthaḥ | nanu tathāpyekameva vastu
rūpāśrayatvena cakṣuṣā sparśāśrayatvena tvacopalabhyetetyabhyupagamaḥ | na ca
tadrūpamaviruddham, rūpatvādikaṃ tu viruddhamiti vācyam | rūpatva
sparśatvayoravirodhāt, pratīteravirodhāt | na caivamandhopi nīlā
dikamupalabheta, nīlatvādivyāvṛttiviśeṣājñānenāndhatvasambhavāt, na
hi nīlameva nīlatvam |
atrāhuḥ | anyūnānatiriktapratiyogitvena vyāvṛttyorna bhedaḥ
syāt | nīlapṛthivīśabdayoścaivaṃ paryāyatāpattiḥ, tathā satyanyatara
padaśravaṇenānyatarapadasandeho na syāt, pṛthivyabhinnajātīyasya kathaṃ
toyatejasorabhedaḥ syāt | kiñca viruddhadharmādhyāsepyabhede
bhedocchedaḥ syādityāha | bhedeti ||
raghuº ṭīº | rūpasparśayorbhedāccākṣuṣe cetasi sparśasya spārśane
ca rūpasya bhānānupapattirityāha | na hīti | atha cakṣuṣā tvacā
rūpaṃ sparśo vā gṛhyatāmityata āha | na hi rūpaṃ sparśo vā
tvagindriyagrāhyamiti | andhasyāpīti | purovarttini śuklatvādi
vaduṣṇatvāderapi grahaṇaprasaṅgādityapi draṣṭavyam | ekameva vastu
nayanena rūpatvena tvacā ca sparśatvena gṛhyata iti ca na yuktam,
viruddhayorekatra vṛttyasambhavāt, ekataravattāyāṃ ca niyāmakābhāvā
dvastuna ubhayarūpaśūnyatvaprasaṅgāt, viruddhayoścaikatra vṛttau dharmiṇo bheda
prasaṅgāt, tathāpi cābhede bhedamātrocchede bhedābhedavyavasthā'nupapatti
rityāha | na caikamevetyādinā | atha rūpatvasparśatve ekatraiva varttete
virodhe mānābhāvāt | na caivamekataragrahe'nyataragrahāpattiḥ, jāte
ryogyavyaktivṛttitvenaiva yogyatvāditi vācyam | bhavatāṃ rūpādī
nāmivāsmākaṃ rūpatvādīnāṃ svayogyatayaiva vedanena pratiniyatendriya
vedyatvopapatteriti cet, tadidamāntarālikaguṇakhaṇḍanam, dravyasya
ghaṭāderupalambhāt | na caitadapi, pavanamaṇiprabhādau mitho vyabhi
cāriṇoḥ sparśatvarūpatvayoḥ pṛthivyādau saṅkaraprasaṅgāt, prabhāyāṃ sparśatvasya
yogyānupalambhabādhitatvāt | evaṃ nīlatvaghaṭatvādīnāṃ saṅkaraprasaṅgo
nusandheyaḥ | api ca ghaṭe pākena śyāmasya nāśe raktasya cotpādo
dṛśyate, na ca tau jātyoreva, kālāntarepi tayorupalambhāt | nāpi
ghaṭasya, sa evāyaṃ ghaṭa iti pratyabhijñānāt | avacchedabhedena ca
bhāvābhāvayorekatra vṛtteḥ vyavasthāpitatvāt, pūrvaṃ ghaṭamadrākṣamidānīṃ
spṛśāmītyanubhavāt sparśo na rūpaṃ rūpaṃ na sparśa ityabādhitā
nubhavācceti ||
nāpi dvitīyaḥ, sa hi ekadeśatayā vā ekakāla
tayā vā ekakāryatayā vā ekakāraṇatayā veti |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | sa hīti | rūpasparśayoḥ samudāya ityarthaḥ |
atra sarvatra bahuvrīhiḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | yadyapi samudāyasya samudāyighaṭitamūrttika
tvāt samudāyinośca rūpasparśayorekendriyāvedyatvādanusandhānāsambhava-
stadavastha eva, tathāpi prakṛte samudāya eva na sambhavatīti prati
pādayati | nāpītyādinā | saḥ samudāyaḥ | eketyādau catuṣke
bahuvrīhiḥ | ekadeśatvādiviśiṣṭau rūpasparśau samudāya ityarthaḥ ||
na tāvadupādānarūpaikadeśasambhavaḥ, tayoḥ prati
niyatopādānatvāt, sambhave vā tadeva dravyamiti
paryavasitaṃ vivādena | nāpyadhikaraṇībhūtabhūtalādyā
dhāratayā tatsambhavaḥ, cakṣuṣā hyupalabhyamāne bhūtale
rūpaviśeṣe ghaṭopi cakṣuṣaivopalabhyamāno rūpaviśeṣa
stadādhāra iti śakyate niścetum, tayoradharottarabhāve
naikajñānasaṃsargitvāt, tadadhikaraṇāḥ sparśādayopīti
tu kasya pramāṇasya viṣayaḥ | na hi sparśādayaścākṣuṣe
cetasi cakāsati | tvaco'yaṃ vyāpāra ityapi nāsti,
tayāpi bhūtalaghaṭasparśayorādhārādheyabhāvapratīteḥ, na ca
samudāyayostatsambhavaḥ, parasparāśrayatvaprasaṅgāt, ekā
dhāratāyāṃ hi samudāyānusandhānaṃ samudāyānusandhāne
caikādhāratānusandhānasambhava iti | anavasthāprasaṅgācca,
bhūtalasyāpi samudāyatvaṃ kiṅkṛtamityanuyogānivṛtteḥ |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | ādyaṃ dūṣayati | na tāvaditi | tvanmate
rūpasyaiva rūpopādānatvādityarthaḥ | sambhava iti | rūpasparśayorya
dekamupādānaṃ sa eva guṇītyarthaḥ | bhūtale rūpātmake ghaṭasya rūpā-
tmakasyādhārādheyabhāvaḥ paraṃ gṛhyate na tu sparśarūpayorapīti naika
deśatā, tvacāpi sparśayorevādhārādheyabhāvo gṛhyate na rūpasparśayo
rityāha | cakṣuṣā hīti | nanu rūpādisamudāye bhūtale rūpādi
samudāyo ghaṭa upalabhyata eveti kathaṃ nādhārādheyabhāva ityata
āha | na ceti | rūparasādīnāmekādhāratānusandhānādhīnaṃ
samudāyānusandhānaṃ cet tadā'nyonyāśraya ityarthaḥ | anavastheti |
bhūtalasyāpi samudāyatvamekādhāratayaiva syādevaṃ tatra tatrāpītyarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | tayoriti | rūpasparśayostvanmate rūpasparśo
pādānakatvādityarthaḥ | tatsambhavaḥ ekadeśatāsambhavaḥ | cakṣuṣā
hīti | tvakcakṣuṣorekaviṣayatayā rūpasparśayorekādhikaraṇatvenā
grahāt, na hyādheyāgrahe adhikaraṇatvena grahasambhava ityarthaḥ |
samudāyayoriti | bhūtalātmakarūpasparśasamudāyaghaṭātmakarūpasparśa
samudāyayorityarthaḥ | paraspareti | rūpasparśayoḥ samudāyatvamekā
dhāratvena syāt, tenaiva caikādhāratetyarthaḥ | tayoriti | ekene
ndriyeṇobhayājñānādityarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | tayoḥ rūpasparśayoḥ | tanmate rūpasya rūpameva
sparśasya sparśa evopādānam | bhinnakālayordeśadeśibhāvāsambhavopi
draṣṭavyaḥ | tadadhikaraṇāḥ rūpātmakabhūtalādhikaraṇāḥ | sparśādaya
ityādipadaṃ gandhādisamudāyo ghaṭādiritimatānusāreṇa | bhūtala
ghaṭasparśayoḥ sparśātmakabhūtalaghaṭayoḥ | samudāyayoriti | eko
rūpasparśasamudāya ādhāro'nyaścādheya iti | paraspareti | rūpa
sparśayostanmate vāstavasyaikadeśavṛttitvasyāsambhavādvaijñānikaṃ tadvācyam,
tathā caikadeśavṛttitāyāṃ jñātāyāṃ samudāyapratisandhānaṃ pratisaṃhite
ca samudāye ekadeśavṛttitvajñānamityarthaḥ | samudāyasyādhāratve
doṣāntaramāha | anavastheti | yadvā ādhārasya samudāyasya
samudāyatvamekasamudāyāśrayatayā ekasamudāyavṛttitayā vā, ādye
parasparāśrayo dvitīye'navasthetyāha | parasparetyādi ||
ata eva naikakālatayāpi, tayorekakālatāyāṃ
pramāṇābhāvāt, bhāve vā rāsabhakarabhayorapyekakāla
tayā samudāyatvaprasaṅgaḥ, bhedāgrahasya prakṛtepyasambhavāt |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | ata eveti | samudāyamityanuvṛttena sambandhaḥ |
rūparasādīnāmekendriyagrāhyatvādevetyarthaḥ | pramāṇābhāvamuktvā'ti
prasaṅgamāha | bhāve veti | nanu rāsabhakarabhayorekakālatāyāmapi
bhedagrahādeva na samudāyavyavahāra ityata āha | bhedeti | rūpa
rasādīnāmapi bhedenaiva grahādityarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | bhāve veti | tathā ca ya eva rāsabhaḥ sa
eva karabha iti pratisandhānaṃ syādityarthaḥ | na ca samudāyatvepi
bhedagrahāttatra na pratisandhānamityāha | bhedeti | rūpasparśayorapi
bhedāgrahādityarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | satyapi samudāyatve bhedagrahāt karabharāsabhayorna
pratisandhānaṃ tatrāha | bhedāgrahasyetyādi | rūpasparśayorapi bheda
grahādityarthaḥ ||
ata eva naikakāryatayāpi, upādeyarūpasyaikakārya
syābhāvāt | ekodakāharaṇalakṣaṇārthakriyetyādyapi na
yuktam, rūpādyatiriktasyodakasyānabhyupagamāt, ekaika
syānekāhāryatve pramāṇābhāvāt, samudāyasya cāsiddheḥ |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | ata eveti | rūparasādīnāmekasya kāryasyā
nanubhavādityarthaḥ | upādeyeti | na hi rūpādibhirekaṃ kārya
mupādīyata iti tava mama vā'bhyupagama ityarthaḥ | nanu rūpādibhi
rekaṃ kāryaṃ nopādīyate, tathāpi nimittamudakāharaṇāderbhavantye
vetyata āha | eketi | udakamapi tvanmate rūpādyevetyarthaḥ | nanu
tathāpi rūpādyātmakameva tat sarveṣāṃ kāryaṃ syādityata āha |
ekaikasyeti | rūpajanye sparśajanyatāyāṃ pramāṇābhāvāt | tathāpi
rūpādisamudāyajanyameva tajjalāharaṇamata āha | samudāyasyeti |
tadarthamevaikakāryatvasyānusaraṇāt tatra ca pramāṇābhāvādityarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | rūpādyekaikātmakamudakaṃ nānekarūpādyāhāryaṃ
mānābhāvāt, samudāyābhāvācca na samudāyasya samudāyāhāryatva
mityāha | ekaikasyeti ||
ata eva naikakāraṇatayāpīti | nimittamantareṇa
tu samudāyavyavahāre'tiprasaṅgaḥ |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | ata eveti | caturṇāṃ rūpādīnāmekaṃ kāraṇa
matra pramāṇābhāvādityarthaḥ | atiprasaṅga iti | bhinnakālabhinna
deśānāmapi samudāyavyavahāraḥ syādityarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | nimittamiti | ekamupādhimityarthaḥ || tṛtīye na vivādaḥ |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | tṛtīye tviti | pratisandhānasya rūpādyati
riktavastuviṣayatva ityarthaḥ ||
nāpi caturthaḥ, sa hi vijñānanayamāśritya vā syāt
dvicandrādivadvisamvādādvā |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | vastvananurodhyākāraviṣayatveti dūṣayati |
nāpīti | sa hīti || ādye tu rūpādiṣu kaḥ pakṣapātaḥ |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | yadi vijñānavādamāśrityocyate tadā rūpā
dīnāmapi viplava evetyāha | ādya iti ||
prāpterarthakriyāsthiteśca na dvitīyopi | te dve
rūpādīnāmiti cet, na teṣām, kintu tasyaiveti kiṃ
na syāt | bādhakāditi cet, na tāvatkramayaugapadya
virodho raktāraktavirodho vā bādhakaṃ, niṣiddhatvāt,
kṣaṇikaparamāṇurūpadravyeṇākrānteśca | sambandhābhāva iti
cet, asambandhastāvadastu | kathaṃ tadvat pratīyata iti
cet, teṣāṃ tathotpādāditi parihāro'stu tavaiva yathā
śarīraṃ cetanāvaditi | rūpādibhireva samastārtha
kriyāsiddheḥ kiṃ tadatiriktadravyakalpanayeti cenna |
tāvanmātreṇaiva samastārthakriyāsiddheḥ kiṃ rūpādikalpa
nayetyasyāpi vācāṭavacaso'vakāśaprasaṅgāt | pratīya
mānatvāditi cet, tulyam |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | nanvekaṃ sthūlamityavayavigocaraṃ jñānam, tacca
dvicandrādijñānavadvisamvādīti nāvayavini pramāṇamityata āha |
prāpteriti | atrānyathāsiddhimāha | te dve iti | prāptyarthakriye
ityarthaḥ | atra vinigamanāvirahaṃ tāvadāha | na teṣāmiti |
tasyaiveti | avayavina ityarthaḥ | bādhakāditi | yadi guṇī
sthiraḥ syānna krameṇa kuryānna vā yugapat, yadi cāvayavī paṭādiḥ
syāttadā raktāraktavirodhaḥ syāditi guṇini bādhakamityarthaḥ |
etaddvayabādhakaṃ pūrvameva parihṛtamityāha | niṣiddhatvāditi |
kiñca kṣaṇike paramāṇurūpe ca guṇini naitaddvayaṃ bādhakamityāha |
kṣaṇiketi | sambandhābhāva iti | guṇini bādhakamityanuṣañja-
nīyam | guṇasamavāyāddhi guṇī bhavet, sa eva tu nāstītyarthaḥ |
sambandhābhāve rūpaviśiṣṭapratītiḥ kathamityāha | kathamiti |
teṣāmiti | rūpādīnāṃ tathaivotpādāt sambandhaṃ vinaiva viśiṣṭa
buddhijanakatvenotpādādityarthaḥ | tavaiveti | jñānacaitanikasyetyarthaḥ |
rūpādīnāmubhayasiddhatvāllabdhaḥ klṛptaparigraha iti kiṃ guṇinetyāha |
rūpādibhireveti | nanu rūpādyanabhyupagame tavāpasiddhānta ityata
āha | vācāṭeti | pratīyamānatvāditi | rūpādyabhyupagama iti
śeṣaḥ | pratītirdravye'pi tulyetyāha | tulyamiti ||
bhagīº ṭīº | te dve iti | prāptyarthakriye ityarthaḥ | tasyaiva
guṇina ityarthaḥ | kṣaṇiketi | uktabādhakayoḥ sthairyāvayavinoreva
sambhavānna tu guṇabhinne guṇinītyarthaḥ | sambandhābhāvo bādhaka
mityarthaḥ | atiriktasambandhe bādhakādityarthaḥ | kathamiti |
rūpādibhirasambandhe rūpādimattayā jñāyetetyarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | (te dve prāptyarthakriye |) kramayaugapadyavirodhasya
sthire raktatvāraktatvādivirodhasya cāvayavini bādhakatvaṃ sambhāvyeta,
na tu kṣaṇike paramāṇau rūpādimatītyāha | kṣaṇiketi | sambandhā
bhāva iti | bādhakamityanuṣajyate || etenālīkaviṣayatāpi nirastā |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | eteneti | rūpādīnāmapyalīkatvaprasaṅgenetyarthaḥ ||
abhedasādhanaṃ bādhakamiti cet, kiṃ tat | sahopa
lambhaniyama iti cenna | samasahopalambhaniyamasyā
siddheḥ, pītaśaṅkhopalambhādau śvaityānupalambhepi śaṅkhopa
lambhāt |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | guṇī guṇābhinnaḥ sahopalambhaniyamāditi
bādhakaṃ śaṅkate | abhedeti | samasahopalambhasyeti | parasparā
viṣayakapratītyaviṣayatvasyeti | vyabhicāramāha | pīteti | śvaityā
viṣayakapratītyaviṣayatvasya śaṅkhe'siddherityarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | saheti | parasparāviṣayakapratītyaviṣayatvāt
guṇaguṇinorabhedaḥ sādhya ityarthaḥ | sameti | tathātve vā śvaitya
śaṅkhayorabhedo na syādityarthaḥ | śvaityānupalambha iti | nanu rūpā
viṣayapratītyaviṣayatvāditi hetuḥ kṛtaḥ, na cāsyā'siddhiḥ, na hi
tadīyarūpaviśeṣāgrahe satyagraho hetuḥ, kintu yatkiñcidrūpāgrahe, sa ca
siddha eva | kiñca śaṅkharūpavṛttirūpatvavyāpyajātistatra na gṛhyate,
na tu rūpamapi, tathā copakrānto guṇaguṇinorabhedaḥ siddha eva |
atrāhuḥ | asiddhipadena nātra svarūpāsiddhirabhimatā, kintu
sandigdhāsiddhiḥ, hetoranyathopapatteḥ | yadvā pītaḥ śaṅkha ityatra
śaṅkhe pītaguṇavattā jñāpyate, doṣavaśācchaṅkharūpaṃ na bhāsata eva,
pītaguṇāropeṇaivopapattau bhramāntarakalpanāyāṃ mānābhāvāt,
kadācidevaṃvidhopi bhramaḥ sambhavatīti tatparo'yaṃ granthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | śaṅkate | abhedasādhanaṃ guṇaguṇinorbhede bādhaka
miti | yadyapi rūpāgrahe tvacā śaṅkhagrahānna sahopalambhaniyamo na
cāsāvanya eva sparśātmakaḥ śaṅkho darśanasparśanābhyāmekārthānusandhānasya
pratipāditatvāt, nirākṛtaṃ ca rūpatvasparśatvayoraikādhikaraṇyam,
tadagrahe gṛhyamāṇatvasya ca vinā bhedamanupapatteḥ, sāmagrīsājātye
nāpādyamāno nāyanopalambhaniyamo'kiñcitkara eva, tathāpi doṣā
ntaramāha1 | sameti | parasparāviṣayakapratītyaviṣayatvasyetyarthaḥ |
pītetyādi | na ca tatra śaṅkhasya rūpaṃ gṛhyata eva, śuklatvaṃ tu tatra na
gṛhyate doṣāt, tatra ca pītatvamāropya tādṛśavaiśiṣṭyaṃ śaṅkhe gṛhyate,
jātivyaktyorbhedasiddhistu na guṇaguṇinorabhedasiddhau bādhiketi
vācyam | tādṛśakalpanāyāṃ mānābhāvāt, āhatyaiva śaṅkhe pīti
māropasambhavāt | na ca tadīye rūpe gṛhyamāṇa eva cakṣuṣā dravyagrahaḥ,
mānābhāvāt, śuklatvādau gṛhyamāṇa eva śuklādirūpagraha ityasyāpi
suvacatvāt sandigdhāsiddherdurvāratvācca | na ca rūpāgrahe niyamenā
gṛhyamāṇatvena rūpābhedaḥ sādhyaḥ, rūpatve vyabhicārāt | atirikta
rūpatvānabhyupagame tattadvyaktyagrahe'gṛhyamāṇatvasya svarūpāsiddhatvāt ||
nāsau śaṅkhaḥ, kintu śaṅkha iva, taimirikakeśavaditi
cet, aho guṇavadvidveṣaḥ, yat taimirikakeśāḥ karatala
parāmarśapratiniyatārthakriyayorapāyānna sambhavantīti
tathā'pi sopi nāstītyāha | iti 1 puº pāº |
vyavasthāpayati, iha tu tatsambhavepi śubhratāmātrānupa
lambhāditi |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | nāsāviti | yacca pītatvenopalabhyata ityarthaḥ |
taimirikakeśānāṃ yathā karaparāmarśasya keśaniyatārthakriyāvirahasya
cābhāvādasattvaṃ syādiha tu tadubhayamastīti kathaṃ śaṅkhaśvaityamityāha |
aho iti ||
vyāpakatvāditi cet, vastunorvyāptirupalambhayorvā |
ādye na vipratipattiḥ | na ca vyāpakānupalabdhi
mātreṇa vyāpyatadupalabdhī nivarttete, dahanānupalabdhau
dhūmatadupalabdhyorapi nivṛttiprasaṅgāt | tatrāpi vā kiṃ
na parikalpayasi dhūma ivāsau na dhūma iti, pāvaka
vattānupalabdheriti | tasmānna vyāpakānupalabdhervyāpya
nivṛttiḥ, kintu vyāpakanivṛtteḥ, sā cātrāsiddheti
vācyam, tadetat tulyaṃ prakṛtepi | upalabdhestu vyāpti
rihaiva bhagnā, śvaityānupalambhepi śaṅkhopalambhādityuktam |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | nanu śubhratā śaṅkhavyāpikā, tathā ca prakṛte
tadupalambhanivṛttau kathaṃ śaṅkhanivṛttirna syādityāha | vyāpakatvā
diti | śubhratāyāḥ śaṅkhasyeti śeṣaḥ | na ceti | śubhratāyā
vyāpakatvepi tadupalabdhinivṛttau na śaṅkhanivṛttiḥ, na vā śaṅkhopa
lambhanivṛttiḥ, na hi vanhyupalambhanivṛttau dhūmanivṛttirdhūmopalambha-
nivṛttirvetyarthaḥ | upahasati | tatrāpi veti | dhūmaṃ dṛṣṭāntīkṛtya
śaṅkhe'pyatidiśati | tadetaditi | ihaiveti | pītaḥ śaṅkha itya
traivetyarthaḥ | kathaṃ bhagnetyāha | śvaityeti ||
bhagīº ṭīº | kiṃ śaṅkhasya śuklatvaṃ vyāpakaṃ śaṅkhopalabdhervā
śuklopalabdhirvyāpiketyāha | vastunoriti | prakṛta iti | pītaḥ
śaṅkha ityatrāpi bhramaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | vastunoḥ śaṅkhaśvaityayoḥ | tathā ca vyāpakasya
śvaityasyānupalambhādvyāpyasya śaṅkhasya tadupalabdheśca nivṛttiriti | upa
labdhyoḥ śvaityaśaṅkhayorupalabdhyoḥ | tathā ca vyāpikāyāḥ śvaityopa
labdhernivṛtyā vyāpyāyāḥ śaṅkhopalabdhernivṛttiriti ||
syādetat | pīta eva śaṅkha utpanna iti cenna |
puruṣāntareṇa śvaityasyaivopalabdheḥ |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | vaināśikaḥ śaṅkate | pīta eveti ||
raghuº ṭīº | śaṅkate | pīta eveti | sarvabhāvānāṃ kṣaṇika
tvāt, tathā ca siddhaḥ sahopalambhaniyama ityarthaḥ ||
nāpyasama eva sahopalambhaniyamo hetuḥ anaikā
ntāt, abhāsvaraṃ rūpaṃ bhāsvareṇa saha niyamenopa-
labhyate bhinnaṃ ceti | deśāviccheda iti cenna | asiddheḥ,
dehadehibhyāmanaikāntācca | na tayoravicchedastadanupa
lambhepyupalambhāditi cet, tulyam, rūpādyanupalambhepi
tadvatāmupalabdheḥ | tathāpi na viparyayaḥ kadāpīti
cet, tulyam | na hi dehādyanupalambhe dehyanupalambha
vaddehyanupalambhepi dehasyopalambhasambhavastava darśane |
pratipattiniṣpattisāmagrīsāhityaniyamena sahopalambho
vā deśāvicchedo vā syāt niyamena viruddhadharmā
dhyāsādbhedaśceti ko virodhaḥ | dharmavirodha eva ko'treti
cet, tadupalambhepyanupalambhaḥ tadabhidhānepyanabhidhānaṃ
tanniṣedhepyaniṣedha ityādi | nīlamutpalaṃ calatītyādau
ca vyāvṛttibhedanirākaraṇe pūrvaka eva nyāyo'nu
sandheyaḥ, anyatropādhibhedāt |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | nāpīti | guṇena sahaiva guṇino'nupalambhepi
guṇinā sahaiva guṇopalambha ityasamasahopalambho guṇaguṇinorabheda
sādhako'stviti śaṅkārthaḥ | atrānaikāntikatāmāha | abhāsvareti |
ghaṭarūpamālokarūpeṇa sahaivopalabhyate na ca tayorabheda ityarthaḥ |
tayorghaṭarūpālokarūpayorbhinnadeśatvamataḥ sahopalambhepi nābheda iha
tu deśāviccheda iti guṇaguṇinorabhedaḥ syādityāha | deśāviccheda
iti | pūrvahetuviśeṣaṇam | svatantro vā hetuḥ ubhayamapi guṇaguṇino
rasiddhamityāha | nāsiddheriti | rūpasya śaṅkhadeśatvāt śaṅkhasya ca
svāvayavadeśatvādityarthaḥ | deheti | dehī tanmate jñānaviśeṣaḥ |
tathā ca dehadehinaḥ svaprakāśajñānasyāhamityupalambhādityarthaḥ |
dehadehinordeśāvicchedena pratītāvapi nābheda ityanaikānta ityarthaḥ |
anaikāntikatvaṃ pariharati | na tayoriti | (a)dehadehino
rdeśāvicchedaḥ kuta ityata āha | dehānupalambheti | dehinaḥ
svaprakāśajñānasyāhamityupalambhādityarthaḥ | tulyamiti--rūpānupa
lambhepi śaṅkhasyopalambhamāha | guṇaguṇinorapi deśāvicchedā
bhāvādityarthaḥ | tathāpīti | yadyapi guṇānupalambhe guṇyupa
lambho'sti, tathāpi guṇyanupalambhe guṇopalambho nāstītyarthaḥ |
tulya ityeva darśayati | na hīti | dehānupalambhepi dehino
jñānasyopalambho na punarjñānasyānupalambhe dehasyopalambhastvaddarśane
tvayā dehopalambhasya dehinaḥ svaprakāśakatvenopalambhaniyamasvīkārā
dityarthaḥ | sahopalambhaniyamaṃ deśāvicchedaṃ ca hetudvayamabhyupa
gamyānyathāsiddhimāha | pratītīti | bhede satyapi dehasattvamanya
thopapannamityarthaḥ | tadupalambha iti | rūpāgrahaṇepi śaṅkhagrahaṇaṃ
śaṅkhābhidhānepi tadrūpādyanabhidhānaṃ śaṅkhaniṣedhepi tadrūpādyaniṣedha
iti bhede satyevopapadyata ityarthaḥ | nanu yatra yatra guṇānupalambhe
guṇyupalambhastvayocyate tatra guṇī śaṅkho na bhāsata eva, kiṃ nāma ?
aśaṅkhavyāvṛttimātramanyatra tu sahopalambhaniyama evāto na guṇa
guṇinorbheda ityata āha | nīlamiti | pūrvaka iti | vidhi
rūpaguṇasyāpohavādanirākaraṇāvasare samarthitatvādityarthaḥ | yadvā
nīlamutpalaṃ calatīti guṇajātikriyāsāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ pratīyate,
tacca samānādhikaraṇaṃ dravyameva, na cātrānīlādivyāvṛttimātra-
sphuraṇamapohanirākaraṇena tannirākaraṇādityāha | nīlamiti |
tat kiṃ sarvatra jātiguṇakriyānibandhana eva viśiṣṭapratyayastathā ca
nityatvānityatvādiviśiṣṭapratyayāḥ kathaṃ syurityata āha | anyatreti |
kvacidupādhikṛtopi viśiṣṭapratyaya ityarthaḥ | yadvā nanu sarvatra
viśiṣṭapratyaye yadi vyāvṛttibhedanirākaraṇaṃ tadā nāśvo'yamagauraya
mityādiviśiṣṭapratyayāḥ kathamata āha | anyatreti ||
bhagīº ṭīº | nāpīti | ekasyaivānyatarāviṣayakapratītya
viṣayatvaṃ na tūbhayoḥ, tathā ca śaṅkhāgrahe śvaityānupalambhosti, tasya
ca bhede'nupapattyā'bhedakalpanā syādityapi nāstītyarthaḥ | kalpanāyāṃ
kalpyakalpakayoravinābhāvaḥ, sa cātra nāsti, ālokaṃ vinā
ghaṭasvarūpasyābhānepi tayorbhedādityāha | anekāntāditi |
deśāvicchede satīti hetuviśeṣaṇaṃ vā sādhanāntarameva vā
deśāvicchedaḥ, tadubhayamapyasiddham, śaṅkhasya svāśrayavṛttitvādrūpasya
ca śaṅkhavṛttitvādityāha | nāsiddheriti | nanvavayavabhinno
nāstyavayavīti na tayorbhinnadeśatvam, tatrāha | deheti | bauddhānāṃ
dehī ātmā jñānameva, tathā ca dehajñānaṃ svaprakāśaṃ svamādāyaiva
dehaṃ gocarayati, na ca tayorabheda ityanaikānta ityarthaḥ | nanu
tayorna deśāvicchedaḥ, tasyaikādhārāvṛttitvāt, dehānupalambhepi
dehina upalambhādityāha | na tayoriti | guṇaguṇinorapi
nāvicchedo rūpājñānepi śaṅkhādīnāṃ jñānādityāha | tulyamiti |
viparyayaḥ śaṅkhādyagrahepi rūpādigraha ityarthaḥ | na hīti | yathā
dehāpratītau dehyapratītistathā na dehyapratītau dehapratītistvaddarśana
ityanekānta ityarthaḥ | hetoranyathāsiddhimāha | pratipattīti |
ghaṭapaṭayoḥ pratītyutpattisāmagryoḥ kvacitsāhityaniyamepyabhedā
bhāvādityarthaḥ | nanu vyāvṛttāvevāyaṃ virodho na tu dharmiṇyata eva
nīlamutpalaṃ calatītyādāvapaunaruktyaṃ bhavatītyata āha | nīlamiti |
pūrvako'pohanirākṛtāvuktaḥ | apohanirākaraṇādyathā pāramārthika
jātivyaktyorbhedepi sahopalambhaniyamastathā guṇaguṇinorapi syāt |
atha tayornityatvānityatvādiviruddhadharmādhyāsādbhedastulyoyaṃ guṇaguṇi
norapi, pākena ghaṭasyānāśepi rūpādernāśāditi bhāvaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | asama eveti | tasmin gṛhyamāṇa eva gṛhya
māṇatvam | asti ca guṇini gṛhyamāṇa eva guṇasya gṛhyamāṇatva
miti | deśāviccheda iti | deśāvicchedo'bhinnadeśatvam | abheda
sādhanamityanuṣajyate | asiddheriti | guṇasya dravyavṛttitvāddravyasya
ca janyasya svāvayavavṛttitvāt | atiriktasya cāvayavino'sādhita
tvāt | deheti | pareṣāṃ dehi vijñānam | tayorapi deśavicche
dānupalambhāditi bhāvaḥ | avicchedo deśāvicchedaḥ | taditi |
dehānupalambhepi dehino vijñānasyopalambhāt deśāvicchede ca
sahopalambhaniyamasyāvaśyakatvāt tavaikatvaparimāṇayoriveti | na
viparyayaḥ na rūpādimatāmanupalambhepi rūpā(dyanu)dyupalambhaḥ | tava
darśana iti | dehavijñānasya svaprakāśatvenāvaśyamupalambhāt | kṣaṇikaṃ
dehaviśeṣamadhikṛtya cedam, tena puruṣāntareṇa dehino'nupalambhepi
na kṣatiḥ | ata evāsvarasādvā hetvoranyathāsiddhimāha | prati
pattīti | ata eva deśadeśinornairantaryameva deśāviccheda
iti parāstam | uparyadhobhāvāpannanīlādisantānadvayenānaikāntācca |
nanūpalambhānupalambhādikaṃ na dharmiṇaḥ, paraṃ tvatadvyāvṛttibhedānā
mityata āha | nīlamityādi | pūrvaka eveti | vāstavamutpala
tvādikamanādṛtyānutpalādivyāvṛtterdurvacatvam | nanu yadi jāti
guṇakriyānibandhana eva viśiṣṭavyavahāro na punaratadvyāvṛtti
nibandhano vilīnaṃ tarhi kāryatvanityatvādiviśiṣṭavyavahāreṇetyata
āha | anyatreti ||
abhede ca dharmadharmiṇordūrādūratayā grahaṇe paṭva
paṭunī kutaḥ | na ca puruṣabhedena tathaivānyasyotpādaḥ,
ekasya dvairūpyābhāvāt | na cānyānya evāsau, eka
deśatayā tattvena pratisandhānāt | na ca sā bhrāntā,
bhinnadeśasya tathābhūtasya pratyāsīdatāpyanupalambhāt |
na ca nirālamba eva tadupalambho vṛkṣādideśaprati
niyamānupapatteḥ |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | dūṣaṇāntaramāha | abhede ceti | dūragrahaṇe
apāṭavaṃ alpaviṣayatvaṃ adūragrahaṇe ca pāṭavaṃ bahuviṣayatvaṃ na
syādityarthaḥ | nanu tathotpādādeva te syātāmityata āha | na
ceti | evaṃ sati tadvastu dvirūpamāpadyetetyarthaḥ | nanvanyaḥ paṭugrahaṇa
viṣayo'nyaścāpaṭugrahaṇaviṣaya iti kuto vastudvairūpyamityata āha |
na ceti | ya eva dūrāddṛṣṭaḥ sa evāyaṃ vṛkṣa iti nikaṭasthena
pratyabhijñānādityarthaḥ | na ca seti | sā ekadeśatā bhrāntā
bhramaviṣaya ityarthaḥ | pratyāsīdatopi puruṣasya tatra bādhānavatārānna
bhrāntetyāha | bhinnadeśasyeti | nanu taimirikakeśopalambhavannirā
lambana eva paṭvapaṭugraha ityata āha | na ceti | evaṃ sati
vṛkṣādistadviṣayatayā nollikhyetetyarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | kiñca dharmiṇo yāvaddharmyaṃ tadā kathaṃ dharmajñāne
satyeva kasyaciddharmasyāgrahaḥ kasyaciddharmasya graha ityāha | abhede
ceti | bahutaradharmagrāhakatvaṃ paṭutvam, alpataratadgrāhakatvamapaṭutvam |
paṭvapaṭujñānabhedāt puruṣabhedaḥ | tathaiveti | paṭujñānapuruṣāpekṣayā
paṭurapaṭujñānapuruṣāpekṣayā tvapaṭurartha evopeyata ityarthaḥ | dvairūpyaṃ
mithoviruddhadharmadvayam | nanu paṭutvādapaṭurartho'nya eveti na doṣa
ityāśaṅkya nirākaroti | na cānyeti | tattvenābhedenetyarthaḥ |
sā ekadeśatā | tathābhūtasyaikadeśatvena pratyabhijñāyamānasyetyarthaḥ |
nirālambanaḥ pāramārthikāviṣayaḥ | pratiniyamaḥ pravṛttiniyamaḥ
pratītiniyamo vā ||
raghuº ṭīº | yatra jātyāderasambhavastatra dūṣaṇāntaramāha |
abhede ceti | dūratvenāpaṭugrahaṇamadūratvena ca paṭugrahaṇam | bahutara
dharmagrāhitvaṃ paṭutvamalpadharmagrāhitvaṃ cāpaṭutvam | dharmigrahe ca
tadabhinnānāṃ sarveṣāmeva grahāttathātvāsambhava ityarthaḥ | atha paṭutva
mapaṭutvaṃ ca viṣayadharmastadgrāhitayā ca grahaṇe paṭutvāpaṭutvavyavahāraḥ,
eka eva cārtho nedīyāṃsaṃ puruṣaṃ prati paṭutvenotpadyata iti tena
paṭutvena gṛhyate, davīyāṃsaṃ prati cāpaṭutveneti tenāpaṭutvenetyāśaṅkya
nirākaroti | na ceti | dvairūpyaṃ viruddhobhayarūpa(va)tva(ttva)m | dharma
dharmiṇorabhede dharmigrāhiṇāpyekena paṭutvamevānyena cāpaṭutvameva
gṛhyata ityevāsambaddhamityapi draṣṭavyam | anyānya iti | ekaḥ
paṭurapaṭuścānya ityarthaḥ | tattvena abhinnatvena | sā ekadeśatā |
bhrāntā bhramaviṣayaḥ | evaṃ tattvamapi bhrāntamiti draṣṭavyam |
tathābhūtasya paṭvapaṭurūpasya | nirālambanaḥ sadanālambanaḥ | tadupalambhaḥ
paṭutvāpaṭutvopalambhaḥ | deśapratiniyamaḥ pratiniyatadeśaviṣayatvam |
ayaṃ hi paṭvādipratyayo niyate vṛkṣādau, nirālambanastu śaśa
viṣāṇādipratyayo na tatheti ||
na cādhipatipratyayatvāttasyeti yuktam, anubhavānāṃ
taddeśollekhānanurodhāt, ullekhe vā sa evālambana
pratyayaḥ, tāvanmātrānubandhitvādavalambanavyavahārasya |
na ca deśo'stvālambanaṃ na tu vṛkṣādiriti sāmpratam,
anupalabdhaviśeṣatayā deśadeśinoraviśeṣāt | na ca
davīyāṃsopi viśeṣāḥ sphurantyeva, na tu niścīyanta
iti yuktam, na hi yogavimalāñjanadhautadṛṣṭeranyasya
tārāvyūhagatayaḥ pratibhāntīti śakyaṃ pratipādayitum |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | nanu vṛkṣādideśapratiniyato'pyupalambhaḥ spaṣṭā
spaṣṭarūpo'nādivāsanāprabhava evetyata āha | na cādhipatīti |
adhipatiranādivāsanā, yadadhīnāḥ sthūlādivikalpāḥ sā pratyayaḥ
kāraṇaṃ yasyetyarthaḥ | vāsanāyā nirapekṣāyāḥ kāraṇatvābhyupagame'ti
prasaṅga iti tadudbodhako'nubhavo vācyaḥ, sa ca na deśamullikhatīti
tadudbodhitā vāsanāpi na tadullikhedityāha | anubhavānāmiti |
nirvikalpakānāmityarthaḥ | nanvananubhavenāpi deśa ullikhyatā
mata āha | ullekha iti | tarhi siddha eva vṛkṣādirdeśastatra ca
spaṣṭāspaṣṭagrahaṇaṃ ca siddhamityarthaḥ | nanvanubhavaviṣayatvepi vṛkṣādiḥ
kathaṃ sālambana ityata āha | tāvanmātreti | nanu spaṣṭāspaṣṭagrahaṇa
viṣayo na vṛkṣaḥ, kintu taddeśa ityata āha | na ceti | spaṣṭāspaṣṭa
grahaṇayoryathā deśini vṛkṣe virodhāpādakatvaṃ tathā deśe bhūtalā
dāvapi tadā syāttatrāpi hi dūrādyāvadviśeṣānupalambhasyāviśeṣā
dityarthaḥ | nanu spaṣṭagrahaṇaṃ nāstyeva yena virodhaḥ syāt, kintu
grahaṇāni nirvikalpakāni sarvatra spaṣṭānyeva, savikalpakaṃ tu sarva
viśeṣaviṣayaṃ yatra notpadyate tadaspaṣṭagrahaṇamiṣyata iti kuto
virodha ityata āha | na ca davīyāṃsa iti | yogavimalāñjana
dṛṣṭiryogī, tadanyo'smadādistasyāpi tārāvyūhasya davīyāṃso
gatayaḥ pratibhāntīti na śakyaṃ vaktumato yaduktaṃ davīyāṃsopi
viśeṣāḥ sphuranti na tu niścīyanta iti, tanna yuktamityarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | nanu kāraṇībhūtajñānaviṣayatayā vṛkṣādi
deśasya pratiniyamaḥ syādityata āha | na ceti | adhipati
pratyayatvaṃ nirvikalpakatvam | tvayā deśasya nirvikalpakaviṣayatvaṃ
nāṅgīkriyate, aṅgīkāre vā sa eva pāramārthiko viṣaya
ityarthaḥ | tāvanmātramullekhamātram | na ceti | deśo bhūtalādi
statra pāramārthiko viṣayo na tu pratiniyamaviṣayo vṛkṣādi
rityarthaḥ | deśadeśinordharmadharmibhāvādabhede yathā dūratvāddeśasya
viśeṣā nopalabhyante tathā vṛkṣāderapīti viśeṣo nāstītyāha |
aviśeṣāditi | nanu dharmadharmiṇorabhedo dharmigrahaṇaṃ nirvi
kalpakarūpaṃ sarvadharmaviṣayameva, savikalpakaṃ tu bahvanyavyāvṛtti
viṣayatayā paṭvapaṭugrahaṇarūpamityāśaṅkāṃ nirākaroti | na ceti |
sphuraṇaṃ nirvikalpakam | niścayaḥ savikalpakaḥ | nirvikalpakasya
savikalpakonneyatvāttadabhāve tatsattvamaśakyaniścayamityarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | kāraṇībhūtasya nirvikalpakasya pratiniyata
viṣayakatvāt kāryabhūtasya savikalpakasyāpi tathātvaṃ na punaranādi
vāsanāsamutthānāṃ śaśaviṣāṇādivikalpānāmityādyāśaṅkya nirā
karoti | na ceti | svasamānākāragrahaṇajanakatvaṃ viṣayasyā''dhi
patyam grahaṇasya ca svasamānākāraviṣayavyavasthāpakatvam, anubhavasya
kādācitkanīlādyākārānyathānupapattyā nīlādyākāraviṣayasiddheḥ,
tathā ca tathāvidhasya tathāvidho vā pratyayo'dhipatipratyayaḥ |
niyataviṣayaṃ nirvikalpakam, tattvāt tadadhīnatvāt savikalpakasya
viṣayaniyamopapatteḥ |
adhipatirnirvikalpakaṃ pratyayaḥ kāraṇaṃ yasya tattvādityapi
kaścit |
niyatākārasavikalpakajananasāmarthyaṃ nirvikalpakasyādhipatyam,
tathā ca tasya savikalpakajanakanirvikalpakasya tathātvāt savikalpake
viṣayapratiniyama ityarthaḥ ityanye |
yadi nirvikalpakaṃ vṛkṣādideśamullikhet tadā tadanurundhāno
vikalpopi vṛkṣādiviṣayakaḥ syāt | na ca bhavatāmapi (asato)
vṛkṣāderavayavino nirvikalpakaviṣayatvasya sambhavo'nyaviṣayakācca
nirvikalpakādanyaviṣayakavikalpotpāde nīlanirvikalpakāt pīta
savikalpakotpādaprasaṅga ityakṣaratātparyābhyāmāha | anubhavānāmiti |
ālambate viṣayatāmātreṇāśrayate asantamarthamityālambanapratyayaḥ
savikalpakaṃ vijñānam, tathā ca tasyaiva kuto viṣayaniyamaḥ |
tāvanmātraṃ asadarthollekhamātram | ākare kvacidviṣayībhūtāyāṃ pratī
tāvālambanapratyayavyavahāraḥ | deśo bhūtalādiḥ | ālambanaṃ viṣayaḥ |
anupalabdheti | paṭvapaṭupratyayasya deśivaddeśasyāpi viśeṣānupalabdhyā
davīyaso'paṭurnedīyasaśca tadupalabdhyā paṭurnānyathetyarthaḥ | sphuranti
nirvikalpakena gṛhyante | na tu niścīyante na tu savikalpakena
viṣayīkriyante ||
aniścayānupapatteśca | anubhūto hyātmā na niścī
yata ityatra heturvācyaḥ | vāsanānudbhava iti cenna |
niḥśeṣaviśeṣavantaṃ dharmiṇamupalabhya vidūravarttina
stadakhilasmaraṇepi anubhavavyāpārānusāriniścayā
nudayāt |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | kiñca nirvikalpakagṛhītaḥ savikalpakena
na viṣayīkriyata ityapyayuktamityāha | aniścayeti | nanu nirvi
kalpakānantaraṃ yatra saṃjñāsmaraṇaṃ bhavati tatra tadviśiṣṭajñānamutpadyate
na tu sarvatretyāha | vāsaneti | anubhavavyāpāreti | anubhava
vyāpāraḥ sākṣāttvam, tena nikaṭe gṛhītasakalaviśeṣasya dharmiṇo
dūre'pi tadanubhavabalāt sākṣātkāri jñānaṃ syāt, tvayā ca
cakṣuṣaḥ prāpyakāritvānabhyupagamāt sāmagryantarasya sadbhāvādityarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | kiñca tadviṣayakanirvikalpakasattve tatkāryaṃ
savikalpakaṃ syādevetyāha | aniścayeti | vāsaneti | saṃskāra
sahakārirāhityarthaḥ | tadakhilasmaraṇa iti saṃskārodbodhadyota
nārtham | yatrāsyākhilaviśeṣasmaraṇābhāvastatrāpi tāvaddharmiviśiṣṭa
dharmyanubhava eva saṃskārodbodhaka iti bhāvaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | iti hetuḥ ityatra hetuḥ | tadakhileti |
smaryate'neneti smaraṇaṃ, tadakhilagocaravāsanodbodhepītyarthaḥ | anu
bhavasya vyāpāro dharmo'śeṣaviśeṣaviṣayatvam, tadanusārī tadvān ||
tathāpi cānubhavakalpanāyāṃ sarvaḥ sarvadā sarvaṃ
jānāti na tu niścinotīti kiṃ na syāt |
bhrāntivaśāt tadviparītaviśeṣaniścaye'nubhūtaviśeṣā
niścaya iti cenna | anubhavavaiparītye niścayasya sarvatrā-
nāśvāsaprasaṅgāt | yatra ca viparītasyāpyaniścayastatra
kā vārttā, yathā parācīnairbhāgairarvācīnānāṃ saṃyoga
vibhāgayoriti |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | tathāpīti | aniścitepyartha ityarthaḥ | nanu
rajatabhrameṇāntarite śuktinirvikalpake śuktiniścayo na bhavati,
tathā ca kuto'yaṃ niyamo yadanubhūtaṃ niścīyata evetyāśaṅkate |
bhrāntīti | anubhaveti | anubhavānantaraṃ viparītaniścayaścettadā'nu
bhavamātraprāmāṇyavādinaḥ kvāpi samāśvāso na syāt, śuktau tu
nirvikalpakaṃ na bhavatyeva, kintu smṛtarajatasya dharmīndriyasannikarṣā
dviparītaniścaya evotpadyata iti bhāvaḥ | kiñca parabhāgārvā
gbhāgayoḥ saṃyogavibhāgau pratyakṣāpratyakṣavṛttitayā vāyuvanaspati
saṃyogavibhāgavadapratyakṣau tatrāpi tvayā grahaṇamabhidhīyate, viparyayaśca
nāsti, tat kathaṃ na niścīyata ityāha | yatra ceti ||
bhagīº ṭīº | nanu tāvadviśeṣavaddharmyanubhavepi tadvirodhi
viśeṣaniścayo bhramarūpastanniścayapratibandhaka ityāha | bhrānteti |
bhrāntiratra tatkāraṇaṃ vivakṣitam | yadyanubhavaviṣamvādī niścaya
stadā sarvatrānubhave'nāśvāsastasya sa vikalpakonneyatvādityāha | anu
bhaveti | yatra ceti | yatra viparītabhramastanniścayapratibandhako
netyarthaḥ | yatheti | saṃyogavibhāgau nātiriktau, kintu dharmiṇa
utpādaviśeṣāviti naye dharmiṇo'nubhavena viśeṣadarśanādviparītā
niścaye yatra niścayastatroktarītyabhāva ityarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | jānāti anubhavati | bhrāntivaśāt bhrānti
janakadoṣavaśāt | nanu niściterthe yatra bādhakamavatarati tatraiva
niścayasyānubhavavaiparītyaṃ kalpyate na sarvatreti nānāśvāso bhavatāmapi
rajatabhramasyārthavyabhicārāt sarvatrānāśvāsaprasaṅga ityata āha | yatra
ceti | na ca niyataviṣayānādivāsanāparipākavaśānniyataviṣaya
vikalpotpāda iti vācyam | avayavijātyādervāstavatvavyava
sthāpanāt | vikalpe'nubhūyamāne sākṣāttve bādhakābhāvāt sarvānu
bhavasiddhe ca guṇaguṇinorbhede na kiñcidapi bādhakamiti ||
iti guṇaguṇibhedabhaṅgavādaḥ ||
atha anupalambhavādaḥ |
astu tarhi nairātmyam, anupalabdheriti cenna |
sarvādṛṣṭeśca sandehāt svādṛṣṭervyabhicārataḥ |
dṛśyatvaviśeṣaṇānnaivamiti cenna | tadasiddheḥ | paropa
gamasiddheradoṣa iti cenna | svatantrasādhanatvāt | yadi
paraḥ sahasaiva naivamabhyupagacchet, nūnaṃ sādhanamidaṃ
mūrchet, yadi ca parādṛṣṭimavadhūya dṛśyantamabhyupagacchet,
evamapi sambhavet, na caivaṃ śakyam, tasya tadupahita
rūpatvāditi saṅkṣepaḥ | vistarastvasanto'kṣaṇikā iti
vadūhanīyaḥ |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | anupalambho veti yadātmani bādhakaṃ śaṅkitaṃ
tannirasyannāha | astu tarhīti | ātmā nāsti, anupalabdheḥ,
śaśaviṣāṇavadityarthaḥ | atra sarvānupalabdhimādāya sandigdhāsiddhi
māha | sarveti | puruṣaviśeṣānupalabdhimādāya vyabhicāramāha |
svādṛṣṭeriti | nanu yogyānupalambhena pratyakṣata evātmābhāvo gṛhyata
ityāśaṅkyāha | dṛśyatveti | anumānapakṣe doṣamāha | tadasiddhe
riti | tvayā''tmano dṛśyatvānabhyupagamāt, abhyupagame vā siddhaṃ naḥ
samīhitamityarthaḥ | naiyāyikaistāvaddṛśyatvamaṅgīkriyate, tathā ca
kathaṃ tadasiddhirityāha | pareti | svatantreti | tarkaḥ parābhyupa
gamādhīnapravṛttirna tu svatantra(sādhana)manumānamapītyarthaḥ | nanu kuto
vyavastheyamityāha | yadi ceti |
‘so'pi yāvat parāsiddhaḥ svayaṃ siddho vidhīyate |
bhavettatra pratīkāraḥ svato'siddhe tu kā kriyā’ ||
ityarthaḥ | sahaseti svārasikānabhyupagamavāraṇāya, anyathā'pa
siddhāntāpatteḥ | mūrchediti | svarūpāsiddhaṃ syādityarthaḥ | nanvanu
mānamapi parasiddhena pravarttatām, ko doṣaḥ, tvadanabhyupagamastvapa
siddhāntabhayādeva vādinā na karttavya ityata āha | yadi ceti |
paro'pi darśane sati dṛśyatvamabhyupagacchet na tu tadantareṇa dṛśyatva
mātramityarthaḥ | tasyeti | dṛśyatvasya darśanopahitatvādityarthaḥ |
vistarastviti | asanto'kṣaṇikāḥ kramayaugapadyarahitatvādityatrā
śrayāsiddhirbādho vā, tathā''tmā nāstyanupalabdherityatrāpītyarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | caturthamātmani bādhakaṃ dūṣayitumupanyasyati |
astu tarhīti | dehādibhinno nāstyātmā, anupalambhādityarthaḥ |
atra sarvathānupalambho vivakṣitaḥ svānupalambho vā | ādye sarvatreti |
yadyapyanupalambho jñānamātrābhāvaḥ svarūpasanneva heturiti tatra
sandehābhidhānaṃ na yuktam, tathāpyātmā nāstyanupalambhādityanenaiva
śabdena jñānamātrābhāve virodha iti bhāvaḥ | antye sveti |
tvadadṛṣṭasyāpi vastunaḥ sattvādityarthaḥ | nanu na vyabhicāraḥ,
yogyatayāṃ svānupalambhasya viśeṣaṇatvādityāha | dṛśyatveti | tvayā
tasya dṛśyatvānabhyupagamādabhyupagame siddha ātmetyata āha | tadasiddhe
riti | naiyāyikaistathā'bhyupagamāt parasiddhena dṛśyatvaṃ svānupalambhe
viśeṣaṇamityāha | pareti | tarka ivānumānamapi parasiddhena na
pravarttate, svato'siddhe tu kā kriyetyāha | svatantreti | nanvanu
mānamapi parasiddhena pravartsyati viśeṣābhāvādityata āha | yadi
ceti | parānumānadūṣaṇārthaṃ yadi naiyāyiko na tathā'ṅgīkuryāt,
tadedaṃ sādhanaṃ na syādityarthaḥ | yadi ceti | parairātmano
dṛśyatvasvīkāre anupalambho neṣyata iti tathā prasiddherevetyarthaḥ |
tasyeti | dṛśyasya dṛṣṭyupahitatvādityarthaḥ | nanu śaśaśṛṅgasyevāsa
tkhyātyupasthitasya niṣedhaḥ syādityata āha | vistarastviti |
asatkhyāterdūṣitatvāttatrāpi śaśe śṛṅgaṃ nāstīti niṣiddhyate na tu
śaśaśṛṅgam, nāstyātmā ajātatvāt śaśaśṛṅgavadityatrāśrayasiddhya
siddhibhyāṃ vyāghātaḥ, pratiyogyaprasiddhyā śarīrādāvapi dharmiṇi
tanniṣedho'śakya ityarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | turīyaṃ bādhakamāśaṅkate | astu tarhīti |
anupalabdhirna jñānamātrābhāvo nāstyātmetyeva jñānāt, parantu
sākṣātkārābhāvaḥ, tatrāha | sarvādṛṣṭerityādi | sandehādityā
pātataḥ, vyatireka eva ca vyaktībhaviṣyati | vyabhicārastvatīndri
yānabhyupagamena śakyaparihāratvānnodbhāvitaḥ | naivam na svādṛṣṭe
rvyabhicāraḥ | svatantreti | prasaṅgo hi parābhyupagamasiddhena hetunā
pravarttate, parābhyupagame'niṣṭaprasañjanarūpatvāt, nānumānam, taduktam |
‘yastu hetuḥ parāsiddhaḥ svataḥ siddho'bhidhīyate |
bhavettatra pratīkāraḥ svato'siddhe tu kā kriyā’ ||
iti | sopahāsamāha | yadi ceti | sahasā apasiddhānta
bhayaviraheṇa | yena yaddṛśyaṃ tadanyena tasyādṛṣṭirasattvasādhikā tenaiva
vā | nādyaḥ, vādyadṛśyasya prativādibuddhyādeḥ sattvopagamāt |
dvitīye tu yena yaddṛśyaṃ taddṛṣṭestatra sattvādasiddhirityāha | yadi
ceti | etena yogyānupalabdhyā tanniṣedha ityapi pratyuktam |
dṛśyaṃ dṛśyatvaviśiṣṭam | taṃ ātmānam | tasya dṛśyatvaviśiṣṭasya |
itivat ityatreva | yathā sthirasya dharmiṇaḥ siddhyasiddhyorbādhāśrayā
siddhibhyāṃ tatrāsattvasādhanamaśakyaṃ tathā''tmanyapīti | kiṃ cāsattvaṃ
nātyantābhāvapratiyogitvam, siddhasādhanāt | nāpi sarvakālāva
cchedena sarvadeśavṛtteratyantābhāvasya pratiyogitvam, sarvatra deśe
sarvasya kālasyāvacchedakatvāsambhavāt, kvacidanyatrāpyaprasiddheḥ, asa
tkhyāternirāsāt, ātmani siddhasādhanācca | nāpi prāgabhāvadhvaṃsa
pratiyogitvam, ghaṭādāvavivādāt | ātmani ca vītarāgajanmā
darśanādityādinā nyāyenānāditvasiddhyā'nādeśca bhāvasya kāraṇā
bhāvād dhvaṃsāsambhavena bādhāt, sādhakavirahācca, meyatvadravyatvāde
raprayojakatvāt | nāpi sattāyā jātervirahaḥ, ghaṭādāvivātmanyapi
tatsādhakasya pratyakṣasya sambhavāt, tathātvepi ca dharmiṇo'napāyāt |
ata eva na deśakālasambandhavirahaḥ, tatsādhakamānabādhitatvāt,
sādhakābhāvācca | ata eva na svarūpasattvavirahaḥ, svarūpasiddhyasiddhibhyāṃ
vyāghātācca | ata eva ca na prameyatvābhāvaḥ, sādhyāprasiddheśca |
nāpi prameyatvavyāpakārthakriyāviraheṇa tadabhāvasādhanam, tvayā
kevalavyatirekiṇo mānatvānabhyupagamāt, vyāpteḥ pakṣadharmatāyāścā
siddheḥ | asya ca jñānasya prāmāṇye vyāghāto'prāmāṇye tu
kuto'bhimatasiddhirityādi svayamūhanīyam ||
athātmasadbhāve kiṃ pramāṇam | pratyakṣameva tāvat,
ahamiti vikalpasya prāṇabhṛnmātrasiddhatvāt | na
vāyamavastukaḥ sandigdhavastuko vā, aśābdatvāda
pratikṣepācca | na ca laiṅgikaḥ, ananusaṃhitaliṅgasyāpi
svapratyayāt | na ca smṛtiriyam, ananubhūte tadanupa
patteḥ | anādivāsanāvaśādanādirayamavastuko vikalpa
ityapi na yuktam, nīlādivikalpasādhāraṇyāt | iha
vāsanāmupādāyānāśvāse pramāṇāntarepi kaḥ samā
śvāso yato nīlādivikalpeṣu samāśvāsaḥ syāt |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | nanu sādhakabādhakamānābhāvādātmani sandehaḥ
syādataḥ sādhakamāha | pratyakṣamiti | āgamānumānayorapi
ātmani sattve pratyakṣasyopajīvyatvāttadeva prathamamuktam | nanu
śaśaviṣāṇapratyayavadahamiti pratyayaḥ syādityata āha | na ceti |
bauddhaiḥ śabdādivikalpānāmavastukatvābhyupagamādāha | aśābdatvā
diti | sandigdhavastukatāyāmāha | apratikṣepāditi | nāyaṃ
sthāṇuritivannāhamiti pratikṣepābhāvādityarthaḥ | na ca laiṅgika
iti | yadyapi laiṅgikamapyasatkhyātirūpameva tanmate, tathāpi
hetvantaramapyāha | ananusaṃhiteti | nanvādhunikī vāsanā
mūlānubhavamapekṣate natvanādirapītyāśaṅkya nirākaroti | anā
dīti | tarhi nīlādyapi pāramārthikaṃ na syādanādivāsanā
vaśādeva teṣāmapi sphuraṇasambhavādityāha | nīlādīti | tadeva
sphuṭayati | iheti | ātmanītyarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | ātmani bādhakoddhārepi sādhakaṃ vinā
sandehaḥ syādityātmatattvasyāvivekastadavastha evetyāha | atheti |
yadyapyātmani śabdānumāne api māne stastathāpi tayoḥ pratyakṣopa
jīvakatvāt pratyakṣameva mānamāha | pratyakṣamiti | na ca
tadasiddhamityāha | ahamitīti | nanvasannapyayaṃ vikalpaḥ śaśa
viṣāṇavikalpavadavastukastathātvena sandigdho veti na mānamityāśaṅkāṃ
nirākaroti | na ceti | bauddhanaye śabdādivikalpā vyāvṛttimātra
viṣayatayā'līkaviṣayā yathā'yaṃ tathetyarthaḥ | apratikṣepādabādhā
dityarthaḥ | nanu śābdatvalaiṅgikatvābhāve'pyanādivāsanājanyatayā
śaśaviṣāṇavikalpava(ttayā)dasatkhyātirūpaḥ syādityāśaṅkya nirā
karoti | anādīti | ayamahamiti vikalpaḥ yadi bādhakā
bhāve'pi tathā tadā nīlādivikalpānāmapi vāsanāmātrajanyatva
sambhāvanayāpi savastukatve kā pratyāśetyarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | pratyakṣameveti | tatrātmā na tāvatpratyakṣato
gṛhyata iti bhāṣyaṃ punarāpātato vipratipannaṃ prati ahamiti
pratyakṣaṃ śarīrādibhinna ātmani pramāṇayituṃ na śakyata ityeta
tparam | avastuko vastvananurodhī vyāvṛttiviṣayakaḥ | tādṛśo hi
vikalpaḥ śabdālliṅgātsāderanādervā vāsanātaḥ, na cāyaṃ tathetyāha |
aśābdatvādityādinā | satyapi ca śābdatvādau nāvastukatva
mabādhādityāha | apratikṣepāditi | vināpi bādhakamavastukatve
nīlādivikalpānāmapi tathātvaprasaṅga iti bhāvaḥ | ananubhūta
iti svamate, ajñāta iti paramate | ayaṃ ahamiti vikalpaḥ |
vāsanāvikalpasantānayoranāditvānna bījāṅkuravat kāryakāraṇa
bhāvāsambhava iti bhāvaḥ | sandigdhavastukatvaṃ nirasyati | iheti |
yadyāntare'hamiti vikalpe vastvananurodhivāsanāsamutthatvasambhāvanayā
savastukatvasandehastadā bāhyeṣvapi nayanādisamuttheṣu vikalpeṣu tayaiva
tatsandehātkvacidapi vikalpe savastukatvanirṇayo na syādityarthaḥ ||
tasmādvāsanāmātravādaṃ vihāyāgantukamapi kiñcit
kāraṇaṃ vācyam, taccāptānāptaśabdau vā liṅgatadābhāsau
vā pratyakṣatadābhāsau veti | tatra yathā prathamamadhyama
prakārābhāvānnīlavikalpaścaramaṃ kalpamālambate tathā
'hamiti vikalpopi | tatrāyaṃ pratyakṣapṛṣṭhabhāvitve
sākṣādeva savastukaḥ, tadābhāse tu mūle'sya pāramparyāt
savastuteti |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | tasmāditi | nīlādyupaplavabhayādityarthaḥ |
prathamamadhyameti | pūrvadūṣitatvādityarthaḥ | caramamiti | pratyakṣa
tadābhāsapakṣamityarthaḥ | pratyakṣābhāsamūlatāyāmapi savastukatāmāha |
tatreti | ahamiti vikalpasya nirvikalpakajanyatve nīlādi
vikalpavat savastukatā, pratyakṣābhāsamūlatve tu paramparayā mūlabhūtaṃ
pratyakṣamabhyupeyaṃ pramāpūrvakatvādāropasyetyarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | pratyakṣābhāsamūlakatve savastukatvamupapādayitu
māha | tatreti | ahamiti | vikalpo yadi vastuviṣayā
vyavahitapūrvavarttinirvikalpakasambaddho yadi vā pratyakṣābhāsajanya
stathāpi paramparayā āropyarajatādinirvikalpakapūrvakatvenobhayathāpi
savastukatvamastyevetyarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | pratyakṣaṃ nirvikalpakam | sākṣāt nirvi
kalpakātiriktavyavadhānamantareṇa | pratyakṣābhāsamūlakatvepi savastukatvaṃ
vyavasthāpayati | tadābhāsa iti | pāramparyādvastuviṣayakanirvi
kalpakapṛṣṭhabhāvisavikalpakaprabhavavāsanāprabhavasmṛtijanyatvāt ||
na ca bāhyapratyakṣanivṛttāveva nirmūlatvam, buddhi
vikalpasyāpi tathātvaprasaṅgāt | tatra svasamvedanaṃ
mūlamihāpi mānasapratyakṣamiti na kaścidviśeṣaḥ |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | nanu yadyātmāsti tadā nīlādivadbahi
rindriyavedyaṃ syādityata āha | na ceti | nanu buddhiḥ svayameva
svasmin pramāṇaṃ na tvātmā tathā, tasya jaḍatvādityata āha |
tatreti | mānasamiti | vedanamityanuṣajyate | tathā ca mānasa
pratyakṣasiddha evātmetyarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | nanu pratyakṣasya bahiḥkaraṇajanyatvadarśanāccātra
ca tadabhāvānna pratyakṣatvamiti vāsanāprabhavatvameva syādityata āha |
na ceti | yathā'nyasya svaprakāśyakatvepi buddhistvanmate svaprakāśā
yathānuvyavasāyo'ntaḥkaraṇajanyastathā''tmapratyakṣamapītyarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | bāhyaṃ bahirindriyajaṃ pratyakṣaṃ nirvikalpakam |
nirmūlatvam mūlabhūtavastuśūnyatvam | buddhīti | upalakṣaṇaṃ cedam |
sukhādivikalpānāmapi mānasapratyakṣamūlakānāmavastukatvaprasaṅgo
draṣṭavyaḥ | sādhitaṃ ca sukhādīnāṃ jñānātiriktatvamākare ||
śarīrādivastuko bhaviṣyatīti cenna, nirupādhi
śarīrendriyabuddhitatsamudāyālambanatve'tiprasaṅgāt | sva
sambandhiśarīrādāvayaṃ syāditi vācyam, tatra kaḥ
svārtha iti vacanīyam | ananyatvaṃ svatvaṃ sarvabhāvā
nām, tathā ca yadā tenaiva tadanubhūyate tadā pratyetuḥ
pratyetavyādavyatirekādahamiti syāt | ata eva
ghaṭādayo na kadācidananyānubhavitṛkā iti na
kadāpyahamāspadamiti cet, evaṃ tarhi tvanmatepyahaṃ
pratyayaḥ śarīrādāvāroparūpa eva, tataḥ pratyetu
ranyatvāt |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | nanvayamahaṃ pratyayaḥ śarīra eva sthaulyādi
sāmānādhikaraṇyenāhantvagrahādityāśaṅkate | śarīreti | evaṃ
sati caitraśarīrepi maitrasyāhaṃ pratyayaḥ syāditi | svasambandhinītyanta
rbhāvya pratyayaśaṅkāmāha | nirupādhīti | buddhicaitanikatatsamudāya
caitanikavādināvapi tulyanyāyena pratyākhyātuṃ tadantarbhāvena
śaṅkitam | tatreti | svapadenātmaiva vācyaḥ, tathā ca siddhaṃ naḥ
samīhitamiti bhāvaḥ | ananyatvaṃ anyonyābhāvātyantābhāvavattva
mityarthaḥ | evaṃ sati sa evātiprasaṅga ityata āha | tathā
ceti | pratyetā yatra pratyetavyastatrāhamiti pratyaya iti nātiprasaṅga
ityarthaḥ | buddhicaitanikaṃ pratyāha | evaṃ tarhīti | śarīrādeḥ
pratipattṛbhinnatvādityarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | atiprasaṅgāditi | caitrasyāpi maitraśarīre
'hamiti dhīḥ syādityarthaḥ | tatreti | ātmānaṃ vihāyeti śeṣaḥ |
ananyatvamiti | yadanyonyābhāvātyantābhāvavattvaṃ yasya tattvaṃ svatva
mityarthaḥ | tadeti | pratīterevāśrayo yadā pratīyate tadā'hamiti
vyavahārastatretyarthaḥ | buddhyātmatāvādinaṃ pratyāha | evantarhīti ||
raghuº ṭīº | kaḥ svārtha iti | yasyātmanaḥ sambandhi yaccharīraṃ
tasya tatrāhaṃ gaura ityādikaḥ pratyaya iti niyamo nātiriktātma
sadbhāvaṃ vinetyarthaḥ | yathā bhavatāṃ svasminnātmani ahaṃ jāne ahaṃ
sukhītyādikā buddhistathā'smākamapi svasminneva śarīre setyā
śaṅkate | ananyatvamiti | yathāśrutamananyatvaṃ sādhāraṇamatasta
dvivecayati | tathā cetyādinā | naiyāyikādīnāṃ sāmānyato
'hantvamātmatvameva, tattadahantvaṃ tu tattadātmatvam, svāśraya eva ca
pratīterahamāspadam, tatrāsvaprakāśe svāśrayatvaṃ svarūpasanniyāmakaṃ
svaprakāśe tu jñāyamānamapīti mantavyam | tataḥ pratyeturiti |
ahaṃ pratyayo hi yadi sākṣādviṣayasamuttho yadi vā viṣaya
savikalpakapṛṣṭhabhāvī ubhayathāpi pūrvabhāvinaṃ viṣayamapekṣate, na ca
bhavatāṃ tasya kṣaṇikasyodīcyapratyayāśrayatvam, nāpi tadupādānatvam,
atyantavisadṛśasyāprakṛteśca bhavatāmupādānatvāsambhavāditi | na ca
pratītyāśrayatvopādānatvābhyāmanyat pratyetṛtvaṃ nāmeti ||
buddhau mukhya eveti cenna | tasyāḥ kriyātvenānubhūya
mānāyā bhinnasya kartturahaṃ cchinadmītivat ahaṃ
jānāmītyanubhavāt | nīlādipratyetavyākāravat prati
pattyākāropi pratipatterevāyamātmā tathā bhāsata iti
cet, tarhi pratyetavyapratipattyākārayostulyayogakṣema
tvāt siddhaṃ naḥ samīhitam | astu svopādānamātra
miti cenna | tatpratibhāsane tadākārasyāpi pratibhāsa-
prasaṅgāt, ākāramantareṇākāriṇo'navabhāsāt |
pravṛttisantānānyī buddhisantānaḥ pratipattā, vayaṃ
tamālayavijñānamācakṣmaha iti cet, astu tarhi
pravṛttivijñānopādānamanādinidhanaḥ pratipattā | sa
kiṃ santanyamānajñānarūpastadviparīto veti cintā'va
śiṣyate, niḥśeṣitā cāsau prāgiti |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | buddhistatropādhirityāha | buddhāviti |
ahantvādhikaraṇe kriyātvena bhāsamānā buddhirnāhaṅkārāspadaṃ bhavitu
marhatītyāha | tasyā iti | nanu yathā nīlādibuddhau nīlādi
rākārastathā pratipatterākāro'hantvaṃ pratipattau bhāsata iti śaṅkate |
nīlādīti | evaṃ yathā nīlādiḥ pratītibhinnastathā prati
pattāpi pratipattibhinna eva tasyākārastatra bhāsata iti siddhaṃ naḥ
samīhitamityāha | tarhīti | nanvahamākārāyāḥ pratipatteryā
pratipattirupādānabhūtā saivāhantvena bhāsata ityāha | astviti |
svopādānamātramahaṃ pratyayaviṣaya iti śeṣaḥ | svopādānaṃ hi
nīlādivijñānaṃ yadi tadā tadullikhadvijñānaṃ nīlādyapyullikhet,
tathā ca kvāhaṃ pratyaya ityāha | tatpratibhāsana iti |
ākāreti | pravṛttivijñānākāro nīlādistamantareṇākāriṇa
upādānasya nīlādivijñānasyānavabhāsanādityarthaḥ | ālaya
vijñānamupādānapadenocyate tasya cāhaṃtvamātramākāra iti na
nīlādibhānaprasaṅga ityāha | pravṛttīti | anādinidhana iti |
santānābhiprāyam | prāgeveti | kṣaṇabhaṅgaprakaraṇa evetyarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | na jñānātmakatvamahamarthasya jñānakriyākartṛtvena
tasyānubhūyamānatayā tato bhedādityāha | tasyā iti | nanu yathā
nīlādibuddhau nīlādyākāratvaṃ tathā jñānarūpasyaivātmano'hamiti
dhīviṣayatvam iti na jñānabhinnātmasiddhirityāha | astviti |
tarhyahamiti jñāne tadupādānanīlādipravṛttivijñānaviṣayetiprati
pattau pratipattrākāratvaṃ bhāsata ityāha | nīlādīti | tāvatāpi
nīlādivatsvajanyajñānabhinna ātmā siddha evetyāha | tarhīti |
nanvayaṃ yasyā buddheryadupādānaṃ sa evātmā pravṛttivijñānabhinnani
rviṣayānādyanantaḥ pratipattā siddha eva, sthairye paraṃ vipratipattistacca
sādhitamevetyāha | astviti | yadyapyālayavijñānasya kṣaṇikatvā
nnānādinidhanatvam, tathāpi pratipattṛtāvacchedakarūpavadrahitaḥ kālo
nāstīti bhāvaḥ | prāgeveti | kṣaṇabhaṅganirāsenetyarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | mukhyo yathārthaḥ | saiva buddhiḥ pratipattrī tatpūrva
bhāvibuddhyantaraṃ vā | tadapi nīlādyākāraṃ svamātrasākṣikaṃ vā |
ādye tasyā ityādi | svasya svāśrayatvasvopādānatvayorasambhavā
dityarthaḥ | antarā vijñānavādī pratyavatiṣṭhate | nīlādīti |
tathā cāhamākāropi jñānasvarūpameveti nātiriktātmasiddhiriti
bhāvaḥ | siddhaṃ jñānātiriktaviṣayavyavasthāpanāt | dvitīyaṃ
śaṅkate | astvityādi | ahamāspadamiti śeṣaḥ | upādānaṃ
sajātīyaṃ kāraṇaṃ buddhyantaram | mātrapadena vijātīyaṃ samavāyi
kāraṇamatiriktamātmānaṃ vyavacchinatti | ākāramiti | tavā-
kārākāriṇorabhedāt asmākaṃ tu viṣayaviśiṣṭasyaiva vyavasāya
syānuvyavasāye bhāsanāt | tṛtīyaṃ śaṅkate | pravṛttīti |
pratipattā pratipatterupādānam | astvityādi | upādānaṃ pareṣāṃ
sajātīyaṃ kāraṇamasmākaṃ samavāyi | anādinidhanaḥ samāna
kālīnānekāvṛttisarvakālasambandhitāvacchedakarūpavān | tacca rūpaṃ
pareṣāṃ tatsantānatvam, asmākaṃ tu tattadātmatvam | pratipattā
ahamāspadaṃ pratipattyāśrayo vā | prāgeva kṣaṇabhaṅgabhaṅgena ||
kaḥ punaratra nyāyaḥ | pratisandhānam | tathyamida
mityasiddhamatathyañca viruddham aviśiṣṭamanaikāntika
miti cenna | hetvarthānavabodhāt | nahi pratyabhijñāna
mātramatra vivakṣitam | tat kiṃ kāryakāraṇayoreka
santānapratiniyamaḥ | so'pi viruddha iti cet ?
eṣo'pi na vivakṣito naḥ | kastarhi ? pūrvāparadhiyā
mekakartṛtayā viniścayaḥ | eṣo'pi tāsāmupādāno
pādeyabhāvenā'pyupapadyata iti cenna | sthairyasthitau
tadabhāvāt | kṣaṇikatve'pi naikajātīyatve sati
tadutpattirevopādānopādeyabhāvaḥ | śiṣyācāryadhiyā
mapi tathābhāvaprasaṅgāt |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | atreti | sthirātmanītyarthaḥ | nyāyarucimpratyu
ttaramāha | pratisandhānamiti | vastutaḥ pratyakṣameva pratisandhānaṃ
sthairye pramāṇaṃ, kathāyāntu pratyakṣamapyanumānacchāyayaiva prayoktavyam,
tathā ca prayogaḥ ahamiti pratyayālambanaṃ sthiraṃ tādrūpyeṇa
pratyabhijñāyamānatvāt ghaṭādivat | pramārūpaṃ pratyabhijñānaṃ
svarūpāsiddhaṃ, bhramarūpaṃ cedviruddhaṃ, pratyabhijñānamātrantu jātyādi
pratyabhijñāne'naikāntikamityāha | tathyamiti | kāryeti | kārya
kāraṇayoranubhavasmaraṇayorekasantānaniyamaḥ santānāntare tadanupa
patterityarthaḥ | so'pīti | kāryakāraṇasantānasya bhedaniyatatvā
dityarthaḥ | āśayamudghāṭayati | pūrvāparadhiyāmiti | yo'haṃ
rūpamadrākṣaṃ so'haṃ sparśaṃ spṛśāmi yo'haṃ ghaṭamanvabhavaṃ so'haṃ taṃ
smarāmi iti pratyabhijñānamanekakartṛkādvyāvartamānamekakartṛkatāyāṃ
viśrāmyatītyarthaḥ | pūrvaṃ pratyabhijñāyamānatvaṃ sthairye'nvayaprādhānyenaiva
śaṅkitamityavirodhaḥ | anyathāsiddhimāha | eṣo'pīti | dhiyā
mupādānopādeyabhāvavyatirekaprayuktaḥ caitramaitrayoḥ pratisandhāna
vyatireko naikakartṛkavyatirekaprayukta ityarthaḥ | tadabhāvāditi |
dhiyāmupādānopādeyabhāvābhāvādityarthaḥ | abhyupagamavādenāha |
kṣaṇikatve'pīti | sājātye sati kāryakāraṇabhāva evopādāno
pādeyabhāvalakṣaṇaṃ tacca dhiyāmastyevetyarthaḥ | atrātivyāptimāha |
naiketi | na ca sākṣātkāraṇatvaṃ vivakṣitamiha tu vacanādidvārā
taditi vācyam | smṛtyanubhavayostadabhāvāt ||
bhagīº ṭīº | yadyapi kathādaśāyāṃ pratyakṣamapyanumāna
cchāyayaiva prayojakamiti samayaḥ tathā'pi nyāyāntaramāha | prati-
sandhānamiti | sa evāhamiti pratyabhijñānaṃ jñāturabhedasādhaka
miti bhāvaḥ | tathyamiti | yathārthaṃ pratyabhijñānamasiddhamayathārthaṃ
bhedaparyavasāyitvenābhedaviruddhaṃ tanmātraṃ ca jvālādāvanaikāntika
mityarthaḥ | kāryakāraṇayoḥ pūrvāparapratyayayorityarthaḥ | so'pīti |
tasya bheda evopapatterityarthaḥ | pūrveti | yo'haṃ rūpamupalabdhavān
so'haṃ spṛśāmīti pūrvāparayorekakartṛkatāsākṣātkāro'nekakartṛkā
dvyāvṛtta ekakartṛkatvaṃ sādhayati | tathā hyantimabuddhiḥ pūrvabuddhyu
pādānopādeyā tāvatkāle sthāyikartṛkā vā ekakartṛkatayā
pratyakṣaviṣayadhītvāditi vyatirekītyarthaḥ | nanu tathā pratisandhāna
vyatireke kāryakāraṇabhāvābhāva upādhirataḥ pratisandhāne kāryakāraṇa
bhāvaḥ prayojaka ityanvaye'nyathāsiddhiḥ, kartṛbhede'pi vilakṣaṇo
tpādabhrameṇaiva pratisandhānarūpotpādādityāha | eṣo'pīti |
sthairyapakṣe bhāsanaṃ mitho nopādānopādeyabhāva ityāha | sthairyeti |
nanu sajātīyakāraṇasyaivopādānatvādbuddhīnāṃ tathātve na virodha
ityāha | kṣaṇikatve'pīti | yadi kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ sākṣādviva
kṣitastadā māsādyantaritabuddhīnāṃ pratisandhānaṃ na syāditi para
mparayā sa vācyastatrāha | śiṣyeti | śiṣyācāryabuddhyorapi jñāna
vivakṣāprayatnasthānābhighātaśabdotpattikrameṇa paramparayā kāryakāraṇa
bhāvādityarthaḥ | etaccopalakṣaṇam | kāryakāraṇabhāve'pyananta
vyavahitaviśeṣaṇajñānajanyaviśiṣṭabuddhau pratisandhānābhāva ityapi
mantavyam | yadyapyupādheratiprasaktatve'pi sādhyavyāpakatvamakṣatameva
tathāpyanvaya upādhau sādhyasiddhiprasaṅgo vyatireke tu sādhyāvyāpakatvaṃ
apratisandhāne kāryakāraṇabhāvābhāvasyāvyāpakatvāt ||
raghuº ṭīº | syādetat siddhyatu kṣaṇabhaṅgo mā vā saitsīt sthiraḥ
punarātmā kutaḥ siddha iti pṛcchati | kaḥ punariti | yadyapi
sa evāhamiti pratyabhijñānaṃ sthairye pratyakṣameva pramāṇaṃ, vinā bādhakaṃ
dhiyāmautsargikasya prāmāṇyasyāpavaditumaśakyatvāt, tathā'pyanu
mānamudrayā tasya gamakatve doṣamāśaṅkate | tathyamityādi | tathyaṃ
yathārtham | viruddham | amedabhramasya bhedavyāptatvāt | aviśiṣṭaṃ
pratyabhijñānasāmānyam | anaikāntikaṃ jñānādau | tatkimityādi |
kiṃ vitarke | vivakṣita iti vipariṇatena śeṣe'nvayaḥ | kārya
kāraṇayoḥ smaraṇānubhavayoḥ | so'pi viruddhaḥ santānasya bheda
vyāptatvāt1 | pūrveti | yo'haṃ ghaṭamadrākṣaṃ so'hamidānīṃ taṃ
smarāmīti pūrvāparadhiyāmekāśrayatvaniścaya ityarthaḥ | nanvayaṃ niścayo
niścetuḥ pūrvāparakālāvasthāyitve hetuḥ pūrvāparapratyayavatorabhede vā,
ādye jñānamātrasya gamakatve śeṣavaiyarthyaṃ, dvitīye tu bhramasādhāraṇo
'yaṃ vyabhicārī2, pramārūpastvasiddhaḥ, sākṣātkāro'pi caupanayiko
'śe'laukikaścānekāntaḥ sarvāṃśe laukikastvasiddhaḥ iti | maivam |
parapratītiḥ pūrvapratītyāśrayāśritā pūrvapratītyāśraye sākṣātkriya
māṇatvāt pūrvapratītivadityarthāt | na cedamasiddhaṃ yo'hamadrākṣaṃ
so'haṃ spṛśāmi yo'hamaspārkṣaṃ so'haṃ smarāmīti pūrvapratītyāśraye
bhedaniyatatvāditi 2 puº pāº |
pareṣāmasiddhavyāptikaṃ cetyadhikapāṭhaḥ 3 puº dṛśyate |
parapratyayavattvagrahaṇāt | sākṣātkāraśca laukiko grāhyaḥ | yo'haṃ
ghaṭamadrākṣaṃ so'haṃ spṛśāmīti pratisandhānaṃ kartṛbhede'nupapadyamānaṃ
pūrvāparapratītyorekakartṛkatvaṃ vyavasthāpayati pratyetavyādananyasyaiva pratyetu
rahamāspadatvāt nahi bhavati caitro'haṃ yamadrākṣaṃ maitro'haṃ taṃ
spṛśāmīti punarākaracchāyāvāhī panthāḥ |
pūrvāparapratītimatorabhedapratisandhānaṃ tayorabhedasādhakaṃ viruddha
dharmasaṃsargavirahiviṣayatvaṃ ca viśeṣaṇaṃ granthakṛdeva dāsyatītyapi
kecit |
yadvā pratisandhānena pratisandhānaprayojakaṃ smaraṇamabhihitam |
anyadṛṣṭasyānyena smaraṇe'tiprasaṅgāt, yaduktaṃ “nānyadṛṣṭaṃ smaratyanya”
iti | na caivamathavetyādinā vakṣyamāṇābheda iti vācyam | ihānu
bhavasya svāśraye smṛtijanakatvāt sthirātmasādhanaṃ, tatra ca saṃskārasya
tathātvāttaditi bhedāt |
santanyamāne'pyātmani ekasantānāntaḥpātitvanibandhano'ha
māropaḥ prācīne pratyetari, tadabhedāropaścārvācīne, tatra codīcya
jñānavattvaṃ gṛhyate ityasiddho hetuḥ vāsanāparīpākaprabhavañca smaraṇa
manubhavitṛsantānaniyatamityāśaṅkate | eṣo'pīti | vyatirekiṇā
pratisandhānenaikakartṛkatve sādhye vyatireke upādānopādeyabhāvasyopādheḥ
sambhavāt sandigdhavyatirekitvamityāśaṅketyākare ṭīkākṛtaḥ |
atra ca ekasantānāntaḥpātināṃ jñānānāṃ satyapyupādānopādeya
bhāve prāyaśo na pratisandhānamiti sādhyāvyāpakatvamagra eva vyaktī
kariṣyata iti hṛdayam |
sthairyeti | sthairyavādināṃ sthiradravyasyopādānatvāt | kṣaṇikatve
'pi | kṣaṇikavādimate'pi | tadutpattiḥ tasmādutpattiḥ kāryya
kāraṇabhāvaḥ, sā cet sākṣādvivakṣitā, tadā antaritayoḥ sāntā
nikayoratathābhāvādapratisandhānāpattiḥ, atha paramparāsādhāraṇī
tatrāha | śiṣyeti | tathā ca tatrāpi kadācit pratisandhā
syāt vivakṣādīnāṃ vyavadhāyakatve sāntānikānāmapi tathātva kena
vāraṇīyam |
bhedāgrahe satīti cenna | prakṛte'pi tadabhāvāt |
śarīrabhedāgrahastāvadastīti cenna | bhinnajanmajñānā
vyāpteḥ | anupalabdhapitṛkeṇāpi bālenātiprasaṅgāt |
ghaṭakapālakṣaṇayoratathābhāvaprasaṅgācca | ekādhāratayā
1niyama iti cenna | tasya vāstavasya kṣaṇikatvapakṣe'pi
viṣamasamayānāṃ kṣaṇānāmabhāvāt, kālpanikasya
tvatiprasañjakatvāt | śarīrabuddhyorapi samānadeśatābhi
mānāt |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | prakṛte iti | nīlapītādidhiyāṃ bhedenaiva grahā
dityarthaḥ | ekabuddhisantāne śarīrabhedāgraho'sti na tu śiṣyācārya
buddhisantāna iti na tatropādānopādeyabhāva ityāha | śarīreti |
bhinneti | tatra jātismaratvānurodhenopādānopādeyabhāvastvayāṅgī
kriyate na tu śarīrabhedāgraha ityavyāptirityarthaḥ | doṣāntaramāha |
tathā niyama iti 2 puº pāº |
anupalabdheti | tatra śarīrabhedāgraho'sti natūpādānopādeyabhāvaḥ,
tathātve vā pitranubhūtasya putreṇa smaraṇaprasaṅga ityarthaḥ | ghaṭeti |
tadutpattāvapi sājātyābhāvāt upādānopādeyabhāvābhāvaprasaṅga
ityarthaḥ |
bālyayauvanabhedena svaśarīrabhedagraho'styeveti tatropādānopā
deyabhāvābhāvātpratisandhānaṃ na syādityapi draṣṭavyam |
ghaṭakapālayoḥ svabuddhyoścaikādhāratvāt kāryakāraṇabhāve satyu
pādānopādeyabhāva ityāha | eketi | ghaṭakapālayorvāstavaikā
dhāratā na deśakṛtā, na kālakṛtā, ghaṭakāle ca kapālanāśā
ddeśakālayośca kṣaṇikatvena bhinnatvādityarthaḥ | kālpanikasyeti |
tantughaṭayoḥ kapālapaṭayośca kadācidekādhāratābhramasambhavādityarthaḥ |
atiprasaṅgamevāha | śarīreti |
bhagīº ṭīº | nanvabhedāgrahaviśiṣṭasya tasyaivopādhitvaṃ tena
buddhyorbhedagrahe kāryakāraṇabhāve'pi śiṣyācāryabuddhyorna pratisandhāna
mityāha | bhedāgraha iti | yo'hamadrākṣaṃ so'haṃ spṛśāmīti
cākṣuṣaspārśanabuddhyorbhedasya pratisandhānasthale'pi grahānnaivamityāha |
prakṛte iti | buddhitvena tu bhedāgrahaḥ śiṣyācāryabuddhyorapyastīti
bhāvaḥ | śarīreti | śiṣyācāryayostu śarīrabhedagraha evetyarthaḥ |
upasthitena śarīreṇa bhedāgraho'nupasthitena vā | ādye bhinneti |
janmāntaraśarīrasyānupasthitena pratisandhāne bālasyeṣṭasādhanatānu
mityabhāvādādyapravṛttirna syādityarthaḥ | antye'nupalabdheti | parasya
vā kāraṇapitṛśarīreṇānupasthitena bālasya bhedāgraho'styeveti pitṛ
buddhipratisandhānāpattirityarthaḥ | na ca bhedāgrahamātraṃ niyāmakaṃ
liṅgādinā śarīrabhedagrahe'pi pratisandhānāditi bhāvaḥ | na vā
sajātīyaṃ kāraṇamityupādānakāraṇamativyāpakatvādityāha | ghaṭeti |
eketi | upādānopādeyatvabhāva ityanuṣajyate | tasyeti | upā
dānopādeyayoḥ samasamayatvābhāvādityarthaḥ | atiprasaṅgamevāha |
śarīreti |
raghuº ṭīº | upādānopādeyabhāvamātraṃ na niyāmakamapi tu
bhedāgrahaviśiṣṭaḥ sa ityāśaṅkate | bhedāgraha iti | bhedāgrahaḥ kiṃ
pūrvāparajñānayoruta tadvatoḥ tatrāpyālayavijñānayorjñānāvacchedaka
śarīrayorvā, ādye prakṛte'pīti | pūrvāparajñānayorbhedasyākalanāt |
na dvitīyaḥ | śiṣyācāryīyasthale'pi tatsattvāt | tṛtīyaṃ śaṅkate |
śarīreti | tatrāpi vyaktibhedasyāgraho vaijātyasya vā, dvitīye'pi
vastuto vaijātyasya vaijātyatvena vā | nādyaḥ | bālyādibhedena bhede1
pratisandhānāt | dvitīye bhinneti | smaraṇapratisandhānamadhikṛtya
cedam, tathā ca prāgbhavīyaśarīravaijātyasya caitratvāderaihikaśarīre
grahaṇāt pūrvajanmānubhūtasyeṣṭasādhanatādeḥ smaraṇaṃ na syādityarthaḥ |
tṛtīye'nupalabdheti | pituranupasthityā tadvaijātyatvasyāgrahāditi |
pitṛjñānasyāpi paramparayā śarīradvārā putrajñānanimittatvādeka
kartṛkatvaniścayarūpapratisandhānapakṣe'pīdaṃ draṣṭavyam |
bhedasya grahe'pi iti 2 puº pāº |
kecittu jātismarasya prāgjanmānubhūtapratisandhānaṃ bhavadbhirapyu
peyate tanna syādityartha ityāhuḥ |
anye tu upasthitāccharīrādabhedasyāgraho'nupasthitādapi vā,
ādye bhinneti | dvitīye'nupalabdhetītyāhuḥ |
lakṣaṇe'vyāptimapyāha | ghaṭeti | eketi | niyama upādāno
pādeyabhāvasya | ekādhāratve sati kāryakāraṇabhāva evopādāno
pādeyabhāva ityarthaḥ | tasyeti | tasya--ekasyādhārasya1 | ādhāra
syāpi kṣaṇikatvena bhinnakālayornaikadeśatvaṃ, tulyakālayośca na
kāryakāraṇabhāva ityarthaḥ | śarīreti | śarīrāvayave śarīra
buddhyādyorabhimānādityarthaḥ |
yadvā eketi | ekasya kāraṇasyādhāratayā niyama upādānatvasya,
tathācādhārādheyayorjanakajanyabhāva ityekamanyacca prāgukta lakṣaṇamiti
bhāvaḥ | tasya | janakajanyayorādhārādheyabhāvasya | itthañcāgre
samānadeśatāsādeśyayorādhārādheyabhāvaparatvam |
etena--
“abhrāntasamataikāvasāyaḥ prakṛtivikriye |
tatau hetuphalasyopādānopādeyalakṣaṇam” ||
iti nirastam |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | abhrānteti | hetuphalasya tatau santatāviti
dvayamupādānopādeyalakṣaṇam | kintadityāha | abhrāntaḥ samatayā
ekādhārasyeti 2 puº pāº |
ekāvasāyaḥ ekākārāvasāyaḥ sabhāgasantānopādānopādeyalakṣaṇaṃ,
visabhāgasantāne tu prakṛtivikārabhāva ityarthaḥ |
bhagīº ṭīº | eteneti | avyāpakatvenātivyāpakatvena ca |
hetuphalabhāvasya, tatau santatau | tathāca kāryabhāve satyabhrāntaḥ
samatayā sādṛśyenaikāvasāyaḥ tatsadṛśajñānamekatvajñānaṃ veti sabhāge
lakṣaṇaṃ, visabhāge tu prakṛtivikriye, prakṛtivikārabhāvaḥ | atra
kāryakāraṇayoḥ sāmye'pyekatvāvasāyasyābhrāntatvamasambhavatīti sarvā
vyāptiḥ, ekatvāvasāyamātramativyāpakaṃ mitho lakṣyāvṛttitvenānanu
gatatvenetyarthaḥ |
raghuº ṭīº | etena | ghaṭakapālādyavyāpakatvena1, lakṣaṇayoḥ
parasparākrāntāvyāpakatvena vā | abhrānteti | hetuphalasya kāraṇa
kāryasya | tatau santatau | abhrāntayā samatayā sājātyena ekāva
sāyaḥ ekatvāvasāyaḥ kāryakāraṇabhāve sati ekatvāvasāyanimittaṃ
sājātyaṃ tena ghaṭasantānayordaṇḍaghaṭayośca nātiprasaṅgaḥ | prakṛti
vikriye prakṛtivikārabhāvaḥ | antyaṃ visabhāge santāne, sabhāge
cādyaṃ lakṣaṇam | 2puñjātpuñjotpatterupagamānnirantarotpannayornīla
santānayoḥ parasparopādānopādeyabhāvaprasaṅgo nibandhe darśitaḥ |
kapālādyavyāpakatveneti 2 puº pāº |
tatra ca puñjātpuñjotpatteriti 2 puº pāº |
kāṣṭhasya tu 1prakṛtervikṛtiraṅgāra iti kuto niścitaṃ
bhavatā, yāvatā vahnerevā'yaṃ vikāraḥ kiṃ na syāt ?
vahnisambandhikāṣṭhādeva tadutpatteriti cenna | kāṣṭha
sambandhena vahnereva tadutpattirityapi kiṃ na kalpyeta |
pārthivaṃ pārthivopādānakamiti niścayāditi cet ?
kuta etat | sabhāgeṣu 2svakṣaṇeṣu tathādarśanāditi
cet ? etadapi kutaḥ ? abhrāntasamataikāvasāyāditi
cet ! atha keyaṃ samatā nāma ? yadi sājātyam ?
sādeśyaṃ vā ? tat prāṅnirastam | ekasantānatvañce
ttadapi tadutpattimātrañcet ? nimittanaimittikayorapi
tathābhāvaprasaṅgaḥ3 | upādānopādeyabhāvaścet ? kathaṃ
tenaiva tadvyavasthāpyeta | jñāneṣu tatpratisandhānamevopā
dānopādeyalakṣaṇamiti cenna | ātmāśrayaprasaṅgāt |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | atrānanugame satyeva visabhāgasantāne lakṣaṇasya
duravagamatvamāha | kāṣṭhasyeti | pārthivamiti | sajātīyamevopā
dānakāraṇaṃ tathā ca kāṣṭhāṅgārayoḥ sājātyaṃ, na tu vahnyaṅgārayo
rityarthaḥ | kuta etaditi | sājātyaṃ tattvamiti kuta ityarthaḥ |
sabhāgasantāne tāvadupādānopādeyabhāvaṃ prati sājātyameva tantramato
visabhāgasantāne'pi tadeva tantraṃ kalpanīyamityarthaḥ | etadapīti |
ceti dīdhitisaṃmataḥ pāṭhaḥ |
lakṣaṇeṣu iti 2 puº pāº |
prasaṅgāt iti 2 puº pāº |
sabhāgasantāne'pi sājātyametadapi kuta ityarthaḥ | abhrānteti |
ghaṭo'yaṃ ghaṭo'yamiti yatsamatayā ekāvasāyo'nugatāvasāyastenātra
sājātyaṃ niścitamityarthaḥ | samataiva durnirūpetyāha | atheti |
sājātyañcettadā''tmāśrayaḥ sājātyenaiva sājātyanirūpaṇāt, sādeśya
ñcet tadā ekādhāratākhaṇḍanenaiva nirastetyarthaḥ | nanvekasantāna
tvameva sājātyaṃ tacca sabhāgavisabhāgayostulyamityāha | eketi |
nimitteti | puñjāt puñjotpattistathā ca pūrvarūpasya rūpaṃ pratyu
pādānatvaṃ rasaṃ prati nimittatvamiti tvadabhyupagamarītyā rūpasyāpi
rasaṃ pratyupādānatvaṃ syādityarthaḥ | tadutpattiśabdenopādānopādeya
bhāva eva vivakṣita ityato nātiprasaṅga ityata āha | upā
dāneti | tathā ātmāśraya ityarthaḥ | ekakartṛkatvavyāvṛtyā prati
sandhānavyāvṛttiḥ siddhāntinoktā | tatra pareṇa kāryakāraṇabhāvābhāva
evopādhirupanyastastatra ca pratisandhānābhāvo hetuvyatirekaḥ sādhya
vyatirekavyāpako vaktavya upādhiśca1 tatra sādhyavyāpako vaktavyastatra
ca śiṣyācāryadhiyoḥ pitāputradhiyośca pratisandhānābhāvo'sti na
tu kāryakāraṇabhāvābhāva upādhiriti sādhyāvyāpakatvamupādhau
dūṣaṇamuktaṃ, upādānopādeyabhāvalakṣaṇakhaṇḍanantu prasaktānuprasaktika
mityavadheyam |
bhagīº ṭīº | sabhāgeṣu--sajātīyeṣu | prāgiti | ekā
dhāratvanirāsenetyarthaḥ | nimitteti | tathā ca tatrāpyekakartṛkatayā
upādhirastu iti 3 puº pāº |
pratisandhānaṃ syādityarthaḥ | yadyapi nātra ghaṭapaṭādau pratisandhāna
mupakrāntaṃ, kintu pūrvāparapratyayayorekakartṛkatvena pratisandhānamukta
nibandhanamityupakrāntaṃ tathāpi lakṣaṇāmātradoṣatvenedamuktam | ātmā
śrayeti | tasyaiva tallakṣaṇatve pratisandhānamevopādhiḥ syādityarthaḥ |
raghuº ṭīº | dūṣaṇāntaramāha | kāṣṭhasya ceti | etadapi
sabhāge santāne upādānopādeyabhāvāvadhāraṇamapi | kutaḥ | sādeśya
mekādhāratvaṃ yathopavarṇitaṃ prāk, śiṣyācāryabuddhyoratiprasaṅgena, vāstava
sādeśyābhāvena ca nirastaṃ | pratisandhānaniyāmaka upādānopādeya
bhāvaḥ pratisandhānameva ca sa ityātmāśrayaḥ |
tadyogyateti cet ? saiva keti cintyam | śakti
viśeṣa iti cet ? sa tāvanna pratikṣaṇaniyataḥ | yathā
hi tena tatkartavyaṃ tathā tādṛśā'pi tatkartavyamityapi
niyama eva, anyathā tena tatkṛtamityapi na niśrīyeta |
kṣaṇasya durunneyatvāt | tathā ca nirīhaṃ jagajjāyeta,
ākasmikañca kāryasya tādṛśatvamāpadyeta, tathā ca na
niyama upalabhyeta1 | nāpi pratisantānaniyataḥ
(śaktiviśeṣaḥ) viśeṣābhāvāt |
upapadyate iti 1 puº pāº |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | saiveti | pratisandhānayogyatāyā eva vicārya
māṇatvānna saiva lakṣaṇamityarthaḥ | śaktiviśeṣa iti | buddhīnāṃ sa
tādṛśaḥ śaktiviśeṣo yena pratisandhānaniyamaḥ kāryakāraṇabhāve
satyupapadyate śiṣyācāryadhiyośca sa nāstīti na pratisandhāna
mityarthaḥ | sa tāvaditi | śaktiviśeṣo hi kāraṇatvameva tanna
prativyaktigrāhyamaśakyatvādananugamācca1 | kiṃ ca yā vyaktiśca kāraṇaṃ
tajjātīyā'pi vyaktiḥ kāraṇameveti niyama eva | na cākāśaḥ
śabdakāraṇaṃ nacākāśajātīyaṃ tatra jāterabhāvāditi vācyam |
anvayavyatirekagrāhyakāraṇatāyā evaṃrūpatvāt | prakṛte tu dharmi
grāhakamānasiddhetyadoṣāt | anyatheti | jāteḥ kāraṇatvānava
cchedakatve | kuta etadityata āha, kṣaṇasyeti | nanu nopalabdhe
kāraṇatvaṃ ko doṣa ityata āha tathā ceti2 | iṣṭasādhanatā
'niṣṭasādhanatājñānābhāvāt pravṛttinivṛttī na syātāmityarthaḥ |
nirīhaṃ niśceṣṭaṃ hitāhitaprāptiparihāralakṣaṇakriyāśūnyamityarthaḥ |
ākasmikañceti | kāraṇatāvacchedakarūpaṃ vinā kāryatāvacchedakarūpaṃ
pratiniyataṃ na syādityarthaḥ | mā bhūtko doṣa ityata āha | tathā
ceti | dhūmajātīyaṃ vahnijātīyajanyamiti niyamo nopapadyete
tyarthaḥ3 | tathā ca buddhitvenaiva kāraṇatā vācyā pratisandhānaṃ prati,
tacca śiṣyācāryabuddhyorapīti bhāvaḥ | pratisantānaniyata iti |
danugamarahitatvācceti 3 puº pāº |
anyatheti 2 puº pāº |
nopalabhyetetyartha iti 3 puº pāº |
śaktiviśeṣa ityanuṣañjanīyam | viśeṣābhāvāditi | śiṣyā
cāryabuddhisantānayorvyāvartakadharmābhāvādityarthaḥ |
bhagīº ṭīº | tadyogyateti | tathā ca pratisandhānayogyatā
lakṣaṇa upādhirityarthaḥ | saiveti | yogyatāvacchedakaṃ rūpameva
nānugatamityarthaḥ | sa tāvaditi | pratikṣaṇaniyatasvarūpatvena vyabhi
cārānna kāraṇatvagrahaḥ, yā vyaktiryadvyaktijanyā tatastajjātīyā
vyaktistajjātīyajanyeti vyāpteḥ | na cākāśajanyaśabdavyaktyā vyabhi
cāraḥ ākāśasyaikatvāditi vācyam | anvayavyatirekagrāhyakārya
kāraṇabhāve tathā niyamāt | tatra ca dharmigrāhakamānasya tadgrāha
katvādityarthaḥ | yadyevaṃ na syāttarhyekakṣaṇikabhāve'nvayavyatireka
grahāśakyatayā kāryakāraṇabhāvāgrahāt kvacidapi pravṛttinivṛttī
na syātāmityāha | anyatheti | tādṛśatvaṃ niyatajātīyatvam |
viśeṣeti | kāryakāraṇabhāvābhāve'pi śiṣyācāryabuddhivyāvṛttānu
gataniyāmakarūpābhāvādityarthaḥ |
raghuº ṭīº | śaktīti | yadyapi pratisandhānānukūlā śaktiḥ
pratisandhātaryeva, na pratisandheye, tasya cirātītatvena tatrāprayojaka
tvāt tathā'pi tasya śaktiviṣayatvaṃ tathā cānusandheyānusandhātṛbhāva
evopādānopādeyabhāva iti bhāvaḥ | tādṛśā tajjātīyena kāraṇena |
tat tadajanyaṃ tat tatkāryajātīyam | tadajanyaṃ tajjanyajātīyaṃ
kāryamavaśyaṃ tatsamānajātīyakāraṇajanyamityarthaḥ | tathā ceti |
prativyakti kāryakāraṇabhāvasya anāgatakāryavyakteranupasthityā grahītu
maśakyatvāt sāmānyena rūpeṇa tadagrahe iṣṭāniṣṭopāyatāgrahasya
kāraṇasyābhāvāt kvacidapi pravṛttinivṛttī na syātāmityarthaḥ |
tādṛśatvaṃ niyatajātīyatvam | niyamaḥ kānicideva kāryāṇi
kiñcijjātīyānītyākārakaḥ |
pratisandhānaśakteḥ prativyaktiviśrāntatve apratisandheyāprati
sandhātṛvyaktyorupādānopādeyabhāvo na syāt tatra tādṛśaśaktau
mānābhāvādityapi draṣṭavyam |
viśeṣābhāvāditi | viśeṣo niyāmakaḥ śakteḥ sāmarthyasya
niyāmakamavacchedakaṃ vinā niyatadravyavṛttitvāyogāt jñānatva
santānatvayoścātiprasaktatvāt |
astu vaijātyamiti cenna | anupalabdhibādhitatvāt
nahi śiṣyācāryanīladhiyormātrayā'pi jātikṛtaṃ
viśeṣamupalabhāmahe | adṛśyatvādayamadoṣa iti cenna |
dṛśyasamavāyinyā jāteradṛśyatvānupapatteḥ | upapattau
vā dhūmādāvapi avakāśaprasaṅgāt | tathā cāvāntara
sattvavadavāntaradhūma eva vahneḥ kāryaḥ syāt iti śaṅkā
kalaṅkitatvāt na (ca) dhūmasāmānyamagniṃ gamayet |
evametat | ādyasyaiva tathābhāvāditi cenna | tatrāpi
śaṅkāyāstadavasthatvāt | tasmāt kāraṇasya vaijātye
pramāṇasiddhe kāryasya sausādṛśye'pyavāntarajātibhedaḥ
kalpyate, hetuvaijātyasya phalavaijātyaṃ prati prayojaka
tvāt, aprayojakatve tasyā''kasmikatvaprasaṅgāt |
kāraṇasājātye'pi kāryasya vaijātyaṃ sahakārivaijātye
paryavasyatīti yuktamutpaśyāmaḥ | anyathā prakṛte para
loko'pi na siddhyet | acetanopādānakamapi jñāna
mavāntarajātīyaṃ syāt, acetanamapyavāntarajātīyaṃ
jñānopādānaṃ bhavet, dṛśyajātyabhede'pi kiñcideva
nimittaṃ bhaviṣyatīti śaṅkāyāḥ samutthāpayituṃ śakya
tvād iti |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | adṛśyatvāditi | ekasantānikabuddhiṣveva sa
viśeṣo'sti parantu nopapadyeta ityarthaḥ1 | vyaktiyogyatāniyatatvā
jjātiyogyatāyā anyathā vahniprayojyā kācijjātiḥ piśāca
janyadhūmādviśeṣā bhaviṣyatītyapi śaṅkyetetyarthaḥ | evametaditi |
dhūme'pi vaijātyaśaṅkā bhavatyeva kintu prathama eva vahniprabhavo dhūmo
vahniṃ gamayatītyarthaḥ | ādyo'pi dhūmaḥ piśācādeva kiṃ iti
śaṅkāyāstatrāpi sadbhāvādityāha | tatrāpīti | nanvevaṃ tṛṇāraṇi
maṇisthale'pi vahnau vaijātyaṃ na kalpyetetyāśaṅkyopasaṃharati |
tasmāditi | atra hetumāha | hetuvaijātyasyeti | atraiva vipakṣa
daṇḍamāha | ahetukatva iti | nanvātmamanaḥsaṃyogajanyamapi jñāna-
nopalabhyetetyartha iti 3 puº pāº |
sukhādi kathaṃ vijātīyamityata āha | kāraṇeti | indriyā
rthādisahakārivaijātyaprayuktaṃ tadvaijātyamityarthaḥ | vaibhāṣikaṃ pratyāha |
anyatheti | yadi kāraṇavaijātye kāryavaijātyaṃ na kalpyeta, kārya
vaijātye kāraṇavaijātyaṃ na tantraṃ, tadā buddhisantānamātrādaviśiṣṭāda
viśiṣṭasukhaduḥkhātmakaparalokasiddhirapi na syādityarthaḥ | yadvā
anyatheti | ekasya karturanabhyupagama ityarthaḥ | aniyamaścettatrāha |
acetaneti | jñānopādānakāt jñānādajñānopādānakaṃ vijātīya
meva kiñcijjñānaṃ bhavedityarthaḥ | acetanamapīti | ghaṭo'pi
kaścidvijātīyo jñānopādānakaḥ syādityarthaḥ | dṛśyajātyabheda
iti | dhūmatvāvacchinna eva kaścidvahneḥ, kaścitpiśācādbhaviṣyatīti
dhūmādvahnyanumānaṃ na syādityarthaḥ |

tayā pratisandhatte na vā ? ādye tatpratisandhānādeva

kāraṇabhāvamātranibandhanaṃ pratisandhānam | na hyasti

sa evaikaḥ karteti siddham | ādye tāvanmātrasyeti | sarvajña iti |
sarvajñasya bhinnakālīnasvajñānābhāvānāmekakartṛkatvapratisandhānāt
